1b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gar skad du/ Ar+ya ran+du shrI duH/
1b2(dkon brtsegs): bya bya bya//
1b3(dkon brtsegs): shrIshrIshud+d+ha/ k+Sho tra gu Na/ byA hAn /
1b4(dkon brtsegs): ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
1b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// // bam po dang ngo //
2a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
2a2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la/ dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga
2a3(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / ngan song sel dang / spyan ras
2a4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen thob la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bzhi stong la 'di lta ste/ thams
2b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/ lha bye ba phrag bdun du rtsa
2b2(dkon brtsegs): gnyis thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang / mi
2b3(dkon brtsegs): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i tshangs pa bzhi khri nyis stong dang yang thabs
2b4(dkon brtsegs): cig go// 'di lta ste/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags zangs ris dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po stobs can dang / lha ma yin
2b5(dkon brtsegs): gyi dbang po phrag rtsub dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab dga' dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po bzhi po thams cad kyang g.yog lha ma yin/
3a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ brgya stong phrag du ma yod pa dang thabs cig go/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo dang
3a2(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po chu lha dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang / klu'i rgyal po gzi can dang / klu'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa dang
3a3(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po sa 'dzin dang / klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang / klu'i rgyal po ri bo dang / klu'i rgyal po bdud las rgyal dang / klu'i rgyal po zla ba'i bla ma
3a4(dkon brtsegs): la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / 'di lta ste/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang / rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po/
3a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang / rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po thams cad kyang / g.yog brgya stong du ma dang bcas
3a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / gnod sbyin kum bi ra dang / 'brog gnas dang / khab spu dang / yid bzangs dang / blo gros bzang po dang / dbyibs bzangs dang / kun nas/
3b1(dkon brtsegs): kha dog dang / gnod snyan ma 'khrugs pa dang / de dag dang gnod sbyin gzhan brgya sno dang yang thabs cig go/ yang ra'i che po ldan 'das rnal do ni ba kyi myong rje
3b2(dkon brtsegs): bar gnas shing bzhugs te/ lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lA ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang
3b3(dkon brtsegs): mi ma yin pa dag dang 'khor bzhi rnams kyis bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ rim gror byas nas mchod cing gsol te/ bcom ldan 'das bza' ba dang bca' ba dang
3b4(dkon brtsegs): myang ba dang / na bapa' dang / zhal zas dang / gzims cha dang / snyun gyi gsos spyan dang / yo byad babang po mang po bcas so// yang de'i tshe bcom ldan
3b5(dkon brtsegs): 'das snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ sham thabs dang chos gos gsol/ ltung bzed bsnams te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu la bya ba lag khrigs rgya stong gis spongs su bskor
3b6(dkon brtsegs): ngas sa nga/ ngas rgyas kyinam pa la pa na
3b7(dkon brtsegs): bsu dang / drang ma chen par mad par 'bas/ sil par ba stong thol sa/ rgyam mam nga ci langs kyi rje kyi ya ma
4a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir gshegs te/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong yang rab tu phyung ngo // de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa
4a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mdzad pas/ zhabs gang dang gang du gzhag pa'i zhabs bzhag pa de dang der pad+ma shing rta'i pang lo tsam/ 'dab ma ni gser/ chu ba ni dngul/ ze ba ni bai DUR+Ya/ snying po ni nor bu bzang po dang ldan pa
4a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams byung ste/ pad+ma de dag gi dbus kyi snying po la byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug pa dag 'byung ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do//
4a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs de dag pad+ma de dag dang bcas te/ rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po la lan bdun du skor ba byed cing tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// skye bo rnams la phan
4a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad ded dpon gang / yon gyi gnas gang dge ba rnam mdzad pa// shAkya khyu mchog blo zhi bdag nyid che// 'jig rten mgon po de ni grong du gshegs// lha yi gnas su gang rnams rtsen pa dang // de bzhin rga dang 'chi/
4a6(dkon brtsegs): las thar 'dod dang // bdud kyi sde rnams pham par gang 'dod pa// des ni shAkya'i seng ge mchod par gyis// 'gro ba rnams la phan zhing thugs brtse'i phyir// bskal pa bye bar spyad pa rnams spyod pa// thub pa
4a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sgra yang rnyed par dka'// thub pa de ring rgyal po'i khab gshegs bzhed// zas skom de bzhin gos dang bzhon pa dang // bu dang bu mo chung ma rnams dang ni// sbyin pa dpag med bsam yas gang btang ba/
4b1(dkon brtsegs): kun pa rgya nga nirgyal po'i khab tu gshegs// lag bkang ba mig dang ba dang // sA dang yan lagangs pa mgo bta hU~M// sman btang yon tan ldan pa gtong 'dod pa// des ni sranas can pa sa mcho
4b2(dkon brtsegs): brnyes so// sbyin dang dul dang sdom la gang bslabs shing // skyes bu dam pa tshul khrims ma nyams pa// bzod pa'i bdag nyid yon tan mchog ldan pa// zhi ba'i thugs de zong du deng gshegs so/
4b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal byeng pa'i 'jig rten rab gzigs nas// brtson mchog bskal pa bye bar gang spyod cing // bsam gtan mtha' yas mnyam pa med dang ldan// tshangs dbyangs de ni de ring grong khyer gshes
4b4(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po de yi shes rab ni// mtshungs med nam mkha'i khams ltar dpag tu med// bde gshegs de yi yon tan gzhan dag kyang // spyod pa dang ni rnam par smin pas byangs// blo g+h+nAn
4b5(dkon brtsegs): gang gis bdud kyi sde bcom zhing // mi g.yo go 'phang mya ngan med pa brnyes// chos kyi 'khor lo tshul bzhin rab bskor te// chos kyi dbang phyug de ni grong khyer gshegs// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis
4b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyan pa'i sku// bde gshegs 'gyur bar su dag 'dod pa ni// snying la rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems zhog ste// mchod pa'i phyir ni de yi thad du song // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug spang ba dang /
4b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyon mongs gzhan las rgyal 'dod pa// da ni ston pa'i thad du nyer song la// mchod pa rnam mang mtha' yas myur du gyis// tshangs pa dang ni lha yi dbang phyug dang // brgya byin nyid ni thob par su
5a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod cing // lha yi bde bas rtag tu can dka' ba// de ni thub pa mchod phyir nye bar song // byung ba'i'i bdag po rgyal por 'gyur bya zhing // rin chen mchog bdun rang gis tho/
5a2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang // bu mchog stong rnams kyang ni gang 'dod pa// sems can mchog la des myur mchod pagyis// khyim bdag tshong dpon khams kyi rgyal po dang // mdzes pa'i gzugs dang g.yog 'khor dam pa dang //
5a3(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod 'phel ba'i mchog rnams gang 'dod pa// de ni deng song thub la mchod pa gyis// gang su rnam par grol dang 'grol ba kun// thub pa rnams kyi chos mchog thos nas te// 'dren pa rnams/
5a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgra yang 'dir dkon gyis// de phyir chos nyan du ni deng myur deng / de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po dag tshigs su bcad pa de
5a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis bskul nas/ skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo rnams me tog dang / bdug spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma'i phur ma thogs/ gser dang dngul gyi me tog gi
5a6(dkon brtsegs): pur ma thogs/ gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs/ rnga bo che dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / mkhar rnga dang / pi lang rgyud gcig pa dang / g+ha s+thAn dang / gling bu dang / kha pos
5a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / kris pa la dang / nagral dang / pi wang thogs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa yid la byed cing / de bzhin gshegs pa la sems te/ sangs kyis dang ldan pa'i yid la drung bas dga' ba nga mchog tu sa
5b1(dkon brtsegs): bathob cung 'ayod par gyur to/ dems pam ldan 'das rgyal po rab kyi thong byer man por gshegs te/ bcom ldan 'dus kyi bas gsas pa na'i rngas pa la gagags pa du
5b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas grong khyer thams cad kyang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos/ lha dang mi'i sil snyan brgya stong yang ma dkrol bar spa byung / lha'i me tog gi chur yang rab tu bab ste/ sems can long ba rnams ni
5b3(dkon brtsegs): mig gis gzugs rnams mthong / sems can 'on pa rnams ni rna bas sgra thos/ sems can spros pa rnams ni dran pa thob/ sems can yid brel ba rnams ni rtswa gcig pa thob/ sems can
5b4(dkon brtsegs): gcenas rnams ni gos rnyed/ sems can bkres pa rnams ni zas rnyed/ sems can dbul po rnams ni nor rnyed do// de'i tshe na sems can gang yang 'dod chags kyis gzir ba med de/ zhe sdang gis
5b5(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ gti mug gis ma yin/ phrag dog gis ma yin/ ser snas ma yin/ khro bas ma yin/ nga rgyal gyis ma yin no// de'i tshe na sems can thams cad kyang byams pa'i sems dang phan pa'i
5b6(dkon brtsegs): sas dang ldan zhing / phan tshun du pa mar 'du shes par gyur to// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sangs rgyas skyes bu'i seng ge che// stobs bcu grong khyer nam gshegs no// de yi mod la
5b7(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnams// bde ba rgya chen dri med thob// long ba'i mig rnams mthong bar gyur// 'on pa thos pa'i rgyu yang skye// smyos pa dag ni dran pa rnyed// yid brel rtse gcig de bzhin no// gcer bu dag ni gos
6a1(dkon brtsegs): rnyed de// bkres pa dag gis zas thob po// skyes bu gang su dbul po yang // dga' bar nor rnams rnyed par gyur// lnga rnams bye ba mang po yang // mkha' la gnas shing
6a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs rab mchod// smra ba'i seng ge mchod pa'i phyir// me tog char yang rab tu 'bebs// rnga dang rdza rnga sil snyan dung // nyams dga' byed pa dpag med pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni bsod nams kyis/
6a3(dkon brtsegs): gleng khyer 'jug tshe sgra yang byung // grong khyer kun tu rab g.yos te// de tshe nyams dga' mnyam par gnas// skye bos ngo mtshar 'di mthong nas// dga' ba shin tu rgya chen thob// 'dod chags kyis ni mig
6a4(dkon brtsegs): zir zhing // de tshe khro blun ser sna med// nga rgyal la sogs nyes pas kyang // gzir ba de tshe ma lus med// dga' bas khyab cing ngang ba ste// mi rnams pha mar 'du shes gyur// gang tshe sangs rgyas//
6a5(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu po// skye bo de phyir grong gshegs tshe// mi yi ma yin sil sman rnams// ma dkrol bar ni sgra yang 'byung // 'jig rten lha min lha mir bcas// bde gshegs 'od kyis rgyas par gang /
6a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar gang tshe sangs rgyas ni// 'gro la phan phyir grong gshegs pa// de tshe ngo mtshar rmad byung ba// rnam pa mang po rab tu gda'/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong
6a7(dkon brtsegs): khyer chen por gshegs pa dang / tshong dpon shing sa la chen po lta bu'i bu sdig bcom zhes bya ba byang chub sems dpa' khyim par gyur pa grong bar zhig na 'dug ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom
6b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das mdzes pa/ dka' bar 'gyur ba/ dbang po 'i ba gzugs ni ba/ dul ba dang 'i gnas mchog ba rnyes pa// dul ba dpa'i gnas mchog gis pha rol tu byor pa/ bsdams pa
6b2(dkon brtsegs): glang po ltar dbang po thul ba/ mtsho ltar dang ste rnyog pa med cing gsal ba/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ dpe byang bzang po babyang cus gru legs par brtsad pa/ kha dog babang
6b3(dkon brtsegs): po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa rgyang ring po nas gshegs pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang de bcom ldan 'das la sems shin tu dad par gyur to// de sems shin tu dang nas bcom ldan 'das gal
6b4(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas
6b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
6b6(dkon brtsegs): dpar sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su myong / sangs rgyas kyi
6b7(dkon brtsegs): ming gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu yang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcos la thugs brtse ba dang / skye bo'i chogs
7a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir grong bar gyi phyogs gcig tu bzhugs so// phyogs gcig tu bzhugs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das mthong nas srog chags brgya stong mang po dag
7a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang lhags par gyur to// bar snang las kyang lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag gus pa dang bcas// zhe sa dang bcas par thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas 'khod do// den
7a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig dang ldan na/ myur tu bla na
7a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su sbyong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu'ang yongs
7a5(dkon brtsegs): su 'dzin to// chos gcig pu gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po semaso can thams cad la snying rje zhing lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
7a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'o// de la lhag pa'i bsam pa khong du chud par bya ba gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu lhag pa'i bsam pa zhes bya ba ni gang byang chub kyi phyir sems bskyed nas mi dge ba'i las
7a7(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mi spyod pa'o// ci mi spyod ce na/ 'dod chags mi sbyong/ zhe sdang mi spyod/ gti mug mi spyod/ khyim pa'i rtags la sred pa mi spyod de/ rab tu byung nas kyang rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs
7b1(dkon brtsegs): su bcad pa mi 'dod cing / gang rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa la gnas pa yin no// dal rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub pa gang ldan/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad yang dag pa jilta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs
7b2(dkon brtsegs): pA'o 'chos thams cad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu rtogs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ces bya ba ni phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / 'dus byas dang / 'das ma byas
7b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos rnams so// phung po lnga rab tu tshogs pa ji ltar rab tu rtogs she na/ phung po lnga rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang / dben pa dang / stong pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma 'gags par rab
7b4(dkon brtsegs): tu rtogs pa ste/ ji ltar rab tu rtogs pa dang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar rab tu rtogs pa'o// gang gi tshe yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / mi shes// rlom sems su mi byed/ mi dog/ rnam
7b5(dkon brtsegs): par mi rtog pa de'i tshe ni rtog pa thams cad nye bar zhi ba ni phung po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya'o// gang phung po rab tu rtogs pa de chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni rab tu byung ba'i bsgrub/
7b6(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams yongs su mi gtong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des ji ltar bdag gis chos de dag yongs su shes par
7b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa de ltar sems can thams cad la ston kyang / sems can dang chos kyang mi dmigs te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gcig pu 'di dang ldan na/ myur du bla/
8a1(dkon brtsegs): na myed pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bsod pa ji lta bu 'ad
8a2(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu'ang yongs su 'dzin to// bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sdig bcom mi skye
8a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur te/ de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba des shing tal bdun srid tsam du bar snang la mngon par 'phags so// 'khor de'i nang nas srog chags nyis stong gis bla na med pa yang
8a4(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i srog chags bzhi khri nyis stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go
8a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i chos nyid de/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas kha dog du
8a6(dkon brtsegs): ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu rnams byung ste/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi la/
8a7(dkon brtsegs): mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas khyab par byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang
8b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa kun dga' bo stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la gtsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ ba
8b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// chos rnams kun las mnga' dbang pha rol phyin// 'dren pa khyod ni rgyal ba'i stobs la mnga'// khyod ni thams cad mkhyen par 'jig rten grags/
8b3(dkon brtsegs): ci yi slad du 'dzum pa 'di bstan gsungs// thub pa chen po 'das pa ma lus mkhyen// de bzhin ma 'ongs ma lus rnams kyang mkhyen// da ltar dag kyang mkhyen pa ma smad pa// ci slad khyod kyis 'dzum pa
8b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di mdzad gsungs// rab 'bring tha ma'i sems dang ldan pa yi// sems can thams cad kyi ni spyod pa mkhyen// chags grol srid pa'i 'du shes pha rol phyin// mi 'dul kha lo sgyur ba lung bstan gsol//
8b5(dkon brtsegs): lha rnams bye ba khrag khrig kun lhags te// skyon ma mchis la thal sbyar phyag 'tshal zhing // skye bo chos spyod 'di dag kun sdod kyis// thub pa chen po mtshungs med gsung dbyung gsol// khyod ni ye shes pa
8b6(dkon brtsegs): rol phyin// khyod la 'khrul pa yong mi mnga'// spyod pa'i bye brag kun mkhyen pa// ci zhig slad du 'dzum pa bstan// bye ba khrag khrig phrag stong lha 'di dag/ chos rnams btsal ba'i slad du 'dir lhags te/
8b7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin dge slong tshogs kyang mang po dag/ dam pa'i chos rnams nyan par 'tshal ba mchis// khyod la mchod pa'i phyir ni sil snyan rnams// rab tu bzang zhing mang brdung bar bgyid// skye bo mang po
9a1(dkon brtsegs): the tsom 'tshal ba kun// thub pa deng 'dir the tsom myur gcad gsol// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'ang
9a2(dkon brtsegs): skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di shing ta la bdun srid tsam du steng gi bar snang la 'dug pa mthong ngam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/
9a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig bcom 'di
9a4(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa gnyis na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ bskal pa rims nad med pa la/ stong
9a5(dkon brtsegs): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nyid du/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ste/
9a6(dkon brtsegs): kun dga' bo dper na da ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / nyan thos phun sum tshogs pa dang / byang
9a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rab tu zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang phyug de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
9b1(dkon brtsegs): na'ang de las mi lhag mi thu bar 'gyur ro// de skad ces bkara' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das phyogs de nas gshegs te/ mthar gyis rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i khyim gal ba der gshegs
9b2(dkon brtsegs): nas byon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das gangan bshams pa la bzhugs so// dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams kyang stan ci 'os pa dgal 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma gyis dgras/ bcom ldan 'das dang
9b3(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun bzhugs par rig nas/ bdag nyid lag dar te/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / snang ba bzang po mang pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la bstabs te tshim
9b4(dkon brtsegs): bar byas so// bstabs te tshims par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bshos gsol ba dang lhung bzed bzhag cing phyag bcabs par rig nas/ bcom ldan 'das la ras bcos bu zung ring thang
9b5(dkon brtsegs): med pa sku la gsol to// sku la gsol nas kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal te/ stan ran pa/ zhig blangs nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug
9b6(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal po ma skyes dgras/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gnod sems dang / za ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa gang nas 'byung ba lags/ mi shes pa cis
9b7(dkon brtsegs): skye ba lags/ mi shes pa ji ltar 'gag pa lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po ngar
10a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa yod pa las gnod sems dang / tha ba dang / zhe sdang dang / 'chab pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa la gnas pas yon
10a2(dkon brtsegs): ngan dang nyes pa mi shes te/ de bas na mi shes pa zhes bya'o// gang ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa de yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pa de la ni shes pa'am/ mi shes pa zhes gdags par
10a3(dkon brtsegs): mi nus so// de bas na rgyal po chen po khyod kyis 'du byed thams cad la gar yang 'gro ba dang / gang nas kyang 'ong bar mi gdags pa de ltar bslab par bya'o// rgyal po chen po gang gar yang mi 'gro/ gang nas
10a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang mi 'ong ba de la chos gang yang 'gro ba 'am/ 'ong ba med do// gang la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa de la skye ba med 'gag pa med de/ gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de shes pa'o// shes pa de ji lta bar mi shes pa'ang de
10a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi shes pa'i phyir ro// gang gi tshe nges par 'byung ba 'am/ nges par mi 'byung ba'i chos de gang yang mi
10a6(dkon brtsegs): she sa de'i tshe/ ye shes can zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po ma skyes dgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
10a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis legs par gsungs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das pa la yang ga bar gabs 'do lonar 'gram pa'i dus cos par gyur na ni/ bdag cid 'ams
10b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ rgyal po ma skyes dgral chos kyi gtam yang dag par bstan/ yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa yang dag par gzengs bstod/ yang dag par rab tu dka'
10b2(dkon brtsegs): bar mdzad nas/ gdan las bzhengs te gshegs nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ yang chos kyi sbyin pa la 'du bar 'gyur ba mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das zas phyis len pa spangs te/ lhung bzed dang chos gos
10b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhag nas zhabs bkrus te nang du yang dag 'jog pa'i phyir gnas khang du gshegs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byi dro'i dus kyi tshe/ nang du yang dag 'jog las bzhengs nas/
10b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ chos yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir bcom ldan 'das gdun bshams pa la bzhugs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
10b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyan thos chen po gzhan dag kyang de bzhin du nang du yang dag 'jog las yangs nas/ ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la bu dang / bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste phyin nas de bcom ldan
10b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang nang du yang dag 'jog las langs te/ lha'i bu ba'i tra
10b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis stong thams cad kyang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bang nas/ ldan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan/
11a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'ang byang chub sems dpa' stong tsam gyis
11a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // khya
11a3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra 'ang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya tsam gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu bcom ldan
11a4(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// rgyal po ma skyes dgra'ang dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhis yongs su
11a5(dkon brtsegs): bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ lhan cig tu ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po ga la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te
11a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gcig tu 'khod ngo // rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas kyang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma ri'i rgyal po bya rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba
11a7(dkon brtsegs): der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan
11b1(dkon brtsegs): las langs te/ skyugs phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ smras mo gsas pa'i lung stsal bcugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thul mo sbyar ba smad nas/ bcom ldan nga/
11b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po'i grong bar du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa tsam gyis/ gang bdi byang chub sems
11b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa la brtsams te/ yongs su nus pa de'i lan bcom ldan 'das kyis mdo tsam zhig bkar thul na/ bcom ldan
11b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis ra'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'grub pa de las brtsams te/ ji ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
11b5(dkon brtsegs): sems pa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi sde rnams pham par bgyid pa dang
11b6(dkon brtsegs): gsan mu stegs can rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur ba dang / nyon mongs pa zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ming gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ba dang
11b7(dkon brtsegs): smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang / shes rab yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi sa la 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs
12a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ su spong bar 'gyur ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug spyod par 'gyur ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob ste/ byang chub sems dpar gyur bzhin du chos kyi
12a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur pa dang / sems can dpag tu ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa'i don bgyid par 'gyur ba de ltar chos legs par rab tu bsten du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor
12a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba 'dus shing mchis pa gang rnams/ bcom ldan 'das las chos mngon sum du thos nas dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba rgya chen po
12a4(dkon brtsegs): thob par gyur te/ de dag dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba thob nas/ ji ltar thob pa bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par 'gyur ba dag mchis so// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'di snyam du
12a5(dkon brtsegs): dgongs te/ 'di lta bu'i chos bstan par byas na 'khor 'di lta bu ni mi mdzes kyi/ ngas ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas nas/ phyogs bcu kun tu phyogs re rer yang 'od
12a6(dkon brtsegs): zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po bkye la/ 'od zer re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po snang bas khyab par byas te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang
12a7(dkon brtsegs): mi snang zhing / de dag 'od zer de dag gis zil gyis mnan nas/ phyir mig gi dbang po la sdang bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha rnams kyi 'od kyi 'od kyang mi mngon pa dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
12b1(dkon brtsegs): nor bu dang / glog dang / me dang / shar ma'i gzugs dang / sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon par 'gyur ba dang / gang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i khor
12b2(dkon brtsegs): yug dang / khor yug chen po dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri'i rgyal po nag po dag dang / rtsig pa dang shing dang / nags tshal de dag
12b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad 'od zer de dag gis thal byung du snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par bya'o snyam du sems so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de lta bu'i 'od zer ba kye nas/
12b4(dkon brtsegs): gsung bsal ba'i sgra mdzad pa dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra des phyogs bcu kun tu 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag sgras go bar gyur to// yang de'i tshe na shar phyogs
12b5(dkon brtsegs): su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun nas 'od ces bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
12b6(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal brtsegs rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gces la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi
12b7(dkon brtsegs): ming yang mi grag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs re re
13a1(dkon brtsegs): dubya// la'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya brgya yod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
13a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de chos 'phags shes bya zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de bcom ldan 'das dpal brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs
13a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor cing chos ston pa'i spyan snga na shing ta la bdun srid tsam du bar snang la 'phags te/ lus mi snang bar gang 'di byang chub sems
13a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sde snod ces bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs rdo rje'i tshig gi gzungs kyi chos ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ chos 'di dag thams cad ni sgra tsam mo//
13a5(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rigs kyi bu 'di'i lus mi snang mod kyi/ bshad pa'ang grag la/ sgra'ang 'byin te/ gzugs yongs su grub pa'ang mi snang ngo // sgra ji lta bar gzugs kyang de bzhin
13a6(dkon brtsegs): no// gzugs ji lta bar chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no snyam mo// de ltar rab tu shes pas byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams bzod pa thob ste/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' de
13a7(dkon brtsegs): chos 'phags shes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags des snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas// bcom ldan 'das dpal/
13b1(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa de gal ba der dong ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang /
13b2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung shing gsung bsal
13b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgra chen po'ang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba 'di lta bu ni sngon ma mthong ngo // de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
13b4(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbul brtsegs rgyal pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags la 'di skad ces bka' spel to// rigs kyi bu sangs
13b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
13b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA thub pa 'is bye ba ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho gang gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa res pang 'di phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams byed
13b7(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig brgya stong chad med pa grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bslag par bya ba'i phyir/ baspu'i phung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag btang ste
14a1(dkon brtsegs): gsung bsal ba'i sgra byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dpal brtsegs rgyal po de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
14a2(dkon brtsegs): po chos 'phags kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
14a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de dag la'ang blta ba dang / chos de'ang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das nges
14a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod nga de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags byang chub sems dpa' stong phrag drug bri sum
14a5(dkon brtsegs): stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs po ches lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba dang / brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis skad cig yud ci ma de nyid pa sangs rgyas kyi
14a6(dkon brtsegs): zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kyad thams cad kyis brgyan pa
14a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de nyid la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
14b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dim tog gi tshogs chen pos pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to// sil snan brgya stong gi sgrab byung ngo // 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan bsgreng bas kyang legs par brgyan par gyur to//
14b2(dkon brtsegs): spos mchog gis kyang yang dag par bdugs te/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i longs spyod dang khyad par med par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'phags kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul
14b3(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa 'di lta bu bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste ldugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos byag
14b4(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// yang de'i tshe lho phyogs su
14b5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
14b6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa zhes bya ba de ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dpag tu med pas yongs su bskor cing chos ston to// sangs
14b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams med do// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che zhes bya ba zhig gnas te/ byang chub sem dpa' de ci'i
15a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir lag na rin po che zhes bya zhe na/ yang rigs kyi bu de nam sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan du sems can rnams la chos ston par 'dod pa de'i tshe/ lag pa g.yas pa brkyang nas// sangs rgyas kyi zhing /
15a2(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed du 'dod pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed lag gis byugs nas/ lag pa de las sangs rgyas rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // chos rin po che'i sgra dang / dge 'dun rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // sbyin pa dang / tshul khrim
15a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms rin po che'i sgra 'byung ngo // de dag dang gsan
15a4(dkon brtsegs): yang chos rin po che'i sgra sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'byung ste/ de'i phyir rigs kyi bu de lag na rin po che zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po ches snang ba chen po de'ang mthong
15a5(dkon brtsegs): gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
15a6(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng
15a7(dkon brtsegs): ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po de 'jig rten du byung zhing / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po'ang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags
15b1(dkon brtsegs): rkyen gang lags / bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byung phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig gang+gA'i glang dgu bcurtsa drug gi brim snyed 'das/
15b2(dkon brtsegs): pa nA/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAHthub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gas
15b3(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos bsgrag pa'i
15b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir ba spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra byung ngo // yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
15b5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs bshad par bzhed de/ der byang chub sems dpa' dpag tu med pa rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom
15b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi
15b7(dkon brtsegs): mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems
16a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' 'dus pa de la'ang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de'ang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pas rigs kyi bu khyod der song ste tsa rung / de ci'i phyir zhen/
16a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis khebs pa'i sems can rnams dang phrad pas na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni sdug bsngal ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sem
16a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
16a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gzhan dag kyang mchis bzhin du/ de tsam
16a5(dkon brtsegs): du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su 'dzin/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des nga ci nas kyang
16a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can ngan pa rnams kyi nang du/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan par bya'o zhes yun ring po nas smon lam btab par gyur te/
16a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de ni de ltar thugs rje chen po dang ldan no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la/ byang chub sem
16b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAn+ya thub pa de la blta ba dang / b+h+ya
16b2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar thugs rje chen po bskyed de/ de tsam du sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan pa yongs su bzung ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg
16b3(dkon brtsegs): pa shAkya thub pa de dka' ba mdzad pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di lta buni 'byung bar dka'a'o// de mthong ba'ang rnyed par dka'a'o// bcom ldan 'das des
16b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song la/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der rab tu bsgrim par gyis shig/ smras par gyur ta re/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
16b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i byang chub sams dpa' de dag ni bstan par dbar ba'o// nga na sems can pa'and dag kyang gdum meng tho ba dag / gang cas pa 'a stsal ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na rlos
16b6(dkon brtsegs): chos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro bar 'gyur ba de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
16b7(dkon brtsegs): smras par 'gyur gyi/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la ni rjes su chags pa'ang ma mchis/ long zo ba'angam mchis na/ bdag ci'i slad du sbas par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la sems can thams cad kyis
17a1(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par gshe zhing spros te/ bsdigs shing btsogs nas bong ba dang mtshon gyis btab kyang bzod par spro ste/ sems cad gang 'a'ang gnod par bgyi ba'i sems mi
17a2(dkon brtsegs): skyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa seng ge'i rtsal gyis bsgyings pa des/ rang gi byang chub sems dpa' 'khor la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed las gang byang chub sems
17a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' lag na rin po che ltar bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par sprob de rigs kyi bu 'di dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der deng zhig/ bcom ldan 'das des tshig de skad gsungs ma
17a4(dkon brtsegs): zag tu/ de nas byang chub sems pa'i 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis dbyangs gcig tu bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rin po che ltar
17a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa 'di lta bu yang dag par 'dzin par spro ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der mchi'o zhes gsol to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che/
17a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' dgu khri nyis stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar myur nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing di
17a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po che 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag rngu 'phrul mi cho 'phrul ci lta bus bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro zhing /
17b1(dkon brtsegs): can tshad med pa la ji ltar bde bar bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches/ de'i tshe ji ltar sdong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di lag pa ka
17b2(dkon brtsegs): pas bkab nas/ lag pa de las bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza' ba byung ba dang / btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang / de bzhin du bzhon pa dang / gos dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / mra/
17b3(dkon brtsegs): tig dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang / su dag ci 'dod par gyur pa thams cad de las byung bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang chos don du gnyer zhing chos 'dod pa de dag gis kyang lag pa de las
17b4(dkon brtsegs): chos thos par gyur pa dang / de na sems can dpag tu med pa dag gis kyang chos mngon par rtogs par gyur pa dang / sems can gang nang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis btab cing sdug bsngal bar gyur pa de dag
17b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyang / mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rin po ches rdzu 'phrul gyi
17b6(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das
17b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma de dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod
18a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ do// yang de'i tshe nub phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/
18a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams nor bu'i snying po zhes bya ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs
18a3(dkon brtsegs): pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bai DUR+Ya bzang po 'ba' zhig las mngon par grub pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnam par gzhag pa med de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de byang chub
18a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gis yongs su gang ngo // yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' gang rnams 'gro'ang rung / 'ong yang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dug kyang rung / ldang yang rung / 'chag kyang rung ste/
18a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis bai DUR+Ya'i sa chen po de las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de mthong ngo // 'di lta ste/ dper na shin tu phyis pa'i me long gi dkyil 'khor la bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba
18a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis bai DUR+Ya'i sa chen po de las de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong ngo // mthong nas chos kun 'dri ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang de dag la lung ston to// de dag kyang chos
18a7(dkon brtsegs): thos nas bzod pa thob po// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sprin mtshams kyi mdzod spu'i dbus su'ang nor bu rin po che chen po mngon par grub ste/ nor bu rin po
18b1(dkon brtsegs): che de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad snang bar byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing den me tog kha zum pa dang / me tog la bye ba las nyin mtshan bgrang ba ma gtogs par/ nyi ma dang zla bar mngon pa'ang med/ nyid
18b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan du mngon pa'ang med do// yang de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spen lam khyad par blo gros shes bya ba
18b3(dkon brtsegs): zhig gnas te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis snang ba chen po derang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
18b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po deg la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa'
18b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nor bu brtsegs pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di 'jig rten du byung /
18b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po'ang gda' ba 'di'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas
18b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi ling bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de// den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
19a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa des gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag
19a2(dkon brtsegs): khrig tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag pa'i phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing ga gsung bsal ba'i sgra byung ngo //
19a3(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad
19a4(dkon brtsegs): der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus
19a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de'ang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de'ang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig/ de nas byang chub sem/
19a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du ba dar te/ lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sang
19a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho drul
19b1(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bus/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro bar bya snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyang ba/
19b2(dkon brtsegs): blo gros kyis de'i tshe ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir gang dag sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes par gyur pa'i sems
19b3(dkon brtsegs): can de dag thams cad mchog tu bde ba dang ldan par gyur pa dang / sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i ma'ang rab tu zhi bar gyur pa dang / sems can gang dag bkres pa dang
19b4(dkon brtsegs): sgom pas nyen pa yi dgas dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba'i sems can de dag dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa de dag thams cad bkres pa dang sgom pa dang bral zhing / bde ba mchog dang ldan par
19b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba bzhin te/ skad cig de nyid la sems can de dag bde ba rnam pa 'di lta bu skyes nas/ skad cig de nyid la sems can gang
19b6(dkon brtsegs): yang 'dod chags sam/ zhe sdang ngam/ gti mug gam/ khro ba 'am/ nga rgyal lam/ 'chab pa 'am/ 'tshig pa 'am/ phrag dog gam/ ser sna 'am/ g.yo 'am/ tha ba 'am/ gnod sems kyis gzir ba
19b7(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang / 'gro ba thams cad du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad kyang skad cig de nyid la byams pa'i sems dang / phan pa'i sems dang ldan zhing phan tshun du pha mar 'du shes par gyur pa de lta bu'i
20a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byas te/ re lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' smon lam khyad par blo gros kyis rdza
20a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'od bstan nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang ldan cig tu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
20a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyasaM shAkya thub pa ka la ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du blang ba'i
20a4(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma de dag la 'amo dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu yong do// / bam po gnyis pa// / yang de'i tshe byang phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi ning 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi ming
20a5(dkon brtsegs): d+hI'i glang stong phrag drug rtsa gsum gyi byem snyed bdas pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rtag tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing den de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
20a6(dkon brtsegs): sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho 'ang gnas la chos kyang ston to// sangs rgyas kyi 'ing den khyim pags dgang pa byo pa med de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang ngos
20a7(dkon brtsegs): drar smrig 'chang ba gastagag/ sangs rgyas kyi ning dan bud med kyi ming yang med cing mangs kyi gnas kyang mi shes so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig can cing skyil mo grangs ca
20b1(dkon brtsegs): par rdzus te 'byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das dbang byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yang dag par rab tu ston to// de la sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya
20b2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba gang na na/ gang 'di byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed de/ de ltar byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa yongs su rdzogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug pa/ gzung
20b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rtsa ba'i gnas/ sems mi g.yeng ba/ gtong ba rjes su gtong ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rjes su 'jug pa/ mtshan ma med pa la yang dag par sgrub pa/ smon lam med pa tshol ba/ rang bzhin gyis 'dod chags dang bral
20b4(dkon brtsegs): pa phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rab tu rtogs pa/ 'dun pa'i bya ba rgyun chags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dod pa/ de la mngon par dad pa/ chos thams cad rab tu rtogs pa/ de dag la yongs su rtog
20b5(dkon brtsegs): ba med pa/ rtog pa yang dag par chad pade'ang mi mthong ba 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya zhes bya'o// yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshanar gyis brgyan pa/
20b6(dkon brtsegs): skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba zhig gnas to// rigs kyi bu de'i smon lam gyi khyad par ni 'di lta bu ste/ sems can ji snyed kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mthong na/ de dag thams cad
20b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs par brgyan par 'gyur ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / gsung bsal
21a1(dkon brtsegs): duba'i sgra de'ang thos te/ mthong zhing thos nas/ bcom ldan 'das sA la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa gal ba der bong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i mabus la/
21a2(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma
21a3(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das snang ba chen po 'di dang / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po 'di
21a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten du byung ba'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba des/ rigs kyi bu de la 'di skad ces bka'
21a5(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// rigs kyi bu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung drug khri sum stong gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
21a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba de ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
21a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa des/ gang 'di phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa dag nas byang chub sems dpa' bsdu ba dang / 'di lta ste/ chos bsgrag pa'i
21b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir spu'i khung bu thams cad nas 'od zer 'di dag rab tu bkye zhing gsung bsal ba'i sgra byung ngo // gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mdzad ces bgyi/ bcom ldan
21b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can 'dod chags la mi mjed/ zhe sdang la mi mjed/ gti mug la mi mjed/ sdug bsngal la mi mdzad de/ de'i phyir
21b3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag las la la smyos pa dang / mi snyan par brjod pa dang / bsdigs pa dang / brdeg pa bzod cing dang du len par
21b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyid pa mchis sam/ 'dod chags kyi sems skyes pa sel tam/ de bzhin du zhe sdang gi sems dang / gti mug gi sems sel ba mchis sam/ bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams de na
21b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can de dag las/ gang yon tan 'di dag dang ldan pa ni nyung ngo // rigs kyi bu sems can de dag las phal cher ni gnod sems dang / zab dang / zhe sdang mang ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
21b6(dkon brtsegs): mug gis kun tu dkris so// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab bo// gal te sems can de dag bzod par 'gyur na ni de'ang rung na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi bzod pas na/
21b7(dkon brtsegs): de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das mi mjed ces bgyi ba'i ming 'di thog tu ma bab po// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa sngon gyi rgyal ba la/
22a1(dkon brtsegs): lhag par bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas brgya stong mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ bzod pa dang / dul ba dang / nges pa dang ldan pa dag yod do//
22a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag ni sems can thams cad kyis spyos/ bsdigs/ mtshon gyis btab kyang ji snyam mi mjed de/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyis mi 'phrogs so// rigs kyi bu skyes bu dam pa de dag gi ming gi/
22a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams 'di mi mjed ces brjod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'ang de na sems can la cig sdig pa'i chos dang ldan pa/ mu cor smra ba/ khro ba/ gtum pa/ sems can dmyal ba/
22a4(dkon brtsegs): dang dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gzhol ba/ ngan 'gro'i spyod yul ba/ sangs rgyas dang / chos dang / dge 'dun la mi gus pa/ phrag dog la mngon par dga' ba'i sems can ngan pa de dag gis de tsam du spros shing smod de gnod par
22a5(dkon brtsegs): byas shing skur kyang / bcom ldan 'das de snying rje che bas bzod cing dang du len te/ sa dang mnyam pa'i sems rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba med pas/ de bsti stang du byas kyang khengs par mi byed/ bsti stang mi byed/
22a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'dud par mi byed de/ re spyos shing brgyad kyang mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog/ gnod par mi 'gyur/ mi 'phrog/ mi chags/ mi skyo ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams de mi mjed ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
22a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan/
22b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das 'di ltar bdag 'jig rten gyi khams der de tsam du smad pa'i sems can rnams kyi nang dum skyes pa ni bdag gis rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de skad
22b2(dkon brtsegs): ma zer cig/ de ci'i phyir len/ rigs kyi bu byang dang shar gyi mtshams na 'jig rten gyi khams stong gas brgyad pa zhes bya ba yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ngan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
22b3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dbang phyug chen po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba ltar yang bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gnas so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing den sems can rnams rab tu bde ba dang ldan no// 'di lta ste/ dper na 'gog pa la ston
22b4(dkon brtsegs): bar zhugs pa'i dge slong gi bde ba bzhin te/ sems can rnams kyang bde ba de lta bu dang ldan no// yang rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams stong gis brgyan pa der lo bye ba brgya stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad pa bas ni/ gang
22b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed du tha na se gol gtogs pa tsam srid du sems can thams cad la byams pa'i sems bskyed na/ de bas 'di bsod nams ches mang du skyed na/ gang nyin mtshan du yongs su dag par gnas
22b6(dkon brtsegs): pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sa la'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'byung ba de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma
22b7(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA
23a1(dkon brtsegs): thub pa de la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa de'ang blta ba dang / chos bstan pa de'ang nyan du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das des bka'
23a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod de'i dus la dbab par shes na song zhig de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa'i bye ba phrag bcus
23a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor cing / lhan cig tu sems bskyed pa gcig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir gnas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' mtshan gyis brgyan
23a4(dkon brtsegs): pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal po 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul ji lta bus/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa de'i thad du 'gro snyam nas/ de re'i tshe ji lta bu'i
23a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che'i gdugs gcig gis khebs par gyur pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs de las kyang me tog rnam pa
23a6(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs kyi char rab tu dab/ sil snyan brgya stong yang 'khrol/ mu tig gi rgyan 'breng brgya stong yang mngon par 'phyang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan brgya stong yang mngon par 'byung ba dang / bcom
23a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du 'dus pa/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha'/
23b1(dkon brtsegs): lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis rang rang gi lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis brgyan par shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par
23b2(dkon brtsegs): 'du bya ba mngon par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mtshan gyis brgyan pa skar ma brtsegs pa'i rgyal pos rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul rnam pa 'di lta bu 'di bstan nas/ byang chub sems
23b3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkyathub pa gal ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
23b4(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du byung ba'i pad+ma dag la 'khor dang bcas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de
23b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du sbyar te/ phyogs bcu kun gyi bar gyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa dag tu'ang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis snang ba chen po
23b6(dkon brtsegs): de'ang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra de'ang thos nas/ rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhus te 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir lhags nas/ de dag thams cad kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
23b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// gang dag stongasas
24a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ba dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkhar lding dang / maM'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa
24a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / rgyal po chen po 'jig rten skyong dang / de ma yin pa'i lha'i bu gzi brjid che ba gzi brjid che ba de dag thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi snang ba chen po de'ang mthong / gsung bsal ba'i sgra chen po de'ang thos nas/ bcom
24a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gal ba der dong ste lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod
24a4(dkon brtsegs): // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa
24a5(dkon brtsegs): ji snyed pa de dag nas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshad med grangs med pa 'dus pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag ci 'dra ba de 'dra
24a6(dkon brtsegs): bar lhag chad med cing khyad ma zhugs par mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku'i kha dog dang chu zheng ci 'dra bar/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku'i yongs su grub pa'ang de
24a7(dkon brtsegs): dang 'dra bar byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas mthong ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi byang chub sems dpa' phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang / nyan thos chen po phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang /
24b1(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod dang kung spyod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'dir yang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis so so nas shes pa dang / bdag nyid kyang rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug pa snyam du shes pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
24b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'du mdzad pa mngon par mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen por mthong nas sngan las langs te/ bla gos zag
24b3(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// phyogs
24b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu rnams su grags pa mtha' yas blo// 'jig rten lhar bcas 'dir ni lam mi ste// thub pa'i thugs ni sems can thams cad kyis// tshad gzung mi nus de phyir khyod bsam yas// phyogs bcu dag nas rgyal sras
24b5(dkon brtsegs): dpag med pa// chos tshol skad du de ring 'dir lpags shing // bcom ldan 'das la kun kyang gus bcas nas// smra ba'i mchog gis chos rnams rab tu gsungs// phyogs rnams ma lus par ni brjod grags pa/
24b6(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims brtson 'grus ting 'dzin blo rnams kyis// seng ge ltar ni 'jigs med khyod mdzes te// nam mkha' dag la nyi ma bzhin du gsal// lha dang mi dang lha min gsang ba dang // dge bsnyen po mo dge slong dag
24b7(dkon brtsegs): slong ma// thams cad gus bcas thal mo sbyar gnas kyis// bcom ldan pa na bzhed chos ni bshad du gsol// khyod ni 'das mkhyen de bzhin ma'o ngas dang // da ltar yang ni shin tu nges par mkhyen// lus can mos/
25a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa ji bzhin khyod gzigs la// the tsom chen po sel ba'i chos bshang gsol// grub pa rgyal sras ji ltar spyad pas na// zhing rnams dag pa rdul med thob par 'gyur// ji ltar smon lam
25a2(dkon brtsegs): grub pa thob 'gyur pa// de ni 'dren pas bdag la myur bshad gsol// ji ltar ser sna'i dri mas mi gos shing // ji ltar tshul khrims ma nyams 'gyur ba dang // sdig pa dang ni de bzhin skur pa dang // brnyas pa dag kyang
25a3(dkon brtsegs): thub pa ji ltar bzod// sdug bsngal du mas rab tu gzir ba yi// 'jig rten dag gi sdug bsngal bzlog slad du// bskal ba bye ba mang por rgyal zas rnams// ji ltar brtson 'grus rtsom zhing spyod par 'gyur// rtam tu
25a4(dkon brtsegs): sems ni rtse gcig mnyam gzhag cing // bsam gtan gnas pa spyod yul rnam dge ste// pad+ma ru yi nyes pas mi gos ltar// ji ltar 'dod pa dag gis gos mi 'gyur// thub pa ji ltar zab mo'i chos snga
25a5(dkon brtsegs): zhing / dmakhas pa 'jig rten 'das pa'i blo ldan 'gyur// brtan po ji ltar bdud sde bcas bcim nas/ byang chub rdul bral bla med reg par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
25a6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan shoms shig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdan de la bzugs nas sangs rgyas
25a7(dkon brtsegs): ring gi yon tan bkod pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par 'jug pa'i tshul la mkhas pa sgrub pa// dang por bas ma zhing nan tan bya ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
25b1(dkon brtsegs): chen po byams pa 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pas don gyi dbang ci zhig gzigs na bdag gangar bting du bcug ste/ gnas brtan pan dga' bo dang / moru 'gal gyi bu chen po la bka' ma stsal pa/ de/
25b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams gangan 'dings su bcug pa las na/ gtam 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi phyir brtsams nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yongs su
25b3(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i gtam zhig 'byung ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams ni chos bstan pa 'di'i snod ma yin pa lta zhig snyam mo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas de'i tshe/ 'di lta bu'i
25b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par byas pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i seng ge'i khri'i bang du dpag tshad bzhi 'bum pa// rin po che du mas sbas pa/ lha'i ras bcos bu brgya stong dum btings/ shing bal ltar/
25b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam pa ga na bang ba ba shams nas// khri do'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sdang bar byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sngam de las pazhengs nas/
25b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i khri la btsugs so// bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la gzugs ma thag tu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis/
25b7(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA bo'i bul bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos pa'i dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
26a1(dkon brtsegs): #khyimasam pas yang dag par bzugs pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / brtson 'grus rlom pa dang / dag pa'i bshes gtan la bzhu pa ste/ shArI'i bu chos pa'i bopong da dang
26a2(dkon brtsegs): lngar byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod las yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shA 'i su gdan sang chos gcig dang ldan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpang chen po spo 'am
26a3(dkon brtsegs): las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshags pa yongs su myong bar 'gyur ro// chos gcig pra gang zhen/ shrI ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sem
26a4(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i spyod pa la slob cing 'dod pa dang 'dun pa skyed pa ste/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na/ tshig 'di skad ces gal te bdag skye ba thams cad du rab tu
26a5(dkon brtsegs): ma byung na// sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par gyur cig ces smras te/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su bslab
26a6(dkon brtsegs): par bya'o// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' de ltar slob pa ni skye ba thams cad du rab tu 'byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung / gdon mi za bar khyim gyi gnas nas 'byung ngo //
26a7(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di lta ste/ khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par 'byung ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnyed pa'i mchog yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems
26b1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yon tan ban yongs su 'dzin to// bcu mang ben/ 'di d+hA ste/ 'dod pa la chags par mi 'gyun pa dang / dgon pa'i gnas la dga' brjed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod stsal yang 'thob pa dang / dang
26b2(dkon brtsegs): ma dang / bu po dang / bu mo la sreng par mi 'gyur ba dang / ngar 'gror 'gro ba'i chos rnam par spong ba dang / bde 'gro 'gro ba'i chos la brten pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba las yongs su mi nyams pa dang /
26b3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba phun sum tshogs pa 'thob pa dang / de la lha rnams dga' ba dang / de la mi ma yin pa rnams kyis bsrung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu rab tu 'byung ba la mngon par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'
26b4(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / sems can thams cad dgrol bar 'dod pa
26b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyun du rab tu 'byung ba dang / mngon par 'byung ba la shin tu dga' bar bya'o// shA ri'i bu chos gcig pu de dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum
26b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa'ang yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gnyis dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
26b7(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su badzin par 'gyur ro// gnyis gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi theg pa mi 'dod/ nyan thos kyi theg pa'i gtam la mi dga'
27a1(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi theg pa pa dang mi sten/ nyan thos kyi bslab pa la mi slob/ nyan thos kyi theg pa dang ldan pa'i chos mi ston/ gzhan yang nyan thos kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'ju/
27a2(dkon brtsegs): cing / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'ang de bzhin pa dang / gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'o//
27a3(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu de la gzhan dag sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu yongs su 'dzin to// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
27a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'ba' zhig gi dge 'dun rab tu rnyed pa dang / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs pa dang / sangs rgyas bcom
27a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams de'i tshul yongs su sgrogs shing chos ston pa dang / 'di lta ste/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid kyi phyir sems dang sems las byung ba rgya chen po skyed pa dang / mir gyur na'ang 'khor los sgyur
27a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / lha dang mi rnams dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / g.yog 'khor mi byed par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi phung po tshad mer byang
27a7(dkon brtsegs): med pa yongs su 'dzin pa'o// shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bsod/
27b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba la bkod pa bas/ gang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gcig yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems la gnag na/ de ni de bas bsod mam
27b2(dkon brtsegs): ces mang du skyed do// shA ri'i bu de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas skyes pas ni sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad par mi 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung bar
27b3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur gyi/ shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod na sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi 'chad cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa'ang yod par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan dag byang chub kyi sems la rab
27b4(dkon brtsegs): tu 'god pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to// ka shA ri'i bu chos gnyis po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
27b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos gsum dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
27b6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// gsum gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa dang / zang zing med par chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa dang /
27b7(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ba'o// shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi 'jigs pa bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di mi 'jig
28a1(dkon brtsegs): par grong du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par 'khor la chos ston pa dang / mi 'jigs par la zas za ba dang / mi 'jigs par btsug lag yang du 'jug pa dang / myi 'jigs par dge 'dun/
28a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi nang du 'jug pa dang / mi 'jigs par lung 'bog pa dang / mi 'jigs par slob dpon dang mkhan po'i drung du 'gro ba dang / mi 'jigs par byams pa dang ldan pas 'khor la rjes su ston pa dang / mi 'jigs
28a3(dkon brtsegs): par gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad la spyod pa dang / des smras pa gzung bar 'gyur ba ste/ shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' mi
28a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa bcu po de dag 'thob po// shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyi chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di de sdig pa mi//
28a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa yin/ de shes kyi khe mi 'dod pa yin/ de grags pa mi 'dod pa yin/ de khyim mi 'dzin pa yin/ de khyim la ser sna med pa yin/ de gos dang / zas dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang
28a6(dkon brtsegs): byang ngan ngon tsam gyis chog shes pa yin/ des smras pa gzung bar 'os pa yin/ lha dag kyang de'i drung du 'gro ba yin/ de tshul bzhin ma yin pa rnam par rtog pa yid la byed pa mi skyed pa yin/ re sangs rgyas
28a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems la sem skyed pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to//
28b1(dkon brtsegs): shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi phan yon bcu yongs su 'dzin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang bdi 'du 'dzi rnam par spong ba dang / rab tu dben pa la snyan pa dang / de bsam
28b2(dkon brtsegs): gtan la sems dmigs par 'gyur ba dang / bya ba mang por mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas rnams 'dod pa dang / de'i lus bde ba dang mi 'bral ba dang / de'i tshangs par spyod pa bar chad du mi 'gyur ba dang /
28b3(dkon brtsegs): tshegs chung ngus ting nge 'dzin thob pa dang / des tshig dang yi ge bstan pa rnams chung mi za ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu dgon pa la gnas pa lhur len pa'i byang chub
28b4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni yon tan gyi phan yon bcu po de dag yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
28b5(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji lta bu 'dod
28b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra ba yin/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed cing nga rgyal bcom pa yin/ nga rgyal tshar gcang ba'i phyir zhug
28b7(dkon brtsegs): shing phrag dog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa yin/ pha rol 'byor pa la yid dga' ba yin no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni bden par smra ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/
29a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de'i kha nas ut+pa la'i dri'i ngad 'byung ba dang / lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su dag par 'gyur ba dang / lngar bcas pa'i
29a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gyi chud mar gyur cing tshig 'khrul pa med par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi gsung phun sum tshogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' bden par smra
29a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ ba'i gang zhe na/ gang 'di ngan 'gror skye ba rnam par spong ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnga mo dang /
29a4(dkon brtsegs): ba glang dang / bong bu dang / rta'i skye gnas dang / de bzhin du gzhan smad par skye ba rnam par spong ba dang / mi smad par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan phyir rgol ba dang mi mdzad pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba/
