29a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis phyag bya bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni nga rgyal bcom pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon yin no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po 'di dag ni za
29a6(dkon brtsegs): rog dang ser sna yongs su spangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon te/ bani gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de gtong ba'i sems la mi mongs pa dang / mu ge 'byung ba'i dus na sbyin padag tu 'gyur ba dang /
29a7(dkon brtsegs): de tshul khrims dang ldan pa 'ongs ma khyim gyi sgo gcod par mi 'gyur ba dang / de'i gtong ba dang len pa la su'ang phrag dog mi byed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu ba'i por dgen phrag dis dang ser sna yongs su sangs pa'i
29b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i phan lon no// shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag na pa rog 'byor pa la dgang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan son te/ bA ga rten/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gis sems
29b2(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag gzung ste/ bdag 'di dag gi ched du go cha bgos nas/ 'di dag la bde bar sbyar ba bya ba yin na/ sems can 'di dag rang gi mthus bsgrubs pa'i longs spyod kyis bde bar 'tsho'o zhes dga' ba rnyed
29b3(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / re'i longs spyod rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / me dang / chu la sogs pa dang / bgo skal la spyod pa mi mdza' pa rnams kyis mi 'phrogs par 'gyur ba dang / gang gi che bu phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog
29b4(dkon brtsegs): 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod phun sum rdzogs pa rnyed pa de'i tshe/ de la rgyal po'ang dgar bar 'gyur na/ sems can gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de longs spyod dang kun spyod pa rgya chen po la
29b5(dkon brtsegs): sems 'jug pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzhi po de dag ni pha rol 'byor pa la dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam las mi nyams
29b6(dkon brtsegs): shing / sangs rgyas kyi 'dzi don tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos lnga dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams ci
29b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing yongs su sbyong ste/ lnga gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpar sangs rgyas kyi ring gi yon tan bkod pa rnan
30a1(dkon brtsegs): pa phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir chos kun tu tshol zhing / de gang la chos nyan pa de la byang chub sems dpas ji ltar yon tan 'di dag yongs su sgrub pa de ban yongs su
30a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dri zhing / des chos de thos nas de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar smon cing / de tshul khrims yongs su dag
30a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ste/ de tshul khrims yongs su dag pas gang dang gang du smon pa de dang der skyes te/ de der skyes nas des sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la sems shing rtog ste/ nyan thos kyi phun sum tshogs pa /
30a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i phun sum tshogs pa'am/ longs spyod dang kun tu spyod pa phun sum tshogs pa mtshan mar 'dzin te/ des de dag mtshan mar bzung nas gus pa dang bcas/ zhe sa dang bcas shing thal mo sbyar te/
30a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i thad du song nas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas ji ltar spyad na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'dzin ces kun nus nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa des
30a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen te/ gang rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rgya chen po yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ba'i gnas de dag ston cing / yang dag par rab tu 'chad de/ des de thos nas
30a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ye shes dang ldan zhing bya ba dang ldan pa yin te/ de mi shes pa yongs su sbyong zhing bya ba ma yin pa yongs su
30b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyong ngo // de la ye shes ni gang / bya ba ni gang zhe na/ ye shes zhes bya ba ni gang dmigs pa la dmigs pa ni ye shes te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang bral ba'o// bya ba zhes bya ba ni ji ltar thos pa
30b2(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la nan tan byed pa'o// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang 'byung ba la mkhas pa yin te/ de la rgyu ni gang / 'byung ba ni gang zhe na/ rgyu zhes bya ba ni gang ni
30b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste/ gang las phyin ci log bzhi la sems can rnams gnas par 'gyur ba'o// de ni tshul bzhin la brtson pa yin te/ de la tshul bzhin la sbyor ba gang
30b4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ gang 'di chos thams cad yid la mi byed pa ste/ 'byung ba'ang de nyid yin no// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes/ zhing
30b5(dkon brtsegs): gi ngo bo nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ni gang / zhing gi ngo bo nyid ni gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam mo// zhing gi ngo bo nyid ces bya ba de yang ming tsam mo//
30b6(dkon brtsegs): gang ming tsam pa de dben par shes shing / ji ltar chos gang yang mi dmigs pa de ltar shes pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos lnga po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi g.yo zhing / sangs
30b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin cing / yongs su spong ngo // shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos drug dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du
31a1(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya zhing / 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin te/ drag
31a2(dkon brtsegs): gang zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni sbyin pa po sbyin bdag tu 'gyur ba ste/ de dngos po gang 'phangs pa yid du 'ong ba/ mngon par 'dod par 'gyur ba de dag yongs su btang yang zhum par
31a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur zhing / yid dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / rangs pa dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'di ltar gang 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la mngon par smon pas bdag gis sbyin pa
31a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po dang / theg pa chen po dang / bya ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// kun tu 'dzin pa'i sems kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bsgrub par mi nus so snyam du rtog go/
31a5(dkon brtsegs): des de ltar brtags nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ des rang gi lus dang srog yongs su btang yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur na/ gzhan nor gyi rnam pa dang / chung ma dang
31a6(dkon brtsegs): bu po dang / bu mo lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shA ri'i bu 'di la ji snyam du sems/ gang thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i tshig 'di'i bstan pa ji lta bu zhe na/ shA ri'i bu gang byang chub sems dpa' sem
31a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cing bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin te/ de'i phyir de byang chub thob pas na thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i gyi/
31b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpar khyim par gyur pa'ang rung / rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ rdul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par 'dzin pa la rab tu sa nus pa smin te/ de srog kyi phyir nga
31b2(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa las mi 'da'o// gang tshul khrims kyi sdom pa yang dag par bzung ba de 'ong sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo sdu/
31b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni tshul khrims dang ldan pa'o zhes dga' ba rnyed cing mchog tu dga' ba skyes te/ mngon par dga' bas tshangs par spyad pa spyod de/ de tshangs par spyod cing bde bar nyin mtshan pa dang bar byed do//
31b4(dkon brtsegs): de bde bar chos mngon sum du 'gyur ro// chos kyi tshul dang ldan par yang dag par so sor rtog par 'gyur ro// yang dag par so sor rtog pa la gnas pa ni zab mo la bzod pa skye'o// zab mo la bzod pa
31b5(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa ni lta ba drang por 'gyur ro// lta ba drang ba ni yang dag par nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa'i nan tan la gnas pa ni khams gsum la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// de khams gsum pa
31b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par mi dga' bas skrag par 'gyur ro// skrag pas 'byung ba tshol lo// 'byung ba mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar bdag sdug bsngal ba ltar sems can thams cad kyang de bzhin te/ bdag gis/
31b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi khur khyer la nye bar zhi ba ma gtogs pa rab de dag gi bde ba'i rgyu gzhan med do snyam mo// de de ltar so sor rtog pa na snying rje chen po 'thob po// de cher snying rjebs thams cad
32a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa ma thob kyi bar du mgo dang gos la me 'bar rab bzhin du brtson 'grus mi 'dor ro/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' de bzod pa'i'o//
32a2(dkon brtsegs): cha gyon cing / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin gyi/ nga rgyal gyi stobs dang ldan pa ma yin no// de spyos rgyad brdegs bsdigs kyang bzod pa sgrub ste/ pha rol la mi 'khrug gnod par mi sems so// de 'di ltar
32a3(dkon brtsegs): sems skyed de/ gal te bdag la sems can de dag gis ri rab tsam gyi tho bas brdegs shing bskal pa bye ba'i bar du blun mi 'chad par gshedang / bdag gis gnod sems dang / za ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems
32a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni ma bsgrubs pa/ bdag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bslab par 'dod pa'o snyam nas/ re ji lta ji lta bur sems can rnams kyis spros
32a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rkyang pa dang / brdegs pa de lta re lta bur snying rje chen po skyed de/ bdag gis sems can 'di dag bskyab par bya'o// bdag sems can 'di dag gi don du go cha bags nas/ bdag gis sems can 'di
32a6(dkon brtsegs): dag bzung ba yin te/ bdag gis 'di dag 'khor ba las yongs su thar par bya'i/ bdag gis 'di dag la gnod sems dang / za ba dang / zhe sdang gi sems bskyed par ri mi bya'o snyam mo// de de ltar bzod pa'i sgo
32a7(dkon brtsegs): cha bgos pas/ phun sum tshogs pa bcu thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ gang 'di rigs pun sum tshogs pa dang / longs spyod bur sum tshogs pa dang / gzugs phun sum tshogs pa dang / g.yog 'khor bum
32b1(dkon brtsegs): sum tshogs pa dang / gtong ba sun sum tshogs pa dang / dge pa'i bshes gnyen phur sum tshogs pa dang / chos nyan pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / chos la nan tan byed pa bun sum tshogs pa dang / ki 'pho
32b2(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba phun sum tshogs pa rnyed pa dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa 'thob pa ste/ shA ri'i bu bzod pa'i go cha bgos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bran sum tshogs pa bcu po de dag
32b3(dkon brtsegs): 'thob po// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i chos yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir brtson 'grus brtsams shing / yid ma la brtan pa yin no// de 'di ltar brtson
32b4(dkon brtsegs): 'grus rtsom ste/ gal te bdag gis sems can re re'i don gyi phyir yang phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa bye bar yang 'khor bar bya'o zhes tshu la 'di dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa 'di dang / spyod pa 'di dang / sems
32b5(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba 'di dang / yi dam 'di dang / dge ba'i bsam pa 'di dang / snying rje ba'i sems 'dis sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi ched du bskal pa de snyed du 'khor bar byas te/ 'di ltar bdag gis sems
32b6(dkon brtsegs): can 'di dag yongs su mi gtang ngo snyam nas brtson 'grus rtsom mo// ya shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang gis gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rin po che sna bdun gyis yod
32b7(dkon brtsegs): su gang bar byas te/ sems bskyed pa sems bskyed pa tsam la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la sbyin pa byin te/ tshul 'di dang stobs bskyed pa 'di/
33a1(dkon brtsegs): phyi ma'i mtha'i bskul pa bye bar sbyin pa byin pa pas/ byang chub sems dpa' gang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa snying rje chen po la gnas pas/ 'di lta bu'i bcom
33a2(dkon brtsegs): 'grus kyi go cha'i sems bskyed na/ de de bas bsod nams ches mang du bskyed do// shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yon tan gyi chos bcu 'thob ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ des 'di
33a3(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ des byis pa'i spyod pa spangs pa yin/ des sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa yongs su bzung ba yin/ des 'khor ba la nyes par 'du shes bskyed pa yin/ des snying rje chen po yongs su bzung ba yin/ sngon
33a4(dkon brtsegs): dam bcas pa las mi 'gyur ba yin/ nang nyung ba yin/ 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi bka' bzhin byas pa yin/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
33a5(dkon brtsegs): gti mug chung ba yin/ ji ltar bstan pa'i tshig dang yi ge rnams kyi don rab tu shes pa yin/ nan tan gyis yang dag par sgrub pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu brtson 'grus brtsams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni
33a6(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi chos bcu po de dag 'thob bo// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rjes su dran zhing de 'di snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs
33a7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag ni thugs rtse gcig pa/ rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa/ baspel pa mi mnga' ba dang ldan pa'o snyam nas/ re yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag de bzhin gshegs pa bzung ba'i rjes su 'gro bar bya na/ sem
33b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yengs pa dang brjed ngas pas ni gang bdi sangs rgyas kyi gnas te/ gnas 'di thob par mi nus so sems nas/ de chags pa thams cad dang / yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad dang / 'thob pa dang bkur sti zam
33b2(dkon brtsegs): cang dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal la chags pa thams cad dang / grogs po dang / bla mi dang / khyim la sred pa thams cad yongs su btang ste/ sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir sems can
33b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni bdag gis yongs su mi btang ngo snyam nas/ dgon pa rab tu dgon pa la mngon par dga' ba yin te/ bse ru ltar gcig pu spyod cing de dgon pa rab tu dgon pa dag tu gnas nas phyogs gcig tu
33b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams la byams pas khyab par byed do// de bzhin du sbyar te phyogs bcu kun gyi bar du tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed do// byams pa la
33b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas nas bsam gtan la bsam gtan par 'gyur ro// yang shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa gang gis/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi 'khor dang bcas pa rnam
33b6(dkon brtsegs): la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal par bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byas pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung ba gang rab tu dben pa 'dod cing / dgon pa logs su phyogs te gom pa bdu
33b7(dkon brtsegs): dor na 'di ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// ches myur du byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu bcu po 'di dag ni dben par gnas shing bsam gtan la bsam gtam pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon/
34a1(dkon brtsegs): bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa dang ldan pa yin// blo gros dang ldan pa yin/ rtog pa dang ldan pa yin/ mos pa dang ldan pa yin/ myur du spobs pa rab tu thob pa yin/ gzungs sgrub pa
34a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ skye ba dang 'jigs pa la mkhas pa thob pa yin/ tshul khrims kyi phung po las mi nyams pa yin/ lha rnams kyang de la rim gro byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi 'byor pa la mi 'dod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu bcu par
34a3(dkon brtsegs): dag ni dben pa la gnas shing / bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i phan yon no// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyu mthun pa la mkhas
34a4(dkon brtsegs): pa yin te/ de 'di ltar shes rab gang nas byung snyam du nye bar rtog cing / de 'di snyam du sems te/ shes rab ni tshul khrims kyi sdom pa'i gnas las byung ba ste/ shes rab byung ba las chos dkar po thams cad rnam
34a5(dkon brtsegs): par 'phel lo snyam nas/ de shes rab la slob ste/ gang 'jig rten gyi bzo'i gnas dang / las kyi gnas dang / sngags kyi gnas dang / sman gyi gnas dang / gang bya dka' ba dang / bsgrub dka' ba'i las de dag thams
34a6(dkon brtsegs): cad la slob po// bslabs nas kyang de 'di ltar sems skyed de/ gang 'jig rten pa'i shes rab 'di ni yid 'byung bar ma yin/ 'dod chags dang bral bar ma yin/ bgog par ma yin/ zhi bar ma yin/ mngon par
34a7(dkon brtsegs): shes par ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par ma yin/ dge sbyong du ma yin/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba ma yin gyis/ 'di ltar bdag gis shes rab gang gis shin tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i rakho rnam
34b1(dkon brtsegs): ba'adi lta bu dang / sngags rnam pa de lta bu dang / sman rnam pa de lta bu dang / shes rab rnam pa de lta bu yongs su btsal lo snyam nas/ de chos thams cad kyi thog ma yongs su tshol lo// de chos thams cad kyi thog
34b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yongs su tshol ba na/ chos gang yang chos gang la nye b.rang rdog pa'i chos de gang yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas rab tu zhi ba la gnas par 'gyur ro// rab tu zhi bar spyod
34b3(dkon brtsegs): pa la gnas nas yongs su yi mi 'chang ngo // yongs su yi mi ba chad pas sems can rnams kyi don du 'di lta ste/ de sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du sring ba 'dzin
34b4(dkon brtsegs): te/ shA ri'i bu chos drug po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing smon lam las mi nyams la/ 'jig rten tham
34b5(dkon brtsegs): cang las mngon par 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang chos bdun dang ldan na/ byang chub
34b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ngo // bdun gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing / sbyin pa de'ang mi
34b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa dang / tshul khrims kyang skyon med la/ tshul khrims de la rlom sems kyang med pa dang / bzod cing nges la/ sems can de'ang mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus kyang rtsom la/ lus dang / ngag dang /
35a1(dkon brtsegs): sems de lang mi dmigs pa dang / bsam gtan yang yongs su sgrub la/ de'ang mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan la bsam gtan pa dang / shes rab kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed la/ re N+DoH
35a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyang rjes su dran la/ de mtshan ma'ang sel ba ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bdun po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing rgyan thams/
35a3(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis brgyan pa'ang yongs su 'dzin to// shA ri'i bu chos brgyad dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi thams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
35a4(dkon brtsegs): yang yongs su skyong ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ phrag dog med pa dang / rgyan sbyin pa dang / sems rgya che ba dang / chos smra ba le bsti stang byeng ba dang / gus pa dang bcas pa dang / 'tshob rnam par dag pa dang / kun pa/
35a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ngang tshul tsan dang / bdag la mi bstod cing gas la mi spong ba s+t+wa~M/ shA ri'i bu chos brgyang po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyam sna shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma
35a6(dkon brtsegs): sku sbyong // / bas po zhus pa// ring bu chos dud ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon la ma las mi rnams shing / sangs rgyas kyin
35a7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par byed de// dgu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus sdom pa dang / ngag sdom pa dang / yid sdom pa dang / 'dod cegs pas pa pa dang / zhe sdang bsal pa dang / gti mug pasal pa dang / sgrub med pa/
35b1(dkon brtsegs): dang / mdza' ba bstan pa dang / dge pa'i bshes gnyen la brnyas pa med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos dgu po de dag dang ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' sgron lam las minyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi ping sang yongs su
35b2(dkon brtsegs): sbyong bar byed do// shA ri'i bu chos bcu dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed de/ bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/
35b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dud bgro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thos na mi 'jig
35b4(dkon brtsegs): shing snying rje ba dang / lha rgung pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / mi rgud pa thos na mi 'jigs shing snying rje ba dang / dbul ba dang / mu ge dang / rkun po dang / rang rta dang / dmag gi gnod pa thos na mi 'jig
35b5(dkon brtsegs): shing snying rje ba ste/ re bdi snyam du ci nas kyang bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can dmyal ba dang / dung 'gro'i skye gnas dang / yi dgas kyi yul med cing / bsams pa tsam gyis bza' ba dang / btung ba dang /
35b6(dkon brtsegs): bgo ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/ nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi sring
35b7(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag par ma byas kyi bar du brtson 'grus mi gtong ngo snyam du sems bskyed pa ste/ shA ri'i bu chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' smon lam las mi nyams shing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
36a1(dkon brtsegs): yang yongs su dag par byed do//
36a2(dkon brtsegs): sa byang chub nas da du sa sa sa d+d+ha
36a3(dkon brtsegs): sa ngas su / smra
36a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang / rin po che sna tshigs kyi shing ljon pas rab tu brgyan par gyur cig ces kyi par sems paskyed do// de bzhin du byur gyis dang / bdug gros dung / phreng nga
36a5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bzhon pa dang / gos dang / bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba ran dang / gser dang / dngos dang / ben+d+han+da dang / mu tig dang / dung dang / man shel lam/ myu ru'i ba
36a6(dkon brtsegs): du gang ci 'bul yang rung ste/ de thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bsgrub pa'i don du yongs su bsngo zhing tshul khrims kyi sdom pa la gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi sdom
36a7(dkon brtsegs): ba la gan pa de'i sems kyi smon lam 'grub par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni su la'ang yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshig mi brjod cing / yid du 'ong ba'i tshigs
36a8(dkon brtsegs): stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can gang gis kyang ying du mi 'ong ba'i sgra mi thos te/ yid du 'ong ba'i bla sha stag thos par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gnan
36b1(dkon brtsegs): ma tha ma sa sa ldam du/ sa ma su s+yA swA
36b2(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ro// rdzag smra sa ma sa sa nga smra / su
36b3(dkon brtsegs): g.yon tan bkod pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir thams kyang mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ste/ nang nub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi shing dro'i sems thus sa byed dag pa bcu las kyi ma dang du bye
36b4(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba'i shes rab can du 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' yul gan 'dug kyang rung ste/ yul der skyes pa'am/ bud med ngam/ khye'u 'am/ bu mo 'am/
36b5(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang ji snyed cig des mthong ba de thams cad byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / sA la'ang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i gtam mi brjod cing / gzhan du na sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i
36b6(dkon brtsegs): gtam sha stag brjod de/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur te/ nyan thos
36b7(dkon brtsegs): ngarangasangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems dpang tshogs kyis yongs su ga pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ming thol par gyur ro// zugs nga ngol byang chub sems dpa
37a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan rgyan pa mi thos sbyi/ gzhan gyis don pa' bar 'arin pa/ dang rnam thob pa'i / sas nas kying dang sas dwang smye ts+tshas skyes par mas sa
37a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phun sumachogs pa dang / chos kyi thob pa chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang dadi la byang chub sems dpa' dge slong ngam/ dge slong mo ma/ sul dang rung
37a3(dkon brtsegs): nyes pa byung bas mi rgol la/ bdag nyid kyang dam pa'i chos la sbyor te/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nyes pa'i ming yang ye med par 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ sems can
37a4(dkon brtsegs): ngag ni nyes pa med pa'i chos can yongs su dag par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos 'dod cing / chos don du gnyer la yongs su yi chud pa med
37a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rang bzhin can yin te/ ji skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pas// de byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skyes pa de dag thams cad chos 'dod cing chos don du gca
37a6(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / yongs su yi chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can te/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams la nan tan byed par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dpa' rnga bo chedang
37a7(dkon brtsegs): dung dang / rdzang dang / 'bar dza dang / pi la brgyad gcig pa dang / spri sman dang / khar darol dang / gling bu dang / pi wa dang / bal la ki dang / sim pa la la sogs pa rol mo sil sman gyi mo byang mid du 'ong bag+sa
37b1(dkon brtsegs): ga sa sa pa kyis smrasas sa byang dus su sa rgyan sa smra nga ra/ smra
37b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing den bsil snyan brgya stong ma dkrol ma badrangs par smra byin par 'gyur ro// shA ri'i bu gzhan yang 'di la byang chub sems dbyur brje ngas pa'i snyoms rnams pa rlad par 'gyur ba sa
37b3(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis 'dems te/ ri byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi ming de'i sems can rnams bsam gtan gyi zas can du 'gyur ro// shA ri'i sangs sangs rdzas kyi zhing gi yi tan kod pa bran bram tshogs pa
37b4(dkon brtsegs): las brtsams te/ bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par chos bstan kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs pa la mtha' thugs pa med mod kyi/ mos pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs
37b5(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis gang thos na de yongs su rdzogs par byed par 'gyur bar mdor bstan to// shA ri'i bu chos gsum dang ldan na/ byang chub
37b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing / ji ltar bsams pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/ gsum gang zhe na/ 'di
37b7(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ bag yod par gnas pa dang / ji skad du thos pa'i chos la nan tan byed pa dang / smon lam gyi khyad par te/ shA ri'i bu chos gsum po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' myur du bla na med pa yang dag
38a1(dkon brtsegs): pa pa tshu A / sa su sas sgyu m+b+ha
38a2(dkon brtsegs): la/ dzA dang ldan pa / 'i bras 'di skang rgyas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dzI rjes du bzhin gshegs pas legs pa rigs su pa ni man+ta ta~M// ma rnan nas snang chub tu phyogs tsas tha
38a3(dkon brtsegs): bag mchis pa la gnas so// byang chub ni nan tam la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub po// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsar
38a4(dkon brtsegs): pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad ni bag yod pa la gnas so// byang chub ni nan tan la gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa ni smon
38a5(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub bo// shA ri'i bu sngon ngas ji ltar smon lam btab pa de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yongs su grub bo// shA ri'i bu nga bag yod pa la gnas pas smon lam yongs su
38a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs so// shA ri'i bu ras nan tan byas pas byang chub thob po// shA ri'i bu bag med par gnas shing / tshig gi las lhur len pa dang nan tan med pas ni nyan thos kyi sarang bsgrub par mi nus na/ zla
38a7(dkon brtsegs): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lta ci smos te/ shAri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa'i ming du gdags rang das 'cha par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas byang chub sem/
38b1(dkon brtsegs): raba'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'dil bslab par bya'o// de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' brgyad bri ba'i stong so so'i spyan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis kyang
38b2(dkon brtsegs): mgrin gcig tu bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa ji ltar bcas pa 'di la bslab par bgyi'o// nan tan gyis yongs su
38b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrub par bgyi'o// bag mchis par gnas par bgyi'o// smon lam rnams yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// ji ltar bsams
38b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad par bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das
38b5(dkon brtsegs): ma dzing lda pa sha sa 'du gang nis gsol to// semathan 'das 'dzum pa mang pa'i rgyung gas/ A pa sa/ bcom ldas ngas kyis pa thal smra/ shAna'i snong kyi du
38b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dumi 'dzin smrasas pa rigs kyi ba dag mthong ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldam skye ma thong ngags sa/ bcom ldan dus myos pa phrul pa sa sa 'dis sa
38b7(dkon brtsegs): ma mams ca ma mam par rdzogs pa ma tshus la mas / sa sa yo kyi'i
39a1(dkon brtsegs): stag sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung ba ngas gzigs pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang ming smon lam bkod pa zhes bya ba sha stag tu sangs rgyas kyi zhing
39a2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang gzhan du 'byung bar 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi
39a3(dkon brtsegs): zhing na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba re 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyur te/ tshe'i tshad ni ma gtogs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi tshe'i tshad ci tsam zhig tu 'gyur/
39a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re re zhing tshe'i tshed bskal pa bcu bcur 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
39a5(dkon brtsegs): seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par 'gyur te 'dug pa stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/
39a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam
39a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bstod cing bsngags na/ bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di yun ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ de'i sangs rgyas
39b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing ni ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgral 'di skad
39b2(dkon brtsegs): ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrag
39b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/
39b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis kho bo la ci khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs sam/ 'on te ma zhugs shes je dris shig/ de ci'i phyir na/
39b5(dkon brtsegs): na/ rigs kyi bu gal te kho bo byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na ni/ de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par batshang yang rgyan/ kho bo yang dag par zhugs pa med pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar ji ltar
39b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sems can rnams kyi don du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par ma zhugs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir
39b7(dkon brtsegs): zhe na/ sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gal te kho bos sems can zhig dmigs na ni/ de'i phyir kho bo'ang de dag gi don du byang chub tu yang dag par 'jug na/ rigs kyi bu gang gi
40a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir sems can yang med/ srog kyang med/ gang zag kyang med pa de'i phyir kho bo 'jug pa med do// ldog pa med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos/
40a2(dkon brtsegs): la ma zhugs sam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos la zhugs pa ste/ chos gang zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa med
40a3(dkon brtsegs): la/ mtshan ma med cing mtshan nyid med pa de ni sangs rgyas su zhugs pa yin te/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas su zhugs pa de dang 'dra bas/ sangs rgyas su zhugs pa de dang mi 'dra ba med do// rigs
40a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ khyod sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi don du ma zhugs sam zhes smras pa de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de bzhin du lung ston cig/ rigs kyi bu 'di
40a5(dkon brtsegs): ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub tu smon tam/ 'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/ gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dam// gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi dben pa
40a6(dkon brtsegs): nyid dam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub tu smon/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ gzugs byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te gzugs kyi rang bzhin nam/ gzugs kyi de
40a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid dam/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid dam/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi dben pa nyid dam/ gzugs kyi chos nyid byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ smras pa/
40b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal de nim yin te/ gzugs byung chub tu smon pa med do// gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid dang / gzugs kyi ngo banyid dang / gzugs kyi stong pa nyid dang / gzug
40b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi dben pa nyid dang / gzugs kyi chos nyid ni byang chub tu smon pa med do// gzugs ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya ba ste/ gzugs kyi chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub mngon par rdzogs
40b3(dkon brtsegs): b.rab tshang mi myor// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ri ji snyam du sems/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa byang chub tu ston tam/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi
40b4(dkon brtsegs): bar du'ang byang chub tu smon tam/ rigs kyi bu 'di snyam du sems/ rnam par shes pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'am/ rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du'ang byang chub mngon par rdzogs
40b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya'am// smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni byang chub tu smon pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar
40b6(dkon brtsegs): durang byang chub tu smon pa med do// rnam par shes pa ni byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgyu'o// rnam par shes pa'i chos nyid kyi bar du 'ang bying chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi bya'o// smras
40b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ phung po lnga po dag las phyi rol tu bdag gam/ bdag gi zhes bya bar gdags par nus sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// smras pa/
41a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ rigs kyi bu de lta yin na byang chub tu smon pa'i chos de gang zhig yod byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'ang gang zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod lta bu byang chub sems dpa' sem
41a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po gzhan dag gi dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pas kho bo byang chub tu smon pa med do// kho bo mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi tshwa'o zhes bshad na/ bstan pa de thos pa'i byang chub sems dpa' las
41a3(dkon brtsegs): dang po pa rnams skrag par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni skrag pa med pa ste/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ni skrag pa med do// skrag pa med par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs
41a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang chos ston te/ gang skrag pa de ni skyo bar 'gyur ro// gang skyo bar gyur pa de ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ro// gang 'dod chags dang bral ba de ni rnam par 'grol lo// gang rnam par grol ba de ni bcing ba med par
41a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// gang bcings pa med pa de ni chags par mi 'gyur ro// gang chags pa med pa de ni 'gro ba med do// gang 'gro ba med pa de ni 'ong ba med do// gang 'ong ba med pa de ni smon pa med do// gang smon pa med pa de ni smyon
41a6(dkon brtsegs): lam 'dengs pa med ngo // gang smon lam 'debyas pa med pa de ni ldog pa med do// gang ldog pa med par ni phyir ldog ste/ tsi las phyir ldog can/ yang ga cu 'dzin pa las phyir ldag go// sems can du 'dzin ma
41a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / srog tu 'dzin pa dang / gang zag tu 'dzin pa dang / chang par 'dzin pa dang / dag par 'dzin pa dang / mtshan mar 'dzin pa las phyir ldog go// rnam par rtog pa las phyir ldog go/ nas phyir ldog pa de na
41b1(dkon brtsegs): nga'i tshe 'gyur ba med pas phyir mi ldog ste/ gang las phyir mi ldog cen/ stong pa nyid las phyir mi ldog go// mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
41b2(dkon brtsegs): rnams las phyir mi ldog go// de la gang las byer mi ldog pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams gang sbyin/ bral ba med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// khongs su gtogs pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi
41b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams so// dmigs pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas kyo chos rnams so// len pa med pa de ni sangs rgyas gyi chos rnams so// dor bamed pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so// grub med pa dang / rnga rnam par rig pa med
41b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / ming tsam du zad pa dang / stong pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma'agags pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / rnam par byang ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang bral ba dang / rdul med pa dang / rdul
41b5(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba dang / bdag gi ba med pa dang / yid la bya ba med pa dang / mi ldan pa med pa dang / zad pa med pa dang / blangs pa med pa dang / mnyam pa med pa dang / mi mnyam pa med pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so//
41b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos gang yin pa de dag ni chos kyang ma yin/ chos ma yin pa'ang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la gang las 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes bya bar brjod par bya ba'i gnas mi
41b7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' las dang po pa gang gis bstan pa 'di thos nas/ 'jigs par 'gyur ba de dag ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
42a1(dkon brtsegs): gang 'jigs par ma gyur pa de dag ni ci'ang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 'jam dpal cigs bsams shing de skad ston/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang 'jigs par gyur pa de
42a2(dkon brtsegs): dag ni rnam par rtog par 'gyur te/ gang rnam par rtog pa de dag ni 'di snyam du/ bdag cag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam pas/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed
42a3(dkon brtsegs): pa ji snyed du skyed par gyur pa de snyed du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang dag de lta bu'i sems mi skyed pa de dag ni byang chub tu dmigs pa med cing / sems kyis rlom sems su mi byed do// byang chub kyi sems su
42a4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa med pas rnam par rtog pa med do// gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe/ ci'ang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med do// de ci'i phyir ci'ang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med ce na/ byang chub de mi dmig
42a5(dkon brtsegs): bAs de'i phyir mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab med do// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam ma pa'i khams byang chub mngon par rdzogs parang tshang rgya ma/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin no// 'jam dpa
42a6(dkon brtsegs): gyis sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu ci bcom ldan 'das kyis chos thams cad nam mkha' dang mnyam par bstan mod / smras pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin no// 'as dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lnga bas rnams
42a7(dkon brtsegs): mkha' ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin/ byang chub ji lta bar nam mkha' yang de bzhin te/ nam mkha' nga byang chub ni gnyis su med de gnyis su dbyer med do// gang gis de lta bu'i mnyam pa nyid shes nar ni zung
42b1(dkon brtsegs): cang shes pa med pa/ des ma shes pa'ang ba yang med do// brtan pa 'du bsad par na/ dge sbyong ma nyis stong rje bar ben pa mang par dag pa rnams byas sems rnas pa grol lo// khwa dang mi rlo ba sto ma
42b2(dkon brtsegs): la chos kyi meg rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam par dag go// srog chags dgu bri drug stong gis sngon ma bskyed pa las bla na med pa srung dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa 'gyur to// drung chub
42b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' lde khri cis stong gis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos dgro'i rtsa le gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i smras
42b4(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skrod ces smras so// 'jas dngapal khyod kyis yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
42b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu kha rog/ chos rnams ma skyes pa la bdag rnam par rtog tu ma gzug/ rigs kyi bu gang la la zhig 'di skad du bdag gis byang chub tu sems bskyed do// bdag gis byang chub kyi phyi'i spyad par bya'o/
42b6(dkon brtsegs): ber na/ de nyid de'i log par lta ba chen por 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni sems gang byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ de ltar bdag gis semos de'ang yang
42b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par rjes su ma mthong bas byang chub tu'ang sems ma bskyed do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal rjes su ma mthong zhes bya ba'i tshig de'i don gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ rigs kyi bu yang dgapa
43a1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su ma mthong zhes bya ba ni mnyam pa nyid bstan to// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir mnyam pa nyid ces bya/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba ni gang la tha dang /
43a2(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa ste/ mnyam pa nyid des chos thams cad 'di lta ste/ dben pa'i tshul du tshul gcig tu bstan pas ro gcig tu brjod cing kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa dang / chad pa med pa
43a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / rtag pa med pa dang / mi skye ba med pa dang / ma 'gag pa med pa dang / nga'i ba med pa dang / yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i phyir chos ston cing / mi rtog rnam par rtog pa ste/ rigs kyi
43a4(dkon brtsegs): bu chos de lta bu mnyam pa nyid du rtog pa'i ye shes ni mnyam pa nyid ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos nyid khong du chud pa de ni khams la tha dad par yang yang dag par rjes
43a5(dkon brtsegs): su mi mthong / gcig tu 'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba 'di ni mnyam pa nyid do// mnyam pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni mi mnyam pa med pa'o// mi mnyam pa med pa gang yin pa de ni gzod ma nas dag pa'o//
43a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon
43a7(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa 'di ni 'di ji srid cig nas ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bgyi bar mi ston te/ 'khor 'di dag ni nyan par 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar
43b1(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gson nur gyur pa 'di ni zab mo'i bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ debang ji tsam du byang chub kyang mi dmigs/ sems kyang mi dmigs pa de tsam du rab pa'i bzod pa dang ldan /
43b2(dkon brtsegs): des byang chub kyi sems mi dmigs pasangs 'di srid cig nas byang chub tu sems bskyed do zhes bya bar mi ston na/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yun ring po ji srid cig nas bla na med pa
43b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med pa brgya stong gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed phrag bdun 'das pa
43b4(dkon brtsegs): de'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol// de'i tshe de'i dus ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/
43b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar phyog logs su sangs
43b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung bye ba brag dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byung ba bzang po zhes bya ba byung ste/ den bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug smra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po zhes
43b7(dkon brtsegs): bya ba des chos ston to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos 'dus pa ni bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhir gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa ni de nyis 'gyur du gyur te/ de'i tshe rgyal po rnam
44a1(dkon brtsegs): mkha' zhes bya ba chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba'i rin po che bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ rigs kyi bu rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba de bu dang / chung ma dang / gnyen bar ba dang /
44a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor du bcas pas las gzhan med cing skyo ba med pa'i sems kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la lo ba
44a3(dkon brtsegs): khri bzhi stong du zhal zas kyi rnam pa kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / na bzab gsar pa gas rab gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / pho brang khang pa brtsegs pa gsar pa gsar pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang /
44a4(dkon brtsegs): rim gro pa kha na ma tho ba med pa gzhan dang gzhan dag dang / bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis rim gror byas par gyur to// de ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das pa'i 'og tu de gcig pu dben pa na gas/
44a5(dkon brtsegs): shing gnyis su med par 'dug 'dug pa'i yid la rnam pa 'di lta bu'i sems skyes par gyur te/ bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po mngon par 'dus byas kyang de dag nges pa med pa'i sems kyis 'dus byas nas
44a6(dkon brtsegs): da ni dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang yongs su bsngo bar bya'o snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du sems te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di brgya byin du bsngo ma/ tshangs par bsngo'am/ 'khor los sgyur bar bsngo 'am/ nyan thos su bsngongam/
44a7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas su bsngo 'am/ gang du bsngo snyam pa dang / rigs kyi bu rgyal po de sems de ltar skyes ma thag tu steng gi bar snang las lnga mang pos sgra bsgrags pa/ rgyal ngo bo chen po de ltar dma' ba'i sems ma skyed/
44b1(dkon brtsegs): cig de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod kyis bsod nams kyi phung po yangs pa byas kyis/ rgyal po chen po blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cig ces byas pa dang / rigs kyi bu de'i cha rgyal po/
44b2(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' de dga' ba dang mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes par gyur te/ des 'di snyam du bsams so// bdag ni byang chub las phyir mi ldog go// de ci'i phyir sten/ lnga rnams kyis bdag gis sems yongs su /
44b3(dkon brtsegs): te sgra bsgrags so snyam mo// rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po nam mkha' de srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cus yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes
44b4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po gal ba der dong ste lpags nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das de la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do//
44b5(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de nas rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po gal ba de legs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bca
44b6(dkon brtsegs): de gsol pa/ khyod kyi spyan sngar dam chos zhug skyes bu dam par mchog skye bar// rnam pa gang gis 'gyur ba de// rnam par 'dren pas bdag la gsungs/ rnam 'dren khyod la mngon sum du// mchod pa yangs pa/
44b7(dkon brtsegs): bgyid bgyid kyang // mngos sems kyis bgyid gyur gyi// gar yang yongs su bsdom bgyis// bdag ni gcig pu dben gnas tshe// 'di 'dra'i sems shig skyes par gyur// bdag gis bsod nams che bsags ma/
45a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ ji ltar yongs su de bsngo snyam// tshangs par bsngo'am brgya byin nam// gling bzhi'i dbang phyug thob par ram// 'on te nyan thos dngos por ram// rang rgyal thob pa'i phyir bsngo snyam/
45a2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sems bskyed de ma thag/ lha rnams sgra 'byin brjod pa ni// dma' ba'i sems kyis bsod nams 'di// rnam par chud gson ma byed cig/ sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// smon lam rlabs chen
45a3(dkon brtsegs): gdab par gyis// byang chub sems rab bskyed byas shing // 'jig rten rnams kyi don yang gyis// de bas chos kyi dbang phyug gtso// rdzogs sangs rgyas la bdag zhu ste// thub pa ji ltar sems bskyed na/
45a4(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub skye bar 'gyur// ye shes de ni gang gis thob// don de bdag la bstan du gsol// byang chub sems ni bskyed byas shing // thub pa khyod 'drar bdag kyang smon// de yi tshig de gsan gyur nas//
45a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// rgyal po chen po shes par gyis// rim gyis khyod la bstan par bya// chos rnams thams cad rkyen bzhin te// 'dun pa'i rtsa la rab tu gnas//
45a6(dkon brtsegs): gang gis smon lam ci btab pa// de 'dra'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// rgyal po ngas kyang sngan chad ni// rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed gyur// sems can kun la par don du// ngas ni smon lam dam pa btab//
45a7(dkon brtsegs): smon lam ji ltar btang tshul du// ngas ni 'bras bu thob par gyur// byang chub dam pa ngas thob pas// nga yi bsam pa rdzogs par gyur// rgyal po chen po brtan gyis la// mi 'gyur sems ni bskyed par gyis//
45b1(dkon brtsegs): gal te spyod pa spyad byas ma/ khyod kyang yang dag sangs rgyas 'gyur/ thub pa'i gsung de thos gyur nas/ rgyal po de ni dga' bar gyur// 'jig rten kun gyi mngon sum du// seng ge ri ror tshig 'di ngo/
45b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba tha ma med pa yi// sngon gyi mtha' ni ji srid du// de srid sems can pan don du// spyod pa dpag yas spyad par bya// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga 'dir// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed do// 'gro ba thams
45b3(dkon brtsegs): cad ma gron gnyer te// dbul zhing 'phongs las sgrol bar bya// de ring phan chad gal te yang // bdag gis 'dod chags sems bskyed na// phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa'i// sangs rgyas thams cad bslus par bya/
45b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub nam zhig thob par du// tha ba'i sems dang gnod sems dang // phrag dog dang ni ser sna yang // de ring byin chad mi bu'o// tshangs pa'i spyod pa bdag gis spyad// sdig pa'i 'dod pa yongs su btang // nu'i khrims
45b5(dkon brtsegs): snom dang nges pa la// sangs rgyas rjes su bslab par bya// bdag ni byang chub rings tshul du// 'chang rgyar mos shing spro ba med// byi mthar thug gi bar du yang // sems can gcig phyir spyad par bya// tshad med pasam/
45b6(dkon brtsegs): gyis mi khyab pa'i// sangs rgyas zhing ni sbyang bar bya// phyogs rnams bcu po thams cad du// bdag gi ming ni thos par bya// bdag gis bdag la lung bstan te// sangs rgyas 'gyur ba dogs pa med// bdag gi
45b7(dkon brtsegs): lhag bsam rnam par dag/ bdag dbang 'di na 'dren pa rnams// lus dang ngag gi las rnams kyang // rnam pa kun tu bdag gis sbyangs// yid kyi las kyang sbyang bar bya// mi dge'i las ni spyad mi bya//
46a1(dkon brtsegs): / ma 'ongs dus na sangs rgyas te// 'jig rten mgon du 'gyur zhe na// bden pa des ni sa 'di yang // rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur cig/ bdag gis bden tshig gang brjod pa// ma nor yang dag/
46a2(dkon brtsegs): smras she na// bden pa des ni mkha' dbyings las// sil snyan dag gi sgra grag shog/ bdag la gal te g.yo med cing // de bzhin tha ba med ce na// man da ra ba'i me tog bzang // bden pa des ni char du phog/
46a3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag don du nges pa yi// tshig bden de skad brjod pa dang // phyogs bcu mtha' yas thams cad kyi// bye ba'i zhing rnams rab tu g.yos// de yi mod la mkha' dbyings nas// sil snyan bye ba'i sgra yang byung /
46a4(dkon brtsegs): me tog man ngar ba dag/ mi 'greng bdun sring bab par gyur// rgyal po de yi rjes bslabs te// srog chags bye ba nyi shu yis// 'dren par bdag cag 'gyur smon ces// yid du 'ong ba'i sgra yang bsgrags/
46a5(dkon brtsegs): de ltar srog chags bye ba phrag/ nyi shu po rnams thams cad kyang // rgyal po mchog gi rjes slob cing // byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur/ rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los
46a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid de'i tshe re'i dus na 'khor los
46a7(dkon brtsegs): sgyur ba'i rgyal po nam mkha' zhes bya bar gyur pa ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis byang chub tu sems bskyed phyin chad bskal pa gang+gA'i klung grangs med pa brgya stong phrag bdun gyi bye ma snyed 'das par
46b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas kyang bskal pa gang+gA'i klung drug cu rtsa bci'i bye ma snyed 'das par gyur te/ de nas nye bar bzung nas 'di bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs yongs su rdzogs so//
46b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu thams cad yongs su rdzogs so// 'di sangs rgyas kyi sa yongs su rdzogs so// 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs te/ bar bga' yang dad
46b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ram/ mi 'gyur snyam pa'i sems gcig kyang bskyed pa ma gyur to// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'brug sgra'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po sa
46b4(dkon brtsegs): spyan sngar/ rgyal po de dang lhan cig tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i srog chags bye ba phrag nyi shu po de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas chos
46b5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can tshad med grangs med pa'i don du sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas nas/ sangs rgyas kyi mya ngan las 'das par yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de dag thams cad kyang 'jam
46b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud do// de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab la yang dag par bcud de// thams cad
46b7(dkon brtsegs): la'ang bsnyen pa kur dang yongs su spyad pa byas so// thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos bzung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa gcig ma gtogs pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas/ 'og gi phyogs logs su sangs
47a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi d+ha rlung ba'i khri bkyi stong gi byes med 'das pa ra/ 'jig rten gyi khams sa'i dbyangs shes myu ba spyod de/ den de bzhin ga shegs pa sa b+hU zhes byung byung chub dem/
47a2(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i dge 'dun tshad med pa dang / sku tshe'i tshad dpag tu med par bzhugs pa ste/ re nga ltar yang bzhugs shing 'tsho'o// gzhes s+ho// sngon byung ba'i le'u 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ srog chags brgya stong breg bdur
47a3(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gnon
47a4(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gal te de ltar khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang yongs su rdzogs/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu'ang yongs su rdzogs/ sangs
47a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi sa'ang yongs su rdzogs/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs na/ ci'i phyir bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang mi rgyu/ de skad ces smras/
47a6(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgral 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su rdzogs na/
47a7(dkon brtsegs): gang dang yang du byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyar med do// de ci'i phyir se na/ des byang chub thob par gyur pas thob zin pa ni gzong thob par mi bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal sangs rgyas kyi chos
47b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs shes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin nyid yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o// nam mkha' yongs su rdzogs pa gang /
47b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de ltar nam mkha' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / de bzhin nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// rigs kyi
47b3(dkon brtsegs): bu sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa gang yin zhes de skad zer ba la/ gang gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / gang rnams par shes pa
47b4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal gzugs yongs su rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
47b5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa ni ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gzugs kyi rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa yang dag par rjes su mthong ngam/ smras pa/ bajam dpal de ni ma mthong ngo // bajam
47b6(dkon brtsegs): dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu chos gang rtag pa'ang ma yin/ mi rtag pa'ang ma yin pa de la yongs su rdzogs pa'am/ 'grib par 'gyur ba yod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni med do// 'jam dang /
47b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis smras pa// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos gang yongs su rdzogs pa'ang med/ 'grib pa'ang med pa de ni mongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ cis yongs su rdzogs shes bya/ smras pa/ des chos ji lta
48a1(dkon brtsegs): shes pa de ltar ye shes 'jug par 'gyur te/ gang gi tshe ye shes 'jug par gyur pa de'i tshe mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go/ gang gi tshe mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de'i tshe yongs su rdzogs pa
48a2(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ 'grib par byed pa med de/ gang yongs su rdzogs pa 'am/ 'grib pa med pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// rigs kyi bu de lta bas na gzugs kyi mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs yongs su rdzogs
48a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mnyam pa nyid mthong ba gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
48a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal de ltar khyod yun ring po nas bzod pa thob kyang bdag
48a5(dkon brtsegs): gis byang chub thob par bya'o zhes bya ba'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang sgru ba med na/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis da ji ltar sems can gzhan dag byang chub la yang dag par gzung bar bya// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu/
48a6(dkon brtsegs): kho bo na sems can gang yang byang chub la yang dag par mi 'dzud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can med pa dang / sems can dben pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu gang gis sems can dmigs pa des ni byeng
48a7(dkon brtsegs): chub kyang dmigs/ gang gis byang chub dmigs pa de ni byang chub la sems can rnams yang dag par 'dzud par byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu bdag gis ni byang chub kyang ma dmigs/ sems can yang ma
48b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pas/ de ltar byang chub la sems can rnams 'dzud par mi byed do// mnyam pa nyid ni byang chub tu smon pa byed pa'ang med/ de las ldog parang med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mnyam pa nyid
48b2(dkon brtsegs): la rnam par rtog pa med pas de ltar mnyam pa nyid la smon pa med do// ldog pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ radu byed rnams la gang nas kyang dong ba dang / gang du'ang 'gro ba med de/ de ni mnyam pa nyid do//
48b3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi tshig ste/ stong pa nyid la smon pa gang yang med do// rigs kyi bu gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du de ltar yun ring po nas bzod pa thob na/ ji ltar cing
48b4(dkon brtsegs): phyir bdag gis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems mi skyed ces zer ba ni/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sems gang gis byang chub thob par bya ba de lta bu yang dag par rjes su
48b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma mthong ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na?/ sems la gzugs med cing bstan du med pas/ byang chub kyang ming tsam ste/ yid las byung ba ma yin pas byang chub ces
48b6(dkon brtsegs): bya ba 'am/ sems shes bya ba ni ming tsam ste/ ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de las bsams nas/ bdag gis byang chub ji ltar thob par bya snyam du
48b7(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed pa med do zhes smras pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems de ni ma skyes pa ste/ ma skyes pa la skye ba med do// gang skye ba med pa de la thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs par bya
49a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang gang zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba ji lta bu/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang chos thams cad la rlom sems med cing / mnyam pa nying
49a2(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pa 'di ni mngon par rdzogs pa zhes bya'o// ji ltar rdul tsam gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyed mi 'gog pa ji ltar rtogs pa de ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// de bzhin nyid dang ma nor bde
49a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin nyid ni rnam par mi rtog ste/ de ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// yang dag pa'i lto bas zhugs mnyam pa nyid la chos gang yang mi dmigs shing ma dmigs pas/ brtsig pa'am tha dad par
49a4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed cing rlom sems su mi byed pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya'o// chos thams cad gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu lus kyis mngon sum du byas shing shes kyang lus la'ang
49a5(dkon brtsegs): mngon par khyen pa med/ sems la 'ang mngon par ben pa med pa 'di ni mngon par rtogs pa thob pa zhes bya'o// smras pa/ 'jam dpal thob pa zhes bya ba de dza m+b+ha buM/ smras pa/ rigs kyi sna na
49a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i tshig ste/ de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o// de'i rgyu ba khams gsum na tha snyad du 'di yin no zhes bstan du med de/ 'phags pa rnams kyi thob pa gang yin par ni brjod par mi nus so//
49a7(dkon brtsegs): de ni gnas med cing rgyub med pas der phyir brjod par mi nus so// rigs kyi bu gzhan sa den thob pa med pa las thob pa'i sgrar brjod pa ste/ de ni chos gang yang thob pa'ang ma yin/ mthob pa'angam/
49b1(dkon brtsegs): yin pas de'i phyir thob pa zhes bya'o// / bam po bzhi pa ste tha ma'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng sa
49b2(dkon brtsegs): rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jal dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi ming gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur ba/ de bzhin gsheg
49b3(dkon brtsegs): pas legs par bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
49b4(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsel gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu
49b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig tu 'gyur/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang byang chub la mngon par dga' ba de la dris shig/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub la mngon par dga' ba ma yin nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no//
49b6(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang mngon par dga' ba de ni 'dod chags dang ma bral ba'o// gang 'dod chags dang ma bral ba de ni sred pa'o// sred pa gang la yod pa de ni skye bar 'gyur ro// skye ba gang la yod pa de la tshor ba yod do//
49b7(dkon brtsegs): gang la tshor ba yod pa de la 'byung ba med de/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/ kho bo byang chub la mngon par dga' ba med de/ byang chub tu dmigs pa med pas de'i phyir mngon par dga' ba med do// rigs kyi bu de/
50a1(dkon brtsegs): lha mod kyi/ 'on kyang gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ji lta bu zhig tu 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ de la bdag gis bdag bstod par mi nus te/
50a2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad thugs su chud pa mngon sum du bzhugs bzhin du bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bdag nyid kyis brjod pa na/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'
50a3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po'i bdag bstod du 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyis khyod nyid kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i smon lam sngon cig
50a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pas gnang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod las smon lam de dag thos nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag kyang spyod pa de lta bu yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
50a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la slar mi zlog ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus bstan par bgyi'o// de nas 'jam dpal gso
50a6(dkon brtsegs): nur gyur pa stan las langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lnga ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa gal pa de logs su
50a7(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo byang chub don du gnyer ba dag bdag la nyan cing smon lam
50b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag thos nas kyang yongs su rdzogs par bgyid la/ de bzhin nyid du nAn tan bgyid na bdag gis bstan par bgyi'o// de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la bcug
50b2(dkon brtsegs): ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
50b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bskal pa bye ba khrig khrig phrag 'bum phrag brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag gis smon lam btab pa ni nam bdag gis phyog
50b4(dkon brtsegs): bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas bltas na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad bdag gis byang chub la yang
50b5(dkon brtsegs): dag par btsud pa dang / bdag gis byang chub kyi sems la bkod pa dang / bdag gis sbyin pa la yang dag par btsud pa dang / de bzhin du tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan
50b6(dkon brtsegs): dang / shes rab la yang dag par btsud pa dang / bdag gis bskul ba dang / bdag gis rjes su bstan par gyur par ma mthong ba de srid du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
50b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi bya'i/ nam bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas phyogs bcur rnam par bltas kyang / bdag gis sangs rgyas nyid la ma bkod pa'i de bzhin gshegs
51a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de lta bu gang yang mthong bar ma gyur pa de'i tshe/ bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o/ zhes bgyi bar smon 'am ba
51a2(dkon brtsegs): bo de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' la la 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa 'dis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji skad cig mthong
51a3(dkon brtsegs): pAr gyur snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis rtog pa thugs kyi thugs su chud nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po steng ge'i rdul
51a4(dkon brtsegs): gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu gang la la zhig skyes par gyur te/ des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kham
51a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di rdul phra rab tu glags shing bshig ste thal bar bya na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag rtsis shes pa'am/ rtsis la shin tu mkhas pa dag gis brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod
51a6(dkon brtsegs): dro 'i'am/ stong phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhe'am/ dbum phrag 'di snyed cig yod de zhe'am/ bye ba brag 'di snyed cig yong do na'am/ bye ba brgya phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhebam/ bye ba stong brag 'di snyed
51a7(dkon brtsegs): cig yod do zhe'am/ bye ba brgya stong 'bum phrag 'di snyed cig yod do zhes shes pa 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ gnal ba'am/ tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags
51b1(dkon brtsegs): so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar skal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas rnam par bltas na/ phyogs bcu'i
51b2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs re rer yang de snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mthong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// ba
51b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig la gang+gA'i klung du ma'i bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing tsam gyi thag grur yangs par yongs su ma grub cing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i phyir rin po
51b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong 'bum phrag du ma las grub pa dang / rin po che brgya stong 'bum phrag du mas spras pa srid pa'i rtse mo'i tshad tsam du ma gyur gyi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog
51b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshang rgya bar mi bgyi bar smon lam btub bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bcu'i tshad
51b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi byang chub kyi shing skyes te/ byang chub kyi shing de'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de thams cad rgyas shing khyab par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab po// bcom
51b7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis byang chub kyi shing de'i drung du bdag bdug pa'i tshe/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas/ yongs su mya ngan
52a1(dkon brtsegs): las 'das pa'i bar du byang chub kyi shing drung de nas ma langs kyang bdag gi sprul pa phyogs bcu'i phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong 'bum phrag grangs med
52a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag tu dong zhing // sems can rnams la chos ston par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang bdag gis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der nyan
52a3(dkon brtsegs): thob dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming tsam yang me med par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang dang / thab dang / bachab pa med pa tshangs pa'i spyod pa yongs su dag par spyod pa sha stag gis sangs rgyas kyi
52a4(dkon brtsegs): de gang la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi ming yang mi grag cing mngal du skye ba med pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang gos ngur smrig gyon cing skyil mo krung bcas par rdzus te byung ba dang /
52a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi 'ang shin tu dag par gyur te/ de bzhin gsheg la'i sprul ba phyogs bcu 'jig chen gyi khams bye ba zag zig pa spyong grangs med par gshegs shing sems pan nam se la tshas so
52a6(dkon brtsegs): dag theg pa gsum las brtsams te/ mos pa'i tshul bzhin du sems can rnams la chos ston pa ma gtogs par/ sangs rgyas kyi snying de na can thos dang rang sangs rgyas med cing byang chub sems rapas song
52a7(dkon brtsegs): su gang bar gyur cig ces brtsi bar smo lam de blang btam po/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rgyal gyis mngon par bsngags pa'i rnam
52b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas na ming ji skad ces bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/
52b2(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ci'i phyir kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
52b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa kur hu gzigs pa des/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa kun gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
52b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu da ltar byung ba'i dus sam/ nga mya
52b5(dkon brtsegs): na las 'das pa'i dus kyang rung ste/ de bzhin gshegs par dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan gang gis thos pa de dag ni mi 'gyur ba la zhugs pa dang /
52b6(dkon brtsegs): mos pa chung ba'i gang zag rnams ma gtogs par thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa de kun tu gzigs pa
52b7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med
53a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis dga' ba'i zas dang ldan par 'gyur bar smon lam mdzad pa lta bu'ang ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'/
53a2(dkon brtsegs): gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag kha zas kyi 'du shes shig skyes par gyur na/ de ma thag tu skad cig de la de dag gi lag pa g.yas par ro bro ba brgya phrag du ma dang ldan pa'i kha zas kyis gang ba'i snod
53a3(dkon brtsegs): mngon du byung bar gyur/ snod de dag byung ma thag tu de dag 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phu le/ sems can dbul zhing 'phongs
53a4(dkon brtsegs): bas rdul bsngal ba dang / mgon med par gyur pa dag dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa gang dag la stong phrag dri mar yang mchol ma'i thal ba 'ga' yang marnyed pa de lta bu dag yongs su tshim da
53a5(dkon brtsegs): ma byas par/ bdag nyid kyis bza' ba ni rdul dang mi 'dra'o zhes bgyi bar dran pa thob par gyur cing / de'i mod la de dag mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su grub par gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan 'i
53a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mtha' las mchi ba dang / rlung ltar thogs pa ma mchis pa'i shugs kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyis khams grangs dang tshad ma mchis pa dag tu phyin nas/ kha zas de las de bzhin gsheg
53a7(dkon brtsegs): thos kyi dang dun dang cas pa la'ang tshul/ sems cad zings shing rdzogs pa dang mapon ma mchis pa rnams dang / yi dgas kyi 'jig rten du skyes pa rnams kyad 'ongs su rgyas par
53b1(dkon brtsegs): bgyis nas/ de dag la chos bstan te/ skad cig gcig gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der slar mchi bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam re skad btab po/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan
53b2(dkon brtsegs): yang bdag gis ni bdag byang chub thob pa'i tshe/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa' gang ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag gos rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi longs spyod dang ldan par gyur te/
53b3(dkon brtsegs): bsams pa tsam gyis ci la dga' ba'i gos rin po che dge sbyong gi tshul dang mthun pa rung ba dag kyang byung bar gyur la/ gos rin po che de dag byung ma thag tu 'di snyam du 'di ltar bdag cag gis gos 'di lta bu
53b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la ma phul bar/ bdag cag nyid kyis yongs su spyad pa ni tshul dang mi 'dra'o snyam pa'i dran pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gis sems de lhur skyes ma
53b5(dkon brtsegs): thag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad ma mchis grangs ma mchis pa rag tu mchis shing / gos de dag sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bkab ste/ blar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der mchis nas kyi
53b6(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i gos rin po chel spyod par gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam de skad btab bo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis lo
53b7(dkon brtsegs): spyong dang / yongs su spyod pa gang ji snyed cig mchis pa de dag thams cad kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dag la phul nas/ slad kyis bdag cag yongs su spyod
54a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi khom pa brgyad ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi dge ba'i sgyu ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sdug bsngal
54a2(dkon brtsegs): gyi sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na skyon du 'gyur ba'i sgra ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg pa yid du mi 'ong ba ma mchis par
54a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces
54a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ci zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
54a5(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ smon lam ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs shing dag la rdul med pa bsags pa zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gyi lam
54a6(dkon brtsegs): de phyogs glang logs shig tu 'byung bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sbal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams den lho phyogs logs su 'byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dra
54a7(dkon brtsegs): cing kyang de'i nang du 'dus shing khongs su chud par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
54b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis ni smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas gang zhing khor bu rin po che du mas smras pas/ nor bu rin po che kun tu bstan pa 'dral/ rin po
54b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dkon la/ sngon chad ma mthong la mi srid pa sha stug ste/ de dag gi ming brjod na'ang lo bye ba brgya stong thogs par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i nor bu rin po che dag gis sangs
54b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing de yongs su gang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de la byang chub sems dpa' la la zhig sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di gser las grub par mthong bar dga' bo snyam na'ang nges gser las grub par
54b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba dang / dngul las grub par mthong bar dga' 'o snyam na'ang dngul las grub par mthong la/ gzhan gyis gser las grub par mthong ba ma mchis par mi 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin du bai DUR+Ya las grub
54b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dang ga shel las grub pa dang / mu tig dmar po las grub pa dang / rdo'i snying po las grub pa dang / spug las grub pa dang / de bzhin du rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las grub pa dang / tsan dan las grub pa
54b6(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ a ka ru la sa grub pa 'am/ ta ka ra las grub pa 'am/ ta ma la'i lo ma las grub pa 'am/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po las grub pa 'am/ tsan dan dmar po las grub pa 'am/ su rnam pa
54b7(dkon brtsegs): ji lta bur 'dod pa de dag gis de bzhin du mthong ste/ phan tshun nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing tha dad par mthong ba'ang ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing den byang chub kyi shing de las 'ong
55a1(dkon brtsegs): byung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rang rang las 'od byung bas sdang zhing gsal ba ma gtogs par nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ skar ma dang / rin po che dang /
55a2(dkon brtsegs): zhugs dang / glog gam/ sems can gzhan gang gi 'od kyang mi mngon pa dang / gang dag ji tsam du 'od kyis khyab par gda' ba/ tha na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de snyed du de dag gi
55a3(dkon brtsegs): 'od kyis gsal bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i khyad par gyis me tog kha bye ba dang / kha zum par 'gyur ba dang / gang dus dang tshed rnam pa ji lta bur
55a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spyod par 'tshal ba de bzhin du de'i 'grub pa ma gtogs par nyin mtshan gyi ming yang ma mchis pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na grang ba dang tsha ba'ang ma mchis/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi
55a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma mchis te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal ba de 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mchis shing / dga' ldan gyi gnas su che bas par bgyi nas
55a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i steng gi bar snang las sil snyan ltar mi gda' ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong rtag tu rgyun mi chad par sgra 'byin pa dang / sil
55a7(dkon brtsegs): snyan de dag las kyang 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i sgra mi 'byung gi/ gzhan du na pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgra dang / sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi
55b1(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sba ba byin par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag ji lta bur mos pa'i sgra de lta bu thos par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de la blta bar
55b2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal na 'chag gam/ 'gro'am/ 'ong ngam/ sdong ngam/ mchis kyang rung ste/ gang dag der sangs rgyas blta ba'i yid la bgyi bar skyes ma thag tu/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
55b3(dkon brtsegs): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa byang chub kyi shing drung na bzhugs pa de de nyid na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur cing / mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de mthong ma thag tu de dag gi the tsom
55b4(dkon brtsegs): ma ma/ nem nur ram/ yid gnyis sam/ chos kyi som nyi gang ci mchis pa yongs su chad par gyur te/ bstan mi 'tshal bar chos kyi tshig de'i don yongs su 'tshal bar gyur cig ces bgyi bar smon lam
55b5(dkon brtsegs): btab po// de nas 'khor de'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ gang 'di kun tu gzigs pa zhes bya ba de'i mtshan de ni tshul dang 'dra ba ste/
55b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can gang dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes par gyur pa lta ci smos te
