55b7(dkon brtsegs): gang dag gis lung bstan pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang / gang dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming thos pa de dag gis ni/ sangs rgyas mngon sum du mthong bar blta'o// ra skad ces/
56a1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin no// ji sad sbas pa bzhi
56a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ rigs kyi bu dag gang gis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig bcu stong gi mtshan brjod pa bas ni/ gang gis 'dum dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i ming brjod na/ 'di nyid de bas bsod rnams ces mang du spyad nu/
56a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i mtshan brjod pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bskal pa re re zhing sems can gyi don ji snyed du
56a4(dkon brtsegs): byas pa'o sems can gyi don de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis kyang ma mdzad do// de nas 'khor de'i lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' ldin
56a5(dkon brtsegs): dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
56a6(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de skad ces brjod pa dang / de'i mod la srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
56a7(dkon brtsegs): sems skyes par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// rgya
56b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gzhan yang 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis ni 'di ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med
56b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dag ne/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'i rgyan dang / smon lam gyi rgyan dang / mtshan nyid dang / mtshan ma dang / spyod pa dang / gnas kyi rnam
56b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyan gang ji snyed cig mthong ba las nyan thos kyi bkod pa dang / snyigs ma lnga'i sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par de dag thams cad bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig gi nang du 'dus pa dang / khongs su
56b4(dkon brtsegs): chud par bya'o zhes bgyi bar smon lam btab ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag 'tshal na bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa las brtsams te/ rnam pa gzhan dang
56b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du thogs pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis sug las gzhan ma mchis par bshad dam/ de bas kyang ring du bshad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de dag mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro// bcom
56b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gi smon lam gyi rnam pa gang ci 'dra ba de la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma gtogs par dbang du gyur pa gzhan gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan
56b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de de bzhin te/ de bzhin gshegs pas thugs su chud do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la ni thogs pa
57a1(dkon brtsegs): / med de/ dus gsum kun tu 'jug go de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' kha cig 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
57a2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de brjod pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan
57a3(dkon brtsegs): bkod pa yod pa de gnyis 'dra 'am/ 'on te mi 'dra snyam pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis rtog pa thugs su chud nas/ byang chub
57a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la bka' stsal pa// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na mi la la zhig gis skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i chas/ rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thig
57a5(dkon brtsegs): pa gcig blangs rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ chu blangs pa de dang byin las pa de gnyis gang mang bar 'gyur// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das blangs pa ni cung / smad na las pa ni tshad ma mchis
57a6(dkon brtsegs): so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu mi ris skra'i rtse mo brgyar gshegs pa'i chas rgya mtsho chen po las chu'i thigs pa gcig blangs pa de tsam du ni 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can de/
57a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o// rgya mtsho chen po na chu'i lcag ma ji snyed cig yod pa de tsam du ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa/
57b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod par blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal
57b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam de lta bu de bzhin gshegs pa
57b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan lal la mnga' bar gyur tam/ mnga' bar 'gyur ram/ da ltar la la na de lta bu mnga' ba lta'ang bzhugs sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu yod de/ sangs rgyas kyi
57b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'di nas shar phyogs logs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gad+ma'i klung bye ba phrag brgya'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams smon lam la rab tu gnas pas mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya ba yod de/
57b5(dkon brtsegs): de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po zhes bya ba sku tshe'i tshang dpag tu med pas da ltar bzhugs te 'a
57b6(dkon brtsegs): zhing gzhes la/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs tshad med pas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te chos ston to// rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon
57b7(dkon brtsegs): tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa dang / da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba
58a1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de gnyis mtshungs te lug chad med do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i go bgos
58a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jug pa chen pos zhugs pa gang 'di 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod pa 'di nyid la gnas pa bzhi yod de/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa'ang 'di dang
58a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi ming bstan du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag gang na mchis pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
58a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang bstan du gsol/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dang byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang bstan du gsol/ de ci'i
58a5(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi
58a6(dkon brtsegs): bu de'i phyir nyon cig dang bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gcig ni 'od kyi tog ces bya ste/ shar phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal
58a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go/ gnyis pa ni ye shes bla ma zhes bya ste/ lho phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nang dug go/ gsum pa ni/
58b1(dkon brtsegs): lci ba'i dbang po zhes bya ste/ dab phyogs logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab brtsegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nab dug go/ bzhi pa ni smon lam tho gros shes pa ste ga byung byos
58b2(dkon brtsegs): logs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mthu bo che'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de tshe rngu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa 'di lta bu mngon par
58b3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad par mngon par mdzad pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtags tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang
58b4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu snang bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das de'ang byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyis kun nas bskor cing mdun gyis bltas pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa sngan chad ma mthong ma thos shing
58b5(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab la rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu mig dang ldan pa'i lag na skyu ru ra'i 'bru 'dug pa mthong ba de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de sa
58b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas kun tu snang bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas 'od zer yon tan rtag tu mang ba rgya mtsho'i rgyal po de'ang sku tha ma la par dpag tshad brgyad khri bzhi stong mnga' ba
58b7(dkon brtsegs): ste 'dzam bu chu'o gser gyi ri bo ltar mdzes shing lham me lhun na lhang nger bzhugs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dpag tshad bzhi khri nyis stong tsam du gyur pa sha stag gis bskor
59a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ cing mdun gyis byas te/ byang chub kyi shing yon tan bkod pa du mas rab tu brgyan pa'i drung na seng ge'i khri la bzhugs shing sprul pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mngon par sprul pa mdzad de
59a2(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa de dag kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la
59a3(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs phun sum tshogs pa mthong ngam/ de nas 'khor de'i nang nas byang
59a4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' brgyad khri bani stong stan las langs te/ thal mo sbyar nas kun gyis kyang mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i spyod
59a5(dkon brtsegs): pa ci 'dra ba'i spyod pa de la bslab par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu bsgrub par bgyi'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum pa
59a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs pa kha dog du ma dang ldan pa 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi
59a7(dkon brtsegs): kha dog lta bu mang po 'thon par gyur te/ de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bar byas nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das
59b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis dbu'i gtsug tu nub par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa
59b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' margyad khri ba'i
59b3(dkon brtsegs): stong 'jam dpal gcon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir sems bskyed de/ byams pa byung
59b4(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' brgyad khri ba ni stong po de dag las skyes bu dam pa bcu drug gis ni lhag pa'i bsam pa dang ldan par bsam pa thag pas tshig brjod do// de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa/
59b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de bzhin du 'gyur ro// lhag ma rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ni de ltar mi 'gyur yang bla na med pa
59b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub myur du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi ming gi yon tan bkod pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi 'am
59b7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba can na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar lhag chad med par 'gyur ro// byams pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa gces spras byed pa/
60a1(dkon brtsegs): dubya/ la ltos/ tshig tu brjod par 'dra'ang gang gis lhag pa'i bsam pas bsam pa thug pa nas tshig tu brjod pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi ning gi yon tan bkod pa dag ni/ 'jam
60a2(dkon brtsegs): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bzhin du 'gyur to// gang gis dma' ba'i sems dang dad pa tsam gyis tshig tu brjod pa de dag kyang las dma' ba des bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig
60a3(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong phrag drug cur 'khor ba phyir bsnyil te/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po 'od kyi tog dang / ye shes bla ma dang / zhi ri'i
60a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang po dang / smon lam blo gros dag kyang phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs pa bai DUR+Sha'i mdog tu 'dug pa mtshungs pa med par bzang ba dag gi nang du zhugs te/ lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs
60a5(dkon brtsegs): su bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar byed/ me tog gi char chen po ni rab tu 'bebs sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni sgra 'byin cing rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul sna tshog
60a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis 'ong bar snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'jig rten du
60a7(dkon brtsegs): dogs cher g.yos par gyur pa dang / phyogs bzhi nas khang pa brtsegs pa bani mchi bar gdar bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa byang chub sems dpa' bzhi po de dag de bzhin
60b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas bskul nas/ de de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba'i phyir nye bar 'ong bar gyur to// de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ ring por ma lon par de'i mod la byang chub sems dpa' bani po de dag lhag
60b2(dkon brtsegs): te/ lpags nas kyang 'ang pa brtsegs pa de dag nas babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
60b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan bdud bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khor do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'khor ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phyogs bzhi nas snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur to//
60b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'ongs pa bzhi po 'di dag ni bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i go gyon pa 'jug pa chen pos yang dag par
60b5(dkon brtsegs): zhugs pa yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis skyes bu dam pa 'di rag la rim gro skyed la chos dris shig/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi smon lam nyon cig/ rigs kyi bu dag skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gi
60b6(dkon brtsegs): smon lam ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa gang su dag gis bdag cag mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
60b7(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ bskal pa bye ba phrag nyi shur 'khor ba byir bsnyil bar gyur cig/ pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig/ bud med gcig gis bdag cag gi ming thos na'ang myur du bud
61a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ med kyi lus las 'gyur bar shog cig ces bya ba de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pa dag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de bstan te/ rdzu 'phrul de dag phyir brtul ba mdzad pa/
61a2(dkon brtsegs): dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yang mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni sgyu ma lta bu ste/
61a3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan ni sgyu ma sprul pa'ang bgyid/ sgyu ma ma mchis par yang bgyid de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang skye'ang skye/ 'gag kyang 'gag ste/ gang la skye ba dang
61a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa ma mchis pa de ni mnyam pa nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mnyam pa nyid la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'a
61a5(dkon brtsegs): rgya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub ji lta bu zhig mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya//
61a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ gang sus kyang ma thob ma bshig cing / gang la'ang yod pa 'am/ meng par chags pa dmigs su med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' ye shes bla mas smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub
61a7(dkon brtsegs): de ji tsam du yod pas kyang mi 'thob/ med pas kyang mi 'thob bam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa ste/ yod par ma gyur mi 'gyur pas dge/
61b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir 'thob par 'gyur ba med do// smras pa/ 'jam dpal tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pas de skad du ston tam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu tshul gcig pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ba gang /
61b2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ spras pa/ 'jam dpal gang phung po rnams kyang mi mthong / khams dang skye mched rnams kyang mi mthong la/ dmus long yang ma yin/ sha'i mig can yang ma yin zhing / chos gang la'ang mi rtog rnam par
61b3(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog pa dang / chos gang la'ang 'phel ba dang 'grib par mi mthong ba 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa zhes bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgra
61b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sgras smras pa/ gang de bzhin cing dang mi 'gal zhing chos nyid dang 'gal bar mi byed de// 'di drag na so so'i skye bo'i chos so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so//
61b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bya bar tha dad du mi 'byed cing gang 'di dben pa'i tshul gcig la 'jug po 'di ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mthong dgas smras pa/
61b6(dkon brtsegs): gang de bzhin nyid la'ang zhugs la de bzhin nyid kyis kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing / 'di ni zab bo zhes bya bar mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu
61b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa mi zad pas smras pa/ chos thams cad kyi mi zad pa gang yin pa de ni shin tu zad pa ste/ gang chos thams cad mi zad par chos ston pa de ni chos nyid la
62a1(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gal bar mi byed pa ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa legs par sems pas smras pa/ gang bsam pas
62a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam du med pa la 'jug/ bsam du med pa med pa des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral
62a3(dkon brtsegs): pas smras pagang 'dod chags dang shin tu bral ba de ni mtshan ma thams cad la 'dod chags pa'ang med/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang med/ rjes su chags pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang med/ rmongs pa /
62a4(dkon brtsegs): med/ gcig tu byed pa'ang med/ gnyis su byed pa'ang med/ byed pa'ang med/ mi byed pa'ang med/ len pa'ang med/ 'dor ba'ang med/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// /
62a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtshos smras pa/ gang rgya mtsho lta bur zab cing gting dpag dka' ba'i chos la zhugs pa de chos la'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog la/ ji ltar gnas pa de bzhin du chos ston cing bdag dang /
62a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du rlom sems su mi byed pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// zla ba'i bla ma gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ gang sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems kyi
62a7(dkon brtsegs): zla ba lta bur gyur kyang / sems can de dag la'ang rlom sems med pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan gyi mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba
62b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ gang mya ngan thams cad rgyun bcad pa de ni mya ngan med cing zhum par 'gyur ba med do// sems can rnams ni mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan pa'o// de la mya ngan gyi rtsa ba gang zhe na/ gang 'dir ngar 'dzin pa
62b2(dkon brtsegs): dngang yir 'dzin pa ste/ gang ngar 'dzin pa dang nga yir 'dzin pa mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos ston pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpar mi dmigs pas smras pa/ gang 'dod
62b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i khams la'ang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams dang / nyan thos kyi chos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos la'ang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos
62b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu lta bas smras pa/ gang chos ston na gang 'di stong pa nyid kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du ston la/ stong pa nyid kyis kyang rlom sems
62b5(dkon brtsegs): su mi byed/ mnyam pa nyid kyang mi dmigs pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin par ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas smras pa/ gang chos ston pa'i tshe
62b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor gsum dang 'gal bar mi byed de/ 'khor gsum gang zhe na/ bdag mi dmigs pa dang / chos nyan pa mi dmigs pa dang / chos la'ang mngon par zhen pa med pa'o// 'di ni 'khor gsum yongs su
62b7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i chos bstan pa zhes bya ste/ de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba grub pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad 'du ba med par
63a1(dkon brtsegs): yang shes shing / ji ltar shes pa bzhin du'ang ston la/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad brjod du med pa'i phyir yi ge gcig kyang mi brjod pa de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi/
63a2(dkon brtsegs): tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' zab mor spyod pas smras pa/ gang chos thams cad kyi zab pa nyid kyang shes la/ chos de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / gang ston pa
63a3(dkon brtsegs): dang / gang la bstan pa dang / gang bstan pa de'ang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar bstan pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi tshul gcig tu bstan pa'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ byang chub sems dpa'
63a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po gzi brjing chen po gzi brjid chen po dag gis so so nas rang rang gi spobs pa ston par gyur to// tshul gcig tu bstan pa'i chos kyi sgo 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' bye/
63a5(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag bdun cu mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bsgred par gyur to//
63a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong bdun stong ni nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// lnga dang mi'i skye dgu las khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa drug ni chos la chos kyi mig rdul dang bral zhing dri ma med par rnam
63a7(dkon brtsegs): par dag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to//
63b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge bdun na ji snyed cig tu 'gyur/ de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni ji tsam zhig tu 'gyur ka/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni ji
63b2(dkon brtsegs): skang cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di nyid la dris
63b3(dkon brtsegs): shigade nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i tshul gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
63b4(dkon brtsegs): dpal khyod ji srid cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe nam mkha'i khams gzugs can
63b5(dkon brtsegs): du gyur pa de'i rmi/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe sgyu ma'i skyes bu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'ang
63b6(dkon brtsegs): rje'o// gang gi tshe dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// gang gi tshe rmi lam gyi skyes bu dang / brag cha dang
63b7(dkon brtsegs): mig yor dang / chu bla dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de'i tshe/ bdag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// gang gi tshe nyi ma'i 'od kyis mtshan mor
64a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ zla ba'i 'od kyi nyin mor gyur pa de'i tshe/ khadag kyang byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu de lta yin gyis/ su byang chub tu smon pa de la dris shig/ sbas
64a2(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jam dpal khyod byang chub tu mi smon nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal cing kyang byang chub la/ byang chub nyid kyang 'jam dpal lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
64a3(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu gang 'di byang chub ces bya ba 'am/ 'jam dpal zhes bya ba ni ming tsam mo// ming gang yin pa de ni dben zhing byed pa med pa ste stong pa'o// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni byang chub bo//
64a4(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom
64a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang chub sems dpa' rus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus pa mthong ngam/ thos sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mthong ngo // thos so//
64a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo// bde bar gshes sa pa de ni bgrang du ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
64a7(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na yul ma ga d+ha'i til gyi dong nas til gyi 'bru gcig cig blangs nas/ rigs kyi bu til gyi 'bru gcig pu de ji lta ba de lta bur ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med kyi byang /
64b1(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpar 'dus pa dang / nyan thos 'dus par blta'o// rkyen d+his gyi ldag ma khas pa ltar ni/ 'jam dpal gnod nur gyur pa sangan par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i byang chub sems dpan
64b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'dus par blta'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bral bar klags te rdul phra rab tu byas pa de la rigs kyi bu rdul phra rab ji snyed cig yod/
64b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de snyed kyis bskal par de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gzigs pa de bzhugs par byas kyang brgya'i char yang smos par mi 'gyur ro// stong gi cha dang / bye ba brgya phrag stong gi cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig phrag
64b4(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang / bgrang ba dang / rgyur yang smos par mi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu rnam grangs des kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
64b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sangs rgyas de'i tshe tshad ni tshad med grangs med par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di skyes bul la zhig gis rdul phra rab
64b6(dkon brtsegs): tu glags te thal bar byas la/ de las skyes bu la la zhig gis rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig khyer te/ rdul phra rab kyi rdul ji snyed pa de snyed kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'das nas/ der rdul
64b7(dkon brtsegs): phra rab kyi rdul gcig gzhag ste/ skyes bu nges tshul de bzhin du shar phyogs logs su rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag thams cad zang zad du bkod par gyur la/ de bzhin du skyes bu gnyis pa zhig skyes te/ des
65a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang lho phyogs logs su de snyed kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul re re nas chub de bzhin du bor te/ de bzhin phyogs bcur skyes bu de lta bur res rgyab de dang 'dra bar de snyed kyi rdul bras kyi rdu/
65a2(dkon brtsegs): zang zad du re re nas bor na/ rigs kyi bu de ji snyam du sems/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// brgya stong gi brag ni 'di
65a3(dkon brtsegs): snyed cig yod do// bye ba'i phrag ni 'di skad cig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bya ba brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag
65a4(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di snyed cig yod do// gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// mi 'khrugs pa phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// zhes bya bar tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/
65a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so// bde bar gshegs pa de ni mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji/
65a6(dkon brtsegs): sbed cig 'das pa dang / gang rag tu phyin te rdul phra rab kyi rdul de dag bor ba dang gi gang dag las te rdul phra rab ma par ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad btags te rdul phra rab tu glags na// rigs
65a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu ji snyam du sems// rdul phra rab de dag rtsis shes pa 'am/ rtsis la mkhas pas brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// khye /
65b1(dkon brtsegs): brag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di med
65b2(dkon brtsegs): cig yod do// gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// mi 'khrugs pa'iri phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya bar shes pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ gas pa pa 'am/
65b3(dkon brtsegs): tshad gzung bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpe de la ni sems can rnams myos par 'gyur gyi/ don 'tshal pa'am/ gnal ba 'am/ bgrang ba 'am/ tshad gzung bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das
65b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis bkar skul pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni rdul phra rab de dag bgrang ba'i tshul gyis brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// brgya stong gi brag ni 'di snyed cig yod do//
65b5(dkon brtsegs): bye ba'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba stong phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// bye ba brgya stong gi phrag ni 'di snyed cig yong ngo // bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi phrag ni
65b6(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad cig yod do// gtams phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// dkrigs phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do// mi 'khrugs pa'i phrag ni 'di snyed cig yod do zhes bya ba de bas kyang lhag par gong du de bzhin
65b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas rnam pa thams cad du thugs su chud ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to//
66a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gal te ye shes chen po de lta bu'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ma'i mtha'i mur thug par sems can dmyal ba chen por sreg kyang / bcom
66a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des bzod par bgyi'o// de lta bu'i ye shes chen po ni yongs su gtang bar mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa de de
66a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ sems can mos pa chung ngu dang / le lo che ba dang / brtson 'grus chung ba ma gtogs par su zhig de lta bu'i ye shes chen po la 'dod pa mi skye/ sangs rgyas kyi sa
66a4(dkon brtsegs): shes 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ srog chags khri byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sprul
66a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu de ltar phyogs bcur skyes bu bcu po de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed cig 'das pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gang dag tu phyin
66a6(dkon brtsegs): te rdul phra rab kyi rdul bor ba dang / gang dag las 'das te ma bor ba de thams cad rdul phra rab tu glags pa de dag pas kyang mang ba'i bskal par da rung 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par
66a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i smon lam ni bsam gyis mi khyab/ yang dag par 'jug pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas/ de byang chub thob pa'i tshe'i tshod kyang
66b1(dkon brtsegs): bsam gyis mi khyab/ byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun yang bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par
66b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa 'di ltar bskal ba 'di skad du'ang skyo ba mi skyed pa'i 'jug pa chen po de ngo mtshar lags so//
66b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das spyod pa chen po ngo mtshar lags so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ nam mkha'i khams 'di snyam bu zhags dang / nyi ma dang / zla ba byed dang /
66b4(dkon brtsegs): dus dang / lo dang / bskal pa dang / bskal pa brgya dang / bskal pa stong dang / bskal pa bye ba dang / bskal ba khrag khrig dang / bsal pa khrag khrig phrag brgya stong dang / gtams dang / dkrigs dang / mi
66b5(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs pa zhig 'das so snyam du sems sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir ro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/
66b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang gis chos thams cad nam mkha'i khams lta bur khong du chud de/ ci nas kyang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ltar khong du chud pa de ni 'di snyam du zhag gcig 'das par gyur to// nyi ma
66b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig 'das par gyur to zhes bya ba nas/ snga ma bzhin du lo 'di snyed cig 'das par gyur to zhes rnam par mi rtog go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos gang la'ang de'i 'du shes gang yang 'jug pa med do// rigs
67a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bu 'di lta ste/ dper nanam mkha'i khams ni bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pas lhag pa zhig 'das par gyur kyang / sgo zhing yongs su mi chad pa med de sa nam mkha'i 'am/
67a2(dkon brtsegs): la skye ba 'am/ 'jig pa'am/ tshig pa 'am/ 'gyes par 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nam mkha'i khams la dngos po med pa'i phyir ro// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang gi
67a3(dkon brtsegs): chos thams cad dngos po med par shes pa de ni skyo ba dang / yongs su yi chad pa'i sems mi skyed do// rigs kyi bu gang la nam mkha'i khams shes bya ba de la ni tshig pa med/ skyo ba med/ yi chud pa
67a4(dkon brtsegs): med / g.yo ba med// skye ba med/ rga ba med/ 'chi ba med// 'pho ba med/ 'byung ba med ga 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med do// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang la 'jam dpal zhes bya ba'i ming 'di la'ang tshig pa med//
67a5(dkon brtsegs): skyo ba med/ yi chad pa med// g.yo ba med/ skye ba med / rga ba med/ 'chi ba med ka' pho ba med/ 'byung ba med/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ming de shin tu dben pa'i phyir ro//
67a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lu'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i bu gzhan yang dbang cha ba dbang che bar grags pa dag gis mchin
67a7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das sems can gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na/ gang gis thos nas 'dzin cing 'acang ba dang /
67b1(dkon brtsegs): klog cing kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan la rang tu cher ston pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das sems can gang dag 'di skad du bdag cag gis gang 'di sangs kyis kyi chos yongs su
67b2(dkon brtsegs): gzung ba'i phyir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya'o// bcang bar bya'o// bklag par bya'o// kun chub par bya'o// gzhan dag la rang rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes tshig tu brjod pa de dag ni dge ba'i
67b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i rtsal gyi mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgras 'di skad ces gso
67b4(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par bgyid dam/ 'jug par bgyid dam/
67b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan la'ang rgya cher bstan pa dang / gang 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa'i rjes su bslab po zhes sems skyed pa des bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
67b6(dkon brtsegs): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang la las phyogs bcur de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sgrib pa med pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed cig gzigs pa de dag thams cad rin po che sna bdun
67b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis yongs su bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re la phul ba dang / rnam grangs de bzhin du sems can thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems kyis tshul khrims kyi sdom pa thams cad yang dag par
68a1(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa la gnas te/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug gi bar du sbyin pa byin pa bas/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan zhig gis chos kyi rnam zangs 'di thos nas 'dzin tam/ 'chang
68a2(dkon brtsegs): ngam ra klog gam/ kun chub par byed ngam/ 'jug par byed ngam/ gzhan la'ang rgya cher ston par byed dam/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa'i rjes su bsgrub par bya'o zhes bya ba'i bar du sems skyed cing gom pa
68a3(dkon brtsegs): bdun 'dor na/ bsod nams kyi phung po de la bsod nams kyi phung po snrums brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// brgya stong gi chur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char
68a4(dkon brtsegs): yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o//
68a5(dkon brtsegs): grangs dang / rba dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang mi bzod do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun nas snang ba sbrum lta bur byung ba
68a6(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// de ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ 'khor der byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed cig 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis phyog
68a7(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong bar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi spyan sngan / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug
68b1(dkon brtsegs): cing rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ston par mthong nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa 'di de ltar 'jig rten gyi 'ams bye ba khrag khrig brgyatu stong mang por cig car nga/
68b2(dkon brtsegs): snang bar gyur pa ni smon lam dang / ting nge 'dzin dang g.ye shes kyi khyad par ngo mtshar tshe'o snyam du ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes skyes par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa
68b3(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ khyams
68b4(dkon brtsegs): pa de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming sangs rgyas rnam par rol pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ smon lam bsam gyis mi khyab pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod/
68b5(dkon brtsegs): ba bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig byang chub kyi sems yang dag par dga' bar byed pa zhes bya bar yang lung zhig de nas de'i tshe 'khor der phyogs bcu dag nas byang chub sems dpa'
68b6(dkon brtsegs): seng grangs med pa 'dus pa dngag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dang / chos kyi rnam zangs 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char chen po pab nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khabs gnyis la byug
68b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal te/ rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dong zhing 'di skad du/ kye ma sangs rgyas kye ma sangs rgyas/ deng ni bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i seng ge'i sgra dang / bkod pa bsam gyis
69a1(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa thos so zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe na byang chub sems dpa' gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
69a2(dkon brtsegs): chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// sems can tshad med pa'ang dge ba'i rdza ba yongs su grub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
69a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis mngon par bsgrags pa'i sgra dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
69a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / dge slong de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog
69a5(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ 'jam dpal gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bco lnga pa rdzogs so//
69a6(dkon brtsegs): sho lo ka stong sum brgya bzhi bcu'o// rgya gar gyi mkhan po shI len dra bo d+hi dang / dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas
69a7(dkon brtsegs): gtan la bab pa// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya pi ta pu tra sA ma ga man nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yab sras mjal ba zhes bya ba/
69b1(dkon brtsegs): theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang po/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo//
69b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das grol ba grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dul ba dul ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa// ni bzhi pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa / rgal brgal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa kha
69b3(dkon brtsegs): rol tu phyin pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ thang la phyin pa thang la phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dbugs phyin pa dbugs phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge slong dge slong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs
69b4(dkon brtsegs): pa bcom pa nyon mongs pa bcom pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dge sbyong dge sbyong gi 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig pa bsal ba sdig pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sdig pa
69b5(dkon brtsegs): bsal ba'i chos can sdigs pa bsal ba'i chos can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ rig pa can rig pa can gyi 'khor dang ldan pa/ khrus byas pa khrus byas pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrogs pa po sgrogs pa po'i 'khor
69b6(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ nyon mongs pa byang ba nyon mongs pa byang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag lnga rnam par bsal ba yan lag lnga rnam par bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sgrib pa dang rnam par bral ba sgrib pa dang
69b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yid rnam par dang ba yid rnam par dang ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ yan lag drug dang ldan pa yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsnyen bsring dang bral ba bsnyen
70a1(dkon brtsegs): bsring dang bral ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bsrung ba gcig pa bsrung ba gcig pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ dran pa'i sgo srungs phun sum tshogs pa dran pa'i sgo srungs phun sum tshogs
70a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa rton pa bzhi dang ldan pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ nyi tshe ba'i bden pa bsal ba nyi tshe ba'i bden pa bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ btsal ba spangs pa btsal ba
70a3(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mthar phyin pa mthar phyin pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ don gyi mthar thug pa don gyi mthar thug pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid bsgoms pa bdag nyid bsgoms pa'i 'khor
70a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa/ kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa kun tu rtog pa'i rnyog pa med pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ lus
70a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba lus kyi 'du byed rab tu bsal ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa mi g.yo ba la mngon par mos pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ sems shin tu rnam par/
70a6(dkon brtsegs): grol ba sems shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba'i 'khor dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa 'phags pa'i 'khor dang ldan pa/
70a7(dkon brtsegs): yal ga dang / lo ma dang / 'dab ma dang / lcug ma dang / shun brags kyi skyon dang bral ba/ dag pa/ snying po la gnas pa/ shAkya'i yul na ser skya'i gnas shing n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na ka lnga sde dang /
70b1(dkon brtsegs): grags byin dang / 'char ka dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / g.ya 'od srungs dang / chu klung 'od srungs dang / 'od srungs chen po dang / shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu la sogs pa dge slong stong nyis
70b2(dkon brtsegs): brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu zhugs te/ thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang dang ldan par gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/
70b3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ yang dag pa'i
70b4(dkon brtsegs): shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems thams cad kyi dbang gi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/ de'i tshe nam gyi tho rangs kyi res la/ bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis
70b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskor cing / dge slong gi dge 'dun gyis mdun gyis bltas te bla gab med pa na bzhugs so// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge
70b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun cang mi smra ba la gzigs so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun la gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa// dge slong dag/ dge slong gang gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon
70b7(dkon brtsegs): par dad par 'gyur ba de lta bu 'ga' zhig tshol cig/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u din+ya stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs
71a1(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma
71a2(dkon brtsegs): mngon par dang bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun shes ko'u ri myal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ko ru di nA khyod ni bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan
71a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba yin gyis 'dug cig/ de bzhin du tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang / ming chen dang / grags sbyin dang / lteng rgyas 'od srungs dang / chu klung 'od srungs dang / g.ya 'od srungs dang / 'od srungs chen po dang /
71a4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par bgyi'o// de skad ces
71a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// mo'u 'gal gyi bu khyod kyang bla ma bla mar bya ba'i chos dang ldan par bya ba yin gyis 'dug cig
71a6(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di snyam du sems te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed pa'i dge slong gang zhig bcom ldan 'das bzhed snyam ste/ de nas tshe dang
71a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bu la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la gnas shi/
71b1(dkon brtsegs): dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dang bar byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na khang pa brtsegs pa 'am/ khang pa brtsegs pa'i khyams sgo byang phyogs su lta ba'i shar
71b2(dkon brtsegs): phyogs kyi skar khung nas nyi ma'i 'od zer byung ste/ nub phyogs kyi rtsig ngos la shar ba de bzhin du/ de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la shar
71b3(dkon brtsegs): cing / dge slong 'char ka 'di rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byed do zhes dgongs pa mthong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'grel gyi bu chen pos ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/
71b4(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das ni khyod la dge slong 'char kas rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par
71b5(dkon brtsegs): dang par byed nus so zhes dgongs shing bzhed do// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de lta yin gyis/ khyod kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dang bar bya bar dad pa skyed cig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan
71b6(dkon brtsegs): ba 'char kas/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen po rigs rnams ni dang par bya bar shin tu dkar ste/ rgyal po'i rigs ni lhags par
71b7(dkon brtsegs): dkar 'o// da ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' ba sden tshe dang ldan pa mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta sde/ dper na shing bur bcu'am kyi bu'am khran
72a1(dkon brtsegs): cu'am/ bzhi bcu'am/ lnga bcu'am/ shing khur brgya'ang rung ste/ gsher bag med cing / skam la lo mang du lon pa zhig yod la/ de la mi la la zhig gis me gtang na/ me'i
72a2(dkon brtsegs): phung po chen po 'bar bar 'gyur ro// de la yang la la zhig gis mar ram/ 'bru mar gyis gtor na/ me'i phung po de bas ches che bar 'ab re ta/ de'i steng ngam/ rlung gi 'khor du 'gro ba ni shin tu dka'a'o//
72a3(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams ni mgu bar dka' 'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na glang po che mche ba can la
72a4(dkon brtsegs): gdangs pa'i so phrag tu 'gro ba ni shin tu dka' 'o// tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po de bzhin du rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba rnams kyang mgu bar dka' 'o// de skad ces smras pa dang /
72a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de ni de lta mod kyi/ 'on kyang khyod ni dge slong 'char ka 'dis rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon
72a6(dkon brtsegs): par dad par bya bar nus so// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs shing bzhed pa yin no// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la rtul po zas gtsang ma dad par
72a7(dkon brtsegs): byed par dgongs sam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong 'char ka ni rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byed do zhes dgongs so// de nas
72b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char kA la bka' stsal pa/ 'char ka rtul po zas gtsang ma dad par gyis shig/ de ci'i phyi zhe na/ 'char ka rgyal po pas gzang ma ni yang nungs dang par
72b2(dkon brtsegs): bya'i/ yeng ma khyod kyis dad par bya'o// 'char ka nga'i nyan thos ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang ma myong ni 'di ltar rigs dad par byed pa'i mchog yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i ni tshe dang ldan/
72b3(dkon brtsegs): bu'achar kal tshigs su bcad de bkar stsal pa/ 'char ka bzang po nga las mnyan par byos// khyod ni rigs dang byed mchog rab yin gyis// shAkya'i rigs rnams dgra' bskyed pa yi// rgyal
72b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i dam pa myur du dad par byos// rgyal po'i rab de dad par byas na ni// rigs su lA dag dang ni mi rnams la// mtha' dbus med pa'i legs pa 'byung 'gyur gyis// mi yi dam pa myur ru nga bar byos/
72b5(dkon brtsegs): da lta na ni shAkya'i bdag po re// mngon pa'i nga rgyal rtog pas dkrugs shing nyams// ri yi ngos nas dbab 'dril ji bzhin du// brtson 'grus rtsol ba thams cad btang ste gnas// dbang phyug nyams pa
72b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran byed pas// yid la gnod gyur sems dang yid kyang stor// dper na tshong pa nor dang bral ba dag/ rjes su dram ning nyon mongs gnas pa bzhin// lha yi gnas nas lha dag shi 'phos shing // rdza rdzas
72b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rjes su dran pa bzhin// rgyal ba'i bstan pa mngon par mi shes shing // rgyal po bde nyams snying rjer smre sngags 'don// nga yi rin po che ni sna bdun dang // mi yi phun sum tshogs pa bzhi po dang /
73a1(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod dag kyang rjes su dran byed cing // sa bdag de ni snying rjer smre sngags 'don// mdangs 'grogs byed pa'i srin po stobs can gyis// ji ltar mi zhig yongs su non gyur na//
73a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang mi shes gzhan kyang mi shes ltar// sa yi bdag po de yang de bzhin no// ti sa'i gangs kyi ri bos pa sgribs gyur na// ji ltar mi dag blta bya mi mthong ba// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos
73a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgribs pas na// rgyal pos blta bar bya ba mi mthong ngo // gnyid kyis log gam shi bas myos gyur pa'i// mis ni rang gi sems kyang mi shes te// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas/
73a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po des kyang dge ba mi shes so// dper na khyim thab shibs myos pa yi// bud med snying rjer smre sngags 'don byed pa// de bzhin nga rgyal chen pos myos gyur pas// rgyal po de yang snying rjer sde
73a5(dkon brtsegs): sngags 'don// de lta bas na 'char ka thabs mkhas pa// khyod kyis 'dir ni rgyal po dad par gyis// nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu bsnyal bar byos// chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bslang bar gyis// 'char ka khyod
73a6(dkon brtsegs): mi gtogs par srid pa yi// 'gro ba dag la skal 'thun spyad med pas// rgyal pos sems ni rab tu dang bya bar// gang gis nus pa'i dge slong gang yang med// 'char ka sngon gyi rus na byung ba ni// 'das
73a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dus nas yi bdag po zhig/ ming ni bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba ste// sa myong byed pa rnam par grags pa byung // de ni chos kyi rgyal po chos dang ldan// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod//
73b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho'i tha mar thug pa'i sa 'di ni// chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po des rkyang bskyangs// grong dang grong khyer dag kyang 'dab nye zhing // bza' shing 'bras bu me tog rgyas pas gang // 'phags pa'i skye bo dgang
73b2(dkon brtsegs): shid las skyes// sdig dang bral ba rnams kyis rab tu gang // dri za brgya mang dag gis gang ba ste// sdong du mtsher ma n+da shing ngan pa med// 'jam zhing dge sbyong gnas kyi tshogs kyis spras// chu grung 'a
73b3(dkon brtsegs): stegs bde bas rab tu brgyan// drang srong tshogs brgya rjes su rgyu ba ste// skye bo'i dkar chos rnams kyis kun tu bsgrubs// ngan song lam ngan rnams ni rab tu bcad // de nas sems can thams cad lpags
73b4(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dong // rgyal po del bu dag yod pa ni// sngon gyi sangs rgyas byung ba mthong ba ste// dge ba'i rtsa ba dag ni bskyed pa can// yon tan mang pos bsgos pa'i blo gros ldan// ming ni blo gros snying po zhes
73b5(dkon brtsegs): bya ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta ba can// mi bdag khyim na gnas kyang dben la dga'// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya ba des// lha yi pho brang 'dra
73b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i khyim mchog 'dir// na chung tshogs kyis kun nas mdun bdar te// 'dod pa'i yon tan bzang la spyod ces smras// bu yi dam pa khyod la nga yis ni// ji ltar 'dod pa'i bya ba gang ma byas//
73b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la khyod yid ci yi phyir// ma mos nga la bu khyod myur du smos// srid pa'i 'gro ba'i yon tan mkhas gyis te// bu khyod rin chen khyim la dga' ba skyed// bud med rin chen 'khor
74a1(dkon brtsegs): dang 'grogs kyis te// yul la dga' zhing mos paskyed par gyis// dka' thub nags na 'khod pa'i drang srong dag/ de btang nas ni phyir yang 'di dag na// bka' thub btang
74a2(dkon brtsegs): zhing 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// 'dod pa de dag bu gcig khyod la bstabs// de lta bas na 'dod pa'i dga' la spyod// nga dang rgyal srid thams cad khyod dang 'thun// rnam thos bu yi gnas dang 'dra /
74a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yi// gzhal med khang gi rgyan can khyim 'dir spyod// 'di dag rnams kyang mchog gi gzugs ldan zhing // lha mo 'dra la sgyu rtsal tshar phyin pa// rol mo'i sgra yi tshul dang glul mkhas// bsnyen bkur
74a4(dkon brtsegs): snyoms shing yon tan mid kyang 'phrog/ mig ni pad+ma'i lo ma 'dra ba ste// bim pa'i mdog 'dra mchu mdzes yid du 'ong // so dang bzhin mdog dri ma med cing bzang // 'phral ba smin ma legs shing mgul pa
74a5(dkon brtsegs): stug rnga brla ni glang po che yi sna yang 'dra// phrag so sha rgyas thal gong legs dang ldan// lag dang rkang pa'i mthil ni zangs kyi mdog/ sor mo byin gyis phra bas legs dang ldan// lce ni zangs mog 'dra
74a6(dkon brtsegs): la srab cing dag/ tshig ran 'jam par smra ba'i tshul dang ldan// so ni thag bzang so rnams dang rod med// mche ba rab dkar mchog gi rgyan dang ldan// lto ba byang nger 'dug cing lte ba sdug/ sta zur yangs
74a7(dkon brtsegs): shing rkang pa rdo rje 'dra// byin pa glang po che yi so 'dra zhing // mda' rgyu snying po legs par skyes pa bzhin// dregs bcas glang chen 'dra ba'i 'gros dang ldan// gzhan du mi sems yid kyis khyod la
74b1(dkon brtsegs): lha/ rtse ba 'dod cing dar la bab dang ldan// gzhon nu snying rje ltos la rtse ba byos// bud cig khyod dang bud med de dag gi/ mdog bzang ba dang ngaral bab pa yang // shing gi rtse mo'i me tog bzhin
74b2(dkon brtsegs): ltung gis// nga rgyal thong la 'dod pa bsten par gyis// blo gros snying po ldan des smra ba yis// ba dang 'khor rnams kun la 'di skad spras// yab gcig khyod ni med par gsung ba lags// gang dag ci/
74b3(dkon brtsegs): gis grags pa ma smang mod// yon tan rnams la mos pa bdag gi tshig/ bsams te gtan la babal rgyal po gson// ji ltar rmi lam na yang 'dod la bdag/ sems mi dga' zhing ma mos de 'dra gson//
74b4(dkon brtsegs): sa yi bdag pos bka' stsal 'di dag ni// mkhas pa rnams la mdzes pa ma lags te// mi mkhas skye bo dag gis yang dag bsams// mkhas pa rnams kyis de dag rtag tu smad// 'ong ba ma lags ci yi rgyu zhig gis//
74b5(dkon brtsegs): long ba'i tshig gis lam 'gol 'dzin par bgyid// thang la gnas pa su zhig ji ltar na// mgon mong chus khyer ba la 'dod pa skyed// grol ba ji lta bur ni bcings pa yi// tshig gi btson ra der ni 'jug par bgyid//
74b6(dkon brtsegs): sa mnyam gnas shing ma 'khrul ji ltar na// nyam ngar gnas la 'dod pa skyed par bgyid// sa bdag 'dod pa rnams la chags bcas shing // 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag ni chus khyer ba// long ba chus khyer btson sa
74b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa dang // nyam ngar gnas 'drar bdag ni de snyam bgyid// mi yi bdag po khyod ni long ba bzhin// bdag ni mig can khyad par mthong ba lags// khyod ni 'dod pa'i chu bos khyer ba lags// bdag ni
75a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa rnams la rnam par spod// 'dod pa dag ni dug gi lo ma bzhin// sbrul gyi mgo 'dra sdug bsngal bgyid pa ste// rtse gsum pa dang ral gri mdung thung 'dra// me yi phung po shin
75a2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'bar ba bzhin// blo gros snying po ldan pas de skad du// smre sngags 'don pa'i pha dang 'khor la smras// rin chen sna bdun dag la ma bltas par// rgyal srid rnam par spangs te rab tu byung // sbrul gyi bag
75a3(dkon brtsegs): snying rjes pa ci 'dra dang // ngar snabs bsdus pa'i thal ba bzhin spangs te// blo gros snying po ldan pa chags med par// sdig dang rnam par bral te rab tu 'byung // gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung myur nas// blon/
75a4(dkon brtsegs): bo'i bu zhig rjes su rab byung ba// ming ni zla bas byin zhes bya ba ste// blo gros snying po'i rjes su rab tu byung // gzhon nu de ltar rab tu byung gyur nas// tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po bskyed nas ni// grogs dang
75a5(dkon brtsegs): bcas pas mngon par shes pa lnga// ma lus mtha' dag bskyed par byas par gyur// 'dod pa rnams la skyon du lta bas na// mi yi seng ga de ni 'dod khams 'das// tshangs pa yang dag nyid ni thob bya phyir//
75a6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba byas// de ltar gnon nu rab tu byung bas ni// pha de bul ma dang myur po dang // zla bas byin pa de yi gan song nas// legs par bshad ba'i tshig gis dga' bar byas//
75a7(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems// de ni blo gros snying po gzhan snyam mam// nga nying de yi chen der gyur te// 'dod pa'i longs spyod don du gnyer ba med// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems// bden pa
75b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba gzhan zhig yin snyam sam// sa bdag zas gtsang 'di nyid de yi che// rgyal po bden pa 'phel zhes bya bar gyur// 'char ka khyod ni de la ji snyam sems// rjes su rab phyung zlas byin gzhan snyam/
75b2(dkon brtsegs): mam// khyod nyid de tshe de yi dus na ni// bden pa 'phel ba dad par byed pa yin// de lta bas ma 'char ka khyod kyis 'dir// rgyal po zas gtsang dad pa mngon skyed cig / sa skyong byed pa 'di ni dang gyur na// skying pa chen
75b3(dkon brtsegs): po phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ bcom ldan 'das la mi smra bar khas blangs so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka zhag de 'das nas// snga dro'i dus kyi tshe
75b4(dkon brtsegs): chos gos dang sham thabs bgos/ lhung bzed thogs te/ ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen por song ngo // de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang ma btsun mo'i 'khor gyi mdun na// shAkya stong tsam zhig dang dgos pa/
75b5(dkon brtsegs): zhig gi ched du 'dus shing 'khod do// rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang / bcom ldan 'das ser skya'i gnas su byon cing ser skya'i gnas 'di nyid na shing n+ya kro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so zhes thos nas/
75b6(dkon brtsegs): de 'di snyam du sems te/ gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas/ bdag ni dbang phyug gi longs spyod chen po las nyams par byas so// gal te gzhon nu de khyim na gnas na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po mthab
75b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhir rnam par rgyal ba/ chos dang ldan pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan par 'gyur te/ de'i rin po che sna bdun ni 'di dag ste/ 'di ltar 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang /
76a1(dkon brtsegs): ta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / blong po rin po rje ste 'di bdun no// de la bu dba' ba/ rdul bod pa/
76a2(dkon brtsegs): yan lag mchog gi gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi sde rab tu 'joms pa stong yang tshang bar 'gyur ba zhig/ de'i gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di yang chad pa med cing // mtshon gyis
76a3(dkon brtsegs): bda' ba med la/ mnyam ste mi mnyam pa med cing / chos dang ldan pas legs par phab nas/ bskal pa rdzogs par legs par bskyangs par 'gyur ba zhig ste/ de ltar gyur na bdag cag kyang 'dor
76a4(dkon brtsegs): los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid la dbang phyug gi dbang dang ldan zhing / rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod par byas pa dang / dbang phyug gi dbang chen po'ang rnyed par
76a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba zhig na/ de ltar bdag cag ni gzhon nu de rab tu byung bas de lta bu'i longs spyod kyi dbang chen po dang bral bar gyur to snyam mo// des 'di snyam du bsams nas/ shAkya rnams la bsgob
76a6(dkon brtsegs): bu de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed par su'ang ma 'gro zhig/ la la zhig nga'i bu de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir 'gro na/ de'i lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do// de'i tshe shAkya'i
76a7(dkon brtsegs): bu dga' ba'i bzhin zhes bya ba zhig 'khor de nas byung nas song bar gyur te/ shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gag
76b1(dkon brtsegs): ba der song ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa'anar ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka sun kyang ring zhig nas
76b2(dkon brtsegs): byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan
76b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAk+Sha'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin la 'di skad ces smras so//
76b4(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i bzhin de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la spun mi mnga' 'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga' 'o// de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'o// bde bar byon to//
76b5(dkon brtsegs): mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad kyis kyang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang lhan cig dben pa na 'khod pa mthong
76b6(dkon brtsegs): nas 'khor de nas byung ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka ga la ba der song nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas te/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka byon pa lag
76b7(dkon brtsegs): so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring mo zhig na byon to// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la spyan mi mnga' 'am/ stobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs sam/ mi bde ba mi mnga' /
77a1(dkon brtsegs): de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'am/ bcom ldan 'das bde bar byon tam/ shin tu ma mnyel tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tam/ de skad ces smras pa dang /
77a2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sad la 'di skad ces smras so// shin tu legs par sad de de bzhin te/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mnga' 'o// stobs dang ldan no//
77a3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar bzhugs so// mi bde ba mi mnga'a'o// de la nyam nga ba ci'ang mi mnga' 'o// bde bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang mya
77a4(dkon brtsegs): ngan bral gyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka dang / shAkya'i bu dga' ba'i bzhin dang / shAkya'i bu shin tu legs par sang gnas dben pa na 'khod pa mthong nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka gral ba der song
77a5(dkon brtsegs): ste/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la yang dag par mgu bar byas nas/ tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka tshur spyon// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'byon pa legs so// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka yun kyang ring zhig na byon to//
77a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka bcom ldan 'das la baspyan mi mnga' 'am/ spobs dang ldan nam/ bde bar bzhugs samra/ mi bde ba mi mnga' 'am/ de la nyi ma ngab ci yang mi mnga'a'am/ bcom ldan 'a
77a7(dkon brtsegs): bde ba byon tam sa shin tu ma me la tam/ bsod snyoms kyis 'o ma brgyal tame/ de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ shAkya'i bu mya ngan med dang / mya ngan bral ba la 'di skad ces
77b1(dkon brtsegs): smras so// mya ngan med dang mya ngan bral/ bcom ldan 'das la bsnyun mi mngar 'o// stobs dang ldan no// bde bar bcugs so// mI bde ba mi mnga'a'o// de la na ma dab cil du mi mnga' 'o// nga/
77b2(dkon brtsegs): bar byon to// mnyel ba med do// bsod snyoms kyis 'o brgyal ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dag
77b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par byed do// de skad ces smras pa dang / shAkya'i bu du dag gis tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'char ka bdag cag ni/
77b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod na/ bdag cag gis de ltar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ nga'i bu la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyin
77b5(dkon brtsegs): su'ang ma 'gro zhig/ la la zhig de la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir song na/ lus la gnod pa'i chad pas gcad do zhes bka' stsal to// de bas na 'phags pa 'char ka de ltar bdag cag
77b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos 'jigs pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba 'am/ bsnyen bkur byed du 'dong bar mi nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di ni/
77b7(dkon brtsegs): shin tu'ang nga rgyal gyis non par gyur na/ ji ltar bdag gis de'i drung du 'gro bar bya snyam nas/ des 'di snyam du bsams so// 'on tang bdag gis nam mkha' la rdzu 'phrul gyis shing tal
78a1(dkon brtsegs): bdun srid du 'phags la steng gi bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i gan du 'gro bar bya'o snyam nas/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas ting nge
78a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gyi rnam pa de lta bul mnyam par bdag ste/ sems mnyam par bzhag pa des nam mkha' la shing tal bdun srid du 'phags nas/ bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma gas
78a3(dkon brtsegs): bder song ngo // rgyal po zas gtsang mas kyang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka kyang ring po nas nam mkha' la shing ta la bdun sring du 'bags te/ rdzu 'phrul gyis par snang la skyil mo krung bcas shing ngong /
78a4(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong nas/ de la thal mo sbyar te tshigs su bcad de smras patshon bsgyur gos can khyod ni gang nas 'ongs// khyod la ci dgos myur du smra bar byos// khyod la gang dgos de yang myur du sbyin// brtul zhugs grub
78a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mthong bar shin tu dkar// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po bdag ni khyod kyi sras kyi bu// bdag la chos dgos
78a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po gang na bzhugs// bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bshos skyel te// bde bar gshegs pa skyob pa'i bshos bkur ro// yul 'khor bdag po che ba'i dpal mnga' ba// khyod la mi mchog sras
78a7(dkon brtsegs): mnga' grags pa thob// gzi brjid kyis ni phyogs rnams kun tu 'bar// ston gyi nyi ma'i gung gi 'od dang 'dra// ji ltar sprin med nam mkha'i nyi ma ni// phyogs rnams kun tu 'od byed mngon par 'bar//
78b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// ye shes mnga' bas phyogs rnams kun tu snang // ji ltar ston gyi tsam shar ba na// srin bu me khyer zil gyis mnan cing snang // de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras
78b2(dkon brtsegs): mu stegs gzhan rnams kun bcom lam mer bzhugs// ji ltar nyi ma'i zil non skar ma rnams// nyin par 'od stor lam mer mi rung ba// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod sras kyis// zil gyis man/
78b3(dkon brtsegs): pas mu stegs gzhan mi snangs// ji ltar nyi mas zil non sla ba ni// nam mkha'i dbyings na 'od stor nyid mi snang // de bzhin khyod sras zil mnan mu stegs rnams// nyi ma'i zil nor zla bzhin gsal ba
78b4(dkon brtsegs): med// seng ge'i nga ro thos na phra mo rnams// shugs kyis rmongs nas bsam pa ji bzhin du// rI sul gseb tu byer nas 'khra zhing gnas// stag ging ro gzhan gyis bzod par dkar// de bzhin rgyal ba
78b5(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen po'i gsung // bdag med nga ro mu stegs gzhan thos na// shes rab dman pa srid pa'i rtser phyin kyang // gsung thos pas ni thams cad 'jigs par 'gyur// lnga dang bcas pa'i
78b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten long ba la// spyan dang ldan pa des ni mig kyang skul// snang ba mdzad cing rdul yang rnam par sbyangs// ye shes snang ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon par shar// bde dang mi bde lam gnyis rab tu bstan//
78b7(dkon brtsegs): lam dang gol ba'i lam yang rgyal bas bstan// lam stor skye bo rnams ni lam du btsud// 'dam du bying ba rnams kyang thang la bton// ji ltar skom pa'i sa la sprin gyis ni// sgang dang gshong bcas
79a1(dkon brtsegs): char gyis ngoms par byed// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba lhar bcas chos kyis ngoms par mdzad// ji ltar char gyis ngoms pa'i ri lung gnas// rtswa dang gel
79a2(dkon brtsegs): ba nags tshal shing rnams dang // 'khri shing sdong po sman gyi rnam pa dang // me tog sna tshogs rnams kyis su mdzes pa// de bzhin stobs bcu mi 'jigs mnga' ba dang // ma 'dres bco brgyad chos mnga'i
79a3(dkon brtsegs): sdong po la// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes me tog dang // 'bras bus spras pas rgyal po'i sras mdzes so// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i dbus na lhun po'i ri// lha yi gnas gyur mi sbrul rnam par mdzes//
79a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi sras// dge sbyong rgya mtsho'i nang na rnam par mdzes// bde sogs khyim thabs brgya byin lha dbang po// lha yi snyan la 'dug na mdzes pa ltar// de bzhin rgyal po glang po khyod kyi
79a5(dkon brtsegs): sras// dge sbyong rtogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// byams pa'i stobs can zab mo'i 'brug bsgrags te// thugs rje chen po 'grog zeng rir ldan pas// dran pa nyer gzhag char ldan 'dab 'jigs te/
79a6(dkon brtsegs): ba gru mchog de ni chos char 'bebs// yongs dag dkyil 'khor tshul khrims rab kyi zer// ting 'dzin nyon mongs lha min rab 'jom zhing // ye shes nyi zer srid pa'i sred pa skems// rgyal ba'i nyi chen 'gro
79a7(dkon brtsegs): bar rnam par mdzes// ting nge 'dzin dang tshul khrims gzings dang gru chen te// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa nor bu rin chen tshogs// byang chub yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas bsam gtan rlabs// thar ba
79b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pas sangs rgyas rgya mtsho bsten par bya// tshul khrims rnam dag rtsab ba rtan par zug// ting 'dzin lo ma dran pa lal ga ba// byang chub yan lag me tog spong ba'i sdong // bdag med dri l+h+wam
79b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i sdong po sten// tshul khrims nags mtha' sten pa'i stobs chen po// ting 'dzin zhi ba'i ri grong phug na gnas// stong pa mtshan med smon med spyod yul can// rgyal ba stobs can seng ge khyod kyi
79b3(dkon brtsegs): sras// thub pa mi gnas sas ni rnam par stor// rgyal ba khyu mchog brjid pa'i stabs bzhud pas// byis pa so so mu stegs gzhan sngangs te// khyod kyi sras ni khyu mchog sgra yang 'byin// tshul khrims gtar
79b4(dkon brtsegs): dang yon tan dbyig gis brgyan// bsam gtan dang ba'i zhi gnas nye bar bskyabs// ye shes kyis bsrungs thar pa'i spyod yul can// rgyal ba tshong dpon gtso bo nor gtong mdzad// dge ba yongs su bzung bas
79b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig bcom ste// nyon mongs ni mdzad dag bsten bka' stsol pas// lnga dang lha min bcas pa'i 'jig rten na// rgyal po khyod kyi sras mchog rnam par mdzes// tshul khrims mchog sprin blo gros glog
79b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byin cing // yan lag brgyad lam char chen rnyan gyis spangs// thub pa gces pa'i lo tog 'bras bu stso la// khyod kyi sras ni klu rjen 'brug sgra spogs// rgyal pos sbas pa/ gang zag mchog de bde bar
79b7(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs sam ci// bsod snyoms rgyu bas 'dren pa ma ngal lam// de yi lus la ngal bas dub med dam// zang gnas ut+pal bzhin ma rnyis sam// 'char kas smras pa/ rdzu 'phrul stobs mnga' bsam
80a1(dkon brtsegs): gtan spyod yul can// dges shing bde bas yan lag yongs rgyas te// thub pa zhi ba'i snyoms 'jug gnas bcas pas// gser gyi pad+ma lta bur rgyal mi rnyis// rgyal pos smras pa/
80a2(dkon brtsegs): sngan chad rdza rnga rnga bran sgras bskul zhing // gling bu'i sgra snyan nga ros bskul byas te// bud med glu yi dbyangs kyis bslang bslang na// da ltar sad na sdug bsngal mi myong ngam// 'char kas smras pa// bsam gtan
80a3(dkon brtsegs): dgongs pas ting 'dzin zhi yul can// ting 'dzin bsgrub pa'i tshul la mkhas pa ste// mnal tam bzhengs sam bzhud dam bzhugs pa na// sdug bsngal mi mnga' rgyal ba rtag tu dgyes// rgyal pos smras pa// /
80a4(dkon brtsegs): che ba'i rkyen 'os mal mchog bshams pa la// me mar sdong pos kun nas mtha' bskor te// bud med tshogs kyis bskor zhing nyal nyal na// da ltar mun par nyal na cis mi rmongs// 'char kas smras pa/ thub
80a5(dkon brtsegs): chen 'phags pa gzims mal gzims pa ni// byams pa'i gdan bting thugs rjes bde bar bzhengs// dga' ba'i gnas pas dges dang ldan pas na// srid med btang snyoms can la rmongs mi mnga'//
80a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/ shAkya'i dpa' bos de rtag mdun du bdar// bstan bcos mkhas dang rtse zhing dga' rgyas te// gzhal med khang 'dra'i khyim du dga' byas na// nga yi bu de nags mthar ji ltar dga'// 'char
80a7(dkon brtsegs): ka sa smras pa/ chos kyis byung bzhi sems ldan rnams kyis// zhi ba'i thugs mnga' de rtag mdun du bdar// zhi ba'i mgon par zhi ba bsten mdzad pas// ston pa 'jigs bral de ni der dgyes so//
80b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos smras pa/ sngan chang gzhon nu khyim na gnas pa'i tshe// yan lag spos kyi 'bru mar nim byugs te// rgyal por byin du 'os pas zhus byas na// nagus kyi mtha' na thub pa su yis bkra/ bcam
80b2(dkon brtsegs): kas smras pa/ khrims gtsang 'bab stegs chos chu rdzing bu ste// thub pa de bkru gzhan yang bkru ba mdzad// sku la mi gsher sras dang bcas su 'bog/ rang yang rgal la skye bo phal chen sgrol/
80b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos spras pa/ gser gyi skud pa nor bu'i 'phreng bas brgyan// rgyal po'i rkyen sa gos mchog bzang gyon gyon// tsan dan zhim pos shing 'dab legs par bris// nag chen de gsepa thub pa su yis
80b4(dkon brtsegs): brgyan// 'char kas smras pa/ tshul khrims spos byugs yon tan 'phreng bas brgyan// khrel yod na bzar ting 'dzin bsam gtan brgyad// mngon shes rig pa rnam thar brgyan gyi sku// rnam grol
80b5(dkon brtsegs): gzi mnga' thub pa nags na mdzes// rgyal pos smras pa/ rtse gnyis mtshon dang ral gri mtshon thogs pa'i// dpa' bo g.yul du mos pas lus bsrungs te// b+ha re gdugs kyis rtag tu dag pa dag pa pa/
80b6(dkon brtsegs): gcig pu nags na 'dug pa su yis bsrung // 'char kas smras pa/ byams pa'i stobs kyis thub pa yongs bsrungs te// de dpung ye shes nyan thos zham ring g.yog/ yon tan tshogs la nges pas 'jig
80b7(dkon brtsegs): mi mngar// stobs bcur gyes pa mngar zhing mi 'jigs brnyes// rgyal pos smras pa/ nga mi bu mi yon tan byed kyis spras// chos lags spyod cing du ba med brjod pa thos// khyod kyang zan zo bsod
81a1(dkon brtsegs): snyoms bkur bar gyis// bdug kyang mi yi dbang po bltar 'gro'o// de skad ces smras pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la 'di skad ces smras so//
81a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das de ni tshogs kyi slob dpon tshogs kyi mchog/ dge sbyong gi tshogs yongs su sdud pa/ drang srong chen po ste// dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ dge sbyong gi rgyal po
81a3(dkon brtsegs): lham me lhan ne ljang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na zla ba yar gyi tshes bco lnga la zla ba nya ste/ yongs su rgyas pa'i tshe/ skar ma'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba ni lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin
81a4(dkon brtsegs): du bcom ldan 'das de'ang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me ldan ne ljang nge'o// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma ni sngon gyi dus na shin tu l+h+wam me ldan me lgang ngo'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'ad/
81a5(dkon brtsegs): de'ang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ shin tu ldum me lhan ne ljang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po ri rab rgya mtsho'i nang na 'dug pa ni lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'ang
81a6(dkon brtsegs): dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me ldan ni lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i dbang po brgya byin ni chos bzang lha'i 'dun sa na gnas na/ lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'ad
81a7(dkon brtsegs): de'ang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na ldum me lhan ne lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na lha'i bu rab 'thab bral dang // lha'i bu yongs su dga' ldan dang / lha'i bu rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i bu
81b1(dkon brtsegs): kunan 'phrul dbang byed lha'i tshogs kyi mang na gnas na/ lham me ldan ne lhang de'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lham me ldan ne ldang ngo// 'di lta
81b2(dkon brtsegs): ste/ dper na mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa ni tshangs pa bye ba phrag stong gis bskor na/ lhun me ldan nen ljang nge'i// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de'ang dge sbyong gi tshogs kyi nang na bzhugs na/ lAm me ldan na
81b3(dkon brtsegs): ldang ngo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan de lta bu brjod pa 'dri thos nas/ de 'di snyam du sems te// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das de'i nyan thos su zad na/
81b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing 'di ltar mthu chel/ 'di ltar dbang che bar grags ni/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma btsas pa nyid kyi tshe/ sa chen po 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu gsod/
81b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul/ ldeg/ rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ chem chem/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem/ 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/
81b6(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs shing / snang ba dpag tu med pa byung ba lta ci smos/ btsas ma thag tu sus kyang ma bsten par sa la gom pa bdun bor ba dang / steng gi bar snang las chu'i
81b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyun grang dro rnam pa gnyis byung ste// de gnyis kyis khrus byas pa dang / de'i lha'i khri bzang po dbus gser las byas pa byung ba dang / stang gi bar snang las lha'i gdugs rnga yab dang bcas pa byung ba lta'ang ci
82a1(dkon brtsegs): spos btsas ma thag tu lnga thams cad phyag 'tshal bar gyur pa dang / gang gi tshe btsas nas/ gang gi tshe mngon par byung ba de'i bar du nam yang 'khrul pa med pa/ rtag tu dam bcas pa la
82a2(dkon brtsegs): brtan pa/ ji skad smras pa de ltar byed pa/ rtag tu rgyun me gcod par brtson 'grus brtan pa ka yang dag par smra ba smrab med pa lta ci smos/ gang gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
