82a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas te/ khargal nas bsgral bar bya'o zhes smras pa lta ci smos snyam ste/ des de ltar bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpar gyur pa'i dam bcas pa de dran nas tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// blo
82a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog ldan pa gang zhig ltams ma thag/ nor ba med pa'i gsung ni brjod mdzad de// gang zhig la ni bden pa'i gsung mnga' ba// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bltams par gyur ma thag
82a5(dkon brtsegs): nyid du// 'jig rten gtso bor 'gyur bar bya'o zhes// mgon pos mnyam pa med par gsung brjod pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// su zhig rmi lam rmi ba'i dus na yang // brdzun gyi tshig ni nam
82a6(dkon brtsegs): yang ma gsungs te// ji ltar gsungs pa de ltar mdzad mdzad pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// gser gyi phung po gangs ri mnyam pa yis// gang zhig chags par bya bar mi nus shing /
82a7(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig chags las rnam par 'das gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// mtshon rnon 'dra ba'i ngag rtsub tshig rnams kyis// gang zhig khro bar bya bar mi nus so// zhe sdang dngos po las ni rab
82b1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// chags par 'gyur dang zhe sdang rmongs gyur pas// gang zhig thul bar nus par ma gyur te// shes rab rgyal po dang ni ldan gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su
82b2(dkon brtsegs): zhig yid mi ches// 'dod pa'i dga' dang bde rnams du ma dang // longs spyod dag la rtog pa'i rnam pa yis// gang zhig bcings par nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// rmad du
82b3(dkon brtsegs): byung ba rnam pa brgya dag gis// ngo mtshar 'dzin gzhug nam yang ma nus te// dpal sdug ldan zhing rtag tu mi ngom pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig ying mi ches// mkhas pa dag gis brjod pa'i tshig snyan
82b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sna tshogs du ma'i tshig gis kyang // gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de la mkhas pa su zhig yid mi ches// don gyi tshul la brtson dang ldan pa dang // chos dang 'dod la nges pa'i tshig
82b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyis// gang zhig bcing bar nus par ma gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// dri ma med stobs mtha' yas ldan gyur pa// gang zhig grong khyer mchog nas 'byung ba'i tshe// dpung rnams
82b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni thub par ma gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// gang zhig 'dod pa'i bde ba spangs nas su// 'chi med rgyu phyir ri dgas spyod mdzad pa//
82b7(dkon brtsegs): de yi gsung la su zhig yidang mi ches// byang chub dam pa mngon par bzhed pa'i phyir// zhan pa ma yin sems can gang zhig gis// lo drug par du dka' thub drag spyad pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches/
83a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten la ni phan dang bde ba'i phyir// byang chub dam pa don du gnyer ba na// lo drug lon pa'i tha mar tshod khu gsol// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang la lo drug par du bdud/
83a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis ni// rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brangs te glags btsal kyang // de la glags ni rnyed par ma gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig 'dod chags zhe sdang bral gyur cing // su la cung zad tsam yang mi
83a3(dkon brtsegs): slong la// 'jig rten dag gi don ni mdzad gyur pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig gzhan la gsan pa ma mdzad par// rtog par dkar ba rab tu zhi ba yi// byang chub bla med mngon rdzogs sa
83a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas pa// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig tshangs pa nyid kyis gsol btab pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de yi tshig gsan te// nyid kyis chos ni rab tu bshad pa na// de yi gsung la su
83a5(dkon brtsegs): zhig yid mi ches// gang zhig bdag la thugs brtse don gyi phyir// shAkya'i grong khyer khyim du byon gyur te/ ka shAkya'i tshogs rnams grol bar mdzad pa na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// brgal bar
83a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i bcom ldan 'das gang gis// sngon gyi thugs dam bcas pa dgongs mdzad de// bdag cag srid pa'i rgyun las sgrol mdzad na// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi nus// de dus dbab
83a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar dus mkhyen pas// bcom ldan 'das kyis de yis dus mkhyen te// 'dren pa dus su thugs brtse mdzad pa po// de yi gsung la su zhig yid mi ches// mi yi 'dren pa yi ni sku mchog la// blta/
83b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i don du bdag ni 'gro bya zhes/ rgyal po des ni rang des sems kyis su// de snyam du ni rjes sra bsam pa byas/ de nas rgyal po bas gcang mas de ltar ring zhig blangs su bsams/
83b2(dkon brtsegs): nas// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka la smras pa dge slong khyod la ci zhig dgos// de skad ces smras pa dang // tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas/ rgyal po zas gcatsang ma la tshigs su bcad de slar smras pa/ rgyal po khyod
83b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi don du bsams byas te// ldod cing dad par bya byir bdag 'dir 'ongs// stobs bcu mnga' la dad pa'i sems bskyed na// skyes pa bud med dag kyang mtho ris 'dong // stobs bcu mnga' zhing yon
83b4(dkon brtsegs): tan tshad med ldan// drang srong chen po shAkya dga' mdzad pa// 'dir byor rgyal po thugs dang skyed cig dang // khyod kyi grags pa tshad med 'jig rten 'byung // khyod kyi sras ni mi dbang dam pa ste// stobs
83b5(dkon brtsegs): bcu thugs rje thug brtse che mnga' ba// chu khrod pad+ma ji bzhin chags med par// stobs bcu chags med thugs mnga' spyod pa mdzad// srid pa'i chu bo bzhi las brgal gyur nas// 'gro ba mang po chu bo
83b6(dkon brtsegs): che las sgrol// gang gnyis gtso bo mi 'jigs thang 'don gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// srid pa'i zug rngu bzhi po kun bton te// sman pa'i gtso bo skye dgu'i zug rngu 'byin// gso ba byed pa
83b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa dam pa'i mchog/ 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bdud kyi sde chen dpag med pham mdzad de// nag po'i phyogs rnams sder bcas yongs mnan nas// mchog tu zhi ba'i byang chub brnyes
84a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur gyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// 'gro ba sgrol zhing chos kyang bstan pa dang // 'chi med zhi ba mi la bshad gsol zhes// mi dbang la ni lha dbang gsol
84a2(dkon brtsegs): 'debs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs rnams zil mnan te// ston pa dpag yas 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems ca bye ba chad med 'dul bad dkyis/
84a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// rnam dag sbyin mnga' de ni 'gro ba dag/ mun pa rab rib sdug pos bsgribs pa yi// mig sbyong rab rib sel cing gsal mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed//
84a4(dkon brtsegs): rga dang 'chi ba'i 'jigs pas nyon mongs la// rga shi med mchog mi la ston mdzad cing // 'chi mar gnas su sems can 'don mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// me chen gsum gyis
84a5(dkon brtsegs): bsregs pa'i 'jig rten 'di// mes tshigs la sprin chen char pa bzhin// bzhi gnyis dam pa'i sprin gyis char 'bebs kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// dri gsum dri ma spangs shing
84a6(dkon brtsegs): skyon bsal te// dri ma gsum las skye bo 'grol mdzad cing // stobs bcu rnam par snang ba spyod mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// skye dgu kun la pa bzhin thugs brtse bas/
84a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu thugs rje mnga' ba byams par dgongs// thugs rje thugs brtses sems can 'grel mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// bcom ldan de ni ma rul sems can 'dul// thugs rje/
84b1(dkon brtsegs): mngar ba ma zhi 'i mdzad cing // rgod pa rnams kyang nyon mongs ni mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// skye bo rnams kyi srid pa'i rgya mtsho skems// rgya mtsho las ni lta bus ji lta bar// stobs
84b2(dkon brtsegs): bcu thugs rje che mnga' sgrol mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// tshad med yon tan tshogs kyis mdzes gyur pa// thugs rje chen po dang pa'i thugs kyis spyod// yun ring 'khrugs pa'i skye bo dang mdzad kyis//
84b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// nor bu rin chen chu dang byed pa bzhin// rgyal ba skye bo dang bar spyod mdzad cing // mi yi 'thab rnyog rab tu dang mdzad kyis// 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin yong dag
84b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed// rgyal ba de bzhin skyon bas la dag pa'i thugs// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' ba yongs su skyed// 'jig rten gtsol dad pa thob myur na// lha dang mi dag sdug bsngal khur yang 'dor// srid
84b5(dkon brtsegs): ba'i rgyu spangs zhib mchog tu 'dong // 'dren po mi mchog la ni dad pa spyod// bdag gis yon tan phyogs gcig brjod pa ni// nam mapa'i dbyings la mkha' lding rjes bzhin te// bdag ni rgyal ba'i son tan mthar phyin min/
84b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa mi mchog la ni dad pa skyed// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas// tshe dang ldan pa 'char ka las legs par bshad pa'ang thos/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa'i yon tan de lta bu'ang nyid kyis mngon
84b7(dkon brtsegs): du mthong / sngon bdag brgal nas skyes bu khyu mchog khyod kyang bsgral bar bgyi'o zhes dam bcas pa'ang rjes su dran nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la dad pa thob par gyur to// de ltar dad pa thob pa'i sems kyis/ tshe dang
85a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa 'char ka la 'di skad ces smras so// dge slong khyod ni nga'i bu'i chos las skyes pa'i bu yin na// khyod bdag phan thos la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te song zhig/ nga'ang
85a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir phyi bzhin 'ong ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char kas de ltar rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas nas zan zos te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer nas song ngo //
85a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag rgyal po zas gtsang ma ni dge slong 'char kas dad par byas te/ deng skye bo bal po che'i don du 'gyur ro// de nas tshe
85a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa 'char ka/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bshos khyer te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/ bdag gis byas pa rnams bcom ldan 'das la gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
85a5(dkon brtsegs): 'char ka la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'char ka legs so legs so// de ring rgyal po zas gtsang ma dad par byas pas khyod kyis bsod nams mang du bskyed do// de'i tshed bcom ldan 'das kyis
85a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de ring dge slong 'char kas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma mngon par dad par byas pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po bskyed pa de la bal te gzugs shig yod na//
85a7(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'ad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su'ang bsod nams kyi phung po de mi shong ste/ bsod nams kyi phung po ri ring tsam du dpag tu med
85b1(dkon brtsegs): / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bshos gsol nas/ phyag bcabs/ lhung bzed bzus te/ margyan ma'i rnam pa 'di lta bu mdzad do//
85b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma'i rnam pa de mdzad pas/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sdes bu stobs dang ldan pas lag pa bskum pa
85b3(dkon brtsegs): las brkyang ba 'am/ rkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
85b4(dkon brtsegs): mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ byang phyogs su brten te steng gi bar snang la gnod sbyin gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te bcom ldan 'das dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to//
85b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po tshul khor srung yang dri za bye ba khrag khrig brgya skyong dri mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das
85b6(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ shar phyogs logs su brtan te/ steng gi bar snang la dri za'i tshegs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur
85b7(dkon brtsegs): to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po'ang grul bum bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ sngam bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur te/ des bcom
86a1(dkon brtsegs): / ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lho phyogs logs su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la rgyal bum gyi tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang
86a2(dkon brtsegs): slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang yang klu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyi sbyin sngar 'dus
86a3(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur te/ des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ nub phyogs logs su brten te/ steng gi bar snang la klu'iri tshogs kyis bskor nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong
86a4(dkon brtsegs): gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par 'gyur to// lha'i dbang po brgya byin yang sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas/ snga ma bzhin steng gi bar
86a5(dkon brtsegs): snang la thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// de bzhin du lha'i dbang po rab 'thab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / lha'i rlas
86a6(dkon brtsegs): bi gzham 'phrul dbang byed dang / me mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lnga'i dbang po 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i
86a7(dkon brtsegs): ris nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ steng gi bar snang la re re ling yang g.yog lnga'i bu bye ba khrag zi
86b1(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag grangs ris kyang lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang ldan cig tu 'di lta ste/
86b2(dkon brtsegs): dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba'am/ brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris lha ma yin gyi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom
86b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// bya'i rgyal po 'dab
86b4(dkon brtsegs): bzangs brgyad khri drug stong yang rang rang gi gnas nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bo phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das dang
86b5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun la mchod cing 'dug par gyur to// gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu rgyal po'i khab tha dad pa nas lpags pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rang 'dus par gyur to// de la 'di skad
86b6(dkon brtsegs): ces bya ste/ nam mkha' yongs su dag pa'i dbyings dkyil du// ma lus rdzogs gyur zla ba nya ba yis// skar ma'i tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// nam mkhar zla ba bzhin du rnam par mdzes// zla ba dri med
86b7(dkon brtsegs): dkyil 'khor zhal mnga' ba// mun pa rab rib sel cing dri gsum 'joms// rtog ge can tshogs zil gyis mnan nas ni// mkha' la skar ma'i bdag po bzhin du mdzes// nyi ma'i 'od zer brgya yi lus 'dzin
87a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ pa// ston gyi dus na mun sel rnam mdzes shing // lha min tshogs rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// nyi ma de ni pad+ma'i kha yang 'byed// nyi ma 'od zer brgya 'dra'i sku mnga' bas// sto
87a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// mi yi nyi ma rnam par mdzes gyur cing // nyan thos pad+ma'i tshal mchog la yang 'byed// lga yi rgyal po dbang po ban+d+ha byin ni// 'dun sar lha yi tshogs kyis yongs bskor ba//
87a3(dkon brtsegs): lha yaM 'khor rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// bde sogs khyim theb sbyin ldan rnam par mdzes// rkang gnyis dbang po dpal sdug stobs bcu yang // dge sbyong tshogs kyis mdun bdar stong gsum na// rtog ge chog
87a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams zil gyis mnan nas ni// dge sbyong tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par mdzes// lha yi rgyal po 'thab bral dbang byed pa// 'thab bral bzang po lhas mchod btsun byas pa// 'thab bral bzang po
87a5(dkon brtsegs): lha tshogs nang bzhugs te// 'thab bral rnams kyi nang na 'dug pa mdzes// gzi brjid mtha' yas stobs bcu mnga' ba yang // lam ngan na 'gror dong ba zil mnan nas// yan lag brgyad
87a6(dkon brtsegs): ba rab tu ston mdzad cing // stobs bcu yon tan rnams kyis rab tu mdzes// lha yi rgyal po yongs su dga' ldan de// dga' ldan gnas na lU yi tshogs kyis bskor// lha tshogs mang po zol
87a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis mnan nas ni// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas rab tu mdzes// de bzhin lha dang lha mor bla ma yang // lha mi lha min tshogs kyis bla mar byas// 'khor brgyad po dag zil gyis mnan nas ni// skyes bu
87b1(dkon brtsegs): seng ge dam pa 'jig rten mdzes// lha yi dbang po bdag po rab 'phrul ni// lha tshogs mang po zil gyis mnan nas su// rang gi bsod nams mthu yis lha gnas na// gnas shing de ni rab tu rnam par
87b2(dkon brtsegs): mdzes// de bzhin nyon mongs rnams las rnam grol zhing // stobs bcu mnga' ba nyon mongs bral ba po// ma dul 'dul mdzad 'dul ba'i rgyal po yang // skye bo zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes//
87b3(dkon brtsegs): lha yi rgyal po dbang sgyur byed pa ni// lha gnas 'dug cing lha tshogs zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis// rnam par mdzes par gyur pa ji bzhin du// de ltar rgyal ba stobs bcu'i
87b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa dag/ sngan tshad spyad pas lha mi zil mnan te// sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzing brjid kyis// rgyal ba de ni rab tu rnam par mdzes// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na ni tshangs pa yang // tshangs pa'i 'khor
87b5(dkon brtsegs): rnams rang gis zil mnan te// shin tu snyan pa yan lag brgyad ldan dag/ yongs su rjod pa byed cing mngon du mdzes// de ltar rgyal ba tshangs pa 'drar gyur pa// dge sbyong rgyal po dge sbyong tshogs rnams kyis//
87b6(dkon brtsegs): mdun du bdar te bden pa'i gtam gsung zhing // 'jig rten gsum po dag na mngon du mdzes// nyan par 'dod pa lha dang mi rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po dag ni 'dus mkhyen nas// skyes bu khyu mchog yan
87b7(dkon brtsegs): lag brgyad ldan gyi// gsung rnams kyis ni rab tu ston pa mdzad// bya lam nam mkha' dpag par nus kyang srid// rgya mtsho bum pas gzhal du rung yang srid// ri rab srang brgyar gzhal du rung yang
88a1(dkon brtsegs): srid// sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' rtogs mi nus so// rgyal po mngon par dad par byas pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'char/
88a2(dkon brtsegs): song nas/ ring po ma lon par rgyal po zas gtsang mas/ shAkya rnams la sgo ba// grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma 'char ba'i snga ltas ni/ gang 'di dmar rengs 'char ba'o// dmar rengs shar
88a3(dkon brtsegs): mnyi ma 'char bar shes so// grogs po dag de bzhin du dge slong 'char ka'ang / bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen pa'i snga ltas yin te/ dge slong 'char kas yon tan gang brjod pa de dag ni nges par tham
88a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa'i yon tan yin no// grogs po dag de lta bas na/ bzhon pa'i mchog mchog rnams rtod de sta gon gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ring kho na bdag cag bcom ldan 'das mchog tu bltan
88a5(dkon brtsegs): thug pa de lta zhing 'dong ngo // lha legs so zhes gsol nas/ shAkya rnams kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i ltar mnyan te/ theg pa'i mchog rnams sbyar du bsnyad do// de'i tshe rgyal po zas gtsang mas
88a6(dkon brtsegs): ser skya'i gnas dang / n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba'i bar de dag thams cad rgyal po'i gshegs shul du mnyam par byed du bcug cing / bye ma gtsang ma 'dal du bcug ste/ nyams dga' ba dang /
88a7(dkon brtsegs): tog sil mas gang ba dang / dar gyi lnga ldi dang / 'phreng ba mang pos brgyan te/ skabs skabs su gar mkhan dang / glu mkhan dang / byang dang / bum rnga thogs pa dang / sil snyan dang / rol mo dang
88b1(dkon brtsegs): klu'i cha byang dang / yo byad thams cad thogs pa dag bkod par gyur to// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma bskon pa'i mchog dang zas pa rnams dang / bdag nyid kyang bzhon pa'i mchog la zhon te/ ser skya'i gnas
88b2(dkon brtsegs): rje grong khyer chen po nas byung nas/ n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dka' ra ba gal ba der song ngo // de'i tshe shAkyal la'i bzhon pa'i mchog ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad sngo la/ rta sngon po rnam
88b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis drangs shing / rgyan rnams kyang sngo la/ dril bu gser ka'i dra bas brgyan pa/ 'khor brgyan sngon po can gyis bskor ba/ gdugs dang / ral gri dang / thod dang / nor bu can gyi rnga yab dang / lAm brgyani
88b4(dkon brtsegs): can sngon po dang ldan pa/ kha tshar ma gcad pa'i ras sngon po gyon cing / rgyun sngon po thog pa'i zhal ta pa rnams zhal ta byed pa/ rgyan sngon po can gyi lhag thogs dang khrid pa du ma dang ldan pa/ rgyal mtshan
88b5(dkon brtsegs): sngon po bsgreng ba sha stag ste/ shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan sngon po can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor bar gyur to// shAkya la la'i bzhon pa ni rnam pa 'di lta bu ste/ 'di ltar shing rta dag kyang thams cad du
88b6(dkon brtsegs): ser ba nas/ thams cad du dmar ba dang / thams cad du dkar ba dang / thams cad du bkra ba dang / shing rta re re zhing yang rgyan khra bo can gyi mi brgya phrag re res bskor ba'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// shing
88b7(dkon brtsegs): rta de dag re re'i phyi bzhin du'ang glang po che brgyad khri gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/ gser gyi dra bas g.yogs pa sha stag bshams te/ glang po che brgyad khri po de dag gi steng
89a1(dkon brtsegs): du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri bzhag nas 'dong bar gyur to// glang po che brgyad khri bo de dag gi phyi bzhin rta gser gyi rgyan gyis brtsan pa/
89a2(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi dril bu g.yer khe brgyus pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyan dang ldan pa brgyad khri bshams te 'dong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAkya rnams rgyang ring po nas
89a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ong ba gzigs nas/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag khyed gang dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba ma mthong ba de dag gis/ shAkya ser skya'i gnas nas 'ong ba
89a4(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag la ltos shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag shAkya rnams ser skya'i gnas nas byung ba de dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha skyed mos tshal du 'dong ba dang rjes su 'thun no// de
89a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'di skad ces bya ste/ ser skya zhes bya'i grong khyer dam pa nas// rgyal po zas gtsang mi yau khyu mchog de// 'khor dang bcas te dzA ltar 'ong gyur pa// de ltar bstan gyis khyed rnams de nyon cig/ shing
89a6(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong mchog dang bcas pa dag/ legs par brgyan cing mdzes par spras nas ni// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer dam pa nas// mi yi dbang po dam pa byung bar gyur// shing rta sngo zhing rgyan kyang sngo ba dang //
89a7(dkon brtsegs): rta yang sngo zhing sngo ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma snga bo dag kyang sngob ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang sngo// lhag kyang sngo zhing zag mang rnams kyang sngo// dril bu gser ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/
89b1(dkon brtsegs): mi rnams kyang ni sngon po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan sngon po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing tu ser zhing rtan kyang ser ba dang // yang ser zhing ser po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po//
89b2(dkon brtsegs): dag kyang ser po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang ser// lug kyang ser zhing thag srang rnams kyang ser// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcus// mi rnams byung ni ser po'i gos can te/
89b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ser po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta dmar zhing rgyan kyang dmar ba dang // rta yang dmar zhing dmar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang dmar po ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag
89b4(dkon brtsegs): rlung dmar// lhag kyang dmar zhing thag srad rnams kyang dmar// dril bu gser ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dmar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dmar po bsgreng bas mdzes par byas//
89b5(dkon brtsegs): shing rta ra kar zhing rgyan kyang dkar ba dang // rta yang dkar zhing dkar po'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma snga po dag kyang dkar po ste// de bzhin dgos kyi dam pa dag kyang dkar// lcag kyang dkar zhing thag srang rnams
89b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang dkar// dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas// mi rnams kyang ni dkar po'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan dkar pos bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta bkra zhing rgyun kyang bkra ba dang // rta yang bkra
89b7(dkon brtsegs): zhing bkra ba'i 'khor dang bcas// mtshan ma lnga po dag kyang bkra ba ste// de bzhin gos kyi dam pa dag kyang bkra/ lcag kyang bkra zhing thag srang rnams kyang bkra/ ril bu gser ka'i dra ba rnams dang bcas/
90a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ mi rnams kyang ni bkra ba'i gos can te// rgyal mtshan khra bo bsgreng bas mdzes par byas// shing rta de dag rnams kyi phyi bzhin du// glang po brgyad khrir tshang ba bshams pa ni//
90a2(dkon brtsegs): ser gyi rgyal mtshan rnams kyis legs par brgyan// glang chen rnams ni gser gyis chal par brgyan// de dag steng du rin chen sna bdun gyi// khang pa brtsegs pa dag ni bzhag nas su// rnam pa sna tshogs
90a3(dkon brtsegs): rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis// shing rta rnams ni b+ha bzhin 'brang bar bshams// de bzhin rta mchog stong phrag brgyad cu snang // rin chen sna bdun rgyan gyis legs par brgyan// rgyal po'i chu 'os rgyal po 'am
90a4(dkon brtsegs): stabs can// glang po de dag rnams kyi byi bzhin 'brang // rab tu dri zhim kha dog lbu pa yaM// me tog sil ma rgyal po'i lam du bkram// dar gyi lha ldi dag kyang rab tu bres// bdug spos snod rnams kyis ni
90a5(dkon brtsegs): legs par brtan/ zlum ban ga mkhan rnams dang kyang rnams dang // bum rnga thogs pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas// rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs byed pa yang // rab tu dga' zhing rgyal po'i phyi bzhin 'thang /
90a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po gshegs pa'i l-i'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / shAHrnams rna babs sa'i bar du bzhon pa dang dong ste byin nas/ bzhon pa las bams te/
90a7(dkon brtsegs): nga thang gi 'khor gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar ti/ n+ya gro dro'i kun dga' ra bar dong ngo // ngo'i ci bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal lo bas gtsangs dargyal che bar ma khyen nas/ mi gang sdug cam kyig
90b1(dkon brtsegs): bar snang gi nam mkha' la rgyal po zas gtsang mngon par dad par bya ba'i phyir 'chag cing bzhugs par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de ltar 'chag pa'i gams phyogs nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po rgyas
90b2(dkon brtsegs): paka ma ring du ra chag cing 'gro'o// g.yon phyogs nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin nam ring du 'chag cing 'gro'o// de ltar bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i zham ring du lpags pa'i rgyal po rab 'thab bral dang / yongs
90b3(dkon brtsegs): su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ gdugs 'dzin cing bsil yab kyis gsob par gyur to// rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang /
90b4(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor srung gnyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i shar phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lhang sprad nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal bder
90b5(dkon brtsegs): logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khor par gyur to// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / mig mi bzang gnyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das 'chag pa'i/
90b6(dkon brtsegs): nub phyogs logs kyi thog ma la bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga smad nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la
90b7(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang /
91a1(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi lha'i bu rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir steng gi bar snang la gnas te/ lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / pad+ma dang / ku mud dang / pad+ma dkar po dang /
91a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i mnad ra ba dang / mnad rab chen po dang / lha'i spos kyi phye me rab tu 'thor bar gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lnga'i rol mo sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs dag kyang steng gi bir snang las
91a3(dkon brtsegs): sgra 'byin par gyur to// mi'i las 'das pa'i klu'i nga ro'ang steng gi bar snang las byung bar gyur to// sprin las spos kyi char zam zim yang 'bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog ut+pal dang / lnga'i tsan dan gyi
91a4(dkon brtsegs): ma'i char yang 'bab par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa gang mngon par mdzad pas/ lha dang mi rnams kyang gcig gis gcig mthong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon
91a5(dkon brtsegs): par mdzad do// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas lha de dge bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa'ang mthong / lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyu las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pas kyang bar snang gang bar mthong nas/
91a6(dkon brtsegs): de 'di snyam du sems te/ ji tsam du bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ sngon bcom ldan 'das gzhon nur gyur pa'i tshe/ 'di skad ru nga la ni gling chen po bzhi'i dbang phyug la dbang
91a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ngo mtshar mi che ste/ ngas ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su lha dang ma'i nang du chos kyi dbang phyug la dbang bar bya'o zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi dbang phyug la
91b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang ba de ni 'di yin pa lta ste/ bdag ni mi'i 'khor can du zad/ bcom ldan 'das ni lha dang mi'i 'khor can du gyur to snyam mo// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang mas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/ pus mo//
91b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshig 'di skad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das bltams ma thag tu sus kyang ma bstan par sa chen po la
91b3(dkon brtsegs): gom pa bdun bzhud de// phyogs bzhir gzigs nas gsung brjod pa/ nga ni 'jig rten na mchog/ nga ni 'jig rten na gtso/ nga ni 'jig rten na rab ste/ ngas skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba mthar dbyung
91b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo zhes gsungs pa de'i tshe'ang bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos gtugs te phyag bgyis so// gang gi tshe bcom ldan 'das zhing pa'i grong du bzhud nas/ 'dzam bu'i grib ma bsil ba la
91b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs pa'i rtse gnyi ma yol yang 'dzam bu'i grib mas bcom ldan 'das kyi sku ma btang ste/ lha'i bu gzhon nu drug thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa de'i tshe yang bdag gis bcom
91b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la phyag bgyis so// nga yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di dang len gsum du phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gang tshe rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod bltams nas/
91b7(dkon brtsegs): se chen 'di la gom pa bdun bzhud de// nga ni 'jig rten 'di na mchog ces gsungs// de tshe mkhas pa khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// gang tshe thub chen zhing pa'i grong bzhud de// 'dzam bu'i grib mas bzhugs pa/
92a1(dkon brtsegs): ma btang zhing // lnga bu gzhon nu drug gis btud gyur pa// de tshe mchod 'os khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal// de yang 'di dang khyod la lan gsum du// thub pa khyod kyi zhabs la phyag
92a2(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// thugs rje che mnga' lha mis mchod pa gtso// khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis lhag ci smos// mtshan ni don grub lags zhes sngon brjod pa// pha dang ma yis bsams te btags pa lags/
92a3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi bsam rdzogs bdud rtsi brnyes pas na// don grub lags par bdag gis da gdod 'tshal/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri lnga'i
92a4(dkon brtsegs): yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu bting ba rnam pa sna tshogs su spel ba bshams so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra bar yang lha'i yid bzhin gyi ras bcos pus yog par bting ngo // steng du'ang lha'i
92a5(dkon brtsegs): yid bzhin gyis ras bcos bu'i bla re bres so// de nas bcom ldan 'das par snang gi 'chags de nas babs te/ gdam bri bshams pa la bzhugs so// rgyal po zas gtsang ma'ang 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom
92a6(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis zhabs la mgo bos phyag brtul te/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/
92a7(dkon brtsegs): bar snang la 'khod par gyur to// 'dil 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// ser skya zhes bya grong khyir dam pa sa// n+ya mo d+ha mi ba nyams dga' bar// rgyal po zas pacang de dang /
92b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi tshe// 'jig rten mgon po phrad pa de yi tshe// skye bo mang po dag ni 'dus gyur te// lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dbang po// gru tshogs rnams dang de bzhin grul bum dang // dri ma'i rgyal po rnams
92b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin gsang ba'i bdag po rnams 'dus te// mi 'am ci yi tshogs dang mi rnams dang // de bzhin 'dod pa dag na spyod pa'i lha// rab tu dga' ba rnams kyang 'dus par gyur// de bzhin
92b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa yi// tshangs pa rnams dang tshangs pa'i ris rnams dang // 'od gsal ba dang dge rgyas pa dag dang // 'bras bu che bar gtogs dang gnas gtsang 'dus// dge sbyong dag nga de bzhin bram ze dang // spyod pa can dang kun
92b4(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyu dag dang // gcer bu pa dang mu stegs gzhan mang po// log lam rjes su 'brang ba rnams kyang 'dus// sangs rgyas nyid kyi gzi brjid dam pa yis// rgyal po chen po zas gtsang de yi sems//
92b5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su smin par bya ba'i don gyi phyir// de yi tshe na 'dus pa chen por gyur// sngan chad bcom ldan 'das kyis legs bshad pa'i// tshig gis 'khor rnams yongs su tshim par mdzad// da ni rgyal ba
92b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po zas gtsang la// rgyal ba'i mthu ni rab tu bstan par bzhed// bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po zas gtsang gis// gzhon nu khyod ni sa bdag chen po yis// rgyal por 'gyur zhes mkhas pas
92b7(dkon brtsegs): lung bstan gyis// khab nas ma byung zhig ces sngon gsol pa// gling bzhir dbang ba'i 'khor los sgyur ba ste// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod// rin chen sna bdun dag dang ldan par 'gyur/
93a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byor pa bzhi po dang yang ldan par 'gyur// chos la gnas shing sa yang skyong ba ste// gling ba'i dbang bar rgyal rigs rgyal chen 'gyur// mi yi bdag dang mi yis mchod par 'ong /
93a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phye ches mchod 'gyur nas gsol ba btag// de nas de ni byang chub sems dpa' des// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig dpag med nas// bdag ni rtag tu bden pa'i chog smras kyis// rgyal po bdag gi tshig la gson
93a3(dkon brtsegs): ces gsungs// 'di ltar gling bzhi pa yi rgyal srid kyis// bdag la sgrub mdzad par bzhed pas na// de lta'i tshul las rgyal po chen po khyod// bdag la cung zad tsam yang thugs mi re// rgyal po chen po sngon
93a4(dkon brtsegs): zung ba nA~M// rgya mtsho'i rlabs kyis rus sbal gcig cig dgrangs// rgya mtsho'i rlabs ni phyir log myur pa dang // rus sbrul de ni khron pa'i mang du lhung // de la blon pa'i nang gi nas sbal gyis// rgya mtsho'i rus sbrel bang
93a5(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dir 'ongs kye// nga yi the tsom skyes pa gtsang ba'i phyir// myur rung la smos shes de skad smras// khron pa'i nang gi rus sbal de nyid la// rgya mtshor rus sbal blo chen des smras pa// nga ni rgya mtsho'i rlabs
93a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis bkur bkur te// blon pa 'dir na de ring bor bar gyur// rgya mtshor rlabs chen deni phyir log song // nga ni slar log 'gro bar ma nus te// nga ni rlabs dang brel bar gyur pas na// rus bral khyod kyi thon par/
93a7(dkon brtsegs): wa'a'o// de la khron pa'i nga gis rus sbal gyis// rgyamatsho de ni khron pa 'di tsam mam// 'on te khron pa 'debs che ba zhig/ dris la nang la myur du smos shes smras// rgya mtsho'i dris bral blo rgya chen po des/
93b1(dkon brtsegs): khron pa'i rus sbab de la tshig smras pa/ khron pa'i rus sbal khyod ni byis pa ste// rmo ts+tshas rlung zhing shes pa rab tu ban// nga ni lan na can kyi nu rab cas// mun ring dus nas den bye skye yang / d+has tsho
93b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ma shes par ma nus na// dbus lta shes par ga la nus shes smras// de ltar mi yi bdag po khyod kyis kyang // bdag gi mthu ni thugs sum chud de// gling bzhi pa mi mchod pa rnams kyis ni// khyod kyi
93b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag la slu bar mdzad par bzhed// bdag ni chos can chos kyi rgyal por 'gyur// chad pas mi bcad mtshan chas bda' med par// stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di bsnyung bar bya// 'jig rten 'das pa'i
93b4(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa thob par 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul spobs bsgoms pa yi bdag nyid can// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon tshig sbyang bzhed nas// de phyir 'khor chen po ni de dag dang // sems can rnams la thugs kyis dgo
93b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad// rgyal po zas gtsang sems ni mgu bya'i phyir// thugs kyis yongs su bskal ba mdzad pa dang // 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag ma lus par// de yi tshe na der ni 'dus par gyur// rgyal po
93b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dun par byas pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i sems thog mar skye bar
93b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris/ lha ma yin khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo khrag khrig phrag drug cu dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'ad/
94a1(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa thog mar byas te/ des gya tsho chen po'i nang na rin po che rin thang yod pa dang / rin thang med pa ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bralalo//
94a2(dkon brtsegs): rin po che gzhan rgya mtsho chen po de na med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul pa byas te mchod par phul lo// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can gyi shing rta khrag khrig phrag drug cu'ang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing rta
94a3(dkon brtsegs): cang shes khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul te gta de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi ril bu g.yer kha'i dre ba can la/ rkang lag gi rgyan gser las byas pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyis spras pa dang ldan pa/ rin po
94a4(dkon brtsegs): che sna bdun las byas pa'i dbyar 'dab can ka gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go// rta cang shes de dag gi rgyan du bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re dag kyang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag kyang
94a5(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi rgyal mtshan can/ gser gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa sha stag go// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las shing rta de dag gi phyi bzhin du 'brang bar gyur te/ shing rta de dag 'dong na ni
94a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'dong / shing rta de dag sdong nan sdod pa sha stag go// yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re dag la'ang mdzes par bya ba'i phyir rin po che sna bdun gyi 'phreng ba'i lnga ldi mngon par sbyangs so// yid bzhin gyi nor/
94a7(dkon brtsegs): bu'i bla re de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu g.yar kha'i dra ba dang ldan par mngon par sprul to// shing rta'i rgyan dang / rta'i rgyan dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod na sgra
94b1(dkon brtsegs): snyan cing yid du 'ong la mnyanan bde ba sha sdug 'byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo sil snyan yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa// mkhas bus sA b+hA na thA snun cing yid du 'ong ba dang / sa
94b2(dkon brtsegs): nabade ba 'byung ba de bzhin du / shing d+ha'i rgyan de dag dang / ti'i rgyan de dag dang / yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re'i rgyan de dag rlung gis spyong na sku ldan cing yid du 'ong la mnyan na bde ba sha s+thag byung bar gyur to//
94b3(dkon brtsegs): shing rta de dag gi 'phang gis kyang steng gi bar snang la dpag cad drug cu bsgribs te 'khong par gyur to// shing rtang dag gi byi bzhin yang rol mo sil snyan sna tshogs rjes su bzang bar gyur to// shing rta de dag
94b4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la'ang lA ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dag 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni sil snyan len/ la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar
94b5(dkon brtsegs): byed la la ni tsan dan dang ut+pa la'i phye mas 'thoral la ni a ka ru dang ta ma la'i lo ma'i bye mas 'thor// la la ni lA ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi bye mas 'thor/ la la ni gser dngul gyi phye mas 'thor/
94b6(dkon brtsegs): la ni man da ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang ba ru sha ka dang / po ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / sgra snar dang / s+yA
94b7(dkon brtsegs): sngar chen po dang / s+ya sAr khra bo dang / skya snar bkra can gyi me tog mngon par sprul cing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni gser gyi me tog dang / dngul gyi me tig dang / shol
95a1(dkon brtsegs): gyi me tog dang / bai n+duR+Ya'i me tog dang spug gi me tog dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog gis mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni rin po che'i
95a2(dkon brtsegs): sna bdun dang dbyig gis snyim pa bkang zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bza' dang rgyan 'bul lo// la la ni sku rags dang / zhabs kyi rgyan dang / phyag gi rgyan dang
95a3(dkon brtsegs): sor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / kang bu tham pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / ser skung dang / mu tig gi ro shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / gya do dang / mgu
95a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyan sna tshogs 'thor bar 'gyur to// la la ni tshong tshong gshibs pa ka la la ni mgo rgyan ka la la ni rna na gdub kor ka la la ni gser gyi 'phreng ba rin po chos spras pa/ la la ni rin po che'i 'phreng ba gser gyis
95a5(dkon brtsegs): spras pa/ la la ni gser gyi dra ba ka la la ni gser gyi 'phreng ba dang / nor bu'i 'phreng ba dang / mu tig gi 'phreng ba thogs so// la la ni gser gyi gdug dang / dngul gyi gdugs dang / bai DU R+Ya'i gdugs dang / shel
95a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi gdugs dang / spug gi gdugs dang / rdo'i snying po'i gdugs dang / mu tig dmar po'i gdugs dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / rin po che'i rgyal mtshan sna tshogs tha dad pa dang / rin po che thams
95a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can mang po thogs so// la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs shing 'khod par gyur to// la la ni bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
95b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bskyod par gyur to// mi mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi phul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang gnyis gcol phyag 'tshal lo// khyod la ro zla yong ma mchis// 'jig rten gsal la/
95b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal dang ldan la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo// yon tan rdzogs la phyag 'tshal lo// nyon mongs sel la phyag 'tshal
95b3(dkon brtsegs): lo/ spyod dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sems dag khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gnas pa mi mngar zhum mi mnga'// le lo mi mnga' rgod mi mnga'// brtson 'grus brtsams shing rtul ba nyid// nges par
95b4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal blta na sdug pa// mdzes pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu'ang mngon par sprul to// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal
95b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag re re zhing yang bzhugs sa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul te/ bzhugs sa de dag re re zhing yang ba gam bkrab/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can brgya phrag drug cu drug
95b6(dkon brtsegs): cu mngon par sprul to// ba gam de dag re re la'ang khang pa brtsegs pa bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// khang pa brtsegs/
95b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag re re zhing yang khyams bkra ba/ blta na sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// de la gser gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni dngul
96a1(dkon brtsegs): rdul bu dang sgo 'bar ni baiDUr+Ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ kra ba ni smug/ kA wu ni mu tig dmar po/ sa gci ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stug go// damra kyi rnams
96a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gdung phya ma nI gser/ thal bu dang sgo 'phar ni bai DUR+Ya/ them pa dang kha khyer ni shel/ ka ba ni spug/ ka zhu ni mu tig dmar po// sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// baR+ShA
96a3(dkon brtsegs): rla'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni shUl/ bral bu dang ske 'bar ni gser/ them pa dang khwa khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni spug/ kazhu ni mu tig dmar po/ sa gzhi ni rdo'i snying po'i rang bzhin can sha stag /
96a4(dkon brtsegs): shel gyi khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni bai DUR+Ya/ gral bu dang sgo 'phar ni spug/ them pa dang la khyer ni rdo'i snying po/ ka ba ni gseraka zhu ni dbum/ sa gzhi ni mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin n+dan sha stag go//
96a5(dkon brtsegs): spug gi khyams rnams kyi gdung phyam ni rdo'i snying po// gral bu dang sgo phar ni mu tig dmar po/ them pa dang kha khyer ni gse r+ra/ kA ba ni dngul/ ka zhu ni shel/ sa gzhi ni bai DUR+Ya'i rang bas ni nan
96a6(dkon brtsegs): sha stag go/ mu tig dmar po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni spug/ gral bu dang sgo 'bar ni rdo'i snying po/ them pa dang kha khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni gser/ ka u ni bai DUR+Sha/ sa gzhi ni ke ke ru'i
96a7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin can sha stag go// rdo'i snying po'i khyams rnams kyi gdung phya ma ni mu tig dmar po/ bral bu dang sgo phar ni gser/ them pa dang kha khyer ni dngul/ ka ba ni bai DUR+Ya/ ke nu ni ka ke ru/
96b1(dkon brtsegs): pa gzhi ni shel gyi rang bzhin can sha drug go// khyams de dag tu'ang seng ge'i khri rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin nan/ lha ma yin gyi rtswa rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs bting ba/ katsa lin da'i steng sogs/
96b2(dkon brtsegs): canA/ mtha'i gnyis su rten ma bzang po bkod pa khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// seng ge'i khri de dag gi rkang rten rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can dgal// ras bcos bu sna /
96b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ shing bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / srin bal las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / zar ma'i shun pa las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang / shun pags las byas pa shin tu phra ba dang /
96b4(dkon brtsegs): ka shi ka la sa byas pa shin tu phra ba bye ba phrag drug cu drug cu bting bar gyur to// seng ge'i khri de dag re re'i ros gnyis su'ang / lha ma yin gyi bu mo rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ rin po che sna bdun
96b5(dkon brtsegs): las byas pa'i bsil yab thogs pa gnyis gnyis mngon par sprul te/ seng ge'i khri de dag la lha ma yin gyi bu gzhon nu 'khod pa dag la g.yob po// khyams de dag re re zhing rin po ni sna bdun
96b6(dkon brtsegs): las byas pa'i gdugs khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// khyams de dag re re zhing yang rin po che sna bdun gyi rgyal mtshan khrag khrig phrag drug cu drug cu mngon par sprul to// de la gas
96b7(dkon brtsegs): gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan sngon po la yu ba ser po shel gyis spras pa dag btsugs/ dngul gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan ser po yu ba dmar po gser gyis spros pa dag btsugs/
97a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ bai DUR+Ya'i khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dmar po yu ba ser po shel gyis spras pa dag btsugs// shel gyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshan dkar po yu ba bai DUR+Ya gser
97a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis sbas pa dag btsugs/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi khyams rnams su ni rgyal mtshun khra bo gser gyi yu ba bai DUR+Yas spras pa dag btsugs so// de la rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po// rgyal
97a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po// rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po// rgyal mtshan dkar po rnams ni tog dmar po// rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan rnams ni tog rin po chesna/
97a4(dkon brtsegs): bdun pa sha stag go// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed par gyur to// de 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum
97a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha rnams kyi glang po che sa srung kyi bu ni bar snang gi nam mkha' las 'gro zhing sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams skyed mos tshal yongs 'dus brtol du nye bar 'jog go// de bzhin du pho brang gi rngag
97a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag kyang bar snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed do// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag dang / ba ga ma de dag dang / bzhugs sa de dag dang / khang pa
97a7(dkon brtsegs): brtsegs pa de dag dang / khyams de dag dang / seng ge'i khri de dag dang / gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / ba dan de dag las lha'i tsan dan dang / ut+pal dang / a ka ru'i
97b1(dkon brtsegs): bye ma'i char 'bab par myur to// me tog man d+ha ra ba dang / mnad rab chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu shwa ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar
97b2(dkon brtsegs): dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / s+ya bA ra chen po dang / s+thA sngar khra bo dang / sgyu snar bkra chen gyi char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur to// gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Sha dang / shel
97b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi me tog dang / dbyig dang / gser dang / yid bzhin gyi ras bcos bu'i char yang mngon par 'bab par gyur te/
97b4(dkon brtsegs): yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i bla re de dag gi mthus/ lha ma yin gyi bu de dag rin po che gang rang gang gi char dbab par 'dod pa de dag las mngon par 'bab par gyur to// de'i tshe ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen
97b5(dkon brtsegs): po nas khor yug tu ni dpag tshad drug khri/ 'phang du'ang dpag tshad drug khrir lha ma yin gyi mchod pa de lta bus rgyas par gang bar gyur to// rin po che'i pho brang gi rdal de dag gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das
97b6(dkon brtsegs): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'ang mi 'greng bdun tsam du me tog mnad rabs rgyas par gang bar
97b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// spos chus kyang rdzab tu gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyang spos chu'i rdzab kyi dri des khyab par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong
98a1(dkon brtsegs): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can gang dag gis spyos chu'i rdzab kyi dri tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
98a2(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog par gyur te/ byang chub tu sems dang po bskyed pa dag ni smos kyang mi dgos so// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag bzangs ris rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/
98a3(dkon brtsegs): lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tsan dan gyi phye mas mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ byang chub dam pa don du gnyer slad du// skyabs
98a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dam pa rab tu mi sgul ba// lngar bcas 'jig rten mi 'jigs stsol ba po// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// gang la dga' ba'i yid kyis skyabs song na// log lhung dag tu ltung bar mi
98a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// de la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// dpe med byang chub 'tshal ba'i slang du'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag ni bshig bcom zhing // mya ngan las rgal nyon mongs dag gyur la// 'dren pa
98a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa// khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// rga dang 'dribs nyen par gyur pa yi// lha dang mi rnams 'dren pa bcom ldan 'das// gang la skyabs song byis kyang mi skye ba
98a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod la bdag ni skyabs su nye bar mchi// de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyis// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe// rta'i rgyan de dag dang / shing rta'i rgyan dag dang /
98b1(dkon brtsegs): lha ma yin gyi rgyan de dag dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyi rgyan de dag dang / bA re dang / dril bu gas+yer ba'i rgyan de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las sku sman DIng yid du 'ong la mnyan mdaga' ba 'di ltan
98b2(dkon brtsegs): dag byung bar gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo'i sil snyan yan lag brgya pa mkhas pas sgra phyung ba bzhin no// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
98b3(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/ steng gi bar snang las lha'i tsan dan dang / ut+pal dang / a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma'i char mngon par bab par 'gyur to// lha ma yin gyi spos kyi phye ma rnam pa
98b4(dkon brtsegs): sna tshogs du ma'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang /
98b5(dkon brtsegs): mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / s+ya snar chen po dang / s+ya sngar khru bo dang / s+ya sAr bkra chen gyi me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par bab bo//
98b6(dkon brtsegs): steng gi bar snang las gser dang / dngul dang / bain+d+haR+Ya dang / shil dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po na thams cad kyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab bo// lha dang lham
98b7(dkon brtsegs): sin gyi spos chu'i char yang mngon par bab po// spos chu'i char de bab pas ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu nun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur to// spos mu'i rngab kyi/
99a1(dkon brtsegs): dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par snang bar gyur to// sems can gang dag gis thos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams
99a2(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe/
99a3(dkon brtsegs): par snang las lha ma yin gyi lha rdzas kyi sil snyan gyi sgra dag byung ngo // sil snyan de dag gi sgras kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su grag par gyur to// theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhug
99a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sems can gang dag gis sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris mi/
99a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas pa'i tshe// lha ma yin gyi bu mo brgya stong dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyi 'khor bya ba'i phyir/
99a6(dkon brtsegs): la la ni glu lan/ la la ni sil snyan byed/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sbyar/ la la ni tsan dan dang / ut+pa la dang / a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor ka la la ni lha'i me to//
99a7(dkon brtsegs): mnad ra ba dang / man dar ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen mo dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / skya snar dang / skya snar chen
99b1(dkon brtsegs): po dang / sgra snar khra bo dang / sgra snur bkra chen dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams dang / gser dang / dngul dang / bai D+yaR+Ya dang / shel dang / sdug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rin po che
99b2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi me tog rnams 'thor zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// la la ni na bza' dang / rkang gdub dang / sku rigs dang / phyag gi rgyan dang / gsor gdub dang / gdu bu dang / gdu bu
99b3(dkon brtsegs): tham pa dang / dbu rgyan rtse gsum pa dang / dpung rgyan dang / cod pan dang / gser srung dang / mu tig gi do shal dang / nor bu'i do shal dang / se mo do dang / gya do dang / mgul rgyan sna tshogs dang / rna cha dang /
99b4(dkon brtsegs): rna cha gdub kor dang / tshong tshong gshibs pa dang / mgo rgyan dang / 'phreng ba'i lda ldi dang / spos kyi lda ldi dang / nor bu'i lda ldi dag 'thor zhing / me tog gi bla re dang / spos kyi bla re dang / nor bu'i bla re dag
99b5(dkon brtsegs): thogs so// la la ni spos chu'i char 'bebs so// la la ni phye ma'i char 'bebs so// la la ni mu tig dmar pos snyim pas bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// lal
99b6(dkon brtsegs): ni rin po ches snyim pa bkang / la la ni gser gyi sa snyim pa bkang ste/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor ro// tshigs su bcad pa 'di'ang smras so// gang brtan gang la gnas bcas
99b7(dkon brtsegs): nasangagang zag mchog la ma chod gyur pa// de 'dra ba yi grogs po dang / rtag par rgyun du phrad par shog/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po thag zangs ris kyis ji ltar byas pa de
100a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du/ lA ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rdul khron te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
100a2(dkon brtsegs): gsum skor ba byed cing / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ stobs bcu brtson bden khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mi 'jigs 'jigs bral ldod la phyag
100a3(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo// chos la ma 'dres nges par gyur pa po// 'gro ba'i 'dren pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// kun sbyor 'ching ba gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor rgyud mi gnas pa la phyag 'tshal lo// mtha'
100a4(dkon brtsegs): phyin thang gnas khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba bying ba sgrol la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can 'grogs kyang rgod pa mi mnga' zhing // 'gro ba kun las thugs ni rnam grol te// pad+ma chu yis mi gos 'dra ba
100a5(dkon brtsegs): po// blo zab bsam mi khyab la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas thub pa khyod kyis stong nyid bsten// rnam pa kun tu mtshan ma thams cad bshig/ khyod ni gang du'ang smon pa yong mi mnga'// mi gnas
100a6(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' mnyam la phyag 'tshal lo// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rab sim gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/
100a7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing // gser phye dag gis gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/
100b1(dkon brtsegs): sa dang bar snang dang ni lha yul na'ang // bde gshegs khyod mnyam ma mchis lhag ma mchis// mtshan mar bzung nas phyin ci log zhugs pa'i// 'gro ba smig rgyu 'dra bar khyod kyis mkhyen// 'di
100b2(dkon brtsegs): na byed pa tshor ba sems can med// gang zag med cing bdag gir bya ba med// chos kun stong zhing byed pa kun las dben// rang bzhin med cing g.yo med zhi zhes bstan// su zhig bde gshegs
100b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'dir mos te// chos kun byas pa med pa'i rjes 'brang ba// de 'dir 'drin pa'i sras su gyur pa ste// ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin yab ltar spyod// rnam 'dren khyod la bdag bstod bsod nam/
100b4(dkon brtsegs): gang skyes te// ji ltar rgyal ba mkhyen pa yis ni mkhyen gyur pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba de kun ma lus mtha' dag 'dir// 'gro la sbal gyis thams cad sangs rgyas 'grub par shog/
100b5(dkon brtsegs): bam po gsum pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po shing rta bzang gis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po skyobs ldan gyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das
100b6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa byas te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rdul gzhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing // dngus kyi me tog rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan
100b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho'i chu las pha rol rnam rgal ba// brgal nas skye bo rgyun gyi rjes 'gro sgrol mdzad cing // bde gshegs pha rol thang de 'jigs pa med 'jog pa/
101a1(dkon brtsegs): spyan mdzes bde bar gshegs pa khyod kyi zhabs la gtugs// blo mchog khyod kyis 'gro ba thams cad kun tu mkhyen// phyin ci log lnga thibs por rab zhen blo ldan te/
101a2(dkon brtsegs): 'khrul pa smig rgyu lta bur ma shes gyur rnams la// mtshungs pa med pa'i thugs rje bskyed nas rtogs par mdzad// mi mchog khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad sbrum dang // smig rgyu 'dra zhing mig
101a3(dkon brtsegs): yor mtshungs shes rab tu bstan// thub pa dam pa khyod kyis chos kyi sras mchog bskyed// srid pa gsum po dag na ma chags spyad pa spyod// dngos po log pa'i don gyur rang bzhin bral ba dang // sa
101a4(dkon brtsegs): dngos pos stong par mi dbang khyod kyis mkhyen// byis pa rmongs pa'i blo gros rmi lam dgra' lta bur// mi dbang khyod kyi sras kyis 'tshal nas spyad pa spyod/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sto
101a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
101a6(dkon brtsegs): skor ba byed cing // me tog skya sngar khra bo rnams kyis gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sku yi ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di zil
101a7(dkon brtsegs): mnan// ri rab kyis ni yungs 'bru dang // rgya mtshos brjes chub zhin no// gzugs mdzes mtshan gyis rab tu brgyad// gzugs kyi gzugs kyi dam pa dang // gzugs rnams thams cad zil gyis man na//
101b1(dkon brtsegs): dper na nyi mas me khyer bzhin// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid kyis// sems can gzi ldan zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas me khyer zil rlag bzhin// ye shes rgya mtsho
101b2(dkon brtsegs): ye shes kyis// 'jig rten gsum kun zil gyis mnan// zil mnan de dag lam me min// nyi mas zla 'od zil rlag bzhin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan gyis ji ltar byas pa de
101b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas// rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing / me tog
101b4(dkon brtsegs): s+ya snar khra bos mngon par gtor te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'dri dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ 'dren pa blo gros zhi ba po// zhi gnas dgyes pas 'gro ba yi// 'dod sdang gti mug rdul ni
101b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// char pas rdul rnams ni bgyid bzhin// 'brar zhing chos tshul 'bar bar mdzad// grugs sbyin gyis ni me bzhin no// nags btang nags mes shing sreg ltar// de bzhin nyon mongs dra ba sreg/
101b6(dkon brtsegs): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig ni// dpag tu med par dge rtsa 'dzin// nyon mongs thams cad 'jo mas mdzad do// bdud rtsis lus zhugs dug bzhin no// mun pa mun gnag sel mdzad de// mun khung sgron me
101b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bar ba bzhin// chos kyi tshul yang ston mdzad de// nor mkhan rin chen yon tan bzhin/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po bde mchog gi ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po yul
102a1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par dga' bas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtul zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum sbyor ba byed cing / rin po che'i me
102a2(dkon brtsegs): tog rnams kyis gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ gdul dkar mi mdzad sems ni khyod kyis gtul// g.yul la dpa' bas g.yul ngor dpa' bo bzhin// shin tu tshar
102a3(dkon brtsegs): bcad rang gis dbang du mdzad// thugs dul mi bsnyengs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod kyis dbang po thul cing dgra yang bcom// gang du'ang mi bsnyengs mi skyong bde ba brnyes// khyod ni nyon mongs rnams kyis yang mi
102a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrugs// rnam pa kun tu drug ni ma lus bcom// mthu chen khyod kyis byams pa legs bsgoms te// khyod kyi thugs ni dgra dang byams la mnyam// thub pa khyod kyis sems can blo gros bshig/ 'gro ba kun
102a5(dkon brtsegs): tu khyod ni bzhud mi mnga'// shes rab rnams grol srid pa'i sred pa bskams// shes rab rnam dag khyod kyi thugs kyang dag/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags mi mnga'// thams cad zil
102a6(dkon brtsegs): mnan thub mchog khyod 'dra med/ ldu ma yin gyi dbang po g.yul la mngon par dga' bas ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mi gzangs kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das
102a7(dkon brtsegs): la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la gter chen po'ang phul nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis
102b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis ni/ chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid mkhyen// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni brdar btags tshig tu zad// chos rnams chos kyi
102b2(dkon brtsegs): po yis// rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs so// gang 'di chos shes brjod pa yang // de ni ming tsam zad ces gsungs// ming ni ming gis dben paste// mtshan cid kyang ni de bzhin no// chos rnams
102b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan cing med pa ste// ming yang med ces khyod kyis bshad// rab tu bshad ces bgyi ba yang // bshad pa ci yang ma mchis te// gang gis kyang ni ma bshad cing // sula'ang bshad pa ma mchis so//
102b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi sras po mi mchog rnams// chos rnams de ltar 'tshal nas ni// chos rnams la yang mi chags par// rnam par spyod do thub pa che/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po mig bzangs kyis rje
102b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon pas kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtal lon te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan
102b6(dkon brtsegs): gsum skor ba byed cing / bcom ldan 'das la mu tig gi do shal yang phul nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dgra zla ma mchis khyod la bdag bstod ngo // tshul khrims dang
102b7(dkon brtsegs): ni gzugs dang ye shes stobs// des ni 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis// de phyir khyod ni dgra thul mtshungs ma mchis// khyod kyi gzugs ni chos kyis bskyed pas na// gzugs kyi stobs kyis
103a1(dkon brtsegs): khams gsum zil gyis mnan// sbyin pa'i stobs kyis mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// dpe byang phun sum tshogs shing gzugs kyang dag/ tshul khrims stobs kyis khyod ni mi spyod de/
103a2(dkon brtsegs): skye bo mkhas pas so sor bsam mi lang // khyod ni tshul khrims ldan ning thugs kyang dag/ mi yi seng ge mdzad pa thams cad 'byor// shes rab stobs kyis khyod mtshungs 'ga' ma mchis// des na mi bsnyengs
103a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gsum btul nas// 'khor du seng ge lta bur sgra bsgrags te// rtog ge tshogs kyi blo gros zil gyis mnan/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'jig rten gsum rnam par gnon gyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin
103a4(dkon brtsegs): du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnam par snang byed kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed cing / rim po ches snyim pa bkang
103a5(dkon brtsegs): ste gtor nas// tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa chen po skye bo tshogs pa 'di// rang ba'i sems kyis khyod kyi zhal du lta// kun gyis rgyal ba mdun na bzhugs par mthong //
103a6(dkon brtsegs): de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la// skye bo bsam pa ji ba'in so sor 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyi gsung de de ltar 'byung // de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres
103a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gcig brjod pa la// 'khor gyis tha dad gsung du rnam 'tshal cing // 'gro bas rang don ji lta bzhin du'ang 'tshal// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan// gsung
103b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig rab tu brjod pa mdzad pas ni// gcig la 'jog gi gzhan ni dgag pa mdzad// 'dren pa su dag ma bslabs rtogs par mdzad// de ni rgyal ba'i sangs rgyas ma 'dres mtshan/ lha ma yin/
103b2(dkon brtsegs): kyi bang po rnam par snang byed kyis ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du// lha ma yin gyi dbang po btang bzung gis kyang // bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rta la zhon te/ bcom ldan 'das
103b3(dkon brtsegs): la lar gsum sko ba byed cing / mu tig dmar pos snyim pa bkang ste gtor nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rgyags dang dargyal sdig pa'i lnga ba spyod pa gang // yid dga' rab
103b4(dkon brtsegs): tu nga bas me dang bde gshegs kyis// blo la mngon par dga' ba de dag pas mchis te// mtshus med bsnyen bkur bgyid pa de dag ston pa'i sras// chos rnams 'di gango ba nyid kyis ma mchis te/ rmi lam dga' ba tham
103b5(dkon brtsegs): cang chadadam ma lalas 'dra// rmi lam dga' spyong ma mchis kyang ni 'du shes mchis// de ltar rgyal bas chos rnams thams cad rab tu gzigs// ston ka'i sprin dang ma tshus shing chumi zla ba 'angadra // byis pa'i blo ldan rnams kyi
103b6(dkon brtsegs): yid ni rmongs par bgyid// gang dag sag tu bgi mchis bde gshegs blo mngar ba// mkhas pa'i skye bo dgal 'dren rmongs mi bgyid// rgyal ba khyod kyi bstan la rnam tu dag mchis gang // mi mnom ngam pa de dag ming la 'ong /
103b7(dkon brtsegs): mo mchi// chos rnams thams cad rmi lam 'dra bar rnams tags nas/ yang ngag mthong ba de dag ting 'dzin thob par 'gyur// de nas thag zangs ris la sogs pa/ lha ma yin gyi bang po bye ba phral drub cu po
104a1(dkon brtsegs): dag gis mchod pa rnam pa 'di lta bu byas nas// byang chub la gzhol ba'i sems kyis tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dka' nas dga' ba dang ming bde ba skyes te thal mo sbyar
104a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lha ma yin
104a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa'ang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas
104a4(dkon brtsegs): 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog du ma 'di lta ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / dkar po dang / le brgan dang / shel dang / dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag byung nas/ de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten snang
104a5(dkon brtsegs): byas rgyas par bkang ste phyir logs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul snyan las langs te//
104a6(dkon brtsegs): gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don tshigs su bcad de nus
104a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ 'jig rten phan bzhed rgyu zhig ma mchis par// mi yi se ge 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// drang srong chen po ci slang 'dzum pa mdzad// skyes bu mchog gis 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// lha min mchod pa rgya chen
104b1(dkon brtsegs): gzigs gyur nas// 'jig rten pan ba zhed khyod ni 'dzum mdzad na// lha min rnams la lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// de thos bdag cag rnams ni dgar bar 'gyur// de ring su yis dogs med rgya chen sems// 'khor
104b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dir yang dag bskyed par gyur cig gu// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gi bsam mkhyen nas// mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa mdzad par 'gyur// de ring yongs su dag pa'i yid kyis su// mi yi mchog la dad pa gang gis
104b3(dkon brtsegs): bskyed // de bzhin gshegs pas gang gis pas ma mkhyen te// yid du 'ong ba'i 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa de mthong nas// 'di ltar bde gshegs 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di// su mi
104b4(dkon brtsegs): dpung bcas bdud ni dang bcom zhes// 'khor 'di de ring the tshom 'tshal bar myur// drang srong chen po rgyal ba dgra las rgyal// the tshom 'tshal ba'i som zhigacang du gsol// mi mchog khyod kyis de ring 'gro ba yi// the tshom sbyar te legs/
104b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gcang du gsol/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis zhu ba zhus pa'i lan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris//
104b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten pa na phyir 'dzum pa ngas byas pa// de yi 'bras bu ma lus bstan par bya// bstan pa de ni rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'i phyir// lha min rnams kyis nga mchod 'di byas te// de dag sems ni ci
104b7(dkon brtsegs): la'ang chags med pas// nam mkha'i ngos la lag mthil chags med bzhin// lha min tshogs kyis dang pa'i yid byas te// de dgang la mchod pa 'di byas pas// blo can de dag lha min ris bor te// mtho ris dong nas yun ring dga'
105a1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// de dag kyi dus rgyal ba mi'i seng ge/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma bye ba sbed/ bsnyen bkur byas nas yid 'ong bsal ba la// de dag thams cad mtshan 'thun rgyal bar 'gyur// de tshe bde gshegs zag
105a2(dkon brtsegs): khrig drug cu'i rnams// 'jig rten sgron ma phyogs su grags pa ste// de dag mi gnas chos ni ston mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'grel par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag rnams kyi zhing // shi tu yangs shing rtsigs/
105a3(dkon brtsegs): ma med par 'gyur// de tshe khrag khrig drug cur chang ba yi// rgyal ba rnams kyis stong gsum sbyong bar 'gyur// de dag ngan song thams cad sel bar mdzad// de dag zhing der dga' ba spyod par 'gyur// brtan pa de dag mi lom thams cad myong //
105a4(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i theg pa ston par 'gyur// de dag tshe yi tshad du 'gyur ba ni// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar yang // rnam par 'dren pa de dag 'tsho bar 'gyur// chags pa med pa'i chos kyang ston par mdzad// thub pa de dag mya ngan
105a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das gyur te// 'jig rten mkhas pa rab tu ni gyur nas// bskal pa khrag khrig drug cu tshang bar ni// rang byung rnams kyi dam chos gnas par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa de dag 'gro ba'i tshogs// gang+gA bye ma snyed kyi skye
105a6(dkon brtsegs): po 'dul// dgralas rgyal ba'i rgyal bar mtshan 'thun 'gyur// zhing dang tshe dang chos gnas 'gyur ba'ang 'thun// bde gshegs de dag khrag khrig drug cu yi// skyes pa bud med yongs su smin mdzad de// bla na med pa'i
105a7(dkon brtsegs): theg pas 'dems par 'gyur/ mkhas pa de dag rgyal ba'i gdung yang 'dzin// rgyal ba lha min de dag lung bstan pa// 'jig rten phan phyir drang srong chen pos bsus// lba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten thos nas// mi
105b1(dkon brtsegs): rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skyes par gyur// lha ma yin lung bstan pa'i le'u sgri bzhi pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos lha ma yin gyi mchong pa rnam pa lta bu 'di mthong nas ngo
105b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshar du gyur te/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ji lta bu zhig mngon nga' 'du mdzad na/ 'di lta bu'i rnam par smin pa rngub snyam nas/ de'i tshe sems ji ltar
105b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gzhag pas/ bskal bzangs med pa'ang rjes su dram zhing / bcom ldan 'das kyis srid pa'i rgyung de dang de rab ni 'pho dang skye ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag mtho par 'du mdzad pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis bla na med pa yang dag
105b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag gis phyir mi ldog pa brnyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad rjes su dran par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par banag go// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung
105b5(dkon brtsegs): chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po rjes su dran par gyur nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bdag nyid chen po 'di lta bu mdzad na/ de'i thugs bskyed pa gcig la
105b6(dkon brtsegs): 'bang 'jig rten gyi 'ams bang+gA'i rlung gi bye ma sbed na/ sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag thams cad mi ri lus thob par gyur te/ lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji snyed pa de sring du sems can des bskal ba bad+ma'i klung bye
105b7(dkon brtsegs): ma snyed du mchod pa byas kyang / ri dag gis thugs bskyed pa gcig la'ang lan lon par mi nus so snyam mo/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te ngo mtshar rang dang pa thob par
106a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ gyur nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcang de mngon par bstod pa/ thub pa byang chub gsol ba yi// thugs bskyed pa ni re re la'ang // lha ma yin gyi mchod pa 'dis// cha tsa mu mi spyod mi'i
106a2(dkon brtsegs): seng ge/ de lta'i yon tan mthar phyin te// lha dang mi yis mchod gyur pa// tsan dan phur ma ri rab tsam// mi mchog khyod la mchod par 'os// mi yis seng ge khyod la ni// gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// rgya mtsho rab tu bkang
106a3(dkon brtsegs): ba yi// spos chu dag gis mchod par 'os// yon tan chen po mnga' ba la// gang+gA 'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// me tog tshogs ni ri bo mchog/ khor yug chen po mnyam mchod 'os// rgyal ba sgron ma rang byung ba// mar me'i snying
106a4(dkon brtsegs): po ri rab tsam// 'bru mar rgya mtsho'i nu snyed kyi// mar me rnams kyis mchod par 'os// mthu chen mnga' ba de lta bur// yon tan pha rol phyin gyur pa// gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// me tog mchod rten mchod par 'os// mi
106a5(dkon brtsegs): dbang mchod pas thugs brtse ba// rin chen gdugs ni che rnams kyis// bskal pa khrag khrig rnams su yang // sems can mchog la mchod par 'os// yon tan mtha' yas mnga' ba khyod// rin po che yi rgyal mtshan gyis//
106a6(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bkang ste// bskal pa bsam yas mchod par 'os// mi yi seng ge khyod la ni// bskal pa khrag khrig dpag med par// gang+gA'i bye ma ches mang ba'i// ba dan rnams kyis mchod par 'os// drang
106a7(dkon brtsegs): srong chen po smra ba'i stag/ lha rnams dang ni mi dag dang // gzhan yang sems can gang tshogs pa// brtag bzung dpe la gsan du gsol// gal te gang+gA'i bye snyed kyi// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams rnams kyi// sems
106b1(dkon brtsegs): can thams cad sangs rgyas su// mi mchog stobs bcu'i stobs ldan la// de dag re re 'i mgo bo yang // gang+gA'i bye ma snyed gyur te// mgo bo dadag re re shing // de skyed pa dang ldan gyur la// kha rnams de dag re re zhing /
106b2(dkon brtsegs): lce dang kha yi grangs mnyam la// gad+hA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi// bskal par bstod pa bgyis kyang ni// rgyal ba de dag spobs mi bas// khyod kyi yon tan mthar mi phyir// rgyal ba de lta'i yon tan gyi// pha rol tu ni phyin par
106b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legs so legs so// nga'i nyan thos rnams ni drang por gyur pa// ye shes dang ldan par gyur pa// chos su gyur/
106b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ tshad mar gyur pa sha stag gnas te/ de dag ni nga'i yon tan gyi tshogs la 'jug pa sha stag go// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa ste/ yon tan bsam gyi
106b5(dkon brtsegs): mi khyab pa dang ldan pa'o// dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi tshogs ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o//
106b6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan rnams gzugs can zhig yin na ni/ sems bskyed pa re re'i yon tan gyi tshogs kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams kang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du shong bar mi 'gyur te/ sems bskyed pa re re'i
106b7(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi tshogs kyang de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gang 'di grangs kyis tshad gzung bar brjod kyang brjod par mi nus/ bsams kyang bsam par mi nus so// de ci'i
107a1(dkon brtsegs): phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems bskyed pa gang yang sems can du bsdu bar bsdus pa sems can gang ji snyed cig yong pa'i sems can de
107a2(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du ma bskyed pa gcig kyang med de// sems can gyi khams ni tshad med pas/ sems can gyi khams ji snyed pa de snyed kyi bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re rel
107a3(dkon brtsegs): las 'byung ngo // sems can gyi khams ni mi grad pa ste/ sems can gyi khams ji ltar mi zad pa de ltar mi zad pa'i bsod nams de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems bskyed pa re re las 'byung ngo // sems de ni sems can
107a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la phan pa'i don du bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad kyis mchod kyang lan lon par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i mnod pa ni zang zing dang bcas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa'
107a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chen po'i sems/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don du 'byung ba ni/ sems can 'khor ba la gnol ba 'di dag mya ngan 'das pa la ji ltar gzhol bar 'gyur zhes te/ zang zing med pa'i phyir ro//
107a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams kyi don du zang zing med pa'i sems dpag tu med pa bskyed par gyur to// dge slong dag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa
107a7(dkon brtsegs): dpag tu med pa/ bgrang du med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
107b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rig pa dang rabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i b.lo sgyu ba/ bla na med pak+Sha lA dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas com ldan sa dang po'i tog ces bya ba 'jig
107b2(dkon brtsegs): rten du byung ste/ dge slong dag de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog des sems bskyed pa re re da gA dA'i klung gi bye mi snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rnams la phan par dgongs par gyur te/ don kyang mdzad do//
107b3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i dog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gcig tu gyur te/ yongs su dag cing / ngan song dang mi khom pa thams cad yongs su
107b4(dkon brtsegs): chad pa ste/ de bzhin gsheg pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na log par nges pa'i sems can gyi skye ba yong med par gyur to// lta ba'i rnam pa yong med par gyur to// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can yong med par
107b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las kyi mtha' yongs su ma dag pa dang ldan pa'i sems can yong med par gyur to// ngan song gi rgyur 'gyur ba'i nyon mongs pa dang / las 'byung ba yong med par gyur to// de ci
