107b6(dkon brtsegs): byir de na/ de bzhin gshegs pa des yun ring po nas sems can rnams dge ba'i chos rnams la btsud cing bathams te/ rjes su bstan cing bslabs pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
107b7(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dbang po'i tog gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ma 'khod pa'i sems can rnams kyang bde ba lnga thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar la la ni 'dod pa'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la mi khyim nas
108a1(dkon brtsegs): #/ 'byung ba'i bde ga dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bsam gtan gyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur to// la la ni snyoms par 'jug pa'i bde bdang ldan par gyur to// la la ni bla na med pa yang dag pa/
108a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ de dag bde ba de la'ang spyod la/ bde ba de dag la'ang mngon par len pa med par gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dper na bung ba me tog gi khu bas nye bar 'tsho 'ang del mngon par zhen pa/
108a3(dkon brtsegs): med do// de bzhin du sems can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na bar snang la rgyu ba'i bya ni bar snang la'ang rgyu la de la mngon par chags pa'ang med do// de bzhin du sem/
108a4(dkon brtsegs): can de dag kyang bde ba de la yongs su spyod kyang de la mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'khod pa'i sems can rnams la yid mi bde bar 'gyur ba'i mi dga' ba med/
108a5(dkon brtsegs): rmongs par 'gyur ba med de/ gnan du ma ming bde bar 'gyur ba'i dgar ba sha stag la yongs su spyod de// de ni 'di ltar sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba de lta bu bskyed pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa/
108a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po'i tog ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ mi dge ba las yongs su bzlog sa dag pa la btsud pas/ de dag las gang gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myong par 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa dbang med/
108a7(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba mi dge ba'i las de lta bu yong med do// de ma bsags pa'i phyir sdug bsngal tshor bar 'gyur ba'i rnam par smin pa mi 'byung ngo // de dag gis ni rmongs pa'i sems tsam gyis kyang las gang gis rmongs pa rnams pa
108b1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal yang ma min/ bde ba'angam yin par tshor ba 'drung bar 'gyur ba de lta bu mngon par 'dum byas te/ des bsags pa'i phyir mongs par gyur ba 'tshor ba sdug bsngal mang sa yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa de mi byung
108b2(dkon brtsegs): ngo/ dede bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing den rgyu gang gis sems can de dag dus gyur pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi 'byung bas// nyams su mi bde ba'i nyi ma mi 'char ro// rlung thams su mi bad
108b3(dkon brtsegs): bami ldang ngo // char nyams su mi bde ba mi 'bab bo// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshwa/ sems can de dag la lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad she
108b4(dkon brtsegs): pa sngon du 'gro zhing / shes pa'i rjes su 'brang ba bstan cing bshad pas/ sems can de dag gi kyang byang chub sems dpa' de las bstan pa de thos nas/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi las thams cad shes pa sngon du 'gro
108b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing / shes pa'i rjes su 'brang bar yongs su bsgrubs pas/ las de'i rnam par smin pa de dag la rmongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ba med do// rmongs pa rnams la rgyu gang gis bde ba'ang ma yin/
108b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa'i tshor ba 'byung ba med do// de ltar sangs rgyas kyi ming de na sems can de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba med cing / bde ba'ang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi ring der
108b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa'i sems can de bzhin gshegs pa des gtams pa de dag ni chos la rim gro bya ba chen pos nye bar gnas par gyur to// de dag 'chag na'ang chos nyid la sems shing / chos la mos pas zhen pa'i yid kyis
109a1(dkon brtsegs): 'chag ste/ chos la mos shing zhen pa'i yid kyis 'chag pa de dag la sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // de bzhin du 'greng ba dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / sad pa dang / spyod lam thams cad
109a2(dkon brtsegs): du'ang sdug bsngal mi 'byung ngo // sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag la yang ba ma spangs pa med de/ de'i phyir yang ba ma spangs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi 'byung ngo // yang dag pa'i spong ba yod pas de dag la skyob med de/
109a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i phyir de dag la yang dag par spang bar bya ba'i sdug bsngal yang med do// sems can de dag la 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// /
109a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag la mi sdug pa dang phrad pa'i sdug bsngal yang med de/ de ni 'di ltar sems can de dag sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi sems nye bar gnas pa'i phyir ro// de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal
109a5(dkon brtsegs): yang med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir ro// sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug bsngal ni sdug pa las 'byung ste/ de'i phyir de dag la sdug pa dang bral ba'i sdug
109a6(dkon brtsegs): bsngal yang med do// sems can de dag la sdug bsngal ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ste/ 'di ltar de na sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba rgyu ba med pa'i phyir ro// gzhan du na 'du byed kyi sdug bsngal gcig pu yod de/ 'di lta ste/
109a7(dkon brtsegs): mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa de ni don dam pa'i chos ston to// de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog de bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du bzhugs pa'i tshe// des gsungs pa la phyir smra ba'i
109b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can dang yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der ma byung ste/ de ni 'di ltar sngon sems can dag legs par yongs su smin par byas pa'i phyir ro// dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ dge ba'i rtsab ban pa dang /
109b2(dkon brtsegs): dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgribs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang / nyes par bsam pa
109b3(dkon brtsegs): dang nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas sems can de snyed gcig gi don bya ba 'am ga de dag la phan par bsam pa'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gla che ba'i sangs rgyas
109b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ sem
109b5(dkon brtsegs): zhan pa dang / sems dmar ba nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i bar gyi sems kyis sems can de snyed cig gi don bya ba'am// de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar
109b6(dkon brtsegs): zag gru che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag de la ji
109b7(dkon brtsegs): snyam du sems/ dad pa zhan pa nas zhes par bsgrubs pa'i ngang ba'i bar dang / tshul khrims zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i tshul khrims kyi bar dang // thos pa zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i thos pa'i ba
110a1(dkon brtsegs): #dang / brtson 'grus zhan pa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pa dang / dran pa 'an sa nas nyes par bsgrubs pa'i dra ba'i ba nga / ting nge 'dzisanapa nas nyes par brlabs
110a2(dkon brtsegs): ting nge 'dzin gyi bar dang / shes rab zhan pa nas shes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyi bar gyis sems can de snyed cig gdon bya ba 'am/ de dag la ban par bsam pa'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba
110a3(dkon brtsegs): 'am/ de ltar thag glu che ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
110a4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag legs so legs so// de ni dge ba'i rtsa ba zhan pa dang / sems zhan pa dang / dad pa dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
110a5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab zhan pa dang / dma' ba dang / zhum pa dang / chung ba dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / sdug bsngal dang 'dres pa dang / sdug bsngal dang ldan pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis yongs su bzung ba dang /
110a6(dkon brtsegs): nyes par bsams pa dang / nyes par bsgrubs pa'i shes rab kyis sems can de snyed kyi don bya ba'am/ de dag la phan par bsam pa 'am/ bde ba bsgrub pa 'am/ sdug bsngal bsal ba 'am/ de ltar thag gruche ba'i
110a7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba 'am/ sems can de snyed yongs su smin par bya bar mi nus so// dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang
110b1(dkon brtsegs): ni ga'in snyamamam ga daskad ces bka' stsal pa dang dge slong dag cang mi zer bar 'khod do// de'i tshe shar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma'i klung gi khyim snye das pa na/ 'jig ter/
110b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams zla ba'i 'od zer gyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhe sA la chos kyang ston to// dar 'ang ma dngul
110b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nur gyur pa 'dus shing 'dug par gyur pa des/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa sems kyis shes nas// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsheg pa la'i brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po de la 'di skad ces gsol to//
110b4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa chos sngon gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de la bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du bdag kyang mchi'o// de skad ces
110b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal pos/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de'i dus la dbab par shes nasob/
110b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig/ de nas 'jam pa la gnon nur gyur pa stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po'i zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
110b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa'i lag pa bskum pa las brkyang ba 'am brkyang ba las bskum pa tsam gyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba'i bod zer gyis rab tu ldan
111a1(dkon brtsegs): du bya/ ba de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan mang 'dir gnas par gyur to// des bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu
111a2(dkon brtsegs): 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gang 'di skad du dge slong dag de la ji snyam du sems/
111a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dbang po'i tog ces bya ba byung ba de gang zhig yin snyam zhes bka' stsal pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das nyid ni de'i tshe de'i dus na dbang po'i tog ces bgyi ba'i
111a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs par gyur to// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa ste/ sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba la chog pa mi mngar/
111a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la rgyun chad par bgyi ba ma mchis sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams la dgod pas chog pa mi mnga' ste/ la la zhig yang dag par smra bas yang
111a6(dkon brtsegs): dag par smra na/ rgyal ba gtso borgyal ba dme pa/ rgyal ba mchog/ rgyal ba rab ces brjod pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid legs par yang dag par brjod pas yang dag par brjod do// de skad ces smras nas//
111a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// dpa' bo rnams ni thabs mkhas te/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse zhing // sems
111b1(dkon brtsegs): can yongs su smin mdzad phyir// dpa' bo chen po rnam par 'phrul// bye ba brgyad cur rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas nyid du bstan gyur kyang // dadung chog pa'i 'du shes bsal// byang chub mchog tu thugs
111b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'jug/ stong gsum drug cu rtsa gcig gi/ sangs rgyas zhing rnams dag mdzad pas// ji ltar thub pa thabs mkhas pa// rgyal ba khyod ni kun gyis 'tshal// dadrung dang po thugs pastod par// dang der
111b3(dkon brtsegs): ni mongs bstan te// nga rung du yang 'dren pa khyod// sangs rgyas mang po ston pa mdzad// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs rnams kyis// rkang pag mchog ni spyod pa mdzad// chos kyi dbyings la nags mi mdzag// khyod
111b4(dkon brtsegs): gang yang mkhyen mdzad de// brgya byim tshangs pa'i cha byad dang // la lar bdud kyi cha byad kyis// sems can rnams kyi don mdzad de// 'jig rten rnams kyis rtogs mi nus// bud med na byang spyod pa mdzad// dung
111b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ri skye gnas rnams na'ang gangar// 'jig rten chos kyis mi gos te// pad+ma chus mi chags pa bzhin// 'dren pa sna tshogs khams can gyi// 'jig rten 'di yi rjes 'jug mdzad// des na skye dgu 'di dag
111b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams// gdugs mtsham khyod kyi yon tan brjod// la la rab ltam pa yongs su bstan// la lar mya ngan 'das pa bstan// la la na ni 'khor lo bskor// la lar spyad pa spyod par mdzad// sems can
111b7(dkon brtsegs): gdul ba'i don slad du// dgyes shing mgu rare len rol pa mdzad// bshums mo dag kyang 'byin par mdzad// sems can sus kyang yong ma 'tshal// 'dod chags mi mnga'i chags pa'i tshul// 'jigs pa/
112a1(dkon brtsegs): mi mnga' 'jigs pa ltar// sems can rnam par gdul don du// 'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// rmongs med rmongs pa'i tshul bstan te// byis pa ma lags kyis tshul
112a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis// sems can rnam par gdul don du// 'dren pa rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad// smyos pa ma lags smyos pa'i tshul// zhab ma lags zha ba ltar// rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs kyis// sems
112a3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ni 'dul ba mdzad// da ltar bsam yas mgon po khyod// dam pa'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab// dpar chen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sems can thub chen 'drar gyur cig/ sngon byung ba 'od
112a4(dkon brtsegs): srungs chen pos nus pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzang brgyad khri drug stong gis lha ma yin gyi dpung po de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/
112a5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la gzhal du med pa'i dad pa skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i don du rin po che sna bdun gyi khang pa brtsegs pa shin tul
112a6(dkon brtsegs): ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong mngon par sprul to// lce'i rin po che sna bdun ni/ 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngus dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang / smug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang
112a7(dkon brtsegs): bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag kyang ka/ ring po che sna bdi'i lan kan gyi dra ba ris bkra ba blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// rin po che sna ba'i ni// 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang /
112b1(dkon brtsegs): b+he d+hAr+yA rlung / shel lo// gser gyi lan kan rnams sdig pa dang gang bu rnams ni ga ser/ shar ba rnams ni dngul/ dngul gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni dngu/ shur ba rnams ni kris
112b2(dkon brtsegs): bai DUR+Ya'i lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni bai DUR+Ya/ shar ba rnams ni shel/ shel gyi lan kan rnams kyi ka ba dang gdang bu rnams ni shel/ shar ba rnams ni dngul las byas pa'o// khang pa brtseg
112b3(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag dril bu g.yer ba'i dra ba bkra ba blta na sdug pa rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor to// de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang /
112b4(dkon brtsegs): spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po dang bdun no// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi dri ba bkrab blta na sdug pa/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi dra ba dang / dngul kyigyi dra ba dang / bai DUR+Ya'i dra bang /
112b5(dkon brtsegs): shel gyi dru ba dang / mu ti ga dmar po'i dra ba dang / spug gi dra ba dang / rdo'i snying po'i dra bas kun nas bkab par gyur to// gdugs bkrab pa ljin sdug pa brgyad khri drug song mngon par sprul te/ de dag kyang 'di ltar gser nas/
112b6(dkon brtsegs): rdo'i snying pori bar gyi rin po che sna bdun las bsgrubs pa sha stag go// rgyal mtshan bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul te/ rgyal mtshan de dag kyang gser dang / dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel dang /
112b7(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bzhi'i rgyu las bsgrubs pa sha stag ste/ rgyal mtshan sngon po rnams ni tog ser po can/ rgyal mtshan ser po rnams ni tog sngon po can/ rgyal mtshan dmar po rnams ni tog dkar po can sha stag mngon par
113a1(dkon brtsegs): sprul to// pa dam pa dog sna tshogs can bkra ba blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur to// bla re bkrab blta na sdug pa brgyad khri drug stong yang mngon par sprul par gyur/
113a2(dkon brtsegs): te/ bla re de dag kyang gser skud kyi bla re dang / dngul skud kyi bla re dang / bai DUR+Ya'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gi bla re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re ste/ rin po che sna bdun las
113a3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs pa sha stag go// de nas bya'i rgyal po 'dab bzangs de dag gis khang pa brtsegs pa brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / gdugs brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang / rgyal mtshan brgyad khri drug stong po de dag dang /
113a4(dkon brtsegs): ba dan brgyad khri drug sdong po de dag dang / bla re brgyad khri drug stong po de dag bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang / de dag thams cad steng gi bar snang la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas so// 'di
113a5(dkon brtsegs): lta ste/ dper na glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu na sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams mgo la khyer zhing nam mkha' las song ste/ yongs 'dus brtol du gnog go/ de bzhin du khang pa brtsegs pa de dag dang /
113a6(dkon brtsegs): gdugs de dag dang / rgyal mtshan de dag dang / bdar de dgu dang / bla re de dag par snang gi nam mkha' la lding zhing / bcom ldan 'das la ldanagasum sbyor ba byed bar gyur to// de nas 'das bzas
113a7(dkon brtsegs): brgya pa bri drug stong po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal zhing / tshigs su bcad pa dag ni
113b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ rlu dang 'chi las rnam dral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gdang 'chi las rnam 'grel khyong la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can gzhal mas kha lo sbyar la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod dang /
113b2(dkon brtsegs): mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa'ang ma mchis so// bdag cag rnams kyang srid med bu yi lus ldan zhing // sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis yan lag brgyan pa dang // dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus shin tu mdzes byas
113b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i/ sangs rgyas rnam par 'dren pa khyod 'drar 'gyur bar shog/ bdag cag 'dom gang 'od kyi gzi ldan zhing // mngon 'phags gzugs kyi dam pas mdzes gyur te// spyod lam mchog dang bdag cag ldan gyur cing //
113b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba rnam sbyong mya ngan zlo bar shog/ bdag cag tshul khrims ting 'dzin rab ldan zhing // shes rab ldan pas mchog tu gyur par shog/ da ltar rnam par 'dren pa khyod lta bur// skye bo rab 'grel sangs rgyas grub
113b5(dkon brtsegs): par shog/ 'dren pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa khyod lta brag/ bdag cag 'dren pa stobs bcu ldan pa dang // ma 'dres bco brgyad chos kyi mthar phyin cing // 'jig rten mkhas pa thams cad mkhyen du shog/ bdag cag kun kyang
113b6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba dngos med dang // rmi lam sgyu 'dra gnas pa med pa dang // brag cha nam mkha' 'dra bar ston byed cing // ji ltar rnam 'dren khyod ston bzhin du shog de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bya'i rgyal po
113b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dab bzangs de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la rigs su bcad de gsol ba/ rgyal ba rnam 'dren gtso bo sangs rgyas
114a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams// rgyu ma mchis par band pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum mdzad 'di la rgyu rkyen gang lags pa// 'jig rten pan mdzad thugs rje mnga' bas gsungs// 'dab bzangs rnams
114a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis rgyal ba mchod bgyis te// bla re nam mkha' rgyas par gang ba bstan// lhar bcas 'jig rten 'di la ngo mtshar skyed// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol// 'gro ba thams cad thal mo rab sbyar cing //
114a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba'i sems dang mgu ba'i sems kyis 'khod// mkha' lding 'gro ba cir 'gyur nyam par 'tshal// rkang gnyis dam pas de dag lung bstan gsol// mi mchog khyod la khong dag mchi ba ni// 'gro ba thams cad the
114a4(dkon brtsegs): tshom med 'gyur zhing // the tshom med pas 'khor du 'jigs med 'gyur// 'dis ni sangs rgyas mnyes par bgyis shes mchi// 'khor 'di 'jigs med rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// yongs su sbyangs shing shin tu skyon
114a5(dkon brtsegs): bsal bas// rgyal bas lung bstan de dag mthong dga' ste/ slob ma mchog la bla mas bstan pa bzhin// the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gcad du gsol// rab tu dga' mdzad rjes su ldan pa mdzod/ dga' ba'i
114a6(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis 'khor 'dir 'dus gyur gyis/ rang byung mkha' lding 'gro btsor gru na gsungs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcang de slar bka' stsal pa/
114a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad zil banon stobs bcu brtson 'grus bden// rgyal ba dbang po thub pa de bzhin gshegs// 'dren pas yan lag brgyang ldan gsung dbyangs kyis// 'ang ba bzangs 'gro ba na thul bkang stsal pa// rta thul khyod
114b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis dri 'a legs par dris// 'jig rten pan phyir 'jum gangangs bstan pa// de yi 'bras bu gar ba'i yid kyis co/ the tshom sel la rab tu dga' ba skyed/ bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol zhing / stobs pa mi
114b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pazhi po gang rnam kyis// 'dren pa 'jigs med 'gyur ba bcal ba'i phyir// 'dab chags dbang pos nga la mthod leg byas// ma 'dres bco brgyad chos ni smra ba yi// phreng med du lus shin tu ma khregs pa dang // sum cu
114b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis mtshan dpe byad bzang po rnams// yongs su btsal phyi rang la mchod pa byas// rgyal ba'i tshul khrim ting 'dzin btsal ba dang // gzhan yang sangs rgyas spyod yul shes rab dang // phun sum zhing dang 'gro ba rnams
114b4(dkon brtsegs): dgrol ba// 'di dag kun btsal don du mchod pa byas// de dgang la dga' bas mthong byas pa// dud 'gro'i gnas nas de dag shi 'phos nas// lha dang brtul zhugs mthun par de dag 'dong // 'di ni ngan song srid
114b5(dkon brtsegs): pi'i tha ma yin// bskal pa bye ba gang+gA'i bye snyed du// de dag lnga mi'i nang na gnas gyur cing // rnam 'drem khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod byas nas// de dag dbang po thul ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag cing du
114b6(dkon brtsegs): song mi 'byung ste// mi khom mi 'byung mtshan dang mi ldan med// rgyal ba de dag mtshan ni kun tu mdzes// ri rab rgyal mtshan bskul pa rab 'byung 'gyur// lo ni bye ba brgyad cu bzhi bgrangs par// 'jig rten
114b7(dkon brtsegs): phan phyir 'dren pa de dag bzhugs// 'jig rten phan phyir rnam 'dren mnyam bzhags pas// lus can rnams la mnyam pa'i don mdzad 'gyur// skyob pa rdul med gyur pa de dag gi/ 'dus pa nga rgyal spangs
115a1(dkon brtsegs): pa brgyad cur 'gyur// de tshe skyob pa rdul dang bral rnams kyi// shin tu sems dul bye ba brgyad cu 'byung // 'dren pa de dag 'gro ba'i dbasal phyir// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar
115a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// mi dag de ltar 'di rnams ngargyal che// 'dab bzangs lus su gyur nas stobs po che// 'di dag sngon tshe 'das pa'i dus shig na// drang srong dkara' thub drag po'i tshogs chen gyur// stong phrag brgyad cu
115a3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa drug tshang ba ste// dka' thub spyad de rdzu 'phrul phun sum brtsal// de dag rdzu 'phrul thob nas nga rgyal gyis// dga' bas dka' thub drag dang ldan par gyur// tshul khrims ma zhig de dag nags 'dab tu// tshe zad
115a4(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos gyur te lus kyang zhig/ nga rgyal des ni mkha' lding mkha' 'gror gyur// rdzu 'phrul sems kyis rdzu 'phrul ldan par skyes// tshul khrims dag pas rgyal ba'i bstan la dang // nga rgyal gyis ni byang chub sems
115a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang bskyed// nam mkha' lding lung bstan pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / bam po bzhi pa/ de nas klu'i bu mo bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po
115a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang // nam mkha' lding gi dbang po de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ mchog tu dga' ba chen po skyes te/ de dag dga' mgu yi rang nas/ des rab tu dga' ste/ dgu' ba dang yid bde ba skyes
115a7(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs be DUR+Ya'i dra ba lnga ldi bkye ba/ mu tis dmar po'i drabs bskor ba/ gser gyi yub can bi n+yang+ga'i thur ma ba rjod gyur/
115b1(dkon brtsegs): rin po ze'i chun po sbyangs pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu cu drug mngon par sprul to// tu sngon po kha dog sngon po// sngon po lta bur ston pa/ 'od sngon po 'byung ba// rgyan sngon pos brgyan pa/ baiDUR+Ya'i srab kyis bsrabs
115b2(dkon brtsegs): pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// nor bu skar mdog gi bla re khor yug tung dbage tshang drug cu yong la// des 'khor de dag thams cad log pa gcig kyang steng gi bar snang la mngon par sprul to// dag
115b3(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi lngam+b+hi bkra ba/ mig tu mdzes pa/ blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag dgu bcu cu drug bres par mngon par sprul to// bla re de'i kho ra khor yug tu rin po che sna bdun gyi dril bu gser khi'i dra ba mngon
115b4(dkon brtsegs): par sprul te bres so// rin po che sna bdun gyi khrung khrung rkang dkar mngon par sprul to// glu'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag rnga sngon po de dag la zhon nus/
115b5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs steng gi bar snang la bres te/ nam mkha' las 'dong zhing rol mo'i sgra bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag len cing / bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum skor ba byed la/ lha'i tsan dan gyi phye
115b6(dkon brtsegs): ma dag kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ lha'i a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ut+pa la'i phye ma dang / me tog sna tshogs kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par 'thor/ me tog ut+pa la dang tsam pa 'di
115b7(dkon brtsegs): 'greng ba dag kyang 'thor/ me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dag kyang 'thor/ spos sna tshogs kyi 'phreng ba dang / na bza' dang / rgyar dag kyang 'brel te/ lha ma yin gyi ji ltar byas pa de bzhin du mchong ba rgyan
116a1(dkon brtsegs): / bo byas so// de nas de dag gis rol mo sil snyar bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag byas pa'i sgras stong gsum gyi sdong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can
116a2(dkon brtsegs): gang gis rol mo'i sgra de thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// nor bu skar mdog gi bla re de dag dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi lnga ldi de dag dang / dril bu
116a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yer kha'i dra ba de dag dang / khrung drung zang dkar de dag rlung gis bskyod pa las/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo sil snyen yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa mkhas pas dkrol ba de lta bur stan la/ de lta bur ying du 'ong shing
116a4(dkon brtsegs): mnyanan bde ba'i sgra byung bar gyur to// sgra des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur te/ sems can gang gis rgyan gyi sgra de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa/
116a5(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byer mi ldog par gyur to// de nas glu'i bu mo de dag gis me tog rnam pa sna rdzogs kyi char dang / spos chu rnam pa snga rdzogs kyi char mngon pa bab par 'gyur te/ me tog gi char de/
116a6(dkon brtsegs): 'bab pa'i tshe/ spos kyi dri zhim po'i ngang byung ste/ 'gro zhing ldog go// spos chu'i char de bab pas kyang ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po'i khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rngab tu gyur te/ spos kyi
116a7(dkon brtsegs): dri des kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur to// sems can gang gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las
116b1(dkon brtsegs): phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gis gdugs bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rta bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug dang / rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa drug po de dag gis btson
116b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa de dag par snang gyi nam mkha' la 'khod de// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bsko/
116b3(dkon brtsegs): ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// klu yi bu mo mkhas pa de dag yi rangs dga' mgu yid kyis
116b4(dkon brtsegs): su byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing shAkya thub la der ni mchod pa chen po byas// rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi gdugs rnams mngon sprul te// bde bar gshegs la mchod cing rab tu dul ba'i yid kyis
116b5(dkon brtsegs): chags dang bral// rgyan gyis legs brgyan bye ba dgu bcu drug gi rta rnams mngon sprul te// kha dog sngo zheng rgyan kyang sngo ba'i rtal rgyal mtshan sngon pos brgyar// de dag thams cad bar snang dong nas thub la rta yis
116b6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byed// klu yi bu mo de dag dang ba'i yid kyis thub la mgos phyag 'tshal// mchog la mchod pa'i don du klu yi gnas nas glu yi sil snyan gyis// mchod pa'i 'os gyur 'dren pa shAkya thub la der ni
116b7(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa byas// sil snyan de dag bde bar gshegs la mchod pa'i sgra de khams gsum grag/ sgra de thos pa'i sems can khrag khrig dag ni byang chub yang dag zhugs// de dag rnams kyis der sprul mkha'
117a1(dkon brtsegs): la bla re chen po gcig tu gyur// phyogs bcur dpag tshad drug cur rgyas shing 'gro ba thams cad khebs par gyur// nor bu rin chen skar ma'i mdog gi gzi brjid phyogs su 'bar zhing
117a2(dkon brtsegs): gsal// klu yi bu mo dga' nas 'gro ba'i mdun du rgyal la mchod pa byas// gzhal du med pa'i sems bskyed dga' nas byang chub zhib tshol byed cing // 'jig rten don byang bde gshegs sangs rgyas 'jig rten
117a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa grub par shog/ ji ltar slob bcu mnga' ba khyod ni sems can sdug bsngal 'grel pa ltar// chos kyang bstan de sems can nyon mongs sdug bsngal bsgribs pa khrag khrig dgrol// chos rnams sgyu ma
117a4(dkon brtsegs): smig rgyu 'dra zhing dbu ba lta bur nyam chung la// char rgyun chul phog pa'i chu bur lta bur 'jig cing bdag po med// me long nang gi gzugs brnyan 'dra bar 'gro ba thams cad brtags nas ni// 'gro ba dag la chos kyi rang
117a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yang dag de nyid bstan par bgyi// sgyu ma bkod pa lta bur ma mchis brdzun pa byis pa rmongs bgyid pa// skye bo mi mkhas ji bzhin ma 'tshal ba dag ma rung rab bgyid pa// byis pa rmongs bgyid chos rnams sbyis/
117a6(dkon brtsegs): med khyod kyi de ltar legs par gzigs// de dag ji ltar gzigs pa de bzhin de dag sems can rnams la bstan// ji ltar sa chen 'di la sprin 'gribs gyur na ri ltar gda' ba yang // yang dag tu na ri ltar ngo bo
117a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid kyis de la gnas ma mchis// de ltar 'gro ba thams cad rang bzhin ma mchis dbang po rmongs par bgyid// shes pas brtags nas skye bo mkhas pa dag ni rmongs par 'gyur ma mchis// yang dag tu na 'gro
117b1(dkon brtsegs): ba zlums cang rang ba'i rnam mchis khyod ston pas// des na 'dren pa rgyal ba khyod la skye bo mkhas pa mi phyed 'gyur// khyod kyi sras rnams chos kyis yongs su ni ma nas rdzab la rnam pa'ang // 'din gyis
117b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i skye bo'i yul min 'gro ba 'di ni sgra phyir 'brang // de lta lags pas sdig med yang dag ston pa byis pa'i skye bo'i mgon// skyabs dang dpung gnyen gnas dang rten dang rtsa lag khyod la skyabs su mchi//
117b3(dkon brtsegs): gzhal yas byang chub de btsal slad du rnam par 'dren pa khyod la mchod// sangs rgyas gyur nas rtogs bgyid sdig bral 'jig rten don rnams brjid pa'ashogade nas bcom ldan 'das
117b4(dkon brtsegs): kyis klu'i bu mo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chung nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la rigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rtenan ning jog rten
117b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa rnam par 'dren mchog khyod 'dzum mdzad// dpal sdug 'dzum pa mdzad la rgyu ma mchis pa bdag gis yong ma mthong // mi yi dbang po'i dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu ni yang dag gsungs//
117b6(dkon brtsegs): thos lha mi lha min tshogs dang klu yi bu mo gsang ba pa// dri za rnams kyang skyob pa'i dgongs pa thos nas yid ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'jig rten dag na 'jig rten rnam 'dren khyod kyis rgyu rnams thams cad
117b7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// rgyal bas chos gang rgyu dang rnam pas mkhyen par ma gyur yong ma mchis// de ltas bde gshegs rgyal ba khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud 'dzum rgyu gsungs// de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad yi rang/
118a1(dkon brtsegs): dog pa chad par 'gyur// thub pa bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la don kyang thob par mchi// 'khor rnams 'di dag don myong gyur nas yid ni rab tu zhi bar 'gyur// kun rtog dpa
118a2(dkon brtsegs): du mi 'gyur byang chub yid kyis rgyal ba'i spyod nyan 'gyur// bde gshegs khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad don thos rang 'byung nyid du nges par 'byung // 'khor 'di rgyal ba khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum mthong the tshom 'tshal gyur te/
118a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal dogs bcas yid mi bde zhing chos la sem nyi gang 'tshal ba/ de dag la ni thub pa ston pas dogs bsal the tshom dgum du gsol// drang srong khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum bstan myur du bka' stsol the
118a4(dkon brtsegs): chom khum// rgyal ba gang gis de ring yid ni rnam par sbyangs shing bdud bcom thul// su zhig yid rab tshim nas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dam pa bgyis// 'di ni su yi mthu lags ston pa 'gro ba'i
118a5(dkon brtsegs): mdun du 'di bka' stsol// thos nas bdag cag yi rangs mchog tu dga' ba skyes nas bde bar 'gyur// khyod kyi zhabs kyi drung du 'dus pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom 'tshal// 'dzum rgyu dga' ba skyed pa
118a6(dkon brtsegs): bka' stso la thub pa the tshom bsal du gsol// de thos lnga dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gsung sgra yang dag thos nas de dag yid dga' 'gyur//
118a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul legs so rgyal ba'i dgongs pa 'dzum pa 'di ni legs par dris// klu yi bu mos
118b1(dkon brtsegs): mchod tshe 'jig rten pan byirangs ni 'dzum pa bstan// de yi zlas bu bstan gyis yid gnyis thab spangs pa'i sems kyis nyon// gang 'angadi dron drangs ni 'dzum pa 'dir mdzad nga mi tshig la nyon// klum bu
118b2(dkon brtsegs): mo 'di dag chags med yid kyis byang chub yang dag zhugs// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rnam pa shig blo ldan dog med legs par gnas// 'di na byed med tshor meng gang zag med cing skyeb po yang med// chos
118b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams 'di dag brdzun zhing smig rgyur mtshungs la me long gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'di dag rnams kyis mchod byas byas gzo blo gros yang dag ngas shes te// rgyal ba'i chos nyid dang ni 'gro ba stong zhing bdag po
118b4(dkon brtsegs): med mthong legs// mchod pa rnam par phye zhing legs par bkod pa 'di dag sgyu ma 'dra// byang chub gzhal yas gang du smon lam btab pa de yang de 'di 'drar stong // ngal gzhal yas mchod pa de byas pa/
118b5(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gro ba stong skyes pas// grulas shi bos nas pa ni lga gnas brgya byir gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gsum song ste lnga yi nang du dga' bar tshe rdzogs nas// ma smang grags dang ldan
118b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lha gnas 'thab bral gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur// 'thab bral lnga nang gnas te lha mi gnas su lha yi dga' ba spyod// lha gyur bde gshegs sras rnams de na mi nang du gnas par 'gyur// rgyal
118b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i sras rnams 'thab bral dga' ba spyad nas tshe tshad zad pa dang // dga' ldan gnas su lha yi grong khyer lha dang brtul zhugs 'dra bar 'gyur// de dag de na lha yi bu mos bskor nas lha yi dga'
119a1(dkon brtsegs): #baspyod// pad+ma rgyas mi chags pa bzhin du bde gshegs mi gnas blo can gnas// 'gro ba thams cad stong par rtogs rig blo las nyams par yong mi 'gyur// skyob pa rnams kyi dran pa
119a2(dkon brtsegs): rdo la brkos pa bzhin du yong mi nyams// de dag dga' ldan gnas der gnas te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni// tshe tshad yongs su zad nas de tshe rab 'phrul dag tu 'gro bar 'gyur// bde gshegs ma smad grags ldan
119a3(dkon brtsegs): der yang lha mo'i tshogs kyis mchod 'gyur te// mi gnas blo gros ldan pa tshe tshang bar du gnas na gnas par 'gyur// de dag gnas der rab 'phrul gyur te lha yi dga' ba spyad nas ni// mkhas pa tshe zad blo gros ldan pa
119a4(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi mthar ni byin myur nas// 'dren pa bsam pa dag pa chags med ying ldan chos kyi bsam pa can// chos dang ldan rnams gzhan 'phrul gnas su lnga 'du bar ni 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag lha gnas de ni gnas
119a5(dkon brtsegs): shing lha yi dga' ba spyod par 'gyur// bde gshegs ma rmongs blo ldan de dag rang gi tshe tshang gnas par 'gyur// mya ngan 'das ltar lha yi 'dod pa'i yon tan ma'am nyid zhi bar rtogs// bsam gtan bsam pa/
119a6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs gnas ma smad grogs dang ldan par 'gro bar 'gyur// tshangs pa'i gnas su bsam gtan mkhas shing bsam gtan 'bras bu spyad gyur nas// der gnas dpe med gyur cing byang chub yid kyis bskal
119a7(dkon brtsegs): par gnas par 'gyur// de dag bskal par tshangs gnas 'thun par ye shes don gnyer brtul zhugs bzang // thub pa mkhas pa thabs mkhas de dag 'jig rten don ni mtha' yas byed// mkhas thub
119b1(dkon brtsegs): de dag de na bsam gtan spyod yul bsam gtan chags pa med// bsam gtan bde ba mnyam nyid 'drar rig byang chub phyir ni dbang po ni// kun tu grol yid drang srong byang chub phyir ni byang chub blo dang ldan// mya
119b2(dkon brtsegs): ngan 'das pa lta bur bsam gtan blo gcig ni ba'i mtshan nid 'gyur// bde bar gshegs dang bcom ldan sras po byang chub zhi ba yongs tshol ba// tshangs pa'i yid ldan 'jig rten don byed de dag tshangs pas/
119b3(dkon brtsegs): de na gnas// kun kyang tshangs pa'i blo ldan mthar phyin sha stag byang chub don gyi phyir// rang byung dgongs pa khams gsum lam las 'das pa'i nges par 'byung ba ston// tshangs pa la ni gus pa bskyed nas gro
119b4(dkon brtsegs): ba byang chub tshol bar 'gyur// tshangs pa'i bsam pa rang byung bsam pa zhes 'byung mthar thug shes nas ni// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa mchog la brtson pa de dag 'gro ba la// ci nas chos tshul 'bras
119b5(dkon brtsegs): bu myur du shes 'gyur de ltar chos kyang ston// de dag tshangs gnas de na gnas shing 'jig rten dag la byang chub phyir// phan pa byas nas slog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang po byang chub bkod// rgyal bkun
119b6(dkon brtsegs): la mchod phyir 'jig rten khams mang khrag khrig 'gro bar 'gyur// dbang po zhi ba de dag bskal pa skar ma 'dra la rgyal bar 'gyur// lha dang mi dang klu dang 'dab bzangs dag dang lha min bcas pa dang // dri za
119b7(dkon brtsegs): thul bum mi 'am ci tshogs gnod sbyin 'gror bcas dgare zhing mgu// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub tu mi mongs sbyangs chos kyi stobs rnyed pa// de dag thams cad mi rangs thal sbyar bde bar gshegs
120a1(dkon brtsegs): la mgos phyag 'tshal// klu'i bu mo lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas klu'i bu mo de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos/
120a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su rdzogs par yang rig nas/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / nye dga' bo la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des sems can thams cad kyi
120a3(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa mkhyen cing / bcom ldan 'das de la mi mkhyen pa 'am/ ma gzigs pa 'am/ ma gsan pa 'am/ mngom du ma mdzad pa gang yang med cing / bcom ldan 'das kyi chos ni legs par gsungs
120a4(dkon brtsegs): tenayang dag par mthong ba/ nad med pa/ dus chad pa med pa/ nye bar gtong ba// 'di mthong ba la don yod pa/ mkhas pa rnams kyis rang gis rig par bya ba ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs
120a5(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba mnga' ba'o// 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ rgod pa mi brtan pa/ mi gnas pa rnams kyis kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyis chos bstan pa yongs su shes pa dang / de
120a6(dkon brtsegs): ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis slob ma dge 'dun yang legs pa zhugs pa/ drang por zhugs pa/ rigs par zhugs pa/ 'thun par zhugs pa dang / 'di ltar bud med du gyur pa/ 'dod chags dang /
120a7(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang / gti mug mi bzad pa dang ldan pa rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rab la 'jug pa ni ngo mtshar che'o snyam te/ ngo mtshar thob pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
120b1(dkon brtsegs): b+hi 'jam bu'i gling rgya mtsho'i ro'i mthus gtugs pa thams cad spos kyi sprin chen pos kun nas yog par byas te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten 'di spos kyid kyis khyab par byas so//
120b2(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi dri ngad des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri nga tshor bar 'gyur pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
120b3(dkon brtsegs): chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyang dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad mu tig dmar pos pus mo nub tsam du rgyas
120b4(dkon brtsegs): par gang bar byas so// n+ya gro d+ha'i kun dga' ra ba de'ang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches rgal par bkang ngo // glu'i me tog gi 'dum khang rgyar dpa ga tshad drug cu yod pa rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba dang ldan
120b5(dkon brtsegs): pa dag mngon par sprul to// klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa dag kyang mngon par sprul te sgra byung ngo // klu'i me tog gi 'dum yang du la'ang me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bye ba phrag dgu bcu bres
120b6(dkon brtsegs): so/ rin po che sna bdun gyi ka ba de dag kyang bai DUR+Ya'i dra bas legs par brgyan to// 'dum pang do'i gzhi'ang rin thang med pa'i nor bu rin po ches yog par byas pa'i gyur to// 'dun khong de'i gzhi ni 'jam
120b7(dkon brtsegs): pa bsgyur du rung ba ste/ 'di lta ste/ dper na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi rdo leb ar mo nig ltar 'jam pa/ kha dog bai DUR+Ya'i lhar 'dug pa/ ka tsa lon di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ nyam dga' ba
121a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can mthong ba rnams kyi mig/ mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba mi dang lha rnams kyi yid du 'ong ba'o// nor bu rin po che sna tshogs de dag gi nang nas// nor bu la la las
121a2(dkon brtsegs): ni me 'byung / la la las ni chu 'byung ba sha sdug ste/ de la'ang la la las ni chu kha dog sngon po 'byung ka la la las ni chu kha dog ser po 'byung la la las ni chu kha dog dmar po 'byung / la la las ni chu
121a3(dkon brtsegs): kha dog dkar po 'byung / la la las ni chu kha dog sna tshogs 'byung ngo // nor bu la la las ni bde bar bsil ba'i rlung 'byung / nor bu la la las ni de ma yin pa'i yo byad gzhan dag bsams pa bzhin du 'byung /
121a4(dkon brtsegs): la la las ni snum gyi bya ba byed/ la la las ni me long gi bya ba byed/ 'khor de dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de'i nang du snang bar gyur to// ser skya'i gnas na sems can gang ji snyed cig rgyu ba de
121a5(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang du snang bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag rnam par sprul pa mdzad pa/
121a6(dkon brtsegs): nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'ang nor bu rin po che de dag gi nang na bzhugs par mthong bar gyur to// 'dum khang gi gzhi de'i 'og nas kyang klu'o mthus gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par 'thon
121a7(dkon brtsegs): par gyur to// rgyal mtshan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog gi lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / spos kyi lda ldi rnam pa sna tshog dang / rin po che lnga ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang /
121b1(dkon brtsegs): mu tig gi 'phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang / me tog brtsegs ma'i lda ldi rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rta rnam pa sna tshogs dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyang 'thon par gyur to// de nas
121b2(dkon brtsegs): klu'i rgyal po dga' bo dang / zhe dga' la sogs pa klu bye ba phrag dgu bcus rje de rnams sngon du bkri ste/ rkang gis dong nas bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ nor bu rin po che ka tsa len
121b3(dkon brtsegs): di ka ltar reg na bde ba dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// 'dun khang gi gzhi de nas rin po che gang dag mngon par 'thon pa de dag thams cad kyang / bcom
121b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa'i steng du char bzhin du bab par gyur to// klu'i rol mo sil snyan dpag tu med pa de dag kyang steng gi bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// de nas glu bye ba
121b5(dkon brtsegs): phrag dgu bcu po de dag gi bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ cang mi zer bar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa
121b6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su dran par byed cing gamig mi 'dzum pa lta la/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi yon tan 'dod pa'i phyir ldag pa'i bsam pas byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par gyur to// de nas
121b7(dkon brtsegs): de dag gis cung zad cig tu mi smra ban/ bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byas nas/ so so nas bla gos brag pa gcig la gzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lpangs la btsug nas/
122a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba bdud de/ bcom ldan 'das la yan lag lngas phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/
122a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan brgya rdzogs pa brtul zhugs legs spyad pa// dkara' thub dgyes pa dri med thugs rje can// rin chen 'byung gnas bcas pa'i sa spangs te// bde gshegs khyod ni grong khyer mngon par byung /
122a3(dkon brtsegs): lo drug par du dkar thub dka' mdzad de// rgyal po khyod kyis bdud rtsi ma brnyes kyang // bde gshegs khyod kyi thugs ni zhum ma gyur// thub pa khyod kyis byang chub thugs kyi spyad// ji ltar 'dren gyi
122a4(dkon brtsegs): lA ma'i bla ma khyod// 'grol phan bzhed dkar thub spyad mdzad de// 'jig rten mgon po sdug bsngal ltar gyur pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// thub pa dbu dang spyan ni btang ba
122a5(dkon brtsegs): dang // byang chub sems ni ji ltar sgrub mdzad pa// bde bar gshegs kyi dka' spyang thos gyur na// de thos pas kyang bdag cag bde mi 'gyur// gang tshe ka ling rgyal pos bzod smra ba'i// zhabs
122a6(dkon brtsegs): dang phyag dang snyan rnams gtubs gyur te// de bzhin shangs bcang rgyal ba mi 'khrugs pa// de thos pas kyang bdag cag yid mi dga'// phug ron skyabs su mchis pa ma gtang ste// gang
122a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren khyod srang la btsal myur ba// rgyal ba'i de thos pas kyang mi bde ste// bde gshegs byang chub spyod pa sdug bsngal che// bdag cag mi 'tshal ma lags ci zhen// bde bar gshegs la 'gros
122b1(dkon brtsegs): gnod bgyis pa// ngan song mun par lhung bas bde gshegs kyi// sdug bsngal spyod pa dran nas mi dga' lags// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dren pa blo 'phags dang // bde ga shegs spyod pa ma'i tshe blo
122b2(dkon brtsegs): g+hur dang // sgrub pa'i rtse na de la mi gnod pa// 'jig rten 'dren pa spyod de bka' stsal gsol// mtha' yas blo mnga' bde gshegs spyod pa la// rngub pa klu tshogs 'di dag rab tu brtson// ji ltar
122b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi bka' bzhin spyod 'gyur ba// de ltar bde gshegs byang chub lam bstan gsol// rga shi ma mchis go 'phang thob 'tshal zhing // klu tshogs 'di rnams thub pa sgom par gnas// 'gro ba 'di dag pa
122b4(dkon brtsegs): bar 'dul 'gyur ba'i// brtul zhugs spyod de bde gshegs bka' stsal gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i mchod pa de dag kyang gzigs/ lhag pa'i bsam pas
122b5(dkon brtsegs): smon lam btab pa de dag kyang thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni chos nyid de sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams gang gi tshe 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe la dog snga tshogs dang / kha dog
122b6(dkon brtsegs): du ma'i 'od zer bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas byung ste/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags nas phyir log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo//
122b7(dkon brtsegs): nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshig su bcad de gsol pa/ brtul zhugs bzang po dge sbyong thub pa rnams/ rgyu med rgyal ba 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dren pa bde gsheg
123a1(dkon brtsegs): thugs rje che mnga' ba// mtshungs med bcom ldan 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol// tshogs kyi slob dpon skye bo 'di dag ni// 'dzum rgyu nyam 'tshal khyod kyi zhal du lha// yid ni
123a2(dkon brtsegs): zhum gyur the tshom 'tshal zhing mchis// mkhas pa the tshom rnam par bsal du gsol// 'jig rten mkhas pa ston pa shAkya thub// de ring su zhig yid ni yongs su dgar// gang gis bdud kyi dbang po mthong
123a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur te// rmongs par bgyid nas yid ni mi dkar bgyis// tshogs kyi slob dpon 'dren pa su zhig gis// bde gshegs chos nyid yab la bsnyen bkur bgyis// bde bar gshegs la mchod pa dam pa bgyis/
123a4(dkon brtsegs): shAkya seng ge bkar stso la the tshom khum// sor bcu thal mo sbyar ba mgor gzhag cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thub pa'i zhal du lha// tshogs kyi slob dpon the tshom bsal du gsol// 'dren pa 'dzum pa mdzad
123a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// de thos skye bo 'di dag dgar 'gyur te/ rgyal bas dgongs pa'i tshul yang rtogs par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa 'khor rnams rim bgyis na// gzhan du mi sems nan tan gnas
123a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ thub mkhas 'dren pa tshogs kyi slob dpon gyis// tshangs 'dra yan lagang rgyang
123a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan gsung brjod kyis/ rta thul skyon med sems kyis dang byos la// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyud mnyan par gyis// klu yi bdag po 'di dag dang gyur te// 'gro ba zil gyis mnan nas tshong pa byas/
123b1(dkon brtsegs): bob bar yongs spyir byung 'i phyir// sangs rgyas byung chub 'dini yongs su tshol// rdzing rjechen pos rnam 'dren med pa me/ 'gro ba bltas nas sdus bsngal cis mi snrum// 'grobs byang chub tu chen rdzo rgya
123b2(dkon brtsegs): la 'dren pa dag ni spro bar yong mi 'gyur// zhi gnas dga' ba ye shes stobs ldan stobs// tshad med stong pa de bzhin smon med pa// namathar sgrogasum yongs su bsgoms nas su// shim du myong
123b3(dkon brtsegs): dag ying can bde bar 'gro// 'gro ba mtha' dag mnyam pa nyid rtogs te// gang tshe rgyal bas shes rab mtshan thos nas// mnyam pa'i sems dang byams dang snying rje thog/ 'grol snying rje chen po rab bskyed nas//
123b4(dkon brtsegs): snying brtse ldan pa mchog tu snying rje can// 'jig rten mkhas pa bla na med par 'gyur// rgyal ba de dgra 'gro 'di mtshungs babral nas// de dag dgra bcom rnam par 'dren par 'gyur// rtag tu bdag med
123b5(dkon brtsegs): tshig mi nan byed cing // 'jig rten gtam gyi rgyung la mi 'jug ste// de dag bde bar gshegs kyi 'chi med thob/ den bdud med mu stegs tshogs kyang med// 'dren pa bde gshegs snying rje ldan pa yi/
123b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba de dga' gro ba kun mos byed// bde gshegs bka' dang tshig rnams tham cad dang // bde bar gshegs kyi dgongs la mos byed 'gyur// srid par bde gshegs rnams kyi spyad spyod cing // rab
123b7(dkon brtsegs): bder 'gro ba yongs smin byed par 'gyur// mtshungs med thub pa bde bar myur du yang // yongs su 'tshang rgya 'chi med thob par 'gyur// thob nas 'gro ba dag kyang mos par 'gyur// skye bo kun kyang gzugs
124a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi cho ga dang ldan// 'gro ba thams cad bde gshegs de dag gi/ dgongs pa'i tshig ni mngon du shes par 'gyur// phyugs dang bya dang gnod sbyin mi de dag/ rang byung dgongs min
124a2(dkon brtsegs): cung zad byed mi 'gyur// de dag kun tu chos rtogs dran dang ldan// bde bar gshegs rnams 'chi med thob par 'gyur// de dag tshig thos sems can gang yang ni// bstan pa de la mi dgar 'gyur ba
124a3(dkon brtsegs): meng / bde gshegs de dag gsung la dga' ba yi// 'gro ba'i che med yang dag 'thob par 'gyur// de tshe 'gro bas rgyal ba'i dgongs legs rtogs// rga ba dang ni na dang 'chi ba dang // mya ngan smre sngags
124a4(dkon brtsegs): 'don las yongs su 'grol// tshig de thos nas ngar 'dzin med par 'gyur// glu yi bsam pa shAkya seng ge la// yongs su zhus nas ji ltar de dag rnams// gzhal yas byang chub thob nas thub rnams/
124a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis// ye shes 'jug 'gyur de skad sras la bstam// klu rnams lung bstan ying du 'ong ba yi// rgyal ba'i gsung thos 'khor rnams yid dga' ste// de la yid ni rab tu ni gyur nas// dga' ba'i
124a6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyis rgyal ba'i skyabs su song // glu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// / de nas rdul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyis/ lha ma yin rnams dang // namam pa' lding
124a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang // klu'i bu mo rnams dang // glu rnams kyi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas// tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas de
124b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di lta de bzhin gshegs pa la shes rab kyi mnga' rgya chen po mnga' zhing / 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa rgya chen po 'di lta bu byas pas kyang ngo mtshar du mi dngongs te/
124b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na rje mtsho chen po ni rgya che zhing yongs su rgyas pa yin pas mtho ba'am// dma' bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang chos thams cad la the tshom mi mngag zhing / yon tan
124b3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad yongs su rdzogs la/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yangs pa mnga' bas/ mchod pa 'di lta bu dgra bzhis kyang / mtho ba 'am/ dma' bar mi 'gyur zhing / ngo mtshar du mi dgongs
124b4(dkon brtsegs): ba ni ngo mtshar shin tu che'o snyam mo// de nas grul bum bye ba phrag bco brgyad po de dag gis bdag cag nyid kyi mchod pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ rin po che sna bdun gyi bla re
124b5(dkon brtsegs): bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par sprul te/ 'di lta ste/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re dang / bai DUn+da'i bla re dang / shel gyi bla re dang / mu tig dmar po'i bla re dang / spug gri bla
124b6(dkon brtsegs): re dang / rdo'i snying po'i bla re sha stag go/ rin po che'i bla re de dag la'ang me tog sna tshogs kyi 'breng po'i lda ldi mngon par sprul te/ gser gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni dngul gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga/
124b7(dkon brtsegs): ldi bkye/ dngul gyi skud pa'i bla re rnams la ni gser gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ bai DUR+Ya'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga ldi bkye/ shel gyi bla re rnams la ni bai DUR+Ya'i me
125a1(dkon brtsegs): tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ mu tig dmar po'i bla re rnams la ni spug gi me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lda ldi bkye/ spug gi bla re rnams la ni mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi 'phreng ba'i lnga/
125a2(dkon brtsegs): ldi bkye ga rdo'i snying po'i bla re rnams la ni shel gyi me tog gi 'greng ba'i lnga ldi bkye ba sha stag mngon par sprul to// shing rta bkra ba blta na sdug pa bye ba phrag bco brgyad kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag kya
125a3(dkon brtsegs): gser nas rdo'i snying po'i bar du'o// shing rta de dag gi steng du rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs thur ma brgya pa gser gyi yu ba can dang / bai DUR+Ya'i yu ba can dang / shel gyi u ba can bye ba phrag bco brgyad mngon par
125a4(dkon brtsegs): sprul to// gdugs de dag la'ang rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyi me tog gi lnga ldi mngon par sprul to// 'di lta ste/ gser gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / dngul gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / bai DUR+Ya'i me tog gi lnga ldi dang /
125a5(dkon brtsegs): shel gyi me tog gi lda ldi dang / mu tig dmar po'i me tog gi lnga ldi dang / klu'i nir bu'i me tog gi lnga ldi sha stag go/ mu tig dmar po'i dra ba dag kyang mngon par sprul te/ de dag gis godugs de dag dang / me
125a6(dkon brtsegs): tog gi 'phreng ba de dag gi gzugs byas so// grul bum gyi rol mo sil snyan dag kyang mngon par sprul to// shing rta de dag re re zhing yang bla re de dag re re rjes su 'brang bar gyur to// de nas
125a7(dkon brtsegs): grul bum de dag rin po che sna bdun gyi shing rtarnga de dag la zhon te/ rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs dang / bla ri dang / me tog de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/ mchod pa byed cing bcom ldan 'das pa
125b1(dkon brtsegs): gleng gi bar snang las lan gsum bskor to// bsgo nas shing rta de dag las babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu khod da// bcom ldan 'das la
125b2(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ thams cad du yang mi bsnyengs mngar dbang can// thub pa chen po mi mtho mi dma' ste// ri yi rgyal po lhun po ri 'dra ba// mchod pa rgya chen 'di dag pa
125b3(dkon brtsegs): su gsol// 'gro ba thams cad ming dang mtshan ma dang // tha snyad tsam mkhyen thub pa chags mi mngar// 'dren pa khyod kyis ting 'dzin zhi bsgrubs pas// shes rab ldan la dregs pa yong mi mnga'/
125b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba khyod kyis 'gro ba sgyu 'drar mkhyen// rang bzhin stong ste rmi lam dag 'dra dang // chu zla nam mkha'i smig rgyu lta bur ni// bde bar gshegs pas 'gro ba 'di dag gzigs// dri za'i grong khyer dri
125b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar snang gyur kyang // grong khyer de ni phyogs bcu kun na med// gzhan du grong khyer de ni ming tsam ste// de bzhin bde bar gshes pas 'gro 'di gzigs// mchod pa 'di kun brag mji bzhin te// shing
125b6(dkon brtsegs): gdugs dang bla re sil snyan dang // me tog rgyal mtshan thal mo sbyar bgyis pa/ brag cha ji bzhin de dag de ltar gdang // 'dren pa mchod pa 'di bgyis bdag cag kyang // sangs rgyas rkang gnyis
125b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu myur 'gyur shog/ rmi lam 'dra bar 'gro ba bdag cag gis// rtogs bgyis rgyal ba khyod bzhin bstan par bgyis// nad dang rga shis yongs su gtses gyur pa'i// skye bo mthong nas bdag
126a1(dkon brtsegs): cag rnams kyis kyang // byang chub myur thob rga shi med pa'i gnas// gang thos grol 'gyur 'grol bstan par bgyi// bdag cag byang chub lam mchog sangs rgyas nas// sem
126a2(dkon brtsegs): can blo stor rnams la bstan par bgyi// thub pa 'khrugs med chos rnams rab ston pa// mya ngan 'das mchog sems can bstan par bgyi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi grul bum
126a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ston pa rgyu med 'dzum pa mi mdzad de//
126a4(dkon brtsegs): rnam 'dren 'jig rten mkhas la mtshar myi mnga'// ngo mtshar 'gyur med rgyal bas 'dzum mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu legs par bka' stsal nyan par 'tshal// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum pa
126a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom som nyi 'tshal// the tshom 'tshal ba rnams kyi the tshom khum// mi yi dbang po'i 'dzum pa'i rgyu yang gsungs// gang gis de ring chos la yid bzhag
126a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur// de ring gang gis chos kyi rgyal yang mthong // deng sus sangs rgyas bsngags pa'i mchod pa bgyis// mi yi dam pa bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// de ring 'dus byas sdug bsngal shes myur na/
126a7(dkon brtsegs): gang gis 'du byas gyur pa'i yid cig bcom// gang zhig yang dag mtha' la mi g.yo gnas// rnam dag thugs mnga' bdag ni nyan par 'tshal// de ring su yis 'khor bcas bdud rnams bcom//
126b1(dkon brtsegs): thub pa ston pa deng sus mnyes par bgyis// 'dren pa de ring su zhig gcing rnyed gyur// the tshom mchis te deng bdag de nyan 'tshal// 'dzum mdzad de yi don ni mnyan skad du// 'gro ba kun
126b2(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar cing gnas// 'dren pa the tshom 'tshal ba'i the tshom gsol// rkang gnyis dam pas lung yang bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa
126b3(dkon brtsegs): rta thul lo tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// 'dzum pa'i rgyu 'dri yongs su dris pas na// 'gro ba'i don yang khyod kyis byas par gyur/
126b4(dkon brtsegs): de don bstan byas rta thul mnyan par gyis// grul bum tshogs kyis nga la mchod byas te// zhi ba'i chos la de dag yid kyang bzhag/ mtshar med nga mthong nas ni ngam gyur te// zhi ba'i chos la de
126b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag yid kyang bzhag/ de dag rnams kyis de ring nga mchod de// zhi ba'i chos la blo gros rnam par btang // lam stor skye bo rnams la snying brtse zhing // bsam pa thag pas snying rje chen po bskyed// snying
126b6(dkon brtsegs): rje bas na nga la mchod pa byas// rab tu lam stor rnams la byams par bsams// mkhas pa de dag las de byas pas na// grul bum skye gnas shi 'phos brtul zhugs bzung // brgya byin
126b7(dkon brtsegs): lha yi drung du 'dong bar 'gyur// thugs thub byams don mdzad ston drung du'ang 'dong // des ni cung zad yang dang yang bstan te// phyir zhing chos la the tshom med par 'gyur// de dag bskal pa gang+gA'i
127a1(dkon brtsegs): bye snyed du// zhing nas zhing du rnam par rgyu byed cing // bdag nyid chen po'i chos la mchod pa byed// go cha chen po rab tu bsgos yid kyis// de dag skyo ba med par 'jig rten khams/
127a2(dkon brtsegs): khrag khrig mtha' yas rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur// skye bo mang po'i don byed 'drer 'gyur te// ngo mtshar med ces bya ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag zhing rnams gang du 'gro rgyu ba// der ni 'gro bas rgyal ba/
127a3(dkon brtsegs): byung bar shes// de dag thabs kyis ma 'ongs dus dag na// ngo mtshar med par skye bo rnam grol byed// rgyal ba ngo mtshar med par zhing sbyong zhing // rdzogs pa'i byang chub bla med zhi ba tshol// de dag tshol
127a4(dkon brtsegs): ba la yang mi gnas te// 'di ltar bla med byang chub gnas phyir ro// de ltar 'dzum rgyu rgyal bas lung bstan cing // bde bar gshegs pas 'jig rten dogs bsngal te// rdul bum mchod pa'i 'bras
127a5(dkon brtsegs): bunges zos nas// 'gro ba the tshom bsal te dga' bar 'gyur// tshul bum lung bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas de'i dri dri za bye ba skrag sum cu cu drug gis/
127a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams dang / klu'i bu mo rnams dang / glu rnams dang / rdul bum rnams kyi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas// tshim ming mgul lo rangs te/ ra
127a7(dkon brtsegs): nyungs zhing ga' ba dang / ming bde bskyes nas ngo mi 'thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi dbyings 'gyur ba med pa'ang mang dag par bka' stsal pa bya ba rnams ca
127b1(dkon brtsegs): sang da par bsnun te/ dge ba'i rgyu ba 'phel du'ang bstan+ta la/ chos bang 'a'ang lung bstan pa med par yang yang dag par bstan pa 'di ni ngo mtshar mad ngo snyam nas// de dag gas chosas
127b2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu khong du chud de// de bzhin gshegs pa la rim gro bya ba'i sems rgya chen po skyes nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mos par gyur te/ rab tu dga' ba'i yid dang
127b3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa de dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// glang po ches srungs kyi bu de dag re re
127b4(dkon brtsegs): zhing mgo bo bye ba brag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ mgo bo re re zhing so bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug drug/ sau re re lwa'ang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu re re zhing yang pad+ma bdun bdun/ pad+ma re re zhing
127b5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'dab ma bye ba phra ba stong stong // 'dab ma re re zhing yang lnga'i bu mo bdun badzin/ lha'i bu mo re re zhing yang 'khor rgyan thams cad kyi brtan pa lha'i bdug spos rdzogs pa bdun bdun nga
127b6(dkon brtsegs): pad+ma'i lo ma'i mtha' mtha' nA 'khod pas bskor ba mngon par sprul to// glang po ches srungs kyi bu de dag gi mgo re re la'ang rin po che sku bdun gyi gdugs nas/ rin po che sna bdun gyi dra ba dag
127b7(dkon brtsegs): gis gzungs byas pa dang ga rin po che sna bdun gyi lda ldi bres pa'i bar dang ldan pa bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug mngon par sprul to// glang po che'i mgo bo thams cad la'ang lha'i spos kyi bla re sna tshog
128a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che sna tshogs kyi lda ldi bres pa sha stag mngon par sprul to// de nas dri zad de dag glang po che sa srungs kyi bu bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag la khon teg lnga'i rol mo sas
128a2(dkon brtsegs): snyan len cing nam mkha' la rgyu ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan sum bcu rtsa drug tu bskor ba byas nas/ lha'i tsan dan gyi bye mas bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to//
128a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i a ka ru'i bye ma dang / lha'i ta ma la'i lo ma dang / ut+pa la'i phye ma dang / lha'i gser phye dang / lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang ka mne da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang /
128a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// gser dang / dngul dang bai DUR+Ya dang /
128a5(dkon brtsegs): shel dang / spug dang / mu tig dmar po dang / rdo'i snying po'i me tog rnams dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// spos
128a6(dkon brtsegs): kyi bla re de dag las spros kyi ngang byung ste 'gro zhing ldog go// lha'i spos chu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi char yang steng gi bar snang las mngon par bab bo// spos chu'i char de mngon par bab pas kyang ser skya'i bam
128a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi grong khyer chen po kho ra khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu tshun chad spos chus rdzab tu gyur te/ spos chu'i rdzab de'i dris stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad rgyas par gang bar
128b1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas/ sems can gang dag gis spos kyi dri de tshor bar gyur pa dang / rol mo sil snyan de dag gi sgra thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir/
128b2(dkon brtsegs): mi ldog par gyur to// de ltar dri za re res kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir/ glang po ches srungs kyi bu'i mgo bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug la/ lha'i bu mo glu len pa dang / par byed pa 'bong
128b3(dkon brtsegs): dag gis ma rnyed de/ skye bo thams cad kyang 'dun par byas so// lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni lus kyi tshul sbyar/ la la ni tsan dran dang / a ka ru dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma 'thor la
128b4(dkon brtsegs): la ni lha ma yin gyi lnga rdzas kyi phye ma dang / spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phye ma 'thor/ la la ni me tog man dar ba dang / man da ra ba chen po nas skya snar khra bo dang / skya snar bkru chen gyi bar gyi me tog
128b5(dkon brtsegs): dang sprul pa'i me tog rnams 'thor/ la la ni gser gyi me tog nas rdo'i snying po'i bar gyi me tog dang / dbyigs dang / gser dang / rin po che snyim pas blangs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon
128b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'thor/ la la ni na bza' dag 'thor/ la lA ni zhabs kyi rgyan dang / sku rigs dang / gser gyi 'phreng ba rin po ches spras pa'i bar dag 'bul lo// la la ni gser gyi dra ba dag 'dzin pa la
128b7(dkon brtsegs): la ni rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang / rin po che'i ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang / tshon sna tshogs can 'dzin/ la la ni lha'i spos chu'i char 'bebs te/ lha ma yin gyi bu mos tshigs su
129a1(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa'i bar du snga ma bzhin no// de nas dri za de dag glang po che'i rgyal po sa srungs kyi bu de dag la
129a2(dkon brtsegs): zhon nas/ bcom ldan 'das la skor ba byed byed pa las/ glang po che sa srungs kyi bu de dag las babs te/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ khabs la mgo bos
129a3(dkon brtsegs): byug 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan pade gshegs srid pa mthar phyin pa/
129a4(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i bcings la 'gro ba rnam grol mdzad// khyod 'dra sring gsum gang na reng ma mchis te// khyu mchog khyod ni gzugs dang mtshan mchog mnga'// mi mchog khyod kyis sa chen 'di steng du// zag
129a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' yas mnga' bas ngo mtshar bstan// 'gyur bgyid chos ni gang yang ma mchis la// dge ba'i tshogs la 'gro ba rab tu bkod// bde gshegs 'gyur ba med pa'i de bzhin nyid// brjod pa
129a6(dkon brtsegs): tsam ste gzhan ni ci ma mchis// tha snyad gdags dang tha snyad 'dogs ma mchis// 'on kyang bde shegs khyod ni 'gro ba sbyongs// bde bar gshegs pas song med 'ongs med dang // gnas
129a7(dkon brtsegs): med rang bzhin gyis ni stong pa dang // chos rnams 'di dag rang bzhin med ces bstan// rgyal ba mchog gis bya ba rnams kyang bstan// chos rnams gang yang bya ba byed ma mchis// 'jig rten gcog
129b1(dkon brtsegs): bya ba'ang yongs su bsdam// bdag dang gzhan gyi yon tan mi dgongs la// bcom ldan 'das kyis bgyi ba kun kyang bstan// shing rta'i yan lag rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ bdag dang gdan gyi yon
129b2(dkon brtsegs): tan mi sems kyang // shing rta'i bgyi ba dag kyang bgyid par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kun bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// chos ni chos la yongasu bskul mi bgyid// chos ni chos la dran par
129b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyid ma mchis// chos rnams chos la nye bar mi rten te// chos rnam gang yang ma skyes 'chi ma mchis// 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob mngon par gsungs// kun rdzob de yang de nam mchis te//
129b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di dag kun rdzob ji bzhin zhes// tshogs kyi slob dpon khyod kyis yang dag gsungs// ming gi rang bzhin gang na'ang ma mchis la// bde bar gshegs pas bya ba rnam par bzhag/ chos
129b5(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'di 'dra yongs su bstan pas na// 'jig rten mkhas pas shin tu ngo mtshar mdzad// de bzhin bdag cag bde gshegs nyid gyur te// nor bapa'i 'gro ba blo gros stor ba rnams// chos kyis
129b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi tshul la gzung bgyis te// zhi ba'i go 'phang 'chi med thob par bgyi// rnam pa 'dren pa khyod ni ci 'dra bar// 'dren pa bde gshegs grags pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje ldan pa phan
129b7(dkon brtsegs): bzhed 'jig rten mkhas// bsod nams brgya yi mtshan dang ldan par shog/ ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// nga rgyal bsgribs pa'i 'gro ba sdug bsngal ba// 'dod pa'i yon
130a1(dkon brtsegs): du bya/ tan rgyun gyi rjes 'gro ba// mngon dga' sdug bsngal brgya ldan yongs su dgrol// ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhin bdag cag gis// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnod pa myong 'gyur la/
130a2(dkon brtsegs): g.yo yi zhugs pas zin cing mu ma mthong // yongs 'thom spre'u ltar nod pa yongs su dgrol// ji ltar bde gshegs khyod bzhi na bdag cag gis// 'gro ba mi mkhas mig dang bral ba yi// lha tshogs yongs
130a3(dkon brtsegs): skyo gnyid kyis log gyur cing // bdag nyid las kyi 'bras bu chung gson dgrol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dri za bye ba phrag sum cu rtsa drug po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su nur
130a4(dkon brtsegs): nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la rigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs mtha' yas gzigs pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ 'dren pa rgyu ma mchis
130a5(dkon brtsegs): par mi 'dzum ma// bde gshegs 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni myur du gsungs// nim nur gnod gyur rnams kyi the tshom gsol// bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal gyi 'dzum mthong nas// skye bo 'di dag the tshom rnyed
130a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// 'dzum pa'i don ni de dag nyan par 'tshal// thub chen 'gro ba'i the tshom bsal du gsol// bde bar gshegs kyi bstan la su mi gzugs// the tshom bral zhing som ni bsal bar gyur// @
130a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gang gi bsam mkhyen nas// mi yi mchog gis 'dzum pa bstan pa mdzad// su zhig bde gshegs bka' stsal tshul bzhin du// blo gros rtogs pa chos bzhin gnas par gyur/
130b1(dkon brtsegs): gang gi blo gros dran rdzogs blo mkhyen nas// bde gshegs 'gro ba'i nang du 'dzum pa mdzad// 'gro ba 'di dag blo gzhan yongs babang ste// bde gshegs 'dzum ngo mnal nas thos par kar// sor
130b2(dkon brtsegs): bcu'i thal sbyar mgo la bzhag bgyis shing // dga' ba'i yid kyis ston pa'i zhal du lta// nyon mongs bral zhing mya ngan rab spangs pa// dgyes pa'i thugs mnga' thub chen 'jig rten mig / 'gro
130b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i ying gnyis som nyi bsal du gsol// rgyal ba thugs rje ldan pas 'dzum rgyu gsungs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la rigs su bcad de slar
130b4(dkon brtsegs): bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba'i don du 'dzum pa ngas mdzad pa// khyod kyis don dris 'thum zhing legs pa ste// 'dzum pa de yi don ni lung bstan pas// skye bo'i tshogs chen don ni de ring 'phel// 'dzum
130b5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad rgyu rta thul mnyan par gyis// rnam par 'dren pas 'dzum pa 'ang mdzad pa// de ni ma log par yang ngas bskrun gyis// bstan pa de la dgyu' ba'i sems kyis nyon// dri za 'di rnams chos
130b6(dkon brtsegs): kyi rjes snyigs shing // bde bar gshegs la mchong ba 'di dag byas// chos nyid byung bar gyur pa med pa ste// chos nyid zad par gyur pa'ang med pa yin// rgyal ba rnam rtog sgyu ma lta bur gnas//
130b7(dkon brtsegs): rtog par mi byed de dag rmongs par 'gyur// gang gis chos gang rjes su brjod bya ba// des ni de nyid stong zhes bde gshegs gsung // de dag nga yi rig de rtogs gyur nas// rta med glang po
131a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog gis mchod pa byas// byang chub rga med 'chi med tshol byed cing // dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis nga mchod do// nor pa'i 'gro la snying rje bskyed nas ni// thams
131a2(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'di dag mos// 'di dag nga la mchod pa 'di byas pas// dri za'i ris bor dga' ba'i yid gyur te// blo gros bzang rnams lha gnas lnga yul ba// brgya byin lha 'dus par ni
131a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas bde gshegs rdul med pa// bye ba khrag khrig mang la mchod byed 'gyur// zhing nas zhing du rjes su rgyu byed cing // de dag la ni mkhas pa chos kyang nyan// de dag bde
131a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs spyod pa yongs su sbyong // de dag zhing yang rtag par yong dga'agyur// rgyal ba'i gdung 'dzin de dag sems can ni// khrag khrig mang po dag la byang chub ston// 'gro ba 'di dag rang bzhin stong rig nas/
131a5(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs 'gro ba dag la ston par 'gyur// rgyal ba thams cad mkhyen cing kun gzigs pa// rdul med bskal pa khrag khrig bzhugs par ra 'gyur// sangs rgyas mtshan ni mtha' yas rtogs pa ste/
131a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas re re khrag khrig phrag mang ba'i// bskal pa rnams su rdul med gnas par gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam 'di rjes su ston// rgyal ba thub pa nyon mongs bcom pa yis// de ltar de tshe dri za
131a7(dkon brtsegs): mchod lung bstan// rta thul gyis ni 'dzum pa'i don zhus pa// dri za lung bstan pa ni bshad pa mdzad// dri za lung bstan yid du 'thad 'gyur pa// de thos nas ni 'gro ba thams cad dga'// der ni bde
131b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gshegs kyi gsung thos nas// shAkya thub la thams cad skyabs su dong // dri za lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / bam po lnga pa// / de nas gnod sbyin byeb
131b2(dkon brtsegs): phrag brgyang cus lA ma yin rnams nas// dri zla'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong // lung bstan pa'ang thos nas// tshi ma zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas
131b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi shes rab kyi rnam pa la rim 'gro chen po bskyed de// chos nyid la 'jug pa'ang thos pas/ ston pa'i 'du shes skyes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyang blo zad mi shes pa'i 'du shes
131b4(dkon brtsegs): skyes par gyur te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das blo bzang mi shis pa zhes bya bar rig nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa skyes par gyur nas/
131b5(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ mngon shes stobs mi kun tu mtha' yas te// rgya mtsho chu 'dzin bsam
131b6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal dang 'dra// de bas mtshungs med 'jig rten pan mdzad pa// mi yi seng ge khyod la 'di ltar bstod// ri rab snang la gnal bar nus kyang gdang // gzi brjid chen po nam mnga' gzhal rung gas/
131b7(dkon brtsegs): shes rab mchog mnga' bde gshegs ye shes stobs// tshad gzung dpag par nus pa yong ma mchis// 'gro ba kun gyi bsam pa thugs su rung // skye bo drang rung me rung gdul min pa// de dag las kyi
132a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa mngon par mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang mas// de dag ci 'dra'i khams la rten pa dang // de dag sems rgyud ci 'drar 'byung ba dang // de dag mos pa cing
132a2(dkon brtsegs): ma lus mkhyen// de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// 'dod chags spyod dang de bzhin de sdang spyod// mi yi gti mug spyod pa de bzhin mkhyen// phrag dog rnam pa'ang de bzhin mkhyen pa ste//
132a3(dkon brtsegs): de bas mtshungs med kun tu mtha' yang yas// 'gro ba 'di dag lam rgyud gar 'khyams pa// de dag mtshungs med khyod kyi rab tu mkhyen// de la ye shes rgyud du rab 'byung bas// de bas mtshungs med
132a4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu mtha' yang yas// bde bar gshegs pas 'gro kun rab tu gzigs// chud za'i lam rgyud gang du 'khyams gyur cing // byams pa'i stobs las rab tu nyams myur ba// de dgra ma lus khyod kyis
132a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gzigs// 'gro ba rnams ni ji srid dus nas shing // ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag reg 'gyur dang // lus kyi rnam pa ci 'dra 'chang ba rnams// de dag 'dren pa khyod kyis rab tu gzigs// mi yi seng
132a6(dkon brtsegs): ges lta ba ci 'dra dang // gang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa 'thob 'gyur bar// gang la rten cing las rnams bgyid 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan la rab
132a7(dkon brtsegs): byung ste// rnam par thar pa'i sgo ni gang zhig gis// ci 'dre'i lam la de dag bsten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i zhi ba 'thob 'gyur khyod kyis mkhyen// byis pa gang rnams bde gshegs bstan pa la/
132b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung zhing 'jig rten mkhas pa yi// bstan pa rab phra ji ltar spong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan la brnyas bgyis pas// dmyal ba chen
132b2(dkon brtsegs): por ji srid gnas pa dang // ci 'dra'i sdug bsngal de dag myong 'gyur ba// de dag rnams kyang 'dren pas rab tu gzigs// gang dag rgyal ba rnams la dang bskyed de// rab tu byung nas rgyal ba'i bstan 'dzin cing //
132b3(dkon brtsegs): chos kun stong pa nyid du yongs brtags nas// mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gcig bgyis shing // 'gro rgyud kun tu smon pa rnam spangs te// lus 'di sgyu ma 'dra bar rab brtags nas// phung po brag
132b4(dkon brtsegs): cha 'dra bar rtogs gyur te// byang chub sems ldan de dag rab tu gzigs// mgon po khyod la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // mtshungs med khyod kyis ji ltar thugs chud pa// de yis bla med sa
132b5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas grub par shog/ 'gro ba kun kyang rang byung thib gyur cigade nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe gnod sbyin bye ba phrag brgyang cu bo de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su rlung nas 'dzum pa
132b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol ba// mi yi seng ges 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// mi yi zla ba rang byung gyur pa ni// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum pa
132b7(dkon brtsegs): mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa ri yi d+h+ya ni bka' stsal gsol// ston pa'i zhal nas 'jus pa de mthong nas// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag the tshom 'tshal// mgon pos de dag the tshom bsal du gsol/
133a1(dkon brtsegs): du bya// 'jig rten 'di dag dga' baji yid du 'gyur// de ring su zhig rgyal la dad pa bskyed// gang gis chos rgya chen po rnam par rtogs// gang gi sems ni mi bskul gnas par gyur//
133a2(dkon brtsegs): ngag rgyal bas 'gro ba bstan du gsol// de ring 'khor rnams the tshom che 'tshal zhing // kun kyang rgyal ba'i zhal du lta zhing sdod// ci nas the tshom ma mchis kun 'gyur ba// de ltar dpa' bos the tshom bsal du/
133a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol// de ring 'di ni gang gi rnam 'phrul lags// gang gis brtson 'grus bzang po 'di bstan lags// gang zhig khyod dang 'dir mjal don mchis 'gyur// de ni legs par 'gro la bka' stsal gsol// rgyal
133a4(dkon brtsegs): pas 'gro ba dag la phan bzhed pa// the tshom 'tshal bas yid gnyis legs bsal gsol// de thos lnga dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing mgu ba dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/
133a5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshig su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa// rta thul khyod kyis dri ba legs par dris// de ring 'gro ba dag gi don chen byas// rang byung 'dzum mdzad
133a6(dkon brtsegs): dris pas na// ston pa'i dgongs pa'ang khyod kyis legs par mthong // de dag lung bstan ma lus bstan par bya// gnod sbyin tshogs kyi ying ni gzigs gyur nas// 'gro la phan pa'i don du 'dzum mdzad pa//
133a7(dkon brtsegs): dang ba'i yid kyis rta thul mnyan par gyis// rgyal ba'i byang chub zhi ba shes gyur nas// gnod sbyin tshogs kyis mos pa'i sems bskyed de// 'byung po'i tshogs dbus sangs rgyas bstod byas nas//
133b1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa mchog tu yid kyang btang // chos rnams stong pa nyid du shes bya dang // mtshan ma thams cad rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir// 'grob kun tu smon pa rnam spang shing // byang chub mchog tu dang/
133b2(dkon brtsegs): srid kyang btang // rnal 'byor stobs kyis phung po rnams bshig cing // kun rdzob tsam du rig nas mi chags te// srid pa kun tu chul pad+mo bzhin// byang chub mchog tu de dag yid kyang bting // de das
133b3(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gang du chags 'gyur ba// stong par bshig ste thams cad legs rtogs pa// de nyid rgyal ba'i sgra mad byang chub ste// byang chub phyir ni dben pa'i brtul zhugs shes// skye dngan shi yong gis stong pa/
133b4(dkon brtsegs): ste/ de ni rgyal ba'i bla mang byang chub yin// dngos po'i rang bzhin stong par shes gyur nas// zhi ba bla med byang chub 'thob par 'gyur// phung po'i rang bzhin dben zhing stong pa nyid// byang chub rang bzhin
133b5(dkon brtsegs): dben zhing stong pa nyid// gang spyod de yang rang bzhin stong pa ste// ye shes ldan pas shes kyis byis pas min// ye shes rang bzhin stong par rig gyur te// shes bya'i rang bzhin stong par rig gyur nas/
