133b6(dkon brtsegs): shes pa po dang 'dra ba rtogs gyur na// byang chub lam la de dag spyod ces bya// stong pa'i rang bzhin spong par shes par bya/ mtshan ma med pa'ang rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // smon pa med pa'ang rang bzhin
133b7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa ste// de ltar spyod na gzhan min spyod pa yin// de thos lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams// dga' zhing de dag stobs dang ldan par gyur// rang byung chos la de dag yid ches te// zhi ba'i gnas
134a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yid ldan gyur// gnod sbyin tshogs rnams deng mos yid gyur te// 'di ltar ngal mchod pa rab byas pas// gnod sbyin rgyud nas shi 'phos blo chen rnams// mtho ris
134a2(dkon brtsegs): dong zhing yun ring dga' bar 'gyur// de dag ma 'ongs dus na rdzu 'phrul gyis// zhing du dong zhing skad cig gcig la yang // blo can de dag rgyal ba bye ba mchod// de dag bzos mkhyen rgyal ba gdams ngag
134a3(dkon brtsegs): ston// de dag 'jig rten phyogs bcur rdzu 'phrul gyis// mtshan ma med par spyod cing 'dod gyur te// 'jig rten 'di dag sprul pa 'drar shes nas// 'jig rten chags med mkhas pa spyad pa spyod// de
134a4(dkon brtsegs): ltar brtan pas rgyal ba rab mchod nas// byang chub bla med de dag 'thob 'gyur te// de dag rnams kyi zhing ni mtha' yas 'gyur// sems can mtha' yas pa dag rnam par 'grel// sangs rgyas mkhyen
134a5(dkon brtsegs): pa mtha' yas grags pa can// de dag ming ni 'jig rten mkhas zhes bya// zhi ba'i blo ldan rgyal ba de dag gi/ tshe tshad bskal pa stong ni tshang bar 'gyur// de dag nyan thos dge 'dun 'gyur ba ni// rgyal
134a6(dkon brtsegs): sras mang po skar ma'i tshogs rnyed de// kun kyang bde bas bsam pa thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa rnams la sdug bsngal med// de skad thos nas lhar bcas 'jig rten dag/ rab tu dga' ba'i
134a7(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis byang chub tshol// ngoms par gyur nas brtson 'grus brtan brtsams te// kun kyang brtson 'grus stobs kyis brtan par gyur// gnod sbyin lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
134b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// sa mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi'am ci bye phrag brgyad kyis/ lham yin gyi mchod pa de dag dang / gnod sbyin gyi mchod pa'i bar de dag cang
134b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas// shin tu ngo mtshar thob par gyur te/ 'di ltar sems can yang mi dmigs la/ srog dang / skye ba po dang / shed las skyes dang / shid bu dang / gang zag dang / bdag dang /
134b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi gang yang med la/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched gang la sems can zhes gdags pa'i phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched de dag kyang mi dmigs/ las gang yod pas rnam par smin pa bdag
134b4(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba'i las de'ang mi dmigs/ byang chub kyang mi dmigs// byang chub sems dpar yang mi dmigs/ sangs rgyas kyang mi dmigs la/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan
134b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad do// ci zhig las dgongs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa mdzad// ci nig las dgongs te/ byung
134b6(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrubs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi che ba nyid dang / sems can yongs su smin pa dang / zhing bkod pa de dang / zhing yongs su dag pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhing
134b7(dkon brtsegs): nas zhing du 'dong ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang / mchod pa de'i mthu dang / sems can rnam par dgod pa dang / bskal pa 'di snyed cig gis sangs rgyas su 'gyur roro zhes bya ba dang / bskal pa
135a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyed cig tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi nyan thos 'dun pa ni 'di snyed cig tu 'gyur ro//
135a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba dang / de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'di snyed cig tu gnas par 'gyur ro zhes de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan pa mdzad/ ci zhig las dgongs te/ sem
135a3(dkon brtsegs): can rnams nye bar len pa med pas mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ro zhes/ bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs pa mdzad snyam ste/ de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa de lta bu'i the tshom skyes
135a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btungad de/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs kyis zhu ba zhus pa/ rgyal ba'i gsung ni thos gyur nas// shes rab che mnga'
135a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag dogs skyes// stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa// bde gshegs bdag gis de ma 'tshal// gsung ba'i zla ba chos kyi dbyings// 'gyur ma mchis la stong pa dang // rang bzhin med gsung ji lta bu/
135a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa 'di ci gang zag mchog/ skye ba'ang ma mchis byang chub tu// sems bskyed pa ni ji lta bu// skyes bu mchog gis bka' stsal ba'i// ldem po ngag de bdag ma 'tshal// mi dbang bdag po ji ltar
135a7(dkon brtsegs): na// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'pho gsung // de ni yang dag lung bstan pas// thub pa bdag gi the tshom khum// sgyu ma 'dral lngar skye zhes// gsung ba de ni ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di
135b1(dkon brtsegs): rab kyang // shAHseng ge bdag ma 'tshal// gnas pa'ang mchis pa ma lags la// dge ba shes brten gsung ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // skyes bu khyu mchog bdag ma 'tshal//
135b2(dkon brtsegs): g.yo ba'ang ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// gang gnyis mchog gsung ji lta bu// ldem por gsungs pa 'di dag kyang // dgrabs la bcom ldan bdas ma 'tshal// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rdzogs
135b3(dkon brtsegs): shes mgon gsungs ji lta bu// the tshom rnam pa 'di 'drar skyes// shes rab dpe med bdag ma 'tshal// zhi ba yod ces bka' stsal la// chos kun ni gsungs ji lta bu// mtshungs med 'di 'dra'i
135b4(dkon brtsegs): ldem po dag/ bdag la rnam par bstan du gsol// sku mdzes gyur kyang chos kyi rnams// nam mkha' 'drar gsungs ji lta bu// chos ni rab tu spangs bgyid na// mi mkhas dmyal lhung ji lta bu// bsam
135b5(dkon brtsegs): pa mtho ris 'jig rten dang // 'gro ba gzhan yang gsungs pa dang // las de bgyid pa ma mchis la// rang las can gsungs ji lta bu// bka' stsal tshal 'di rnam pa yang // zil gyis mi non bdag ma 'tshal/
135b6(dkon brtsegs): mgon po de la bdag dogs na// bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom gsol// dge ba'i tshogs 'gyur ma mchis la// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa'ang gsungs// dge sbyong rgyal po'i gsung gi tshul// de skad bas
135b7(dkon brtsegs): stsal bdag ma 'tshal// chos rnams zad pa med gsungs la// spong byed las ni zad bstan pa// tshad med blo mnga' 'di la yang // bdag ni yid gnyis the tshom 'tshal// yang dag mtha' yang bka' stsal
136a1(dkon brtsegs): la/ ma nor sbyin pa'ang bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang rab rib bral ba yi// spyan mnga' sdig spangs bstan du gsol// thams cad gzigs pa ma gtogs par// gdan/
136a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis bdag gi the tshom 'di// sel nus ma mchis de lta bas// bdag ni rgyal ba mchog la dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas the tshom dris pa di
136a3(dkon brtsegs): dag gsan nas// de la lan gdab pa'i phyir/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ stong pa nyid dang lung bstan pa/ bdag gis ma 'tshal ces smras pa/ gal
136a4(dkon brtsegs): te 'ga' zhig mi stong na// rgyal bas de lung bstun mi gsung // ci phyir zhe na 'di lta bur// rang gi rang bzhin gnas gyur na// 'gyur ba med cing ther zug ste// de la 'phel med 'grib pa med//
136a5(dkon brtsegs): me long shin tu yongs dag la// ji ltar rang bzhin med pa yis// gzugs brnyan snang ba de bzhin du// ljon pa chos rnams shes par gyis// chos kyi dbyings ni 'gyur med na// mchod pa'i
136a6(dkon brtsegs): yan lag 'gyur bang shes// yan lag rnams la brtag byos la// ljon pa mchod pa 'di la dpyod// chos dbyings rnam pa thams cad du// 'gyur med skye bo mkhas pas rtogs// byis pa rnam
136a7(dkon brtsegs): ni 'di la 'khrul// blo sbyangs pas ni med par shes// skye ba'ang ma mchis sems kyang bskyed// de nim 'tshal ces smras pa// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i ldem po ngag/ gzhan du ma sems mnyan par/
136b1(dkon brtsegs): gyis/ byis pa 'khor bar dga' ba rnams// 'khor bar mngon dga' sems zhen pa// log pa'i sems dang 'du shes can// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar 'gyur// de dag sngon chang ma
136b2(dkon brtsegs): thos pa'i// sems med chos ni ngas bshad na// byis pa blo dang ldan pa rnams// 'di la kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// byang chub gzhol ba'i sems nyid dang // byang chub pa na yon thos gyur nas/
136b3(dkon brtsegs): zil gyis ma non rang byung sems// rgya chen de ni thob par 'gyur// 'gag pa ma mchis 'chi 'bo ba// de yang ma 'tshal ces smras pa// 'chi 'pho yang dag lung bstan gyis// gzhan du ma sems
136b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyan par gyis// gang dag rtag 'dzin de dag la// 'di la mi 'gyur ther zug med// dngos po 'di dag mi rtag ces// bde gshegs 'chi 'pho rnam par bstan// sgyu ma 'dral lhar skye ba// ji lta bu zhes
136b5(dkon brtsegs): dogs gyur pa// mthar phyin ma gyur slob pa dang // skye bo rnams la mtho ris bshad// gnas pa'ang yod pa ma yin la// dge ba shes bsten ces gang smras pa// gnas dang dbral bar bya ba'i phyir//
136b6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa med pa'i dge ba shes bsten// g.yo ba ma mchis bgyi ba rnams// bstan pa ma 'tshal zhes smras pa// shing rta'i yan lag 'dus pa dang // shing rta'i bya ba bzhin du rtogs// mi gang bdag
136b7(dkon brtsegs): yod khas len cing // bya ba'ang bdag gis byas zin pa// de dag la ni bya ba dang // g.yo ba med par bde gshegs bshad// rang bzhin stong ste stong pa yang // rtogs shes nga yis gang smras pa/
137a1(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i log pa'i blo can rnams// rang bzhin stong par mi shes pa// de dag rnams la bstan pa'i phyir// rang bzhin stong zhes bde gshegs ston// kun tu rtog pa'i
137a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas bskyed// yang dag ma yin rtog pas bcings// zhi ba yod cing chos kun kyang // zhi bar mthong zhes smras pa ni// mi shes rmongs par gyur rnams kyis// kun tu rtog las sred pa skye//
137a3(dkon brtsegs): skom pas ji ltar smig rgyu la// kun tu rtog pas sgom pa skyes// mi mkhas des ni rtog pa'i rgyu// yod par min la log par brtags// chu yin par ni mthong gyur kyang // smig rgyu la ni chu med do//
137a4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin yongs su rtog pas dkrugs// sdug pa min la sdug par rtog/ byis pa 'dod chags ldan pa dag/ sdug dang ldan pa rang bzhin gyis// sdug med smig rgyu chu bzhin te// smig rgyu la ni chu med do//
137a5(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gzugs la sdug pa med// gzugs de sdug pa mi yin na// byis pa log pa'i 'du shes can// sdug par rtog pas bcings par 'gyur// chos rnams nam mkha' 'dra ba dang // spong ba
137a6(dkon brtsegs): dmyal lhung zhes smras pa// med pa mthong bar ma gyur pa// mi mkhas rnams ni skrag par 'gyur// rang bzhin ngo bo nyid stong na// bdag zhen dus ni mi shes pa// de dag stong zhes thos myur na// bdag
137a7(dkon brtsegs): med 'gyur zhes skrag pa skye// de dag pa dag tu mngon zhen te// nam mkha' la ni mdung bor nas// stong pa gya nom spong byed de// mi ma pas sems dmyal chen por ltung // mtho ris 'jig rten ngas bstan dang / skyeb
137b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro rgyud gzhan dag dang // las kyang ngas ni bstan byas te// byed pa po ni rab tu bkag/ yang dag tun 'gro ba dag/ rmi 'drar bshad par shes par gyis// rmi lam gang la'ang dngos po med// log pa'i sgo/
137b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan mngon par zhen// ngas ni las kyi rnam pa bstan// byed po phyogs bcu rnams na med// shing rnams rlung gis bskul pa las// me 'byung 'gyur ba ji bzhin no// bdag tsug me 'di bskyed bya zhes/ rlung
137b3(dkon brtsegs): dang shing la sems pa med// 'on kyang me ni 'byung ba ltar// las kyi byed po de bzhin no// bsod nams tshogs ni yod mimal// byang chub yang dag bsgrub pa dang // legs spyad yod ces zer ba ni// de tshul yang
137b4(dkon brtsegs): dag mnyan par byos// mi yi tshe tshang lo brgya ste// de srid 'tsho zhes brjod mod kyis// lo la phung por spungs pa med// sgrub pa de yang de dang mtshungs// zad pa med ces gang smras dang // las zad ces ni
137b5(dkon brtsegs): ngas smras pa// stong pa'i tshul du zad pa med// tha snyad tshul du zad par bstan// yang dag mtha' ni ngas bshad pa// phyin ci log de'ang yang dag mtha'// log pa'i blo can byis pa rnams// yang dag mtha' ni mi
137b6(dkon brtsegs): shes so// mtshan nyid thams cad gcig nyid de// mtshan nyid med par shes pa yi// ye shes lam du zhugs rnams kyi// nges pa ljon pa khyod nyon cig/ yi ge gcig gis brjod pa yi// byang chub blo ldan rnams
137b7(dkon brtsegs): la bstan// chos rnams thams cad ma byas pa// a yi sgo yi gzungs su bstan// de ltar spyod pa byed rnams la// mtshan nyid mtha' yas ngas bstan te// 'di 'dra'i tshul la 'jug pa ni// a yi sgo mi bcu
138a1(dkon brtsegs): su bstan// chos rnams thams cad 'gag med la// a yi chos la 'jug par bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// de yang ljon pas shes par gyis// chos rnams rnam par
138a2(dkon brtsegs): rtog med pa// de yang chos la 'jug par gsungs// chos kun 'gyur ba med pa yang // a ni chos kur sgo mor bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs 'di dag ldan pas de ltar shes par gyis// mi zad pa dang zad/
138a3(dkon brtsegs): smras pa// chos kun mi zad brjod bya ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba thams cad kyis// mi zad sgo yi gzungs su bstan// chos rnams kun la sgo med de// de dag med pas sgo mi'i byung // 'di yang gzungs
138a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos kun bsam gyis mi khyab ces// yang dag ji bzhin bde gshegs bstan// a yi sgo yi gzungs bstan pa// 'di yang ljon pas shes par gyis// chos
138a5(dkon brtsegs): kun lus med byang chub ces// blo ldan rnams la ngas bstan pa// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams 'ong ba med pa ste// med pas de dag 'ong ba'ang med/
138a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya// chos rnams gdags pa med pa ste// med pas de dag gdags pa med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'ju
138a7(dkon brtsegs): par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin med pa ste// med pas de dag rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// gzung kyi sgo mong la nyon// chos kun/
138b1(dkon brtsegs): yid la bya ba med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// bde bar gshegs pas gzungs su bstan// med phyir chos kun sgrib med ces// de bzhin gshegs pas bstan mdzad pa// 'di yang
138b2(dkon brtsegs): gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas shes par bya// chos kun thogs pa med pa ste// thogs par bya ba de mi dmigs// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// a la brten nas 'jug par bya/
138b3(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams thams cad ma skyes par// mkhas pas mtshan nyid gcig shes bya// chos rnams gang dag ma skyes pa// de dag ming med shes par bya// chos rnams yang dag ma yin te// de dag ma
138b4(dkon brtsegs): lus rang bzhin med// 'di yang gzungs kyi sgo yin te// A la brten nas shes par bya// gang dag ma skyes mi byung ba// de dag mthong med bstan par bya// lta ba po ni med pa dang // de dag rnams kyang
138b5(dkon brtsegs): med phyir ro// chos kun mnyam med de bas na// mtshan nyid gcig cing mtshan gzhi med// nam mkha' dang ni 'dra ba ste// chos kun yod pa ma yin no// de ltar lhag med chang pa med// mnyam gzhag med cing /
138b6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med// gdung med bsil med tsha ba'ang med// lta ba'i lam min med phyir ro// drang po ma yin yon po min// mun pa ma yin snang ba min// mthong ba med cing thos med de// med pas gzungs su shes
138b7(dkon brtsegs): par gyis// g.yo med drang po'ang med pa ste// chos rnams gsal med g.yo ba med// 'khrug pa med cing khro ba med// ci yang mi byed nyer zhi med// skye ba med cing gnas kyang med// 'gro med ldog med 'gro/
139a1(dkon brtsegs): sems med// nyal ba med cing mi nyal med// sad pa med par shes par gyis// mig can ma yin long ba min// lta ba ma yin mun bsgribs min// sbas pa ma yin bzhag pa
139a2(dkon brtsegs): med/ dul ba ma yin ma dul min// rgod pa ma yin zhi ba min// 'khor min mya ngan 'das pa min// bden min brdzun min de lta bur// rgyal ba'i spyod yul shes par gyis// 'jig rten gdul ba'i
139a3(dkon brtsegs): don phyir gyi// 'di la the tshom gang yang med// gang gcang bya ba'i the tshom de// dam pa'i don du byung ba med// de nas mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung
139a4(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa dang // gzungs nges par bstan pas yongs su tshim par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ khang pa brtsog pa shing la rten pa dang / pad+ma la rten pa dang ka ri la rten pa
139a5(dkon brtsegs): dang rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ rin po che'i gdugs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ gdugs kyi lda ldis mdzes par byas pa/ rdul mtshan dang ba dan gyis brgyan pa/ bla re dang lnga ldis brgyan pa bye
139a6(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag brgyad mngon par sprul te/ mi 'am ci'i rol mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad kyang mngon par sprul nas/ ri spos kyi ngad ldang las skyes pa dang / zang las skyes pa dang / chu las skyes pa'i me tog
139a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas nas/ de mi 'am ci'i tshogs dang lhan cig tu khang pa brtsegs pa bye ba phrag brgyad po de dag tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum
139b1(dkon brtsegs): bskor ba byas te/ zang las skyes pa dang rna las skyes pa'i me tog de dag kris bcom ldan 'das la gtor// mngon par gtor/ mngon par rab tu gtor to// de nas yang pa brtsegs pa da ga las bas
139b2(dkon brtsegs): te rkang pas dong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzum par lta
139b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing / rnam pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rjes su dran par byed cing phyogs gcig tu 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa 'khor dang ba
139b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde bshegs dri bral spyan mnga' ba// rgyu
139b5(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// lha mis mchod pa yang dag tu// 'dzum mdzad rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa 'dzum mdzad pa// 'khor gyis mthong nas the tshom 'tshal// zla ba tshel ma
139b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du// smra ba'i zla ba'i zhal du lta// bde gshegs mdzes pa dang su zhig/ gnyis med chos la shes mchog skyes// bdag ni the tshom 'tshal bar gyur// mi mchog dam pa the tshom sol// bde
139b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs gang gis chos nyid la// dad pa thob na bcom ldan 'das// 'di ltar 'dzum pa mdzad par gyur// smre mchog bdag gi the tshom khum// thams cad ldan pa'i 'khor 'di yis// bcom
140a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan bstan thos yid dga' zhing // the tshom ma mchis som nyi nang // ji ltar bstan zhing gnas par 'gyur// de ltas rkang gnyis rnams kyi mchog/ 'grol thugs brtse
140a2(dkon brtsegs): mdzad pa dang // the tshom ge cang sgang ljon pa dang // mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan gsungs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la rigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal
140a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ skye bo tshogs chen rnams nang du// sangs rgyas yon tan sten gyur pa/ ljon pa'i lung bstan gang dris pa// rta thul khyod kyis legs par dris// ye shes mthong ba sgrib med pa// bde gshegs
140a4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes ngo mtshar can// deng khyod dang ba'i yid byos la// skyon med yid kyis nga las nyon// 'jig rten phan dang bde ba'i phyir// ljon pas the tshom gang dris pa// de yi 'bras bu brjod par byas//
140a5(dkon brtsegs): the tshom bcad pa nga la nyon// ljon pa la sogs mi 'am tsi// bye ba phrag brgyad 'dir lpags pa// de dag nga la mchod byas nas// 'di nas shi 'phos mtho ris 'dong // bskal pa bye ba dgu
140a6(dkon brtsegs): bcur der// lha min nang du 'khor bar 'gyur// mngon par shes pa lnga bsgoms nas// sems la dbang sgyur dbang ldan 'gyur// mi yi seng ge de dag gis// sangs rgyas zhing phrag khrag khrig tu/
140a7(dkon brtsegs): sprul bkye rang ni lha gnas na// bsam gtan dga' ba'i bde ba myong // bskal pa bye ba dgu bcur yang // de dag lha mi re 'khor 'khor nas// rang rang zhing rnams sna tshogs su// byang chub rnam par
140b1(dkon brtsegs): 'chang rtar 'gyur// rtag tu gnang pa'i bskal pa la/ mi mi seng ge 'jig rten mngon// chags med me shes mthong dab smrasas// stobs bcug zi brjid mthara' yas 'gyur// de dag ci
140b2(dkon brtsegs): du sems can gang // yongs su ma smin dga' mi skye// nyan thos theg pa gang byung ba// kun kyang srid pa tham pa// mi yi seng ge'i zhing der ni// byang chub sems dpa' gang skye ba// de dag
140b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe gcig thogs pa ste// mi mchog byang chub thob par 'gyur// gang dag gtso bor gyur pa rnams// bdag cag dpag med sangs rgyas zhing // yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes// de 'dra'i bsam
140b4(dkon brtsegs): pas rab tu zhugs// sems can rlabs chen de dag ni// smon lam rgya chen yun ring btab// de dag 'di nas shi 'phos nas// bsdam pas rang bzhin rnam par sbyong // nyon mongs 'joms pa
140b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi zhing gi bkor bar 'gyur ba ni// dga' ldan gnas kyi longs spyod rnams// ngan song kun kyang yongs su dag/ de dag zhing du rnam kun tu// mi khom gang yang 'byung mi 'gyur// cing
140b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams yongs sbyangs de dag ni// sems can rnams kyang bde bar 'dren// de ltar 'jig rten mgon po yis// mi ci rnams kyi lung bstan bshad// lung bstan de thos 'khor gyi rnams//
140b7(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang yid ni rangs par 'gyur// mi 'am ci lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas lha 'phreng ldan glang po can brgyad khris ka lA ma yin rnam
141a1(dkon brtsegs): nas mi 'am ci'i bar dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/ tu dag shing gar ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas
141a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la mos shing / bcom ldan pa das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te// de dag gis ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad kyi khor yug tu dpag tshad
141a3(dkon brtsegs): drug cu tshun chad me tog ma nA ra bas pus mo nub tsam du gleng bar byas so// de nas de dag gis bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ tshigs su bcad pa dag
141a4(dkon brtsegs): gis mngon par bstod pa// zhi ba'i dbang po 'dzum pa'i zhal// srog chags kun la thubs brtse ba// bde bar gshegs pa thugs rje can// 'jig rten bdag po mi yi bdag/ sangs
141a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas chos la mos pa yi// 'khor 'di ji srid 'dir gnas par// zhabs mchog mdzes shing dag ldan pa// thugs rje can la mgos phyag 'tshal// ji ltar dgung zla nya ba'i tshe/ mi
141a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams zla bar phyag 'tshal ba// de bzhin lha tshogs 'di rnams kyang // bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du lte// dpag tu med pa'i dge spyad pa// dpag yas ye shes phung po ldan// gzi brjid
141a7(dkon brtsegs): dpag yas phung po can/ blo mchog khyod la mgos phyag 'tshal// stobs bcu mnga' zhing dpal sdug pa// bden pa ni mi bsnyengs dri gsum sel// rgyal ba'i bco brgyad chos dang
141b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan/ the tshom mi mnga' smra ba'i mchog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' zhing // dpe byung babyung po brgyad cu ldan// dbang po'i rgyal mtshan mtshungs med thugs// bde gshegs
141b2(dkon brtsegs): khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// tshul khrims spobs kyi mthar phyin pa// ting 'dzin stobs kAnas mi spyod pa// ye shes stobs kyi mtshon cha can// bdud stobs bcom thub rgyal ba lags//
141b3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes stobs mchog rgyas gyur pa// ser sna mi mnga' nyan thos btul// zhi ba'i thugs kyis spyod mdzad cing // lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'dul// skyes bu seng ge bde gshegs
141b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod// gti mug zhi bgyid chos brnyes pa// bdag cag rnams kyang stobs bcu mi// chos rnams 'dir ni thob par shog/ ji ltar thub khyod sems can gyi// bsam mkhyen dang mdzad de bzhin
141b5(dkon brtsegs): du 'jig rten snang mdzad bdag cag kyang // lha mir bcas pa'i 'gro dang bgyi// de ltar 'gro ba'i don slad du// snying brtse nye bar bzung nas ni// 'gro ba 'khor ba'i mtshor bying ba//
141b6(dkon brtsegs): srid pa'i rgyu las bsgral bar bgyi// bdag cag lngar bcas 'jig rten gyi// 'dren dang rab tu 'dren gyur cig/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal brgyas nyen pa// srid pa'i rgyud las dgrol bar bgyi/
141b7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha 'phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi bsam pa thugs su chud nas de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das
142a1(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bde gshegs rnam par 'dren pa po// rgyu ma mchis par 'dzum mi mdzad// stobs bcu khyod ni 'dzum mdzad pa'i// rgyu gang lags pa bka' stsal
142a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol// rgyal ba'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba dang bgyid byung mthong nas// 'khor kun the tshom 'tshal gyur te// 'dzum pa'i don ni nyan par 'tshal// don chen 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i don// bka'
142a3(dkon brtsegs): stsol bka' stsol 'dren pa mchog/ dge sbyong rnams kyi rgyal po khyod// the tshom chad 'gyur bka' stsal gsol// gang gis rgyal ba mnyes par bgyis// gang gis deng khyod bla med bgyis// su zhig de ring
142a4(dkon brtsegs): gting thob gyur// bde gshegs bdag gi the tshom khum// de ring gang gis bdud kyi gnas// dkrugs g.yengs kun tu 'khrugs par bgyis// deng sus lha gnas thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' yid ldan
142a5(dkon brtsegs): par bgyis// rgyal ba thub pa de lung ston// 'gro ba'i the tshom myur du khum// de thos bde gshegs 'khor gyi rnams// kun kyang rab tu yid dga' 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
142a6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la slar bka' stsal pa/ 'phreng ldan glang po can lha yi// lung bstan rta thul khyod dris pas// des na 'gro ba mang po yi// don chen shin tu deng byas 'gyur//
142a7(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu rgyal ba ma dris par// sras mchog byang chub lung mi ston// de ni 'gro ba mang don du// de ring khyod kyis rgyal la zhus// 'phreng ldan glang po lha tshogs kyis// nga la sems dang nga mchod
142b1(dkon brtsegs): bas/ bskal pa grangs med 'das 'og tu// nyon mongs pa ma byas rgyal bar 'gyur// de dag 'di nas shing phos nas// 'thun pa mi yi nang skyes te// rgyal ba bye ba dpag med la// me tog mchog
142b2(dkon brtsegs): gis mchod par 'gyur// kun tu bde bar gshegs kyi sems// skyed par 'gyur zhing 'phel byed 'gyur// rang 'byung mi yi seng ge la// tshigs su bcad pas bstod par 'gyur// ma 'ongs dus na 'di
142b3(dkon brtsegs): kun gyis// rgyal ba khrag khrig dpag yas mang // me tog gis mchod tshigs bcad kyis// mi mchog rnams la bstod byas te// de dag bde gshegs rnams mchod cing // mthu bo che yi sku bstod
142b4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i bskal pa la// rnam par 'dren par 'jig rten 'byung // grags pa ma smad nags rtsu ba// brgyad khri po rnams de dag kun// bskal pa gcig la bde gshegs 'gyur//
142b5(dkon brtsegs): tig rgyal mtshan ldan zhes bya// de na dmyal dang dung 'gro dang // ngan song ga shin rje'i 'jig rten med/ shing de na nI lA min med// mi 'om thams cad rab tu bcom// 'azeng rdzun glang po can
142b6(dkon brtsegs): lha yi// longs spyod sum cu rtsa gsum gyi// ci 'dra ba ni de 'drar 'gyur// 'gro ba'i tshe tshad dpag tu med// de tshe mi dge sgra mi grag/ mi dge byed pa smos ci dgos// den rnams 'dren mchog rnams kyi//
142b7(dkon brtsegs): skye bo rnams kyang chos can 'gyur// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ gang+gA'i bye ma rab mang snyed// grol bar byed 'gyur stobs bcu rnams// gnas pa med pa'i chos kyang ston// grags pa ma smad
143a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag gi/ ring bsrel dag kyang rgyas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi ring bsrel la'ang // rgyal ba'i sku mang 'byung bar 'gyur// grags pa mtha' yas ldan rnams kyi// ring bsrel
143a2(dkon brtsegs): cho 'phrul sku mthong nas// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig mang // byang chub tu ni sems skyed 'gyur// 'phreng ldan glang po can rnams kyi// lung bstan 'dren pas bka' stsal pa// thos shing shes nas 'bor
143a3(dkon brtsegs): kun kyang // de tshe sems ni rab tu dga'// 'phreng ldan glang po can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// / de nas rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khris lha ma yin rnams nas/
143a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phreng ldan glang po can gyi lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas// tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos
143a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po bskyed de// 'di lta ste/ dper na kham pa'i bru la zhon pa'i mi zhig chu'i dbus su phyin na// gru chag tu 'ong zhes tshu rol nas pha rol tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mos pa/
143a6(dkon brtsegs): drag po skyed pa de bzhin du/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dgu khri po de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi che ba nyid la dad pa skyes nas// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thob pa bya ba'i phyir mos pa drag po skyes par
143a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// de dag sangs rgyas kyi chos 'chol zhing / bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang lhan cig tu rin po che'i bla re bkra ba blta na sdug pa dgu khri mngon
143b1(dkon brtsegs): par sprul to// de dag kyang phal cher mu tig dmar po dang // skar mdog dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / gser dang / rdo rje'i rang bzhin can sha stag go// lha'i rol mo sil snyan dgu khri'ang mngon par sprul te/
143b2(dkon brtsegs): dag nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi bla re dgu khri po de dag thogs nas/ rol mo sil snyan dgu khri bo de dag byed cing / steng gi bar snang las dong ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byed cing / me
143b3(dkon brtsegs): tog man+da ra ba dang / man+da ra ba chen po dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / pa ru sha ka chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par
143b4(dkon brtsegs): gtor// mngon par rab tu gtor te/ de dag gis mchod pa byas nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// rgyal ba'i yon tan
143b5(dkon brtsegs): mthong ba yi// lba ni dgu khri tham pa dang // 'dren pa khyod kyi spyan snga na// thal mo rab tu sbyar nas mchis// rgod pa ma mchis zhum ma mchis// 'dod pa ma mchis 'gyod ma mchis// mi blun
143b6(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshur ma mchis par// rkang gnyis mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod ni srid pa'i rgyud rnams bkum// mi shes pa ni rnam par sbyangs// sred pa'i phur pa rab tu byung // dmyal rgyal mtshan
143b7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis bsnyal// khyod ni zug rngu byung ba ste// rma la gdug pa khyod kyis spangs// khyod ni mkhyen bzhin spyod pa ste// 'dren pa khyod kyis rma rnams sos// khyod kyis nyon mongs thams
144a1(dkon brtsegs): cad spangs// bcing ba dag ni thams cad cad// sbyor ba kun dang bral ba ste// thub pa chags pa kun las 'das// rgyal ba khyod kyi spyod yul ni// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma
144a2(dkon brtsegs): med// bcom ldan khyod la smon pa yang // rnam pa kun tu mi mnga' 'o// khyod kyis sred pa drungs nas phyung // ma rig pas ni thugs kyang phyung // rnam pa bzhi po'i phyin ci log/ rnam pa kun tu yongs su spang /
144a3(dkon brtsegs): gang du 'jig rten mi chud de// ri dgas rngon pas ji bzhin du// 'jigs shing skrag par 'gyur ba yi// yang dag mtha' ni khyod kyis gzigs// sems can 'jigs tshogs ltar lhung ste// stong pa nyid ni ma 'anal
144a4(dkon brtsegs): bas// ma rig pa yi mun pas gtibs// 'khor ba'i brtson rab dga' bar bgyid// khyod kyis yang dag ji bzhin du// 'gro de nang pa stong 'drar gzigs// gang gis rnam dag mig 'gyur ba'i// ye shes
144a5(dkon brtsegs): snang ba rab tu bstan// phung po stong par rnam par bshig/ ming dang gzugs kyang gsog 'dra zhing // khams rnams dang ni skye mched dag/ bdag med stong par rnam par bshig/ chos gang dang ni ming gang gis//
144a6(dkon brtsegs): chos gang mngon par brjod bgyi ba// chos de chos des stong pa ste// thub pa khyod kyis stong par bstan// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos med pa la// skye bo'i tshogs chen mngon sprul na// de la sems can gdags ma
144a7(dkon brtsegs): mchis// srog dang gang zag ma mchis ltar// de bzhin phung po khams rnams dang // dbang po dag dang skye mched kyang // yang dag ma yin sgyu ma zhis// skyes bu dam pas bstan pa mdzad// ji ltar rim
144b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhan zhig gis// bud med gzugs ni rnam bris shing // mnyam pa dang ni mi mnyam dang // lci dang yang ba bstan gyis kyang // byis pa'i mig ni bslus pa ste// de la mi mnyam ci ma mchis// de bzhin
144b2(dkon brtsegs): chos dbyings mnyam lags na// byis pa rnams ni de la rmongs// gang shes khyod kyi bslab pa la// legs bslabs rmongs par mi 'gyur ba// lag mthil skyu ru rabazhin du// de ni kun mkhyen khyod kyis
144b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan// shes rab chen po khyod kyis ni// ye shes sgron ma rab bus te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor nas// sems can rnams la chos bstan pa// de ltar bdag cag myur du ni// bla med byang chub ni thob
144b4(dkon brtsegs): ste// ji ltar 'dren pa khyod bzhin du// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi// 'khor ba'i lam log 'di dag tu// 'khyams par gyur pa'i sems can la// ji ltar 'dren pas bstan pa bzhin// bdag cag
144b5(dkon brtsegs): gis kyang chos myur bstan/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis
144b6(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// rgyu ma mchis par rdzogs sangs rgyas// 'dren par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i 'dzum gyi rgyu// dpa' bo chen pos lung bstan gsol//
144b7(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa 'khor 'di dag/ bde gshegs deng bzhad mthong nas ni// yid gnyis chen po 'tshal gyur te// kun kyang the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur// de ring su yis bdud pham bgyis// nem nur gang gis bcad
145a1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur// su zhig de ring chos rtogs gyur// skyes bu mchog gis lung bstan gsol// de ring khyod la su yis mchod// ston pa gang gis bsnyen bkur bgyis// 'gro kun nem nur
145a2(dkon brtsegs): 'chal gyur na// rnam par 'dren pas lung bstan gsol// ji ltar cing gnyis mchog khyod kyis// lung bstan 'di dag zos gyur na// 'gro ba the tshom 'chang 'gyur ba// 'dren pas de ltar lung bstan
145a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol// ci nas rnam pa thams cad du// kun mkhyen lam la gnas pa'i rnams// myur du byang chub thob 'gyur ba// de ltar 'dren pas bstan du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'as
145a4(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa na thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i phyir// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mgon po la// 'dzum pa'i rgyu rnams dri bya zhes// rta thul khyod kyis
145a5(dkon brtsegs): dris pa legs// 'jig rten kun la phan pa'i phyir// bstan pa yid du 'ong 'gyur zhing // nyams dga' byed pa de bshad kyis// dran pa mngon byos mnyan par bgyis// dgu khri tham pa'i lha rnams kyis/
145a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'i rnam pa 'di lta bu// de ring de bzhin gshegs pa la// shin tu dad pa'i yid kyis byas// sangs rgyas mngon par bstod pa byas// stong pa nyid kyang shes par gyur// chos rnams la ni nges pa
145a7(dkon brtsegs): rnyed// nga yi bstan la rab tu gnas// sngon yang sangs rgyas bye ba phrag/ brgyad cu dag la 'di dag mchod// ma 'ongs dus na'ang sangs rgyas ni// bye ba mtha' yas mchod par 'gyur// 'dren pa de
145b1(dkon brtsegs): dag ji srid du// sangs rgyas bye ba ma mchod cing // bsnyen bkur byas par ma gyur pa// de srid byang chub 'tshang mi rgya// de bas shin tu 'phyib na// kun kyang gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// mtshan ni 'od zer
145b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chang ba ste// 'jig rten kun mkhyen thub par 'gyur// 'jig rten sgron ma de dag gi/ nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba ni// blo yi mchog dang ldan pa dag/ 'dus pa brgyad cu 'byung bar 'gyur// sgrib med gzigs
145b3(dkon brtsegs): ba de dag gi/ mi rnams de yi dus kyi tshe// lo zangs bye ba brgyad cu tham// srog gi dbang po gnas par 'gyur// shes rab mtha' yas de dag gi/ nyan thos 'dod chags bral ba rnams// lus kyi tha ma 'dzin
145b4(dkon brtsegs): pa dag/ bye ba tshad med 'byung bar 'gyur// sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i// 'jig rten mgon po dpal ldan rnams// mya ngan 'das pa'i ring bsrel yang // shin tu rgya chen 'byung bar 'gyur//
145b5(dkon brtsegs): mi dbang mya ngan 'das gyur nas// rnam par 'dren pa dpal ldan pa// rgyal ba'i mchod rten rnams kyis ni// sangs rgyas zhing rnams legs brgyan 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po skyob rnams kyi// mchod
145b6(dkon brtsegs): rten de dag thams cad la// srog chags brgya dang stong rnams dang // khrag khrig rnams kyis mchod byas nas// byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed de// mya ngan 'das pa thob par 'gyur// rang byung mya ngan 'das
145b7(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang // de dag dam chog gnas 'gyur ba// lo grangs bye ba khrag khrig phrag/ brgyad cu tshang bar gnas par 'gyur// chos kyi rgyal po'i sras rnams kyis// gzung zhing yongs su bsrung bar gnas//
146a1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten thugs brtse mdzad pa dang // shAkyas yongs su smin mdzad pa// rgyal chen bzhi yi ris rnams la// 'jig rten sgron mas lung bstan mdzad// de thos nas ni skye bo kun
146a2(dkon brtsegs): kun tu dga' zhing rab dga' ste// sems mgu yid kyang rangs gyur nas// ston pa la ni mngon par bstod// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /
146a3(dkon brtsegs): bam po drug pa// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus/ lha ma yin dag dang / nam mkha' lding dag dang / glu'i bu mo dag dang / klu dag
146a4(dkon brtsegs): dang / grul bum dag dang / dri za dag dang / gnod sbyin dag dang / mi 'am ci dag dang / 'phreng ldan glang po can dag dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ sangs
146a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi chos rnams la tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yid byung ba chen po skyes te/ 'dod pa'i tshul gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa bcom ldan
146a6(dkon brtsegs): 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur te/ de dag gis rin po che'i khang pa bkra ba blta na sdug pa// rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin can/ mu tig dmar po'i 'phreng ba dang / bai DUR+Ya'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/
146a7(dkon brtsegs): gser gyi 'breng ba sna tshogs dang / nor bu rin po che skar mdog gi 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ sa gnas rim pa brgya dang / ba gam dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung gis brgyan pa// gdugs dang / rgyal
146b1(dkon brtsegs): mtshan dang / bdan dag gis brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi seng ge'i khris brgyan pa/ bla re chen po dang / dril bu g.yer kha'i dra bas brgyan pa/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis mdzes par byas pa/ lha'i rol mo sel
146b2(dkon brtsegs): swan sgra rab tu 'byung ba bye ba phrag brgyad cu mngon par sprul to// rta cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta lnga rdzas kyi rnam pas legs par brgyan pa// gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dag gis mdzes
146b3(dkon brtsegs): par byas pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu'ang mngon par sprul to// ser skya'i gnas kyi grong khyer chen po thams cad dang ldan pa'i khor yug tu dpag tshad drug cu chun chad me tog man dar ba dang // lha'i mchod pa de dag
146b4(dkon brtsegs): gis rgyas par gang bar byas so// glang po che sa srungs kyi bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu'ang mngon par sprul te/ glang po che sa srungs kyi bu de dag re re zhing yang mgo bo bye ba phrag brgyad cu brgyad cug glang po rjes
146b5(dkon brtsegs): srungs kyi bu'i mgo de dag re re zhing yang so drug drug/ so de dag re re zhing yang rdzing bu bdun bdun/ rdzing bu de dag re re zhing yang pad+ma stong phrag bdun bdun pa pad+ma de dag re re ba zhing yang 'dab ma brgyad khri
146b6(dkon brtsegs): brgyad khri 'dab ma re re zhing yang lnga'i bu mo bdun bdun/ lha'i bu mo de dag re re zhing yang 'khor bdun bdun yod pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa sha stag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i khang pa de
146b7(dkon brtsegs): dag mdun du byas te dbus su glang po ches srungs kyi bu dag brtsad nas/ phyi bzhin shing rta de dag bshams pa de dag bkye nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas so// rin po che'i khang pa de dag las
147a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang / lha'i can na dang / a ka rung / ut+pal dang / ta ma la'i lo ma'i phye ma dang / gser bye'i char mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i me tog man dar ba dang / mnad rab chen po
147a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / man dzu sha ka dang / man dzu sha ka chen po dang / pa ru sha ka dang / ba ru sha ka chen po dang / mdog dkar dang / mdog dkar chen po dang / sprul pa'i me tog dag gi nar yang mngon par bab par gyur to// gse
147a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ka dngul dang / bai N+yaR+Ya dang / shel dang mu tig dmar po dang / spug dang / rdo'i snying po dang / rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par bab par gyur to// lha'i bu mo de dag las la la ni glu len/
147a4(dkon brtsegs): la la ni gar byed ka la la ni rol mo byedaka la la ni lus kyi tshul sgyur zhing lha ma yin gyi mchod pa lta bu dang / glang po ches srungs kyi bu de dag dang / rin po che'i khang pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas/ de'i
147a5(dkon brtsegs): 'og tu rta cang shes kyis drangs pa'i shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu la zhon te// bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ lba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs mang po'ang phul bar gyur to// lnga'i rob
147a6(dkon brtsegs): mo sil snyan bye ba phrag brgyad cu'ang bar snang las sgra 'byin par gyur to// shing rta bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag la'ang lnga'i bu mo gzhan bye ba phrag brgyang cu brgyang cu mngon par sprul to// lha'i bu mo de dag ca
147a7(dkon brtsegs): la la ni glu len/ la la ni gar byed/ la la ni rol mo byed/ la la ni lus kyi tshul sbyar zhing / lha ma yin gyi mchod pa ji lta ba bzhin du byas so// de nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha phye
147b1(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ji ltar sprul pa'i lha'i bu mo 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed pa las na/ chos thams cad kyang sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin du nges so snyam nas/ de dag
147b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di snyam du chos 'di dag thams cad ni/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa de bzhin te/ sprul pa dang 'dra ba yin no snyam du sems par gyur cing / de dag gis chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar
147b3(dkon brtsegs): shes nas chos la the tshom med pa thob par gyur to// de dag de ltar the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs
147b4(dkon brtsegs): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de dag chos thams cad sprul pa dang 'dra bar rtog cing / bdag cag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong / mchod pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra
147b5(dkon brtsegs): par mthong / bcom ldan 'das kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis chos gang bstan pa de dag kyang sprul pa dang 'dra bar yang dag par shes te/ de dag gis chos thams cad
147b6(dkon brtsegs): sprul pa lta bu'o zhes bya bar shes nas// the tshom med cing nem nur med par gyur te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa// 'gro ba kun gyis mchod pa gang bgyis
147b7(dkon brtsegs): dang / sprul pa'i mchod pa 'di dag gang bgyis dang // lha rnams kyis ni sangs rgyas mchod byas pa// 'di ltar chos 'di thams cad sprul pa nyid// 'dren pas chos kun gsungs pa dang
148a1(dkon brtsegs): lags dang // de bzhin gshegs pas lung bstan mtha' dag kyang // 'di dag thams cad sprul pa 'dra'o zhes// de ltar lha tshogs de dag blo gros skyes// bcom ldan sprul
148a2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dag ji bzhin du// ston pa'ang de bzhin sprul dang 'dra ba ste// rgyal bas lung bstan bdag cag 'tshal gyur pas// 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis so// rgyal bas so so'i skye bo rnams
148a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen nas// byis pa'i sa thob tha snyad gang btags pa// de dag kun kyang sprul pa ji bzhin te// bde gshegs 'gro ba lung bstan de bzhin no// slob pa rnams dang gang dag mi slob dang // bcom ldan nyan thos
148a4(dkon brtsegs): dul ba'i sa thob pa// de dag kun kyang bcom ldan sprul dang 'dra// bcom ldan bstan la the tshom ma mchis so// bcom ldan gang rnams mi smre lhur len cing // bse ru lta bur gnyis med nyon mongs spangs//
148a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag rnams kyang sprul 'dra bcom ldan 'das// bde gshegs bstan la the tshom ma mchis so// gang rnams 'gro ba kun la bde phan phyir// rgyal ba'i byang chub sbyad spyod bag yod pa'i// byang chub sems
148a6(dkon brtsegs): dpa'i bde gshegs sras dag kyang // khyad par ma mchis sprul pa 'di dang 'dra// bde gshegs rab byung rnam par 'dren pa mchog/ stobs bcu shes rab mtha' yas thugs rje can// ye shes stobs 'phag
148a7(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten gtso bo dag/ sprul pa 'di 'dra de dag rang bzhin mtshungs// 'dren pas 'di la chos rnams gang gsungs pa// gnas med zhe bsil nyon mongs med gyur cing // sdug bsngal zhi byed mthar thug grangs
148b1(dkon brtsegs): med pa// de yang sprul pa 'di dag ji bzhin no// bcom ldan 'di la chos rnams gang dag kyang // sprul pa'i rang bzhin ma lags de ma mchis// gang ne go'u ta ma'i bstan pa 'di// bdag cag rtogs nas the tshom than
148b2(dkon brtsegs): cad spangs// sprul pa 'di 'drar chos rnams kun mthong nas// bdag cag rnams kyang 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// bde gshegs spyod yul 'di la spyod pa rnams// the tshom ma mchis rang byung 'dren par 'gyur/
148b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta
148b4(dkon brtsegs): thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// gzhal yas grags mnga' mtha' yas gzi brjid can// bde gshegs rnams ni rgyu med 'dzum mi mdzad// rnam par 'dren pas
148b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni 'dzum mdzad na// rgyal bas 'dzum pa'i tshig gsungs the tshom khum// rang byung bde gshegs zhal nas 'dzum pa 'di// byung bar rig nas 'jig rten+da the tshom 'tshal// 'gro ba'i the tshom thub
148b6(dkon brtsegs): pas bsal du gsol// 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis mdzod// lnga tshogs 'di rnams rab tu yid dga' bas// rgyal bas bstod de lha rdzas rnams kyis mchod// bde gshegs de dag don du
148b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad// rgyal ba 'khor 'di dga' mdzad bka' sbrul gsol// zla 'drar dri med 'od mnga' mtha' yas gzi// can nas bde gshegs bka' ni 'di thos pas// mgon po 'gro ba thams cad
149a1(dkon brtsegs): dgar 'gyur bar// rgyal ba lnga tshogs mchod mkhyen bka' stsal gsol// bde gshegs lnga tshogs 'di yis chos rnams kun// sprul pa lta bur rnam par rtogs gyur na/
149a2(dkon brtsegs): stobs bcu mnga' bas don 'di bka' stsol te// rab rib bral ba lha yi bslab pa gsungs// skye bo 'di dag the tshom bral gyur nas// thub pa de ltar byang chub spyod rtsom 'gyur// rab tu dpa' ba
149a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor 'dis thos gyur te// dgongs pa rigs nas rgya chen rtsom par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis katshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ lha
149a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs 'di dag rab tu dga' shes nas// rta thul khyod kyis dus dang ldan pa'i rigasmras pa de ni dus la bab pa ste// 'dzum pa dris pa de ni lung bstan to// lha rnams bsam shes 'dzum pa des
149a5(dkon brtsegs): dris pa// des ni khyod kyis 'gro ba'i don chen byas// 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de ngas bstan gyis// dgrar zhing dang ba'i sems kyi sang la nyon// lha tshogs rnams kyis chos rnams 'di dag ni// ma
149a6(dkon brtsegs): lus sprul pa lta bur shes gyur nas// chags med ye shes mthong ba dpag med cing // rab rib bral ba'i 'jig rten mgon por 'gyur// srid pa'i rgyud na sngon yang 'khor ba'i tshe// mi yi gtso bo bad+hA'i
149a7(dkon brtsegs): byi snyed chos// srid rgyun de na 'di dag thub pa las// chos rnams sprul pa lta bur ma mthong ngo // 'di dgang la mchod mchogs 'dir byas pas// chos rnams sprul pa 'dra bar mngon du mthong / ba
149b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs bstan pa 'di la byas pa ni// chung zos mi 'gyur bar chad song mi 'gyur/ lha tshogs 'di yis ngal mchod byas te// chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar shes pas// bskal pa pad+ma zhes
149b2(dkon brtsegs): bya byung ba'i tshe// smra ba'i zlab mi yi mchog tur gyur// khyu mchog ldan pa'i ming mchog 'gyur ba ni// bde gshegs rab mkhas dbang po'i tog rdul po// chos rnams thams cad sprul pa 'drar ston cing //
149b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba khrag khrig dpag med 'grel bar 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag bstan la bag yod pa// chos rnams 'di dag sprul pa 'dra bar sems// zhi gnas de la su rten bag yod pa// myur du bla med byang chub mchog
149b4(dkon brtsegs): zhi thob// sum cu rtsa gsum pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe 'thab bral gyi lha bye ba phrag bzhi bcus lha ma yin rnams nas sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi
149b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bar de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong // lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyang lung bstan pa la thog
149b6(dkon brtsegs): pa med par shes shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni nyams dga' ba ste/ de dag thob na ma shes pa 'am/ ma mthong ba 'am/ ma rtogs pa 'am/ mngon du ma byas pa 'am// skye ba 'am// 'gag pa 'am/ las
149b7(dkon brtsegs): sam las kyi rnam par smin pa gang yang med do zhes sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed do// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pas kun rdzob dang don dam pa gnyis thugs su chud de// shes par bya
150a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang kun rdzob dang don dam pa 'dir zad do// de'ang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid du rab tu gzigs/ rab tu mkhyen// legs par mngon du mdzad pas/ de'i phyir thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya'o//
150a2(dkon brtsegs): de la kun rdzob ni 'jig rten gyi spyod par de bzhin gshegs pas gzigs so// don dam pa gang yin pa de ni brjod du med pa ste/ shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ yongs su
150a3(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya ba ma yin pa/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma bstan pa/ ma mthong ba/ ma btags pa// 'dzin du ma bcug pa/
150a4(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par ma byas pa/ thob par ma byas pa/ ma thob pa// nye bar ma bsnyen pa/ ma bor ba/ ma gzhag pa/ ma spangs pa/ bya ba med pa/ byed pa med pa// rab tu zhi ba med pa// ma smad pa// ma bstod pa// thob pa ma
150a5(dkon brtsegs): yin pa/ ma thob pa ma yin pa/ bde ba ma yin pa/ sdug bsngal ba ma yin pa/ snyan pa ma yin pa/ mi snyan pa ma yin pa/ gzugs ma yin pa/ gzugs med pa ma yin pa/ zangs med pa/ grangs pa med pa/
150a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten med pa/ 'jig rten dang bral ba med pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa/ rnam par byang ba med pa/ 'gro ba med pa/ ldog pa med pa/ ma brtags pa/ rnam par ma brtags pa/ ma g.yos pa/ ma bsam
150a7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ ma bskyod pa/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa dang bral ba ste/ ji ltar gzugs kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi
150b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa// mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs dang / sgra dang / dzi nga / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi mnan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi rnam par shes
150b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
150b3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i mnan ma mi dmigs pa/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba'i bar gyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs kyi 'du
150b4(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar gyi 'du shes kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ gzugs su sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ chos kyi bar du sems pa'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa
150b5(dkon brtsegs): yid la bya ba'i mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs
150b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i khams kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa/ 'dus byas dang 'dus mi byas kyi mtshan ma mi dmigs pa ste/ 'di ltar chos gang dang gang brjod pa'i rang bzhin gang dang gang gis brjod pa'i chos de
150b7(dkon brtsegs): dang de brjod pa'i rang bzhin de dang des mi brjod pa ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni de ltar nyams dga' ba yin na// de byis pa so so'i skye bo thos pa dang mi ldan pa mi shes pa rnams kyis thos
151a1(dkon brtsegs): na 'jigs shing dngang ba dang skrag par 'gyur te/ nges 'jigs par gyur pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes las nyams par 'gyur te/ de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig
151a2(dkon brtsegs): rten gyis mya ngan du bya ba ste/ 'khor ba na yod pa'i sdug bsngal gyi rgyun to zhes te/ de dag gis 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la 'dod pa bskyed nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi don du/ bcom
151a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mchod pa'i phyir brtson par gyur to// de dag gis sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i mchod pa las khyad par du 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
151a4(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ka bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas 'thab bral gyi lha de dag gis/ bcom ldan 'das la
151a5(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis phung po dben par gzigs// khams dang skye mched rnams kyang de bzhin te// dbang po'i grong ni mtshan mas dben pa dag/ kun kyang
151a6(dkon brtsegs): thub pa khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i bden pa 'di gnyis te// khyod kyis gzhan las ma gsan rang gis gzigs// de ni kun rdzob bden dang don dam ste// bden pa gsum
151a7(dkon brtsegs): pa gang yang ma mchis so// gang gis bde bar gshegs la 'gro ba rnams// bde ba'i don du dad pa skyed 'gyur ba// rgyal bas 'gro ba rnams kyi don slad du// 'jig rten phan phyir kun rdzob de bstan to// /
151b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can chags kyis 'gro drug dang bstan pa// sems can dmyal dang dung 'gro yi dgas dang // a min ris dang mi dang lU mi rnams/ yi lci seng ges kun rdzob btags pa mdzad// rigs dma'/
151b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin mtho ba'i rigs rnams dang // phyug po'i khyim dang dbul po'i khyim rnams dang // bran gyi tshe ba dang de bzhin g.yog gi tshogs// bud med tshogs dang skyes pa ma ming dang // 'gro ba'i khyad par ji snyed
151b3(dkon brtsegs): gang yang rung // mtshungs med khyod kyis 'jig rten bstan mdzad pa// kun rdzob bden par mkhas pas thugs chud nas// 'jig rten phan pas mi la de bstan to// de la dga' ba'i 'gro ba 'khor ba na/
151b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba'i chos brgyad de la mi 'byung ste// thob dang ma thob snyan dang mi snyan dang // bstod dang smad dang bde dang sdug bsngal lo// thob pa rnyed na de la chags pa skyed// ma thob gyur na des kyang 'khrug par
151b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gang gan nam bstan tshul 'dis shes par bya// nang rnams brgyad kyis de rgyud gnod par 'gyur// kun rdzob de la don dam su smra ba// de dag nor ba'i blo ldan shes par bya// mi sdug sdug dang
151b6(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal bde ba dang // bdag med rang bzhin bdag tu smra ba dang // mi rtag chos la rtag ces smra bgyid cing // de ltar dga' ste mtshan mar gang gnas pa// de dag bde gshegs gsung ni thos gyur na//
151b7(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing ji bzhin mi rtogs spong bar bgyid// de dag bde gshegs gsung ni spangs gyur pas// sems can dmyal ba sdug bsngal mi bzang myong // de dag tshul min bde ba tshol bgyid kyang //
152a1(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal brgyad dag byis pas myong bar 'gyur// 'jig rten phan pa'i bstan pa su zhig gis// ma log blos ni rnam par rtogs gyur na// sbrul gyi pags pa rnying ltar rab spangs
152a2(dkon brtsegs): te// srid pa kun las 'das na zhi bar 'gyur// chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin dben pa ste// stong pa mtshan ma med pa don dam zhes// gang gis thos nas dga' ba skyed 'gyur ba// de dag bla med byang chub
152a3(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// ji ltar bde bar gshegs pas gsungs pa'i chos// de la lha rnams the tshom ma mchis te// 'gro ba thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i phyir// de dag bla na med pa'i byang chub tshol// byang
152a4(dkon brtsegs): chub blo can rnam dag blo can rnams// skyes bu mchog gis dga' ba bskyed du gsol// de thos 'gro ba kun la sman slad du// bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ de nas de'i tshe bcom
152a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis 'thab bral ris kyi lnga bye ba phrag bzhi bcu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rnga thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su
152a6(dkon brtsegs): bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten phan pas 'dzum pa gang mdzad des// khyod kyi 'khor ni the tshom 'tshal bar 'gyur// mi mchog 'dzum pa'i rgyu de bka' stsal gsol// des ni 'khor 'di rab tu dga'
152a7(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// lha rnams lung bstan de ni thos gyur na// 'khor 'di shin tu dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rigs pa ldan pa bstan pa 'di nyid la// bde bar nan tan bgyid cing rtsom par 'gyur// rgyal ba
152b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod 'khor 'di ni mchog ldan te// drang srong chen po sangs rgyas yon tan snod// 'gro ba 'di rnams bsdu ba mdzad skad du// snyan pa'i gsung ni legs par brjod du gsol// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu
152b2(dkon brtsegs): dag thos gyur na/ skye dgu kun la rab tu sman par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pas lung bstan de thos ni// mkhas pa rnams ni tshul bzhin rtsom par 'gyur// mi yi dam pa smra ba'i mchog gis 'dir//
152b3(dkon brtsegs): the tshom 'tshal ba'i nem nur legs par gsol// 'khor rnams thams cad thos par dga' zhing sdong // lha rnams lung bstan pa ni bka' stsal gsol// kun kyang rim gror gus par rna blags te/
152b4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis lung bstan rab tu dga' ba la// sgrib pa rab tu spangs shing de dag nyan// 'jig rten pa na phyir skyes bu mchog gis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan
152b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal // 'jig rten phan phyir mkhas pas 'dzum mdzad pa// rta thul khyod kyis dris pa dus dang ldan// sangs rgyas yon tan mthu ni thos gyur na// skye bo
152b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs can rnams kyi don du 'gyur// sangs rgyas yon tan tshogs la blo zhan cing // 'dod rgyags blo dang zhe sdang blo ldan dang // tshe rabs brgyar ni rtsod pa'i blo can dang // gti mub blo can dga' ba sbyar/
152b7(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// gang rnams rgyal bas bstan la dga' ba dang // gang gis rgyal ba rnams la sngon 'dris dang // gang rnams snying rje tshe dang ldan pa dag/ de kun sangs rgyas yon tan ldan par 'gyur// gang gis
153a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba gnod zin mthong gyur te// mi yi seng ge snying rje skyed byed pa// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan 'di thos na// ut+pal 'phreng bzhin mgo la 'khyer bar 'gyur// nga yi 'khor 'di
153a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu dga' gyur pa// sngon gyi rgyal la bsnyen bkur sngon byas te// de dag sangs rgyas yon tan yid 'ong 'di// me tog 'phreng bzhin de dag yang dag lta// 'thab bral lha rnams sngon gyi rgyal kun la// bsnyen
153a3(dkon brtsegs): bkur byas shing chags pa spangs pa ste// nyon mongs smad cing sangs rgyas blo ldan gyur// snying rje ldan zhing nyon mongs med blo ldan// rgyal ba mi yi seng ge gang+gA yi// bye snyed kun la sngon chad bsnyen bkur
153a4(dkon brtsegs): byas / byang chub bla na med par smon byed cing // dge ba mtha' yas 'di dag kun gyis byas// sems can nyon mongs 'dam bying rig gyur nas// sdug bsngal gyur pa rnams la snying rje bskyed// de dag
153a5(dkon brtsegs): mi mchog sems can phan mdzad la// chos tshul mtha' yas yongs su dris par gyur// gang thos nas ni rnam par 'dren gyur pa// rnam 'dren chos la 'jug pa 'chad par 'gyur// mi yi nyon mongs spyod
153a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rab mkhyen nas// de dag rnams la rgya chen chos kyang 'chad// rnam 'dren skyes bu dam pa'i mchog de dag/ rang bzhin med pa stong pa nyid kyang 'chad// de dag rgyal ba'i gsung de thos gyur nas// 'gro
153a7(dkon brtsegs): ba thams cad stong pa rab tu rtogs// cis stong zhe na mtshan ma'i rnam pas stong // rang bzhin med cing mtshan ma med par smra// rgyal ba'i chos rnams de ltar shes gyur nas// kun kyang sangs
153b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyas yon tan rnams la gnas// de dgang la mchod pa rgya cher byas// bdag gis chos bzhin du ni lung bstan nas// skar tshogs mnyam pa'i bskal pa dam pa la/ bla na med pa'i byang chub
153b2(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur// bde gshegs mnyam pa med pa bye ba phrag/ nyi shu nyi shus yongs su gang bar 'gyur// blo gros dag ces bya ba'i grangs su 'gro// sems can bsam las yongs su sbyongs par
153b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'thab bral 'khod pa'i lha yi bsam pa rnams// rta thul gyis ni yongs su zhus byas pa// rgyal ba dgra rgyal drang srong chen po yis// lung bstan lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dga'/
153b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thab bral ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// / de nas dga' ldan ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'thab bral gyi ris kyi lha'i bar de dag gi
153b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ 'di snyam du sems te/ gang bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i chos de gang zhig
153b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs sam/ 'on te tshor ba 'am// 'on te 'du shes sam// 'on te 'du byed dam/ 'on te rnam par shes pa zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung
153b7(dkon brtsegs): bstan snyam nas/ de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ gzugs 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed
154a1(dkon brtsegs): dang / rnam par shes pa ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ma bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs kyang ma skyes pa/ byang
154a2(dkon brtsegs): chub kyang ma skyes pa na/ ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang ma skyes pa/ byang chub kyang ma
154a3(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa na/ de la ji ltar ma skyes pas ma skyes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya/ gzugs kyang 'gags pa med pa/ byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang 'gag pa med
154a4(dkon brtsegs): pa byang chub kyang 'gag pa med pa/ gzugs kyang spros pa med pa/ byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang spros pa med pa// byang chub kyang spros pa med pa/ gzugs kyang
154a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su med pa// byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang gnyis su med pa/ byang chub kyang gnyis su med pa/ gzugs kyang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med/
154a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par shes pa'i bar yang g.yo ba med pa/ byang chub kyang g.yo ba med pa/ gzugs kyang dmigs su med pa// byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa/ rnam par shes pa'i bar yang dmig
154a7(dkon brtsegs): su med pa/ byang chub kyang dmigs su med pa nas/ ji ltar 'gag pa med pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / gnyis su med pa dang / g.yo ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pas 'gag pa med pa dang /
154b1(dkon brtsegs): dmigs smra med pa'i bar du mngon par rdzogs par 'chung bya bar bya// de ltar chos thams cad ni mi dmigs na/ 'di la sangs rgyas ni bdu// byang chub sems dpa' ni dang // byung nub ni byang rba
154b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa ni gang / gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong// sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong
154b3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong / byang chub ni byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong / lung bstan pa ni lung bstan pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ de ltar chos thams cad rang
154b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis stong pa la// gzugs zhes bya ba dang / rnam par shes pa'i bar zhes bya ba dang / sangs rgyas zhes bya ba dang / lung bstan pa'i bar zhes bya ba de dag ni tha snyad tsam/ ming tsam/ brda cag
154b5(dkon brtsegs): kun rdzob tsam/ brjod pa tsam/ gdags pa tsam ste/ de la mkhas pa rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba mi cha'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang
154b6(dkon brtsegs): ldan zhing rtse rtse ba las// de nyal ba las sad na 'dod pa'i yon tan de dag mi mthong ste/ de rjes su dran yang mi rnyed cing / de ltar ma rnyed pa'i phyir sdug bsngal du gyur pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i
154b7(dkon brtsegs): theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyang byang chub tshol na de dag byang chub dang phrad par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub ma rnyed cing rom myong bas sdug bsngal du 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos
155a1(dkon brtsegs): bya/ thams cad ni rmi lam lta bu nor ba ste/ chos de dag gi don ni rnam pa gzhan la/ so so'i skye bo de dag kyang rnam pa gzhan du zhen to// chos de dag ni de ltar shes par bya ba yin na/
155a2(dkon brtsegs): de la chos gang zhig sangs rgyas yin/ gang zhig byang chub sems dpa' yin/ gang zhig byang chub yin/ gang zhig lung bstan pa yin/ de ltar chos thams cad dmigs su med de/ so so'i skye bo'ang dmig
155a3(dkon brtsegs): su med// so so'i skye bo'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyang dmigs su med/ nyan thos kyi chos kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
155a4(dkon brtsegs): kyang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dmigs su med/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyang dmigs su med/ sangs rgyas kyang dmigs su med// sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang dmig su med/ byang chub kyang
155a5(dkon brtsegs): dmigs su med/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang dmigs su med do// bcom ldan 'das de la ni bdag cag the tshom ma mchis/ yid gnyis ma mchis so zhes gsol nas/ dga' ldan ris kyi lha'i bu de
155a6(dkon brtsegs): dag chos de ngag la the tsom med cing // nemu nur med par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir brtson par gyur nas/ de dag gis 'thub bral gyi mchod pa las khyad par
155a7(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod/
155b1(dkon brtsegs): do/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad ba dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ gang dag sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas pa// de dgra 'jug pa de bzhin
155b2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas gsungs// rnam thar sgo gsum de ni rnyed gyur pas// mtshungs pa med pa'i spyod yul spyod par 'gyur// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes ma mchis te// sems dang bsam pa de
155b3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma mchis pa// chags med blo mnga' rnams kyi spyod yul lags// mi yi seng ge phung po dben la dgyes// skyes bu dam pa mkhas pa de dag gi/ byang chub sems kyang nam yang 'byung ma mchig
155b4(dkon brtsegs): phung po dben pa'i yon tan myong gyur nas// sangs rgyas dgongs la nem nur spangs blo ldan// de dag byang chub smon pa ma mchis shing // byang chub sems la'ang de dag mi smod de// dga' dang zhum
155b5(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba ma mchis par// bde gshegs sras rnams spyad pa spyod par bgyid// bde gshegs rnams kyis chos rnams mnyam par gzigs// de la rgyal sras 'jigs dang bral ba rnams
155b6(dkon brtsegs): yang dag nyid du sangs rgyas legs spyod cing / mkhas pa de dag 'jig rten 'di na spyod// gzugs kyi mtshan ma rnam par gzhig bgyis shing // mtshan ma'i rnam pa thams cad rab spangs te/
155b7(dkon brtsegs): srid pa gsum la de dag yong mi smon// dngos po stong par smon lam de dag bgyid// phung po 'di dag ma skyes rtogs gyur cing // lung bstan bde gshegs nyid kyang ma skyes la// byang chub
156a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' byang chub kyang ma skyes// de ltar gang 'tshal de la rmongs ma mchis// skye bo'i chos dang sangs rgyas yon tan rnams// de dag kun dang bde gshegs ma skyes te// mi
156a2(dkon brtsegs): yi seng ge de ltar gang 'tshal ba// de mi khyod sras khyod ni de yi yab// gang zhig phung po 'gag pa ma mchis shing // khams dang skye mched de bzhin rgyal ba'i chos// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung brtan
156a3(dkon brtsegs): ba bcom ldan 'di kun 'gag med 'tshal ba dang // gang rnams byang chub 'tshal zhing spyod bgyid pa// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag 'gag ma mchis// 'gro ba thams cad 'gag med blor gyur
156a4(dkon brtsegs): na/ de 'dra'i blo ldan byang chub rnyed mi dka'// phung po skye mched dag dang khams rnams dang // byang chub rgyal brgyal sras mi g.yo bar// gang gis 'tshal ba de dag rgyal sras te// de dag
156a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba'i chos 'di 'dzin pa legs// phung po sems med de bzhin skye mched dang // khams dang byang chub rgyal ba rgyal sras dang // lung bstan de bzhin sems pa ma mchis par// gang gis
156a6(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba de dag rgyal ba'i sras// rang byung phung po dngos nyid spong ba ste// khams dang skye mched dag dang rgyal ba dang // byang chub dang ni lung bstan rgyal sras rnams// ngo bo nyid kyis stong par gang
156a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa// phung po spos 'dra de bzhin khams rnams dang // skye mched rkang gnyis mchog dang byang chub dang // lung bstan spros pa med par gang spyod cing // de ltar gang 'tshal de dag rgyal ba'i phrag/
156b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa ma mchis mi gnas ma 'gras te// mchis pa ma lags ma mchis yong ma lags// 'dus byas ma lags 'dus ma byas ma lags// de ltar gang nal de dag rgyal ba'i sras// la
156b2(dkon brtsegs): dang 'gro 'di de ltar yongs mthong zhing // ston pa'i dgongs pa de ltar 'tshal myur lags// de ltar bgyis na gang zag mchog mchod cing // 'dren pa 'khor dang bcas la bsnyen bkur lags/ rnam
156b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren la bstod pa'i bsod nams gang // ji snyed 'jig rten pa na mdzad mkhyen pa yi// dge bas de yis 'gro ba rang byung ba// rgyal ba mtshan mchog ldan par grub par shog
156b4(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dga' ldan ris kyi lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
156b5(dkon brtsegs): de gsol pa/ 'dren pa'i rgyu yi stobs ni gang zhig gis// stobs can brnyes pa 'di ltar 'dzum mdzad pa// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de 'dren pas bka' stsal gsol// des ni 'jig rten 'di
156b6(dkon brtsegs): dag dga' bar 'gyur// shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dris mthong the tsom 'tshal gyur te// nyan par 'tshal zhing gzhan du mi sems par// kun kyang 'jig rten phan pa'i
156b7(dkon brtsegs): zhal du lta// 'di ltar dper na nad pa nang skyo ba// sman pas bsgo ba bzhin du 'dzin bgyid pa// de bzhin 'khor 'di lung bstan thos 'tshal zhing // rkang gnyis dbang po bde gshegs zhal du
157a1(dkon brtsegs): lta/ 'khor 'di thams cad rgya chen ldan pa ste// sangs rgyas dgongs la zhen pa'i yid dang ldan// rgyal bas lung bstan de dag thos 'tshal te// kun kyang bde
157a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs zhal du lta zhing sdod// de la rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // ci nas 'khor 'di rab tu dga' 'gyur dang // sangs rgyas dgongs la bsam pa gzhog 'gyur bar// ye shes
157a3(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyis the tsom gcang du gsol// mi yi khyu mchog lung bstan dus la bab// the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom bsal du gsol// sangs rgyas slar sngo'i dgra ni mi mnga' na// rtog ge'i tshig
157a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sde ni gzhig tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la rigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul khyod kyis 'jig rten sgron mdzad la/
157a5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa'i don dris de ni dus dang ldan// de ltar 'jig rten mkhas la dris pas na// de ring 'gro ba 'di yi don chen byas// 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa 'di mdzad pa// gang gis chos rab 'di/
157a6(dkon brtsegs): dag shes gyur te// ngal mchod pa rgya chen 'di byas pa'i// dga' ldan lha yi bsam pa mkhyen nas mdzad// 'gro ba yang dag rtogs pa bzhin du mthong // rgyal ba'i dgongs pas chos
157a7(dkon brtsegs): nyid brnyes par gyur// gang la 'gro ba thams cad rmongs gyur pa'i// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum rab tu rtogs// sngon gyi rgyal ba rnams la lhag bya byas// bsam pa gcig gis
157b1(dkon brtsegs): zhu ba legs par zhus// de nyid du ni stong nyid legs par bsgoms// sngun chad byas pa de ni 'dir yang bstan// de dag de bzhin gshegs dang deng phrad cing // skyes bu mchog dang
157b2(dkon brtsegs): 'grogs pa thob gyur nas// stong pa nyid kyis 'dren pa stong byas pas// de ring 'gro ba'i don chen shin tu byas// 'gro ba thams cad skye med ji bzhin du// byang chub rgyal ba de bzhin lung
157b3(dkon brtsegs): bstan dang // gang dag zhi ba thob nas spyod pa dang // byang chub de bzhin de dag skye ba med// 'gro ba kun gyi chos nyid 'di 'dra ba// de shes byang chub thob par 'gyur ro zhes// lha rnams gang yang
157b4(dkon brtsegs): de la the tshom med// byang chub sems kyi rtag par de ltar spyod// de bzhin 'gro ba 'gag med ji bzhin du// lha tshogs 'di dag rtogs pa'i blo ldan te// mkhas pa 'di dag nem nur med pas
157b5(dkon brtsegs): nA de phyir 'di dag rtul ba rang byung 'gyur// gnas po med pa la ni nges gyur nas// g.yo ba med pa de la nem nur med// 'gro ba kun la sems pa yod min pa// dela'ang lha rnams
157b6(dkon brtsegs): the tsom yong med do// chos rnams ngo bo nyid kyis rang bzhin med// byang chub sems dang de bzhin byang chub kyang // thams cad ngo bo nyid kyi rang bzhin med// de la'ang lha rnams the tshom
157b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams par dgablo mchog ldan pa'i dga' ldan lha 'di rnams// kun kyang gnas med de la rab gnas te// de phyir lha rnams byang chub rnyed mi dka'// rang byung nyid ni myur du thob
158a1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// 'dren pa yar ma 'dra ba'i bskal pa la// 'gro ba mtha' yas rnam par 'brel bar 'gyur// rgyal ba de dag mtshan du 'gyur ba ni// rang byung chos la rnam nges/
158a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po'o// de ltar rgyal bras dga' ldan lha rnams kyi// bsam pa mkhyen te 'grol bstan mdzad pa// de thos nas ni lhar bcas 'jig rten yang // yi rangs gyur cing stobs kyang thob pa 'gyur/
158a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga' ba bye ba phrag bdun cus lha ma yin rnams nas dga' ldan
158a4(dkon brtsegs): ris kyi bar gyi lha de dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yid rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la
158a5(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing / de bzhin nyid la the tsom med par gyur nas/ stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo//
158a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag cag gis 'tshal ba ltar na/ chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /
158a7(dkon brtsegs): slob pa ma mchis pa'i mtha' dang / mtha' yas pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnas pa'i mtha' dang / mi zad pa'i mtha' dang / mi gnyis pa'i mtha' ste/ mtha' ma mchis pa'o// bcom
158b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das de la ma nor ba'i spyad du yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// tshad ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' yas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// chags pa ma mchis pa'i slad du sgrib pa ma mchis pa'i
158b2(dkon brtsegs): mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ngo bo nyid ma mchis pa'i slad du mi gnas pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du mi zad pa'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ro gcig pa'i slad du mi gnyis
158b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtha' zhes bgyi'o// ma mchis pa'i slad du mtha' ma mchis pa zhes bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' 'di ni thams cad kyi rjes su song ba lags te/ chos gang yang dag pa'i
158b4(dkon brtsegs): mtha' ma lags pa'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ byang chub gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad rang
158b5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma mchis pa ni/ byang chub lags par rig par bgyi'o// tha na mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub po// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub ni rang bzhin ma mchis
158b6(dkon brtsegs): ba ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang rang bzhin ma mchis pa lags pas/ de'i slad du mtshams med pa rnams kyang byang chub ces bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
158b7(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dbyings ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
159a1(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa'i dbyings te/ mtshams med pa rnams kyang de'i rang bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das gang su dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'tshal ba de dag ni gnod par 'gyur ba'i
159a2(dkon brtsegs): chos can te/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gal te 'khor bar zhugs pa zhig mchis na ni/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang 'tshal bar 'gyur na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' la ni 'khor bar zhugs pa gang yang ma mchis
159a3(dkon brtsegs): na/ de mya ngan las 'das pa ci zhig tshol bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i mtha' ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de la bdag cag som nyi ma ma sa/ the tsom ma mchis so// /
159a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig chos 'di la nem nur dang the tsom me mchis na/ de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par
159a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par 'tshal bar bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag bdun cu
159a6(dkon brtsegs): po de dag rang gis ring lung bstan pa gsan nas// 'gro ba thams cad rab tu dga' bar bya ba'i phyir de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad
159a7(dkon brtsegs): de gsol pa/ 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas 'dzum pa mdzad/ 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni khyod kyis ma bstan te// rang byung skyes bu dam pa gang dag kyang // rgya ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad pas//
159b1(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyi zhal nas 'dzum pa de mdzad pas// mthong nas lhar bcas 'jig rten the tsom 'tshal// 'dzum pa'i rgyu de gang lags rang byung gsungs// the tsom 'tshal ba'i the tsom bsal du/
159b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol// khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu de thos gyur na// 'khor 'dri thams cad ngo mtshar thob par gyur// byang chub mchog ni yongs su bsgrub slad du// de dag la ma mchog shin tu rnam ga
159b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// the tsom 'tshal bdag ni nam du yang // byang chub yid bzhin bde bar mi 'grub ste// the tsom som nyi bsal nas mkhas pa rnams// byang chub mchog gi rgyu dang skal ldan 'gyur/
159b4(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis dbang po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag/ sdig pa yongs spangs byang chub sems dang ldan// lha rnams lung bstan de dag thos gyur na// rgyal ba'i gong phang rgya chen thob par 'gyur//
159b5(dkon brtsegs): de bas rgyal bas thugs rje che bskyed cing // the tsom 'tshal ba rnams la thugs brtse bas// lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad lung bstan cing // 'gro ba 'di dag thams cad dga' bar
159b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzod/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ dus ni 'jig rten phan phyir 'dzum pa mdzad// rta thul khyod
159b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis zhu ba de zhus pa// lung bstan de ni khyed la ma lus par// bstan par ngas byas dang bas kun kyang nyon// 'phrul dga'i ris kyi lha tshogs 'di rnams kyis// thams cad mkhyen par
160a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag lung bstan te// mu stegs tshogs kyi bsam pa zil mnan nas// 'khor 'dir seng ge'i nga ro chen po bsgrags// gnam du rdo 'phangs sa la ltung ba ltar// de la the
160a2(dkon brtsegs): tsom za bar mi 'gyur te// de ltar the tsom med pa'i tshul thob pa// bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// nyi ma nub gyur nam sros gyur pa'i tshe// mi rnams zla ba myur du 'tshar bar shes//
160a3(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin rgyal ba'i sras po chu la thob dag/ bdag cag nyid ni stobs bcur 'gyur bar shes// skar tshogs dbus na zla ba gnas pa ni// sems can mtshungs par 'di la the tsom med// de bzhin rgyal
160a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sras po'i tshul thob dag/ bdag cag thams cad mkhyen du 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar nyi ma nub par gyur pa'i tshe// nyi ma mi mthong sems can de dag shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul
160a5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa// ye shes dam pa thob par 'gyur du shes// chu klung ji ltar gzhol bar 'bab 'gyur zhing // rgya mtshor 'bab par mkhas pa rnams kyis shes// de bzhin bde gshegs sras po tshul shes
160a6(dkon brtsegs): pa// byang chub rgya chen 'thob par 'gyur bar shes// ji ltar gnam du bong ba 'phangs pa ni// sa la ltung bar 'gyur du the tshom med// de bzhin rgyal sras mkhas pa de dag kyang // 'jig rten mkhas
160a7(dkon brtsegs): par myur 'gyur ye shes 'jug gang thos nas ni the tsom med 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas yon tan gnas par bdag shes la// rang gi sar nye lag stong ma yin par// mkhas pa rnams kyis chos ci
160b1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mthong // gal te bdud kyi tshogs ni bye ba dag/ sangs rgyas gzugs bsgyur bar chad spras byas kyang // chos la mkhas pa chos nyid rab mthong ba// de dag byang chub las ni bzlog mi nus/
160b2(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sangs rgyas yon tan rab gnas shing // bdag gis bdag nyid lung bstan rjod byed pa// de la 'dren pa cho ga tshul mkhyen pa// mi dbang lung bstan de la yi rang mdzad// de ltar lnga tshogs 'di
160b3(dkon brtsegs): dag tshul 'di la// gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jig mngon shes shing // de dag bde gshegs 'gyur zhes rang sprul// 'jig rten mkhas pa rjes su yi rang mdzad// rta thul de bas mkhas pa gang gi rnam//
160b4(dkon brtsegs): bla med byang chub thob par byar sems pa// de dag tshul 'di shes par gang gyur pa'i// 'phags pa'i skye bo mkham la brten par bya// gang dag tshul la 'jug pa rab mthong zhing // mkhas pa
160b5(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bde gshegs bsnyen bkur ba// de dag byang chub lag mthil 'dra bar gsal// tshul shes de dag rang gis rang 'byung 'gyur// gang gis bskal pa stong du dka' thub spyad// sha khrag
160b6(dkon brtsegs): pags la mi lta byas pa bas// gang gis tshul 'di skad cig rtogs gyur na// de ni khyad 'phags dka' thub de lta min// 'das pa'i rang byung gang rnams byung ba dang // ma 'ongs sems can
160b7(dkon brtsegs): phan bzhed gang 'byung dang // da ltar dus na 'dren pa gang bzhugs pa// kun kyang tshul gyis bde bar gshegs pa thob// rab 'phrul lha tshogs thub pa'i tshul shes pa// 'di dgang la
