161a1(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa mchog byas shing // 'dren pa thams cad bsnyen bkur rab byas nas/ tshul gyis su ni rang byung thob par 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa'i ting 'dzin gang
161a2(dkon brtsegs): smin pa// de yis rgyal ba rang byung gnas pa'i rnams// de dag thams cad rgyal ba'i spyod yul ba// tshul thob rnams kyis sngon bsten myur du thob// de la rta thul sangs rgyas sras rnam
161a3(dkon brtsegs): ni rdza sangs rgyas gnas pa de la nem nur med// sangs rgyas tshul la sems can rnams brtse ba// tshul shes pa dag ston pa'i lam la spyod// de ltar tshul la dang ba'i yid byas te// brtsam
161a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya yi sdug bsngal spyod la min// rtag tu dge ba shes mkhas pa bsten byas na// bla med byang chub myur du thob par 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa'i gsung mchog thos nas ni// 'khor kun rgyal ba'i
161a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yi rangs te// rjes su yi rang the tsom med gyur nas// mthar phyin blo gros la mi zhugs par gyur// 'phrul dga' ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o//
161a6(dkon brtsegs): bam po bdun pa/ de nas de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'phrul dga'i lha'i bar dag
161a7(dkon brtsegs): gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dka' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
161b1(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'phrul dga'i lha rnams kyis yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes kyang smras pa de la bdag cag gis ni yang dag pa'ang ma dmigs na// de'i mtha' lta smos kyang ci 'tshal// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan
161b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das gang la la zhig gis yang dag pa dmigs na ni mtha' yang des dmigs par 'gyur te/ de ni gnyis kyis spyod pa'o// de lta bu de ni theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo rnams
161b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi spyod yul ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gnyis su ma mchis pa'i chos rnams la chos rnams ni gnyis su med do zhes mi spyod mi mos na/ de 'di snyam du bdag gis byang chub mngon
161b4(dkon brtsegs): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems su lags kyang / de ni lam log par zhugs par 'tshal bar bgyi ba'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das gang 'di byang chub tu smon pa de ni lam
161b5(dkon brtsegs): log par zhugs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gang mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba'i chos de gang yang ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'ga' zhig dmigs par
161b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das chos ni 'das pa ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa ma lags/ da ltar byung ba ma lags 'dus byas ma lags ka 'dus
161b7(dkon brtsegs): ma byas ma lags/ dngos po ma lags/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par
162a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags ka mngon du bgyi ba ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub ces bgyi ba de'ang chos gang gis gnyen po'ang ma lags la/ chos gang yang chos de'i gnyen po
162a2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags so// de ci'i skad du zhe na/ chos de ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags/ rnam par byang ba ma lags te/ gang gis chos gzhan gyi gnyen por gyur pa'i chos de'ang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs
162a3(dkon brtsegs): la gang chos de'i gnyen por gyur pa'i chos gzhan de gang yang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni mtshan ma dang bral ba ste/ de dag ni mngon par
162a4(dkon brtsegs): shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ spangs par bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni
162a5(dkon brtsegs): gzugs kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi skye ba'i mtshan ma nas/
162a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi skye ba gang lags pa de'ang skye ba'i mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// gzugs kyi 'gag pa nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar gyi 'gag pa gang lags pa de'ang 'gag pa'i mtshan
162a7(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'ang 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba dang bral ba'o// 'dus byas kyang 'dus byas kyi maH
162b1(dkon brtsegs): ma dang bral ba'o// 'dus ma byas kyang 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan ma dang bral ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de ltar ji tsam du phung pos bzung ba 'am/ skye ba dang 'gag pas bzung ba 'am/ 'das pas
162b2(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba 'am/ ma 'ongs pas bzung ba 'am/ da ltar byung bas bzung ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyis bzung ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyis bzung ba de dag ni rnam pa thams cad du mi dmigs te/
162b3(dkon brtsegs): lhur mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags/ yongs su shes par bgyi bla ma lags/ spang bar bgyi ba ma lags/ bsgom par bgyi ba ma lags/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lag
162b4(dkon brtsegs): te bcom ldan 'das gang dag de ltar zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa zhes bgyi'o// de nas
162b5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha de dag gis ji ltar shes pa'i chos de ltar lung bstan nas/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bcom ldan srid pa
162b6(dkon brtsegs): mthar 'byin legs par gsungs// 'dren pas srid pa'i snying po ma brnyes na// sme bo mi mkhas de dag 'jigs pa yis// 'khor ba'i pha rol bgrod phyir rab tu zhugs// phung po rnam ni kun
162b7(dkon brtsegs): tu mi dmigs te// phung po'i mtshan mas phung po stong pa nyid// chos gang gang gi gnyen por 'gyur ba ni// mtshan mas stong ste gang yang ma mchis so// ngo bo nyid kyis stong phyir dngos po gang /
163a1(dkon brtsegs): yongs shes bya dang spang bsgom mngon bya ba// gang yang ma mchis gang du'ang mi dmigs te// dngos po rnams ni dngos med rang byung gsung // byang chub gang yang mtshan mar mi
163a2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs te// byang chub phyogs kyi chos rnams de bzhin no// sangs rgyas gang yang mtshan mar mi dmigs te// byang chub sems dpa' mnan mar rtogs mi 'gyur// mi mkhas gang dag mtshan
163a3(dkon brtsegs): mar mngon zhen pa// de dag byang chub 'tshang rgyar sems bskyed kyang // mtshan mar spyod cing spyod yul logs pa ste// blo gros ngan pas byang chub lam mi spyod// mtshan ma sus spangs sangs rgyas
163a4(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul la// spyod pa de dag sangs rgyas bstan la mkhas// mtshan ma de bzhin mtshan mi med spangs te// stong dang mi stong de bzhin dmigs med pa// mkhas pa de dag byang chub lam la spyod//
163a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob// bas kyi rgol ba kun gyi spyod yul min// gnas de nyan thos rnams kyis bgrod bya min// rang rgyal rnams kyang de la mi 'gro ste// rnam zol sems ldan
163a6(dkon brtsegs): zag med tha ba med// dgra bcom bstan pa 'di la gang brtson dang // de bzhin rang rgyal skyob par gyur pa dag/ mkhas pa'i spyod yul de la spyod yul med// glo 'phang de ni mtshan ma spyod pa dang //
163a7(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid la sgom pa dang // gang rnams stong pas stong zhes spong sgra dang // chos kun rang bzhin yod smras 'thob mi nus// sangs rgyas ma snang rnams kyi bslab pa la// slob dang rnam bral slob
163b1(dkon brtsegs): ba slob pa'i rnams// mkhas de rtogs pa med pas byang chub rtogs// ston pas bstan pa bzhin du dgyes byed la// sangs rgyas gang gnyis gtso bo bstod pas na// bdag cag bsod nams mi
163b2(dkon brtsegs): chung gang thob des// 'gro ba byang chub dam par 'tshang rgya zhing // mi shes ston mdzad sangs rgyas grub par shog de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs
163b3(dkon brtsegs): ba gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu po de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ skye bo phal po che de dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do//
163b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha yi bsam pa mkhyen nas// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad la// thub
163b5(dkon brtsegs): pas 'dzum pa'i rgyu na ma gsungs na// le ba 'jam bu'i b+ha ni bstan du gsol// 'dren pa rgya med 'dzum pa mi mdzad ces// rgyal ba khyu mchog dam pas de skad gsus// 'dig rten don srung
163b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu// 'dren pa bka' stsol the tsom bsal du gsol// drang srong nan po'i zhal nas 'dzum rig nas/ thub chen khyod kyi 'khor rnams the tsam 'tshal// ko'u tam rgyal
163b7(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dren pas de dag la// 'jig rten sman slad 'dzum thu lung bstan gsol// 'di dag 'khor ba'i rgyud la rgyab phyogs te// mya ngan 'das pa'i sems kyis thal sbyar sdod// 'khor 'di yangs
164a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems la the tsom 'tshal// don yod grags mnga' som nyi bsal du gsol// bde gshegs bstan la the tsom ma mchis te// phyir zhing dang skyeng rim gro cher bgyid de// the tsom
164a2(dkon brtsegs): mi 'tshal sems ni krol 'gyur bar// rgyal bas skye bo'i the tshom legs par khum// bde gshegs bstan la 'di dag bder gnas shing // gang lam rang byung rgyal ba gshegs gyur pa// lam de nas ni
164a3(dkon brtsegs): the tsom ma mchis mchi// de bas skye bo'i the tsom gcad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ skye bo chog
164a4(dkon brtsegs): chen don dbang brten byas nas// tshigs su bcad de dus su gang smras shing // 'dzum pa'i don gyi rgyu ni yongs zhus pa// khyod kyi tshig ni dus dang ldan pa yin// rta thul dri ba de yi don dris pas//
164a5(dkon brtsegs): skye bo tshogs chen 'di yi don byas gyur// khyod kyis de dris skye bo tshogs chen dag/ byang chub mchog tu yang dag zhugs par gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed bsam pa ngas mkhyen te// rta thul 'dzum pa 'di ni
164a6(dkon brtsegs): ngas bstan to// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i snyan pa'i lam de nas// don du gnyer ba de dag de bzhin 'dong // gang gis 'gro ba 'di dag mtshan med par// smig rgyu la ni ji ltar chu bzhin mthong // byis pa
164a7(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa mkhas pa'i tshul bzhin te// de dag rjes su byang chub 'dod pas bslab// mtshan ma'i 'du shes spang phyir mi rnams gang // rtag tu mtshan ma mngon dga' 'dzags 'gyur zhing // mtshan ma'i
164b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes log pa'i lam du 'dong // mtshan ma med pas byang chub mchog thob 'gyur// med pa'i rtog ldan ma chun mar rnam btags nas// ji ltar btags pa de ltar 'ching ba min// mtshan ma stong
164b2(dkon brtsegs): par rnam mthong mkhas pa yi// zhi ba dag ni grags ldan dam pa 'thob// 'du shes mnan can mi mnyam sems rgyud kyis// sdig pa brgya dag mi mkhas de dag byed// 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mi
164b3(dkon brtsegs): chung myong // de ltar mi mkhas mtshan mar brtag par byas// mtshan mar 'du shes pas ni phung po dang // sangs rgyas byang chub byang chub sems dpa' mthong // de ltar mtshan ma med cing stong mthong na//
164b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub gzhal med bla na med pa 'thob// 'du shes mtshan ma can la nyon mongs 'phel// mtshan ma med par kun tu sbyor ba spong // mtshan ma las ni kun sbyor gzhan med de// kun tu sbyor ba de nyid
164b5(dkon brtsegs): mtshan med yin// gang rnams byang chub thob par bya rtog pa// rtog pa de nyid mi mkhas par chad yin// mkhas pa'i longs spyod rnam pa thob byed na// longs spyod de nyid mnan ma med par 'gyur// chos
164b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams gang yang rang bzhin nyid kyis med// rnam par rtog pas chos byung kun kyang stong // rtog pa med pas mtshan ma med par 'gyur// de nyid byang chub gzhan du mkhas mi smra// rgyal bas gsus
164b7(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag thos gyur nas// mi 'jigs ldan pa'i 'khor ni the tsom bsal// dper na tsam pa'i 'phreng ba 'dzin pa ltar// mkhas rnams thub pas gsungs la legs shes 'dzin// 'jigs
165a1(dkon brtsegs): pa med pa'i lha tshogs 'di dag gis// mchod pa 'phags pa bla na med byas shing // rgyal ba'i spyod yul chos kyang rab shes nas// 'gro ba rnam par 'dren pa kun mkhyen
165a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / de nas tshangs ris kyi lha bye ba phrag drug cus lha ma yin rnams nas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed ris
165a3(dkon brtsegs): kyi lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa dang /
165a4(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi rgyal ba la bsnyen bkur byas pa dang / bsam pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir// 'jigs rten pa'i bsam gtan la mi 'dod pa skyes shing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa 'di la ni snang
165a5(dkon brtsegs): ba thob ste/ chos zab mo la bzod pa thob par gyur nas/ de dag gis chos thams cad byas pa'ang ma yin/ ma byas pa'ang ma yin zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de bzhin du skyes
165a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma yin/ ma skyes pa'ang ma yin/ byung ba'ang ma yin/ ma byung ba'ang ma yin/ grub pa'ang ma yin/ ma grub pa'ang ma yin/ 'gag pa'ang ma yin ma 'gag pa'ang
165a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ gnas pa'ang ma yin// mi gnas pa'ang ma yin// kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin/ rnam par byang ba'ang ma yin/ rjes su chags pa'ang ma yin/ khong khro ba'angam
165b1(dkon brtsegs): yin du rmongs pa'ang ma yin/ ma mongs pa'ang ma yin/ shes pa po'ang ma yin/ shes pa po med pa 'du ma yin/ mthong ba po'ang ma yin/ mthong ba po med pa'ang ma yin/ tshor ba
165b2(dkon brtsegs): bo'ang ma yin// tshor ba po med pa'ang ma yin// ston pa po'i'adra ma yin/ ston pa po med pa'ang ma yin/ yod pa'ang ma yinapa med pa'ang ma yin/ dngos po'ang ma yin/ dngos po med pa'ang
165b3(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ mi dmigs pa'ang ma yin/ 'gro ba'ang ma yin/ 'ong ba'ang ma yin/ song ba'ang ma yin/ ma song ba'ang ma yin/ stong pa'ang ma yin mi stong pa'ang
165b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin/ mtshan ma yod pa'ang ma yin/ mtshan ma med pa'ang ma yin/ smon pa yod pa'ang ma yin/ smon pa med pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de dag de ltar chos thams
165b5(dkon brtsegs): cad la yong mi gnas pa'i yid kyis de dag ming la'ang mi gnas tha snyad la'ang mi gnas brjod pa lnga'ang mi gnas te/ de dag ni brjod pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin brjod du med pa'i
165b6(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ bya ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i 'du shes
165b7(dkon brtsegs): can yang ma yin// so so'i skye bo'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ so so'i skye bo ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin
166a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ nyan thos ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes
166a2(dkon brtsegs): can yang ma yin// rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin// rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin//
166a3(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin pa byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin / byang chub sems dpa'
166a4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin//
166a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ma yin pa'i chos kyi 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin // 'khor ba'i 'du shes
166a6(dkon brtsegs): can yang ma yin/ 'khor ba med pa'i 'du shes can yang ma yin te/ de ltar thams cad kyi thams cad du rtog pa med pa'i blo can nam mkha' bzhin du dag cing gos pa med par gyur nas/ dri rnams
166a7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa dang gos pa med pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe de dag zhi bas bcom ldan 'das la rigs su bcad pa dag gi mngon par bstod pa/ zhi la zhi ba'i thugs mnga' zhi ba spyad cing zhi ba'i pha
166b1(dkon brtsegs): rol byon// zhi ba sten par mdzad cing 'grol ni ba ston pa rjes su ston// zhi ba'i spyod yul dgyes shing byang chub zhi la dri bral 'khrugs ma mchis// khyod kyis 'chi med zhi ba 'gro rgyud thams cad
166b2(dkon brtsegs): bang ba myur du brnyes// zhi ba thob par bgyid pa'i zhi ba'i lam mchog zhi ba yang dag bsten// yan lag brgyad pas nyon mongs slong rnams zhi mdzad 'gro ba thams cad bton// sngon gyi rgyal bas bsten
166b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba de la 'god// de sten sangs rgyas 'phags pas bsten pa'i grong khyer zhi bar deng zhes gsung // 'dren pa de ltar 'gro ba 'di la rgyal bas bsten pa'i bslab pa bstan// gal
166b4(dkon brtsegs): bslab pa de slob 'gro ba 'di dag byang chub gzhal yas 'thob// bslabs nas zhi zhing yid zhi zhi ba'i lam dong dbang po ni ba dag/ 'jig rten mkhas pa 'gro ba zhi byed mthu chen zhi ba shes par 'gyur/
166b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa khyod kyi sras mchog zhi ba 'gro bzhi bgyid gang dag gis// 'chi med zhi ba mtshan ma thams cad zad pa rnam par rtogs gyur pa// de dag 'dren pa tshul la mkhas pa mchod pa mchog gis mchod
166b6(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// nyon mongs zhi zhing mtshan ma kun spangs zhi ba rtag tu ston par 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad zhi zhing mtshan ma bral ba de nyid mya ngan 'das// thub pa gang dag zhi las zhi 'dod sems pa de
166b7(dkon brtsegs): ngag nyon mongs 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod kyi byang chub dang ni 'gro kun chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa blo ldan 'dam las rgal ba de la bdag cag dog ma mchis// gang dag phung po bor te byang chub zhi tshol
167a1(dkon brtsegs): de la zhi bar rtogs// phung pos 'jigs pa de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan la dga' ma lags// dben pa'i blo gros ldan pa ni nol de dag blo 'khrugs gyur pa ste// chos kyi
167a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma spyod yul 'di dag byis pa zhes ni ston pas gsungs// thams cad mkhyen pas zhi dang mtshan ma'i 'ching ba zhi ba 'di dag gsungs// thub pa gang dag phung po rnams la rnam pa kun tu
167a3(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mi rnyed// de dag shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa mdzes byed gang dag mtshan med dga'// de dag byang chub skyon bral zhi ba mkhas pa'i spyod yul thob par 'gyur// bdud kyi rtsod las rgyal nas
167a4(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs zhi ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa 'thob// rnam 'dren zhi ba mdzad la bstod pas bdag cag bsod nams gang rnyed pa// chags med thugs mnga' ba re bar gshegs pas 'di tsam zhes
167a5(dkon brtsegs): ni mkhyen gyur pa// des ni 'gro ba thams cad lam mchog thams cad mkhyen pas bsten gyur pa// zhi byed zhi ba bsten nas mkhas pas mchod pa'i rang 'byung sdig med shog/ de nas mi
167a6(dkon brtsegs): mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ tshungs pa rnams dang / lha rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la bstod par rig nas// bdag nyid kyis tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la
167a7(dkon brtsegs): mngon par bstod pa// mi dbang khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad ni// log pa rmongs byed rung pa stong 'dra zhing // ston gyi sprin 'dre mig 'phrul 'dra bar mkhyen// rgyal bas 'dod pa'i yon tan med
167b1(dkon brtsegs): bar mkhyen// ji ltar mi zhib rmi lam bkres myur pas// kha zas ro brgya zos kyang ma 'grangs pa// de la bkres med zas med sems can med// mi lam de 'drar chos rnams thams cad gzigs/
167b2(dkon brtsegs): sgom pa'i me zhig nyal ba'i rmi lam na// chu bsil dang zhing rnyog med 'thungs gyur kyang // ngoms med cha ba zhi bar mi 'gyur te// de bzhin khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad gzigs// 'di la byed med cho
167b3(dkon brtsegs): med sems can med// byas pa de bzhin med cing rnam smin med// 'bras bu myong bar 'gyur ba de med ces// 'di 'dra'i chos mkhyen the tsom yong mi mnga'// mi zhig yid du 'ong ba'i tshig smra na// dga' bar
167b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur yang tshig la 'pho ba med// tshig nyid med cing dgar gyur dngos kyang med// de ma khyen de la the tsom yong mi mngar// pi wa nga sgra snyan mnyan na rnar snyan te// sgra de rang bzhin gang yang yod pa min// de ltar
167b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas phung po 'di gzigs na// phung po'i rang bzhin gang yang dmigs mi mngar// nor bu rin chen rang bzhin gsal dag pa// gos kyi drung gzhag sna tshogs rlon du 'gyur/ de ltar rang bzhin yongs
167b6(dkon brtsegs): dag chos rnams kyang // log pa'i rnam par rtog pas de ltar 'gyur// tsanA dan dri med skyon dang bral ba yang // rkyen dang sbyar na dri zhim gzhan du 'gyur// de dag rang bzhin yongs dag chos rnams
167b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang so so rang gis brtags pa'i rnam pa bzhin// ji ltar mi yis dung gi sgra thos te// sgra 'di ga las byung zhes brtags byas kyang // rang bzhin stong pa'i dngos te de mi dmigs//
168a1(dkon brtsegs): ming bang khyod kyis ba'in chos b+hagathis// ji ltar mi mig bsod pa'i babasal/ yan la gathog pa na ji ltar 'ar btags na/ ngos med ldan la bsdus kyang da 'gyi/
168a2(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// ji ltar mi zhig nam mkha'i 'dza' mthong na// yan lag gzigs brtags rang bzhin med cing stong // nam mkha'i 'ja' bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong /
168a3(dkon brtsegs): drang srong chen pos de bzhin chos kun gzigs// grong khyer mchog kyang yan lag rnam gzhig na// grong khyer rang bzhin de bzhin ming mi dmigs// grong khyer ji bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // mi
168a4(dkon brtsegs): dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus dga' bar rnga zhig brdungs bgyis na// dga' ba skyed kyang sgra yi rang bzhin stong // ji ltar sgra bzhin de ltar yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod
168a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rje de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de phyogs su mi 'gro 'byung ba med// phyogs su de bzhin 'gag par mi 'gyur te// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin
168a6(dkon brtsegs): chos kun gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// thogs pa med cing snyan pa'i rang bzhin te// khyod kyi yan lag rnga sgra de dang 'dra// mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun
168a7(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// skyes bus ji ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de 'jig rten dga' byar rtog pa med// ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis chos kun de ltar gzigs//
168b1(dkon brtsegs): skyes bus ji ltar dza de brdungs pa'i tshe// g.yo ba med cing zhi ba'i dngos kyang med// ji ltar rnga zhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis de bzhin chos kun gzigs// skyes bu ji
168b2(dkon brtsegs): ltar rnga de brdungs pa'i tshe// sgra de yan lag ma byung rang dbang min// ji ltar sgra bzhin khyod kyi yan lag stong // mi dbang khyod kyis dri bzhin chos kun gzigs/ de nas
168b3(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud cing / zhi gnas dang ye shes mthong ba'i bstod pa des de ltar
168b4(dkon brtsegs): bstod pas// 'khor de'ang dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags par gyur par gzigs nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol
168b5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas 'dzum mdzad dri med dag mthong nas// lhar bcas mir bcas klu dang gnod sbyin bcas pa'i 'jig rten kun// skyob pa'i 'dzum mthong thams cad ldan pa'i 'gro
168b6(dkon brtsegs): ba the tsom 'tshal// bde gshegs zhal bzangs de la lta zhing thos par dga' ste sdod// rgyal ba 'dzum mdzad legs par bka' stsol the tsom dgum du gsol// rnam par 'dren pa thub
168b7(dkon brtsegs): mchog kun mkhyen sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams// rgyu ma mchis par 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad ma mthong na// bde gshegs khyod kyis gang slad 'dzum mdzad the tsom rgyu de gsungs// rgyal
169a1(dkon brtsegs): ba 'dzum mdzad rgyu thos 'gro ba rnams ni dga' bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di the tsom 'tshal nas thal mo sbyar te khyod la sems// bde gshegs thub pa'i gsung mchog tho ma/
169a2(dkon brtsegs): gcod pa nyan 'tshal na// rnam 'dren thub pa 'dzum mdzad rgyu de dag rnams la gsungs// thos nas 'gro ba dga' zhing the rtsom ma mchis 'phel bar 'gyur// 'khor 'di snying po ldan zhing rnyog med
169a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ston pa khyod kyi zhal mdzes zla ba mdzes pa 'dra la lta// 'dren pa chags med rdzogs pa tshangs pa 'dre ba'i gsung bsgrags gsol// de thos 'khor rnam
169a4(dkon brtsegs): the tsom chad cing chos la gnas par 'gyur// khyod kyi tshangs pa'i gsung mchog don ldan 'jig rten 'das riganas/ skye ba dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid ldan thams cad mkhyen pas tshim// de
169a5(dkon brtsegs): ngag dogs bsal sbyangs pa'i yid kyis thams cad mkhyen du sgrub// brtson 'grus stobs chen bskyed nas 'dun pa stobs ldan brtson par bgyid// de lta lags pas 'jig rten 'dren pa
169a6(dkon brtsegs): pan mdzad gsung bsgrags gsol// gang gnyis dam pa'i gsung mchog mi g.yo thos nas de yis ni// dge ba thob pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad mkhyen du sems 'gyur bar// stobs bcu
169a7(dkon brtsegs): mnga' ba 'gro ba kun la phan pa legs par dgongs/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal ba// rta thul nga yis pan
169b1(dkon brtsegs): byed 'dzum pa 'gro ba kun la gang bstan pa// rtse gcig yid kyis snyan cing bsngags pa mdzes pa de ni mnyan par byos// de thos 'gro ba yon tan bsags pa myur du 'jig rten don byed pa/
169b2(dkon brtsegs): pan dang ldan pa'i bya ba sangs rgyas bka' stsal de la brtson 'grus tsam// tshangs pa kun 'khor 'di dag dga' zhing chos rnams la ni the tsom med// bskal pa khrag khrig bang+gA'i bye ma snyed du
169b3(dkon brtsegs): dka' ba legs par spyad// kun tu rnam par dag la ma chags yid gyur 'du shes mkha' 'dra ste// de ltar gyur kyang bde gshegs byang chub rdzogs par 'tshang rgya sems mi bskyed// 'di
169b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag ma 'ongs dus na bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag gnal yas pa// gang+gA'i bye ma snyed na rdul bsal thams cad mkhyen pa'i stobs la gnas// de dag phyi nas bde bar gshegs pa che ldan sangs rgyas
169b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dren che ba// srid pa sel cing 'gro ba stong par ston pa bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur// skyob pa de dag ji ltar spyod pa su rno'i tshad kyang de ltar 'gyur// bde gshegs mtha' yas grags ldan
169b6(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'grel cing gnas par 'gyur// de dag rnams kyi sangs rgyas zhing ni zhing gi 'byor pa gzhal yas te// 'dren pa chen po rnams kyi bskal pa khrag khrig rnam pa du mar ni/
169b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas mtha' yas rnams kyis gsung kyang de dag bkod pa zad mi nus// de tshe de dag ye shes stobs ldan zhes bya'i rgyal bar mthun par 'gyur// g.yo ba med cing sems med mi
170a1(dkon brtsegs): gnas chos ni 'gro la ston par 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog rnams su skyob pa'i thams cad mkhyen lam ma sbyangs pa'i// sems can gcig kyang mi 'byung srid pa de/
170a2(dkon brtsegs): la phal cher mya ngan 'dang // de dag na ni de tshe 'gro ba de dag sdug bsngal gcig shes te// mi rtag 'du byed sdug bsngal rab tu 'jigs pa sems can yid 'byung ba'o// de na 'gyur ba'i sdug
170a3(dkon brtsegs): bsngal dang ni sdug bsngal sdug bsngal yod mi 'gyur// de dag thams cad blo mthun 'gyur zhing slob pa'i lam la myur bar 'gyur// de na mi rnams ngag gi sgra skad rang bzhin gzhan ni 'byung mi 'gyur// mi sdug mi rtag
170a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin nyid dang sdug bsngal de bzhin bdag med dang // zhi ba stong nyid mtshan med 'chi med mya ngan 'das dang byang chub zhi// sgra skad de dag yang dang yang 'byung de dag rna la gnas par 'gyur// sgra
170a5(dkon brtsegs): gang thos nas de dag 'khor ba grol nas thob par mi 'gyur ba// de 'dra'i sgra de shing ngam rtsig pa dag dang gang na'ang yod mi 'gyur// bla gab med dang mkha' dang gtsug lag khang dang gnas khang rnams
170a6(dkon brtsegs): na med// de tshe sangs rgyas mthu yis yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sgra dbyangs 'byung // de tshe 'dres pa'i nyes pa med cing 'dod chags dang ni zhe sdang dang // gti mug dag gis gzir ba
170a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi rnar ni dge ba'i sgrar grag 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad 'khor ba las ni 'byung zhing mya ngan 'das 'gror gyur// de che zhing mchog stong pa thams cad dga' ba'i skye bos gang bar
170b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// skyes bu dam pa de dag bskal pa khrag khrig byang chub brtson byas nas// drang srong chen po de dag smon lam gyis ni 'byor pa 'di bas gas te// zhing mchog de na sems can tshogs gang yod pade
170b2(dkon brtsegs): kun bde gshegs 'gyur// tshangs pa'i smon lam yangs pa rgya chen zhi ba 'thobs mthong gyur nas// ji ltar sangs rgyas bka' stsal bzhin du tshangs pa'i tshogs kyis bsten gyur pa// de la bslabs
170b3(dkon brtsegs): nas 'gro ba thams cad thogs pa med pa'i 'dren par 'gyur// de dag rgyal ba thob nas 'gro ba 'di kun dngos po med ces ston// de lta bas na tshul kun 'jug la mkhas pa'i spyod pa sten par gyis/
170b4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas 'od gsal gyi lha bye ba phrag lnga bcu rtsa brgyad kyis lha ma yin rnams nas/ tshangs pa'i bar gyi lha dag gi mchod
170b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang mthong // lung bstan pa'ang thos nas/ nim zhing mgul yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' bu dang / ming bde ba skyes nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu
170b6(dkon brtsegs): bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
170b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpas tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du gang la bslabs pas chos thams cad snang bar 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba mchis te/
171a1(dkon brtsegs): des chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa rtogs par bgyid do// de rtogs pas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang byin
171a2(dkon brtsegs): gyis brlabs pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / dge ba'i spobs pa dang / rig pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / nye bar gyur pa
171a3(dkon brtsegs): spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / thun mong ma yin pa'i spobs pa can du 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi spobs pa'ang 'thob par 'gyur to// chos thams ca
171a4(dkon brtsegs): snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin de gang zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug pa'i slad du// rnam par rtog pa dang /
171a5(dkon brtsegs): rnam par dpyod pa thams cad yid la mi bgyid de// de 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rnam par rtog pa med de/ rnam par rtog pa yongs su chad pa'o// gang rnam par mi rtog pa de ni thams cad du song ba
171a6(dkon brtsegs): stechos gang yang rnam par rtog par nus pa ma mchis so// de ci'i skad du zhe na/ rang bzhin ma mchis pa'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de la ji ltar rnam par rtog par 'gyur
171a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes chos thams cad la rnam par mi rtog par a la 'jug pa'i spobs pa rab tu thob cing // de dag a'i sgo la zhugs pas spobs pa mtha' yas par 'gyur te/ a es bgyi ba ni mtha' yas pa/
171b1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu mtha' yas pa ga ma bgyis pa/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa/ yongs su ma grub pa// dngos po ma mchis pa/ mi gnas pa/ mi gso ba/ 'du ba ma mchis pa/ 'phro ba ma mchis pa/
171b2(dkon brtsegs): rtog pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par rtog pa ma mchis pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ yongs su thug pa ma mchis pa/ ma zhugs pa/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ bltar ma mchis pa
171b3(dkon brtsegs): ma mthong ba/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ rnam par mi gnas pa/ ma shes pa/ rnam par ma shes pa/ ma smos pa/ ma bstan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam du ma mchis pa/ song ba ma
171b4(dkon brtsegs): mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ nye ba ma lags pa/ ring ba ma lags pa/ ma btags pa/ gdags pa ma mchis pa'i chos can/ ming ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa
171b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen po ma mchis pa/ sgrib pa ma mchis pa/ 'pho ba ma mchis pa/ 'khrug pa ma mchis pa/ brtag tu ma mchis pa/ mi zad pa/ gnyis su ma mchis pa/ ma byung ba
171b6(dkon brtsegs): brdzun pa ma lags pa/ bde ba ma lags pa/ sho bre ma lags pa/ ma skyes pa ma lags pa/ sbyangs pa ma lags pa/ sbyang bar 'os pa ma lags pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa
171b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan mas ma bskyod pa// ma gzung ba/ ma bor ba/ 'dzin pa ma mchis pa// yongs su 'dzin pa ma mchis pa/ gtang du ma mchis so// yongs su gtang du ma mchis pa/ ma gtang ba/ yongs sum
172a1(dkon brtsegs): gtang ba ste/ a zhes bgyi ba ni sus kyang ma bgyis pa/ chos gang gi byed pa po'ang ma lags so// a ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos gang yang skye bar bgyid pa ma lags so//
172a2(dkon brtsegs): a ni ma skyes pa ste/ rlos gang gi skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// a ni ma 'gags pa ste/ chos gang gi 'gag pa'i rgyur 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// a ni ma 'gag pa'ang ma lags pa ste/
172a3(dkon brtsegs): chos gang gi mi 'gag pa'i rkyen du 'gyur ba'ang ma lags so// a ni gnas pa'ang ma lags/ mi gnas pa'ang ma lags/ a nI btags pa'ang ma lags/ ma btags pa'ang ma lags a ni
172a4(dkon brtsegs): spangs pa'ang ma lags// ma spangs pa'ang ma lags// a ni shes pa'ang ma lags/ ma shes pa'ang ma lags/ a ni dmigs pa'ang ma lags/ ma dmigs pa'ang ma lags/ a
172a5(dkon brtsegs): ni stong pa'ang ma lags/ mi stong pa'ang ma lags/ a ni dmigs su mchis pa'ang ma lags/ dmigs su ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ a ni mtshan ma'ang ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis
172a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma lags/ a ni smon pa'ang ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa'ang ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid ni a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni
172a7(dkon brtsegs): tshul gcig pa ste/ a'i tshul lo// chos thams cad ni 'gro ba gcig pa ste/ a'i 'gro ba'o// chos thams cad ni 'jug pa gcig pa ste/ a la 'jug pa'o// chos thams
172b1(dkon brtsegs): cad ni gdags pa gcig pa ste/ as gdags pa'o// chos thams cad ni tha snyad gcig pa ste// a'i tha snyad do// chos thams cad ni brjod pa gcig pa ste/ as brjod pa'o// bcom
172b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag ni rtogs par bgyi ba ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma byung ba de dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma
172b3(dkon brtsegs): grub pa de dag ni ma grub pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// chos gang ma 'gags pa de dag ni 'gag pa ma mchis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das chos gang mngon par 'dra
172b4(dkon brtsegs): ma bgyis pa de dag ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'i tshul gyis rtogs par bgyi ste/ de ni chos thams cad kyi tshul lo// bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de dag gi tha snyad ji ltar rtogs par bgyi zhen
172b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste/ dper na rmi lam na bya ba sna tshogs 'byung ba de bzhin du chos thams cad blta bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rmi lam gyi bya ba ni ma skyes pa/ ma byung ba/
172b6(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ma mchis pa ste/ 'on kyang de dag la gdags par gsungs so// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi byed pa'ang 'tshal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na dran
172b7(dkon brtsegs): chal tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad kyang blta bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu la gdags pa mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams
173a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi gdags par blta'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na smig rgyul chab tu gdags pa'i tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad blta bar
173a2(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na me long gi dkyil 'khor la bud med kyi gzugs sam/ skyes pa'i gzugs kyi tha snyad mchis pa de bzhin du chos thams cad kyi tha snyad palta
173a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byis pa rnams dga' bar bgyid pa'i slad du/ rmi lam gyi bya ba tha snyad du bgyi yi/ rmi lam gyi bya ba de dag ni ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du byis
173a4(dkon brtsegs): pa dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ mig yor dang / smig rgyu dang / brag ru'i bya ba dag kyang tha snyad du bgyi ste/ brag cha la bya ba ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de ltar bdag cag gis bcom
173a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ni chos thams cad snang ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de skad ces gsol nas// 'od gsal
173a6(dkon brtsegs): gyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la rigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyis tshul gcig mkhyen te 'on kyang gzhan dang gzhan du gsungs// thub
173a7(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jig rten mkhas pa'i sras rnams rnam par rol pa'ang de bzhin no// de la 'jig rten blo med bdag tu lta ba rnams kyis khang mi chung // bdag gi don de phyogs bcur ma mchis bdag nyid kyis ni
173b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba stong // sgyu ma gsog dang smig rgyu chu ma mchis la chab kyi 'du shes can// byis pa de dag blo log de bzhin 'khrul te bdag tu sbyor ba bgyid// de dag yang dag ma 'tshal mi mkhas gnas min ngos
173b2(dkon brtsegs): la rten kyang 'char// de bzhin byis pa'i skye bo sdig rgyu 'dra ba'i phung po yong ma 'tshal// 'khor bar dga' bas zug rngus zug cing sdug bsngal de yis dbang po 'das// rang la mi mkhas nges par
173b3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal myong ba de la dngos ma mchis// blo stor yid nor sdug bsngal rnams la bde bar 'du shes nor pa la// nyon mongs 'jigs pa che dang dug gsum rnams kyang rjes su 'gro zhing 'brang // 'dod
173b4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs zhe sdang gti mug dug chen nyon mongs mtshungs med rjes su 'brang // blo stor de dag sdug bsngal gang gis sdug bsngal gyur pa'i sdug bsngal ba// de rnams de dag rjes 'brang byis pa mi mkhas gnod pa'i
173b5(dkon brtsegs): khur yang khyer// de dag rgyal ba'i tshul spro thar bar bgyid pa stong pa 'di thos na// skyes bu ngan pa blos na de dge bstan dag 'di banyid kyis 'jigs// bde ga shegs khyod kyis a yi yi ge tshul non sgros ci de ltar bstan/ de
173b6(dkon brtsegs): la yang dag blo can sa las shing skye bzhin du yid bskyed cing // bdud rnams bye ba dpung dang bcas thul byang chub zhi pa mngon 'tshang rgya// yan lag brgyad pa'i gru bcas skye bo nyon mongs rgya mtsho che las sgrol// bde bar gshegs
173b7(dkon brtsegs): pa cang mkhyen nges pa rnams ni tshul gyi dam pa des// myur du nyon mongs dug bsal byang chub dpag yas zhi ba thob gyur cig/ grol nas dug med gyur pa skye bo gzhan mthong nges pa'i mkhyen brnyes nas// pha rol myur phyin
174a1(dkon brtsegs): / dug med bde zhing gdug pa thams cad 'joms par mdzad// bde gshegs thams cad stong yang bdag tu rtogs rnam tshul dang tshul min rtog/ 'gro ba kun gyi nang nas mkhas pa tshul dang tshul min/
174a2(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pa dag/ grol nas 'gro ba kun la tshugs med yid kyis ngo bo nyid kyi chos// de yi tshul mthong tshul la mkhas pa de dag mthu chen mgon por 'gyur// 'ching dang bcings pa med cing bde bar gshegs pa chos
174a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams chos nyid med// de bzhin nyid dang ma nor de bzhin nyid zhi mi dga' nyon mi mongs// nyon mongs mtshan ma med cing zhi byed med la nyon mongs rnams kyang med// gang gis tshul chen dam pa 'di mthong de dag tham
174a4(dkon brtsegs): cad mkhyen du 'gyur// grol zhing grol mdzad zhi ba'i chos can zhi mdzad ngo mtshar 'gyur mi mnga'// bcom ldan lhar bcas 'jig rten dpyid kyi smig rgyu bzhin du 'khrul pa ste// kun rtog bdag nyid zil gnon
174a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang gzhan med skyes pa bud med rtog/ 'gro ba sdug bsngal de na sna tshogs kyis bskyed sems kyis sems kyang ni// las dang 'bras bu med cing de myong ci myong gang gyur de yang med// bde gshegs de ltar
174a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyod yul tshul ni bdag cag 'tshal// des na da ltar bde gshegs zhi thugs dbang po zhi zhing nges pa ste// dge ba'i blo mngar dag gtsang dri med chos kyis rab tu mchod par gyur// sangs
174a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyas 'jig rten 'phags pa'i gtso la bstod pas bsod nams gang byung ba// ji snyed dpal stag rkang gnyis btso bos rnam smin yongs su mkhyen gyur pa'i// bdag cag dge rtsa de yis 'gro ba 'di kun kun mkhyen nyid
174b1(dkon brtsegs): thob sho// du las 'di kun 'thob pa kyi na nakya rgyal bar s+ho/ des bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'od gsapa kyi ska ga kyi mas pa'i sam pa sos su sa pa dang // rdum sa/
174b2(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'gro ba'i spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa'ang thugs su chung la// 'khor de dag gis kyang khyad par 'thob par 'gyur bar mkhyen nas// de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
174b3(dkon brtsegs): la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa// 'jig rten don mdzad rnam par 'dren mchog kun mkhyen thams cad zil gnon pa// bde gshegs thugs rje ldan rnams rgyu ma mchis par bshad pa mi mdzad na// rgyal ba dpal sdug
174b4(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis ma rnyog gis 'jig rten thugs brtses bka' stsal gsol// 'jig rten 'das khyod ci slad 'dzum mdzad de rgyu bdag cag rnams la gsungs// gtso bo de thos 'gro ba mtha' dag yid ni rab tu dang 'gyur
174b5(dkon brtsegs): zhing // rnam par 'dren pa nges 'byung las dang 'bras bu gzhal yas bgyid par 'gyur// des ni lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'khor bar sdug bsngal nyam thag 'di// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad
174b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan srid pa'i rgya mtsho 'di nas sgrol par 'gyur// drang srong chen po'i gsung mchig yan lag brgyad ldan bzang po 'di thos nas// gro ba thams cad sangs rgyas nyid 'tshal dge la brtson zhing dga' bar 'gyur/
174b7(dkon brtsegs): the tsom bral gyur rnam dag yid kyis brtson 'grus drag po'i stobs bskyed cing // bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa bzhin bgyid khyod dang mthun byung sras su 'gyur// 'khor rnams 'di dag rten pa gan/
175a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis par 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta// 'gro ba'i rtsa lag rtog pa yid gnyis bsal zhing lung bstan bka' stsal gsol// bcom ldan 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyi zham
175a2(dkon brtsegs): ring gnas shing nyan par 'tshal// gsung rab legs brjod bdud rtsi'i char pho ba gang dag skom pa 'tshal bar 'gyur// 'dren pa chen po khyod kyi 'khor 'di dag cing sangs rgyas yon tan 'tshal// ring du song ba'i ma la
175a3(dkon brtsegs): bu blta bzhin du khyod kyi zhal du lta// bde gshegs lha rnams lung bstan bka' stsol bzhan pa'i don kyang bstan du gsol// skyob pa'i gsung mchog thos na 'jig rten don chen shin tu thob par 'gyur// thub pa
175a4(dkon brtsegs): ring su zhig dge ba 'phel zhing grags pa don du gnyer// su zhig 'dren pa'i yon tan gter rnyed 'gyur ba bdag cag de nyan 'tshal// rgyal ba'i 'khor rnams khyod kyis gsungs pa de dag thos shing dgar gyur nas/
175a5(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'di ston cing ting 'dzin stobs ldan shes rab la yang sgom par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshogs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ rta thul
175a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis spobs pa legs par dus ldan skyes pa shin tu legs// bde gshegs rnam par sprul bzhin de ltar khyod kyi blo gros 'byung 'gyur zhing // spobs pa cha 'byung de phyir gang dang gang dag khyod
175a7(dkon brtsegs): dris gyur pa// de dag lung bstan ngas bshad kun kyang dbang po zhi bas mnyan par gyis// 'od gsal ba yi lha rnams blo dag sngon gyi rgyal ba mthong ba ste// 'jig rten mgon med yid can 'di dag mthong nas byang
175b1(dkon brtsegs): chub yang dgazugs// byang chub nges 'byung lam mchog yang dag rgyal bas spyad spyod pa// byang chub 'gro 'ang gang tshe sngon med lam stor rnams la ston par 'gyur// tshul byed pa pa shin tu gsal sgra thun mong
175b2(dkon brtsegs): ma yin 'di thos na// sangs rgyas yon tan don gnyer blo sbyangs de dag byang chub ni 'thob 'gyur// de dag stobs skyes tshul dang tshul min mkhas shing byang chub yang nges 'gyur// bu skye ma bzhin dga'
175b3(dkon brtsegs): bas byang chub mchog tud dag smon lam btag/ 'od gsal lha rnams 'di dag byang chub 'did la tshul gyi sgo bstan te// bskal pa khrag khrig brjod du med par phra ba'i tshul bdi bstan byas na// sems
175b4(dkon brtsegs): can skar ma'i grangs pas ches mang ba dag byang chub dga' byas te// de yi 'og tu 'jig rten mkhas pa rang byung skyon bral kun mkhyen 'gyur// de dag zhing mchog brjod du med pa zhing rnams bye ba brgya
175b5(dkon brtsegs): bgrangs par// yangs shing shin tu ngag la mtha' dag bkod pa rnams kyis brgyan pa ste// kun gyi zhing du ngan song rnams dang de bzhin mi khom yod mi 'byung // bde bar gshegs rnams thug brtses
175b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can thams cad rang byung mdzad par 'gyur// zhing rnams de dag gang na'ang nyan thos theg pa ston par mi 'gyur te// sems can thams cad rang byung nyid du mngon phyogs 'phrogs pa med par 'gyur//
175b7(dkon brtsegs): de na rang byung sangs rgyas nyid ston mdzad pa 'jig rten mkhas rnams kyi// sku tshe'i tshad ni bskal pa bye ba brgya bgrangs pad+ma'i bye snyed 'gyur// rta thul 'jig rten khrag khrig khams kyi nyan thos mya ngan 'das
176a1(dkon brtsegs): / pa bas// gang yang skyes pa 'am bud med gcig cig byang chub yang dag dga' byas na/ bsod nams de la snga mas grangs sam dper yang bya bar mi nus so// de bas byang chub zhugs pa'i/
176a2(dkon brtsegs): skyes bu dam pa byang chub dga' bar gyis// rta thul 'di la 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'byung ba brnyed sla min// de ni mu dum wa ra'i me tog 'dra zhes sangs rgyas mtha' yas blo mnga' gsungs// de phyir
176a3(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa'i zhi bde byang chub mi gang 'dod pa yis// shin tu blo phra sten bzang mkhyen pa tshul mkhas 'dren la brten par bya// de bzhin gshegs kyi zhal nas don byed gsung dag de 'dra thos gyur nas/ 'khor
176a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams thams cad yi rangs mchog tu dga' zhing yang dag dga' bar 'gyur// khrag khrig lnga rnams nas mkhar 'khod nas gos kyi g.yab mo 'dor bar byed// dga' nas sangs rgyas dbang phyug khyod la phyag
176a5(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal lo zhes spa yang phyung // zhi ba thugs ni skye bo nyon mongs rgod pas rgod gyur zhi bar mdzod// bdud rtsi ston cing dug gsum ni mdzad sems can dug ni skyug tu gsol// khyod kyi ye shes thob nas
176a6(dkon brtsegs): skye dgu rug med 'gyur zhing dgra med 'gyur/ sdug bsngal rnams kyis 'dren las tshul thos mi bzad srid pa'i rgyud las 'grol// 'od gsal ba lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//
176a7(dkon brtsegs): bam po brgyad pa// / de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha khrag khrig phrag bcu gnyis kyis/ lha ma yin rnams nas/ 'od gsal ba'i lha'i bar dag gi mchod pa'ang mthong /
176b1(dkon brtsegs): krung bstan pa'ang thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas/ bdag cag tshul phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba'ang brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la
176b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs
176b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i dngos po thams cad la bde ba'i tshor ba sha stag myong bar 'gyur zhing / sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba mi myong la/ sdug bsngal yang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa'ang mi myong ste/ sems can
176b4(dkon brtsegs): dmyal ba'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / mi'i gnod pas gnod par bgyis kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa dang / lag pa bcad dam/ rkang pa
176b5(dkon brtsegs): bcad dam/ gang lag bcad dam/ rna ba'am/ sna 'am/ rna ba dang sna gtubs kyang / bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / wa lcag gis gnas sam/ pA lcag phyed tsal
176b6(dkon brtsegs): lam lcag gis gzhus kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / btson rar bcug gam/ lcags sgrog dang / shing sgrog tu bcug gam/ mtshon cha dam po la rgyas btab bam
176b7(dkon brtsegs): byis pa'i gtsug pud ltar bcings sam/ dugs kyi snod ltar bdug sa sa ma/ bu ram shing brdung ba ltar brdungs sam/ 'dam bu gnom pa ltar bcom sam/ 'bru mar gyi mar me ltar 'bar bar byas sam
177a1(dkon brtsegs): mar gyi mar med dang / zho bskol ba ltar 'bar bar byas kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / me'i mngadu por ram/ seng ge'i khar bslabs sam/ sdug gi
177a2(dkon brtsegs): khar bstabs sam/ skam ril bya ba bzhin dril tam/ byi bo'i chung pa lta bus bcad ngam/ nyes dbyung ba bsgrags pa ltar bsgrags sam/ kar shA pa Na rtsam du gtubs sam/ 'bras phye btse ba
177a3(dkon brtsegs): ltar brtsos sam/ glang po che rnams kyis bcom yang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang / mig phyung ngam/ gsal shing gi rtse mo la gzhag gam// gsad pa'i gnas su
177a4(dkon brtsegs): khrid de rnam pa thams cad du mgo gcod kyang bde ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur te/ bde ba'ang ma lags/ mi bde ba'ang ma lags pa'i 'du shes rnam pa thams cad du mi 'byung ngo // de ci'i
177a5(dkon brtsegs): slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des yun ring po nas sbyang pa spyod pa'i tshe/ smon lam 'di ltar btab ste/ gang gis bdag la la zas byin pa de dag nye bar zhi ba'i bde ba thob
177a6(dkon brtsegs): par gyur cig/ gang gis bdag la skom blud pa de dag dang / gang gis bdag la rim gro byas pa dang / bkur sti byas pa dang / bsti stang du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa de dag thams cad kyang nye bar zhi
177a7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bde ba thob par gyur cig/ gang yang bdag la gshe ba dang / mi bde bar byed pa dang / rdeg pa dang / mtshon gyis 'debs pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du srog gcod pa'i bar du byed pa de dag thams
177b1(dkon brtsegs): ca kyang byang chub kyi bde ba thob cing blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig ces smos lam btab ste/ de yid la bya ba de dag dang snga' zhing
177b2(dkon brtsegs): de lta bu'i las dang / de lta bu'i smon lam dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i bde ba'i 'du shes la rten cing spen la sgom zhing mang du byed de/ de las de rnam par smin
177b3(dkon brtsegs): pas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob bo// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad la bde bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur pa de'i tshe / bdud kyi las thams
177b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis mi 'phrogs shing mi 'khrugs par gyur te/ de'i tshe 'di lta tshal dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / rnam par rtog pa la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba ste/ dbang lnga thob par rig
177b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyi'o// de 'tshal na tshe brjes ma thag tu byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de 'tshal na bskal pa zangs ma mchis par gnas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub
177b6(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs shing / byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin pa dang / ngan 'gro thams
177b7(dkon brtsegs): cad rab tu bsal ba dang / 'gro ba drug po kun tu skyes pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa thams cad la bsrab pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas yongs su bzung ba dang / thabs mkhas pa
178a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa dang / bdud kyi las las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chos thams cad khong du rung bar rig par bgyi ba'i slad du ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis byang chub sems dpa' chos thams
178a2(dkon brtsegs): cad la nges par rtogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mthu'o// de nas dge rgyas ris kyi lha rnams kyis ting nge 'dzin de brjod nas// de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa dag gis sa
178a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/ dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag thams cad chos la mthar thug gyur pa te// ston pa dbang po zhi zhing zhi ba mkhyen la mgo bos skyabs su mchi// de dag mkhas pas mchod pa'i sangs rgyas
178a4(dkon brtsegs): don mkhyen 'khor ba brgal gyur pa// thub pa mi yi 'dren pa tshul mkhas rgyal ba 'dren pa 'dren la bstod// 'di na rang bzhin nges pa'i thub chos gnas pa gang na'ang ma mchis te// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma ji
178a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhin khyod kyis thub pa legs par mkhyen// yan lag sna tshogs sgra brnyan ri khrod 'byung ba mkhas pas rtogs pa ltar// de bzhin bde gshegs drang srong khyod kyis lha mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gzigs/
178a6(dkon brtsegs): 'di na sems can srog dang shes bu gso ba gang zag ma mchis te// mi mchod khyod kyis 'du shes rnam par shig cing spyod par rnam gzhag la// rkang gnyis dam pa sems can gtso bo byams pa gzhal yas sgom
178a7(dkon brtsegs): babang mdzad// rgyal ba sangs rgyas dgongs pa 'di ni 'gro ba kun gyis rtogs par dka'// byams pa dge bsgoms sems can dmigs pa yin zhes 'dren pas bka' stsal la// sems can rnam par
178b1(dkon brtsegs): ga shig cing 'gro ba thams cad sems can med par mkhyen// de ltar rkang gnyis dam pa rnyog pa mi mnga' the tshom bral thugs ldan// des na bde gshegs rnam brtags blo mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod
178b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'tshal// bde bar gshegs pa sdug bsngal phyogs bcur gnas pa kun tu mi dmigs kyang // lha yi lhar gyur khyod kyis sems can rnams la snying rje bgyi ba gsungs// de ltar rgyal mchog bdag
178b3(dkon brtsegs): cag rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ji bzhin kun tu 'tshal// des na rkang gnyis gtso bo mi mchog mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thub pa khyod kyis sems can dang ri bsal bgyi sdug bsngal ma gzigs la// dgyes
178b4(dkon brtsegs): paskyes nas rab tu dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mi dgyes rnam par bsal// de ltar sangs rgyas tshul ni bsam gyis mi khyab tshul 'di ji bzhin 'tshal// des na mi mchog khyod la mnod gnas brnyed pa'i 'bras bu thob par
178b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyi// skyon bral khyod kyis 'gro ba kun tu sdug bsngal mya ngan 'das ma dmyigs// 'on kyang 'khor bar sems can gzigs shing don mdzad stobs dang ldan pa bskyed// sems can sdug bsngal 'gro dang thub
178b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mya ngan 'das dang gnas ma mchis// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rtobs nas thub pa mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// 'dren pa tshad med bzhi po gzigs shing de yang gnyis su med par bstan// gang zhig
178b7(dkon brtsegs): der dul ma gzigs gang yang tshad med gnas pa de ma gzigs// thub pas bag med gang yang ma gzigs bag yod ming yang ma gzigs te// sangs rgyas tshul 'di 'tshal nas thub pa ston pa khyod la mchod pa
179a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyis// thub pa sku ni rnam par spangs pas sku btsal mdzad nam brnyes kyang // de ltar 'dren pa dran pa ma bsrungs ma lags bsnyel ba yong mi mnga'// bde bar gshegs pas lus
179a2(dkon brtsegs): la song ba'i bsgom pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di rig nas bde bar gshegs pa skyob la mchod pa bgyis// 'dren pas tshor ba'i rang bzhin btsal ba mdzad na brnyes par ma gyur la/
179a3(dkon brtsegs): tshor ba tshor bar bgyid pa'ang thub pas yongs su btsal na ma brnyes te// de ltar gang zhig dran bsgom de ni sangs rgyas kyis kyang yod ma gzigs// sangs rgyas tshul 'di btsal nas ston pa la ni bdag cag mchod
179a4(dkon brtsegs): pa bgyis// thub pas sems dang sems las byung ba dgongs te btsal na ma brnyes la// gang gi nye bar gzhag pa de yang dran pa med par rab mkhyen kyang // thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis sems 'dus dran pa sgom
179a5(dkon brtsegs): par gyis zhes gsungs// bde bar gshegs pa'i dgongs pa 'di 'tshal nas ni ston la mchod par bgyis// 'jig rten phan par bzhed pas chos dang chos la gang spyod de ma gzigs// bsgom par gang
179a6(dkon brtsegs): gsungs dran pa de yang rang bzhin ma mchis la// thar pa 'dod pa rnams kyis chos 'dus dran pa sgom par gyis zhes gsungs// sangs rgyas tshul bzhi po 'di rab tu 'tshal nas skyobs la mchod pa bgyis/
179a7(dkon brtsegs): gnas gcig mchis pa ma lags gnyis sam gsum mam bzhi lta ga la mchis// gang gis gnas su brjod pa'i dran pa de yang gang na'ang ma mchis te// de bas gang gi bde ba 'am sdug bsngal yang dag gang na'ang /
179b1(dkon brtsegs): de ma mchis/ smon pa'i tshul 'di 'tshal nas des na bdag cag khyod la mnochod pa 'tshal/ ston pa'i tshul mchog bzhi po 'di rnams dge slong gang dag 'dzin bgyid na/ 'di dag thar pa nyid kyi lam te
179b2(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba las ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de ltar de ni tshul 'dir ma bcings ma grol byang chub 'dren pa min// bcom ldan 'das kyis btags pa ma bshig des ra khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thar mdzad
179b3(dkon brtsegs): slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis lam bzhi rdzu 'phrul rkang pa gsungs// 'di dag bsgoms na mi rnams dbang po dul zhing mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// yang dag tu na rdzu 'phrul dang ni rkang pa bsgom pa mi dmigs
179b4(dkon brtsegs): chang par mi 'gyur bya ba'ang ston cing byed pa po yang mi dmigs pa// thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan 'dir lha rtogs the tsom gang na'ang ma mchis te// de dag de la nem nur ma mchis de bzhin som nyi ma mchis
179b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'di ni mchod pa bzang po mchog ces mchos 'os sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs// des na bde gshegs dpe med spyod mnga' mchod 'os khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// thar par mdzad slad 'jig
179b6(dkon brtsegs): chen mkhas pas nges 'byung dbang po lnga yang gsungs// rtag tu bag yod byos la mya ngan 'das 'gro'i lam 'di sgoms shes bstan// thub pa dbang po dang ni sgom pa po dang thar pa'ang mi dmigs te// 'di
179b7(dkon brtsegs): las lha 'khor the tshom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das par 'gro ba'i drang lam stobs lnga po// de dag nyon mongs zad bgyid thar bar bgyid ces ston pa thug
180a1(dkon brtsegs): pas gsungs// de dag rang bzhin pa mchis nyon mongs ma mchis rgyal ba ma mchis te// thub pa bdag cag gang la'ang theze rom ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod// byang chub yan
180a2(dkon brtsegs): lag bdun po 'di dag dge ba lam gyi dam pa ste// sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan 'das 'gro'i drung lam mchog ces thub pas gsungs// 'ching ba mchis pa ma lags grol ba ma mchis bcings pa'ang ma mchis
180a3(dkon brtsegs): te// sems can dkon mchog 'di la bdag cag the tshom ma mchis khyod la mchod// rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis bzhi phrag gnyis lam sems can rnams la bstan// brtson 'grus ldan par 'bags lam
180a4(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal tha mar 'byin pa sgoms zhes gsungs// mi mchog lam dang de bzhin nyon mongs 'di gnyis g.yo ba ma mchis te// 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis gyur pas mchod 'os khyod la mchod// 'dod chags
180a5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen por zhi gnas bka' stsal zhe sdang gnyen por byams pa gsungs// gti mug gnyen por lhag mthong thub pa mchog gis sems can rnams la bstan// 'di dag thams cad g.yo ba ma mchis skad cig dag
180a6(dkon brtsegs): min nyon mongs min// 'di la lha tshogs the tshom ma mchis thub pa mchod slad rtag tu brtson// sdug bsngal zhi bya phyir ni zhi gnas lha mthong lam yang sgoms zhes gsungs// bcom ldan gang gis 'gro ba nyon
180a7(dkon brtsegs): mongs bag rags bcas dri de dag zhi// thub pa zhi gnas lhag mthong de bzhin dri ma thams cad stong pa ste// 'di la lha tshogs gang du'ang the tshom ma mchis skyon bral khyod la mchod// stobs bcu sems
180b1(dkon brtsegs): can rnams la dge ba bcu mi las lam bstan mdzad de// gsod dang 'khrig dang ma byin phra ma brdzun dang zhe gcod kyal tshig dang // gnod sems dang ni mi rigs 'dod dang de bzhin log par rdog pa rnams/
180b2(dkon brtsegs): mi dge'i las lam 'di yang bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can rnams la bstan// sems can mi dmigs gsod pag la mchis te lhag ra de dang 'dra// gnyen po dge ba ma mchis de ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa ste/
180b3(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs thub pa zag pa mi mnga' rnams kyang ngo bo nyid kyis stong // rnam 'dren the tsom som nyi ma mchis de slad khyod la mchod pa 'tshal// sangs rgyas sras po dge ba'i blo can gang zhig spyod pa 'di ston pa/
180b4(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa kun tu dge ba nyid myong sdug bsngal myong bar yong mi 'gyur// bcom ldan bde gshegs ye shes des ni tshul 'di bde bar thob par bgyis// 'di la lha tshogs the tsom ma mchis mchod 'os khyod la
180b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa 'tshal// de ltar dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas cang mi zer bar 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge rgyas kyi lha rnams cad mi zer
180b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'khod pa'ang mkhyen de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa'ang thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la rigs su
180b7(dkon brtsegs): bcad de gsol pa skye ba 'di kun bcom ldan khyod kyi mkhyen pa'i zil gyis zil mnan nas/ bde gshegs rgyal ba mchog khyod kyis ni 'dzum pa mdzad 'di 'jig rten bstan// rgyu ma mchis par
181a1(dkon brtsegs): chos kun mkhas pa rnams ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// 'dzum rgyu don gnyer mig med rnams la 'jig rten mkhas pas bka' stsal gsol/ ma lus 'di dag thams cad gzhan du mi
181a2(dkon brtsegs): sems khyod 'dzum re zhing 'khod// dpal sdug khyod la bstod pa bgyid cing nyan par 'tshal ba'i yid kyis gnas// sangs rgyas gsung gi dbang phyug thos nas yid ni rab tu rangs gyur te// ros rnams
181a3(dkon brtsegs): kun la nges pa'i blo dge ldan pa'i ston par skye bar 'gyur// bde gshegs mi mchog dge ba'i thugs can de ring su zhig blo gros bskyed// de ring gang gis 'chi med zhi ba rtogs shing phyogs rnams snang
181a4(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyis// su zhig 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal ba 'dren pa dpag tu med gyur pa// de dag bka' stsol drang srong 'khor 'di legs par gsungs pas tshim par mdzod// rgyal ba khyu mchog dge sbyong
181a5(dkon brtsegs): dam pa deng su btsun la dad pa skyes// bdud kyis mi 'phrogs blo ldan gang zhig chos la yang dag yongs su gnas// sangs rgyas sras po tshul mkhas gang zhig de ring nges pa thob par 'gyur// rkang
181a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis gtso bo de dag bka' stsol 'gro 'di the tsom ma mchis mdzod// bde gshegs deng su 'gro la dang bskyed skye dgu rnams la byams gyur cing // byang chub mthar phyin blo gros brtan zhing thams cad
181a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid la gnas// gang la 'dzum pa deng bstan bde gshegs bsten pa 'dzin pa de gang lags// bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan mnga' de dag bka' stsol bdag gi the tsom khum// 'dren
181b1(dkon brtsegs): bakhyod gsung yan lag brgyad ldan legs par bka' stsal thos gyur na// bde gshegs gsung gis thog mar bdag cag 'dong zhing 'gro ba gzhan yang 'dren// de ltar gyur na bde gshegs bstan rab
181b2(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni sras la gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dag yid ni myur du bde gshegs rnams la gnas par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su
181b3(dkon brtsegs): bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ nga yis 'jig rten don byed 'dzum mdzad rta thul khyod kyis mthong gyur cing // skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis dus su dris te 'gro ba'i don byas pa/ khyod kyi bsod nams
181b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba brjod du med de de ni zad mi 'gyur// de ni khyod la bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba 'di dag dga' bas nyon// dge rgyas lha tshogs 'di dag nga yis chos nyid la ni the nom med// kun kyang yid rangs
181b5(dkon brtsegs): rang zhi yid kyis tshigs bcad dag gis nga la bsngags// sngon gyi sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong bgrangs mchod 'os mchod byas te// the tshom med pa'i yid kyis tshul dris kun tu som nyi med par gyur/
181b6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sngon gyi rgyu des 'dir yang rigs su bcad pas nga la bstod// bskal pa bzang po'i rgyal ba bstod 'os kun la'ang 'di dag bstod par 'gyur// 'di dag bskal pa ut+pal la rgyal ba dgra rgyal maH
181b7(dkon brtsegs): tsheni 'gyur// 'di dag sems can khrag khrig bsam yas yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed// sangs rgyas drang srong chen po de dag yid 'ong mtshan du gang 'gyur ba/ de yang bstan gyis dang ba'i yid kyis
182a1(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi tha ba spongs te nyon// rgyal ba de kun chos kyi tog ces bya ba'i 'dren pa gzhal yas 'gyur// 'di dag re res kyang ni khrag khrig bsam yas mya ngan zlo bar 'gyur// de'i tshen
182a2(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs kun gyi ring bsrel shin tu rgyas 'gyur te// de rno zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i mchod rten me tog rgyas par 'gyur// thub pa grags chen de dag yongs su mya ngan 'das par gyur pa na// thub pa
182a3(dkon brtsegs): skyob pa de dag kun gyi ring bsrel rgyas pas don chen 'gyur// sems can khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyis de tshe ring bsrel mchod byas te// ring bsrel de dag mchod nas mya ngan 'das pa zhi ba 'chi
182a4(dkon brtsegs): med thob// thub pa rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag grags pa rgyun chad mi 'gyur te// slob pa khrag khrig bsam yas rnams kyang de tshe rgyal ba'i drung du 'dus// ji ltar bye ba brgya bgrangs nga la legs par spyad pa byas
182a5(dkon brtsegs): nas su// byams pa lnga phyir rgya chen yid kyis byams pa'i 'khor du 'dod gyur pa// de ltar rgyal ba'i nyan thos slob tshogs de dag rgyal nas rgyal 'khor du// rkang gnyis gtso bo de dag kun gyi ring bsrel
182a6(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa bya phyir 'dod// bde gshegs gsung snyan 'gro ba thams cad do mnar gyur pa de thos shing // dag rgyas ris kyi lha yi bdag nyid chen po de ni thos gyur nas// 'khor rnams thams cad rab
182a7(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' ste phal cher byang chub sems kyang bskyed// bdag nyid chen po de tshe shes nas thub pa'i zhab la mgo bos rab tu gdugs// dag rgyas ris kyi lha lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
182b1(dkon brtsegs): de nas de'i tshe 'bras bu che ba'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus lha ma yin rnams nas dge rgyas kyi lha'i bar de dag gi mnod pa'ang mthong lung bstan pa'ang thos nas gcim
182b2(dkon brtsegs): zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' zhing dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas tshul gcig la zhugs pa dang / chos re re las kyang chos kyi sgo mtha' yas pa 'byung bar yang dag par mthong zhing
182b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul la 'jug pa thams cad las kyang mtha' yas pa'i spobs pa dang / mi nod pa'i spobs pa dang / rigs pa'i spobs pa dang / grol ba'i spobs pa dang / thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / nye ba'i spobs pa
182b4(dkon brtsegs): dang / phra ba'i spobs pa dang / zab pa'i spobs pa dang / sna tshogs kyi spobs pa dang / 'jam pa'i spobs pa dang / 'brel ba'i spobs pa dag kyang 'byung bar shes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dga' ba skus te/
182b5(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid brjod cing bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa zhes bgyi ba'i ting nge 'dzin mchis te/ de la brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
182b6(dkon brtsegs): chen po spobs pa 'thob cing / mi mchod pa'i spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang / dmigs pa dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la rmongs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro// de la dmig pa gang yang gzungs lags par ma
182b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal ba'i tshul gyis sgrib par mi 'gyur ro// de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang sgo'i tshul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur/ khams la 'jug pa dang / skye mched la 'jug pa dang / dbang po la 'jug pa dang /
183a1(dkon brtsegs): bden pa la 'jug pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa dang / sems can la 'jug pa dang / sems can ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dngos po la 'jug pa dang
183a2(dkon brtsegs): dngos po ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa la 'jug pa dang / dmigs pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / bdag la 'jug pa dang / stong pa la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma la 'jug pa dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pa la
183a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pa dang / smon pa la 'jug pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / gnas la 'jug pa dang / gnas ma mchis pa la 'jug pa dang / 'dus byas la 'jug pa dang / 'dus ma byas la 'jug pas kyang
183a4(dkon brtsegs): sgo'i chul mtha' yas pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ thams cad la thogs pa ma mchis pa'i spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ni phung po la 'jug pas kyang 'di lta ste/ phung po zhes bya ba'i chos 'di ni yongs su ma grub pa'o zhes
183a5(dkon brtsegs): gdungs rab tu thob bo// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs ni gang yang yongs su grub pa ma mchis te/ sa ni ser yongs su ma grub// de bzhin du nu dang / ma dang / rlung ni rlung du yongs su ma grub po// de ci'i slad du zhe
183a6(dkon brtsegs): na/ sa ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// chu dang / me dang / rlung ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis par ni yongs su mgrub pa'o//
183a7(dkon brtsegs): de ltar yongs su ma grub pa'i gzugs ni 'das pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ ma 'ongs pa zhes gdags par mi bgyi/ da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar gzugs ni dngos
183b1(dkon brtsegs): po ma mchis pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis te/ gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni gdags su ma mchis so// de bzhin gshegs pas kyang
183b2(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs gang ci yang rung ste/ de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus nas gzugs kyi phung po zhes bka' stsal te/ gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni dmigs su ma mchis nag 'a
183b3(dkon brtsegs): bltag la 'gyur/ ma 'ong bar yang ga la 'gyur/ da ltar byung bar yang ga la 'gyur te/ de bas na gzugs phung po ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
183b4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phung po rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du phung po rnams ni dmigs su ma mchis so// phung po dmigs su ma mchis pas gzungs dmigs su ma mchis te/ de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs la 'jug par
183b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// gzungs de'ang ming tsam dang / ji skad tsam dang / badz+ra tsAm dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam ma gtogs par gzungs la 'jug par mi dmigs te/ 'di la dung
183b6(dkon brtsegs): po'ang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang mi dmigs/ 'jug pa'ang mi dmigs/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis mi dmigs so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang 'di phung po zhes bgyi ba de ni ma bgyis pa'i chos te/
183b7(dkon brtsegs): chos gang yang ma bgyis pa de la spungs pa'ang ga la mchis te/ phung po ni spungs pa'i slad du phung po zhes bgyi'o// dper na khyim dang khang bzangs dang bsil khang dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / skar khung
184a1(dkon brtsegs): khol ma dang / ba kam dang / dra ba dang / steg pu dang / kha khyer dang / skas bung dang / blta ba dang / rab dang shing rtags dang / 'obs dang / chos mang po bsogs pa la
184a2(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer zhes bgyi ba bzhin du phung po zhes bgyi ba'ang de bzhin te/ gzugs de'ang ngo bo nyid kyis mi dmigs na/ de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis/ spungs pa ma mchis pas na gzugs kyang ma mchis/ gzugs kyi
184a3(dkon brtsegs): phung po'ang ma mchis so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis na/ de la spungs pa lta ga la mchis te/ spungs pa ma mchis
184a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i slad du rnam par shes pa'ang ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa'i phung po'ang ma mchis so// de ltar phung po la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa thob par 'gyur ro// de la
184a5(dkon brtsegs): skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur ba ni/ mig gi skye mched ces bgyi ba ni/ ci'i spyi mched ces bgyin/ sdug sngal gyi skye mched do// de la mig grang zhe na/ 'byung brjen po bzhi dang bste
184a6(dkon brtsegs): sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang ba'o// de la sa'i khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o//
184a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du chu'i khams dang ba dang // me'i khams dang ba dang / rlung gi khams dang ba ni rang bzhin ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang gi rang bzhin mi dmigs pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// de ltar yongs su ma grub
184b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mig gi skye ma da de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par 'gyi ba ma lags / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gangags par bgyi ba ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na 'di ltar mig gi skye bad ni dngos po ma mchis/
184b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis pa ste/ gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa'o// de ltar na mig kyang ma skyes ma
184b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gags skye mched dang sdug bsngal yang ma skyes ma 'gags pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma
184b4(dkon brtsegs): gtogs par gdogs su ma mchis pa ste/ ming de'ang ming gis ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ chos gang la mig ce 'am/ skye mched ce'am/ sdug bsngal zhes gdag par bgyi ba'i chos de gang
184b5(dkon brtsegs): yang dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ ming yang ming du brjod du ma mchis so// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang dri dang ro dang /
184b6(dkon brtsegs): reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang de bzhin te/ de'i slad du skye mched la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob/ gzungs la 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob po// de la khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob pa ni mig ni mig
184b7(dkon brtsegs): gis ma mchis pa khams ni khams kyis ma mchis pa ste/ de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba khams ni khams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'i slad du ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin
185a1(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de la ni skye ba ma mchis so// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la
185a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni ming tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang / brda tsam dang / kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam ma gtogs par 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma
185a3(dkon brtsegs): lags ma 'ongs pa dang de ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// ming dbang ming gis ma mchis/ brjod pa'i bar de'ang brjod pas ma mchis pa ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis bden dngos
185a4(dkon brtsegs): bo ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa ste/ yongs su ma grub pa'i slad du skye ba ma mchis pa'o// gang la skye ba ma mchis pa de la 'gag pa ma mchis so// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni
185a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du gdags par bgyi ba ma lags pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa
185a6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ tha snyad ma mchis pa/ brda ma mchis pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa/ 'dris pa ma mchis pa/ brjod du ma mchis pa/ 'ong ba ma mchis pa/ 'gro ba ma mchis pa/ ma bstan pa/
185a7(dkon brtsegs): rab tu ma bstan pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ gnas ma lags pa/ rten ma lags pa/
185b1(dkon brtsegs): thob pa ma lags pa thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa rtogs pa ma lags pa rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa sngon du bgyis pa ma lags pa sngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa so so'i skye bo'i sa ma 'bras
185b2(dkon brtsegs): ba/ nyan thos kyi sum lags pa rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ma lags pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa ma lags pa sangs rgyas kyis ma lags pa ste/ sa 'ang ma lags/ sa ma lags pa'angam
185b3(dkon brtsegs): lags so// de ni de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma lags pa de bzhin nyid dang / zhi ba dang / mtshan nyid ma lags pa ste/ tha skad tsam du btags pa'o// des tha snyad du
185b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi sde / don dam par ni ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bgyi ba'i chos de mi dmigs so// de bzhin du gzugs kyi khams dang / mig gi rnam par
185b5(dkon brtsegs): shes pa'i khams dang / yid kyi khams dang / chos kyi khams dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar du rgya cher khams thams cad kyis chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
185b6(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings ni phung por btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor/ khams dang / skye mched dang / dbang po dang / bden pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar btags kyang chos kyi dbyings nyid mi
185b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dor te/ chos kyi dbyings de ming gang dang gang gis btags kyang de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na sa'i khams ni ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyis
186a1(dkon brtsegs): kyang de dang des sa'i khams nyid mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gi tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyidadi mi 'dor ro// bcom
186a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ dper na nu'i khan dang / me'i 'ang+ga dang / rlung gi mam+ba dang / nam mkha'i khams ni ming gang dang bang gis tha snyad du bgyi de dang ngas/ nu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha'i khams nyid
186a3(dkon brtsegs): mi 'dor ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings kyang ming gang dang gang gis tha snyad du bgyi ba de dang des chos kyi dbyings nyid mi 'dor te/ de ltar na khams la 'jug pas gzungs 'thob gzungs la
186a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug pas spobs pa 'thob bo// bcom ldan 'das de la dbang po la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ni/ dbang po nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ 'di lta ste/ mig gi dbang po dang / rna ba'i dbang po dang
186a5(dkon brtsegs): sna'i dbang po dang / lce'i dbang po dang / lus kyi dbang po dang / yid kyi dbang po dang / mo'i dbang po dang / pho'i dang po dang / srog gi dbang po dang / bde ba'i dbang po dang / sdug bsngal gyi dbang
186a6(dkon brtsegs): bo dang / yid bde ba'i dbang po dang / yid mi bde ba'i dbang po dang / btang snyoms kyi dbang po dang / dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin
186a7(dkon brtsegs): gyis dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po dang / mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa'i dbang po dang / kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po ste/ de la mig ni mig gi ma mchis
186b1(dkon brtsegs): dbang po ni dbang pos ma mchis pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mig ni mig gi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni
186b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba/ gang mi skye ba de ni mo 'gag pa/ gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung
186b3(dkon brtsegs): ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni mig ma lags/ dbang po ma lags so// gang mig ma lags shing dbang po ma lags pa de'i tha snyad ji ltar 'tshal bar
186b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi 'di lta ste/ dper na 'chang ba stong pa ni brdzun pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par bas kyi/ don dam par ni stong par yang mi dmigs
186b5(dkon brtsegs): nang ba'ang mi dmigs so// de bzhin du mig dang dbang po'ang chung ba stong pa ltar brdzun zhing ma mchis la/ yang dag pa ma lags pa'i/ gsob/ gsog/ log pa slu ba'i chos can
186b6(dkon brtsegs): byis pa 'drid pa// glen pa rmongs par yang bgyid pa ste/ 'di ltar ming du gdags par bas kyi/ don dam par ni mig kyang mi dmigs/ dbang po'ang mi dmigs nA/ de ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
186b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes nas/ ji tsam du phyin ci log la gnas pa'i sems can rnams gzung ba'i slad du dbang po zhes btags kyis/ don dam par ni ma lags so// dbang po ni rang
187a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin dang bral zhing dbang po'i ngo bo nyid kyi stong pa ste/ chos gang chos gang gis stong pa de la des tha snyad du bgyi ba ni brdzun pa ma mchis pa gsob gsog log pa slu
187a2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos can byis pa 'drid pa glen pa rmongs par bgyid pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ da ni mi skye mi 'gag go// gang ma skyes ma 'gag pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/
187a3(dkon brtsegs): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du ma mchis pa de ni ming ma mchis pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ brdzun pa mtshan nyid ma mchis pa
187a4(dkon brtsegs): gdags su ma mchis pa gdags pa ma lags pa/ ma shes pa shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnam par ma shes pa rnam par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa
187a5(dkon brtsegs): thos par bgyi ba ma lags pa rnam par mi rig pa rnam par rig par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mu rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma mthong
187a6(dkon brtsegs): ba mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ ma mchis shing mchis pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na mi
187a7(dkon brtsegs): zhig rmi lam na dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' dgur spyad pa dag nyal nyal ba las sad de rjes su dran la de dran yang rnyed par mi 'gyur/ 'thob par mi 'gyur ro//
187b1(dkon brtsegs): ci'i slad du zhun / rmi lam na'ang mi des dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' dgur spyad pa de dag mthong ma rnyed na nyal ba las sad pa'i ma lha spos kyang ci 'tshal te/ thob pa
187b2(dkon brtsegs): dang rnyed par bgyi ba de'i gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du dbang po rnams ni rmi lam lta bu ste/ ji ltar rmi lam na dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / rtses pa dang / dga' dgur spyad pa
187b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag dmigs su ma mchis pa de bzhin du ros thams cad kyang ngo bo nyid kyis dmigs su ma mchis pa ste/ de dag ni 'das pa zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par
187b4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du dmigs su ma mchis pa de dag ni brjod du ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/ dbang po thams cad kyang de bzhin du rig par bgyi'o// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pas chos
187b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la 'jug par bgyi/ chos thams cad la 'jug pas kyang chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi'o// de la ji ltar na bden pa la 'jug pos chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par bgyi zhe na/ bzhi po 'di dag ni
187b6(dkon brtsegs): bden pa ste/ sdug bsngal dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang chos thams cad ni stong pa ste/ sems can med pa/ srog med pa/ gang zag med
187b7(dkon brtsegs): ba/ mtshan ma med pa / mtshan nyid med pa'o zhes bka' stsal te/ de la bdag cag the tsom ma mchis som nyid ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das de la sems can ma mchis pa'i slad du sdug
188a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la sems can ma mchis pa de la sdug bsngal yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das sdug bsngal ma mchis pa'i slad
