188a2(dkon brtsegs): du kun 'byung ba'ang ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang la 'bras bu ma mchis pa de ni rgyu ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du 'gog pa ma
188a3(dkon brtsegs): mchis par rig par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ kun 'byung ba ma mchis pa la spangs pa ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'gog pa ma mchis pa'i slad du lam ma mchis par rig par
188a4(dkon brtsegs): bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gang spong bar mi bgyid pa de ni lam ma lags te/ lam gyi 'bras bu ni 'gog pa ma legs la/ gang spang ba'i 'gog pa'i nyon mongs pa de ni mi dmigs te/ 'gog pa dmigs
188a5(dkon brtsegs): su ma mchis na lam du 'thad pa ma lags te/ 'bras bu ma mchis pa'i lam yang ma mchis pas/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi po de dag ni btags par rnam par bsgrubs pa ste/ gang btags shing
188a6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bsgrubs pa de ni ma mchis pa'o// gang ma mchis pa de la ni 'das pa zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mtshas so// ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba zhes tha snyad du bgyi ba ma mchis so// gang dus gsum du mi
188a7(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa de ni/ ma skyes pa/ ma 'gags pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ ma btags pa/ gdags par mi bgyi ba/ ma bstan pa/ rab tu ma bstan pa/ bstan par bgyi ba/
188b1(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ rab tu bstan par bgyi ba ma lags pa ma brjod par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ mngon par ma brjod pa mngon par brjod par bgyi ba ma lags pa / ma mthong ba/ mthong bar byor/
188b2(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ ma shes pa/ shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ khong du ma chung pa/ khong du chud par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rtogs pa/ rtogs par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma rnyed pa/ rnyed par bgyi
188b3(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa ma thob pa/ thob par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma thos pa/ zos par bgyi ma lags pa/ ma mthong ba/ mthong bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ ma bsgrubs pa/ bsgrub par bgyi ba ma
188b4(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ mngon du ma bgyis pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa dkar po ma lags pa/ nag po ma lags pa/ snang ba ma lags pa/ mun pa ma lags pa/ 'gro ba ma lags pa/ 'ong ba
188b5(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ gsal ba ma lags pa/ zab pa ma lags pa/ 'khrugs pa ma lags pa/ dang ba ma lags pa/ 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ 'aring ba ma lags pa/ 'grol ba
188b6(dkon brtsegs): ma lags pa/ rjes su chags pa ma lags pa/ khong khro ba ma lags pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par byang ba ma lags pa/ ye shes ma 'gas pa/ rnam par shes pa ma lags
188b7(dkon brtsegs): pa lam ma lags pa lam gol ba ma lags pa/ 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ rnam par 'jigs pa ma lags pa/ gzung ba ma lags pa/ mi gzung ba ma lags pa/ dor ba ma
189a1(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ rab tu dor ba ma lags pa dmigs pa ma lags pa/ dmigs su ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ sems can ma lags pa sems can ma mchis pa ma
189a2(dkon brtsegs): lags pa/ srog ma lags pa/ srog ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gang zag ma lags pa/ gang zag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ bdag ma lags pa/ bdag ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ dngos
189a3(dkon brtsegs): po ma lags pa/ dngos po ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ stong pa ma lags pa/ mi stong pa ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma lags pa/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ smon pa ma lags pa/ smon
189a4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gnas pa ma lags pa/ gnas pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa 'dus byas ma lags pa/ 'dus ma byas ma lags pa/ chad pa ma lags pa/ rtag pa ma lags
189a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ log pa ma lags pa/ yang dag pa ma lags pa/ bden pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma lags pa/ mngon par zhen pa ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ rten ma
189a6(dkon brtsegs): lags pa rten ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ gzhi ma lags pa/ gzhi ma mchis pa ma lags pa/ mngon par shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ yongs su shes par bgyi ba ma lags pa spang
189a7(dkon brtsegs): ba ma lags pa/ bsgom pa ma lags pa/ mngon du bgyi ba ma lags pa/ rnyed pa ma lags pa/ rnyed par bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'khor ba ma lags pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags pa
189b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas ma lags pa/ 'tshang rgya bar bgyi ba ma lags pa so so'i skye bo'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ 'phags pa'i spyod yul ma lags pa/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ rang sangs/
189b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul ma lags pa sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul ma lags pa/ spyod yul yang ma lags pa/ spyod yul ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa
189b3(dkon brtsegs): bgyis pa ma lags pa/ ma bgyis pa ma lags pa/ dag pa ma lags pa/ dag par bgyi ba ma lags pa ste/ de ltar bden pa la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur/ chos kyi dbyings
189b4(dkon brtsegs): la 'jug pas gzungs thob par 'gyur/ gzungs thob pas spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ro// de la ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug ce na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen
189b5(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'du byed rnams 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa nas/ de ltar na sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bgyi ba'i bar du ste/ 'di ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung
189b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'o// bcom ldan 'das de la ma rig pa ni ma rig pas ma mchis so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar ma rig pa ni rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ chos gang la rang bzhin ma mchis pa de ni dngos po ma mchis
189b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'o// gang la dngos po ma mchis pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa'o// gang yongs su ma grub pa de ni mi skye ba'o// gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag pa'o// gang ma skyes ma 'gags pa de ni 'das pa zhes gdags par
190a1(dkon brtsegs): bgyi ba ma lags/ ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba zhes gdags par bgyi ba ma lags so// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni ming ma mchis pa/ mtshan nyid ma mchis pa/
190a2(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma ma mchis pa/ gdags su ma mchis pa ste gzhan du na ming tsam dang brda tsam dang / tha snyad tsam dang kun rdzob tsam dang / brjod pa tsam dang / gdags pa tsam du sems cad
190a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams gzung ba'i don du bgyi ba ma gartogs par ma rig pa de ni don dam par dmigs su ma mchis so// chos gang don dam par dmigs su ma mchis pa de ni gdags su ma mchis pa tha snyad du bgyir ma mchis pa/
190a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod du ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das gang ming tsam zhes bgyi ba nas/ gdags pa tsam gyi bar de dag kyang yang dag pa ma lags pa/ brdzun pa log pa gtags pa/ rnam par bsgrubs/
190a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ yongs su btags pa/ rnam par btags pa rnam par dpyad pa ma zhi ba rab tu spros pa'o// ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams shes bgyi ba'ang chos gang ngo bo nyid kyis ma mchis pa de'ang/
190a6(dkon brtsegs): byeng skyed par yang ji ltar 'gyur te/ de bas nam rig pa ni ma mchis pa'o// de ltar ma rig pa ma mchis pas 'du byed rnams kyang ma skyes pa'o// gong ma skyes pa de dag ni rga bar mi 'gyur/ na bar mi 'gyur
190a7(dkon brtsegs): 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ shi 'pho bar mi 'gyur/ skye bar mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos gang ma skyes pa de la rga ba ga la mchis te/ gang la rgab ma mchis pa de ni na
190b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ma 'jur/ 'ching mi 'gyur shi 'gro ra mi 'gyur skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ 'di ni 'das pa dang / mabyon padang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
190b2(dkon brtsegs): nub ste/ ming tsam du bas kyi don dam par ni ma lags so// ma rig pa gang lags pa de nyid byang chub bo// de bzhin du srid pa'i yan lag thams cad kyang shes par bgyi ste / de ltar na rten cing 'jam
190b3(dkon brtsegs): par 'byung ba la 'jug pas chos kyi dbyings la 'jug par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma skyes pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa'o// de bas na chos thams
190b4(dkon brtsegs): cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni ma 'gags pa ste/ chos thams cad kyang ma 'gags pa'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa ni mtshan
190b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid ma mchis pa mtshan ma ma mchis pa dmigs su ma mchis pa/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa/ rnam par byung ba ma mchis pa/ rjes su chags pa ma mchis pa khong khro ba
190b6(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa ste/ chos kyi dbyings dang de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mtha' sde/ chos thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i mtha' 'o// de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa
190b7(dkon brtsegs): ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar na chos gang dang gang dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa mchis pa'i chos de dang de dag gis chos thams cad mchis pa ste/ de'i slad du chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o//
191a1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes mchis na de dag
191a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su ma mchis pa ste/ byang chub kyang gnyis su ma mchis pa lags pas/ gnyis su ma mchis pa ni
191a3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis su ma mchis pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang mi rgya'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor to zhes mchi na de dag
191a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni zlog pa 'am skor bar mdzad pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin
191a5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das so zhes mchi na/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni
191a6(dkon brtsegs): sems can ma mchis pa ste/ de la yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang yang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas sems can tshad med pa'i don mdzad do zhes ma
191a7(dkon brtsegs): na/ de dag tham cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gang shegs pa ni chos gang la'ang phan pa 'am/ gnod pa'i rnam par nye bar gnas pa ma lags so//
191b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas tshe'i 'du byed bor ro zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das
191b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dbyings ni ci'ang 'dor ba'am len pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las
191b3(dkon brtsegs): 'das so zhes mchin/ de dag thams cad ni lta ba'i rnam pa la mngon par zhen pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni 'khor ba 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa ma lags
191b4(dkon brtsegs): so/ bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig 'di lta bu'i chos la nges par gyur na/ de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings la ni 'gyur
191b5(dkon brtsegs): ba mchis kyang gda'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ba ni mi gda'a'o//
191b6(dkon brtsegs): bam po dgu pa// de nas 'bras bu che ba'i lha bye ba phrag brgyad cus/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar chos nyid la nges par 'gro bar brjod nas// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsha
191b7(dkon brtsegs): te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ thal mo sbyar te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la nigasu bcad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa
192a1(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs mthu chen 'dren pa tshul dang tshul min mkhyen la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba kun la thugs rtse thub pa yang dag ji bzhin ston mdzad pa// 'dren pa tshul ma las khyod kyis tshul ni yang dag nyid du
192a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag bstan// mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// khyod kyi byang chub nges par 'byung ba'i drang lam gcig pu bgrod pa bstan// khyod kyis byang chub dam pa gzhal yas zhi
192a3(dkon brtsegs): bshis pa mi g.yo brnyes// srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal nyam thag 'grol mdzad pa// mtha' yas yon tan mnga' zhing ye shes mngon par 'phags la mgos phyag 'tshal// phung po rnams
192a4(dkon brtsegs): ni ngo bo nyid stong shin tu phung po rnams dang bral// byis pa rmongs byed rnams ni rab tu bral bar khyod kyis yongs su btags// shes pa mig ldan skye bo phal chen 'dir bcings rnyod la spre'u thogs bzhin/
192a5(dkon brtsegs): grol ba mkhas pa rnams ni mkha' la rlung bzhin chags pa med par 'dong // khams rnams khams kyis rnam pa kun tu stong par thams cad mkhyen pas gsungs// dper na drag cha rnam pa kun tu shin tu sgra
192a6(dkon brtsegs): dang bral ba 'dra// de ni mi mkhas spyi bo yang dag ji bzhin mi shes mang po bcings// grol ba mkhas pa yang dag rtogs pa rnams ni khams gsum chags ma mchis// skye mche pa nyid kyis rtag tu stong zhe/
192a7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mkhyen pas bstan// yang dag ma lags brdzun zhing byis bslu ba chang pa stong pa 'dra// mi mkhas skye bo chos la gcig tu ma nges mang po 'di la chags// dper na 'gron pa rgya mtsho chen por
192b1(dkon brtsegs): 'khyams pa bzhin du 'khor bar lhung / 'dren pa dbang po 'di dag dbang po nyid kyis shin tu stong pa ste// thub pa me long nang gi gzhin gyi dkyil 'khor lta bur shin tu stong // mi mkhas skye bo yang dag rje
192b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin ma 'tshal mang po dag ni de lnga chags/ bya dang mtsho yi'i dang srog chags dag ni rgyal thogs pa bzhin// sems can sems can nyid stong sems can dral zhing ngo bo nyid kyis stong // thub pa sems can ri
192b3(dkon brtsegs): mo mkhan gyis gzugs bris bzhin du ma mchis na// mi mkhas skye bo yang dag ji bzhin ma 'tshal mang po de la chags// mkhas pa yang dag rtogs rnams sgo nga'i sbubs nas byung ba'i bya bzhin grol// rter byung
192b4(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams de dag skad cig pa ste stong zhing dmigs ma mchis// rmi lam dga' ba bzhin du gzung du ma mchis byis pa rmongs bgyid pa// mi shes rtogs pa'i slad du des kyang mi mangs skye bo mang po bcings/
192b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa yang dag rab tu rtogs rnams gzeb nas thar pa'i bya bzhin grol// thub pas chos nyid bsam yas ji bzhin chos rnams thams cad bsam mi khyab// thub pa zhi ba mya ngan 'das pa ji bzhin chos kun
192b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid dang bral ba// thub pa khams gsum mi chags bzhin du chos kun gnas pa ma mchis te// de slad tshul cig 'tshal gyur na 'gro kun bde bar gshegs par 'gyur// thub pa bdag dang gzhan
192b7(dkon brtsegs): du mi mkhyen lta bur chos kun g.yo ba med// thub pa'i ye shes rgyal ba'i bstan pa ji bzhin chos kun bsam mi khyab// thub pa byis pa'i spyod yul ma lags ji bzhin chos kun btags ma lags// sangs
193a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyus rnams kyi spyod yul 'di ni rab gsal de bzhin shes par gyis// mi mkhas gang dag rgyal bas byang chub gzhal yas bsnyes shes smra ba dang // gang dag rgyal bas 'khor
193a2(dkon brtsegs): lo dam pa gzhal yas mchog bskor smra ba dang // gang dag bde gshegs skyob pas srog chags khrag khrig mya ngan 'das smra ba// de dag thams cad yang dag ma 'tshal lta ba thibs por yongs su dkris/
193a3(dkon brtsegs): gang dag bde bar gshegs pas tshe yi 'du byed btang bzung smra ba dang // gang dag stobs bcur 'gro ba'i don mdzad yongs su mya ngan 'das smra ba// de dag thams cad lta bar song la yid chad bdud kyi
193a4(dkon brtsegs): lag tu mchis// khyod kyis de bzhin nyid ma 'tshal te 'dren pas mkhyen bzhin 'tshal bar bgyi// gang dag tshul drang tshul min 'di la mkhas pa de dag 'dren pa 'tshal// de dag rkang gnyis gtso bo
193a5(dkon brtsegs): dpal sdug 'jig rten thugs brtse rgyal bar 'gyur// de bzhin nyid 'di 'gyur ba'i dbang dang ldan te de nyid chos nyid lags// de ltar 'di 'tshal gyur nas tshul la mkhas pa mi yi mchog tu 'gyur//
193a6(dkon brtsegs): de ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs chos rnams nges par rtogs gyur pa// ston pa'i spyan sngar brjod de lhag pa'i bsam pa de yang bstan byas nas// kha cig yi rangs dogs med yid kyis sangs rgyas nyid du
193a7(dkon brtsegs): bdag mthong nas/ 'dren sras de dag tshul 'di nyid kyis bdag gis bdag lung bstan par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'bras bu che ba'i lha de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa phun sum
193b1(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa dang / chos rnams nges par rtogs pa thugs su chung nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i phyir/ de'i ni 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas dang ldan pa rgya thul gyis/ brjo
193b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la rigs su bcad de gsol pa/ dpal skye 'dun pa rnams ni rgyu zhig gzigs nas 'dzum pa mdzad lags te// rgyu med mi mdzad bka' stsal bdag gis bde gshegs dngon gsus
193b3(dkon brtsegs): sked thos// 'di ltar 'dren pa khyod kyis zhi ba bde ba bsil ba'i 'dzum mdzad na/ rtul ba lha mi lha min bla ma 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu de gsungs// 'di ring 'di ltar 'dre pa khyod kyi zhal nas
193b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum mdzad bsil mthong nas// 'gro ba 'di kun the tshom 'tshal te bde gshegs khyod kyi zhal du lta// mi mchog thugs rje ldan pa khyod kyis 'dzum rgyu de ni myur du gsungs// de thos gyur nas rgyal lo//
193b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba 'di dag the tshom ma mchis 'gyur// 'dren pa dam pa lnga tshogs gang dag rang gis rang la lung bstan pa// de dag su zhig gang gis ni thob mtha' bcas rnam par 'khrul pa gsungs// mi mchog
193b6(dkon brtsegs): tshangs pa'i gsungs dbyangs sgrogs te the tshom kun tu bsal du gsol// de zos rgyal ba'i 'khor 'di rab tu dga' zhing mchog tu mgu ba 'thob// bde gshegs rgyal mtshan mthon po de dag thams cad
193b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan du mi sems par// 'dren pa'i sras rnams byang chub gzhal yas zhi ba dam pa sems shing mchis// thub pa 'dren mchog the tshomi 'tshal ba de dag rnams kyi the tshom khum// des ni ye shes stobs
194a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan tshul dang tshul min mkhas kun rgyal bar 'gyur// rkang gnyis gtse bo'i yan lag brgyad ldan gsung thos gyur nas rab dga' ste// bde gshegs bstan pa bzhin du bgyid ci
194a2(dkon brtsegs): gsungs pa'i rjes 'jug mkhas par 'gyur// de dag don gyi dbang la brten nas bde gshegs 'dren pa bka' stsal gsol// des ni yi rangs gyur te 'gro ba chos kyi mtha' mar phyin par gyur// 'dren pa
194a3(dkon brtsegs): chen po lnga de dag gi sngon gyi spyod pa thos gyur cing // rgyal ba'i gsung thos gyur nas brnag pa yongs rdzogs zhi zhing rab dga' ste// tshul la zhugs shing tshul la mkhas rnams myur du thams cad mkhyen par
194a4(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'gro ba rab tu 'grol mdzad ji bzhin yang dag ston par mdzad par 'gyur/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal
194a5(dkon brtsegs): pa lha tshogs rnams kyi ched du nga yis 'dzum pa bajig rten bstan mdzad pa// rna thul khyod kyis dus dang chod shes nga la dris pa shin tu legs/ gang phyir nga yis 'dzum pa mdzad pa 'di yi tshul dang /
194a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyu// de khyod bstan gyis khyod dang 'gro ba rtse gcig yid kyis nyon// thams cad mkhyen pa rnams ni rgyu yi 'bras bu rnam pa gsum gzigs shing // rgyu la gzigs nas rkang gnyis dam pa dpal sdug
194a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams ni 'dzum pa mdzad// kha cig blo zhan bdag cag nyan thos 'gyur zhes mya ngan 'das zhugs dang // kha cig kha rog 'dug la dga' zhing rang rgyal byang chub 'dod zhugs dang // kha cig bdag cig
194b1(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten 'dren pa mthu bo cher ri 'gyur byas te// sku bo sdug bsngal lhung ba sgrol zhes zhugs pa'i bsam pa mkhyen gyur nas// 'dzum pa chung mdzad gang byung nyan thos don du mdzad par shes par bya/
194b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum pa 'bring mdzad gang byung rang rgyal don du mdzad par rig par bya// 'dzum mchog ngas gang mdzad pa 'di ni 'dren pa'i don du shes par bya// rab 'bring tha ma rnam pa 'di gsum 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyur gsungs te/
194b3(dkon brtsegs): kha cig thar pa don gnyer lam gsum zhugs pa'i 'jig rten 'di mkhyen nas// des na 'jig rten mkhas pa rnam par 'dren pa dam pa 'dzum pa mdzad// rta thul de la nyan thos don du 'dzum mdzad zhabs 'og nub
194b4(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// rang rgyal dor du 'dzum pa gang mdzad sku yi dbus su nub par 'gyur// 'dren pa stobs bcu'i don du 'dzum pa mdzad pa gtsug tu rub par 'gyur// de ltar rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum pa'i rgyu ni rnam
194b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum shes par gyis// rgyal ba mchog rnams don du gang 'dzum de kun nga yi gtsug tu nub// sdig pa gzhom pa'i tshul du de ltar 'dzum pa ngas bstan shes par gyis// 'dren pa rnam kyi 'dzum pa gang yin
194b6(dkon brtsegs): de rgyu rnam gsum yang bshad kyis// kun kyang rtse gcig yid byos de ni nga la legs par mnyan par gyis// dang po'i don du 'dren pa 'dzum pa ngas mdzad myur du thog mar nub// 'bring gi don ni dus tshod cung
194b7(dkon brtsegs): zang bsdad cing byi nas nub par 'gyur// blo mchog ldan phyir 'dzum pa rgyal ba ngas mdzad shin tu ring du gnas// rta thul nyan thos don du gang gnas 'dzum de thag pa'i dbang gis mdzad// gzhan yang 'dzum
195a1(dkon brtsegs): d+hU rnam gsum bshad kyis rta thul khyod kyis mnyan par gyis// gang dag rgyal ba drang po stobs bcu po la skor ba byed pa ni// de dag nga la sbyin par bskor nas myur du shin tu mkhas par
195a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// 'bring don phyir ni srab cing che la dal gyis skor bar byed par 'gyur// dal gyis g.yas phyogs bskor ba byas nas rgya cher 'gyur zhing mnan par 'gyur// gang dag gser rgyan la dkar steng bzhag 'dra
195a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bde gshegs mthong gyur na// de ni rkang gnyis dam pa thub pa'i sku kun khyab par gnas par 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pas 'dzum bstan 'di ni zhing gi dbang du shes par bya// gang tshe gdugs 'dra mtha'
195a4(dkon brtsegs): yas mig ldan pas ni 'dren te 'geb pa dang // gang tshe me tog 'dra la 'dren pa'i steng gi mkha' la lding ba dang // gang tshe sgo mo 'dra zhing bde bar gshegs la lan gsum skor byed pa// de ni 'jig rten
195a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das pa de yi dbang du 'dzum mdzad shes par bya// bde gshegs rgyal ba rnams kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu ni rnam gsum de tsam bstan// rta thul khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad rgyu rnam gsum po de dag shes par gyis/
195a6(dkon brtsegs): des na 'jig rten don bstan bzhed nas 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'dzum pa mdzad// des thos gyur nas thams cad mkhyen gyi bstan la the tshom med par gyis// 'bras bu che ba'i lha tshogs bye ba brgyad cu tham pa 'di dag ni/
195a7(dkon brtsegs): zhing rnams dag tu chos tshul shin tu rgya chen smra ba'i rgyal bar 'gyur// mkhas pa de dag dpag med tshe ldan bskal pa mang por gnas par 'gyur// de phyir bde bar gshegs pas 'dzum pa rgya chen mchog gi chu 'di
195b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan// de dag sngon gyi bskal pa sum cu drug gi rgyal ba rnams kyang mthong // bskal pa sum cu drug tu thams cad mkhyen pa bsnyen bkur spyad pa spyad// nga dung tshul ma khas 'di dag bskal pa grangs med sum
195b2(dkon brtsegs): cu rtsa drug tu// gang dag chen po 'di dag rgyal ba khyu mchog mchod pa byed cing gnas// thams cad du yang phun sum tshul rtog rgyal ba'i mchog la mchod pa byed// rkang gnyis tso bo mchod de byang chub zhi ba yos
195b3(dkon brtsegs): su bcal byas nas// de dag de yi 'og tu dpal sdug rkang gnyis dam pa skyes bu mchog/ 'dren pa mthu chen yon tan ldan par gser gyi rgyal mtshan bskal la 'byung // rgyal ba de dag sna tshogs zhing na gnas shing
195b4(dkon brtsegs): rang rang zhing sbyangs te// sems can dam pa de kun nyi mo'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dpal zhes bya// de tshe yon tan ldan pa de dag rnams kyis 'dus pa grangs med de// de tshe thub pa re re'i nyan thos 'dus par 'gyur ba de dag
195b5(dkon brtsegs): ni// gal te bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu stobs bcus nyan thos de bgrangs kyang // lags mdzad rnams kyi nyan thos 'dus pa dag ni mthar phyin bgrangs mi 'gyur// 'dus pa de dag thams cad grangs meng 'dus
195b6(dkon brtsegs): pa de ni ci 'dra ba// de las nyis 'gyur de tshe byang chub tu ni yang dag zhugs par 'gyur// de tshe rgyal por zhugs kyi rgyal ba tham cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin// de dag thams cad yongs dag zhing du spyad nas kun kyang
195b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bar 'gyur// bde gshegs de dag spyod pa gang yin de dag rnams kyi'ang de nyid 'gyur// 'jig rten mkhas pa de dag mya ngan 'das par gyur nas dam pa'i chos// de tshe sras kyis bzung zhing bskal pa bye ba
196a1(dkon brtsegs): brgyad ngur gnas par 'gyur// de dag 'das nas ston pa'i gsung rab de la byang chub sems bskyed pa// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma pas kyang shin tu mang ba 'byung bar 'gyur// de dag 'das nus
196a2(dkon brtsegs): ston pa skyob pa rnams kyi gsung rab de la ni// nyan thos rgya mtsho kun gyi bye snyed dpag yas mya ngan 'da' bar 'gyur// de ltar 'jig rten don rnams mdzad pa rang byung de dag thams cad kyi// bstan pa gang yin de ni
196a3(dkon brtsegs): chos dang yongs su legs par ldan gyur cing // yang dag shar bar 'gyur te de ni bstan pa rnams kyi chos nyid yin// mi mchog de yi gsung rab de thos 'gro ba ma lus dang gyur nas// rkang gnyis dam pa gzhal yas
196a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten don byed bdag cag 'gyur zhes te// thams cad dga' nas rgyal ba'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal skye bo rab tu dga'// bde bar gshegs la dga' ba gzhal yas bskyed nas rlos kyi bsnyen bkur byas/
196a5(dkon brtsegs): de lta bas na dga' bar byos la mgo la 'bar zhing spyad spyod de// rtag tu shes rab pha rol phyin dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byos la// yang dag mthong ba'i spyod pa dge ba 'di la rab tu rten byos te// dge
196a6(dkon brtsegs): slong khyed cag rkang gnyis gtso bo 'jig rten thugs brtser 'gyur bar gyis// 'bras bu che ba pa lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// / de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams
196a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis de'i tshe/ sems can dpag tu med pa byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs par rig cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la the tsom med par gyur par rig nas/ tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga'
196b1(dkon brtsegs): zhing dga' bad yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis so so nas mngon par bstod do// de la lha'i bu sbyin pa la mos pas gsol ba
196b2(dkon brtsegs): kyis sdug pa'i sras rnams dang // btsun mo dang ni srog 'phangs btang // rgyal srid btang ba ci smos te// sbyin mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu tshul khrims la mos pas gsol ba/ khyod kyis
196b3(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnam sbyangs pa/ rnam pa kun tu bsnyengs mi mnga'// shin tu bslabs pas mthar phyin pa// khrims mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu bzod pa la mos pas gsol pa khyod kyis
196b4(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa bsten mdzad pa// yan lag gtubs pa'ang bzod par mdzad// zab mor sgyid lug ma lags te// bzod mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus la mos pas gsol pa/
196b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson pa ma btang brtson 'grus te// stobs chen brtson 'grus ldan 'gyur bas// rdzogs pa'i byang chub mchog bskas pa// brtson mthar phyin la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bubasam gtan la mos pas gsol
196b6(dkon brtsegs): ba khyod kyi bsam gtan bsten mdzad pa// de la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// dus gsum mnyam pa nyid bsnyes pa// bsam gtan mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gzi brjid dang ldan pas gsol
196b7(dkon brtsegs): pa/ dpa' bos shes rab pha rol byin// yang dang yang du bsgoms pas na// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes pa// shes rab mthar phyin phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu khams kyi blo gros kyi gsol pa/
197a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin pa dag dang ngag snyan dang // don spyad mthur pa'i don dag gis// 'jig rten 'di dag khyod kyis btul// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dge ba'i blo gros kyi gsol pa/
197a2(dkon brtsegs): byams chen thugs rje chen po dag/ yun rings dus nas bsgom mdzad de// sems can dpag yas yongs su bsgral// gdos 'dzin khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu dag pa'i sems kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs
197a3(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i mthar phyin cing // thub chen dul ba'i sems mnga' bas// ma dul thams cad dul mdzad pa// kha lo sgyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros dri ma med pas gsol pa/ sems ngag mnyen
197a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems mnga' ba// sems dul dbang po zhi mnga' ba// sems can kun gyi sems mkhyen pa// sems mkhyen khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros rnam par dag pas gsol pa/ shes rab ldan pa'i blo
197a5(dkon brtsegs): gros can// blo gros mchog la rab tu zhugs// thugs gsal phur sum tshogs pa'i blo// mi mkhas rtogs mdzad phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sems brgyan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sems ni rnam par sbyangs
197a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas zhing yang rnam dag mdzad// sems can blo yang rnam sbyangs pa// kun dag khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu pham pa med pas gsol pa/ dgongs pa pham pa mi mnga' ba// khyod kyis bdud kyi dpung yang bcom//
197a7(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis lha tshogs thams cad kyang // rab tu dga' ba'i yid du bsgyur// lha'i bu myur du byed pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi chos rnams myur bar ma khyen// sems can myur bar rnam par sbyangs// zab cing blta dka'i chos dag la/
197b1(dkon brtsegs): myur du mdzad la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu brtson 'grus brtan pas gsol ba/ bral myur yongs su bral gyur pa// nu bo rgal te zag pa spangs// pha rol phyin cing thang la bzhugs// brtson 'grus brtan la
197b2(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu spyod lam dang ldan pas gsol pa/ 'dod rlags spangs shing zhe sdang spangs// gti mug spangs pa zag med pas// sbyin nas bsod nams zhir gyur pa// 'jig rten mchod 'os
197b3(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu shin tu brtan pas gsol pa khyod kyi dam chos shin tu bstan// 'jig rter gsum du rab tu mchod// gcig pu bgrod pas bde ba brnyes// de phyir khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/
197b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mi 'khrug pas gsol ba lhun sdug gcig tu gyur pa'i ri// rlung gis bskyod par mi nus te// de bzhin bstod dang smad pa yis// bde gshegs spyod par mi nus so// lha'i bu mnyam pa nyid thob pas
197b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po zab cing mnyam// mtshan rab sum cu rtsa gnyis can// shes rab zab mo blo ldan pa// rgyal ba mdzes la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zab pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa ka sku rer khyod la
197b6(dkon brtsegs): sku mi mnga'// de bzhin nyid la rab tu bzhugs// yang dag mtha' yang rab tu ston// khyod mtshungs gang zag yongs ma mchis// lha'i bu blo gros dang bas gsol pa/ gnyis su med pa yang dag ston/
197b7(dkon brtsegs): dpe' bo dpa' bas rnam par gnon// gadze dag zab la zhum ma mchis// de dag khyod chos pha rol phyin// lha'i bu rab tu dga' bas gsol pa/ mchog tu dga' yid brtan pa dag/ khyod kyis slob la bslab
198a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rnams// sbrul rnams pags pa rnying 'dor bzhin// srid pa gsum po 'di dag 'dor// lha'i bu zhi ba'i yid kyis gsol pa// ji ltar mar me mar zad cing // snying po zang pas zhir 'gyur
198a2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin// khyod kyis bstan pa myur bos na// shes rab chen po mya ngan 'da'// lha'i bu zhi gnas la gnas pas gsol ba/ gang gis kun mkhyen khyod mthong ba'i// mi rnams 'dod chags bcings pa yang /
198a3(dkon brtsegs): shes rab mtshon gyis mkhas pa dag/ 'dod chags zhags pa gcod par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas mang gis gsol pa zhi ba'i sems mnga' zhi la spyod// cho ga spyod yul rab tu zhi// nyon mongs thams
198a4(dkon brtsegs): cad zhir gyur pa// dgra rnams zhi la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis zhi gnas bslabs pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' grags chen dag/ zhi gnas nyid kyis
198a5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung 'gyur zhing // sems zhi de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas zas kyis gsol pa chos rnams kun gyi zhi ba ni// dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu bstan// shes rab chen pos de 'tshal
198a6(dkon brtsegs): rang dag de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur// lha'i bu rtag tu rnam par lta bas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sems can rtag tu gzigs// mkhas pa khyod ltar slob pa rnams// yang shes mchog gis mnyam bzlas
198a7(dkon brtsegs): cing // byang chub mchog kyang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu snang 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ shes rab pha rol phyin gyur pa// thub chen khyod las gang slob pa// de dag 'jig rten snang 'dzin cing // sgrib pa
198b1(dkon brtsegs): med par gzigs par 'gyur/ lha'i bu 'od byed kyis gsol pa/ 'dug rten sgron ma khyod kyi gsung // ye shes rgya mthong thos na// de dag dri med pa de bzod// bsam chis mi khya 'od kyang 'jung /
198b2(dkon brtsegs): bu dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rnam mi rtog/ thabs la mkhas pas de dag gsungs// de 'dra'i ye shes rten bgyid pa// de dag gang zag mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu rab tu
198b3(dkon brtsegs): mi gnas kyis gsol pa/ gnas ma mchis shing blung ma mchis// chos rnams thams cad sems ma mchis// bdag dang gzhan gyi rnam 'gyur ba// de dag khyod kyi de bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu ga nas med
198b4(dkon brtsegs): blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad gzhi med par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// de dag khyod kyis lugs bzlog ste// sems can rnams la bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu mi
198b5(dkon brtsegs): rjer blo gros kyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad rten ma mchis// sems can ma mchis phan tshun min// lag mthil skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// yang dag ji bzhin khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu
198b6(dkon brtsegs): rab snang rgyu bas gsol pa/ bde gshegs khyod kyis chos kyi rnams// bar snang lta bur snang ba ste// skya dang 'gag pa med par gzigs// de slad 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i du nga yir
198b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin pa med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis 'gro ba 'di dag kun// lus kyi ngo ba nyid kyis ni// g.yo bo med cing ngar 'dzin med/ spyod med rtsol ba med par gzigs// lha'i bu blo gros rnam par
199a1(dkon brtsegs): bsgoms kyis gsol pa sgyu ma sna tshogs legs bgyis pa// sgyu ma'i mkhan pos bstan myur na// de bzhin ma lags de bzhin gda'// thub pa de ltar mnyam ma mchis// ShA
199a2(dkon brtsegs): bu rab tu sang pa'i ngang tshul gyis gsol pa gzugs ba rnyan ji ltar me long la// gda' yang de ltar ma mchis pa// de bzhin chos rnams khyod kyis gzigs// de bas 'jig rten rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu
199a3(dkon brtsegs): yid gnyis rnam par 'jog gis gsol ba/ sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lta bu ste// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams// de bzhin khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// de ltar 'gro ba kun kyang mkhyen// lha'i bu
199a4(dkon brtsegs): spongs pa thogs med kyis gsol pa/ chos nyid la ni khor zug tu// spobs pa rab tu 'byung 'brur zhing // chos nyid de ni brnyes pa na// de slang khyod ni spobs pa ldan// lha'i bu chags med blo thos kyis
199a5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ khyod kyis chos 'di thams cad ni// rang bzhin mtshan nyid ma mchis par// yang dag ji bzhin rab tu mkhyen// de bas thub pas rab ribe bsal// lha'i bu mya ngan bul gyis gsol pa/
199a6(dkon brtsegs): ngan med cing ner len med// spros pa med cing rnyog pa med// chos rnams kun tu nyon ma mongs// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu rtogs pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams yang
199a7(dkon brtsegs): dag ma lags te// 'phro dang 'ong ba ma mchis pa// de dag khyod kyis yang dag mkhyen// de bzhin rab tu bstan pa mdzad// lha'i bu blo gros mchog gis gsol pa/ lhun gyi grub cing blangs med pa/
199b1(dkon brtsegs): rmongs pa med cing shes pa med/ chos rnams ci yang mi bgyid ba khyod kyis rang ba'inathugs su rung // lha'i bu sgrib med thob kyis gsol pa snang ba ma mchis mu ma mchig / gzugs med ma
199b2(dkon brtsegs): lags gzugs can min// gzung ba ma mchis grol mA mchis// khyod kyis rang bzhin thugs su nud// lha'i bu mig pas kyis gsol pa/ yul dang phyogs na mi gnas pa// yod dang med pa ma lags pa/
199b3(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam 'dod pa ji bzhin du// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mig mi 'dzums kyis gsol pa/ byim pa rnams kyi blo rmongs pa// ma skyes pa dang ma 'gags pa// bar ma'ang gnas pa
199b4(dkon brtsegs): ma mchis pa// de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang zag sems can ma mchis pa// ma mchis tha snyad ma mchis pa// bstan pa'i slad du brjod
199b5(dkon brtsegs): bgyig/ de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gis tha snyad gang gra pa yi// mtshan ma de dag ma mchis te// chos kun mtshan ma ma mchis
199b6(dkon brtsegs): par narnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu smon pa med pa la gnas pas gsol pa/ ji ltar mtshan ma stong gyur cing // smon pa dmigs su ma mchis dang // su la smon lam mchis
199b7(dkon brtsegs): gyur ba/ de yang de lha'i tshul du ma khyen// lha'i bu ting nge 'dzin la gzhol bas gsol ba rnam thar sgo la brten bgyis shing // gang zhig 'grol 'gyur de ma mchis// de bzhin kun nas nyon mongag/
200a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu ma smad pas gsol ba/ khyod ni sdig pa kun spang shing // bsod nams thams cad bsags gyur te// bde gshegs khyod la smad mi
200a2(dkon brtsegs): mnga'// su smod de dag mkhas ma lags// lha'i bu glog gi sprin gyis gsol pa/ ji ltar glog bcas sprin gyi tshogs// char gyis sa chen ngoms par bgyid// de bzhin 'dren pas chos char gyis/
200a3(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten rnams ni ngoms par mdzad// lha'i bu bsam pa dor yod kyis gsol pa/ thub mchog gsung ni don mchis te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// shin tu brtags te mdzad pas na/
200a4(dkon brtsegs): ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i mtshan// lha'i bumangon sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad dngos nyid kyis// ma skyes 'gags pa ma lags te// de dag bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen/
200a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de bzhin rtogs par mdzad// lha'i bu sing gA'i nga ros gsol pa/ khyod kyis stong pa nyid bstan te// seng ge'i nga ro bsgrags mdzad pas// mu stegs can kur rab 'jigs pa// sa
200a6(dkon brtsegs): ges ri dgas phra mo bzhin// lha'i bu bag yod las kyis gsol pa/ bag yod sngon du btang mdzad de// khyod kyis spyod pa spyad bgyis pas// sangs rgyas chos la 'dren pa khyod// bag yod pas
200a7(dkon brtsegs): ni nges par byung // lha'i bu bag yod rab gnas kyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab gnas te// khyod kyis nyid kyi chos kyang spel// stob bcu gzhal yas sangs rgyas chos// bsam gyis mi khyab rab
200b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyu'i bu ga sa sa kyis gsol pa/ dgasod pa la btsun du k+Sha/ d+hA na zugs/ ma ma sa/ ts+tsha/ rgyu da nga lagyur/ na na /
200b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu bag yod nges par byung gis gsol pa/ byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dag/ ji nyid thar la rten pa'i rnams// kun kyang khyod la bslabs pa ste// bag yod pas ni nges par byung // lha'i bu
200b3(dkon brtsegs): yod gnas pas gsol pa/ bag yod yongs su ma btang bas// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// 'gro ba 'di la ma chags par// thams cad mkhyen du nges par 'byung // lha'i bu bag yod bsrungs kyis gsol
200b4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ byang chub lam la brten mdzad cing // khyod ni bag gis bsrungs pas na// thugs rje chen po mkhas pa yis// byang chub dam pa brnyes par 'gyur// lnga'i bu bag yod brtson gyis gsol pa/ bag yod pa la rab
200b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson zhing // mtshan nyid gcig po rtogs bgyis pas// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyi sras// yab kyi dkor yang thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu bag yod mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ bag yod dga'
200b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i bstan pa rnams// de dag sangs rgyas ye shes kyis// dpa' bo nyon mongs ri 'jigs pas// nga rgyal ri yang de bzhin bsnyil// lha'i bu bag yod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'chol
200b7(dkon brtsegs): mdzad no// khyod ni bag gis bzung bas na// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// khyod kyi thugs ni sbyor ma gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas brtson gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams de dga'ang bzhin ni// da ni sangs rgyas spyod yul
201a1(dkon brtsegs): lags/ byang chub yang dag gang zhugs dang // thams cad mkhyen pa der mi 'jigs// lha'i bu zhi gnas la yang dag par gnas pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi gnas bzhugs pa ste/
201a2(dkon brtsegs): 'on kyang de la chags mi mnga'// sems can nyon mongs zhi bar mdzad// rdul 'thul ba la char pa bzhin// lha'i bu zhi gnas la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas zhi la rab tu bzhugs// sus kyang mi
201a3(dkon brtsegs): spyod ri bo bzhin// khyod la gnod bgyir mi nus te// sems zhi khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas dul gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras rnams ma smad pa// zhi gnas kyis ni yongs su dul// bdud rnam
201a4(dkon brtsegs): bye bas mi tshugs te// 'dod chags kyis ni gnod mi 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i yid mnga' zhi gnas la// dpa' bo chen po sgom mdzad pas// ci la gnas te bsam gtan
201a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// sus kyang khyod kyi tshul ma 'tshal// lha'i bu zhi gnas sngon du 'gros gsol pa/ ston pas sangs rgyas chos rnams kyi// sngon du zhi gnas 'gro zhes gsungs// gang gis byang chub 'grub 'gyur bgi/
201a6(dkon brtsegs): chos gzhan de yi rjes su 'brang // lha'i bu zhi gnas rjes su 'brang gis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma zhi gnas ni// sems kyi rnyog pa dang bar bgyid// zhi ba'i sems ldan rnams kyi 'ching // de khod mtha'
201a7(dkon brtsegs): yas dbang du mdzad// lha'i bu zhi gnas kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// zhi gnas yin zhes 'dren pas gsungs// de la chags med spyod pa ni// rnam par 'dren pa
201b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu zhi gnas brnyan gyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan gyis ni mngon brlan te// shes rab kyis ni sems bsgoms pas// de phyir rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes// de bzhin skye bo rnams
201b2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'dren// lha'i bu zhi gnas lhur len gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams gang la yang // lam gzhan bdag gis ma mthong ste// zhi gnas ye shes ma thob na// rang byung nying du nges par 'byung /
201b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon dgas gsol pa/ dpa' bre chen po lhag mthong ni// chos rnams thams cad ston pa ste// de la khyod kyi sras spyod cing // rang byung zhing ni thob par 'gyur// lce'i bu lhag mthong
201b4(dkon brtsegs): byung gis gsol ba/ shes rab pha rol phyin gnas shing // rnam par 'dren pa 'byung bar 'gyur// sman pa'i rgyal po sten pa ste// de ni lhag mthong dge ba lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong rab gnas kyis
201b5(dkon brtsegs): ga sol pa/ chos rnams thams cad bsngal bgyis te// yang dag ji bzhin mthong gyur na// brtun pa rdzogs pa'i byang nub thob// byang chub di la gnas par 'dong // lha'i bu lcag mthong nges 'byu
201b6(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa/ gang zag mchog rnams ye shes kyis// byang chub mchog tu nges par byung // rdzogs pa'i byang chub ye shes kyis// brnyes pa'i 'dren pa skyes mi 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong mngon
201b7(dkon brtsegs): dgas gsol ba/ yang dag ji bzhin yang dag tu// chos rnams rnam par gzigs pas na// byang chub gzhal yas brnyes gyur te// de bas rnam 'dren sangs rgyas lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong
202a1(dkon brtsegs): la mngon par brtson pas gsol pa/ mkhas pa ye shes gang brtson zhing // dka' ba mang po spyod bgyid pa// de dag rgol tshogs thams cad kyis// 'pham par bgyi bar yod
202a2(dkon brtsegs): mi nus// lha'i bu lhag mthong byung gis gsol pa/ chos rnams rnam mthong bgyi slad du// rgyal sras gang dag bzhugs pa'i rnams// chos rnams ngo bo nyid 'tshal zhing // rang 'byung nyid ni thob par
202a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// lha'i bu lhag mthong la rten pas gsol pa/ rnam 'dren khyod kyis yun ring du// ye shes la ni brten mdzad pas// thams cad mkhyen pa brnyes nas ni// srog chags bye ba grol bar mdzad/
202a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu khyad par ldan gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mkhyen pas thams cad mkhyen// 'dren pa dam pa mngon par 'phags// srid pa'i rgya mtshos khyer ba yi// 'jig rten de yis sgrol bar mdzad// lha'i bu
202a5(dkon brtsegs): lhag mthong gnas kyis gsol ba/ lhag mthong la ni gnas mdzad cing // rjes kun rnam par gzigs pas na// sangs rgyas chos rnams 'phel 'gyur te// sa bzang n+ya kro d+ha spyi 'dra// lha'i bu lhag mthong
202a6(dkon brtsegs): dang ma gral bas gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis sras// ye shes kyis ni yongs bzung ste// byang chub mchog ni thob bgyis shing // skye bo mang po 'brel pa bgyid// lha'i bu lhag mthong la rnam
202a7(dkon brtsegs): par rtse bas gsol ba/ sangs rgyas mkhyen la rnam par rol// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// zhum pa ma mchis dngang mi mnga'// thub pa 'jig rten tham cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lhag
202b1(dkon brtsegs): mthong la yang dag par 'jug gis gsol ba/ dpa' bo chen po chos kun ni// lhag mthong nying du yang dag 'du// rang bzhin med par rnam mthong ni// de ni rang byung byang chub lags// lha'i bu lhag mthong
202b2(dkon brtsegs): snying pos gsol ba/ sangs rgyas lhag mthong snying po ste// nos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// 'jig rten sdug bsngal 'di gzigs shing // thugs rje rnon po shin du bskyed/ lnga'i bu lhag mdzod
202b3(dkon brtsegs): 'gros kyis gsol pa/ byang chub phyir ni shes 'gro ba'i// 'jig rten mkhas pa nges par 'byung // de dag byang chub marjog kyang 'thob// grol nas skye dgu 'di dag 'brel// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rten
202b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ stong pa nyid kyi chos sten pa'i// mkhas pa byang chub 'tshang rgya ste// sems can bcings las grol bgyid cing // 'ching ba thams cad rnam par gcod// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mos kyis
202b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ stong pa nyid la mos gyur pas// 'gro ba 'di dag srog med gzigs// dmigs med ngo bo nyid med pa// de ltar srog chags rnams la ston// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/
202b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos rnams rang bzhin stong pa ste/ srog chags rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa' bos de la spyad par mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis bsam pas gsol pa/ skyon
202b7(dkon brtsegs): dang bral zhing bcings med la// 'jigs skrag thams cad rab tu spangs// chos rnams kun la mi gnas shing // nam mkha'i rlung bzhin spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/
203a1(dkon brtsegs): stong nyid chos la rten bgyid cing // sangs rgyas spyod yul gang mos pa// de dag stong pa mchod pa ste// mchod pa de ni bla na med// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'phags kyis/
203a2(dkon brtsegs): / sa na / /
203a3(dkon brtsegs): dpa' bo chen po chos rnams gang / mya ngan 'das min ston mi mchis// kun kyang mya ngan 'das par 'dren// drang srong chen po'i byang chub lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid kyis yang dag shar gyis gsol pa
203a4(dkon brtsegs): stong nyid zhi la brten nas ni// khyod kyi slob ma yang dag bshad// stong pa nyid la gang rten pa// de dag rim gro bgyid pa lags// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la rten gyis gsol pa/ gang rnams stong pa nyid rten
203a5(dkon brtsegs): ba/ mkhas pa de dag rmongs mi 'gyur// nyon mongs med cing lha med rnams// byang chub rdul med thob par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa// gang rnams stong nyid stan kyad
203a6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams phun sum tshogs// rang byung pham pa med par 'gyur// 'jig rten don kyang bgyid par 'gyur// lha'i bu stong pa nyid la yang dag par zhus pas gsol ba/ sangs rgyas chos
203a7(dkon brtsegs): la zhugs gyur te// stong pa nyid la gang stan pa// de la bdud rnams bye ba phrag/ stong gis dkrug par mi nus so// lha'i bu mtshan ma med la dga' bas gsol ba/ mtshan ma med la mngon dgyes te/
203b1(dkon brtsegs): dngos po thams cad rnams bshig nas// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rnams nas byung // mtshan ma rnams la chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la gnas pas gsol ba/ mnan ma med la spyod zur cing //
203b2(dkon brtsegs): zhi bzhi la spyod pa rnams// mtshan ma rnam par bshig rnams kyis// tshul ni bdud kyis shes mi rus// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyis spyod yul la// 'dren pa
203b3(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni spyod mdzad de/ mtshan ma mi mnga' rtogs dka' zhing // zhi spyod khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med bso skom gyis gsol ba/ thub pa'i 'khor 'di thams cad ni// mtshan ma
203b4(dkon brtsegs): mang bso skom gyur te// yab kyi dkor ni 'tshal gyur nas// de bzhin gshegs la bkur sti bgyid// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ mtshan ma med la nyin mtshan du// gang zag
203b5(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni spyod mdzad pas// lha dang dri za mi dag kyang // khyod kyis tshul ni ma 'tshal to// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas rnam par grol gyis gsol pa/ chos rnam thams cad rnam bshig shing // dpa'
203b6(dkon brtsegs): chen 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// mtshan ma med la gnas pa mdzad// de bas khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rnam par brtse bas gsol ba/ thub chen dpa' bo chen po khyod/
203b7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan ma med la rnam par rol// 'gro ba yongs su smin mdzad cing // sangs rgyas ye shes mchog la bzhugs// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pas yongs su grub kyis gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma spangs gyur pa/
204a1(dkon brtsegs): de dag byang chub grub pa ste// yab kyi chos kyi brtul zhugs can// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la dga' bas gsol pa/ gang gis mtshan ma
204a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa shig pa// de dag sangs rgyas chos la dga'// bla ma'i gnas la gnas pa ste// sems can kun gyi mchod rten lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la rten pas gsol pa zhi la spyod cing
204a3(dkon brtsegs): rnam grol ba// sangs rgyas 'jig rten bla na med// 'byung po kun gyi skyabs dang rten// dpung gnyen de bzhin gnas kyang lags// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa la mos pas gsol ba/ mtshan ma med la
204a4(dkon brtsegs): mos gyur cing // zhi ba dgra las rgyal gyur pa// sangs rgyas rgal po'i 'gro sgrol ba// de dag tshad ni ga la mchis// lha'i bu smon pa med pa rtogs kyis gsol ba/ mgon po gang dag smon lam
204a5(dkon brtsegs): mi// rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs pa// de dag 'jig rten bral ba ste// sangs rgyas 'jig rten nang nas byung // lha'i bu smon pa med pa la rten pas gsol pa/ zhi ba'i thugs dang ldan pa khyod// srid pa
204a6(dkon brtsegs): rnams su smon mi mdzad// srid pa yongs su chad pas na// sangs rgyas 'jig rten yod mi gos// lha'i bu smon pa med pas skyes kyis gsol po/ gang gis sred pa yongs bcom pa// de dag gzi mchog
204a7(dkon brtsegs): skyes pa ste// de dag 'jig rten mgon po'i sras// rang gi yab la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas spyod kyis gsol pa// khyod kyis sras rnams ma smad pa// phred pa yongs su bcad pas na// srid pa 'dzi
204b1(dkon brtsegs): dpying sring pa la// de dag smon pa mi bgyid do// lha'i bu smon pa med pas yongs su grol bas gsol ba/ gang dag smon pa mi bgyid pa// ga'i ldan khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// re ba bang zhing bcing grol ba// de dag yongs su
204b2(dkon brtsegs): grol bar 'gyur// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ gang gis sred pa rab bcom pa// de dag mya ngan dgon pa nol// de dag mi sgom zang zing mad// dpa' chen khyod la de phyag 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa
204b3(dkon brtsegs): med la nges pas gsol pa/ gang gis srid dang sdug bsngal dang // bde ba dngos po med bsgoms la// mgon khyod de dag rnams kyi yab// de dag khyod kyi sras kyang lags// lha'i bu smon pa med pa'i 'khor gyis
204b4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ srid pa'i sdug bsngal sus mthong ba// de dag khyod kyi bstan la dul// kha lo sgyur zhing srid sel ba// sems dul khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas byung gis gsol pa/ srid pa'i
204b5(dkon brtsegs): dkon las byung ba'i rnams// bde ba thob cing zhi gnas te// nyon mongs dgra rnams pham mdzad pa// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu smon pa med pas ya mtshan du gyur pas gsol pa/ g.yul
204b6(dkon brtsegs): las rgyal bar gyur pa ste// khyod ni rnam rgyal pham mi mnga'// bdud kyi dpung rnams pam mdzad cing // srid pa kun tu smon mi mdzad// lha'i bu smon pa med pa stobs ldan gyis gsol pa/ thar ba'i chos la stobs ldan
204b7(dkon brtsegs): pas/ bdud kyis zhags pa yongs bcad cing // khyod kyis sras rnams bdud dag la// bskyab pa'i 'du shes mi bgyid do// lha'i bu lus rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ lus med pa chi ba med tshul du// lus
205a1(dkon brtsegs): sa/ / k+Sha la su sa
205a2(dkon brtsegs): 'du / shin rgyu/ hUM/ nga 'a bya / 'angs / sa 'a ltung
205a3(dkon brtsegs): cing // lus kyi sdug bsngal rnam grol nas// ras pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// bu lus yongs su gtong gis gsol pa/ sbrul gyi bags pa rnying bzhin du/ nag can sus 'di blangs nas ni// 'dzi ni/
205a4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa'i sku rje me/ su mi mang le phug kyang 'tshas// zhwa'i bu lus la smon pas gsol pa/ mi gcung rdzing rnam pabacing // rdul pa'i lus la rnam skad de/ rig tsang gang dun smra
205a5(dkon brtsegs): nas// 'dren po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyis yongs su stobs gsol pa/ kyang dag rul pa'i lus sgo zhing // rgyal skas gtsang ma 'tshal rnams// chos kyi rab tu bskyed pa'i rdus
205a6(dkon brtsegs): de dag sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal 'gyur// lha'i bu lus kyis skrag pas gsol pa/ 'byung ba chen po sbrul gdug 'drar// gang gis shin tu rtogs gyur ba// de dag lus las 'das pa ste// rkang gnyis gcos
205a7(dkon brtsegs): phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi skyon mthong bas gsol pa/ lus kyi skyon la mngon gsum ste/ me shes gzigs pa'i spyan mnga' bas// sangs rgyas mkhyen pas mkhas pa dag/ srid gsum thams
205b1(dkon brtsegs): cang mongs su gzigs// lha'i bu lus la 'dod chabs dang bral bas gsol ba/ lus kyi 'du shes 'dod nabs bral// chos kyi 'du shes mi gnas pas// kun sbyor kun las 'das bste// rnam
205b2(dkon brtsegs): 'brel sangs rgyas phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa'i dgra'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ srid par srid pa 'joms mdzad pa// khyod kyis dgra yi 'du shes mkhyen// khyod kyi sras rnams sgom bgyid cing /
205b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa byang chub mngon 'tshang rgya// lha'i bu srid pa sel bas gsol pa/ srid pa rnams kyi nyes dmigs mthong // mya ngan 'das la 'jigs ming mthong // khyod kyi sras rnams 'gro phan phyir/
205b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub spyad pa spyod par bgyid// lha'i srid pa rnam par spangs kyis gsol pa/ gang gis srid pa rnams spangs shing // 'jig la mngon par mi dga' ba// bral bar gyur cing sems dag pa/
205b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhas khyod zhabs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa gsal gyis gsol pa/ mi yi dam pa khyod kyi sras// srid par khrid pa rab gsal te// khyod kyis bslab la bslabs pa dag/ stong gsum 'di na
205b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par mdzes// lha'i bu srid pa las brgal bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i mtsho las rgal ba yi// 'jig rten mgon mchog skyob rnams la// grangs kyis rgyud du bgrang ba yi// grangs ni 'jig rten
205b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di na med// lha'i bu srid pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/ srid pa thams cad yongs bcom ste// gang dag rtag tu dran spyod pa// de dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mchod// srog chags rnams la chos kyang
206a1(dkon brtsegs): ston// lha'i bu srid pa las rab tu grol bas gsol ba/ srid pa'i rgyun las rab tu grol// rnam par 'dren pa srid pa rgal// srid pa mthar phyin sangs rgyas te// srid pa sel la phyag
206a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa rab tu zhi byed kyis gsol ba/ srid par khrid pa rab zhi zhing // srid pa pham par mdzad nas gshegs// brtan bsrid pa mthar byin pa// khyod la ngo zla ma mchis so// lba'i
206a3(dkon brtsegs): bu srid pa'i mthar 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i mthar phyin rab zhi bas// mgon po khyod kyi srid pa'i mtha'// srid pa phyir log thams cad mkhyen// sangs rgyas 'jig rten rtogs par mdzad/
206a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu srid pa tha ma'i lus 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ srid pa'i rgyu ni rnam spangs te// srid pa tha ma 'dzin mdzad pa// gang gis srid pa ler gyur pa'i// khyod kyis kun tu sbyor ma mthong // lha'i bu srid pa
206a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu zhi ba thob kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis srid pa stong mkhyen te// srid pa'i rgyu yang de bzhin no// zhum dang rab tu zhum mi mnga'// mnyam nyid gyur la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu
206a6(dkon brtsegs): 'gro bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i pha rol brgal ba ste// srid par khrid pa yang dag bsal// rnam par 'dren pa thugs brtse bas// skye bo gzhan ni sgrol ba mdzad//
206a7(dkon brtsegs): bam po bcu pa/ lnga'i bu tshor bas mnar gyis gsol pa/ tshor ba bdag tu bgyi ma mchis// sems pa ma mchis rtsol ma mchis// bsam gtan mdzad pa ni khyod kyis// nor ba chu bur
206b1(dkon brtsegs): bur mkhyen// lha'i bu tshor ba smon pas gsol pa/ ngo bo nyid kyis dngos med par// nor ba khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// rmi'am sdug dgu'i dga' 'dra ba// del so so'i skye bo tshogs// lha'i bu tshor ba la mongs
206b2(dkon brtsegs): su rtog pas gsol ba/ shes rab bcas pas yongs brtags na// nor ba 'gro bar ma song zhing // 'ong ba med la dngos med par// de ni thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba dang bral bas
206b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba/ tshor ba dang ni tshor ba po// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis gzigs// zab mo bstan dka'i tshig de yang // khyod kyis sems can rnams la bstan// lnga'i bu tshor ba'i chung la ngas pas gsol pa/
206b4(dkon brtsegs): nor ba de ni kun rdzob tsam// don dam nyid du mi dmigs te// khyod kyis sems can dar bdul bas// 'gro bathe tshom ma mchis 'gyur// lha'i bu nor ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ nor ba'i phung po mkhas
206b5(dkon brtsegs): ba po mkha' la rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhin// byis pa'i blo can rmongs bgyid na// de ni khyod kyis yang dag gzigs// lha'i bu tshor ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ nor ba'i phung po mngon mkhyen pa/
206b6(dkon brtsegs): rig cing rig pa'i mthar byon pa// mkhas pa rnams kyi mchog khyod kyis// nor ba bdag med rab tu gzigs// lha'i bu nor ba las brgal bas gsol pa/ rkang gnyis gtso bo dam pa khyod// brgal dka' tshe
206b7(dkon brtsegs): ba'i mtsho las brgal// 'angam las brgal cing sdig med pa/ byang chub mchog 'di sangs rgyas 'gyur// lha'i bu tshor ba las 'byung gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pas 'jig rten du// nor ba rnams
207a1(dkon brtsegs): ni 'byung mkhyen nas// tshor ba'i phung po rab brgal te// sangs rgyas 'jig rten chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu tsher ba rig pas gsol pa/ mi rnams dag la gang ning ba'i// tshor ba
207a2(dkon brtsegs): thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// nyon mongs zhags pas 'ching 'gyur ba// de yi rang bzhin khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la mkhas pas gsol ba/ khyod kyi sems kyis nyon mongs pam// bdud
207a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyang ni spa bkong ste// sems de rang bzhin ma mchis par// thub pa chen po khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ ji ltar sgyu ma'i mkhan po yis// sgyu ma sna
207a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs sprul pa bzhin// sems ni bde gshegs khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir khyod la 'jig rten mchod// lha'i bu sems la yang dag rtogs pas gsol pa/ sgyu ma maben nam slob ma bzhin// gang gis 'gro
207a5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di bcings pa'i// sems ni khyod kyis yang dag brtags// de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen// lha'i bu sems kyi spyod yul la spyod pas gsol pa/ sems kyi spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen// rnam
207a6(dkon brtsegs): par 'dren pa rmi lam na// ji ltar tshogs kyi grangs bzhin du// byis pa'i sems rmongs bgyid pa gzigs// lha'i bu sems kyi dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ dul gyur las su rung ba yi// sems kyi rang
207a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin rtog med pa// gang la 'jig rten gting mi rnyed// mtshan nyid bstan pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sems la dpa' bas gsol pa/ gang gis sems la sems medo shes// mkhas pa
207b1(dkon brtsegs): sgyid lug mi 'gyur zhing // bdud sde rab tu 'dul bgyid pa// de dag 'dir ni dpa' zhes bgyi// lha'i bu sems kyis yang dga' phags kyi gsol ba/ gang dag sems la sems med shes// de dag
207b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas sras lags te// dpa' chen sangs rgyas chos rnams la// skyes bu de dag yang dag 'phags// lha'i bu zhi ba'i sems kyis gsol pa/ gang gis sems la dbang bgyis pa// sems
207b3(dkon brtsegs): can de dag zhi rab zhi// bdud kyi zhags las rab grol bas// de dag bdud kyi dbang mi mchi// lha'i bu sems mnyen pas gsol pa/ mi rnams gang dag sems mnyen zhing // bsnyen pa
207b4(dkon brtsegs): dka' dang dpa' ba dang // khyod kyis bstan la gang mos pa// de dag 'dod par zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/ sems dag las rnams gtsang gyur cing // yang dag
207b5(dkon brtsegs): rtogs pas spyod bgying ba// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan thos na// zab mo rnams la zhum mi 'gyur// lha'i bu ros nyid la gnas pas gsol pa/ gang gi yid ni chos nyid la// rab tu dga' zhing
207b6(dkon brtsegs): thogs med pa// de dag mi dbang sras po ste// zhi ba'i sar ni phyin pa lags// lha'i bu chos la sems pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad chos dbyings su// 'dren pa de la bslabs pa rnams
207b7(dkon brtsegs): chos nyid la ni gang sems pa// de dag spyod yul ma yin med// lha'i bu rlos kyi dbyings las nges par byung gis gsol pa/ mi mchog khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// chos kyi dbyings las nges byung ste/
208a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa khyod kyi sras de dag/ mtshan nyid gcig gi des byung lags// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams kun gyi spyod yul ni// chos kyi dbyis
208a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes rgyal bas gsungs// dpa' bo khyod ni gang spyod pa'i// ye shes de ni bsam mi khyab// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la zhugs pas gsol ba/ chos kyi dbyings la gang zhugs pa// de dag
208a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes bsam yas te// sangs rgyas chos la the tshom med// sems can bsam la de dag mkhas// lha'i bu ros kyi dbyings la bab kyis gsol pa/ gang dag chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig/ chos
208a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings la bab pa rnams// de dag spobs pa'i stobs bskyed pa// bsam gyis mi khyab thos par 'gyur// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la 'jig pa med pas gsol pa/ gang la de dag gnas pa yi//
208a5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa med pas thob med pas// de dag rnams kyi spobs dang stobs// de la mtshungs pa med pa 'byung // lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la mkhas pas gsol pa/ khyod ni chos dbyings mkhas
208a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ste/ chos rnams kun la shin tu mkhas// lag mthil skyu ru ra gzhag bzhin// chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par stor// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la gnas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams
208a7(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin med gzigs pas// khyod ni chos kyi dbyings la zhugs// mi gnas zhum pa ma mchis te// bzung ba ma mchis btang ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la spyod pas gsol pa/
208b1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyod yul gang lags pa'i// chos kyi dbyings la khyod spyod de// bar snang mkha' dang 'dra ba yi// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la sto pas
208b2(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ gang dang gang gi sgo dag nas// skyes bu dam pa ston mdzad pa// de yi sgo nus chos dbyings ston// de phyir rtags dang gzugs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings la brtson pas
208b3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ mngon par brtson pas chos kyi dbyings// skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi mkhyen// brtson pas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// yeng shes pha rol phyin par gyur// sna'i bu chos kyis tshim
208b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis skye bo 'di// chos kyi bar tu tshim par mdzad// chos kyi dbyings ni rnam mkhyen pas// 'dren pa byang chub mchog la bzhugs// lha'i bu chos nyid kyi gting rnyed pas
208b5(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ gting rnyed gyur pas 'gro ba kun// 'dren pa khyod kyi zhal du lta// chos dbyings rnam par mkhyen pa yi// 'dren pa khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas shes pa la rab tu gnas bas
208b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba/ mi mnog 'dren pa sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes gnas 'di chos dbyings te// rnam par 'dren pa stobs bcu po// gang la spyod pa de lags so// lha'i bu gnas la gnas pas gsol pa// chos
208b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi dbyings ni gnas chen te// thams cad mkhyen la bzhud pa'i lam// de ni chos rnams thams cad kyang // mtshan nyid gcig par shos pa lags// lha'i bu gnas mngon par shes pas gsol pa/
209a1(dkon brtsegs): khyod ni chos dbyings mngon par mkhyen// mtshan nyid gcig la mkhas pa ste// sems can kun gyi bsam pa yang // rkang gnyis gtso bo khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu gnas nas nges par
209a2(dkon brtsegs): byang gis gsol pa/ rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyi sras// gnas su bya ba chos dbyings shes// gsal bar 'tshal ba'i mkhas pa rnams// rang byung nyid du nges par byung // lha'i bu gnas la bslabs
209a3(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ chos kyi dbyings la gang bslabs pa'i// skyes bu de dag byang chub zhugs// rang byung nyid du gnas rnyed pas// de dag rkang gnyis mchog tu 'gyur// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas
209a4(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ gnas med pa ni gang 'tshal ba// de dag bde gshegs dgongs la mos// bdud rnams bye ba stong gis kyang // de dag rmongs par yongs mi rus// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mngon par shes pas gsol
209a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gnas med gang gis rig gyur pa// de dag bdag cag bdud kyi tshogs// bye bas byang chub mi bskyod ces// mkhas pa de dag shin tu dga'// lha'i bu gnas med pa'i dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa
209a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas med 'du shes mkhas pa ni// chos nyid la ni rab gnas te// sdig can bdud rnams bshal ba ni// ji ltar rta yis shing rta bzhin// lha'i bu gnas med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ mtshan nyid gcig la
209a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pa po// chos kyi dbyings la bgegs bgyid pa'i// bdud kyi las ni gnas med de// gnas med do zhes rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rtogs pas gsol pa/ gnas dang de bzhin
209b1(dkon brtsegs): gnas min pa// byis pa'i blo can rnams la bstan// rang gi da ni thugs drud nas// sems can rnams la khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu sbyin pa la mkhas pas gsol ba/ sngon nad dru ni gang dag dang // las
209b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra 'thung ba ma 'tshal ba'i// N+ya de khyod kyis thugs su chud// las kyi gnas kyang rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la mkhas pas gsol pa/ rgyags dang zhe sdang gti mug ni// las b+hin+d+ha zhes khyod kyis
209b3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen/ gang gis d+hu yis bgyis de yang // gang zag mchog gis thugs su chud// lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ ma 'ongs pa yi dus dag na// mi rnams las gang bgyid 'gyur ba// de
209b4(dkon brtsegs): yi d+hu dang len pa dang // gnas dang las kyang khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu de ltar byung ba la lta bas gsol ba/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi/ sems can rnams dang rgyu dang las// gnas da
209b5(dkon brtsegs): las kyi len pa rnams// kun kyang 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ mi dbang khyod kyis ma gzigs pa'i// las dang rgyu dag ma mchis te// gnas dang skye ba 'ang ma
209b6(dkon brtsegs): mchis so// de bas khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lha'i bu stobs la mngon par dga' bas gsol pa/ lus dang rgyu dang de bzhin gnas// dus la rnam smin rnam gsum dang // ji ltar de yi len pa yang // khyod
209b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis mkhyen pas de slad mchod// lha'i bu stobs kyi blo gros kyis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // rnam par smin dang rkyen dang gnas// rang bzhin bral bar khyod kyis mkhyen// de phyir rgyal ba
210a1(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa med// lha'i bu stobs kyis byung gis gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud rnams dang // rnam smin so so yang dag rig/ thams cad stong par
210a2(dkon brtsegs): rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu stob la dga' bas gsol pa/ rgyu dang las dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// khyod nyid rang gi mngon 'khyen te// rang bzhin med par bstan par mdzad// lha'i
210a3(dkon brtsegs): bu stobs kyi rnam par brtsebs kyi gsol pa/ rgyu dang lA dang len pa dang // gnas dang rkyen dang rgyud kyi rnams// 'pho med dbang phyug med pa ste// rten cing 'byung bar khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyis
210a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags kyis gsol pa/ rgyud dang rkyen dang las rnams dang // rnam par smin pa ston pa rnams// de kun rang bzhin stong ngo zhes// seng ge'i nga ror khyod kyis gsungs// lha'i bu stobs kyi rjes su 'brang
210a5(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/ 'jig rten las ni gang zhig gis// 'ams ni gang zhig spel gyur pa// de dag rkang gnyis gtso bos mkhyen// dpas khyod ni do zla med// lha'i bu stobs dang ldan gyis gsol ba/ khams
210a6(dkon brtsegs): gang la ni brten bgyis shing // gang gis mngon par las bgyis dang // de yi rnam smin ci 'dra ba// de kun spyan dang ldan pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs yang dag par 'phags kyis gsol pa/ khams dang
210a7(dkon brtsegs): la ni brten bgyis shing // ci 'dra'i rang bzhin gyur pa yi// sems can thams cad khyod kyis mkhyen// phyag gi sor mo lnga dang 'dra// lha'i bu stengs la spyod pas gsol pa// khams gang la ni brtan
210b1(dkon brtsegs): bzlas shing / ba shes gasnyen ci 'dra rnyed bur nas// 'du 'dzi ci 'dra bgyid gyur ba// de kun blan med pas mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyis byi kyis brlabs pas gsol pa/ rlobs kyi byin gyis brlapa
210b2(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen cing // 'drer pa de yi khams dang ni// 'du 'ji ba shes gnyen chogs kyi rnams// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lnga'i bu khams nges pas gsol pa/ khams de dang ni da len dang /
210b3(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen de dang de 'grogs pa// de la khyod kyis mkhyen pa des// de phyir the tshom yongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu khams la rten pas gsol pa// sems can gang na gnas gnas pa'i// 'khor ba de dang
210b4(dkon brtsegs): khams de dang // spyod dang skad dang 'gro ba rnams// mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la mkhas pas gsol ba/ ye shes gang gi khams de ni// 'dren pas mngon par mkhyen pa yi/
210b5(dkon brtsegs): mkhyeran te mkhyen pas stong ngo zhes// blo mchog mnga' bas yang dag bstan// lha'i bu khams ras nges par byung gis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis na// 'dus byas ngag la ji srid gnas
210b6(dkon brtsegs): de ni khyod kyis ji bzhin mkhyen// khyod la do zla ma mchis so// lha'i bu khams kyi rjes su song bas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis pas// yon tan ji skad bskyed pa dang // rnam par smin dang /
210b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu dag/ de dag ma lus khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu khams la yang dag zhugs pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni rten dgyid cing // 'gro ba ci 'dra 'dod bgyid pa// de yang khyod kyi thog med
211a1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// de phyir khyod ni mkhas pas mchod// lha'i bu lam mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis pas// 'gro ba ci 'drar mchi ba yi// sems can
211a2(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi lam dag kyang // ye shes mkhas pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu lam la mi 'jigs pas gsol pa/ sems can log pa nyid nges shing // mya ngan 'das 'gro skal med pa// phung po gsum po
211a3(dkon brtsegs): de dag la// khyod kyi ye shes nges par 'jug/ lha'i bu lam gyis nges pa byung gis gsol ba/ sems can yang dag nyid nges te// ngan 'gror 'gro ba'i skal med pa// de la 'jig rten sgron ma khyod// rtogs/
211a4(dkon brtsegs): pa thogs pa med par 'jug/ lha'i bu lam la mos pas gsol pa/ mdzes phung por gyur pa la// gang zag gang rnams gnas pa rnams// de la ngan song ngan 'gro dang // mya ngan 'das pa'ang khyod kyis
211a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan// lha'i bu stobs kyi brdas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas brda tsam nyid lags te// de bzhin stobs dang ye shes dang // mi 'jigs bzhi yang de bzhin du// kun rdzob ces ni thub pas gsungs//
211a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu yang dag pa mthong bas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas sangs rgyas chos rnams med// ye shes gnas pa gzhan yang med// don dam nyid du bstan to zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa khyod kyis
211a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i stobs la gnas kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas ros la stobs gnas pas// des na de la 'jigs med de// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs kyi sras// ji ltar 'dod dgur rnam par 'drug/
211b1(dkon brtsegs): lha du chos la 'jigs med kyis gsol pa/ kun rdzob dang ni ngong sa dang // dedag rab tu bstan mas kyang / na rdo dang ni don drung // brda gang dmig su sum rdzi s+ho/
211b2(dkon brtsegs): shes lhur len gyis gsol pa/ brjod pa thams cad rnam pa gzhan// chos kyi mtshan nyid rnam pa gzhan// mtshan nyid ma mchis brjod ma mchis// khyod kyis chos kyi mtshan nyid gzigs// lha'i bu
211b3(dkon brtsegs): lam la brtson pas gsol pa/ nges par gyur pa'i sems can rnams// gzhan gyi rgyud mtsho'i gnas ma mchis// log par nges rnams kun tu 'gror// drang srong cher po khyod kyis gzigs// lnga'i
211b4(dkon brtsegs): bu mos pa'i stobs kyis gsol pa/ khams gang la ni brten bgyis te// gang rnams ci 'drar mos 'gyur zhing // 'dod chags khams la sdug lta ba// de dag thub chen khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i
211b5(dkon brtsegs): bu mi sdug pa las nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// 'dod chags khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu
211b6(dkon brtsegs): byams pas nges par byung gis gsol pa/ ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// zhe sdang khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i bu
211b7(dkon brtsegs): rkyen 'dis nges par byung gis gsol pa ma mchis yongs su brtags pas na// gti mug khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa nges byung ba// de dag khyod kyis ji bzhin gzigs// lha'i
212a1(dkon brtsegs): bu gtong ba nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ 'tsho med 'jigs pa rnyed pa dag/ ser sna mngon par 'phel 'gyur te// de la mos pa nges byung ba/ de dag mthu ched khyod kyis
212a2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sdig pa'i grogs dang 'grogs pas na// mthun pa'i khams ni rab tu byung // de la mos pa thob 'gyur ba// de dag
212a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pas rnam par mkhyen// lha'i bu rnam par shes pa snying por 'dzin pas gsol pa/ 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis// ci 'dra'i khams la brten pa dang // mos pade mthar phyin pa dag/ khyod kyis
212a4(dkon brtsegs): ma lus rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu nan tan snying por byed pas gsol pa/ 'khor ba na ni 'khor rnams kyis// gang gi rgyu 'byung nan tan dang // mos pa de la 'byung ba yang // smang ba med de khyod kyis
212a5(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la mos pas gsol ba/ sems can gang gis khams gang la// brten na ji ltar 'gyur ba yi// rgyu de khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// des na khyod ni dka' bar mdzad//
212a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dbang po la spyod pas gsol pa/ sbyor ba gang gis skye ba dang // gang gis rgya chen skye ba dang // dmigs pa dang ni zhing rnams dang // dbang po khyod kyi rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang pos nges par
212a7(dkon brtsegs): byung gis gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i sdug bsngal gnod gyur dang // sred par mngon par 'jug pa dang // srid pa zhi bar bgyi ba'i don// de dag smra ba'i mchog gis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po'i
212b1(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ dbang po nyas rgyung rnam dag ni// gzugs kyi 'dod nag pa ben par 'dus/ sred pa rnam par gcig pa yang / rkang gnis dam pas bstan pa ngang/ lha'i dru bang
212b2(dkon brtsegs): po rnam par rgyal bas gsol pa/ dbang po rtul po dur khrod brten// rang gi 'dod chags zhi bar bgyid// rkang gnyis gtso bo'i zhal mthong nas// sred dang bcas pas khyod la lta// lha'i bu
212b3(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rtogs kyis gsol pa/ 'dod nags can dang 'dod nags dang // zhi dang shes dang mi shes dang // sred pa zhi dang dbang po rnam// rnam par gzigs na sngon mi dmigs// lha'i bu dbang po
212b4(dkon brtsegs): la gnas pas gsol pa/ zhe sdang gnyen por gyur pa yi// gnod sems med dang dben pa dag/ dbang po rtul po sten pa'i tshe// khyod kyis 'gro ba'i bsam pa gzigs// lha'i bu dbang po la brtson
212b5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ zhe sdang gnyen po byams par gsungs// sems can shes pa rjes su skye// zhe sdang khams ni zhi bar bgyid// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po tshol bas
212b6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa gnod sems med dang byams pa dang // zhi ba ngo bo nyid ma gzigs// bdog dang nyon mongs ma dmigs te// des na 'jig rten khyad par 'phags// lha'i bu dbang po rjes su 'brang gis
212b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa log par rnam par rtog pa dang // log par nye bar ston pa yang // nyon mongs dam phyir kun sbyor te// bzlog pas thar par 'gyur ba gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes yang dag shar gyis gso
213a1(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // dngos la 'dzin pa mun pa ste// bzlog pas snang ba chen por 'gyur// de ni grags chen khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu ye shes 'dod
213a2(dkon brtsegs): chags chad pas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // mun pa snang ba dngos po rnams// rang bzhin nyid kyis ma mchis te// de ni rkang gnyis gtso bos gzigs// lha'i bu snang ba 'dzin gyis
213a3(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ sems can gang gis shes pa gang // ji tsam yongs su bsgrub bgyis dang // snod du gang rung ji rnyed pa// de dag mi mchog khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po dang zhes 'gras pas gsol
213a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ nyon mongs spangs phyir shes gang gis// shes pa de la rtogs bgyid pa// de yang ston pa khyod kyis mkhyen// de bas khyod la mngon par dga'// lha'i bu dbang po la dka' bas gsol pa
213a5(dkon brtsegs): yul dang dus dang gnas dag dang // spyod pa rnam par bsgoms pa dang // nyon mongs nyon mongs rnam dag dang // thub pa khyod kyis stong par gzigs// lha'i bu ye shes rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa//
213a6(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rdo rdul 'bring dab dang // gang zag dag gi bsam pa dang // bcings dang thar dang thang dang shes// g.yo ba med par khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu dbang po'i rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ dbang po rab 'bring rdul ba
213a7(dkon brtsegs): dang / nyon mongs ye shes tshor ba dang // gdul dang 'dul bar bgyid pa dag/ khyod kyis mtshan nyid med par gsungs// lha'i bu dbang po rnam par brtags kyis gsol pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam
213b1(dkon brtsegs): gtan dang // rnam thar kunA nas nyon mongs dang // snyoms 'jug ting 'dzin ldang ba dang // rnam byang thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu stobs kyi dashugs kyis gsol pa/ zhi ba'i ting nge 'dzin
213b2(dkon brtsegs): brten te// chos kun ngo bo nyid kyis ni// rang bzhin med par khyod kyis mkhyen// des na thams cad mkhyen ces bgyis// lha'i bu stobs kyi go chas gsol pa/ chos rnams gang dang rang bzhin dang //
213b3(dkon brtsegs): chos gang gis dri brjod bgyis pa// yang dag ji bzhin thugs su chud// desar dus gsum chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu stobs 'dod kyis gsol pa/ log par btags pas kun nyon mongs/
213b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa bzhi ni skye bar 'gyur// las las skyes par de dag mkhyen// des na khyod kyi do bla med// lha'i bu stobs shes kyis gsol pa/ nyon mongs rnams dang las rnams kyi// gnyen po rnam par byang ba
213b5(dkon brtsegs): dang // bstan pa'ang khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// des na khyod kyi do zla med// lha'i bu stobs kyi 'od kyis gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnam thar ldang ba dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting 'dzin dang // kun nas nyon
213b6(dkon brtsegs): mongs rnam byang dag/ ming tsam mo zhes khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu stobs las byung gis gsol pa/ bsam gtan rnam thar rnam byang dang // snyoms par 'jug dang ting nge 'dzin// bag yod pa las
213b7(dkon brtsegs): byung ba ste// de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug/ lha'i bu stobs rnam par spel gyis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// bsam gtan la sogs de dag dang // ldang dang rnam par byang la 'jug/ de ni
214a1(dkon brtsegs): / rlung ltar chags pa med// lha'i bu sngon gyis mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// srid pa 'di na sngon bzhugs te// srid pa'i skyon dang yongs ma 'dres// des
214a2(dkon brtsegs): na khyod la do zla med// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la gnas pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// byang chub gzhal yas chol mdzad cing // 'dren pas yongs su spyad pas na// des na khyod ni dpa' bo
214a3(dkon brtsegs): lags// lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la rtog pas gsol pa/ sngon mthar sbyin pa sna tshogs dag/ blo mchog gsung tshe gsol bas na// spobs pa sna rnyogs rab mnga' bar// rnam par 'dren pa des nges byung /
214a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha' la byang bas gsol pa/ sngon chad 'khor bar spyod pa'i tshe// tshul rnams la ni tshul mkhas pa// 'jig rten sgron rnams khyod kyis gzigs// des na khyod ni tshul la mkhas// lha'i bu
214a5(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' tshar phyin pas gsol ba/ sngon mthar chos rgyal mang po la// dpa' bos sngon chang spyod mdzad pas// thams cad mkhyen du nges par byung // sems can mkhas la phyag kyang 'tshal/
214a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gyi tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol ba/ byang chub mchog ni btsal ba'i phyir// bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// sangs rgyas bye ba mtha' yas pa// de la khyod kyis sa bon btab// lha'i bu
214a7(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi tshul la nges pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye bar brtags mdzad pas// chos kun sems can med pa zhes// chos rnams thams cad nges par mkhyen// 'du khrod tsam du rgyal bas gsungs// lha'i bu
214b1(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' lasems pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bya bzangs med du/ gnas dang gnas min rab mkhyen par// rnam par 'dun pa spyod mdzad pas// des na 'dig rte rmongs mi bdag/ khwa'i burtson
214b2(dkon brtsegs): gyi mtha' la spyod pas gsol pa/ gnas dang gnas min brjen bgyis nas// las dang rgyu rnams dpyad pas nA// khams dang dbang po mos pa dang // bsam gtan mngon gyi mtha' yang mkhyen// lha'i bu
214b3(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyi mtha' la yongs su rtogs pas gsol pa/ khyod kyis sngon mtha' yongs brtags pas// stobs kyi ye shes rnam bcu po// dpa' bo chen pos rnam par spel// des ni 'jig rten 'di la gzigs
214b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod yul gyis gsol ba/ dpa' bos sems can thams cad kyi// sngon gyi mtha' yi spyod pa dang // dge dang mi dge'i rgyu ba rnams// mkhyen pas 'jig rten gso ba mdzad/
214b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sngon gyi mtha'i spyod pa la so sor rdog pas gsol ba/ thub pas sngon gyi sems can gyi// sngon mtha'i spyod pa rab mkhyen cing // khams dang mos pa mkhyen pas na// de phyir sems can gsol ba
214b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// lha'i bu mos pa'i stobs can gyis gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas su// sngon gyi mtha' la brtag bgyis kyang // khyod kyi dgongs pa rlags mi mnga'// des na mgon la bdag mos lags/
214b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ye shes la mos pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// sngon mtha'i srid pa bsam gyis kyang // rkang gnyis gtso bo'i yon tan gyis// pha rol phyin nus dga' ma mchis// lha'i bu
215a1(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten 'di dag gi skye dgu sna tshogs las ldan pa// shi so skye bar 'gyur ba dag/ khyod kyi sangs rgyas spyan gyis
215a2(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la nges par byung gis gsol pa/ rgyu gang gis ni las gang zhig/ bgyis shing rgyud drug mchis gyur pa// de dag thams cad rgyal bas mkhyen// des na thams cad
215a3(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen ces bgyis// lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba mngon par shes pas gsol pa/ khams gang gis ni sems can gang // bsgos par gyur cing las bgyid pa'i// bag chags las dang sems can dag/
215a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod kyis g.yo ba med par mkhyen// lha'i bu shi 'pho dang skye ba rig pas gsol pa/ bshes gnyen ci 'dra bstan bgyis shing // las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pas// 'gro ba gang du mchi 'gyur ba/
