215a5(dkon brtsegs): thub pa khyod kyi de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu dgongs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ las de yi ni bgyi ba gang // dgos pa khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// gang gi slad du las bgyis pa// de yang ma lus rab tu
215a6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu dngos po la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dngos po gang dag dmigs pa dang // las gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa// thams cad mkhyen pas de mkhyen te// de ni sangs rgyas
215a7(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul lags// lha'i bu dngos po rigs pas gsol pa/ sems can rnams kyi bsam mkhas pa// dngos de ji ltar gnas pa dang // de ni ji ltar grub pa yi// las de khyod kyis mngon par
215b1(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen// lha'i bu shes pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ shes pa gang gi dngos po de// brtags par gyur pa rab tu mkhyen// dAl ji ltar nags gyur pa'ang / zab pa khyod kyis shin tu mkhyen/ lnga'i
215b2(dkon brtsegs): bu mngod par 'du byed pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ chags pa gang gi las de rnams// nyon mongs gang gis 'du bgyis pa'i// nyon mongs de dag yang dag mkhyen// de ngas khyod ni bdag gi mngon/
215b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'gro ba la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba gang du las gang gis// mchis shing sgrib pa gang rnyed nas// 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur ba// de kun spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu
215b4(dkon brtsegs): dmigs pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba dag tu skyes rnams kyi// gang gi las rnams smin gyur pa'i// dmigs pa khyod kyis rab mkhyen te// de lo khyed kyi blo gros 'jug/ lha'i bu bag
215b5(dkon brtsegs): chags la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ 'gro dang 'gro bar mi rnams kyis// sngan chad bgyis pa'i sdig las dang // de bzhin dge ba'i las rnams kyi// bag chags khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen/
215b6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol ba/ 'gro bar 'byung po thams cad kyi// rnying dang gsar deng slad ma dang // las rnams gsum po khyod kyis mkhyen// de la so so'i skye bo 'khrul/
215b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu rnam par smin pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ nung zhing rnam smin che ba dang // che zhing rnam smin chung ba dang // chung ngam che 'am mnyam pa'ang rung // de la mu stegs can rnams rmongs/
216a1(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol pa tshe 'di'i las rnams gang lags dang // skyes pa'i las rnams gang lags dang // lan grangs gzhan gyi gang lags pa/
216a2(dkon brtsegs): dag spyan ldan khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu tshe 'di la myong bar gyur pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ tshe 'di la ri gang bgyis pa'i// las kye rnam smin mi gang dag/ myong bar 'gyur ba gang dag la
216a3(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo rmongs pa mkhyen// lha'i bu skyes nas myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ gang gis las gang bsags gyur te// skyes nas rnam par smin gyur pa// gang la 'jig rten gting
216a4(dkon brtsegs): mi rnyed// shes rab chen pos de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu lan grangs gzhan na myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ las gang bskal po bye ba yi// byi dus rnam par smin 'gyur zhing // dus
216a5(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag na yang 'byung ba// de dag yang dag nyid du mkhyen// lha'i bu yongs su ma smin par myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ las rnams gang zhig bgyis gyur pa// yongs su smin par ma
216a6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na// de srid 'bras bu mi 'byin pa// rkang gnyis mchog gis de yang mkhyen// lha'i bu yongs su ma smin pa myong bar gyur pa la rtogs pas gsol pa/ las gang dang ni ldan pas na// sems can
216a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dir ni spyir 'gyur ba// pham pa med pas de mkhyen te// yongs su brtags nas rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu yongs su smin par myong bar 'gyur ba la mkhas pas gsol ba/ las ni ji ltar yongs smin
216b1(dkon brtsegs): na/ 'bras bu dkar bar 'gyur ba mkhyen// de la khyod kyi ye shes 'jug/ de dag stong par rnam par mkhyen/ lha'i bu yongs su smin par myong bar 'gyur ba la nges pas gsol pa thams cad maphye
216b2(dkon brtsegs): bas las kyi rnams// lci dang yang bar rab tu mkhyen// sems can bsam pa thugs su chud// de slad bcom ldan bdag gi bla// lha'i bu lci yang la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ las gang gis
216b3(dkon brtsegs): ni sems can rnams// ngan song mchi bar 'gyur ba dang // lci ba dang ni yang ba gzigs// de shes mkhyen pas rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la mkhas kyis gsol pa/ sems
216b4(dkon brtsegs): can spyod pa nyer bzung zhing // las kyi lci dang yang bdag/ dpa' bo khyod kyis rab tu mkhyen// mu stegs can rnams de la rmongs// lha'i bu sems can gyi spyod pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ sem
216b5(dkon brtsegs): can spyod pa dpyad mdzad cing // las kyi rnam par smin pa bstan// phor bu'i rlu dang gang+gA'i chu// lan tshwas rnam par bstan pa bzhin// lha'i bu las la mkhas kyis gsol ba/ slob dang mi
216b6(dkon brtsegs): slob rnam par smin// rkang gnyis dam pa ston mdzad cing // kun nas nyon mongs las myong nas// las ni zad par 'gyur ba bstan// lha'i bu sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la reg par byed pas
216b7(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ sangs rgyas can gyis khams gsum na// las kyi 'bras bu rten pa yi// byis pa dag dang mkhas pa gzigs// phra gzigs khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu las zad par
217a1(dkon brtsegs): byed pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten dag na rnam 'dren khyod// sems can rnams kyi shing po dang // skye ba kun la ye shes 'jug/ mkhyen pas 'jigs med phyug kyang 'tshal/
217a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu dmigs pa med pa la spyod pas gsol pa/ 'chi 'pho ba dang skya dang las// 'gro dang de bzhin sems can rnams// rnam smin rmi lam 'drar bstan pa// 'dren pa darkang gnyis mchog gis mkhyen/
217a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu nyon mongs pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ ji ltar rmi lam skom pa zhig// shin tu bsil ba'i nu 'thungs bzhin// rkang gnyis mchog khyod 'dod chags dang // zhe sdang gti mug rnams kyang zad/
217a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu yongs su rdog pa dang bral bas gsol pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// yongs su rtogs las skyes pa ste// rmi lam dka' bar rtse ba bzhin// smra mchog khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/
217a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu yongs su rtog pa zhi bar byed pas gsol pa/ yongs su rtog pa rab zhi bas// nyon mongs zad par rab bstan te// rmi lam la ni sprin med ltar// mi mchog khyod kyis rab tu bskur// lha'i bu
217a6(dkon brtsegs): dag pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ rmi lam mar chen 'bab pa ltar// de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung bar// zag pa 'byung ba mkhas pa po// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu rmi lam rtog gis
217a7(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba rmi lam char chen 'bab pa ltar// de bzhin zag pa rnams 'byung ste// nor pa rnams la zag 'byung bar// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pas gsol
217b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ji ltar bu mo'i rmi lam na// bu zhig byung la shi 'phos nas// dga' dang sdug bsngal chor 'gyur ba// de bzhin 'gro ba khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu rmi lam rtogs pas gsol pa/
217b2(dkon brtsegs): rmi lam dag ni mgo bcad bzhin// khyod kyis zag pa zang pa gzigs// de ni mkhas pa rnams la bstan// thams cad gzigs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu blo gros nges par rtags
217b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ chos kun mkhyen pa khyod kyis ni// ji ltar rmi lam mdza' phrad dang // bral ba yang dag ma mchis gzigs// 'gro ba ji bzhin tshim par mdzad// lha'i bu
217b4(dkon brtsegs): ye shes yid kyis gsol pa// khyod kyi dam pa'i chos ston pa// thos nas yid ni dga' 'gyur te// rmi lam dag na rmi bstan bzhin// de ltar rgyal bas bstan pa mdzad/
217b5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu yongs su dga' ba'i yid kyis gsol pa/ me long gzugs b.rAn snang ba bzhin// 'gro ba mtha' dag gzigs pas na// bsam gtan mnga' ba khyod la ni// lhar bcas 'jig rten
217b6(dkon brtsegs): yid kyang dga'// lha'i bu blo gros nges pas gsol pa/ thub pa pi wang sgra 'dra ba'i// khyod kyi dam chos thos gyur na// lha'i bu rnams kyang the tshom por// rgyal ba mchog la phyag kyang
217b7(dkon brtsegs): 'tshal// lha'i bu sgyu mas tshim gyis gsol pa/ sgyu ma'i mkhan pos sgyu ma dag/ byis pa rmongs byed yongs bstan na// mi mkhas de la rmongs par 'gyur// sgyu ma bzhin du khyod kyis bstan/
218a1(dkon brtsegs): kwa'i du sprul pa la sems pas gsol pa sar rtsi las sna yo bya// de ltar spyod kyis 'gro ba ga dgas// sos pa'i dang par ba ma dugad+hA ba nga
218a2(dkon brtsegs): so lha'i bus+thA ma la nges par byung gis gsol pa/ sgyu ma'i mtshan po sna sprul gag/ snum lags par 'tshal bas na// de la tshangs par 'gyur ma mchis// de bzhin rjod kyis 'gro gzugs/
218a3(dkon brtsegs): b+h+rUM'i du rtogs pa'o rjes su rtog pas bsol pa/ ji ltar brtson pa'i rmi laman// sangs rgyas suM gzugs brtags pa bzhin// de ltar rtog pas 'jig rten bskyed// rnam papa dren pa rjod kyis ga ng+ga/
218a4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bri kun tu rtog pa 'joms kyi gsol pa// kun tog 'dod chags rgya lags te// 'dod chags dngos pos skyed ma lags// rtog pa ngan las 'dod chags drung // de ni rnam 'dren khyod kyis gcin/
218a5(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu yongs su shes pa dang ldan pas gsol pa/ ri sul dag nas sgra byung ba/ brag chag sems can sgra ma lags// de bzhin 'jig rten khyod kyis gzigs// de skad 'jig rten chags mi mang/
218a6(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu ston pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// sgra ni gang yang ma mchis te// sgra ni brag cha 'dra ba lags/ 'on kyang mi dbang khyod kyis bstan/ byis pa mang po rab tu btsud// lha'i bra nan tan ma
218a7(dkon brtsegs): mkhas pas gsol pa/ chos rnams don ni gzhan lags kyang // byis pa rnams kyis gzhan du brtags// nan tan chos la shes par bgyi// de la bdag ni the tshom chad// lha'i bu ron gyi
218b1(dkon brtsegs): rjes su 'brang bas gsol pa/ chos don yang dag gang lags pa// de ni sras kyang ma rtogs shing // sus kyang ma bstan 'tshal ma gyur// de skad thub pa'i mchog gis gsungs/
218b2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu chos kyi brda rtogs pas gsol pa// zag dang dri ma nyon mongs dang // bag chags dang ni rtog dang rtog kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag la// thub pa brda yi tshig kyang lags/
218b3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu kun tu rtog pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ kun nas nyon mongs rnam dag dang // zag pa dag dang nyon mongs dang // ngag dang bshad dang nye du dang // ston pa 'di kun ming tsam lags/
218b4(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ khams gsum rnams la ma chags te// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i thugs mnga' ba/ bral bar gyur cing sbyin pa'i gnas// zhi ba'i sems la bya ba
218b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu ma gos pas gsol pa/ thub pa khyod kyis thugs yid ni// gzugs dang gzugs med mi gnas shing // 'dod dang mya ngan 'das pa la// gnas pa ma mchis par snang /
218b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra lha'i bu re ba med pas gsol pa/ 'dod pa'i khams la re ba spangs// gzugs dang gzugs med gnyis kar min// 'du 'dzi dag dang bral gyur pa// sred zad khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal
218b7(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu sred pa phyung bas gsol pa/ 'byung ba dag rang 'jig pa la// khyod kyi srid pa yang dag chad// khams gsum kun la chags mi mnga'// rnam par 'dren la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu/
219a1(dkon brtsegs): sred pa zil gyi gnon gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten 'di dag zil mnan nas// khyu mchog dam pa spyod mdzad cing // sems can 'jig rten sgrol mdzad pa// zugs
219a2(dkon brtsegs): brtse khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu sred pa dang bral bas gsol pa/ kun tu sbyor dang bral ba ste// yang srid bas pas zhir gyur pa// dag pa'i bdag nyid dag pa'i sems// dus dang bral
219a3(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu ji lta ba bzhin du rigs pas gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad dngos med pa// ji bzhin dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen// bcings pa ma mchis grol ma mchis/
219a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag gzigs la phrag kyang 'tsha la// lha'i bu dam las brga la bas gsol pa// 'dod pa'i 'dam las brgal ba ste// de bzhin srid pa'i 'dam las brga la// gzigs pa mi mnga'
219a5(dkon brtsegs): len mi mnga'// yang srid brgal la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu zang zing spangs kyis gsol pa/ zang zing spangs shing dri ma spangs// re ba spangs shing sdig pa'ang spangs// sangs rgyas
219a6(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pa rnam spangs pa// don rtogs khyod la phyug kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu re ba spangs kyis gsol pa/ don dang don ma lags pa spangs// chags pa mi mthar res rtogs pa// bdud
219a7(dkon brtsegs): kye zhags las rnam 'das pa// len med khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu phan par 'dod pas gsol pa/ bdag nyid dang ni gzhan rnams kyi// lam gang nyon mongs rim med pa/
219b1(dkon brtsegs): sgrib pamed pa garigs pa po// dpa' chen khyod kyis de yang garigs/ lha'i bu grags pa thob kyis gsol pa/ 'dren pa 'jig rten rnam thags pa// khyod kyis mkhyen la brtson pa rnams
219b2(dkon brtsegs): sa du bstan bzhin rang rtogs na// nyon mongs rnams ni nub par 'gyur// lha'i bu 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa// chos rnams pan la nges pas na// sto ba gang yang 'ongs ma gzigs/ ye shes rgya
219b3(dkon brtsegs): mi bsnyengs par// seng ge'i sgra ni ldog par mdzad// lha'i bu gang nas kyang 'jigs pa med pas gsol pa/ 'jigs pa kun las yang dag bcal// drug rngu thams cad kun d+ha bton// bsnyengs pa mams
219b4(dkon brtsegs): zhum mo mngar// thams cad zil gnon phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu gnas med kyis gsol pa/ lha rnams dang ni dri za dang // bdud dang tshangs par bcas pa yis// khyod kyi chos las brgal mi nus/
219b5(dkon brtsegs): ri bas khyod la bsgrengs mi mngar// lha'i bu seng ge rtsal gyis gsol pa/ chos rnams thams cad yongs mkhyen pas// sangs rgyas gyur la 'jigs mi mnga'// bdag la chos kyis sus rgol zhes/
219b6(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs khyod la ngogs mi mngar// lha'i bu skyug med kyis gsol pa// seng ge ri sral gnas pa ni// 'jigs pa ma mchis sgrub ma mchis// ri dgas phra mo yongs btul te// sra bkod
219b7(dkon brtsegs): nags nang ro sgrogs// de bzhin thams cad mkhyen pa yang / mu sngags can rnams yongs skrag ste// lha klu dri za'i 'jig rten na// mtshungs med gzigs nas gsung yang ldog/ zhwa'i bu thams
220a1(dkon brtsegs): cad zil gnon gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten rnam 'dren 'jig rten na// sangs rgyas nyid la bsod bgyid pa// 'jig rten gsum na ma mchis te// des na rgyal ba bdag gi
220a2(dkon brtsegs): skyabs// lha'i bu seng ge'i blo gros kyis gsol pa// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs// chos rnams kun la 'jigs mi mnga'// khyod 'dra 'jig rten ma mchis te// cis mi
220a3(dkon brtsegs): bsnyengs la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu rjes su mthun par skyes kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas nyid du dam bcas na// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// 'jig rten 'dren pa chos kyis ni//
220a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod la gang rgol de ma mchis// lha'i bu mdzod 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ seng ge'i nga ro gsung bsgrags te// khyod kyis chos kyi mdzod bzung bas// srog chags bye ba stong dag gis// byang chub
220a5(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu sems kyang bskyed// lha'i bu brtul zhugs rjes su mthun gyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas rjes mthun brtul zhugs can// dpa' chen de dag thob chen thob// byang chub mchog tu sems
220a6(dkon brtsegs): btud cing // gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur// lha'i bu rjes su mthun pa'i chos la dga' bas gsol pa// khyod kyis bstan pa sus thos te// byang chub mchog tu sems brtul bas/
220a7(dkon brtsegs): de dag 'jig rten sems can che// gang zag mchog tu de dag 'gyur// lha'i bu sems dag pas gsol pa/ 'jig rten dag na rgol med pa'i// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gsung thos nas/
220b1(dkon brtsegs): srog chags bye ba stong dag gis// byang chub mchog tu sems kyang bskyed// lha'i bu sems rgyun yongs su dag pas gsol pa// yun ring dus na mi dbang gis// sangs rgyas bsrag la ga
220b2(dkon brtsegs): bslabs pas// de sngang khyod ni thugs rgyud dag/ mtshan rab sum cu gnyis dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa med pa'i yid kyis gsol pa// zab pa zad pa'i sangs rgyas kyis// sang ba
220b3(dkon brtsegs): nga ro bsgrags mdzad de// dam bca' ba la mngon bzhugs na// rgol ba 'di na yong ma mchis// lha'i bu de kho na'i rjes su song bas gsol pa/ khyod kyi gsung la smra 'gyur ba'i// lha dang lhan
220b4(dkon brtsegs): bu mi dag ni// 'jig rten gsum na mchis te// des na thub pa stobs dang ldan// lha'i bu zag pa zad pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dge sbyong dam pa'i zag po ni// ma lus yongs su
220b5(dkon brtsegs): bas pa ste// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// des na sangs rgyas bdag gi pha// lha'i bu rtag tu brtson gyis gsol pa/ khyod la nyon mongs lus so zhes// mi dbang khyod la gang rgol ba
220b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa kun tu mi dmigs te// des na sangs rgyas bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu sems zhi bas gsol pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang zhi ba ste// gti mug bag chags bcas pa zhi// nyes
220b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod las kyang zhi bas na// sems zhi khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha'i bu rnal 'byor spyod pas gsol pa// rnal 'byor gang gis nyon mongs gang // bas par 'gyur bar lta ba'i tshe/
221a1(dkon brtsegs): de la khyod kyis mkhyen kun 'jug/ des na khyod la phrag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu rnal 'byor la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'dren pas gang la bsgrungs pa mi/
221a2(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor tshogs ni mtha' yas te// thams cad mkhyen pa de skad du// nyon mongs thams cad mi lus pas// lha'i bu rnal 'byor po thos kyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron ma chod kyi b+h+yo//
221a3(dkon brtsegs): rnal 'byor las ni rnams ma mchis// des na khyod kyis nyon mongs kun// bag chags bcas par yongs su bsal// lha'i bu zhib rig pas gsol pa/ nyon mongs thams cad nir gyur nas/
221a4(dkon brtsegs): bag chags ma lus yongs su bsal// bsnyengs pa mi mnga' rgyal sras dang // cis kyang mi bsnyengs spyod pa mdzad// lha'i bu zag pa la rtog pas gsol pa/ thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa khyod//
221a5(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs bag chags bcas par bas// 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni// mtshungs pa gang yang mi dmigs so// lha'i bu bag la nyal phyung gis gsol pa/ khyod kyis bag chags ma lus bsal/
221a6(dkon brtsegs): khyod la skyon dri yod ma mchis// de slad sangs rgyas thams cad mkhyen// lha rnams kun gyi thub pa'i thub// lha'i bu mtha' na gnas pas gsol pa/ zag pa rnams ni spangs pas na// skye ba yang
221a7(dkon brtsegs): skye ma lags te// thub pa khyod skye ba ma pa// des na mgon po bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu tshad bsrung gis gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis sa bon spangs// sdug bsngal myu gu tshig par gyur// mya
221b1(dkon brtsegs): nga khro shing rnam par bsams// gdung ba med la phrag kyang 'tshal// lha'i pra shing btags bton gyis gsol pa// thub pa thams cad mkhyen pa thong // ma rig shing btags rnams kyang bsal/
221b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyod pa rnam par sbyangs// de bas ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu srid pa'i pha rol tu song bas gsol pa/ srid pa'i mtsho las yang dag brgal// rnam par 'dren pa bya ba byas/
221b3(dkon brtsegs): khrod kyis snang ba yang dag phung // 'jigs med khyod ni don kyang grub// lha'i bu mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro bas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa zhir gyur pa// nyon mongs thams cad rab tu ba
221b4(dkon brtsegs): bag chags rdul tsam yong mi mnga'// mgon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgrengs// nga rgyal rgyal mtshan rab tu
221b5(dkon brtsegs): bskal// chos kyi lam srang mtha' yas pa// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu chos kyi 'byung gnas kyis gsol pa// sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas po// thub pa chos
221b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kun mkhyen pa// sems can kun gyi dge bshes gnyen// ye shes gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu chos kyi gos can gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi sras po 'jigs med pa// seng ge'i
221b7(dkon brtsegs): nga ro rnam sgrog kyang // rgyal sras de dag chog med cing // sangs rgyas chos kyi don gyi sgom// lha'i bu chos don du gnyer bas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos rnams don gcer bar// khrod kyi
222a1(dkon brtsegs): sras rnams sems bskyed cing // khyod kyi mi 'jigs thos gyur nas// mkhas pa de dag byang chub tshol// lha'i bu chos kyis skom gyis gsol pa/ khyod kyi mi 'dzags
222a2(dkon brtsegs): zos gyur nas/ sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal ba'i phyir// srog chags bye ba skom gyur te/ brtson 'grus brtan pa rab tu rtsom// / bam po bcu gcig
222a3(dkon brtsegs): pa/ lha'i bu chos kyis 'phags kyis gsol pa/ sangs rgyas chos kyis mngon 'phags shing // 'jigs pa med par 'dul mdzad pa'i// gsung ba'i mchog gyur khyod mthong
222a4(dkon brtsegs): nas/ brtul zhugs mchog can byang chub 'tshal// lha'i bu chos 'dzin gyis gsol pa/ thub pa zab cing blta dka' ba'i// chos ni khyod kyis rab bstan pa/ khyod kyi sras kyis thos gyur nas
222a5(dkon brtsegs): de dag bla med byang chub tshal// lha'i bu lta ba med pas gsol pa/ khyod kyi seng ge'i gsung thos nas/ khyod kyi sras po dpa' nges pa lus rang srog la mi lta bar// byang chub don du
222a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyer ba bgyid// lha'i bu gzhan du mi sems pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa/ thub pa bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// khyod kyi dam chos 'di thos nas/ gzhan du sems pa ma mchis par// brtul
222a7(dkon brtsegs): zhugs mchog can byang chub 'tshal// lha'i bu gzhan du mi 'gro bas gsol pa/ mi dngang khyod kyi gsung thos nas// theg pa gnyis po spangs bgyid cing // lam gzhan du ni mi mchis par/
222b1(dkon brtsegs): blan med pa'i byang chub 'tshal// lha'i bri nye bar gnas kyis gsol pa/ seng ga'i ra ro 'dri bsgrags pa// rgyal ba'i sgras kyis thos gyur na// byang chub mchog la nyer gyur cing // da
222b2(dkon brtsegs): rkang gnyis dam par 'gyur// lha'i bu stobs pa nye bar gyur pas gsol pa/ thabs chen khyod kyi gsung brjod pa'i// spobs pa de ni thos gyur nas// sangs rgyas chos la khyod kyi
222b3(dkon brtsegs): sras/ kun kyang dga' ba rab tu skyed// lha'i bu spobs pa thob pas gsol pa/ 'jigs med khyod kyi gsung bsgrags pa// ma smad sras kyis thos gyur na// de dag spobs pa nam du
222b4(dkon brtsegs): yang sangs rgyas nyid las phyir mi ldog/ lha'i bu rtag tu rab dgas gsol pa// 'jigs med khyod kyi gsung bsgrags pa// stobs chen khyod kyi sras kyi rnams// rtag tu rab tu dkar gyur
222b5(dkon brtsegs): cing // ma smad de dag byang chub 'tshal// lha'i bu yid zhum pa med pas gsol pa// khyod kyi gsung bsgrubs thos gyur na// rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyi sgras// dga' zhing zhum pa ma mchis
222b6(dkon brtsegs): b.rabyang chub mchog ni 'tshol bar bgyid// lha'i bu thogs med yid kyi gsol pa/ khyod kyi gsung bsgrags thos pas na// sems rangs gyur cing yid dga' ste// de dag yid ni nam
222b7(dkon brtsegs): du yang // byang chub nyid du thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu chos la bar chad med pa la mkhas pas gsol pa// chos rnams gang la brten bgyis kyang // dkar po'i phyogs dag mi 'grib
223a1(dkon brtsegs): cing // de yi bar chad mi 'gyur ba'i// gnas ni thub pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu chos nges par bstan pa la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dkar po'i phyogs la
223a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa la// bar chad 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhing // gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen// des na ston pa bsnyengs mi mnga'// lha'i bu chos kyi ngo bo nyid la mkhas pas gsol pa/ dag
223a3(dkon brtsegs): lo kun nas nyon mongs pa// nag po'i phyogs kyi rang bzhin te// khyod kyi thugs ni des mi gos// gnas kyang med par thub pas mkhyen// lha'i bu rig pa la mkhas pas gsol
223a4(dkon brtsegs): pa/ nag po'i chos ni nam du yang // dkar po'i chos dang mi 'grogs par// rig par bcom ldan khyod kyis gsungs// des na bcom ldan bdag gi bla// lha'i bu dge ba dang mi dge ba rig
223a5(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa// chos rnams thams cad ma 'dres par// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis mkhyen// kun nas nyon mongs brtags pas na// dkar ba'i phyogs las 'grib par 'gyur// lha'i bu
223a6(dkon brtsegs): lam la mkhas pas gsol pa// kun nas nyon mongs spyod pa la// dkar ba'i phyogs ni mi 'byung ste// de ltar 'tshal bar ma gyur la// bar chad du ni 'gyur bar gsungs// lha'i bu thar pa
223a7(dkon brtsegs): 'dod kyis gsol pa/ nag po'i phyogs la rten bgyid na// thar pa 'dod pa mang po yi// bar du gcod par 'gyur zhes gsungs/ des na rgyal khyod thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu dag pa'i sem
223b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ sems grol dgyi da bang 'tshal ba'i// kun nas nyon mongs shes bya zhes// dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis gsungs// des khyod 'jig rten mchod rten 'das// nA'i dri nyon mongs
223b2(dkon brtsegs): mthong gis gsol pa// kun nas nyon mongs spyod bgyid pa// kun nas nyon mongs ma 'tshal na// dam pa'i chos ni shes mi nus// de skad bde bar gshegs pas gsungs// lha'i bu sdig mthong
223b3(dkon brtsegs): gis gsol pa/ sdig pa rnams la brten byas kyang // dge ba mi 'grib pang smra ba// de ni thar chos skal med ces// rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis gsung // lnga'i bu gdul bar bya bas gsol pa/
223b4(dkon brtsegs): chags pa gdul bar gang 'dod dang // zhe sdang gti mug gdul 'dod pas// thub pa'i spobs pa ci 'dra ba// de lta bur ni nan tan bgyi// lha'i bu kun nas nyon mongs pa dag pas gsol pa/
223b5(dkon brtsegs): ngag dang kun nas nyon mongs pa// mi mkhas gang rnams mi shes pa// de dag ston pa sangs rgyas min// de skad drang srong mchog gis gsungs// lha'i bu thar pa la brtson pas gsol pa
223b6(dkon brtsegs): nyon mongs 'grib par 'gyur ba'i chos// rgyal ba yis ni gang bstan pa// de sten nyon mongs mi zad ces// khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis// lha'i bu thar pa la mngon par phyogs
223b7(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ chos gang nyon mongs gang gis rnams// zad 'gyur thub pas bstan pa la// yang dag brtson byas mi zad ces// rgol ba 'ang na yong mi dmigs/ lha'i bu rnal
224a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byor la btsun pas gsol pa/ rgyal ba khyod kyis nyan thos la// gang gi don du chos bstan pa// de brtson bgyis pas mi 'thob ces// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis//
224a2(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu mi 'jigs dpal gyis gsol pa/ 'dod chags spang phyir mi sdug pa// bstan la yang dag brtson bgyis na// 'dod chags zad par mi 'gyur zhes// khyod la rgol ba yong ma mchis//
224a3(dkon brtsegs): lha'i bu 'gro ba med pa rab tu shes kyis gsol pa/ shin tu bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba// zhe sdang spang phyir byams gsungs pa// de bstabs sel bar mi 'gyur zhes// dgra 'joms
224a4(dkon brtsegs): khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mig rnam par dag gis gsol pa/ shes rab gti mug spangs pa'i phyir// gsungs pa de la brten bgyis kyang // gti mug sel bar mi 'gyur zhes/
224a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu rnam par rtog pa 'joms kyis gsol pa/ rnam par rtog pa'i gnyen por ni// dbugs byung rngub pa dran gsungs pa// de la brtson gyis mi
224a6(dkon brtsegs): zhi zhes// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu mtshan ma med pa lhur len pas gsol pa// nga'o snyam pa spang slad du// stong nyid khyod kyis bka' stsal te// des na de zhi mi 'gyur zhes/
224a7(dkon brtsegs): 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal spangs kyis gsol pa// nga snyam nga rgyal spang slad du// mtshan ma med pa khyod kyis gsungs// bsten kyang zhi bar mi 'gyur zhes/
224b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu sems rgyan rnam par dag pas gsol pa// lhag pa'i bsam pas rab pa yis// nyon mongs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur// des ni 'od
224b2(dkon brtsegs): mongs mi zad ces// 'di na khyod la rgol ma mchis// lha'i bu 'du shes rnam par bshig gis gsol pa/ phyogs dang gnyen po'i rnam pa dang // nyon mongs lam dang 'am 'jug la 'jigs pa
224b3(dkon brtsegs): med par rgol ba na// thub pa chen po ma mthong ngo // lha'i bu tha snyad shin tu shes pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan phyogs dang phyogs min dang // zad dang ma dang tha snyad tsam// 'jigs
224b4(dkon brtsegs): pa ma mchis rgol bgyid pa// thub pa de ni ming tsam mo// lha'i bu lus kyi las dul bas gsol pa/ mkhyen pas yongs su mkhyen gyur nas// khrod kyi sku yi 'phrin las 'jug
224b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ma lus mkhyen pas na// des na 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen// lha'i bu lus kyi las yongs su shes pas gsol pa/ sems can rnams la thugs brtse bas// dpa'
224b6(dkon brtsegs): khyod sku yi 'phrin las ni// mtha' dag shin tu nges pa lags// 'jig rten mgon la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu lus kyi las shin tu nges pas gsol pa/ sku yi 'phrin las
224b7(dkon brtsegs): rab nges par// lus can kun la sman slad du// 'jig rten sngon ma khyong mdzad de// des na khyod ni gang zag mchog/ lnga'i bu lus kyi las kyi mtha' shin tu mthong bas gsol pa/
225a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can kun la spyan spyad du// 'dren pa thams cad mkhyen pa ni// sku mi 'phrin las dag pa dang // lags par yongs su gartags dang ldan// myu bu lus
225a2(dkon brtsegs): las kyi mtha' shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas gsol pa/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag sku dang // sku yi 'phrin las rnam dag dang // ldan par sems can bde don du// gang zag mchog ni spyod pa
225a3(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// lha'i bu tshig grub kyis gsol pa/ snyan cing yon tan ldan pa dang // rtsub pa yongs su spangs pa'i gsung // mkhyen pas shin tu yongs brtags shing // mgon po khyod ni gsung ba
225a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// lha'i bu dus su smra bas gsol pa// dus su don dang ldan pa dang // don med yongs su spangs pa'i gsung // gzung bar 'os dang blangs 'os pa// 'dren pa khyod ni gsung ba
225a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// lha'i bu sdums byed blo gros kyis gsol pa/ dbyen du gyur pa yongs spangs te// 'dum par 'gyur dang yid 'ong ba// dbyen med 'bras bu rnam par smin// sngon chad khyod
225a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsung du brjod// lha'i bu mi smra bas gsol pas/ srog gi don du'ang khyod kyis ni// srid pa rnams su brdzun ma gsungs// de bas khyod kyi grags pa kun// 'jig cen
225a7(dkon brtsegs): dag na thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu yang dag par smra bas gsol pa/ 'di ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas chos rnams btsal slad du// thub pa'i gsung la sdod pa ni/
225b1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag gsungs pa'i rgyu mthun lags// lha'i bu yang dag pa'i mtha' la nges par byung gis gsol pa/ mi mchog khyod kyis bden pa yis// rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di bsgrubs te//
225b2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi yang dag rang bzhin yang // rkang gnyis dam pa khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu yang dag pa la brtul bas gsol pa/ 'dras byas dag gi chos kyi rnams// yang dag ji banan
225b3(dkon brtsegs): lta ba dang // chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid kyang // mo yi dbang pos rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu las la rtog pas gsol pa/ ye shes yongs su dag pa yis// bdag nyid dang ni
225b4(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag gi/ tshig gi las kyang rab tu mkhyen// des na rgyal ba mnyam ma mchis// lha'i bu yid la rtog pas gsol pa/ mi yi dbang po'i thugs kyi las// ji snyed gang dag 'a/
225b5(dkon brtsegs): pa ni de dag 'gro la thugs rje 'jug/ 'gro pa ma khrod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'o bu yid kyi rnam par rtog pa la mdzes pas gsol pa/ 'gro la thugs rje bstad nas ni// yang la/
225b6(dkon brtsegs): khrong ni spyod mdzad pa// de la thugs ni dral bar byung // 'gro bamachod la phyag kyang 'tshal// lha'i bu thabs la skakhas pas gsol pa/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa rnam dpyong nas// rnas
225b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren rgyas kyi 'dzin pas 'chug/ rlab pam shes tshags so// mabyon pa'in can byarab tu 'jug/ lha'i bu'ing rnam par bam-im sa pasal pa/ sangs rgyasas rang tsha kyi
226a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can thugs rjes gzigs pas 'byung // sangs rgyas nyid la ye shes thabs// rang bzhin med par rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu 'das pa la mkhas
226a2(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa/ sbyin rang tshul khrims bzod pa dang // brtson 'grus bsam gtan dag la yang // gang gis gang la sngon spyad pa// sngon gyi dus kyang rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu 'das pa la
226a3(dkon brtsegs): rtog pas gsol pa/ byang chub mchog ni 'tshol mdzad cing // gang drung khyod kyis sngon spyad pa// sngon gyi spyod pa yongs brjogs nas// sangs rgyas bye ba rab tu mkhyen// lha'i bu sngon gyi
226a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ bskal pa bye ba grangs med du// gang du khyod kyis sngor spyad pa// sngon gyi tshul ni dgongs mdzad kyang // khyod kyi thugs yid thogs mi mnga'// lpan
226a5(dkon brtsegs): bu sngon gyi tshul la yongs su rtog pas gsol pa/ sangs rgyas mang las byung ba yis// ting 'dzin mngon par bsgrub bya ba// sangs rgyas bye ba grangs med la// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis
226a6(dkon brtsegs): zhus/ lha'i bu sngon gyi sbyor ba las nges par 'byung gis gsol pa/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas drung dag tu// grangs med dpag tu med pa yi// ting 'dzin sgo dag 'dren pa yis// zhus shing bsgom
226a7(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzad par gyur// lha'i bu sngon gyi gnas la rtog pas gsol pa/ 'khor ba'i nyes pa rab mang dang // dkur sti rnam pa sna tshogs dag/ gzigs nas sems can rnams la ston// sems
226b1(dkon brtsegs): can long ba rnams kyang 'grel// lha'i bu sngon gyi dus na 'phrul bas gsol pa/ gzhan dang gzhan dag zos shing 'tshal// rtse zhing rab tu dga' ba bgyis// gnod pa mi bzang bgyis pa dag
226b2(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dang gzhan yang khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu sngon gyi spyod pas yang dag par byung gis gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa 'gro rtogs pa// khyod kyis ye shes 'das dus kyi// las dang ngas ma
226b3(dkon brtsegs): gtan snyoms 'jug dang // 'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu phyi ma'i mtha' la mkhas pas gsol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// ma 'ongs dus kyi 'chi 'pho dang // skya dang las kyi
226b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam smin la// thogs par 'gyur ba ma mchis so// lha'i bu ma 'ongs pa'i spyod yul gyis gsol pa/ brtan pa 'gro ba mkhas khyod kyi// mkhyen pa phyi dras sems can gyi// bsam dang las kyi
226b5(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu dang // 'gro ba rnams la thogs ma mchis// lha'i bu srid pa las skyod kyis gsol pa/ khams rnams gsum po 'di dag dang // dus gsum kun la mkhas khyod kyi//
226b6(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni mi chags te// srid pa'i spyod yul khyod kyis mkhyen// lha'i bu tha snyad la spyod pas gsol pa/ las dang sems can 'gro ba dang // rnam par smin pa myong ba dag/ de dag
226b7(dkon brtsegs): thams cad ming tsam du// rkang gnyis dam pas bstan par mdzad// lha'i bu da ltar byung ba la yang dag par rtog pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// da ltar byung la
227a1(dkon brtsegs): thogs ma mchis/ grangs mang sangs rgyas zhing rnams ni/ 'jig rten mgon pos rab tu mkhyen// lnga'i drad ltar byung ba la rnam par dpyod pas gsol pa maM
227a2(dkon brtsegs): dbang po rnam dpyad nas/ byas pa'i blo gros rmongs bgyid pa// dus gsum dngos po ma mchis par// nges par mnyam pa nyid du gzigs// lha'i bu mi gnas pa'i blo gros kyis gsol pa//
227a3(dkon brtsegs): dus gsum gnas pa ma mchis shing // ngo bo nyid la mi gnas te// dngos po thams cad dngos med par// rnam par 'dren pa khyod kyis gzigs// lha'i bu dus gsum mngon par bskul/
227a4(dkon brtsegs): bas gsol pa/ 'das pa dag dang ma 'ongs dang // da ltar byung ba'i phung po rnams// ma mchis dngos po ma mchis par// skyes bu dam pa bstan par mdzad// lha'i du chags med yid
227a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ dus gsum sems can thams cad la// snying po mchis par ma bstan te// sgyu ma smig rgyu mig yor dang / brag cha lta bur khyod kyis bstan// lha'i bu dus gsum dpogs
227a6(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa/ 'dren pa khyod kyis mkhyen pa ni// dus gsum po dag kun tu yang // sgyu ma lta bur mkhyen pas na// khyod kyi dbang po chags mi mnga'// lha'i bu mos pa yongs su rig par
227a7(dkon brtsegs): byed kyis gsol pa/ gang gi nub mo dpa' khyod kyis// byang chub mngon du bgyis gyur pa// de dus tshul can mos pa la/ bri bar gyur pa yong mi ganga'// lha'i bu mos pa yang dag thob
227b1(dkon brtsegs): kyis gsol pa// 'jig rten sgron ma'i mos pa ni// bar du rgyun chad mi 'gyur te// rtag par khyod kyi mos pa des// khyod kyi sras rnams mos pa che// lha'i bu mos pas mngon
227b2(dkon brtsegs): 'phags kyis gsol pa/ chab las pad+ma ji bzhin du// khyod ni mos pas mngon du 'phags// 'jig rten dag gi mi gos te// pad+mar chab kyis ji bzhin no// lha'i bu mos pas
227b3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su grol bas gsol pa/ 'jig rten mgon dang mos pa ni// chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod pa ste// gnyis med gnyis su bgyir ma mchis// smad pa med pa khyod kyis
227b4(dkon brtsegs): gzigs// lha'i bu brtson 'grus yang dag thob kyis gsol pa/ gzi brjid chen po brtson 'grus kyis// byang chub yang dag brnyes par gyur// mdzad pa mdzad kyang mngogon po khyod/
227b5(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus btang ba yongs ma mdzad// lha'i bu dran pa phun sum tshogs pas gsol pa/ dpa' bo chen po'i dgongs pa ni// thams cad kun tu rjes su 'jug/ mdzad pa mdzad
227b6(dkon brtsegs): mgon po khyod// dgongs pa bri ba yongs ma mchis// lha'i bu sems mnyam par bzhag pas gsol pa/ mgon po rtag tu mnyam gzhag ste// sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ma
227b7(dkon brtsegs): 'dren pa spyod pa'i dbang gis ni// sems can rnams la chos kyang ston// lha'i bu shes rab lhur len gyis gsol pa/ 'jig rten sgron mar gyur khyod kyis// ye shes rgya mtsho
228a1(dkon brtsegs): tha ma ni// bsgral pa bri bar brjod bkris gang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis bshad mi spyod// lha'i bu rnam par grol bu la mkhas pas bstsol pa/ rnam pa
228a2(dkon brtsegs): grol dang ma grol ba// gang skad khyod kyis ma bsdus pas// mtshungs pa med pa khyod la ni// rnam grol yongs su nyams mi mnga'// lha'i bu rnam par grol ba'i ye shes la brtson
228a3(dkon brtsegs): pas gsol pa// thub pa khyod ni rnam grol nas// ngo bo nyid med mkhyen pas na// rnam grol ye shes gzigs pa ni// yang dag mkhyen pa nyams mi mnga'// lha'i bu sngon gyi srid
228a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam par dpyod kyis gsol pa// mar me mdzad pa tshun chad du// dpa' bo yang dag gzigs khyod kyis// spyod la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ste// res na sangs rgyas lags shes
228a5(dkon brtsegs): bstod// lha'i bu zab mo la spyod pas gsol pa/ srog chags gzhan dag ji bzhin du// bde gshegs khyod la tshogs mi mnga'// chos kyi rang bzhin mkhyen pas na// rang
228a6(dkon brtsegs): bzhin de la rmongs mi mnga'// lha'i bu blo gros yangs pas gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa khyod la ni// rnam pa kun tu bsnyel mi mnga'// mgon po'i dgongs pa nyer gzhag pa//
228a7(dkon brtsegs): thub pa 'bru mar snod dang 'dra// lha'i bu sems g.yeng ba med kyis gsol ba/ 'jig rten sgron ma khyod la ni// mnyam par ma bzhag sems mi mngag// ma 'dres sangs rgyas chos kyi rnams/
228b1(dkon brtsegs): gros rgyags can gyis shes par dka'/ khwa bum shes la rab tu gnas kyis gsol pa 'a bar gshags pa khyod la n-i// marnams pang snyoms sa ra ste// ma dpa la sam/
228b2(dkon brtsegs): byas chos// ma 'dres pa ni bsam mi khyab// zhwa'i bu thams cad zil banon gyis gsol pa/ skyes bu lha mchog rtsod la na// 'jig rten gsum na mtshungs ma mchis// thams cad mkhyen
228b3(dkon brtsegs): pham phas pa// khyod kyis chos rnams thams cad mkhyen// lha'i ba snying po drangs pas gsol pa/ sems na srid po bla na med// chos rnams byas pa 'jigs mi mngag// sangs rgyas
228b4(dkon brtsegs): kun dang mnyam brnyes pa/ sangs rgyas byang chub phyag 'tshal lo// gnas gtsang ma pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o// / de nas de'i tshe gzhan mu stags can spyod pa
228b5(dkon brtsegs): dang / kun tu rgyu drug khris/ lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / klu'i bu mo dang / klu dang / grul bum dang / dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang / mi 'am ci dang / 'breng ldan glang po che can dang / rgyal chen
228b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / tshangs pa dang / 'od gsal dang / dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu
228b7(dkon brtsegs): che ba'i lha dag gis mchod pa'ang mthong / lung bstan pa'ang thos/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dag gis bstod pa brjod pa'ang thos nas/ ngo mtshar thob par gyur te// chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa
229a1(dkon brtsegs): 'di thos nas/ 'di ltar sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul thos pas/ yid gnyis su gyur/ nem nur dang the tsom za bar gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
229a2(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// kye go'u ta ma sngan chad ma thos pa'i chos bstan pa 'di thos na/ bdag cag ni kun tu rgyu'i gnas kyang mi 'tshal/ khyim gyi gnas kyang mi 'tshal bar 'gyur cing / 'di ltar sngan
229a3(dkon brtsegs): chad ma thos pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ chos 'di la nem nur dang the tsom du gyur te/ sems dad par yang ma gyur mod kyi / 'on kyang dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod la bdag cag yid ches pa mchis so//
229a4(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mngon par mdzad de/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par mdzad pas/ bdag cag
229a5(dkon brtsegs): gis lha'i 'khor rgya chen po 'di dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor phal cher go'u ta ma khyod kyis legs par gsungs pa 'tshal cing / yi rangs par gyur pa mthong ste/ des na bdag cag dge
229a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyong go'u ta ma khyod la dad pa mchis par gyur to// kye go'u tsa ma gang 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes smras pa de la/ ji ltar chos thams cad de
229a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa snyam du bdag cag the tsom char 'tshal lo// dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod la ni ci nas bdag cag legs par bshad pa'i don de rtogs nas/ mun pa med par gyur te/ stan 'di las ldang
229b1(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba de ltar bdag cag la chos ston spyod do snyam ste bdag cag dge sbyong go'u ta ma khyod de ltar mngon par dad par gyur to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// gzhan ma
229b2(dkon brtsegs): stobs can spyod pa can dang / kun tu rgyu rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu d+hA dag de'i phyir khyed nyid la dris/ khyed kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lan thob cig/ dge sbyong go'u tam
229b3(dkon brtsegs): legs so zhes gsol te/ kun tu rgyu dgra bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun tu rgyu dag khyed kyis dzaM lta mngal du 'jug
229b4(dkon brtsegs): bshes sam/ de dag gis gsol pa/ kye go'u ta ma bdag cag gi bstan bcos las thos na/ gsum 'dus nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur te/ gang 'di pa dang ma gnyis kyang tshogs pa dang / chags
229b5(dkon brtsegs): par yang gyur pa dang / chags nas kyang 'dod pa'i rnam par rtog pa rnams kyis rnam par brtags pas/ 'dod chags kyang byung ba de'i tshe/ mngal du 'jug par 'gyur ro zhe'o// bcom ldan
229b6(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ ba dang ma gnyis rnam par rtog pa'i tshe/ 'dod chags de ma'i sems las byung ngam/ gsol pa/ kye go'u tam ma
229b7(dkon brtsegs): lags so// ma'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/ kye go'unam ma lags so// de pa'i sems las byung ngam/ kye go'u ta ma ma lags so// pa'i rnam par rtog pa las byung ngam/ kye go
230a1(dkon brtsegs): tam ma lags so// kun tu d+hA rag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ pa'i 'dod chags gang yin pa de ma'i mngab du zhugs sam+b+ha/ kye+e go ru ta ma de ni ma lags so// naH
230a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems pa'i sems gang yin pa de ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma de ni ma lags so// kun tu N+ya dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ pa'i kun tu rtogs pa
230a3(dkon brtsegs): da ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma de ni ma lags so// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de lha las 'chi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u
230a4(dkon brtsegs): ta ma ma 'tshal to// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de mi dang / lha ma yin dang / sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten
230a5(dkon brtsegs): nas 'chi 'phos te ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma ma 'tshal te// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ mngal na gnas pa de gzugs yod pa 'am/ gzugs med pa zhig
230a6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma ma 'tshal to// kun tu rgyu dag 'di la ji snyam du sems/ gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa ma'i
230a7(dkon brtsegs): mngal du zhugs sam/ kye go'u ta ma ma 'tshal to// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhan mu stegs can kun tu rgyu de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
230b1(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rgyu dag chos 'di ni zab cing pra ste/ mkhas pa shes pa blo dang ldan pas rig par bya ba yin te/ brtag tu med cing brtag pa'i yul ma yin la/ blta dka' zhing shes par
230b2(dkon brtsegs): dka' bas/ de ni khyed yun ring por gzhan du bltas pa/ gzhan du mos pa/ gzhan du rad pa gzhan du brtson pa/ gzhan gyi lta ba'i gnas la gnas pa rnams kyis shes par mi nus
230b3(dkon brtsegs): mod kyi/ kun tu rgyu dag 'on kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag tshul dang 'dra ba'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten nas/ chos zab mo rnams la mig skye bar 'gyur te/ kun tu
230b4(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na mi mig gi dbang po nyams pa ni/ de'i tshul dang 'dra ba'i gso ba byed pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten na tshe 'di 'di la mig yongs su dag par 'gyur/
230b5(dkon brtsegs): mig des kyang tshe 'di nyid la gzugs rnam mthong bar 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de bzhin du rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo shes rab kyi mig 'ams par gyur pas kyang tshul dang
230b6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba'i dge pa'i bshes gnyen la brten na/ shes rab kyi mig rnam par dag par 'gyur te/ des kyang ches zab mo rnams mthong bar 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag byeng bang yun ring po
230b7(dkon brtsegs): rnam gan du nas pa/ sngor log pa'i gdams rag gis bsdus pa/ chos ma yin pa la chos su 'du shes pa/ bar pa ma min pa la thar par 'du shes me/ 'dung ba mtshas pa
231a1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'du shes pa/ chud zos pa rnams kyis chud gsan pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na long ba'i dmigs bu long bas byas na/ gang 'di bgrib
231a2(dkon brtsegs): dang khrid pa de gnyis ka'ang tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// kun tu rgyu dag de bzhin du dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze gang la la ston pa ma yin par bdag cag ni ston
231a3(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par bdag cag ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang / 'byung ba la mkhas pa ma
231a4(dkon brtsegs): yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba la mkhas pa'o zhes khas 'che ba dang / 'byung ba mthong ba ma yin par bdag cag ni 'byung ba mthong ba yin no zhes khas 'che ba dang / mu stegs byed pa ma yin par bdag
231a5(dkon brtsegs): cag ni mu stegs byed pa yin no zhes khas 'che ba yin te/ de dag ston pa ma yin par ston pa'o zhes khas 'che zhing / gang rjes su ston pa de ni log par rjes su ston par 'gyur/ yang dag par
231a6(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin par gang khong du chud par byed pa de ni log par khong du chud par byed par 'gyur/ 'byung ba la mkhas pa ma yin par gang 'byin pa de ni log par 'byin par
231a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ 'brang ba mthong ba ma yin par gang 'byung ba ston pa de ni log par ston par 'gyur/ mu stegs byed pa ma yin par gang sgrol ba de ni log par sgrol bar 'gyur te/ de dag ni tshul ma yin
231b1(dkon brtsegs): par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag 'di lta ste/ dper na ba lang rdzi rab ka la mkhas pa ma yin pas rab ka ma yin par ba lang bskal na/ de'i ba'ang de dag gis pha rol
231b2(dkon brtsegs): dang tshu rol gyi 'gram ma rnyed nas 'khyil te/ de nyid du tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar ba lang rdzi de rab ka la mi mkhas pa'i phyir ro// kun tu
231b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyu dag de bzhin du gang la la mu stegs byed pa ma yin par mu stegs byed por khas 'che zhing gang sgrol ba de ni tshul ma yin par sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag nga ni ston pa nyid
231b4(dkon brtsegs): yon la/ ston par khas 'chi bas/ nga gang rjes su ston pa de yang dag par rjes su ston pa yin/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid yin la/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
231b5(dkon brtsegs): su khas 'che bas/ nga gang khong du chud par byed pa de yang dag par khong du chud par byed pa yin/ 'brang ba la mkhas pa zhing yin la/ 'byung ba la mkhas par khas 'che bas/ dbang
231b6(dkon brtsegs): 'byin pa de dag yang dag par 'byin pa yin/ 'byung ba mthong ba nyid yin la/ 'byung ba ston par khas 'che bas/ nga gang 'byung ba ston pa de yang dag par ston pa yin/ mu stegs byed pa
231b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid yin la/ mu stegs byed par khas 'che bas/ nga gang sgrol ba de yang dag par sgrol ba yin te/ ston pa'i chos rab tu shes nas ni rjes su ston/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rab tu shes
232a1(dkon brtsegs): nas ni khong du chud par byed/ 'byung ba rab tu shes nas ni 'byin/ yang dag par mthong nas ni ston/ mu stegs rab tu shes nas ni sgrol te/ gang sgrol ba de'ang mu
232a2(dkon brtsegs): stegs bde bas rab tu sgrol ba yin no// de ni 'di lta ste/ kun tu rgyu rag khyed kyang thar par 'dod pa yin la/ nga'ang ston pa mngon du bzhugs pa yin te// yang dag par ston pa/ yang dag
232a3(dkon brtsegs): par khong du chud par byed pa/ 'byung ba phun sum tshogs pa/ 'byung ba mthong ba/ yang dag pa'i mu stegs byed pa yin gyis/ de'i phyir rna ba lhogs te mos pa skyed la/ dran pa nye bar zhob ste/
232a4(dkon brtsegs): yid 'dun par gyis la/ ma thob pa'i chos rnams thob par bya ba dang / sngon ma phyin pa'i lam du 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma song ba'i phyogs su 'gro bar bya ba dang / sngon ma 'grogs pa'i
232a5(dkon brtsegs): lam grogs dang 'grogs par bya ba dang / sngon ma 'tshal ba'i lam btsal bar bya ba dang / sngon ma thob pa'i chos kyi mdzod thob par bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus yang dag par rtsoms shig/ kun
232a6(dkon brtsegs): tu rgyu dag chos gsum mngon du gyur pas mngal du 'jug ces gang smras pa de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / mngal du 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di khyed la/
232a7(dkon brtsegs): ngas bshad do// kun tu rgyu dag de la ma zhes gang smras pa de ni sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rkyen du gsungs so// pha zhes bya ba de ni sngon gyi las bsags pa'i rgyur gsungs so// dri za
232b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba de ni rnam par shes pa las kyis 'phangs pa'i tshig bla dmas so// mer mer po zhes bya ba de ni las kyis 'phangs pa'i rnam par shes pa'i gnas dang bapa'o// ma'i mang la rjes
232b2(dkon brtsegs): ba de ni rnam par shes pa las 'phangs pa'i gzhi ste/ 'di ltar ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa ni skye ba dang / 'phel ba dang / rgyas par 'gyur ro// kun tu r+b+ha dag 'di lta ste/ dper
232b3(dkon brtsegs): sa chen po la gnas na/ rdza dang / shing ga' ba dang / sman dang / nags tshal dag ste zhing 'phel ba dang rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma'i mngal na gnas pa'i rnam par shes pa'ang skye ba dang /
232b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phel ba dang / rgyas par 'gyur te/ 'phel nas skye bar 'gyur ro// btsas nas rnam par 'phel lo// 'phel nas spyod pa snang bar 'gyur te/ 'gro ba gang dang gang nas 'chi 'phos nas/
232b5(dkon brtsegs): de dang der skyes nas/ de dang 'dra ba'i spyod pa de dag de spyod par 'gyur te/ de dag kyang mkhas pas shes bya ba yin gyi/ glen mas ni ma yin no// yun ring po nas 'grogs pas shes
232b6(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba yin gyi/ yun thung dus ma yin no// yang dag par sems pas shes par bya ba yin gyi/ mi brtson pas ma yin no// kun tu rgyu dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas 'chi 'phos
232b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gang zag gi rtags mkhas pas shes par bya ba ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ skad sha sha po yin/ skad gyo dum gyi sgra lta bu yin/ skad brtag dgos pa yin/ skad che ba yin/ skad
233a1(dkon brtsegs): lhang lhung po yin/ rtag tu dngang ba yin/ rtag tu 'dar ba yin/ rtag tu spu zing zhes byed pa yin/ rmi lam na me'i phung po 'bar ba mthong ba yin/ ri rgyug par mthong ba
233a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ me mdag 'bar bar mthong ba yin/ lcags zangs kyi nang du btso bar mthong ba yin/ lag na dbyug pa thogs pa'i mi dag mthong ba yin/ srin po dag gis bdag 'phangs par mthong ba
233a3(dkon brtsegs): yin/ bdag nyid gson por gsal shing gis gzugs par mthong ba yin/ khyi dag gis bdag dbad par mthong ba yin/ khyi dag gis bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid glang po che
233a4(dkon brtsegs): dang sbrul gyis gtses par mthong ba yin/ phyogs bzhir bros na phyogs mi shes pa yin/ sems can kun la yid mi rton pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag rnam pa nyi shu po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba
233a5(dkon brtsegs): nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag rig par bya'o// kun tu rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ rmugs shing gnyid
233a6(dkon brtsegs): che ba yin/ le lo che ba yin/ mang du za ba yin/ sa la 'drud pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa med pa yin/ mi gsal bar smra ba yin/ glen pa la dga' ba yin/ mun pa la dga' ba yin/ 'dam rdzab la
233a7(dkon brtsegs): dpa' ba yin/ yang dang yang sos rgya gcod pa yin/ rgyun du rkang pa'i mthe bos sa rko nga yin/ yang dang yang mgo la sbeng ma 'du ba yin/ yang dang yang nam mkha' la sos 'dangs pa yin/ kun tu
233b1(dkon brtsegs): bskums te nyal ba yin / sa la thal ba yin/ mi gtsang bas mi 'dog pa 'in/ yang dang yang nam mnga' la sdom pa yin/ yang dang yang ma ston pa pa ba yin/ gzhan du smra zhing bzhan du byed de gso byung ba yin
233b2(dkon brtsegs): bab bab tu spyod pa yin/ rmi lam na bdag rdzab kyis gos par rmi ba yin/ rmi lam na bdag nags su song ste/ rtswa za bar mi ba yin/ sbrul gdug pas bdag bskor bar mthong ba yin/ bdag nyid khrong du
233b3(dkon brtsegs): zhugs par mthong ba yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag de dag la sogs pa dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas 'chi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma rnam pa du mar shes par bya ste/ de dag ni bskal pa 'am bskal ba las lhag
233b4(dkon brtsegs): par brjod kyang zad par mi nus so// kun tu rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ skra ser ba yin/ mig wa'i mig 'dra ba yin/
233b5(dkon brtsegs): rtag par bkres pa yin/ rtab tu sgom pa yin/ saur sna che ba yin/ 'dod chen che ba min/ 'thob pa mo rnyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi la ba yin/ khro ba yin/ mig dmar ba yin/ bza' ba thams cad la sre/
233b6(dkon brtsegs): pa yin/ bdog pa thams cad la chags pa yin/ sbyin pa'i gnas dag mthong bar mi 'dod pa yin/ dngos po kun la'ang de rku ba'i sems yod pa yin/ dngos po ngan pa rnams la'ang dga' ba yin/ 'thob/
233b7(dkon brtsegs): ba la mos pa yin/ zas skom mi gtsang ba la dga' ba yin/ gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la phrag dog byed pa yin/ gzhan gyi longs spyod la sring pa skyed pa yin/ gzhan gyi 'ongs spyong bar yo
234a1(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ de'i sems byams pa sngon du 'gro ba yin/ dgod pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ 'jam par smra ba yin/ dka' ba la mkhas pa yin/ rgyun la dga'
234a2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ che ba'i ngang tshul can yin/ 'gro ba'i ngang tshul can yin/ lus kyi shugs 'byin pa'i drang tshul can yin/ chags pa'i mtshan ma dang mi chags pa'i mtshan ma shes pa yin/ phan
234a3(dkon brtsegs): par bya ba la mkhas pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag mtshan ma de dag la sogs pas mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag tu shes par bya'o// kun tu rgyu dag de la mtshan ma de dag las
234a4(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag mtshan ma dag las 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa de lta bu'i
234a5(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la brten par bya/ bsnyen par bya/ bsnyen bkur bya'o// de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i
234a6(dkon brtsegs): tshe zhe sdang la yongs su brten pas/ des zhe sdang las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas// de las des sems can dmyal bar skyes te/ de'i phyir sems can dmya' bar gnas pa rnyed nas/
234a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can dmyal ba'i spyod pa can du gyur pasade mi'i nang du skyes te/ spyod pa'i rtag 'di dag thos na/ bdag ni sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par
234b1(dkon brtsegs): bya zhing / des sems can dmyal ba'i las kyi rtswa spangs pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge pa'i bshes gnyen de dag zhe sdang gi gnyen por byams bston to//
234b2(dkon brtsegs): byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / byams pa dang ldan pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston to// des kyang de'i zhe sdang gi bag la 'al spong bar 'gyur te
234b3(dkon brtsegs): des byams pa chen po bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag
234b4(dkon brtsegs): gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe gti mug la yongs su brten pas/ nges gti mug las byung ba'i las mngon par 'dus byas pas/ de las des dud 'gro'i skye gnas su skyes te/ de'i phyir de dung
234b5(dkon brtsegs): 'gro'i skye gnas na gnas pa rnyed nas/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de dud 'gro'i sgra gnas nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du ste kyang / dud 'gro'i sgra gnas kyi spyod pa de dag nyid
234b6(dkon brtsegs): spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni dud 'gro'o skyo gnas nas sho 'phos nas mi'i nang du skyes so zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / de dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi las de dag las
234b7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gti mug spang ba'i phyir rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba ston to// des kya
235a1(dkon brtsegs): pa de sa 'a gas kum du mas / byas sa 'das/ sa pa 'a ga sa ts+tsha
235a2(dkon brtsegs): 'jam cananas pa 'das pa'i 'ang sa ni rnams pa zag ni dang mas pa par byas pa shes par ca nan dag ma ldan smra
235a3(dkon brtsegs): man+danan na 'dzi ga lan te/ m+b+hahU~M/ dus pasnyen/ 'thab pol chab y-i/ aT 'as pa tshus/ rgyas man/ n+ta 'a ba shA
235a4(dkon brtsegs): ba yin+tu/ mthu dang ldan pa yin/ thabs mo'i blo can yin/ dbyen la dga' ba yin/ bya ba thams cad la nga rgyal che ba yin/ so snang ba yin/ 'jig rten thams cad la brnyas pa'i 'du shes
235a5(dkon brtsegs): can ston/ mtshan marno ba yin/ tshi len pa yin/ bdag gzangs bstod pa can yin/ mi shes pa'i stobs can yin/ nyon mongs pa'i stobs can yon te/ kun tu r+m+ma da ga de rag la so/
235a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ni wa ma yin las shi thos pa'i gang zag gi mtshan mar shes par bya'o// ban tu r+g+ha dgadal mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi martan ma ni 'di dag minate/ hrAk+Shas+t+wa~M/
235a7(dkon brtsegs): ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa can yin/ 'phags pa dang snyan pa yin/ 'phags pa ma yin pa la ston pa yin/ dge pa byed pa yin/ mngon rtags 'dod pa yin/ thabs pa 'dod pa yin/
235b1(dkon brtsegs): snyan pa 'dod pa yin/ bzo la dga' ba yin/ shes pa la dga' ba yin/ nyon mongs pa chung ba yin/ khrel yod cing ngo tsha shes pa yin/ rigs kyi bu'i tshul phun sum tshogs pa yin/
235b2(dkon brtsegs): byas pa gzo ba yin/ mdza' bo la gdu ba yin/ yongs su gtong ba dang ldan pa yin/ bye brag shes pa yin/ byas pa dang ma byas pa la rtogs pa yin/ tshig gi mthu yod pa yin pa thos
235b3(dkon brtsegs): gzung bar bya ba'i mthu yod pa yin/ 'dum par bya ba dang 'thab mo bya ba la mngon par mkhas pa yin/ pho nya nus pa yin/ skad thams cad 'dzin pa'i mthu yod pa yin/ gnas dang gnas
235b4(dkon brtsegs): ma yin pa mngon par shes pa yin te/ kun tu rgyu dag de dag la sogs pa ni mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gi rtags yin no// kun tu rgyu dag de la lha las shi 'phos
235b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gang zag gi rtags ni 'di dag yin te/ 'di lta ste/ mdzes pa yin/ gtsang sbra che ba yin/ 'phreng ba la dga' ba yin/ spos la dga' ba yin/ bdug pa la dga' ba
235b6(dkon brtsegs): yin/ glu len pa'i ngang tshul can yin/ byug pa la dga' ba yin/ 'dod pa'i yon tan ngan ngon gyis mi mgu zhing rgya chen po la dga' ba yin/ rol mo'i sgo thams cad la dga'
235b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin/ glu thams cad la dga' ba yin// skye bo rgya chen po dang 'grogs par dga' ba yin/ khang pa dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khyim dang longs spyod rgya chen po la dga'
236a1(dkon brtsegs): de'i gti mug gi bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dus gsum mnyam pa nyid ston te/ des de gti mug re ni rang bzhin med
236a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'o zhes bya bar shes pa skye bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ston te/ des de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs shing thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
236a3(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i tshe ser sna la kun tu brten cing bsgoms te mang du
236a4(dkon brtsegs): byas pas/ des ser sna dang ldan pa chags pa las byung ba'i las mngon par 'du byas pas/ de las byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs pa byas pa dang /
236a5(dkon brtsegs): blangs pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten du skyes te/ de gshin rje'i 'jig rten na gnas pa des gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos te/
236a6(dkon brtsegs): mi'i nang du skyes kyang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ nges spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid
236a7(dkon brtsegs): kyis shes par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge bo'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag sor sna spang ba'i
236b1(dkon brtsegs): bIr gtong ba ston to// des kyang de'i ser sna'i bag la nyal spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la gtong ba dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams ston/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
236b2(dkon brtsegs): byin pa ston te/ de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de la lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon
236b3(dkon brtsegs): mir gyur pa'i tshe dge ba'i rtsa ba rgya chen po dag kyang mngon par 'du byas la ka nga rgyal la'ang yongs su brten pas/ de nga rgyal dang ldan pas las byas pa dang bsags pa dang /
236b4(dkon brtsegs): zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pangs lha ma yin du skyes te/ lha ma yin gyi nang na gnas pa des lha ma yin gyi spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de lha ma yin nas shi
236b5(dkon brtsegs): 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang / lha ma yin gyi spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni lha ma yin las shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis
236b6(dkon brtsegs): shes par bya zhing kau ris spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag nga rgyal spang
236b7(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / nga'o snyam pa'i nga rgyal gzhom pa'i phyir skye mched rnams ston to// des kyang de'i nga rgyal spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la stong pa nyid ston te ga des de'i nga rgyal gyi
237a1(dkon brtsegs): bag la nyal spong ba dang / bdag rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// yang na ji ltar bu ba 'byung ba rnams tshags pa las 'byung ba'i tshul ston te/ des de
237a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal gyi bgazhal spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na de 'chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gcig pa ston te/ dus du'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing / de bsgoms
237a3(dkon brtsegs): pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de la mi las shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni sngon mor gyur pa'i tshe'ang dge pa bcu'i las kyi lam la
237a4(dkon brtsegs): kun tu brten cing bsgoms te mang du byas pas/ des las de byas pa dang / bsags pa dang / zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa des mir skyes te/ de mi'i nang
237a5(dkon brtsegs): na gnas pa nges mi'i spyod pa can du gyur pas/ de mi'i nang nas shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes kyang // mi'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ de spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni mi'i nang /
237a6(dkon brtsegs): nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bya bar bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des mi'i spyod pa de dag las yang dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/
237a7(dkon brtsegs): la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag mi rtag pa'i 'du shes ston to// des kyang de'i spyod pa bag la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la 'khor ba'i mi bsngags pa dang /
237b1(dkon brtsegs): sbyang las 'das pa'i bsngags pa ston te// des 'khor ba la mo dka' zhing / mya nga las 'da' ba don du gnyer bar 'gyur ro// yang na del pha rol tu phyin pa drug sto
237b2(dkon brtsegs): thos pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed par 'gyur ro// de la thabs mkhas pa'ang ston te/ des de'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag shin tu
237b3(dkon brtsegs): bzung ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang myur du thob par 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dab de la mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni/ sngon mir gyur pa'i
237b4(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa mchog tu bzung ste spyad pa dang / sbyin pa mchog tu bzung ste byin pa dang / tshul khrims mchog tu bzung ste bsrungs pas/ de las de byas pa dang / bsags pa dang /
237b5(dkon brtsegs): zin par byas pa dang / rdzogs par byas pa dang / blangs pa des lha'i nang du skyes te/ de lha'i nang na gnas pa des lha'i spyod pa n+dan du gyur pas/ de lha las shi 'phos te mi'i nang du skyes
237b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang lha'i spyod pa de dag nyid spyod par 'gyur te/ des spyod pa de dag gis bdag ni lha'i nang nas shi 'phos pa'o zhes bdag nyid kyis shes par bya zhing / des spyod pa de dag las yang /
237b7(dkon brtsegs): dag par 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bar bya ste/ de la dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag tshangs par spyod pa mchog tu 'dzin par nyes pa ston cing / mi gnas/
238a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshangs par spyod pa'i yon tan brjod do// mchog tu 'dzin pa'i sbyin pa la smod cing / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i ston pa bsngags par 'gyur ro//
238a2(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu 'dzin pa'i tshul khrims la smod cing / mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'i tshul khrims bsngags par 'gyur ro// des de'i tshul khrims dang / brtul zhugs mchog tu 'dzin pa sa
238a3(dkon brtsegs): la nyal dang bcas par spong bar 'gyur ro// yang na de la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ de bsgoms pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
238a4(dkon brtsegs): la thabs mkhas pa'ang ston te/ de dang ldan pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kun tu r+m+ma dag de la sems can dmyal ba nas shi 'phos pa
238a5(dkon brtsegs): gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mnyan par bya'o// thos nas kyang shas cher gnas par bya ste/ grong dang / zong khyer dang / zlog
238a6(dkon brtsegs): rdul dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho zung 'khor dag nu/ dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / 'khor bzhi po mang po
238a7(dkon brtsegs): yod pa de dag tu gnas par bya zhing / de dag dang bzo bar bya'o// des bgro ba byas te goms pa'i rjes su bgro bar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid do zhes rus
238b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum mnyam pa nyid mngon du 'gyur ro// kun tu rgyu dag de la dud 'gro'i skye gnas nas shi 'phros pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gzhan la brten te
238b2(dkon brtsegs): mug gi gnyen por bstan bcos la mkhas pa'i skye bo dang lhan cig dga' bar gnas par bya'o// des de'i gti mub spong bar 'gyur te/ nges bstan bcos de rang bskrun
238b3(dkon brtsegs): bac+doMs shes pa de dag rang bzhin gyis yang dag par brtag par bya'o// de'i phyir de bstan bcos dang bstan bcos shes pa rnams kyang rang bzhin med do// rang bzhin med
238b4(dkon brtsegs): ngo nas za bar snang bar 'gyur te/ des de la dus gsum mnyam pa nyid mngon du 'gyur zhing myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro//
238b5(dkon brtsegs): kun tu rmyi dag de la gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni gang la brten na de'i sbyin pa'i blo skye bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis de la dus gsum
238b6(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid dang / gang 'di mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa mngon du 'gyur ba dang / de bsgoms pas myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i
238b7(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i shes gnyen la brten par bya/ yon tan la brten par bya'o// / bam po'i chu gnyis pa/ kun tu rgya dab la lha ma yin las
239a1(dkon brtsegs): shi 'phos pa'i gang zag gis ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brten te/ nyon mongs pa'i bdud dang 'thab par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ nga rtul zhes bya ba'i chos
239a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni gang zhig/ de ni ci zhig gis yongs su bzung // de ni su la kun nas langs/ su zhig de spong bar byed ces yang dag par btsal na nga rgyal de mi dmigs so// gang
239a3(dkon brtsegs): gis de yongs su bzung ba dang / gang la de kun nas langs pa dang ga gang de spangs pa'i phyir rtsol ba de'ang mi dmigs pa de ni yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su bzung bas bdag dang
239a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten bslus par yang dag par rjes su mthong ngo // des chos thams cad rang bzhin med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing / chos gang la rang bzhin med pa de ni dngos
239a5(dkon brtsegs): po med pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// dngos po med pas yongs su ma grub bo zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// yongs su ma grub pas mi skye ba ste/ gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gag
239a6(dkon brtsegs): go gang mi skye mi 'gag pa de ni gdags su med pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// gang ga dgas su med par ni 'das pa'ang ma yin/ ma 'ongs pa'ang ma yin/ da ltar byung ba'
239a7(dkon brtsegs): ma yin no// gang dus gsum du mi dmigs pa de ni thob pa'ang ma yin/ chud zos pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar rab tu shes so// kun tu rgyu dag de ltar na de ni chos thams
239b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi chos nyid de/ chos nyid gang gis chos thams cad de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid de// de bzhin gshegs pa'ang de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de ban
239b2(dkon brtsegs): nyid gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid pas/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ming bzhin gsheg pa'o// kun tu rgyu dab ngas ni sngon chad dang da ltar yang 'jig rten btags pa ni nga rgyal
239b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi rang bzhin no zhes bshad de/ nga rgyal gyis ni mi las shi 'phos pa bdabs par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal gyis ni mtho ris nas shi 'phos pa gdags par 'gyur ro// ngargyal
239b4(dkon brtsegs): gyis ni sems can dmyal ba'i bar du shi 'phos pa bdags par 'gyur ro// nga rgyal med na gdabs pa med do// kun tu rgyu dag de ni nga rgyal med pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o//
239b5(dkon brtsegs): de'ang thabs mkhas pa dang ldan zhing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pas shes par nus so// de nas kun tu rgyu drug
239b6(dkon brtsegs): khri po de dag gis bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ de dag mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi
239b7(dkon brtsegs): zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis mngon par
240a1(dkon brtsegs): bstod pa / mgon po ye shes stobs kyis yang dag 'phags/ 'gro ba kun la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog 'gro ba kun na spyod pa rnams gzigs te/
240a2(dkon brtsegs): lag pa'i mthil du skyu ru ra gzhag bzhin// 'jig rten lta ba'i rnam pas kun tu dkrugs// sprin sgrub dag gis nam mkha' yog pa bzhin// de dag gis ni byis pa rmongs nas spyod/
240a3(dkon brtsegs): long ba'i tshogs rnams rab tu lam skor bzhin// 'jig rten rtag dang 'jig rten mi rtag dang / rtag kyang rtag la mi rtag kha cig mchi// rtag pa ma yin mi rtab min zhes
240a4(dkon brtsegs): glang po'i dbang po khyim du btags ltar brlag 'jig rten mtha' yod 'jig rten mtha' med dang // mtha' yang yod la mtha' med kha cig mchi// mtha' yod ma yin mtha'
240a5(dkon brtsegs): med min zhes te/ dper na d+ya ni gzeb tu bcug pa bzhin// la la dag ni lus 'di bdag ces mchi// la la dag ni lus 'di gzhan zhes mchi// rtog pas yongs su bkris nas nyal
240a6(dkon brtsegs): bgyid de// d+ya ni d+ha rgyar chud nas thogs pa bzhin// la la dag ni dbang phyub sprul ces mchi// la lar+g+ha med byung zhes 'dogs par bgyid// lta ba'i rnam pa dag gis kun nas dkris/
240a7(dkon brtsegs): mkha' la gnas pa'i bla ltar rgyal bas gzigs// ji ltar gzeb tu bcug pa'i bya rmongs pa/ bu ga ru gar thar du re ba ltar// mi mkhas lta ba'i rnam pas bdas pa 'gyur// zar
240b1(dkon brtsegs): pa mi thob rkang gnyis btags pa bzhin// tshangs dang skye dgu bdag dang skem byed dang / gzhon dang 'khor lo 'dzin dang rnam thos bu// phyogs dang rgya mtsho kun la phyag 'tshal te/
240b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal pos mtshan mo rkun po bzung ba bzhin// dbul po bu lon chags pa bu lon pas// bzung na gnyar sngon gsol ba 'debs pa bzhin// lta ba'i rnam pas gnas pa'i byis pa
240b3(dkon brtsegs): dag/ dbang phyug las ni bden pa 'tshal bar bgyid // rkun po'i tshogs rnams btson rar stsal ba bzhin// 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal brgya myong ba// de dag de bzhin
240b4(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa khyod kyis gzigs// phyag gi mthil na sor mo lnga dang mtshungs// de la mi dbang thugs rje bskyed nas ni// 'gro ba mkhyen pa 'gro bar spyod mdzad de// blo mchog
240b5(dkon brtsegs): tshe rabs 'gro ba dkrol ba ni/ dper na rgyal pos brtson rnams bkye ba bzhin// 'jig rten sman skad bskal pa bsam yas su// dka' ba mdzad nas zung chub mchog
240b6(dkon brtsegs): brnyes te// lta ba'i rnam par sems can la byams mkhyen nas// de dag bcings las khyod kyis 'grol bar mdzad// bde gshegs mi yi seng ga rkang banyis gtso/
240b7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs gang la mnga' rang khyod mdzad pa/ lta ba'i rnam pa sgyu 'drar rmongs mi mnga'/ bde gshegs khyod ni nga 'drar bdag cag 'tshal// stobs rnams gang gis rgyal ba
241a1(dkon brtsegs): stobs brnyes shing // mi 'jigs gang gis sngo ba'i dgra bsal te/ 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa/ blo mchog de ni bdag cag thob par
241a2(dkon brtsegs): shog gang gis rgyal ba 'jig rten gsum bskyod dang // gang gis mtha' yas 'od ni 'gyed pa dang // gang gis mi mchog sems can lung ston pa// de ring yud kyis
241a3(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag de thob shog de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis kun tu rgyu de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas/ de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang
241a4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa rta thul gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshogs su bcad de gsol pa/ 'jig rten phan bzhed 'dzum pa gang mdzad pa// mu stegs tshogs 'di shin tu 'phags gyur tam/
241a5(dkon brtsegs): mcho ga rang byung ci skad 'dzum mdzad pa// 'dzumar+b+ba de ni khyod kyis bka' stsal gsol/ bde bar gshegs pa 'dzum bya mdzad mthong nas// 'jig rten+da pAn+d+ha zhed zlo
241a6(dkon brtsegs): 'o// d+ha sh+'ul 'thob na bang / mchis rang 'jam rdzabs sa// sa rnaMs rgyal la mchen pa dam pa baHsa/ ra
241a7(dkon brtsegs): par bcas/ rgyam ba'i man can ring bang gis mthong // mkhas paslar du 'gas par bka' stsalagasal// mu gegs ca rnams lung bgan de thos ma/
241b1(dkon brtsegs): mas na rna pa stsa/ 'di lta pa ga sanas smra la nu na na na lags
241b2(dkon brtsegs): bar bas ladu gso// snyom tshal nasam ny-i kyus na gas pa// rnas n-i 'bang rnams 'didas sa sa thaMng / smras nas byu kyis dgas du
241b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ da ldan pa rtathul la tshags smra bcad daslar bak+ta sbrul pa rdul khyod kyis dus 'di shes smra nas/ rgya
241b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag las rgyal la rdos pa legs// 'dzin pa rang zung nyid la du dris pas// 'jig rten phan pa'i tshig kyang brjod par 'gyur/ 'dzum pa 'di ni dzA ka rangs mdzad ga/
241b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzum rgya ngas deng khyod la bstan par byas// yang dgra ji bzhin nga yis bstan pa la// dga' ba'i yid du byos te deng nyon cog/ mu stegs tshogs 'di rab tu dul gyur te//
241b6(dkon brtsegs): lta ba'i rnam spangs lta ba bzang por gyur// lta ba'i rnam par 'jig rten 'khyams mthong nas// snying rje can gyur byang chub rab tu zhugs// lta ba'i rnam pa dag ni rab
241b7(dkon brtsegs): spangs te// lta ba drang po rnyog med rtogs gyur cing // nga yis lung bstan thobs med thos gyur nas// de dag kun gyis thams cad mkhyen sems bskyed// sngon gyi
242a1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba dag la dang bskyed de/ thugs rje ldan pa rkang gnyis dam pa po// rgyal ba ze ba nyi shur tshang ba la/ bla med byang chub 'tshal zhing bsnyen bkur/
242a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyas rgyal ba rnams la sbyin pa mi nyung phul// khrims dang zhi ba'i ting 'dzin rnam par sbyangs// shes rab brtson 'grus stobs kyang 'bar bar byas/ thugs rje ldan
242a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams drung du bzod pa bsten// byang chub dam pa btsal nas yun ring du/ pha rol phyin pa drug la blo yang bzhugs// rgyal ba dgra las rgyal la zhu ba zhus// sangs rgyas brgya
242a4(dkon brtsegs): bgrangs dag la yid dga' byas// de dag sdig pa'i grogs kyi dbang gis na/ lta ba'i rnam pa gdug la gnas gyur pa// de dag bde gshegs rang byung mthong gyur nas// chags pa/
242a5(dkon brtsegs): med pas lta ba'i rnam pa spangs// ston pa'i dgongs pa yang dag rnam par rtogs/ ston pa'i dpongs pa rnams la dad pa gnas/ ma 'ongs dus na byang chub 'tshol byed cing
242a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba bye ba bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur/ ga ma 'ongs bskal pa skar ma 'dra ba la/ rgyal ba nga rgyal bcom par mtshan mthun par/ grags pa chen por phyobs su rnam par
242a7(dkon brtsegs): thabs// 'jog rten mkhas pa 'pho ba 'gre' bar 'gyur// de dag sangs rgyas zhing yang dag 'gyur te/ de dag bsod pa sna chags mtshungs pa med/ sangs rgyas zhing
242b1(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa'i blo can med// blo zas dag par mthun pa sha stag gnas// de na ngan song thams cad rnam par stangs/ maM kham pa sal tu dus pa'i tha ma la/ rgyal ba da
242b2(dkon brtsegs): sku tshe'i stobs ldan te// lo ni stong phrag brgyad cu thub par 'gyur// mi de dag gis byang chub 'di thos na// de tshe mi mnyes par ni byed mi 'gyur// chags med rlo mnga'
242b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi mtshan thos na/ bud med rnams kyang skyes pa'i lus thob 'gyur// de ltar nga rgyal bcom pa drang srong che// ston pas mu stegs lung bstan bka' stsal pa// de thos
242b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas lhar bcas 'jig rten rnams// yi rangs gyur cing stobs kyang skyes par gyur// mu stegs can lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// /
242b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'khor dang bcas pas lha ma yin rnams dang / nam mkha' lding rnams nas/ kun tu rgyu rnams kyi bar gyi lung bstan pa thos nas/ 'di snyam du sems par
242b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis legs par gsungs pas/ 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byas pa ni ngo mtshar to snyam nas/ de'ang bu la chags pas kun tu dkris par gyur/
242b7(dkon brtsegs): to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po zas gtsang ma'i sems thugs su chud nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma la bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po khyod la
243a1(dkon brtsegs): tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge babar du dge ba mtha' mar dge ba/ don bzang po tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/
243a2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa/ yongs su byang ba'i chos 'di lta ste/ khams drug rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs bshad kyi de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang ngas
243a3(dkon brtsegs): bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/ rgyal po zas gtsang ma bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang / de la bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
243a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po khams drug rnam par dbye ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam zangs de gang zhe na/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu gang zag 'di ni khams drug pa/ reg pa'i skye mched drug pa yid kyi nye
243a5(dkon brtsegs): bar spyod pa bco brgyad pa ste ga skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa zhes gang smras pa de ci las brtan te smra she na/ rgyal po chen po khams drug ni 'di dag go/ drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
243a6(dkon brtsegs): sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams so// rgyal po chen po de dag ni khams drub
243a7(dkon brtsegs): ste skyes bu 'di ni khams drug pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te smras so// skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched drug pa'o zhes gang smras pa de ci las brten te smras shan/
243b1(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po chen po rab pa'i skye mched drug ni 'di dag ste/ drug gang zhe napa gzugs rnams la lta ba'i phyir mog gi rig pa'i skye mched dang / sgra rnams la nyan pa'i phyir rna ba'i rab pa
243b2(dkon brtsegs): skye mched dang / dri rnams la snom pa'i phyir sna'i reg pa'i skye mched dang / ro rnams la myang ba'i phyir lce'i reg pa'i skye mched dang / reg bya rnams la reg pa'i phyir lus kyi reg
243b3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i skye mched dang / chos rnams rnam par shes pa'i phyir yid kyi reg pa'i skye mched do// rgyal po chen po de dag ni reg pa'i skye mched drug ste/ skyes bu 'di ni reg pa'i skye mched
243b4(dkon brtsegs): drug pa'o zhes gang ngas smras pa de ni de la brten te smras so// rgyal po chen po skyes bu de ni yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad pa'o zhes gang smras pa de ci las brtan te smras
243b5(dkon brtsegs): she na rgyal po chen po yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad ni 'di dag ste/ bco brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di la mis mig gis gzugs mthong na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang /
243b6(dkon brtsegs): btung snyoms su 'gyur bar gzugs la zhi bar spyod do// rnangs sgra thos na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur bar sprul nye bar spyod do// smras
243b7(dkon brtsegs): dri tshor na yid bde ba dang yod mi bde ba dang oM btang snyoms su 'gyur bar dri la nye bar spyod // ldes ro myong na yong bde ba rang gi yong mo bde ba dang ba tang snyoms su
244a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur bar ro la nye bar spyod do// lus kyis reg bya la reg na yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur bar reg bya la nye bar
244a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod do// yid kyis chos rig na yid bde ba dang / yid ma bde ba dang / btang snyoms su 'gyur bar chos la nye bar spyod do// rgyal po chen po de la gang dag yid ba nga
244a3(dkon brtsegs): zhi bar spyod pa drug dang / gang dag yid bde bar nye bar spyod pa drug dang / gang dag btang snyoms su 'gyur bar nye bar spyod pa drug po de dag gcig tu bsdus na yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco
244a4(dkon brtsegs): brgyad du 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po brgyad po de dag ni yod kyi nye bar spyod pa ste/ rgyal po chen po skyes bu 'di ni yid kyi nye bar spyod pa bco brgyad pa'o zhes gang smras pa de ni de la brten
244a5(dkon brtsegs): te smras so// rgyal po chen po de la sa'i khams ni rnam pa gnyis te/ nang gi'ang yod/ phyi rol gyi'ang yod do// rgyal po chen po de la nang gi sa'i khams gang zhe na gag
244a6(dkon brtsegs): tsa'ang rung sbyi/ lus 'di la nang gi khong nas sra ba dang / mkhrang ba'i rnam pa dang / nye bar gyur pa dang / zin po'o// de'ang glang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skya dang / spu dang /
244a7(dkon brtsegs): mo dang / so dang / rdul dang / dri ma dang / pags pa dang / sha dang / rtsa dang / chu rgyas dang / rus pa dang / kang rang / snying dang / mchin pa dang / zlo ba dang / mkhal ma /
