302a6(dkon brtsegs): de dug gis / rgyal po chen po chos thams cad la 'jug par bya'o// rgyal po chen po gzugs kyi rang bzhin ni ma byung / mi byung / da ltar yang med do// rgyal po chen po de bzhin
302a7(dkon brtsegs): du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ma byung / mi byung ba da ltar yang med do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs brnyan gyi
302b1(dkon brtsegs): bzugs kyi rang bzhin ni mthung / mi byung da ltar yang med do// rgyal po chen po de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes
302b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'du bzhin yang mabyung mi byung da ltar yang med do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na brag cha'i rang bzhin yang mabyung ba mi byung / ru ltar yang med do// de bzhin du brtu
302b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang ma zung ma rdung ba ra ltar yang med do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na smib tu
302b4(dkon brtsegs): rang bzhin nim drung / mi 'byung / ru ltar yang med do// de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin yang mabyung / mau d+hu /
302b5(dkon brtsegs): da ltar yang med do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na dbu ba rdos pa ni snying po med de/ ma byung / mi byung / da ltar yang med do// de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin nas
302b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du ma byung mi byung ra wAr yang med de/ rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na rmi lam gyi yul gyi bzang mo nI ma byung mi byung bar ltar yang
302b7(dkon brtsegs): med do// de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin nas/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du ma rung / mi byung da ltar yang med do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste gdaper mardzi
303a1(dkon brtsegs): lam gyi mo gsham gyi bu'i skye ba ni ma byung / mi 'byung / da ltar yang med do// de bzhin du gzugs kyi rang bzhin nas pa rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin gyi bar du ma byung ga mi
303a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ga da ltar yang med do// rgyal po chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na na mkha' la gnas med do// de bzhin du gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du gnas med do// rgyal po chen po gzugs
303a3(dkon brtsegs): la ni skye ba med do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du skye ba med do// rgyal po chen po gzugs la ni 'gag pa med do// de bzhin du rnam par shes pa'i bar du 'gag pa med do// rgyal po
303a4(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings las skye ba 'am 'gag pa med do// de bzhin du gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la skye ba 'am 'gag pa med do// rgyal po
303a5(dkon brtsegs): chen po 'di lta ste/ dper na chos kyi dbyings la skye ba 'am 'gag pa med do// de bzhin du gzugs nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar la skye ba 'am 'gag pa med do// rgyal po chen po chos 'di dag ni
303a6(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spyod yul lo// byis pa sa so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i spyod yul te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad
303a7(dkon brtsegs): dang thun mong ma yin/ phra ba ma yin// bsnan pa ma yin// thob pa ma yin/ stor ba ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa ma yin/ mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa mayin/
303b1(dkon brtsegs): mngon par shes pa ma yin/ mngon par ma shes pa ma yin/ yongs su shes pa ma yin/ yongs su ma shes pa ma yin/ spangs pa ma yin/ ma spangs pa ma yin/ bsgoms pa ma yin// ma sgoms/
303b2(dkon brtsegs): pa ma yin/ mngon du byas pa ma yin/ mngon du ma byas pa ma yin/ bstan pa ma yin/ ma bstan pa ma yin/ rab tu bstan pa ma yin/ rab tu ma bstan pa ma yin/ bsgrags pa ma yin/ ma
303b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgrags pa ma yin/ thos par byas pa ma yin/ thos par ma byas pa ma yin/ thos pa ma yin/ ma thos pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po gang bsnan par bya ba 'am/
303b4(dkon brtsegs): dbri bar bya ba'i chos de ni mi dmigs te/ rgyal po chen po chos thams cad ni rang bzhin med pa yin gyi/ rgyal po chen po 'di la yid yongs su dga' bar bya zhing / gzhan gyi dring mi 'job
303b5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya'o// de nas rgyal po zas gtsang ma 'di snyam du sems te/ 'di la ni gang rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ba'i chos de gang yang mi ridamigs mod kyi/ 'on kyang dmibs su med pa'i chos
303b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams la ga de bzhin gshegs pas gdags pa bstan to snyam nas/ de'i tshe rgyal po zas btsang ma la sogs pa shAkyang dun khri mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyes so// de nas
303b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis de dag gi lhag pa'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas 'dzum pa mdzad do// 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid de/ gang gi tshe 'dzum pa de'i tshe 'od
304a1(dkon brtsegs): zer kha dog sna tshogs can/ kha dog du ma dang ldan pa dag bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas drung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dag snang bas rgyas par dkang /
304a2(dkon brtsegs): nas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du mngon par 'phags te/ phyir log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tu nub bo// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rta thul stan las langs te/
304a3(dkon brtsegs): rla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsubs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de zhus
304a4(dkon brtsegs): pa 'jig rten rnam par 'dren pa po// dpa' chen khyod kyis 'dzum mdzad pa// 'jig rten snang ba mdzad pa po// 'dzum pa'i 'dzum rgyu bka' stsal gsol// thams cad mkhyen pa 'dren pa po//
304a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyu gang gis ni 'dzum bstan pa// khyod kyis 'gro ba rnams la ston// bdag gi the tsom myur du khum// shAkya'i tshogs kyi don slad du/ bo'u ta mas ni 'dzum pa mdzad// dnga'/
304a6(dkon brtsegs): bo 'gro ba dga' mdzad pa// 'gro ba'i the tsom bsal du gsol// bsam gtan chen po khyod kyis gsungs// thos nas 'gro ba'i the tsom 'chang // mchog tu dga' ba'i yid/
304a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ kun kyang khyod kyi bstan pa thob// rgyal ba'i 'dzum gyi 'phrin las 'di// khyod kyi sras rnams 'tshal gyur na// nan tan gyis ni rab nges shing // shes pas rjes
304b1(dkon brtsegs): su mchi bar 'gyur/ rgyal ba khru mchog khyod kyis ni// 'gro ba'i bcom 'di bsal gsol// 'jig rten the tsom char gyur na// de brgya chen thob par 'gyur/ de skad ces bsol/
304b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rta thul la tshigs su bcad de slar bka' stsal pa/ ngas ni 'dzum zhi bang mdzad pa// rta thul de ni nga la nyon// shAkya rnams
304b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis rmongs pa/ yang dag ji bzhin lung bstan to// chos rnams dmigs su med pa ni/ shAkya rnams kyis yang dag shes// re phyir sangs rgyas chos rnams la// 'di dag yid ni ngas
304b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bzhag pa dmigs su med la brten nas ni// shAkya grabs pa chen po pa// chos rnams kun la nges gyur nas// DA med byang chub thob par 'gyur// shAkya nges pa 'di dag ni/
304b5(dkon brtsegs): mi yi nang nas shi 'phos nas/ bde ba can gyi 'jig rten du/ bong dpab med kyi drung du 'gro// drung chub sems dpa' 'jigs med la/ bde ba can na gnas pa'i tshe// sangs
304b6(dkon brtsegs): rgyas bye bzangs med la// phyogs bcu dab tu mchod byed 'gyur/ mangs pa rnams ni khams gcig na// sangs rgyas bzhugs rnams bsnyen bkur byed// sems can kun la
304b7(dkon brtsegs): phan tshal zhing / byang chub mchog tu smon lam 'debs/ de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod byer cing / zhing nas zhing du rnam par bya/ bang du sangs rgyas 'byung ba yang /
305a1(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul stobs kyis 'dong bar 'gyur// bskul pa bye ba grangs med du// me tog rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod nas// de yi 'og
305a2(dkon brtsegs): tu 'dren par 'gyur// de tshe sangs rgyas re re zhing // sems can khrag khrig mang po dag/ byang chub phyir ni sangs rgyas kyis// sangs rgyas dgongs la 'gro ba 'dul// sangs rgyas kun gyi zhing rnams
305a3(dkon brtsegs): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ston// de na sangs rgyas gang yang na// nyan thos 'dul bar yong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas de dag re re zhing // de na tshe tshar 'gyur ba ni// bye ba grangs med lo
305a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams su// chos ston pa dag gnas par 'gyur// de dag mya ngan yongs 'das nas// byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs med pa// rgyal ba'i sras dag lo grangs ni// bye ba stong du dam chos 'dzin//
305a5(dkon brtsegs): mi dbang sras po de dag kyang // stong pa nyid kyi chos ston pas// sems can bye ba bsam yas dag/ byang chub la ni 'dul bar 'gyur/ bag yod pa yi mi rnams ni// bag yod pa la gnas bcas te//
305a6(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyis chos bstan nas// thams cad mkhyen du nges par 'byung // rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis shAkya yi// bu yi 'gro bstan 'di thos nas// lhar bcas 'jig rten dgar gyur te/ byang
305a7(dkon brtsegs): chub phyir ni yid kyang btang // shAkya lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa / shA ri'i/
305b1(dkon brtsegs): du byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kho na nges par bstan pa 'di/ byang chub sems dpa' mthar phyin pa rnams la bslabs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin 'di ni gang zag med
305b2(dkon brtsegs): paste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pas chos gang yang mi dmigs so// gang mi dmigs pa de ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so// gang mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas pa de ni ma bstan pa
305b3(dkon brtsegs): pang ma bstan pa de ni ma shes pa'o// gang ma shes pa de ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bstan pa ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
305b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos kyi rnga chen po yin gyi/ ci nas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di gzung ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bya bar
305b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di shA ri'i bu khyod la yongs su gtad do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis bskal pa bcu'i bar du pha rol
305b6(dkon brtsegs): tu phyin pa lnga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar spyad pa bas shA ri'i bu gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di tha na thos par gyur kyang gde nyid de bas
305b7(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// shA ri'i bu gang gis bskal pa bcu'i bar du nyan ma bas/ gang gis sems can gcig cig la 'di bstan na/ de nyid de bas bsod nams chos mang du 'phel/
306a1(dkon brtsegs): lo// gang gis bskal pa bcu'i bar du mnyan te gzhan la bstan pa bas gang gis se gol gtogs pa tsam du 'di bsgoms na ga re nyid re bas bsod nams ches
306a2(dkon brtsegs): mang du 'phel lo// shA ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin re kho na nges par bstan pa 'di nyid la/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams nan tan thams cad kyis gdams par bya'o//
306a3(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di bsgoms pas ni/ myur du mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ shA ri'i bu gang du na
306a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngas lung bstan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs 'di dag thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de kho na nges par bstan pa 'di la
306a5(dkon brtsegs): rab tu gnas pa sha stag go bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang dge slong de dag dang / rgyal po zas gtsang ma dang / brgya
306a6(dkon brtsegs): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/
306a7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsebs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las yab dang sras mjal
306b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i de kho na nges par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste/ 'dus pa bcu drug pa rdzogs so// / rgyu bar gyi mkhan po shI len bo d+hi dang / dzi na maM tra dang / nA na shI la dang /
306b2(dkon brtsegs): zhu chen gyi lo tsa bzhang ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la rang pa/ sh+lo ka bzhi stong lnga ban+d+ha ste/ ram po bcoM lnga'o//
306b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar srid du/ Ar+ya pUR+sha pa ri dr-its+tsha nA ma ma hA yAn sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa bang pos zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / kham pa/
306b4(dkon brtsegs): dang // / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khang 'od ma'i tshal na//
306b5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po mang po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po grangs med tshad med pa rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhubs te/ de nas tshe dang ldan
306b6(dkon brtsegs): dra mas ma'i du gang po stan las langs te/ bA gos drag pa gcig tu bzar te / pus mo g.yas pa'i lpang sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar te/
306b7(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi zhu ba cung zad tsag mchis na de bzhin gshegs pas thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ rjes su gnang bar mdzad
307a1(dkon brtsegs): du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bums ma'i du gang po khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shib dang / ngas yang dag par bstan nas khyod kyi sems rangs par
307a2(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang bdag ni yon tan mchog mngon par bsgrubs pas/ grags pa shin tu mtho zhing rgyang ring ba/ rtag par sems can gyi bde
307a3(dkon brtsegs): ra yongs su gnyer bar bgyid pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi slad du zhu ba mchis lags so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dums ma'i bu gang pos tshigs su bcad de
307a4(dkon brtsegs): bsol pa/ yon tan mchog ni rab bsgrubs nas// grags pa mtho zhing rgyang ring dang // tshul khrims gtsang zhing chos mos pa'i// spyod pa gang lags bdag zhu lags// ji ltar sems
307a5(dkon brtsegs): ni sbyongs par bgyi// ji ltar sbyin pa rgya chen gtang // ji ltar sems can rab sgrol cing // dga' sems rtag tu lam sgom lags// yang bcom ldan 'das la/ byams ma'i bu gang pos
307a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni skyes bu dam pa de dag gi slad du dngos po de lta bu dag zhu ba lags na/ byang chub sems dpas ji ltar mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bsags
307a7(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur lags/ ji ltar mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas chos rnams la nges pa'i don thos pas/ tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud
307b1(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur ba lags/ de nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ji ltar drang chub sems dpa' rnams// mang thos rgya mtsho lta bu tshol// chos la nges pa'i ngor thos nas// drang chub la
307b2(dkon brtsegs): ni legs rtogs 'gyur// ji lta bur na tshob gcig gis// tshad med don ni rab rtogs te// 'di ltar shes rab stobs rab gis// chos rnams thams cad rtogs 'gyur lags/
307b3(dkon brtsegs): mang thos mthar thug ma mchis pas// rgol ba mchis kyang sems mi g.yo/ snying brtse sdud du chos bstan nas// sems can the tsom gcod dgyir labs/ @
307b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das deng bdag ni sa'i rjes su 'brang ba'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu ba
307b5(dkon brtsegs): bsol ba lags na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su ldog par mi 'gyur lags/ de nas yang
307b6(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ ji ltar maM khom yongs spangs nas// sangs rgyas mang po phrar 'gyur lags// sangs rgyas mang po mthong nas kyang / shin tu dang ba myur 'thob lags/
307b7(dkon brtsegs): bla med rang ba thob gyur nas// shin tu gtong dka' gtong bar 'gyur/ thams cad yongs su btang nas kyang / stobs kyis thobs med lam spyod lags// ji ltar rab 'byung mos
308a1(dkon brtsegs): gyur nas// dben gnas stong pa'i ye shes bsgom// ji ltar chos dang 'gal mi bgyid// dngos po 'di ni bkas bshad gsol/
308a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa dums ma'i bu gang pos yang gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mkhyen pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / rdzu 'dral
308a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / khams gsum na mchog tu gyur pas/ dpe zla ma mchis pa'i ye shes chen po gya nom pa brnyes nas/ chos rnams la spyod pa thogs pa mi mnga' bar
308a4(dkon brtsegs): khong du chud pas na/ de'i slad du deng bdag dngos po 'di dag zhu ba ladaso// de nas yang tshigs su bcad de gsol ra / bcom ldan yon tan mchog bzhugs pas/ rdzu 'phrul pha rol rab tu byon//
308a5(dkon brtsegs): thogs pa mi mnga' mkhyen brnyes pas// dpa' bo khyod la bdag zhu lags// chos rnams thams cad legs spangs pas// yon tan mtho zhing mngon par 'phags// mun
308a6(dkon brtsegs): bcom shes rab snang bskyed pas// 'khor mang thams cad dga' bar mdzad// dgra zun byams sdang mi mnga' zhing // mya ngan mi mnga' sku mi mnga'// 'chi b.rab las ni rab
308a7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal zhing // bidud dpung dag ni pham par mdzad// mtshon cha thogs pa mi mnga' bar// rab rnams thams cad pham par mdzad// rtag par byams pa'i thugs ldan zhing
308b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims rnam dag brtan par gnas// bcom ldan gso smram mnga' zhing // rargyal mi mnga' dregs mi mnga'// rnam grol rig pa brnyes pas na// yon tan kun gyi mchog
308b2(dkon brtsegs): tu gyur// ji ltar sngon ni lam sbyar nas// mkhyen pa mchog ni brnyes pa dang // ji ltar sbyar nas sangs rgyas pa/ ngarabag la der ni bkas bshang gsol/
308b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la bka' stsal pa/ khyod kyis ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa la dngos po de lta bu dag zhus pa legs so lebs
308b4(dkon brtsegs): so// shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang // ngas khyod la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed nas/ ji ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos tshad med pa
308b5(dkon brtsegs): thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa yang dag par spyan par bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ ngas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams//
308b6(dkon brtsegs): dang po byang chub sems bskyod nas/ rab tu brtson pa'i stobs dag gis// byang chub lam spyang bshad par bya// byang chub sems dpas spyad pa yi// ldab pa'i bsam pa sna tshogs
308b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis// sangs rgyas lung ni bstan gyur pa// dngos po de rab mdor bstan to// lhag pa'i bsam pas chos mos sems// tshad med mtha' yang yang ma yin// spyod pa sna
309a1(dkon brtsegs): tshegs ston byed pa// dngos po gcig gis 'grub mi 'gyur// dga' sems dang ni rab rgyas pas// sbyin pa dag ni gtong bar byed// sbyin pa gtong yang 'gyod med pas/
309a2(dkon brtsegs): de yi sems ni dga' bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du// sems can rtag tu rgud pas na// mang du thos pa'i nor mi ldan// bdag gis btsal bya snyam du sems// sems can
309a3(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu chud pa yang // le lo'i dbang du gyur pas na// bdag gis brtson 'grus rab bskyed de// byang chub 'thob bu snyam du sems/ bdag gis sems can ched du ni// yid bzhin
309a4(dkon brtsegs): pa rab bskyed de// tshig ngan sma 'bebs brdegs gyur kyang // lan yang mi smra snyam du sems// bdag la sma 'bebs su zhig yin/ sma 'bebs dmigs par mi 'gyur bas// sma
309a5(dkon brtsegs): 'bebs khong khro byed pa yin// dngos po thams cad stong snyam sems// de ltar yid la sems pa na// sems la khong khro kho na 'dzin med// rtag tu bzod pa bsgoms pas na// des na
309a6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par 'chang yang rtsa// sems can dab sems med pa la// 'jig rten sgron ma byas nas ni// mgon dang skyabs ni dring bas na// nor mang nor dang ldan par byed// sems can
309a7(dkon brtsegs): lam log spyod pa ni// de dag snying brtse'i gnas yin pas// bdag gis yongs su bzlas nas ni// mya ngan 'das la gzhag snyam sems// sems can thams cad rgud pas na// shes
309b1(dkon brtsegs): rab nor dang yong ma ldan/ rang bas thams cad margyan thob nas// de dag tshim par du snyam sams// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ sems can 'ongs su bzla ba'i phyir/
309b2(dkon brtsegs): sems bskyed byang chub 'tshal bas na// de 'dra'i smon lam 'debs par rnyed / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa du mas ma'i du bang po la dka' stsal pa/ rlung
309b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rgyu rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams la chos ston par byed kyang / chos 'ba' tsam la'ang gnas par mi byed do// de ci'i 'byor zhe/
309b4(dkon brtsegs): na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos thams cad yang dab par bslabs nas/ de'i 'og tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas so// byang chub sems dpa' ni ngo mtshar rmad du drung
309b5(dkon brtsegs): nga'i dngos po rnam pa bzhi dang ldan pas/ chos gzhan gang yang dngos po 'di las lhag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can le lo can rnams
309b6(dkon brtsegs): pa/ brtson 'grus rtsom par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po dang po zhes bya'o// khong khro ba'i sems can nan po che de dag gi nang na bzod pa sgom par byed pa gang yin pa
309b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po gnyis pa zhes bya'o// sems can lam log pa la spyod pa dag mthong nas bdag nyid yang dag pa'i lam la brtson par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar
310a1(dkon brtsegs): rmad du rung ba'i dngos po bsum pa zhes bya'o// sems can 'khor ba las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir lhag pa'i bsam pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
310a2(dkon brtsegs): tu sems skyed par byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bzhi pa zhes bya ste/ gang po ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung
310a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i dngos po mchog ces bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can la lo can mthong na// brtson 'grus sems ni skyed byed pas// bdag
310a4(dkon brtsegs): gis de la chos min pa'i// dngos po bstan snyam yong mi sems// khong khro ston par mi byed de// khong khro sangs rgyas lam min zhes// rtag tu byams sems bsgoms pas na/
310a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub de las skye bar 'gyur// sems can lam log mos pas na// log pa'i lam la gnas par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag lam// btsal nas sems can 'god par byed/
310a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor ba'i zhes dmigs mthong bas na// rtse gcig sangs rgyas ye shes 'tshal// bla med gter ni thob gyur nas// sems can bzla bya snyam du sems// rmad byung dngos po 'di dag las// lhag pa
310a7(dkon brtsegs): gzhan ni su yang med// de lta bas na thobs med chos// 'thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya// lus kyi bos ni tshig pa dang // mgo thong me ni 'bar ba bzhin// la lo'i sems ni skyes gyur na/ myur/
310b1(dkon brtsegs): ba zhid du sel bar byed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ dga' ba'i sems bskyed par 'gyur ro// bzhi pang zhe na/ sem
310b2(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ni 'khor ba na gnas shing // brtson 'grus mi rtsom par mthong la/ bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi lam la gnas nas brtson 'grus rtsom par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
310b3(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni rtag par le lo can du gyur par mthong la/ bdag nyid ni sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la gnas nas brtson 'grus rtsom par mthong bas dpa' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sems
310b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams ni khong khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog can du gyur par mthong la/ bdag nyid ni khong khro ba dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / phrag dog med cing rtag par byams pa'i sems dang
310b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par bsgrub par brtson par gzhan su'ang bdag dang mtshungs pa med par mthong bas dga' ba'i sems skye
310b6(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ sems can le lo than mthong na// bdag nyid brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas// de phyir/
310b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' des// bdag nyid dpa' sems 'thob par 'gyur// 'khor ba'i nyes dmigs mthong bas na// skyo ba'i sems ni rab tu skye// khams gsum btson ra 'jigs pas
311a1(dkon brtsegs): na/ brtson pa'i sems kyis spong bar byed// sems can khong khro 'on 'dzin dga'// bdag nyid byams sems gnas pas na// de phyir byang chub sems dpa'
311a2(dkon brtsegs): de/ dga' ba'i sems ni skye bar 'gyur// sems can rnams kyis gang byas pa// de dag thams cad mi bya bar// de phyir bdag gis bla med pa'i// sangs rgyas lam ni btsal snyam
311a3(dkon brtsegs): sems// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yis// yang dag ye shes gang yin pa// bdag gis ye shes re bslabs nas// sems can kun gyi skyabs bya sems// de phyir
311a4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' re// rtag tu dga' sems skye bas na// 'dus bus mi bden dag las ni// yang dang chos ni skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
311a5(dkon brtsegs): pa/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// mi rim pa rnams dang bral te ga dal ba phun sum tshogs pa thob nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos mngon par bsgrub pa chung ba bar mi 'gyur
311a6(dkon brtsegs): ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' de ni sems dman zhing shin tu mnyen pas na/ sems can dag mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe/ rtag par bde bar 'ongs sam zhes mdangs dang ldan
311a7(dkon brtsegs): pas gsod por smra zhing / phan tshun tshig sbyin par byed pas/ rtag par 'dzum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sems rtse gcig tu chos gnyer zhing rtag par dri rtog la rab tu mos pas na/ dge ba'i don
311b1(dkon brtsegs): tshol zhing brtson pa la cho ba shes pa med pa yin/ dben pa'i gnas la mos shing gcig du 'dug pa la dpa' ba yin // bdag nyid byang chub kyi 'amal banas shing sems can gzhan yang byang chub rtsa
311b2(dkon brtsegs): lam la gnas par 'dzud pa yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ mi khom pa rnams dang bral te/ dal ba phun sum tshabs par thob nas/ sangs rgyas
311b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi chos mngon par bsgrub pa chung za bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mnyen pa'i sems dang rang ldan zhing // rtab par byams
311b4(dkon brtsegs): sems bsgoms pas ni// sems can dag dang smra ba'i tshe// sems can gsong por smra bar byed// rtag tu sangs rgyas bsdabs pa yi// zab mo gya no mchos kyang 'tshal// rtag
311b5(dkon brtsegs): par tshul khrims gtsang srung zhing // sbyangs pa'i sgo de la mos pa yin// sbyangs pa'i chos la rab gnas kyang // shes rab zang mos spyod pas na// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// mi
311b6(dkon brtsegs): 'o ma rang spangs dal dang ldan// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams la ni// chos zab rnams ni zhu byed pas// de phyir shes rab 'phel gyur nas// mi khom panas su skye mi 'gyur// rtag par
311b7(dkon brtsegs): dgon par gnas mos shing // rnam dag sbyangs pa spyod pas na// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de// mi 'o ma rab spangs khom dang ldan// rlo ldan mkhas pa gang dag gis// chos 'di bzhi
312a1(dkon brtsegs): la rten byed na// mi kho ma thams cad rab spangs nas// sangs rgyas mang po mthong bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mang po mthong nas kyang // mi 'jibs dang rang
312a2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pas na// brtson 'grus mchog ni rab bskyed nas// sangs rgyas ye shes 'tshal bar 'gyur// de phyir ye shes gnyer ba dag/ yang dag chos ni bslab par bya// yang dag chos ni
312a3(dkon brtsegs): bslabs gyur na/ byang chub lam ni thob mi dka'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po byang chub
312a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ mang du thos pa rgya chen po lta bur bsags pa yin pas/ yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing // rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas/
312a5(dkon brtsegs): chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas/ tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos yongs su 'tshol bar byed pas// gsung
312a6(dkon brtsegs): rab yan lag bcu gnyis po 'di lta ste/ mdo'i sde dang // dbyangs kyis bskyed pa'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i sna dang / tshogs su bcad pa'i sde dang / ched du brjod pa'i sde dang / nga
312a7(dkon brtsegs): bzhi'i sde dang / de lta bu drung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rabs kyi sde dang / shin tu rgyas pa'i sde dang / rmad du byung ba'i chos kyi sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde dang / gtan la phab
312b1(dkon brtsegs): par bstan pa'i sde rnams yongs su 'tshol bar byed de/ yongs su btsal nas kyang klog cing kha ton du 'don par byed/ klog cing la ton du bton nas kyang yang dag par rjes su dran par byeng / yang
312b2(dkon brtsegs): rag par rjes su dran par byas nas kyang ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par sgrub par byed de/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur na// mang du thos pa rgya
312b3(dkon brtsegs): mtsho chen po lta bur bsags pa yin pas/ yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing rtab par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas/ chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas tshig gi
312b4(dkon brtsegs): do rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad la gnas pa med pas/ bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag
312b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang gnas par bya ba med do// gnas pa med pa'i phyir chos rnams la gnas pa med pa'i ye shes 'thob par 'gyur ro// gnas pa med pa'i ye shes thob pas chos rnams la thogs pa med/
312b6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i ye shes dang mthong ba thob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po 'dod chags shing thogs par bya ba'i chos gang yang med pa'i phyir te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis
312b7(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ mang du thos pa rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bsags pa yin pas/ yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par mang du thos pa'i gtor rin po che bsags nas/ chos rnams
313a1(dkon brtsegs): la nges pa'i don thob pas/ tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni chos yongs su gnyer ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis
313a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dran par byed do// des chos kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / sangs rgyas kyi chos rjes su dran par gyur pas na/
313a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags par bya ba'i chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // des 'dod chags pa med pa'i phyir// chos thams cad la sems kyis mngon par zhen pa med do// des chos thams
313a4(dkon brtsegs): cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir/ dris pa rnams kyi rjes su lan 'debs pa la thogs pa med par 'gyur te// byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bsum po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ mang du thos
313a5(dkon brtsegs): pa rgya mtsho chen po lta ngur bsags pa yin pas/ yongs su btugs par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che bsags nas/ chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas/
313a6(dkon brtsegs): tshig gi don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni dmigs pa med pa'i dums pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pas/ spyod pa dag la thogs pa med
313a7(dkon brtsegs): de/ dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa ni dngos po rnams mi len pa gang yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po gang mtshan ma 'di la gnas par gyur na yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang
313b1(dkon brtsegs): gti mug skyed par byed la/ gang mtshan ma de la gnas par gyur na yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mub skyed par byed pas so// dngos po'i mtshan ma 'am/ rdzas kyi mtshan ma 'am/
313b2(dkon brtsegs): phung po'i mtshan ma 'am ka skye mched kyi mtshan ma 'am/ khams kyi mtshan ma 'am/ chos kyi mtshan ma 'am/ chos ma yin pa'i mtshan ma la gnas par gyur na yang 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
313b3(dkon brtsegs): gti mug skyed par byed pas ka de'i phyir gang po ji tsam du len pa'i mtshan ma dang bcas pa de dag thams cad ni log par lta ba zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni mtshan ma de dag thams cad nye bar ni
313b4(dkon brtsegs): bar bya ba'i ched du byams pa'i sems sgom par byed pas/ sems can 'jig pa'i phyir dang / mtshan ma 'jig pa'i phyir dngos po'ang 'jig pa nyid do// dngos po 'jig pa'i phyir lta ba'ang 'jig
313b5(dkon brtsegs): pa nyid do// zhes byang chub sems dpas de'i tshe/ chos thams cad rnam pa ra ba shig nas byams pa sgom par byed de/ de lta bu'i byams pa gang yin pa 'di ni dmigs pa med pa'i byams pa zhes
313b6(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// de lta bu'i dmibs pa med pa'i byams pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dums pa zhes bya'o// de lta bu'i chos kyi byams pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi byams pa zhes bya'o// gang po
313b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi byams pa gang zhe na/ mngon par 'du byed pa med cing 'jog pa med pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi bums pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang po yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos
314a1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rab tu rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi byams pa zhes bya'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bgyis na yang dab pa ji lta ba bzhin chos thams cad rab tu rtog pa
314a2(dkon brtsegs): zhes bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bang po rab tu rtogs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni chos so zhe 'am/ 'di ni chos ma yin no zhes sems par mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bang po gal
314a3(dkon brtsegs): te chos yod do zhes zer na/ de ni chos ma yin pa yin pas/ gal te chos med par gyur na chos ma yin pa'ang med par 'gyur bas/ de la spros pa ci'ang med pas so// spros pa med pa gang yin pa de ni
314a4(dkon brtsegs): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/ khyod kyi de ltar rab tu brtags na de shin tu thag ring ba zhig yin nam 'on te shin tu thag nye ba zhig yin// gang pos gsol pa/ de ni thab ring ba'ang ma lags la/
314a5(dkon brtsegs): thags nye ba'ang lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i don de la ni phyobs kyang ma mchis/ gnas kyang ma mchis/ nang zhes bgyi ba'ang ma mchis/ phyi zhes dbyi ba'angam
314a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis pas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du bang po khyod kyis chos rnams grangs su bgrang bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das chos ji lta bu zhig la grangs su bgrang bar bgyi lags/ gang ngo po/
314a7(dkon brtsegs): ji tsam du dris pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par zhen par bya ba'i chos de dag ni/ de bzhin gshegs pas dmigs par mi mdzad/ bsgrub par mi mdzad/ mngon du mi mdzad do zhes de lta bu'i chos
314b1(dkon brtsegs): mi rtog pa gang yin pa de ni grangs su bzang ba zhes bu'o// gang po chos rnams kyi grangs de dag na chos rab tu rnam par 'byung ba ma yin pa'i phyir/ gang po dang myod la 'di ltar rab tu dben pa'i chos mcho
314b2(dkon brtsegs): dam pa sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs su sdud par gyur pa bshad par bya'o// gang po ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten pa'i rnyed pa la gdub dag/ gal te mdo sde 'di thos par gyur na/ mnyan pa rang
314b3(dkon brtsegs): len par mos par mi 'gyur ro// bang po ngas byang chub ces brjod pa'i tsho ba 'di khyod kyis sgra dang tshig tsam du phyogs cung zad cig rtogs par gyur par zad kyi/ de'i don gyi tshul ni khyod kyis
314b4(dkon brtsegs): shes par mi nus so// don 'di ni shin tu zab pas tshig gis brjod par bya ba ma yin gyi/ mkhas pa dag gis rang gis rig par bya ba yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
314b5(dkon brtsegs): bcad de bka' stsal pa/ gang gis don ni mi rtogs pa// sangs rgyas chos la mya ngan skye// gal te don ni rig gyur nas// sangs rgyas de la ston par mdzad// sangs rgyas ston par dang /
314b6(dkon brtsegs): sems pa// de ni mya ngan 'das gnyer bas// 'thab rtsod sems ni med par yang / yang dag chos ni sems par byed// 'di la chos skye yod pa min// 'bab pa'i chos kyang yod min te/
314b7(dkon brtsegs): skye dang 'gab pa med gyur pa// de ni chos rnams yang rab mtshan// chos gang skye ba med pa la// byed dang 'byung ba'ang yod mi 'gyur// yin dang ma yin tha dad gcig/ chos 'di la ni de dag
315a1(dkon brtsegs): med// de ni mya ngan 'das yin te// de ni 'gag par bya ba med// zag ni nyi ring bang zer ba// de dag gnyis ka stong pa yin// gang zhig stong par rtogs gyur pa/
315a2(dkon brtsegs): de ni mya ngan 'das shes yin// mya ngan 'das pa gang shes pa// nga yi slob ma zhes bya'o// bang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ mang du thos pa
315a3(dkon brtsegs): rgya mtsho chen po lta bur bsags pa yin pas/ yongs su gtugs par mi 'gyur zhing / rtag par mang du thos pa'i gter rin po che sags nas/ chos rnams la nges pa'i don thob pas/ chog gi
315a4(dkon brtsegs): don rnams legs par khong du chud par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rtag tu mang thos gnyer 'dod pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags
315a5(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur zhing // yang dag nges don thob 'gyur bas// de phyir rgya mtsho ltar bur 'gyur// yi ge 'bru ni gcig pu dang // tshig gi don ni gcig tsam yang // bskal pa bye ba brgya stong du// brjod kyang
315a6(dkon brtsegs): zad par mi 'gyur ro// de phyir yang dag chos banyer bya// gnyer nas tshul bzhin bsam bya yi// chos kyi mtshan nyid mi blang zhing // sangs rgyas bsngags la zhen mo d+ha// de bzhin gshegs
315a7(dkon brtsegs): brjes dran zhing // yang dag chos ni dran par bya// 'dod chags rtsod med sems kyis ni/ 'dren pa yongs su btsal bar bya// rtag par sems can rnams la ni// byams pan
315b1(dkon brtsegs): sems ni bsgom par bya// sems can rnams la zhen med par// chos rnams thams cad zhi bar rgyu// drang chub sems dpa' brags chen gyis// 'di 'dra'i chos ni sgyu ba byed na/
315b2(dkon brtsegs): du gzungs ni 'thob 'gyur bas/ mang du thos pa de las skye// ji ltar nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid// 'phel zhing 'grib pa med pa ltar// chos nyid kyang ni de bzhin te// 'phel du med cing 'grib pa med
315b3(dkon brtsegs): ngas ni shes rab stobs dag gis// bskal pa tshad med grangs med du// chos rnams yongs su bshad gyur kyang // 'on kyang bshad pa zhes mi brjod// sems can nyid ni ji snyed pa// thams
315b4(dkon brtsegs): car mi lus thob gyur te// kun kyang rab tu byung nas ni// mang zos kun dga' bzhin gyur kyang // gzungs thob byang chub sems dpa' yis// sems can de dag thams cad la// bskal pa
315b5(dkon brtsegs): bye bar chos bshad kyang // de yi shes rab gtugs mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas mkhyen pa mtshungs med pas// nam mkha' 'dra bar tshad kyang med// nam mkha' skye 'byung med pa ltar// mkhyen pa
315b6(dkon brtsegs): yang ni de bzhin no// klu yis chu ni ma blangs par// char chen dag ni 'bebs byed pa// chu de la ni gnas med kyang // char 'bebs pa la mthar thug med// byang chub sems dpa'ang de bzhin du//
315b7(dkon brtsegs): gzungs 'di thob par gyur pa na// chos rnams la ni gnas med kyang // rkyen de bshar na zad mi 'gyur// de phyir mang thos btsal bar bya// btsal nas tshul bzhin gnas bya ste// chos
316a1(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rjes dran na// mang du thos pa de las skye/ khums pas sems can kun chub ste// sems can mtshan ma zhi byed cing // chos kyi mtshan ma'ang zhi byed na/
316a2(dkon brtsegs): mang du thos pa de las skye// mang du thos pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/
316a3(dkon brtsegs): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par gyur na/ don gyi tshul rab tu sems par byed
316a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'di ma yin no zhes smra bar mi byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur nabla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de nas/
316a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ bdag gi yid dang mi 'gal ba'i// ma thos chos ni thos gyur na// don gyi tshul ni sems byed kyi// chos min zhes ni
316a6(dkon brtsegs): smra mi byed// gal te stong pa'i chos thos na// rtag tu don tshul 'tshol byed pas// de phyir shes rab 'phel 'gyur zhing / byang chub lam ni de nas skye// ma thos chos ni thos gyur
316a7(dkon brtsegs): na// don gyi tshul ni 'tshol byed pas// byang chub las ni mi ldog cing // shes rab dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// mthos chos ni zos gyur na// nga rgyal ngan pa'i sems mi 'brang //
316b1(dkon brtsegs): g.yo sgyu dag kyang skyed mi byed// g.yo skyed pa ni byang chub min// mthos chos ni thos gyur na// re yi don ni 'tshol byed pas// sngon chad thos par ma gyur kyang // rtse gcig tu ni sems
316b2(dkon brtsegs): par byed// gang zag des ni chos thos tshe// yang dag chos ni thos 'gyur zhing // rtag par sangs rgyas mang mthong bas// byang chub las ni ldog mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas mang po mthong
316b3(dkon brtsegs): nas kyang // tshul bzhin zhu ba zhu byed pas// nyan thos dag gis thos na yang // thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur// 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad ldan pas// 'di 'dra'i zhu ba zhu bar byed/
316b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag cag bsam pa'ang yod min na// dngos po 'di thos ci smos zer// nyan thos ngo mtshar brjod pas na// lha klu thams cad dga' 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas bsngags pa brjod 'gyur
316b5(dkon brtsegs): ba 'di ni mang thos 'bras bu yin// zhu ba gang yod zhus pa'i tshe// sangs rgyas de bzhin lan 'debs pas// 'khor 'dus mang po tshad med pa// thams cad phan pa che thong 'gyur//
316b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpas lan 'debs pa// mang thos 'di ni thos gyur na// 'khor mang tshad med thams cad kyis// bla med chos mig thob par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das
316b7(dkon brtsegs): kyis bka' stsa la pa/ gang po rgyu dang rkyen des na byang chub sems dpas sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par gyur pa na/ mngon par yid ches pas dang du len cing / 'gal ba med pa'i sems kyis tshul bzhin du
317a1(dkon brtsegs): bsams nas/ 'di ni ma yin no zhes smra bar mi byed na/ des sems can char med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o// gang po sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa zangs
317a2(dkon brtsegs): med/ tshar med/ dpag tu med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ying ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/
317a3(dkon brtsegs): bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa// bla na med pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po
317a4(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba byung ste/ glang po bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag brgyad cu thub par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de'i 'khor 'dus pa re re
317a5(dkon brtsegs): la'ang nyan thos kyi dge 'dun pad+hA'i klung brjod kyis mi lang ba'i bye ma snyed chos rnams la len pa med cing zab pa zad nas/ sems rnam par grol ba'i dgra bcom pa gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par
317a6(dkon brtsegs): grol ba'i sha stag byung ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi grangs kyang de bzhin no// gang po bcom ldan 'das de mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos ni lo drug khrir gnas par gyur to//
317a7(dkon brtsegs): de yongs su mya ngan las 'das su nye ba'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' dre ba brgya phrag mang po thams cad rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir// 'dzam bu'i gling bye ba brgya phrag mang po kun tu/
317b1(dkon brtsegs): khyab par gyur pas/ 'dzam bu'i gling re re na'ang byang chub sems dpa' re re gnas par gyur to// gang po bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po yongs su mya ngan las 'das
317b2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'og tu de'i nyan thos rnams khad kyis le lo dang sbom las can du gyur pas 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo dag kha ton du 'don cing / yongs su 'dzin pa med par gyur pas/ chos rnams spyong pa
317b3(dkon brtsegs): nyid dang ldan pa'i mdo sde dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag cing spungs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa'i mdo sde thams cad kyang mthar gyis nub par gyur te/ de dag gis klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang /
317b4(dkon brtsegs): rnam par bshad pa ma byas pa'i phyir/ de'i bstan pa las chos kyi sde snod shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba brgyad khri bzhi stong yod la/ chos kyi sde snod re re la'ang mdo sngo bye ba khrab khrig brgya stong phrag
317b5(dkon brtsegs): drug cu rtsa brgyad yod do// mdo'i ste re re la'ang ched du brjod pa'i sde sum khri drug brgya yod do// ched du brjod pa'i sde re re la'ang tshigs su bcad pa bye ba phrab drug khri bdun brgya yod do//
317b6(dkon brtsegs): po de'i tshe de'i dus mtha' ma la dam pa'i chos nub tu nye ba na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sde snod mang po de dag las/ mdo'i sde dang ched du brjod pa'i sde 'ba' zhig lus par gyur to// de'i tshe chos
317b7(dkon brtsegs): smra ba'i dge slong mthu bo che zhes bya ba zhig yod de// 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir re bzhin gshegs pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus dam pa'i chos bsrung ba'i phyir/ chos smra ba/ mthu chen thob pa mang du
318a1(dkon brtsegs): thos shing rgya che/ chos legs par ston pa/ tshig gi rgyan dang ldan pa/ don gyi tshul gsal bar rtogs pa des// rtag par sngon ma thos pa'i chos bsgrags pa la mos par
318a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// des chos bsgrags par gyur pa na/ skye bo mang po phal cher skur pa 'debs shing 'gal bar byas par gyur pas/ chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob pa de 'di snyam du 'di ltar skye bo mang po
318a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos par gyur kyang / mngon par yid mi ches pas mnyan pa dang len par mos pa'ang med la/ gal te thos par gyur na'ang khong du mi chud pas rjes su 'brang bar mi byed
318a4(dkon brtsegs): cing // 'gal bar byas nas skyon 'byin par byed pas 'di skad du 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' yang ma yin la/ ston pa chen po'i stan pa'ang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bad ga cag gis sngon char nam
318a5(dkon brtsegs): yang slob dpon dang mkhan po las 'di lta bu'i mdo sde ma thos la/ gzhan yang dge slong gnas brtan rgan rabs gang yang slob dpon dang mkhan po las 'di lta bu brgyud de thos par mi smra bas so// zhes dge/
318a6(dkon brtsegs): slong mang po de skad kyang zer la/ mdo'i sde dang ched du brjod pa'i sde tsam las ma lus pas deng bdag ci'i phyir gcig pu banas dben par mi 'gro snyam mo// bang po chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob
318a7(dkon brtsegs): ba de re snyam du bsams nas gcig pu ri phug dben par gnas par gyur to// de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na bskal pa chags tshun char grong khyer chen po chur dpa'i tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ zheng du dpag tshad bdun yod cing rab
318b1(dkon brtsegs): tu mdzes par byas pa/ lam srang rnams zad kar 'bab pa/ skye bo mang pos gang ba/ lo legs shing bde bar gyur pa drug khri brgyad stong yod par gyur to// de'i 'og tu phyis yang grong khyer chung ngu kha cig
318b2(dkon brtsegs): ni dpas tshad bdun yod pa/ kha cig dpag tshad drug dang / lnga dang / bzhi dang / gsum dang / gnyis yod pa// nang gi chung ba'i tshad kyang dpa' tshad gcig yod pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi byas par gyur te/
318b3(dkon brtsegs): gang po de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling na grong khyer chen po rab tu dben pa zhes bya ba na/ khyim bdag sha ni zhes bya ba zhig byung ba de'i bu ni ma ha shu ma ta zhes bya ste/ khyim bdag de'i bu de dben pa na gnas pa
318b4(dkon brtsegs): las/ lha zhig 'ongs nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ khyod kyis nan tan chos dag la// btsal nas tshul bzhin soms shig dang // de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgyal// khyod 'tshang
318b5(dkon brtsegs): rgya bar lung bstan to// gang po lde ngas tshigs su bcad pa 'di smras nas mi snang bar gyur to// de nas khyim bdag gi du re ba'i drung du song nas rkang pa' mgo ngos phub byas te/ 'di skad du da na dang /
318b6(dkon brtsegs): tu rlung nas/ bcom ldan 'das yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i bstan pa la tshangs par spyod par 'dong ngo zhes smras pa dang / de nas khyim bdag sha nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ nga yi khyim
318b7(dkon brtsegs): norarin chen mang // bser dngul dag ni tshad kyang med// 'dzam bu'i gling na med pa kun// nga yi khyiman ldan par yod// ngas ni rin chen btsal ba yang // bu 'dod spyod phyir btsal btsal na tsaM phy-ir
319a1(dkon brtsegs): rab tu 'byung byed cing // 'jig rten smod la dga' bar byed// de nas khyim bdag gi bu des tshigs su bcad de pa la smras pa/ bdag ni rtab tu chos 'tshal mos// btsal nas
319a2(dkon brtsegs): yang dag tshul bzhin sems// longs spyod myong bar mi dga' bas// 'jig rten 'dren pa byed par dga'// drim gyi rin chen mi dbos pas// bad ba ni 'dod pa nyung la mos// chos kyi gter ni drung
319a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir// rab tu 'byung bar mos pa yin// sangs rgyas 'byung bar rab tu dkon// chos bstan pa yang rab tu dkon// deng bdag sangs rgyas bstan phrang na// ci yi phyir na gtang bar bya
319a4(dkon brtsegs): gang po denas khyim bdag gi bu nges pa'i rkang pa la phyag byas te/ bskor ba byas nas phyir byung ste/ 'gro ba'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// pa ni bye ba 'dum yod cing // ma ni bye ba brgya yod
319a5(dkon brtsegs): kyang // deng bdag rab tu 'byung ba'i sems// gang gis kyang ni bzlob mi nus// rang bdag lus srog pha ma dang // gnyen 'dab kun ni rab spangs nas// sangs rgyas chos ni mi spong bar// rang
319a6(dkon brtsegs): zung spyod pa gzer bar byed// glang po de'i tshe khyim bdag gi bu dus tshigs su bcang ba 'di dag smras nas/ rab tu byung bar gyur te/ chos smra ba'i dge slong mthu chen thob pa ga la ba der song nas/ chos mnyan
319a7(dkon brtsegs): pa ga'ar bar gyur pa dang / re nas de'i tshe chos smra ba mthu chen thob pas kyang / de la sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to// de nas dge slong ma ha shu ma cas sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde
319b1(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur nas/ chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis 'di lta bu'i mdo sde sngon chad mthos na/ mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di sus ni klog par byed/ sus ni 'don par byed/ sus ni lang
319b2(dkon brtsegs): dag par blangs nas 'dzin par byed/ gnas gang du ni zos par 'gyur// mthu chen thob pas smras pa/ bdag gis sngon gyi tshe rab rjes su dran pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rgyan gyi phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa
319b3(dkon brtsegs): yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthu'i dbang gi phyir/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo rang gi ngang gis sems la gnas par gyur to// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu ma tas
319b4(dkon brtsegs): de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed de/ rjes su bsams pas shes rab kyi mthu skyes pas/ shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa chen po'i stobs kyis chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa
319b5(dkon brtsegs): la dri ba dris pa dang / mthu chen thob pas kyang don gyi rjes su lan yang dag par btab nas/ 'di skad du sngon de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po la dge slong zhib gis dngos
319b6(dkon brtsegs): po 'di dang khyod kyis ji skad dris pa de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de bzhin du yang dag par lan btab pa dge slong des thos par gyur nas shin
319b7(dkon brtsegs): tu dga' bar gyur to zhes smras so// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu ma tas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la yang de skad du dris pa dang / mthu chen thob pas kyang 'di skad du sngon de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams
320a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po la dge slong zhig gis dngos po 'dri dang khyod kyis ji skad dris pa de bzhin du zhus pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang de bzhin du lan yang dag par
320a2(dkon brtsegs): btab pa dge slong des thos nas shin tu dga' bar gyur to zhes smras so// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu ma tas/ chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la 'di skad ces smras so// kye skyes bu dam pa sngon de bzhin
320a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa la zhus pa dang / lan 'debs pa'i dngos po 'di lta bu lan du zhig thos par gyur/ mthu chen thob pas smras pa/ dngos po 'di ni shin tu yid ches par dka' bas/ dngos po 'di ma 'dri bar
320a4(dkon brtsegs): zhog cig/ gzhan yang gang lus kyi chos khyad par du 'phags pa mngon sum du ma byas pa dag gis kyang shin tu yid ches par dka' 'o// de bzhin du lan gnyis 'tsha gsum gyi bar du ma ha shu ma ta sa/ kye skyes
320a5(dkon brtsegs): bu dam pa sngon de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus pa dang / lan 'debs pa'i dngos po 'di lta bu lan du zhig thos par gyur/ mthu chen thob pas smras pa/ dngos po 'di ma 'dri bar zho gcig/ gal te
320a6(dkon brtsegs): khong du ma chud par gyur na/ deng khyod la dpes nye bar mtshon par bya ste/ blo dang ldan pa dang ni dpes nye bar mtshon na rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// dge slong bdag gis de bzhin gshegs
320a7(dkon brtsegs): pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po las sems can gyi rang bzhin thos pa ni sa chen po'i rnam mapas ches mang ngo // dge slong gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
320b1(dkon brtsegs): gyi khams thams cad na yod pa'i sems can gyi rnam pa gzubs can nam/ gzugs can ma yin pa 'am// 'du shes can nam/ 'du shes med pa'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min ji snyed pa
320b2(dkon brtsegs): dag thams cad kyi mi'i lus thob nas shes rab kyi stobs dang ldan par gyur la/ sems can de dab re res kyang yun se gol gtogs pa gcig la pad+ma'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi drib so so nas mi mthun pa dag
320b3(dkon brtsegs): dris par gyuradage slong de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad na sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa gcig las lhag
320b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i bar du dri ba mang po de lta bu dris par gyur/ gzhan yang gang zag gcig gis se gol gtogs pa gcig la gang zag de snyed kyi dri ba tha dad cing mi mthun pa thams cad dris par gyur/ de bzhin du gzhan
320b5(dkon brtsegs): yang gang zag gcig gis sems can ma lus pa mthar thug pa snyed kyi dri ba sna tshogs bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa gcig las lhag pa'i bar du dris par gyur na/ 'di ji snyam du sems
320b6(dkon brtsegs): dri ba de dag ci mang ba yin snyam mam/ smras pa/ re shin tu mang bas dper sla ba'ang ma yin no// mthu chen thob pas dge slong ma ha shu ma ta la smras pa/ bdag gis deng khyod la yang dag
320b7(dkon brtsegs): par smras pa yin gyis the tshom ma za zhig ji ltar sems can ma lus pa de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa gcig gam/ bskal pa gcig las lhag pa'i bar du the tshom dris pa bas bdag gis de
321a1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gshegs pa las chos kyi rnam grangs gcig zos pa'i sgo nas lan btab pa de bas kyang ches mang ngo // de bzhin du chos kyi rnam grangs kyi sgo gnyis dang / gsum dang / ra ni/
321a2(dkon brtsegs): dang / lnga dang / bcu dang nyi shu dang / sum cu dang / bzhi bcu dang / lnga bcu nas brgya dang / stong dang / khri dang / 'bum la sogs pa'i bar du'ang de bzhin te ga dge slong bdag gis mdo tsam
321a3(dkon brtsegs): du bstan na bgrang ba'i ming dang yi ge ji snyed pa thams cad ni tshad med/ mther thug pa med/ bsam gyis mi khyab pas ga grangs de dag las yang dag par 'das par gyur kyang ga bdag gis ma lus par kha ton
321a4(dkon brtsegs): du bton nas yongs su bzung ngo // dge slong dris pa de dag thams cad kyang chos kyi rnam grangs gcig tu 'dus par bdag gis rab tu shes te 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad
321a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal pos yang dag par gsungs pa'i lam gyi tshig dang / sgo'i tshig dang / phyag rgya'i tshig dang / dngos gzhi'i tshig dang / rdo rje lta bu'i tshig dang / rab tu lci ba'i tshig dang / mi g.yo ba'i tshig
321a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / gting dpag dka' ba'i tshig gang yin pa'o// dge slong sgo gcig tu chos thams cad sdud pa ni/ 'di lta ste mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i sgo dang yin pas chos thams cad dang
321a7(dkon brtsegs): tshi ga thams cad kyang sgo des gzhi byed pas/ thams cad sgo der 'jug par 'gyur ro// mdo'i sde dang ched du brjod pa'i sde thams cad kyang sgo der zhugs nas yi ge gcig rnam par phye na sa yi ge
321b1(dkon brtsegs): mang po la 'jug par 'gyur ro// dge slong de bzhin du gzungs kyi sgo bdun khri brgyad stong po thams cad la'ang 'jug par 'gyur te/ re la'ang dbang po rnams kyi bye brag dgu dri nyis stong yod do//
321b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi spyod pa'i sgo nas kyang gzungs kyi kha dog brgyad khri yod de/ lam gyi bye brag gis tha dad pa'i gzugs ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyi ming gang yin pa'ang bdag gis rab tu shes so//
321b3(dkon brtsegs): gzugs de dag re re la ming brgya yod pa dang ka de bzhin du ming nyis brgya dang ming sum brgya yod pa nas/ ming brgya spong du ma yod pa'i bar dag kyang bdag gis rab tu shes so// 'dzam bu'i gling na yod pa nas/
321b4(dkon brtsegs): phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams las 'das pa'i bar dag na yod pa'i dmigs pa tha dad pa dang / ming tha dad pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang bdag gis rab tu shes so// mdor na de bzhin gshegs
321b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mthus chos rnams so so tha dad pa'i bye brag dang // dris pa dang / lan gyi bye brag ji snyed yod pa rnams kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byin gyi rlabs kyi mthus bdag
321b6(dkon brtsegs): gis rab tu shes so// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu ma tas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa slar grong dang / grong khyer dang gzong rdal du gshegs te/ de bzhin
321b7(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal pos yang dag par gsungs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag par rjes su bskor cing / bdag gis gsol ba btab pa bzhin du gnang bar mdzad du gsol/
322a1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis yang dag par bsrung zhing chos mnyan par 'tshal lo// mthu chen thob pas smras pa ga da ltar gyi dus kyi dge slong rnams ni thams cad kyang le lo dang sdom las can du
322a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur te/ dge ba'i chos ba sogs pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa med pa khyod de skad ma zer cig/ ma ha shu ma tas smras pa/ bdag ni deng phyin chad dge ba'i chos la lhag pa'i bsam pa bskyed nas/ chos de gnyis
322a3(dkon brtsegs): bar bgyid pas le lo mi bgyid do// gang po dge slong ma ha shu ma ta sa mthu chen thob pa grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal du 'jug cing yang dag pa'i chos bshad par gsol ba bta nas rjes su bsrung bar byas
322a4(dkon brtsegs): te sngon ma thos pa'i chos yang dag par mnyan to// gang po de'i tshe dge slong shu ma ta skye ro rnams kyis rim gro dang bsnyen bkun byas te/ mang po kun gyis tshul khrims bsrung ba dang / shes rab dang
322a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang / mang du zos pa'i yon tan mchog tshad med pa dang ldan pa'o zhes brjod par gyur to// de'i tshe dge slong shu ma tas grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dag tu song nas sems can mang po yang dag pa'i
322a6(dkon brtsegs): chos la gzung ba dang / gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa kun tu spel ba'i ched du chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa'i bsngags pa'ang rab tu brjod par gyur to// gang po de'i tshe dge slong shu ma tas skye bo mang po rnams ca
322a7(dkon brtsegs): rab par bskul nas chos la mchod pa dra ba dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan pa'i phyir chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa la bsnyen bkur dang / rim gro dang / yang dag par srung bar byed du bcug go// gang chos smra ba mthu chen thob
322b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang dge slong shum ta sa yang dag par bsrung ngabyas pas/ phyis grong dang / zong khyer dang / grong rdal rab tu song nas/ de bzhin gshebs pa yon tan thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi rgyal pos bskal pa grangs med
322b2(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams su byang chub mngon par bsgrubase pa bang yin pa de dag rnam pa sna tshogs kyi sgo nas rgya cher yang dag par bshad de/ kun tu rgya cher rab tu spel to// gang po 'di ltar dge slong shu ma tas kyang lo
322b3(dkon brtsegs): ngargya'i bar du rtag par chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa'i rjes su 'drangs nas/ chos rnams yang dag par dris kyang rtag par gsar du tha dad pa'i chos yang dag par bstan gyi / nam yang zlos bu smras par ma gyur
322b4(dkon brtsegs): to// gango po chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa'ang dge slong shu ma ta sa yang dag par rab tu bsrung ba'i phyir/ sems can tshad med pa smad 'phags pa'i bstan pa la yang dag par btsud nas/ sems can tshad
322b5(dkon brtsegs): med ba smad sangs rgyas kyi byang chub la yang dag par bkod do// gang po khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na tshes smra ba mthu chen thod pas dam pa'i chos yang dag par bsrungs shing chos legs par bshad pa
322b6(dkon brtsegs): de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa 'di nyid yin no// gang po dge slong shu ma ta'ang chos smra ba yang dag par bsrungs shing gsol ba btab pa dang /
322b7(dkon brtsegs): grogs byas pa'i bsod nams kyi mthus shi ba'i 'og tu 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams bcu pa de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor mchog tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i zhing du skyes nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la sems can thams/
323a1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi the tsom yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde 'di yang dag par zhus pa dang / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa lan brgya stong dum
323a2(dkon brtsegs): brjod nas/ de la chos thams cad sdud cing 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par bstan to// mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na// sems can tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
323a3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ yang dag pa nyid du sems pa la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// gang po dge slong shu ma ta 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab ces bya ba dang drad
323a4(dkon brtsegs): nas de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos thams cad sdud cing 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par zhus pa dang / de'i tshe bzhin gshegs pa des kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i rasngags pa lan brgya
323a5(dkon brtsegs): stong du ma brjed nas/ de la chos thams cad sdud cing 'byung bar byed pa'i sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par bstan to// mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na/ sems can tshad med pa snyed dra na med pa
323a6(dkon brtsegs): yang dab par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa ri'i rgyal po zhes bya dang phrad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos thams cad kyi sgra
323a7(dkon brtsegs): zhes bya ba'i mdo sde yang dag par zhus pa dang / de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa des kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa lan brgya stong du ma brjod nas/ de la chos thams cad kyi sgo zhes bya ba'i mdo sde
323b1(dkon brtsegs): rgya char yang dab par rab tu bstan to// mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na/ sems can tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu tungs par gyur to// de nas yang 'chi ba'i dus rgyas
323b2(dkon brtsegs): tede bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba dang phrad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa zhes dra ba'i mdo sde yang dag par zhus pa dang / de'i tshe de de bzhin gshegs
323b3(dkon brtsegs): pa des kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod nas/ de la chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa zhes bya ba'i mdo sde brgya cher yang dag par bstan to// mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan pa na/ sems
323b4(dkon brtsegs): can tshad med pa snyed bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// gang po dge slong shu ma tas de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu sangs rgyas mang po dang phrad nas mdo sde
323b5(dkon brtsegs): mang po zhus pa dang / sems can yongs su bzlas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bkod pa gang yin pa de dag ngas gal te bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par brjod par gyur
323b6(dkon brtsegs): na'ang / sangs rgyas mang po de dag gi mtshan dang / sems can ji snyed cig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par bkod pa de dag mthar thub par mi 'gyur ro// gang po dge slong
323b7(dkon brtsegs): shu ma tas ji tsam du de bzhin bshegs pa 'jib rten na mngon du bzhugs pa 'am/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa rnams yang dag par bsrungs
324a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i grangs ni brjod kyis kyang mi lang ngo // gang po de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos nas/ don gyi tshul yid la
324a2(dkon brtsegs): sems par byed na/ yon tan rgya chen po de lta bu dag thob par rib par bya'o// gang po khyod kyis de'i tshe de'i dus na dge slong ma ha shu ma tas chos smra ba mthu chen thob pa las sngon ma thos pa'i chos thos nas
324a3(dkon brtsegs): don gyi tshul gyi rjes su 'brangs par gyur pa de gzhan yin snyam du sems na de ltar mi blta ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' ke'u l+r-ir du zhes nu ba 'di nyid yin te de'i tshe dge slong ma ha shu ma tas yang
324a4(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i chos bsrungs pa dang / sngon ma thos pa'i chos mnyan nas/ don gyi rjes su 'brang zhing tshig la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis sangs rgyas mang po dang phrad nas/ mdo sde zab mo shin tu
324a5(dkon brtsegs): gya nom pa mang po thos pa dang / sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis deng 'dir nga la'ang chos thams cad yang dag par sdud pa rgya mtsho lta bu'i chos kyi rnam grangs zhes bya ba'i mdo sde zhus pa las ngas
324a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang yang dag par bstan pa ni sems can tshad med pa snyed phan pa chen po thob par gyur pa yin no// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad
324a7(dkon brtsegs): de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpas mthos chos// thos nas don tshul sems bya yi// bdag gi sngon chad mthos zhes// de skad du ni smra mi bya// ma thos chos ni thos gyur
324b1(dkon brtsegs): nas/ yang dag dran pas don sems na// rgya mtshor 'bab chu shong ba bzhin// de phyir shes rab 'phel bar 'gyur// mang du thos pa 'phel 'gyur zhing // shes rab dag kyang 'phel/
324b2(dkon brtsegs): par 'gyur// sangs rgyas mdzad pa thos 'gyur zhing / gargya cher sems can phan yang 'dogs// mang thos rgya mtsho sogs 'gyur zhing // shes rab dag kyang btugs mi 'gyur/
324b3(dkon brtsegs): tshig gidon ni rab shes pas// khyad par nang na mchog tu 'gyur// re phyir sngon chad ma thos chos// yang dag par ni mnyan par bya// mthos chos ni mnyan byed na// de 'dra'i rnam sngan
324b4(dkon brtsegs): 'thob par 'gyur// / bam po gnyis pa/ gzhan yang bang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mang du thos pa yongs su banyer ba la
324b5(dkon brtsegs): shin tu 'dun pa'i bsam pa bskyed cing gnas dben par gnas pa la mos pa'i bsam pa rab tu bskyed nas/ sems rtse gcig tu nan tan brtson 'grus kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
324b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub yongs su gzer bar du'o// yongs su banyer nas kyang zhe sdang yongs su spangs pa'i phyir/ byams pa bsgom par bya'o// 'dod chags yongs su spang ba'i phyir/ mi sdug pa bsgom par
324b7(dkon brtsegs): bu'o// gti mug yongs su spang ba'i phyir/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba bsgom par bya'o// gang po byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus ni gang yin/ byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar
325a1(dkon brtsegs): na brtson 'grus rtsom par byed ce na/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig bskal pa gcig gapa bskal pa gcig las nyung ba bcig tu 'gro 'am/ 'dug pa rab tu rtag par
325a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus bskyed par bya'o snyam du sems na// bang po de lta bu gang yin pa de ni yang dab pa'i brtson 'grus zhes ma bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig bskal pa gcib bam/ bskal pa gcig las nyu
325a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhib tu tshul khrims rnam par dag pa bsrung ba dang / dka' thub sdud pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang ldan par gyur kyang / dmigs pa'i dngos po'i rjes su 'dod pa'i sems su bskyed nas/ chos rnams
325a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan 'di dang bral bar gyur na/ 'di lta bu 'di yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus zhes mi bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol
325a5(dkon brtsegs): to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par 'gyur zhing 'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis smod par mi 'gyur
325a6(dkon brtsegs): ra bang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang po byang chub sems dpas sngon ma thos pa'i chos zab mo stong pa nying dang ldan pa// mtshan ma cung zad tsam yang med cing don dam pa'i rjes su
325a7(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa de lta bu'i mdo sde zab mo thos par gyur na/ mi mthun zhing 'gal ba med par de'i don bsal bar rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed nas/ sems la nur ba med mar nyan
325b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / len pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / gzhan la yang dag par rab tu ston par byed pa gang yin pa 'din byung chub sems dpa'i yang dag pa'i btsun 'grus zhes bya'o// ma lnga zab ma
325b2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas de'i don rab tu rtogs te/ mi mthun pa med cing 'gal ba med pa'i brtson 'grus de lta bu de la ni/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags par 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyi kyang spong
325b3(dkon brtsegs): par mi gyur pas/ de phyir gang po byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar 'dzag rten pa'i sems can rnams kyis gting mi rnyed pa bang yin pa de bdage gis 'dir gting gi mthar thug par bya'o// 'jig rten pa'i sems
325b4(dkon brtsegs): can rnams bying bar gyur pa'i gnas gang yin pa der bdag gis bying bar mi bya'o// 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyis 'jigs pa gang yin pa de dag la bdag gis 'jebs par mi bya'o snyam pa'i
325b5(dkon brtsegs): go cha bgo bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis go cha bgos pa ni 'jig rten pa dang rjes su mthun pa ma yin pas/ 'jig rten pa'i chos spang ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten pa'i chos
325b6(dkon brtsegs): spyad pa'i phyir go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ 'jig rten pa'i chos mi spyad par bya ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa yin/ 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir go cha bgos pa ma yin gyi/ 'jig
325b7(dkon brtsegs): rten pa'i chos bzlog pa'i phyir go cha bgos pa yin no snyam du sems bstod pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yang dag pa'i brtson 'grus zhes du ste
326a1(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das
326a2(dkon brtsegs): kyis don de nyid yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chos gnyer ba/ rtag par brtson 'grus rab bskyed de/ don gyi tshul ni sems byed pas// sgra yi rjes
326a3(dkon brtsegs): su yongs mi 'brang / byang chub sems dpa' tshig mi 'brang // chos rnams stong par shes pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i tshig ni 'tshal bar byed/ bskal pa dag ni grangs med pa/ bye ba stong phrag mang
326a4(dkon brtsegs): bor ni// nyin mtshan rtag par 'dug gyur te// sems bskyed dka' ba rab spyad kyang // sngon chad mthos mdo sde dag/ yid mchis na brtson 'grus min// don zab gcing ni gang rnyed pa/
326a5(dkon brtsegs): lo can zhes mi bya'o// de 'dra'i brtson 'grus gang yin pa// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags// 'jig rten gting ni ni rnyed pa/ re gting byang chub sems dpas 'thob/ 'jig rten
326a6(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs shing bying gyur kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs bying med// brtson pa'i sems kyis rtag tu ni// stong dben byang chub 'tshol bar byed/ stong pa'i chos la 'jigs med pas/
326a7(dkon brtsegs): ldog cing bying bar gyur pa'ang med// bdag chos mtshan nyid gnas pa las// de phyir 'jigs bying rab tu skye// chos rnams thams cad 'dzag 'thor ba// de ni drang chub 'am zhes bya// nan tan brtson
326b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grus gang bskyed pa// mthos rgya mtsha myur du 'grug gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpas phung po lnga la mkhas par bya// skye mched bcu gnyis la mkhas par bya// khams bco brgyad
326b2(dkon brtsegs): la mkhas par bya rten cing 'brel mar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la mkhas par bya'o// phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / rten cing 'brel par 'drung ba'i yan lag bcu
326b3(dkon brtsegs): gnyis po la rab tu mkhas par gyur na// gnas pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su 'grub par 'gyur ro// gnas pa med pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la maM sems shing / rnam par rtog par yang
326b4(dkon brtsegs): mi byed do// mi sems shing rnam par mi rtog par sems can rnams la chos bstan nas/ lta ba thams cad 'jig cing 'dzag tshogs la lta ba rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos
326b5(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad nga bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems
326b6(dkon brtsegs): dpas phung po lnga// skye mched bcu gnyis stong par shes// khams ni bco brgyad rab 'byed cing // rten 'brel bcu gnyis rab tu rtogs// lnga phung rjes su mi 'brang zhing // lus ni mi bden nyid/
326b7(dkon brtsegs): du rig phyi nang skye mched thams cad kun// rang bzhin dag ni stong par shes// de ltar chos rnams shes nas kyang // gzhan dag la ni ston byed pas// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' de/
327a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur/ gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni ji ltar tshul khrims bcas pa dang / ji ltar 'dul/
327a2(dkon brtsegs): ba yang dag par bstan pa bzhin du legs par rjes su slob par byed pas/ yongs su nyams par mi byed do// byang chub sems dpas ji ltar tshul khrims slob par byed ce na/ chos thams cad slob par
327a3(dkon brtsegs): dred pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la slob pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad slob par byed pa gang yin pa des ni ka thams cad
327a4(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa thob par 'gyur la/ chos shes pa des ni rnam par mi rtog pa'o shes rab thob par 'gyur te/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab des dngos po thams cad shes par 'gyur bas so// ji ltar
327a5(dkon brtsegs): dngos po thams cad shes par 'gyur zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni nang gi dngos po thams cad dang / phyi rol gyi dngos po thams cad rab tu shes pa gang yin pa'o// gang po ci'i phyir nang zhes bya zhe na/
327a6(dkon brtsegs): nang zhes bya ba ni ji tsam du myong ba dang bcas pa 'dod chags par bya ba'i gnas/ 'di lta ste/ rlung gi lus rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa las skyes shing / de la kun rdzob tu
327a7(dkon brtsegs): btags pa'i ming tsam du yod pa 'di ni mig go// 'di ni rna ba'o// 'di ni sna'o// 'di ni lce'o// 'di ni lus so// 'di ni yid do zhes brjod pa gang yin pa 'di dag ni nang zhes bya'o//
327b1(dkon brtsegs): chos de dag la so so'i skye bo rnams kyis mngon par zhen par byed pa'i phyir nang zhes bya ste/ 'di skad du bdag gis mig 'di lta bu thob par bya'o zhes brjod kyang // de lta bu'i mig mngon par 'du byed pa med la/
327b2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid thob par bya'o zhes brjod kyang / 'di ltar rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid mngon par 'du byed pa med par yang de na las
327b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi rkyen slong zhing rnam par smin pa rab tu bskyed pas de'i phyir nang zhes bya'o// de'i phyir bye brag la so so'i skye bos mngon par zhen nas 'di ni mig go/ 'di ni rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang
327b4(dkon brtsegs): lus dang / yid do zhes zer ba thams cad ni nang zhes bya'o// gzhan yang glang po nang zhes bya bas dngos po 'di gnyis mngon par 'du byed pa'ang mi bden zhing smra bar byed pa yin nabyis pa
327b5(dkon brtsegs): so so'i skye bo mngon par zhen pas yang drag par blangs nas rtsod par skyed par byed kyi/ gang po de bzhin gshegs pas ni 'di dag gzod mo nyid nas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud pas
327b6(dkon brtsegs): mngon par zhen par mi mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa ji ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du thugs su chud nas mngon par zhen par mi mdzad ce na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos 'di dag la phyogs par
327b7(dkon brtsegs): mi mdzad do// gang zhig la phyogs par mi mdzad ce na/ 'di lta ste/ mig 'di ni sred pa 'ching ba yin no zhes phyogs par mi mdzad la/ mig dang bral ba la'ang phyogs par mi mdzar ro//
328a1(dkon brtsegs): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la'ang phyogs par mi mdzad la/ yid dang bral ba la'ang phyogs par mi mdzad do// de ci'i blor zhe na/ gang po de bzhin
328a2(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni chos 'di dag la nang zhes bya ba'ang mi dmigs la phyi rol zhes bya ba'ang mi dmigs pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas chos 'di dag la phyogs par mi mdzad do// de bzhin
328a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsung ba yin pas/ 'di skad du dge slong dag mig ni bdag kyang ma yin la/ gzhan yang ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang gi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med
328a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir ro// chos gang ni mig yin/ mig ni su'i yin/ chos gang ni rna ba dang / sna dang / k+She dang / lus dang / yid yin/ yid ni su'i yon te ga de tsa'i b+hir zhe na/
328a5(dkon brtsegs): rang gi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pas so// gang po mig kyang deng so sor rab tu brtags rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyang deng
328a6(dkon brtsegs): so sor brtags na/ chos gang la'ang mngon par zhen cing len pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang gis ji tsam du chos la len pa dang bcas pa des ni sdug bsngal skyed par byed la
328a7(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal skyes pa'i phyir ni bde ba med par gyur pas de'i phyir gang po ji tsam du chos la len pa dang bcas pa thams cad ni sdug bsngal myong bar gyur la/ gar sdug bsngal myong bar
328b1(dkon brtsegs): thur ba des na sdug bsngal spong bar mi byed pas/ bang po 'don mos so sor brtags pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang yid 'jug pa'i gnas med par so sor brdabs/
328b2(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// re tse'i phyir zhe na/ glang po gal te 'jug pa'i gnas yod par gyur na/ 'byung ba'i gnas kyang yod par gyur pas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang
328b3(dkon brtsegs): mig ni stong zhing bdag dang bdag gi ba med de/ rang bzhin gyis de 'dra zhing rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyang stong zhing bdag dang bdag gi ba med de rang
328b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhin gyis de 'dra bas ngo bo nyid med de// 'di ltar ngo bo nyid med pa gang yin pa de la ni mngon par 'du bya ba'ang med la// 'jig pa'ang med do nas gsungs so// gang po chos nyid 'di lta bu gang chen
328b5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung yang rung ste/ ngo bo nyid 'dini rtag tu gnas pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos rnams skye'ang mi skye ba nyid du thugs su/
328b6(dkon brtsegs): chud pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa ni yang dag par gsungs pa yin pas/ 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pa byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa ma byung yang rung ste/ ngo bo nyid 'di ni rtag tu gnas pa nyid de/
328b7(dkon brtsegs): gsung ngo // gang po ci'i phyir mi skye ba zhes bya ba ci'i phyir ni mi skye ba'i ye shes zhes bya zhe na/ gang po chos rnams mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o// lam gang yin pa de
329a1(dkon brtsegs): mi skye ba'i ye shes zhes bya'o// sdug bsngal zad pa gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba zhes bya'o// lam gang yin pa de ni mi skye ba'i ye shes zhes bya ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
329a2(dkon brtsegs): pas bden pa gnyis po 'di lta ste/ kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang / don dam pa'i bden pa yod par gsungs pa zhes bya'o// gang po de bzhin gshegs pas sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid ces gang gsungs pa de
329a3(dkon brtsegs): nyid ni mtshan nyid med pa zhes gsungs so// sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid ces bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'o// 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni mtshan nyid
329a4(dkon brtsegs): med pa yin pas/ mkhas pa rnams kyis 'dus ma byas de nyid mtshan nyid med pa yin par rab tu shes so// gang po mkhas pa rnams kyis ji ltar 'dus ma byas de nyid mtshan ma med pa yin par rab
329a5(dkon brtsegs): tu shes par 'gyur zhe na/ 'di ltar 'dus ma byas kyi chos ni stong par yang shes/ rab tu dben pa yin par yang shes pa skyabs su 'gro ba'i gnas yin par yang shes pa phan pa mchog yin par
329a6(dkon brtsegs): yang shes/ yongs su gdung ba med par yang shes te/ mkhas pa rnams kyis de ltar 'dus ma byas rab tu shes kyang ye shes de la skye ba'i mtshan ma med pa'o// gang po mkhas pa rnams ni mtshan
329a7(dkon brtsegs): ma rnams yongs su spangs pas/ don mchog dam pa mngon par 'du byed pa med pa 'jigs pa med pa thob par 'gyur ro// gang po mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pa de la ni 'jigs pa yo/
329b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rgyu mngon par 'du byed pa med pa de la 'jigs pa'ang med do// 'jigs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni stong pa nyid yin no// 'jigs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni mtshan ma med/
329b2(dkon brtsegs): pa yin no// 'jigs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de ni smon pa med pa yin no// gang gis kyang mngon par 'dus ma byas la// gang gis kyang 'jigs pa med par dbyer med pa gang yin pa de ni/
329b3(dkon brtsegs): gang po de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mi 'jigs pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
329b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dmigs su med pa gang yin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
329b5(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams kyi dmigs su ma mchis pa de nyid gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po chos thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dmigs su med pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das
329b6(dkon brtsegs): gal te de ltar na ni/ chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub lags par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po de de bzhin te// chos thams cad sangs rgyas
