329b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub yin yang / byang chub de ni chos thams cad ces mi bya'o// chos thams cad ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub yin no// zhes bya'ang kun rdzob tu btags pa tsam du brjod
330a1(dkon brtsegs): par zad de/ de ni le lo tsa rnams kyis rtogs par dka' zhing rig par dka' ba yin no// na cu'i phyir zhen// le lo can gang yin pa dang na chos rnams mamadapa nyid du mngon par
330a2(dkon brtsegs): sgrub par mi byed la/ mnyam par mgyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas dang rtsod par byed pas so// gang po gang dag mnyam pa nyid mngon par sgrub par mi byed ces na/ bang po 'jib rten pa thams cad
330a3(dkon brtsegs): nimanyam pa 'i mngon par sgrub par mi byung // sangs nas rnams kyi d+hang chum la tshamanyam pa'ang med namanyam pa 'ang mad do// rang rangs 'am 'das dran mang pa yang dag par rdzongs par ba rnas/
330a4(dkon brtsegs): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas na ga rgya dang rkyen gyis de'i phyir mdo sde 'di dag las chos thams cad ni yang dag pa'i gnas su thams cad du nges pa nyid du zhubs pa yin pas/ de na
330a5(dkon brtsegs): nges par byang chub kyi sbyor zhugs pa zhes bstan pa yin te/ de'i phyir gang po chos thams cad byang chub ces bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la ga tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces/
330a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi blan med sgra yang dag par rdzobs pa'i byang chung gang lags pa den nges pa'ang lags/ mnges pa'ang 'gas pa tshig 'bru dang
330a7(dkon brtsegs): yi ger zhugs pa'ang lags/ tshig 'bru dang yi ger ma gugs pa'ang lags/ tshig 'phru la zhugs pa'ang lags pa tshig 'bru la ma zhugs pa'ang lags pa de ni shin tu ngom tshar che lags so//
330b1(dkon brtsegs): btsa'i srad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dang dag gis bcom ldan 'das las mdo sde 'di lta bu thos pas/ chos thams cad la rnam par nges pa'i snang 'thob pa labs so// bcom ldan 'das dang dag/
330b2(dkon brtsegs): gis chos rnams la rnam par nges pa'i snang ba thob pas dngos po gcig las kyang dngos po thams cad rtogs par gyur la/ dngos po thams cad las kyang dngos po gcig rtags par gyur pas so//
330b3(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po la bka' stsal pa// gang po khrod kyis 'di ltar myur ba khor nar sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos thams cad kyi don la rab tu zhugs
330b4(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa legs so legs so// 'di'ang khyod kyis sngon 'das pa'i dus su sangs rgyas mang po rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed nas nye bar bstan te nub dag zhus pa las
330b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa yin par rib par bya'o// gang po ngas mngon par dran te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi zhing 'di nyid kyi nam mkha'i phyogs gcig na khyod kyis sangs rgyas drug khri brgyad stong las mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dge ba'i
330b6(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba'i yon tan gyi rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis khyod chos rnam par nges pa'i snang ba thob pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das gal te bdag gis sangs rgyas mang po las mdo sde 'di sngon thos par gyur pa zhig
330b7(dkon brtsegs): lags na/ ci'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rjes su dran pa'i bsam pa gcig tsam yang ma mchis lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
331a1(dkon brtsegs): gang pongs mngon par dran te/ 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe khyod kyis bskal pa gcig gi bar du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las slar ldog cing thams
331a2(dkon brtsegs): par gyur kyang / de'i bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis ngas deng 'dir khyod chos smra ba rnams kyi nang na mchog tu gyur pa zhes brjod pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos gsol pa/ bcom
331a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das bdag gis sngon mi dge ba'i las ci zhig bgyis na/ bskal pa gcig gi bar du bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las slar ldog cing nyams par gyur pa lags
331a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis mi dge ba'i grogs po la brten pa'i phyir dang / gzhan yang khyod kyis dam pa'i chos rgya cher ma spel ba'i phyir khyod bla na med pa yang dag par
331a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs pa'i byang chub las slar ldog cing nyams par gyur pa yin no// gang po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las ldog cing nyams nas nyan thos kyi theg par 'gyur
331a6(dkon brtsegs): ro// bzhi gang zhe na// byang chub sems dpas sdig pa mi dge ba'i grogs po la brten pa'i phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su spangs nas ka 'di skad du 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
331a7(dkon brtsegs): tu sems bskyed ci dgos/ 'khor ba'i mtha' ni shin tu thag ring ste/ 'gro ba lnga po rnams su kha brgyud cing sdug bsngal tshad med pa myong bas/ khom pa dang phrad pa'ang shin tu dkon sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang /
331b1(dkon brtsegs): phrad pa'ang shin tu dkon// shin tu dang ba'i dad pa thob pa'ang shin tu dkon/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad par byar ma'ang khyim nas khyim med par rab tu 'byung ba ches shin tu dka' bas pa dang khyod khom pa dang /
331b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa chung ma gas na tsag/ khyod de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las blan med pa yang dag pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung bstan pa thob pa'ang ma yin la ga dge
331b3(dkon brtsegs): rtsa ba nges par gyur pa'ang ma yin pas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'ang mi thob cing / 'gro ba lnga po rnams su 'khor bar 'gyur ro zhes smras pas/ gang zab des de skad smras pa thob pa'i dbang gis
331b4(dkon brtsegs): sems bying nas byang chub kyi lam las ldog cing le los mos par mi 'gyur te/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur nas bla na med pa'i byang chub las slar ldog
331b5(dkon brtsegs): nas nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su mthun pa'i mdo sde 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod kyi mdo dang //
331b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i mdo dang / byang chub sems dpa'i bya ba yang dag par sdud pa'i mdo dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang rjes su mthun pa'i mdo thos par ma gyur na 'di ltar zos
331b7(dkon brtsegs): par ma gyur pa'i phyir/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod par mi 'gyur/ ji skad bsten pa bzhin du yang dag par slob par mi 'gyur bas/ des byang chub sems dpas chos gang ni bsten par bya/
332a1(dkon brtsegs): chos gang ni yongs su spang bar bya/ chos gang ni yang dag par blang bar bya ba'i rigs/ chos gang ni yang dag par blang bar bya ba'i mi rigs/ chos gang ni byang chub sems dpa'i chos/
332a2(dkon brtsegs): yin chos gang ni nyan thos kyi chos yin pa dag rab tu mi shes so// 'di ltar mi shes shing rab tu 'byed par mi nus pa'i phyir/ bsten par bya bar rigs pa'i chos ni ston par mi byed la/ bsten par bya bar
332a3(dkon brtsegs): mi rigs pa'i chos la ni rab tu sten par 'gyur ro// des bsten par bya bar rigs pa'i chos ni sten par mi byed la/ bsten par bya bar mi rigs pa'i chos la ni rab tu ston par byed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rnams
332a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi byang chub kyi sems las rab tu nyams shing log par gyur pas/ sems kyang zhum ste le lo can du gyur nas/ sngon gyi smon lam rnams kyang yongs su gtong bar 'gyur te/ bang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis
332a5(dkon brtsegs): pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las slar log nas nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang po chos rnams yod pa nyid du 'dzin cing bdag tu mngon
332a6(dkon brtsegs): par zhen pa dang / log par lta rnams spyod cing mtha' 'dzin pa'i lta bar ltung ba dang / log pa'i sdig pa rnams su bying ste drang dka' bar gyur nas/ mdo sde zab mo don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa dang
332a7(dkon brtsegs): thos par gyur na'ang / mngon par yid ches pa'i rtags cung zad tsam yang med cing 'gal bar byed pa dang mngon par ma rtogs nas yang dag pa'i chos 'dzeg pa'i kha na ma tho ba dag slong bar byed na
332b1(dkon brtsegs): chu dang rkyen des mi 'om pa'i gnas su skyes nas sangs rgyas rnams dang yang phrad par mi 'gyuradam pa'i chos kyang thos par mi 'gyur/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag dang yang
332b2(dkon brtsegs): phrad par mi 'gyuradage ba'i bshes gnyen yang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// res sangs rgyas rnams mi mthong ba'i phyir yang dag pa'i chos kyang thos par mi 'gyur ro// yang dab pa'i chos ma thos pa'i
332b3(dkon brtsegs): phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis rjes su bstan pa dag dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rjes su bstan pa'i chos dang phrad par ma gyur pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par
332b4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur ro// dge ba'i bshes gnyen ma rnyed pa'i phyir ngom pa'i gnas dang bral nas mi khom pa'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro// mi khom pa'i gnas su skyes pa'i phyir rige pa'i
332b5(dkon brtsegs): bshes gnyen dang bral nas mi dge ba'i grogs po dang phrad par 'gyur ro// mi dge ba'i grogs po'i rjes su 'drangs pa'i phyir/ sngon gyi yi dam brjed cing stor bar 'gyur ro// des
332b6(dkon brtsegs): sngon gyis yi dam brjed cing stong par gyur pa'i byir byang chub kyi sems kyang spong bar byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa'ang spong bar byed pas slar ldog par 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi
332b7(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa'ang gtan du stor nas 'khor ba'i chos 'ba' zhig spod cing theg pa chen po'i spyod pa'i chos mngon par bsgrub par mi 'gyur te/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos
333a1(dkon brtsegs): gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na med pa'i byang chub las slar log nas nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di
333a2(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i mdo sde thos par gyur kyang / lhag pa'i bsam pas gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par mi byed cing sems zhum par gyur nas gcig tu 'gro ba la dga' zhing chos kyi ser sna byas nas
333a3(dkon brtsegs): gzhan dag la bstan pa'i 'dun pa med pa dang / chos kyi sa gzhan dag rgya cher yongs su sdud par mi byed na/ mi dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i rgyu dang rkyen gyis shes rab dang dran pa rab tu nyams par 'gyur ro//
333a4(dkon brtsegs): shes rab dang dran pa rnams par gyur pa'i dbang gis zhen pa dag dang lhan cig mdo sde'i chos klog cing 'don par mi byed la chos kyis gzhan dag dang mthun par mi byed pas/ gang zag de lus brjes
333a5(dkon brtsegs): ma thab tu byang chub kyi sems kyang stor bar gyur la/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'ang brjed par gyur ste/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan par gyur na/ bla na
333a6(dkon brtsegs): med pa'i byang chub kyi sems las slar log nas nyan thos kyi theg pa par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de 'di yang dag par rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad
333a7(dkon brtsegs): de bka' stsal pa/ mi dge'i grogs po sten byed cing // byang chub la ni mi brtson na/ rgyu dang rkyen ni de yi phyir/ bla med byang chub sems stor 'gyur// sdig pa'i bdag lta ba bskyed nas// mtha' dang log/
333b1(dkon brtsegs): ltar gang ltung ba// chos 'dzag sdig ni blang bas na// me khom gnas su skye bar 'gyur// maM 'om gnas su skye nas kyang // byang chub sems ni gcod byed cing // sngon gyi ying maskor 'thur
333b2(dkon brtsegs): de phyir byang chub sems kyang nyams// de yis byang chub sems skye ba'i// chos ni thos par yong mi 'gyur// de yi sems ni 'phel gyur na// byang chub sems ni bsgrubs par 'gyur// dmachos
333b3(dkon brtsegs): rgya chen thos gyur kyang // ser snas gzhan la ston mi mos// rgyu dang rkyen ni de yi phyir// byang chub las ni ldog par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' theg chen gnyer// chos 'di ban ni shes par bya/
333b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems ni skye bar 'gyur// de phyir sdig pa'i chos 'di bzhi// nan tan gyis ni rab spangs nas// stong nyid chos ni sgom byed na// dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten par 'gyur// 'di lta'i ma
333b5(dkon brtsegs): sde zos gyur na// ser snang dag ni mi skyed par// nan tan gzhan la bstan par bya// de las byang chub rab tu skye/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bang po byang chub sems
333b6(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las slar ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa bzhin du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su nyams par mi
333b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims rnam par dag pa yongs su bsrungs nas/ bsam pa rnams mngon par grub par byed pa dang / dran pa dang ldan zhing shes rab la
334a1(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par gnas pa dang / rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis brtson zhing le lo med pa dang / mang du thos pa phun sum tshogs shing shes rab 'phel bar gyur pa dag yin te/ gang po
334a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa bzhin du byang chub kyi sems las yongs su ldog par mi 'gyur zhing / ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa bzhin du
334a3(dkon brtsegs): dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar rab tu bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa'
334a4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims ldan// dran pa zab cing thag kyang ring // brtson pa'i sems kyis rab brtson zhing // mang thos shes rab rgyan dang ldan// byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ni// chos 'di bzhi
334a5(dkon brtsegs): la sten byed na// yid la bsam pa'i dngos po kun// thams cad rab tu grub par gyur// de phyir rtag tu khrims bsrung zhing // nan tan brtson 'grus ldan par bya// chos dran
334a6(dkon brtsegs): rgyun ni mi gcod cing / rtag par mang thos gnyer bar bya// khrims bsrung gnas gtsa' ba tu skye/ dran pas shes rab sbyong bar 'gyur// brtson 'grus sangs rgyas chos kyang spyod/
334a7(dkon brtsegs): mang thos shes rab chen po skye// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams// de 'dra'i chos ni bslab par bya// de 'dra'i chos ni rab bslabs na// bla med 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur/
334b1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan sa gang ba zang chub sams dpa' chos pa'i dang ldan par gyur na ga/ cung chub la ngan 'debs par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ chul thams srung ban byang chub la pan gos pa 'ams so//
334b2(dkon brtsegs): bzod pa sgom na byang chu la phan 'dogs pa'i chos so// brtson 'grus rtsom pa ni byang chub la phan 'dogs pa'i chos so// mang du thos pa ni byang chub la phan 'dogs pa'i chog te/ gang po chos bzhi pa
334b3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag ni byang chub la man 'dogs pa zhes bya'o// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de 'i rab tu bsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad bka' stsal pa byang chu sems dpa' rnams srungs pa byang chub 'anas
334b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dogs te// brtson 'grus dang ni bzod pa dang // mang du thos pa de bzhin no// tshul khrims dag pa gang srung ba// smon lam thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// khrims gtsang ban 'dogs mang bas na// byang chub thob dang/
334b5(dkon brtsegs): yang mi dka'/ byang chub sems dpa' bzod sgom pa// lus kyi mtshan dang shes rab 'grub// de phyir bzod pa rab bsgoms na// sangs rgyas mtshan dang shes rab gter/ brtson 'grus kyi
334b6(dkon brtsegs): ni de bzhin du// byang chub mang du phan 'dogs pas// rtag tu brtson 'grus gang rtsom pa// byang chub thob par yong mi dka'// mang thos kyis kyang phan 'dogs pas// thos nas chos la rab brten
334b7(dkon brtsegs): cing / chos min dag ni spong byed pas/ byang chub thob par yong me dka'// chos bzhi sa bon yin pas na// de las byang chub rab tu skye// de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams// chos kyi phan
335a1(dkon brtsegs): la brten par bya/ gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/ lus kyi kha dog phun sum tshogs pa dang / longs
335a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang / 'khor phun sumatshogs pa thob par 'gyur/ rnams kyang rtag par sdig pa mi dge ba'i gnas mi khom pa rnams su skye bar mi gyur/ rtag par sangs rgyas rnams dang phrad par 'gyur/
335a3(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni byams pa bsgoms pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing gnod pa mi byed pa yin te/
335a4(dkon brtsegs): gang po byang chub sems dpa' byams pa bsgoms pas sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med cing gnod pa mi byed pa ji lta bu zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa sgom pa ni/ sems can rnams la
335a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis yongs su bsgrub par bya'o snyam pa'i byams pa bskyed pas/ sems can lus dang sems sdug bsngal bar gyur pa dag mthong na/ 'di snyam du bdag gis nan tan brtson 'grus kyis sem
335a6(dkon brtsegs): can de dag 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las yongs su bzlas nas/ sems can de dag la bdag gis bde ba sbyin par bya'o// bdag gis drangs nas 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dang dbral bar bya'o// zhes sems can
335a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de lta bu'i sems skyed par byed do// de lta bu'i sems bskyed nas kyang nan tan brtson 'grus kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang
335b1(dkon brtsegs): bsams pa dang / shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa dang yongs su goms par byed do// gang po dung chub sems dpa' rda shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i nus/ pha rol tu phyin ma drug ro dag phun sum
335b2(dkon brtsegs): tshogs par byed do// byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu smin pa ni gang yin/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyus nan tan brtson 'grus spyad par byed can/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' 'i
335b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du chos gang ni bdag ces bya ba yin/ chos gang ni bdag gi zhes bya ba yin snyam du sems shing 'jal bar byed de/ de ltar sems shing 'jal ban bdag ces bya ba'i chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la
335b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gi zhes bya ba'i chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo snyam du sems pas// chos 'di la ni bdag ces bya ba'i chos kyang med la/ bdag gi zhes bya ba'i chos kyang med do snyam du sems so// byang chub
335b5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir lus stong pa nyid rab tu shes so// lus stong pa'i phyir sems can yang stong ngo snyam mo// re ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos rnams la bdag dang
335b6(dkon brtsegs): bdag gir 'dzin pa'ang stong pa yin na/ sems can lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam du sems pas so// byang chub sems dpas bdag dang bdag par 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir sems can stong pa nyid du rig par
335b7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// sems can stong pa'i phyir gzugs kyi phung po'ang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// gzugs kyi phung po stong pa'i phyir/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang
336a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam par shes pa'i phung po'ang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' de ltar bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir lus kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro//
336a2(dkon brtsegs): lus stong pa'i phyir sems can yang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// sems can stong pa'i phyir phung po rnams kyang stong nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// phung po rnams stong pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ sa dang /
336a3(dkon brtsegs): chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur te/ sa'i khams kyang sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis stong / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang /
336a4(dkon brtsegs): nam mkha' dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid kyis stong pas/ khams 'di dag la ni byed pa'ang med la/ byang chub kyang med do// gang byed pa med pa'i
336a5(dkon brtsegs): chos de la ni stong pa nyid yin snyam mo// gang po byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa spangs pa'i phyir/ lus stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// lus stong pa'i phyir sems
336a6(dkon brtsegs): can yang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// sems can stong pa'i phyir/ phung po rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// phung po rnams stong pa'i phyir// khams rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par
336a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ro// khams rnams stong pa'i phyir/ skye mched rnams kyang stong pa nyid du rig par 'gyur ro// skye mche rnams stong pa'i phyir/ skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid kyang stong zhing / skye mched rnams 'byed pa ma/
336b1(dkon brtsegs): pa dang / bud med pa nyid du rig par 'gyur te/ chos gang byed pa dang / bya ba med pa gang yin pa dan stong pa nyid yin no snyam mo// gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni ltar chos thams cad stong b.rang du lta bar/
336b2(dkon brtsegs): byed do// chos thams cad stong par lta ba'i tshe/ chos rnams la ngo bo nyid kyis zhe sdang skye ba'i gnas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
336b3(dkon brtsegs): kyis byams pa chen pos lus stong pa nyid du rig pa'i byams pa dang / sems can stong pa nyid du rig pa'i byams pa dang / phung po dang / skye mched dang / khams rnams stong pa nyid du rig pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o//
336b4(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' gang 'di lta bu'i byams pa bsgom pa gang yin pa de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi byams pa bsgom pa zhes bya ste/ gang po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po bsgom pa zhes bya'o//
336b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i sems kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las shin tu 'dun pa skyes na/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par
336b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pas/ sems can gang 'di ltar chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i mtshan nyid khong du ma chud pa dag khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir/ go cha chen po bgos pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po
336b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa zhes bya ste/ bdag gis bskyab par bya'o snyam du sems pa'i phyir byams pa zhes bya'o// bdag gos drang bar bya'o snyam du sems pa'i phyir snying rje zhes bya ste// byang chub sems
337a1(dkon brtsegs): dpa' gang 'di lta bu'i bums pa chen po dang ldan pa gang yin pa des ni sems can rnams kyi mgon dang / skyabs dang gnas dang / gling dang // mthar phyin pa'i gnas byed par gyur
337a2(dkon brtsegs): pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i byams pa chen po bsgom par bya'o// sems can rnams la rjes su chags pa'ang med la// khong khro ba'ang mi rnyed pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems
337a3(dkon brtsegs): rapa'i sems can stong pa'i byams pa zhe sdang med pa zhes bya'o// bang po byang chub sems dpa' gang bums pa'i rgyu dang bral ba'i rgyu dang / spyod pa'i rgyus chos rnams skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa la
337a4(dkon brtsegs): 'jug par 'gyur ba gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po bsgom pa zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' gang gis de ltar chos rnams rab tu rdzogs par gyur pa de la sa chu kyi 'khor rnams kyis
337a5(dkon brtsegs): tshugs par mi 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par gyur pa des ni yon tan thams cad la sgrib pa'i 'ching ba rnams yongs su gcod par byed do// yon tan gyi 'ching ba yongs su bcad
337a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'i phyir/ mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnams 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu gsal bar bya ba'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal la// byang chub sems dpas
337a7(dkon brtsegs): phung po dang // khams dang skye mched de dag la// bdag med par ni rtag shes pa// byams bsgom stong par lta bar byed// bdag dang bdag gi chos gnyis dag/ nges par yang dag dmigs su med// chos
337b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams dmigs su med pas na// byams pa'i sems kyis sgom par byed// chos rnams la ni mi gnas te// mi gnas pa yang ma yin pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi lam// chos rnams mi gnas pa zhes bya//
337b2(dkon brtsegs): bla med bzod pa gang thod pa// chos rnams yang dag mtshan nyid bzod// chos rnams skye 'bag med do zhes// don gyi tshul ni rab tu rtogs// blo thos chen po ldan pa dag/ chos 'di la ni sten byed na/ tag
337b3(dkon brtsegs): tu gya nom gzungs thob cing // spobs pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur// rtag par sangs rgyas phrad par 'gyur// chos rnams kun gyi don rig 'gyur// de phyir byang chub sems dpa'ade// bla med byang chub
337b4(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur/ gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni nan tan brtson 'grus kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mchod rten dag la mchod pa byed pas// gus
337b5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems kyis me tog dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / gdugs dang / ba dan dang / rol mo sol snyan dang / mchod pa'i yo byad gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs
337b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis mchod par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don
337b7(dkon brtsegs): nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' me tog spos// ba dan dang ni gdugs mchog gis// blo mchog mchod rten rab mchod nas// shes rab
338a1(dkon brtsegs): mchog ni 'tshol bar byed/ bsod nams de yi rkyen gyi ni// byang bzhin dag ni mdzes par 'gyur/ nor phrugs rin chen rab tu mang // 'khor ni phun sum tshogs par 'gyur/
338a2(dkon brtsegs): byang chub nyid du nges 'gyur zhing // rtag tu chos la rab tu gnas// skye ba dag ni thams cad du// yon tan 'phel zhing mthon por 'gyur// rgyal po rnams ni bkur byed cing // lha klu rab tu dran par
338a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// sems can thams ca kun gyis kyang // bkur sti dag ni byed par 'gyur// 'das dang da ltar bzhugs pa yi// sangs rgyas dag la mchod byed na// skye ba kun tu mchod pa'i thob// rtag par/
338a4(dkon brtsegs): mi khom med par skye// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rtag par brtson pa'i sems kyis chos la mchod par byed do// chos zhes bya ba ni gang // ji ltar/
338a5(dkon brtsegs): na chos la mchod par byed ce na/ de la chos zhes bya ba ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
338a6(dkon brtsegs): dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / zad pa'i ye shes
338a7(dkon brtsegs): rang / mi skye ba'i ye shes gang yin pa 'di ni chos zhes bya'o// ji ltar mchod par byed ce na/ chos de dag ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrub cing rjes su 'brangs nas 'gal ba med par 'dun pa dang /
338b1(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus bskyed de phun sum tshogs par mngon par bsgrub pa gang yin pa 'di ni chos la mchod pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang gang po chos la mchod pa zhes bya ba la/ chos ni mdo sde 'di lta bu dag yon la
338b2(dkon brtsegs): de la mngon par yod ches shing yid la sems pa dang / rnam par 'byed pa dang // rjes su 'brang zhing sems kyis 'gal bar mi byed pa gang yin pa 'di ni chos la mchod pa zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gang
338b3(dkon brtsegs): chos gsum po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/
338b4(dkon brtsegs): rtag tu chos mchod brtson byed pas// dza skad bstan pa bzhin du gnas// zab mo stong pa'i chos thos nas// sems kyis 'gal bar yong mi byed// dbyer lus ni rtab mdzes shing // spobs pa dag kyang
338b5(dkon brtsegs): thob par 'gyur// ngas ni ji skad bsngags pa'i chos// de yi rab tu 'phel bar byed/ gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni rab tu brtson pa'i sems
338b6(dkon brtsegs): kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams la mchod par byed pas// me tog dang / spros dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos kyi phye ma dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan dang /
338b7(dkon brtsegs): gos dang / bza' ba dang ka btung ba dang / mal cha dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / 'tshe ba'i g.yo byad dag dang / gtsug lag khang dang / kun dga'i ra ba dang / 'chabs dang / khrus
339a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi rdzing bu dang / khron pa dang ga las byed pa'i mi dang / 'di lta bu la sogs pa gzhan yang mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'di ltar 'phags pa'i tshogs rnams la
339a2(dkon brtsegs): mchod par byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' gang chos bzhi po 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu
339a3(dkon brtsegs): gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ mchod pa'i yo byad mchog dam pas// 'phags pa'i tshogs ni mchod byed pas/ bsod nams 'di yi rkyen gyis ni// skye ba kun tu
339a4(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod ldan// lus kyi kha dog rab mdzes shing // spobs pa dag kyang thob par 'gyur// yon tan rnams ni phun tshegs shing // shes rab dag ni 'phel bar 'gyur// drang po'i sems
339a5(dkon brtsegs): kyis mchod byas shing // bdag dang bdag gi med pas na// shes pa 'di yi rgyu rkyen gyis// skye ba kun tu mchod pa thob// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngags pa yi// chos bzhi dag la rtag
339a6(dkon brtsegs): brten na// skye ba kun tu cho rigs btsun// yon tan dag ni mngon thob 'phags// phyir mi ldog pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // bam po gsum pa/
339a7(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ka tshe dang ldan pa gang po la bka' stsal pa/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen mo gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pas/ rtag sar chos bzhi po
339b1(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag la brtan cing rnams par byas na / dag pa'i chos thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par yongs su sdud par 'gyur la/ dge ba'i rtsa batha thams cad dang yang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro// bani gang ban
339b2(dkon brtsegs): gang po rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag theb pa chen por sems bskyed pas ka bzod pa bsgrub pa'o chos la brten cing bsgom par bya'o// de ltar na bzod pa'i chos bsgom pa na/ gal te sems
339b3(dkon brtsegs): mnyam par gyur na/ shin tu mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang thob par 'gyur la/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' des sems
339b4(dkon brtsegs): mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan par gyur pa na/ gal te 'gro 'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam/ nyal lam gnyid log gam gsar pa'i tshe
339b5(dkon brtsegs): 'ang rung ste/ gcin gyi bum pa'am/ dug gi bum pa 'am/ chu tshan gyi bum pa 'ag/ phyag dar rnams sam ka me dang thal ba 'am/ bshang gci 'am/ thal ba tsha ba thogs pa zhig 'ongs nas/ mgo'i steng
339b6(dkon brtsegs): du blugs sam/ lus kyi yan lag kun tu brdungs par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' de la zhe sdang dang khon gyi bsam pa bskyed nas ka sems rnam par g.yeng zhing khong khro ba bskyed par yang ma bya'o//
339b7(dkon brtsegs): 'di skad du bdag la nyes pa ci yod ces kyang smra bar mi bya'o// gzhan yang ngan sems kyis de la blte bar mi bya'o// sems rtso gcig tu rang gi chos don du gnyer zhing gang bsgrub par bya ba'i dngos po sems ca
340a1(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu mi spang bar de ltar sems yongs su gdul bar bya'o// gang zag des rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir ka gcin gyi bum pa dang / dug po bum pa dang / thal ba dang / med ga thogs
340a2(dkon brtsegs): te 'ongs nas/ bdag gi lus la gnod pa byed pa na/ bdag gi lus ni dngos po 'di dag gi rgyu rkyen gyi na pa dang gnod par 'gyur ro// zhes byang chub sems dpa' de'i tshe 'di ltar rgyu dang rkyen mang po tsham
340a3(dkon brtsegs): la so sor btags nas/ su zhig ni dngos po 'di sbyin par byed/ dngos po 'di ni su la sbyin par byed// dngos po gang ni sbyin par byed ces des de ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yid la byed pa na/ sbyin
340a4(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa ni su yin/ len par byed pa ni su yin// chos ni gang yin zhes chos 'ga' yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ltar yang dag pa'i dran pas yid la byed cing so sor rtog pa'i tshe/
340a5(dkon brtsegs): dang de zhes bya ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad dmigs par yang mi 'gyur la/ mthong bar yang mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' des chos thams cad mi dmigs shing mi mthong
340a6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i phyir/ zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa'ang skyed par mi byed do// gang po byang chub sems dpas gal te de ltar bsams kyang // zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa'i bsam pa skyes par 'gyur na/ gzhan yang 'di ltar la
340a7(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i dran pas 'di snyam du reg bya gang gi rgyu dang rkyen gyis bdag gi lus len par byed/ reg bya de dag gis gang du ni reg par 'gyur/ lus la gnod par gyur tam/ 'on te sems la gnod par 'gyur
340b1(dkon brtsegs): gal te lus la gnod par gyur pa yin na ni/ lus ni rtswa dang / shing dang / gyo mo dang / rdo dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu yin pas// rtog pa med pa/ shes pa med pa yin pas/ bdag kyang ma
340b2(dkon brtsegs): yin/ gzhan yang ma yin no// gal te sems la gnod par gyur pa yin na ni/ sems ni kha dog dang gzugs med pa/ skad cig mar skye zhing 'gag pa/ zang cig tsam yang mi gnas pas/
340b3(dkon brtsegs): bdag kyang ma yin// gzhan yang ma yin pas/ yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags nas/ 'di ni sdug bsngal lo// 'di ni bde ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin
340b4(dkon brtsegs): bde ba'ang ma yin pa'o zhes zer bar zad pas/ deng bdag gis yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par brtags pa 'di bskyud par mi bya'o// deng bdag gis mnyam pa nyid kyis yang
340b5(dkon brtsegs): dag pa'i mtshan nyid du bltas nas/ 'phags pa'i bya ba rnams bsgrub par bya'i/ byis pa so so'i skye bo'i bya ba'i rjes su 'brang bar mi bya'o// 'phags pa'i bya ba gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos rnams
340b6(dkon brtsegs): las thag ring du gyur cing / rnam par grol ba gang yin pa'o// bdag ni thag bsring ba'i phyir slob pa yin// mi 'phrod par bya ba'i phyir slob pa yin na// yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rnam par rtog pa 'di
340b7(dkon brtsegs): dag ni/ thams cad kyang 'phrod par byed pa yin te/ su dang 'phrod par byed pa yin zhe na/ 'dod chags dang 'phrod par byed pa yin// zhe sdang dang gti mug dang 'phrod par byed pa yin no// ji ltar na
341a1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang 'phrod par byed pa yin zhe na/ lus la rmongs pa'i phyir/ 'jib cho gra la lta ba la rmongs pa'i phyir dang / 'jig tshogs la lta
341a2(dkon brtsegs): ba la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir lus kyi sdug bsngal myong ba'i tshe// gzhan dpal mnar sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni zhe sdang dang 'phrod pa zhes bya'o// 'dzag tshogs la lta ba'i rmongs pa dang
341a3(dkon brtsegs): bcas pa'i phyir dang / 'jog tshigs la lta ba la mngon par zhen pa'i phyir dang / yid dang mi mthun par gyur pa'i phyir gzhan dag la mnar sems bskyed pa gang yin pa de ni gti mug dang 'phron
341a4(dkon brtsegs): pa zhes bya'o// gang dag 'di lta bu'i dug gsum gyis rtsa ba bcings nas/ 'di lta bu'i kha na ma tho ba'i las kyi rgyu dang rkyen slong bar byed na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su skyob par
341a5(dkon brtsegs): mi skyospyod no// gzhan gyis lta smos kyang ci dgos te/ deng bdag gis rgyu dang rkyen gyi chos rnams shin tu legs par so sor brtags nas/ chos stong pa nyid du blta bar bya'o snyam du bsam par bya'o//
341a6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' da ltar rjes su mthun par yang dag par lta bas rgyu dang rkyen gyis chos rnams so sor rtog par byed pa na/ chos 'ga' tsam yang sus byin pa 'am/ sus len pa 'am// dngos po gang yin pa/
341a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan yang 'di snyam du chos thams cad ni rgyu rkyen mang po las skyes pa yin pas/ rang bzhin gyis gzod ma nyid nas stong pa yin te// nges
341b1(dkon brtsegs): par dmigs su med par ston pa yin na// bdag ci'i phyir yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos dmigs su med ba dag la las mngon par 'dus byas nas zhe sdang bskyed de/ 'dra g+sa kyai d+hA rten spong bar byed/ deng bdag gis
341b2(dkon brtsegs): zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa med pa'i bsam pa bskyed nas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / skye ba med pa'i chos mngon par bsgrubs nas stong pa nyid kyi chos nyid du blta bar bya'i// bdag nyid kyi
341b3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar mi bya'o// der bdag gis mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / skyo ba med pa'i chos la blta bar bya'o// mngon par 'du bya ba dang // 'byung ba'i chos la gnas par mi bya'o//
341b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du chos rnams bsam par bya'i/ rang bdag gis yang dag pa ma yin pa yod pa ma yin pa 'di la nan tan gyis chos su 'du shes bskyed par mi bya ste/ yang dag pa ma
341b5(dkon brtsegs): yin pas nan tan gyis mngon par 'du byed pa ni zhe sdang dpopo du 'dzin pa dag yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi ngo bo la gnas pa la ni zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa yod kyi/ chos rnams kyi yang dag pa'i
341b6(dkon brtsegs): mtshan nyid mthar stong pa nyid la ni gnas par bya ba'i chos kyi ngo bo gzod ma 'di nas med pas so snyam du bsam par bya'o// byang chub sems de pas de ltar chos rnams yid la byas par gyur na/ de'i sems rab tu
341b7(dkon brtsegs): dben par gyur nas zhe sdang dang khon du 'dzin pa skye bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' de 'gro 'am/ 'greng ngam/ 'dug gam nyal lam gnyid log gam ka sad pa'i tshe'ang rung ste/
342a1(dkon brtsegs): 'ga' zhig 'ongs nas spos dri zhim pa 'am/ spos kyi phye ma 'am/ byug spos sam/ me tog mchog dam pa dag lus la gtor ram/ yang na spos dang / me tog mchog dam pa dang /
342a2(dkon brtsegs): se mo do dang / me tog tsam pa ka'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog pa ri sha ka'i 'phreng ba dang / me tog mang po'i 'phreng ba dag gis lus la g.yogs par gyur tam/ yang na gos mchog dam pa shin tu phra zhing 'jam pa
342a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di lta ste / ka shi ka 'am ku sha ka 'am ku sha pa 'am ka ku sha ma'i pa 'am/ ko sha ya sha'am/ chu ma 'am/ ka pa 'am/ de dag la sogs pa gos phra zhing 'jam pa dag gis lus la g.yogs par
342a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur tam/ yang na daT gyi lda ldi mchog dam pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan dag bdag nyid kyi steng du bres par gyur tam/ yang na lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / gos mchog dam pa dang //
342a5(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i 'phreng ba dag gis lus la g.yogs par gyur tam/ yang na lha'i kha zas mchog dam pa bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dang ldan pa dag khyer te 'ongs nas byin par gyur na/ byang chub sems dpas mchod
342a6(dkon brtsegs): pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'di dag la sred pa'i sems bskyed nas mngon par zhen par mi bya'o// rkyen des gang zag de dag la brten nas yid dang mthun par byas te/ phan tshun 'phrul zhing gtam smra bar yang
342a7(dkon brtsegs): mo bya'o// phyogs gcig pa'i sems kyis rjes su chags par yang mi bu'o// byang chub sems dpa' de dag la sems sboms par bya zhing chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rab tu
342b1(dkon brtsegs): rtags par byas nas 'di snyam du/ bdag gis sems can rnams la khong khro bar yang ma bya/ rjes su chags par yang mi bya'o// de ci phyir zhe na/ byams sdang gi dngos po gnyis ka'ang nyon mongs pa
342b2(dkon brtsegs): yin pas so// rang bdag gis de dag la sred pa mi snyed par chos rnams kyi yang dag pa 'od legs par rtogs par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyi nang na sred pa'i rkyen gyis drang
342b3(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa 'di lci bas so// de ltar nyon mongs pa de ni rus pa dang rkang las kyang thal te 'gro ba kun tu sbyor ba skyed pa'i chos kyi nang na snyed pa'i sems kyis na shin tu mngon par zhen par mi byed de/
342b4(dkon brtsegs): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags par bya ba'i dngos po gal te yid bzhin du thob par ma gyur na zhe sdang skye bar 'gyur bas so// skye bo rnams ni rang gi lus la 'dod chags kyi sred pa skye bar byed pas/
342b5(dkon brtsegs): dag gal te 'ga' zhig gis gnod par byas par gyur na zhe sdang skye bar gyur pas// de'i phyir zhe sdang ni sred pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yin la/ mngon par zhen pa ni gti mug gi 'bras bu rnam par
342b6(dkon brtsegs): smin pa yin par rig par bya'o// deng bdag ni sred pas gos pa'i sems spangs nas// chos rnams la mngon par zhen pa med par bya'o// bdag ni 'dod chags kyi phyir slob pa ma yin/ zhe
342b7(dkon brtsegs): sdang gi phyir slob pa ma yin// gti mug gi phyir slob pa ma yin gyi// bdag ni chos rnams kyi de kho na nyid la rgya cher slob pa ma yin pas// chos rnams kyi mtshan 'ad yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du/
343a1(dkon brtsegs): bltas nas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag pa nyid du spyad nas ka las dang rnam par smin pa'i rgyu rkyen la brten nas/ mchod pa dang / sdug bsngal gyi dngos po rnams
343a2(dkon brtsegs): kyang sngon gyi las kyi spyod pa'i rkyen las gyur pa yin par rig par byas nas/ de'i phyir rjes su mthun par gyur pa'i chos rnams la'ang dga' zhing sred pa mi bskyed/ dge ba'i chos dang 'gal
343a3(dkon brtsegs): ba la'ang zhe sdang mi bskyed par sems yongs su sbyangs te/ mnar sems med par byas nas/ 'dod chags kyi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya// zhe sdang gi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya
343a4(dkon brtsegs): gti mug gi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya// sdig pa'i chos kyi rjes su 'brang bar yang mi bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos dang po 'di dang ldan par
343a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal
343a6(dkon brtsegs): pa ngas ni rtag tu shes rab bsngags// tshul khrims bsrung ba'ang bsngags pa yin// bzod pa bsgom la bsngag byed cing // mang du thos pa'ang bsngags pa yin// nga ni dge ba'i
343a7(dkon brtsegs): chos spyod dang // byams sems tshig snyan sgra la bsngags// sem can la ni phan gdags phyir// yon tan mang po ci rigs bsngags// nga ni rtag tu 'dod lnga dang // khong khro khon
343b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin gti mug can// phrag drob nga rgyal g.yo sgyu dang / 'khrug long sems can gnod byed smod// le lo dang no snyoms las dang // bka' blo ma bde sna dka' dang // bu dka' ma bzod la mchog
343b2(dkon brtsegs): can nyes pa chung la cher khro dang // rnyed pa la ni gdu ba dang // bdag ni smad par rab dga' zhing // gzhan gyi rnyed la mi dga' ba// 'di dag la ni mi bsngags// blo chung rnyed pa bdag
343b3(dkon brtsegs): 'dod cing // gzhan gyi rnyed la phrab dog che// gzhan gyi khyim la ser sna byed// 'di dag la nar mi bsdabs// rnyed pa dag ni 'tshal ba'i phyir// spyod lam dge ni 'chos byed ba// 'don
343b4(dkon brtsegs): bdag min pas// nga yi chos las shin tu ring // lam mo bsgom pa dag la ni// nyes pa 'di dag thams cad yod// 'don ngan 'gro rkyen yin pas// dngos po 'ga' yang bsngags su mad/
343b5(dkon brtsegs): sdig pa bdag lha ma spangs na// 'dod sred sems ni rab tu mang // 'dod sred sems ni mang ba'i phyir// rnyed pa dag la gdu bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du// bgrod bsgoms sems
343b6(dkon brtsegs): can pa na gdags shing // khengs pa'i sems ni rab dul nas// myur du sangs rgyas bya bar sems// bdag gis byams sems rab bsgoms te// bzod pas sems can brtse bar bya// chos rnams
343b7(dkon brtsegs): stong zhing rkyen las byung // 'brel pa med cing shes par bya// rkyeni gang gis ni chos rnams yod// chos de sems las byung ba yin// mi bden 'du shes khong khro bskyed// mkhas pa thams cad stong pa yin//
344a1(dkon brtsegs): mi bden 'du shes khams gsum bskyed// lus kyi rgyun ni 'chang mi 'gyur// mi bden 'du shes mi rtog na// nyes dmigs 'di dag yod mi 'gyur// rtag tu chos rnams sems
344a2(dkon brtsegs): mas na// rkyen las byung ba rab tu shes// rtab tu chos rnams stong lta bas// thams cad yongs su bzlog par nus// khrims spangs sems can sdug bsngal ba// nga rgyal dag gis smras pa la/
344a3(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal nyer zhi chos ston pas// phan pa mang po rab tu byed// gang zhig shar nub lho brang dang // phyogs mtshams bzhi po dag nas ni// mi gtsang rug gi bum thogs nas// mgo yi steng du blugs
344a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur kyang // sus byin sus ni len byed ces// bdag ni khong khro'i sems mi skyed// chos gang zhig ni bdag yin zhes// brtags nas brtson 'grus rtsom par byed// zhes pa ci yod gnod byas ces// /
344a5(dkon brtsegs): ngan sems gzhan la lta mi byed// shin tu brtan pa'i bzod bskyed nas// byams sems de la phan 'dogs byed// sngon gyi las las gyur shes pas// rnam smin 'di myong snyam du sems//
344a6(dkon brtsegs): blangs te bzod byed pas// byang chub lam la gnas par byed// smod dang sdug bsngal dngos po 'di// gzhan gyis byas pa ma yin gyi// 'di ni nges par las kyi rkyen// yun ring lon
344a7(dkon brtsegs): kyang chud mi za// sems can 'jig rten gnas pa dag/ rtag tu dge sdig las slong bas// deng bdag sdug bsngal 'di myong yang // las rkyen yin par rab tu shes// gal te ngan mas lan
344b1(dkon brtsegs): byas na// phyis kyang sdug bsngal myong 'gyur na// ci'i phyir dngos po ngan pa yis// de dag la ni gnod bya snyam// bla na med pa'i chos gnyer nas// gzhan dag la ni ston byed pas/
344b2(dkon brtsegs): sems can sdug bsngal ji snyed pa// thams cad las ni thar par byed// gal te 'ga' zhig me tog spos// 'phreng bdag gis bdag mchod kyang // rjes su chags pa mi spyad mas// mnyam pa
344b3(dkon brtsegs): bsgom pa bsgrib bu snyam// byams sdang bdag ni lam man pas// rtag tubatang snyoms spyod par byed// sus byin sus ni len byed ces// chos rnams yang dag rtog par byed// stong pas byin zhing stong
344b4(dkon brtsegs): len na// phyi nang gnyis ka stong pas na// stong la byin dang len med pas// thams cad kun la bdag med do// stong la 'dod chags bral ba med// stong la kun nas nyon mongs med// rnam par
344b5(dkon brtsegs): byang ba'ang med pas na// dri bral rnam dag stong pa yin// stong la rnam par rtog pa med// stong la jo bo nyid rnams med// stong ni rtag stong mtshan ma med// de ni rnam dag lam yin no// gal te 'a
344b6(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'ongs gyur nas// lus ni dum bur bcad gyur kyang // las kyi rgyun las byung rig pas// de la zhe sdang yod mi skyed// sems can dge sngog slong bas na// las bzhin dang zhing 'bras bu
344b7(dkon brtsegs): len/ bdag kyang nges par snga ma'o sdig/ sdug bsngal rnam smin 'ang myong snyam// sdig pa'i rnam smin 'di myong yang // lus brtags gzugs brnyan chu bur dang // sgyu ma sprul pa smis rgyu 'ang// stong cing
345a1(dkon brtsegs): mes pas mthar yang stong // kha cig lus kyi yan lag gcod// kha cig drin ni dran gyur nas// mchod pa dag ni byas gyur kyang // dga' dang mi dga' yong mi byed/
345a2(dkon brtsegs): rnyed pa thob kyang dga' ba med// kha ngan byas kyang khong mi khro// 'di gnyis sgrib pa yin pas na// sangs rgyas yang dag lam min sems// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug sems// de dag thams cad
345a3(dkon brtsegs): spong bar byed// rtag tu stong dben bsgoms pas na// sgrib pa rnams ni spang bar byed// bzod pa stobs bcu'i gzhi yin te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul gnas// thogs med ye shes snying
345a4(dkon brtsegs): rje yi rtsa ba dag ni bzod pa yin// bden pa ni dran dang yang dag spong // dbang stobs byang chub lam yan lag/ thams cad bzod pas gzhi byed pas// mkhas pa gang zhig bzod mi sgom
345a5(dkon brtsegs): ngas kyang wA rA NA sir ni// bla med 'khor lo bskor ba yang // bzod pa dag gis gzhi byas pas// sangs rgyas rtag tu bzod pa bsngags// khyed kyang stong bzod bla med gzhi// yongs su sgom par
345a6(dkon brtsegs): byed na ni// chos kyi chos nyid de yin pas// sangs rgyas yon tan thob par 'gyur// gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni 'dod pa lnga po dag
345a7(dkon brtsegs): spangs nas/ rtag par rab tu byung bar mos pas sems kyis rab tu byung ba'i rjes su 'brang bar byed/ rab tu byung ba la gsol bar byed pas/ 'dod pa lnga po dag la mngon par zhen par mi byed do// rab tu byung nas
345b1(dkon brtsegs): 'du 'dzi rnams spangs nas shin tu thas ring ba'i ri rang nags tshal dben pa rag tu gnas shing / dge ba'i chos chud mi za bar byed do// byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gnyis pa 'didang ldan par gyur na
345b2(dkon brtsegs): yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ rab tu byung la rtag mos pas// rtag tu rab tu byung
345b3(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur// ri dang nags tshal gnas mos pas// yon tan 'byung gnas 'phel bar byed// dben par gnas la rten byed pas// 'dod lnga tshogs pa yongs su spong // de na 'du 'dzi med pas
345b4(dkon brtsegs): na dge chos rkyen ni nyams mi 'gyur// phan tshun 'grul zhing gtam 'dri dang // tshig gis smra bar mi byed pas// stong dben nyer zhi dben pa la// sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bstabs/
345b5(dkon brtsegs): de phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams// rtag par yongs su bsten bya zhing // grong khyer lan chags mi bya// bsten na rnyed sems skye bar 'gyur// rnyed pa thob na rab tu dka'// stor par
345b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur na mya ngan skye// de yis sangs rgyas mchod pas kyang // mchod pa byas zhes mi brjod do// de 'dra'i zhes dmigs spong 'dod na// rnyed pa rnams ni sdang bar bya// spangs nas
345b7(dkon brtsegs): gnas daden rab gnas nas// stong pa'i chos ni bsgom par bya/ gzhan yang gang po byang chub sems dpa' ni rtag par chos banyer ba yongs su slob par byed pas/ yongs su
346a1(dkon brtsegs): gnyeb nas kyang klog cing kha ton du bton nas 'di ltar tshul khrims yongs su dag pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan shin tu phra ba'i chos yongs su 'tshol bar byed kyig 'dod pa mang
346a2(dkon brtsegs): po dang / chog mi shes pa'i chos yongs su 'tshol bar mi byed do// 'dod chags nye bar zhi ba yongs su 'tshal bar byed kyi// 'dod chags spel bar mi byed do// zhe sdang gzhom pa yongs su 'tshal bar
346a3(dkon brtsegs): byed kyi/ zhe sdang 'phel bar mi byed do// gti mug gcod pa yongs su 'tshal bar byed kyi / gti mug skyed par mi byed do// khengs pa bcom pa yongs su 'chol bar byed kyi/ khengs pa slong pa yongs
346a4(dkon brtsegs): su 'tshol bar mi byed do// nga rgyal gzhom ma yongs su 'tshol bar byed kyi/ nga rgyal 'phel ba yongs su 'tshol bar mi byed do// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos spong ba yongs su 'tshol bar byed kyi//
346a5(dkon brtsegs): bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa'i chos 'phel bar med pa yongs su 'tshol bar mi byed do// bad ba med pa'i chos yongs su 'tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag dang / gang zag dang / sems can dang / srog la
346a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas pa'i chos yongs su 'tshol bar mi byed do// rtag par shes rab chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su 'tshol bar byed kyi/ shes ra ba chen po nyams par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su 'tshol
346a7(dkon brtsegs): bar mi byed do// rtag par mtshungs pa med pa'i shes rab thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su 'tshol bar byed kyi/ shes rab rgya chung ngu thob par 'gyur ba'i chos yongs su 'tshol bar mi byed do//
346b1(dkon brtsegs): phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob par 'gyur ba'i chos rnams yongs su 'tshal bar byed kyi sayon tan rnams sun sum tshogs par mi gyur pa'i chos yongs su 'tshal bar ma byed do// de
346b2(dkon brtsegs): chos yongs su btsal nas kyang / klog par byed/ kha ton du 'don par byed/ tshul bzhin du yang dag par yid la byed// ji skad bstan pa bzhin du yang dag par yid la byed/ sgrub par byed / gnan
346b3(dkon brtsegs): dgal yang dag par rab tu ston par byed kyang / 'jig rten pa'i khe'ang yongs su 'tshol bar mi byed la/ tha na logs so zhes bya ba'i bsngags pa brjod pa tsam yang yongs su 'chol bar mi byed pas
346b4(dkon brtsegs): sems can mang po chos de la dgod par byed de/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'di dang ldan par gyur na/ yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu 'thob par 'gyur
346b5(dkon brtsegs): ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rab byung ni/ tshul khrims sbyangs pa dag la mos/ des na shes rab yongs 'phel nas/
346b6(dkon brtsegs): ye shes char ni 'bebs par med// rnam dag chos zab zos nas// yang dag dran pas don sems byed// ji skad bstan pa bzhin du ni// de bzhin yang dag sgrub par byed// rtag tu rnam
346b7(dkon brtsegs): dag sems kyis ni// gzhan la rgya cher rab bstan nas// sems can mang la phan 'dogs kyang // sems la re ba cung zad med// yon tan rnams kyi ro rnyed nas// bdag nyid chos de ba gnas shig/
347a1(dkon brtsegs): gzhan yang de la 'god byed pas// de phyir sangs rgyas chos 'phel 'gyur// bskal pa tshad med rnams su ni// yon tan mang po ci bsags pa// thams cad mngon
347a2(dkon brtsegs): du gyur nas ni// byang chub lam bdud 'jug 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas bsngags pa yi// chos zab dag na yongs btsal nas// rtag par sems can bstan par bya// yon tan rnams ni de 'ag
347a3(dkon brtsegs): sgyu/ gang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang tshul khrims yongs su srung zhing sbyangs pa'i chos la rab tu gnas par gyur na// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad phun sum
347a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs pa'i bsod nams dang ldan par 'gyur ro// gang po sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus bskal pa grangs med ma tshad med cing mtha' yas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yang ches bsam gyis mi khyab pa byung ba
347a5(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa// 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i la
347a6(dkon brtsegs): lo sgyur ba// lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das me ro gan da zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni tshe lo drug cu thub par gyur to// 'dus pa re re la chos
347a7(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i tshe nyan thos bye ba phrag brgyad cu dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me co gnan yongs su mya ngan las 'das ma'i 'og tu dam pa'i chos ni lo lnga brgya'i bar du gnas
347b1(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu zhage bdun tshun chad nyan thos chen po ji sbed pa pal cher de bzhin gshegs pa'i rjes su yongs su mya na las das pagyur to//
347b2(dkon brtsegs): gang pode bzhin gshegs pa de'angang ji lta ba bzhin du snyigs ma lnga'i dus kyi tshe 'jig rten du byung bar gyur te/ nyan thos chen po rnams yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu/ de'i tshe skye bo rnams pal char 'a
347b3(dkon brtsegs): snyam du dge sbyong gi chos ni rab tu bde zhing skyid pa yin na// bdeg cig ci'i phyir so so nas rab tu mi 'byung snyam du bsams nas/ so so nas spa dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig bgos nas khyim nas
347b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // rab tu byung nas kyang dngos po gsum po rtag par khyim pa'i khyim du 'gro zhing 'grul bar byed pa dang / rnyed pa la mngon par zhen nas bdag nyid 'tsho bar byed pa dang / bdag
347b5(dkon brtsegs): nyid nyam tshig 'tsho ba 'ba' zhig tu sbyor zhing bsod nams dang ye shes dang mi ldan pa 'ba' zhig spyod par gyur pas/ dngos po gsum mo 'di 'ba' zhib spyod par byed kyi/ khas gzhan ni mngon par
347b6(dkon brtsegs): mi sgrub par gyur to// lo brgya 'das pa'i 'og tu nyan thos chen po thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das te ma lus par gyurab nas/ dge slong mang po de dag khyim pa rnams dang mthun par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi mdo sde
347b7(dkon brtsegs): zab mo rnams dang / tshul khrim bsrung ba dang / spungs pa'i yon tan spod lam zhib mo gya nom pa'i chos rnams ni phal cher spangs nas su'ang klog cing 'don pa med par gyur to// gang po de'i tshe dge slong rnams 'dod pa
348a1(dkon brtsegs): mang po dag la spyod par mos shing bza' ba dang btung ba'i ro la chags par gyur pas// de'i tshe rgyal mo'i budam shi bi zhes bya ba rgyal po shin tu byams shing gces par byed pa zhig yod do// des
348a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas dben pa zhig tu gnas nas/ 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gnangs chos ji lta bu zhig brnyes na/ deng de'i nyan thos rnams bag med par spyod cing / khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med par gyur ces de snyam du sems
348a3(dkon brtsegs): shing the tshom du gyur pa dang / de'i tshe lha meg de'i thad du 'ongs nas lus mi snang bar byas te 'di skad du/ kye rgyal bu de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan ngas brnyes pa'i chos ni shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges pa
348a4(dkon brtsegs): yin no zhes smras so// de nas rgyal bu des lhas de skad smras pa thos pa dang / 'di skad du kye de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan ngas brnyed pa'i chos shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges par gyur pa'i
348a5(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi dngos po de ji lta bu zhig yin/ lhas smras pa/ rgyal bu chos de ni gzugs kyang med/ tshob pa dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'ang med/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched
348a6(dkon brtsegs): kyang med/ 'dod pa lnga'ang med// 'dod pa'i sems kyang med de// de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan ngas de lta bu'i chos shin tu zab cing yongs su dag la rnam par nges pa brnyes pa sems can rnams la
348a7(dkon brtsegs): yang dag par rab tu bstan to// de nas rgyal bu des/ lha de la smras pa/ bdag gis de lta bu'i chos thos shing khong du chud par grub nas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub tu rung ngam/ lhas
348b1(dkon brtsegs): smras pa/ kye rgyal bu khyod sems rtse gcig nan tan brtson 'grus byos shig dang / thob par dka' ba med do// gang po de'i tshe rgyal bu de 'di snyam du nges par lhas kyang bskul te/ bdag gis 'ong /
348b2(dkon brtsegs): du chud par byas nas/ bdag rab tu byung ste chos zab mo de rab tu yongs su gnyer bar bya'o snyam du bsams nas/ pa ma ga la ba de song ste mgos gtugs te phug byas nas 'di skad ces
348b3(dkon brtsegs): smras so// yab yum reng bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan da'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas lam yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal lo// pha mas smras pa/ khyod dang nged spangs
348b4(dkon brtsegs): nas rab tu byung ba de ci dgos da ltar sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la rab tu byung ba rnams ni khyim pa rnams dang bye brag tu gyur pa ci'ang med do// de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de smras pa da ltar
348b5(dkon brtsegs): dge slong mang po rnams// bag mang 'dod pa lnga yang spyod// zhing rmod ni tshong byed pas na// khyim pa rnams dang bye brag med// dbul po sdug bsngal rab mang zhing // bdag
348b6(dkon brtsegs): gso bar mi nus pa// de 'dra'i skye bo mang po rnams// lus gso'i phyir ni rab tu byung // khyod ni rgyal rigs khyim du skyes// phyug cing 'di lnga'i bde ba myong // nor dang rin chen rab mang
348b7(dkon brtsegs): na rab tu byung bas ci zhig bya// de nas rgyal bu dam shi ris/ pha ma la tshogs su bcad de smras pa/ bdag ni dbang phyug mi 'tshol te// gal te thob kyang spong bar bgyid// deng bdag sangs rgyas chos zab dang /
349a1(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag tshul khrims 'ba' zhig 'tshol// lha zhig bdag ni go bgyis te// rab tu byung bar bskul bas na// sangs rgyas gsung ba'i zab mo chos// bdag ni rab tu rtogs
349a2(dkon brtsegs): par 'tshal// lhas smras bdag gis thos pas na// sems ni rab tu dga' bar gyur// sangs rgyas bstan ma nub tu nye// bdag ni grogs bgyi bsrung bar sems// de nas pa mas tshigs su bcad de dam
349a3(dkon brtsegs): shi ri la smras pa// mdo sde zab mo zad nus pas// kha ton 'don pa'ang yong med na// da ring khyod kyis su las ni// sangs rgyas chos zab thob par 'gyur// gal te 'khor ni bzhi po las// don
349a4(dkon brtsegs): zab 'don pa yod gyur na// de las khyod kyis sngar mnyan nas// de 'og rab tu byung ba'i rigs// ra ma shi ris tshigs su bcad de/ pha ma la smras pa/ deng bdag nan tan brtson 'grus kyis// tshul khrims
349a5(dkon brtsegs): bsrung zhing sbyangs pa spyod// zag ring ri dang nag tshal nas// sangs rgyas chos zab rnam dga'atshol// gang po dam shi ris tshogs su bcad de pa ma la smras nas/ mgo bos phyag byas te rab tu byung bar
349a6(dkon brtsegs): gsol ba btab pa dang / pha ma gnyis kyang cang mi smra bar gnang ngo // de nas de dge slong rnams kyi thad du song nas skra dang kha spu bregs te/ chos gos ngur smrig bgos nas rab tu byung ste ga bslab pa'i
349a7(dkon brtsegs): dngos po rnams yang dag par blangs nas gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan ras rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gos slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan par mdzad/
349b1(dkon brtsegs): bdag gis thos par gyur na/ dza skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang ga gang po dge slong mang po rnams kyis// dge slong dam sha ri la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag
349b2(dkon brtsegs): cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa las chos thos pa ni med kyi/ mkhan po dang slob dpon rnams kyi rjes su spyod par zad pas/ deng khyod kyang 'di lta bu'i chos la spyod cig/ de nas dge slong dman
349b3(dkon brtsegs): ris dge slong rnams la smras pa/ khyed ni gdon mi za bar dbul po smad rims las rab tu byung ba yin pas/ de'i phyir deng khyod gos zas 'ba' zhig lhur len pas spyod pa rnams khyim pa dag dang rgya
349b4(dkon brtsegs): brag tu gyur pa ci'ang med pas na/ deng khyed bdag dang lhan cig tu sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo yongs su dag pa btsal bar bya'o// de nas de'i tshe dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de/ dge
349b5(dkon brtsegs): slong dam shi ri la smras pa/ bdag cag gis ni gang bsgrubs pa// dngos po de ni thob gyur pas// gos zas dag ni 'byor cing ldan// rgyal pos bkol ba las kyang thar// shin tu bde
349b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhing rab tu skyid// brnyas shing nga rgyal byed pa med// khyim pa'i sdug bsngal gang yin pa// de dag da ltar gang yang med// 'di nyid mya ngan 'das yin pas// mchog tu bde bar gyur
349b7(dkon brtsegs): ba yin// dngos po 'di las lhag pa ni// bdag cag la ni dgos pa med// khyim pas rtag tu sbyor 'bul bas// bdag cag chos gos lhung bzed mang // sman dang nor zas shin tu mang /
350a1(dkon brtsegs): sbyin bdag khyim yang rab tu mang // gang po de'i tshe dge slong dam shi zos/ dge slong mang po rnams kyis tshigs su bcad de de skad smras pa thos pa dang / sems la rab tu gdung /
350a2(dkon brtsegs): bskyes nas mchi ma blags te dus nas/ gtsug lag khang gzhan dag tu song ste/ yang dngos po des dge slong mang po rnams la de bzhiran gshegs pa me ro gnadas rjes su bstan pa ji lta bu zhig gis
350a3(dkon brtsegs): slob ma rnams la rjes su bstan par mdzad/ bdag gis thos par gyur na/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub par 'tshal lo zhes smras pa dang / dge slong mang po rnams kyis kyang snga ma bzhin du
350a4(dkon brtsegs): len btab par gyur to// de nas dge slong da ma shi ris dge slong mang po de dag spangs nas gcig pu raM dang nags tshal dben pa'i gnas su song nas/ sems rtse gcig tu chos zab mo gnyer ba
350a5(dkon brtsegs): la 'dun par gyur pa dang / de'i tshe sngon de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan da'i nyan thos rnams kyi nang na nyan thos chen po shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba rab tu dben pa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs/
350a6(dkon brtsegs): ma/ gcig pu ri phug dben par gnas pa/ 'dod pa nyung zhing chog shes pa/ yongs su spong ba la sems mngon par spro ba/ bya ba byas pa/ mngon par shes pa drug dang / rig pa gsum dang
350a7(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa'i dgra bcom pa chen po zhig byung bar gyur te/ ji ltar da ltar nga'i bstan pa las 'od bsrungs chen po ji lta ba bzhin no// de'i tshe dge slong shin tu brtan pa des bdag nyid gnas pa'i ri rug
350b1(dkon brtsegs): go brag ngos la tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag mi ger bris par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i ron myangs pa'i phyir// 'khor ba dag ni rgyun mo gcod// dgran gsos nas dung khrod 'jug don med
350b2(dkon brtsegs): sdug bsngal mang po myong // lus 'di mi gtsang ro dang 'dra// brag dgunas mi gtsang 'dzag/ sngon du mi gtsang myos pa bzhin// blun pos lus sred de dang 'dra// yang dag ma yin kun rtog pa// des
350b3(dkon brtsegs): mi do lnga'i rtsa ba yin// mkhas ma dag na mo rtog pas// 'dod lnga dag na 'gag par 'gyur// log rtog las ni 'dod chen skye// 'dod chen las ni nyon mongs kyi// yang dgadun la zhen med pas/
350b4(dkon brtsegs): na mongs lhag ma'ang zad par 'gyug// bam po byin pa/ gang ma dag slong shin tu brtun pas da phyag ga brag ngas latshigs su bcad pa
350b5(dkon brtsegs): bo di dag yi ger bris pa// dge slong dam sha 'i bug ben par song bas yun dang khrig yon nas sug gi brag ngos la tshags su bcad pa sam pa'ang dag yi bar bris pa mthong nas la ngan du bsgrubs te/
350b6(dkon brtsegs): de'i don gang yin pa yid la byas pa dang / ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga thob par gyur to// de nas bzhin ga zhen pa ma da rdzo ru pa shed pa'i gnas su phyin nas ma phyag byas te lan gsum bskor ba bas
350b7(dkon brtsegs): nas rgyal mo drang bcas te 'du nas 'dag ces/ bdag thos banas 'a' bache gshebs pa'ang ma mthong chos gzhan yang mthos kyi mar du 'dalas ma ldang ngoms med ma bcas so// nga ba sa la ses
351a1(dkon brtsegs): pa me ro gnad sa gsungs pa'i mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa zhes bya ba brgya byin lha'i dbang pos mdo sde de kha ton du shes pas/ brgya byin lha'i dbang pos dge slong dam shi ri'i lhag pa'i
351a2(dkon brtsegs): bsam pa sems kyis rtogs nas sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas babs te/ de'i drung du phyin nas/ de la mdo sde sgo stong phrag brgyad brgya pa de yang dag par bshad do// gzhan yang mang du thos pa'i dngos gzhi'i chog
351a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhi dang / rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshig bdun dang / sgo'i tshig bcu bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyang byin no// dge slong dam shi ris thos nas kyang kha ton du bton te yongs su bzung bas chos rnams la shes rab
351a4(dkon brtsegs): kyi snang ba thob par gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan ras gsungs pa'i mdo sde yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa ga bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa/ zab mo shin tu bya nom pa'i mdo
351a5(dkon brtsegs): sde rnams kyang rang gi ngang gis sems la snang bar gyur to// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan ra'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'khor dang bcas pa bzhugs pa'i gnas dri gtsang khang dang / gdan khri dang /
351a6(dkon brtsegs): 'khor bzhi po rnams rang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang bcas/
351a7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// dge slong dam shi ri'ang chos rnams la shes rab kyi snang ba thob par gyur pas// 'dug pa'i bstan las langs nas mthar gyis rang yul du song ste/
351b1(dkon brtsegs): pa ma'i drung du tshun nas/ pha ma la yongs su rag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa/ bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa/ zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag mar bshad nas ka sangs rgyas dang /
351b2(dkon brtsegs): chos dang / dge 'dun gyi yon tan gyi bsngags pa rab tu brjod pas/ gang po de'i tshe dge slong ram shi ri'i pha ma dang / nang gi btsun mo dang / blon po chen po dang / 'khor rnams kyis chos de thos nas shir tu
351b3(dkon brtsegs): mngon par yid ches par gyur pas/ gus pa'i sems kyis dge slong dam shi ri la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa bdag cab yongs su bsgrub cing de bzhin gshegs pa maro gan da'i bstan pa la ba
351b4(dkon brtsegs): tu byung du gsol zhing / gang po de'i tshe srog chags brgyad khri bzhi stong rgyal mo dang btsun mo rab tu byung ba'i rjes su dus gcig tu rab tu byung bar grub to// rab tu byung nas thams cad kyi ming da ma shi ri'i
351b5(dkon brtsegs): tshogs kyi dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to// gang po dge slong da ma shi ris de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan da'i bstan pa slar rgyas par byas nas/ sems can mang po de dag
351b6(dkon brtsegs): bde ba la yang dag par bkod do// sngon gyi tshe rabs kyi byams pa dang snying rje chen po'i sems kyis dam pa'i chos bsrung bar smon lam btab pa'i phyir/ de'i tshe dge slong dam shi ri ljongs gcig nas
351b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu / grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/ yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan da dang / de'i nyan thos kyi bsngags pa'ang brjod/ gzhan yang yongs su dag cing
352a1(dkon brtsegs): stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa/ bral ba'i rjes su mthun pa ga zab mo shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde rnams kyang sems can rnams la rgya tshor yang dag mar rab tu bstan pas do'i tsha pa/
352a2(dkon brtsegs): slong ram sha ri'ang skye bo mang po kun gyi mchod cing rim gro dang / bkur sti dang / bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod pas spyan pa'i grags pa'ang kun tu grags par gyur to// gang po dge slong dmag ris
352a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar sems can mang pos don rgya cher byas nas/ de'i 'og tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / de'i slob ma dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang // dge bsnyen dang // dge bsnyen ma rnams lhan cig 'dus te/ spos kyi shing
352a4(dkon brtsegs): thams cad srungs nas mchod pa byas te bsregs nas ring bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grags gnyis yod pa brtsegs te/ me tog dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / spos kyi phye ma dang // gdugs dang /
352a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal mtshan dang ba dan sna tshogs kyis gus par mchod cing / rim gro dang bla mar byas nas bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong ra ma shi ri 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe slar 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyidadu
352a6(dkon brtsegs): skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btang bas/ smon lam btab pa bzhin du rgyal rigs su skyes nas dran pa thob pa zhes bya bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa me To gnar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu
352a7(dkon brtsegs): sum brgya lon ma'i bstan pa la rab tu byung ste/ sngon gyi smon lam dang tshe rabs dran pa'i shes pa'i dbang gis sgo rnams kyi tshig ces bya ba'i gzungs kyi tshig kyang rang gi ngang gis slar thob par 'gyur to// gzungs thob pa'i/
352b1(dkon brtsegs): stobs kyi dbang zas sngon ma thos pa'i mad snga rnams sems can la rgya cher yang dag par bstan gyi/ tshe rabs snga ma la sngar bshad par gyub pa dab nim bstan no// gang po de'i tshi ma na'i'i dge slong mang po rnams
352b2(dkon brtsegs): las gang shes rab zab cing gsal la rno ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun stug po gang yin pa de dag ni dran ma thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde rnams thos par gyur na sems kyis rjes su yi rang nas mngon par yod ches
352b3(dkon brtsegs): shing dang du len par byed/ gus pas mchod pa bus nas dge slong rngon pa thob pala'ang yongs su srung bar byed do// dge slong de dag las gang gzi byin dang yon tan med pa dang / dbang po rtul zhing migasal
352b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba chung ba de dag ni dge slong dran ma thob pas gsar du bshad pa'i chos thos par gyur na/ mngon par yid ches pa'ang med/ rang du len pa'ang med// 'gal ba dag byas nas skyon
352b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dzin cing 'di skad du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde 'di dag ni/ bdag cag gis mkhan po dang slob dpon las kyang mthos/ sngon slob dpon chen po dam shi ro las kyang mthos so zer ro// gang po de dag las
352b6(dkon brtsegs): gang shes rab zab cing yang dag pa'i don la rton pa de dag ni tshig gi rjes su mi 'brang bar don la rton pa'i phyir/ sems kyis kyang 'gal bar mi byed do// 'gal bar mi byed pa'i phyir de bzhin gshes
352b7(dkon brtsegs): pa ma do gar da'i bstan pa la'ang yang dag par srung bar byed la gagus pas dge slong dran ma thob pa la'ang srung bar byed do// gang po de'i che dge slong dang ga dge slong ma dang ka/ dge bsder dang
353a1(dkon brtsegs): dge bsnyen ma'i 'khor khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu dge slong dran pa thob pas bstan pa'i mdo sde'i chos kyi rjes su zhugs par gyur to// gang po de'i ched man dri'i slob ma 'khor rnams
353a2(dkon brtsegs): logs shig tu sde gnyis su gyes par gyur te/ gcig gi ming ni dam shi ri'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur to// gcig gi ming ni dran pa thob pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun zhes bya bar gyur kyang /
353a3(dkon brtsegs): de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pas bdag ni ra ma shi r-i yin no zhes ma smras so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i tshe dge slong dam shi ri ni mang po kun gyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur gyi / byang chub
353a4(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ni ma yin no zhes zer nas/ gal te bdag nyid kyis smras par gyur na mang po kun the tshom za bar gyur pa dang / dge slong dran pa thob pa ni de'i tshe mang po kun gyis 'di ni byang chub sems
353a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' yin gyi gdagra bcom pa ni ma yin no zhes zer bas so// gang po dge slong dran pa thob pas de ltar rgya cher sems can rnams la phan baha ga nas de'i 'og tu 'chi bar gyur pa dang / de'i slob ma
353a6(dkon brtsegs): mang po rnams kyis spos kyi shing thams cad spungs nas mchod pa byas te bsregs so// 'khor bzhi po rnams 'dus nas ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ring/
353a7(dkon brtsegs): bsrel gyi mchod rten chu zheng du rgyang grags gcig yod pa brtsigs nas/ spos dang / me tog dang / spos kyi phye ma drang / byug pa dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang
353b1(dkon brtsegs): bdang sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur sti byas/ bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge sbyong dran pa thob pa 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshwa/ bdag smrar 'jam bu'i klung 'ad
353b2(dkon brtsegs): du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas/ smon lam btab pa bzhin du khyim bdag gi rigs shing sa la chen po lta bur skyes par gyur te/ de'i ming ni ya sha zhes bya bar gyur to// sngon
353b3(dkon brtsegs): gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa thob par gyur pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gnad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya pa'i bstan pa la lo bdun lon te/
353b4(dkon brtsegs): rab tu byung nas gzungs rnams thob par gyur to// gzungs thob pa'i mthus skye bo mang po la sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde rnams yang dag par bstan to// de'i tshe dge slong dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams
353b5(dkon brtsegs): dang da ma shi ri'i dge slong rnams las gang dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun sdug pa de dag ni ye shes bstan pa'i chos rnams thos nas sems rab tu dga' zhing ga thams cad kyis chos kyi bde ba thob par gyur to// /
353b6(dkon brtsegs): gang po dge slong mang po de dag yang dag pa'i don la rton cing tshig gi rjes su 'brang bar cang mi byed pas/ de'i phyir dge slong ya shas sngon ma thos pa'i mdo sde stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun zhing shin tu zab
353b7(dkon brtsegs): don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa dag yang dag par bstan pa thos par gyur na/ mngon par yid ches shing dang du len par byed/ 'gel ba med par yang dag par len cing kha ton du 'don par byed/ ji skad
354a1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa bzhin du rjes su bsgrubs par gyur to// gang po dge slong de dag las gang dbang po rtul zhing mi gsal ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba lhun mi stug pa de dag ni dge slong ya sha las sngon ma thos
354a2(dkon brtsegs): pa'i mdo sde don dam pa'i rjes su mthun pa// stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun zhing shin tu zab pa dag thos par gyurab na/ mngon paT yid ches shing dang du len pa'ang mi byed/ 'gal bar byas nas 'jig cing smod par myed de 'di
354a3(dkon brtsegs): skad du/ 'di lta bu'i chos 'di ni bdag cag gis mkhan po dang slob dpon las kyang ma thos/ sngon ston pa chen po byang chub sems dpa' dran pa thob pa las kyang ma thos so zhes zer ro// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ya
354a4(dkon brtsegs): sha las chos thos nas/ rab tu dga' ba dang sems kyis mngon par yid ches shing dang du blangs pa de dag thams cad ni/ da ma shi ris dge slong rnams dang / dran pa thob pa'i dge slong rnams kyis sdang zhing phrag dog gis//
354a5(dkon brtsegs): smad nas lhan cig gnas su'ang mi ster/ lhan cig klog pa dang / kha ton du 'don pa dang / chos bshad du'ang mi ster te/ skur pa btab nas 'di skad du// 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma yin/ ston pa chen mo'i bstan/
354a6(dkon brtsegs): pa'ang ma yin no zhes zer ro// gang po de'i tshe dge slong ya shas de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan da'i bstan pa rgya cher yang dag par spel nas/ grong khyer gcig nas grong khyer gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ sems can
354a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams la chos bstan cing phan pa mang po byas pas/ srog chags khrag khrig phrag brgyad cu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// dge slong ya shas de ltar phan pa mang po byas
354b1(dkon brtsegs): nas de lag tu 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / dge slong ya sha rdzas su phyogs pa'i skye bo bdum gro yod pa de dag pa dge slong ya sha' bur rang bsngal gyi mchod rten bdum khri btsugs nas/ spos dang / mato dang /
354b2(dkon brtsegs): spos kyi rtse ma dang / drug sa dang / 'phreng ba dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan mang po sna tshogs kyis mchod cing bkur ste byas/ bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod par gyur to// gang po dge slong ya sha 'chi ka'i dus
354b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi tshe sngar 'jam du'i gling 'di nyid du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas/ 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu smon lam btab pa bzhin du yang rgyal rigs su skyes par gyur te/ de'i tshe lha mang po rnams kyis sgra chen po
354b4(dkon brtsegs): srung ste/ 'di skad du kye deng rgyal po'i bu btsas ma 'di ni sems can la phan pa mang po byed pa yin no zhes bsgrags pas/ sgra de'i rjes su ming yang rab tu 'dren pa zhes btags so// de lo bcu bzhi lon pa dang / de bzhin
354b5(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa me ro gnad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu lo brgya pa'i bston pa la rab tu byung bar gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de'ang mdo sde dang bstan bcos mang po rgya char kha ton du 'don pa dang / mang du thos shing
354b6(dkon brtsegs): zab mo la 'jug pa dang / tshig 'bru dang / spobs pa yongs su dag pa dang / chos bstan pa'i thabs la rab tu mkhas par gyur to// gang po dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de grong rdal gcig nas gcig tu/ grong khyer gcig nas
354b7(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu/ yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa me ro gan da'i bstan pa rgya cher spel nas phan pa mang po byas so// de'i tshad ma shi ri dang / dran pa thob pa dang / ya sha'i dge slong gi tshigs
355a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams lhan cig tu 'dus nas rab tu 'dren pa'i thad du 'ongs te/ des bstan pa dag gzhig cing skur pa gdab par bshams so// de nas de'i tshe dge slong rab tu 'dren pas dge slong mang po 'ongs
355a2(dkon brtsegs): par rig nas/ 'di skad du kye dge slong mang po khyed dngos po ci zhig gis ni rgol bar sems ka dngos po gang zhig gis ni 'dri bar sems zhes smras pa dang / dge slong mang po rnams de skad smras pa thos nas mya ngan
355a3(dkon brtsegs): gyis non cing mi bde bar gyur pas cang mi zer bar gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa la bgegs bya bar yang ma nus so// gang po byang chub sems dpa' de ji srid du 'jig rten na gnas pa de srid du sangs
355a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyas kyi bstan pa'ang rgyas shing rab tu 'phel bar gyur to// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i rjes su sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'ang nub par gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de ma 'ongs pa'i dus tha ma la dam
355a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i chos nub tu nye ba'i tshe/ grong rdal gcig nas gcig tu/ grong khyer gcig nas gcig tu/ yul gcig nas gcig tu rgyu zhing song nas/ sems can mang po'i chen du yongs su dag cing stong pa nyid kyi rjes su
355a6(dkon brtsegs): mthun pa'i mdo sde zab mo yang dag par bstan pas/ srog chags bye ba phrag brgyad cus bla na med ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur te gde dag 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu thams
355a7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyang mtho ris lha'i 'jig rten du skye bar gyur to// gang po dge slong rab tu 'dren pas de ltar phan pa byas nas/ de gang gi nub mo 'chi ba'i dus byas pa de'i nyan par sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa dang nub par gyur to//
355b1(dkon brtsegs): gang po de bzhin gshegs pa me gan da'i bstan pa nub par gyur pa'i phyir/ mdo sde bab mo yongs su dag tsang stong pa nyid kyi rjes su mthun pa'i chos rnams kyang nub par gyur to// bang po ltar na byang chub
355b2(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni mdo sde zab mo de lta bus sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing / bdag thaMd kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang bsod nams kyang phun sum tshogs par byed pa yin no// gang po zung
355b3(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' rab tu 'dren pa de 'chi ba'i dus bus pa'i 'og tu zhing de nyid kyi steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bcu par skyes par gyur te/ de'i tshe zhing de'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan no// de bzhin gshegs pa
355b4(dkon brtsegs): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas legs pa'i spyan zhes bya ste/ de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas tshe rabs snga ma'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / bsod nams kyi rgyu dang rkyen gyis shes rab zab cing
355b5(dkon brtsegs): gsal la rno ba dang / spobs pa gtugs pa med cing myur la thogs pa med par gyur to// dge slong rab tu 'dren pa de de bzhin gshegs pa legs pa'i spyan gyi bstan pa la lo brgyad khro ba'i stong gi bar du dge
355b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i chos rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa dang / slar yang de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'phel ba'i dpung sa zhes bya ba dang phrad par gyur nas/ sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu
355b7(dkon brtsegs): byung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams mngon par bsgrubs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to// de nas 'chi ba'i dus byas pa'i 'og tu slar yang zhing de nyid du skyes nas/
356a1(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdon mi za ba'i spyod pa dang phrad par gyur te// sangs rgyas de'i bstan pa la rab tu byung nas/ lo bdun khri'i
356a2(dkon brtsegs): bar du nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par bsgrubs nas// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar gyur to// de'i tshe de'i ming ni shu la zhes bya ste/ de bzhin
356a3(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa gdon mi za ba'i spyod pa des 'di skad du nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu dge slong shu la 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro//
356a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i spyan zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to// gang po byang chub sems dpa' gang chos gsum pa 'do nga
356a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan par gyur nas yon tan phun sum tshogs pa thams cad rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di thod rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de dka' stsal/
