383a3(dkon brtsegs): shig/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gsung rab las ni sku'i mtshan la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o zhes ma gsungs te/ gal te sku'i mtshan yang de bzhin gshegs pa yin no zhes
383a4(dkon brtsegs): brjod na ni/ gyo mo dang / rdo dang / ri dang / klung dang / rtswa shing thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa yin par 'gyur ro// de gal te 'di skad du gyo mo dang / rdo dang / ri dang / klung dang / rtsa
383a5(dkon brtsegs): shing thams cad la ni skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis med mas de bzhin gshegs ma zhes mi bya'o zhes zeb na// de la 'di skad du smros shig/ khyod kyis smras pa ltar mtshan sum cu rtsa
383a6(dkon brtsegs): gnyis dang ldan pa la de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya na ni/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang de bzhin gshegs pa yin pa'i rigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'ang
383a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pas so// des gal te 'di skad du mtshan gyi chos la 'jug par 'gyur bas// mtshan shes pa'i bram zes kyang sangs rgyas su 'gyur ro zhes lung
383b1(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa'i dngos po bden pas sa zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du spros shig/ gal te mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa yin na ni// khyod bdag nyid kyis mtshan ma can gyis mtshan
383b2(dkon brtsegs): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan par mthong bas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa yin no zhes smras pas// deng khyod kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan shod cig
383b3(dkon brtsegs): de gal te 'di skad du bdag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad rang / zag pa med pa'i dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi
383b4(dkon brtsegs): yan lag dang / lam dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid du ston to zhes zer na/ de la 'di skad du smros shig/ khyod
383b5(dkon brtsegs): kyis stobs bcu la sogs pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan nyid yin no zhes smras pas/ deng khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin pa shod cig/ de ga' te 'di skad du
383b6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang mtshan tha dad pa zhig yin nam zhes zer na// de la 'di skad du khyod nyid mtshan sangs rgyas yin zhes zer bar zad kyi mtshan ni sangs rgyas ma yin no zhes smos shig/
383b7(dkon brtsegs): des gal te yang 'di skad du dbyibs med cing kha rog med pa'i chos gzhan zhig sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu la sogs pa'i mtshan nyid byed par 'gyur ram zhes zer na// de la 'di skad du
384a1(dkon brtsegs): spros shig/ dbyings med cing kha dog med pa'i chos ji ltar dbyings dang bcas shing kha dog dang bcas pa'i mtshan nyid du bud par 'gyur// gzhan yang khyod kyis gal te/
384a2(dkon brtsegs): dbyibs med cing kha dog med pa'i chos la sangs rgyas zhes bu zhes zer na/ 'o na ni gzhan dbyibs med cing kha dog med ma'i chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas yin par 'gyur ba'i rigs so// gal
384a3(dkon brtsegs): te chos de dag sangs rgyas yin par gyur na ni/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / ma 'dres pa'i chos bco brgyad dang / dbang po dang // stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam
384a4(dkon brtsegs): rang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'ang de'i mtshan nyid byed par 'gyur ba'i rigs so zhes brjod par bya'o// glang po che'i lag nga'i nyan thos rnams ni de ltar skyes
384a5(dkon brtsegs): du blun po rnams rab tu 'dul bar byed do// gzhan yang glang po che'i lag ngas sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can thams cad
384a6(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bzla bar bya'o zhes smon lam tab mod kyi// da byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas bla na med ma yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na/ sems can yang ma dmigs/
384a7(dkon brtsegs): sems can gyi ming yang ma dmigs pas/ nga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug pa'i tshe/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos dngos po 'di yod pa'i phyir dngos po 'di yod do// dngos po 'di med
384b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i gyu dngas pa 'dam na par rtogs pa lan ba 'o// rangs rolang yod pa bu rangos pa yang me 'dangs po gang med pa'i tshang ngas da yang me pa gyur NAn/ ma dag pa d+hA
384b2(dkon brtsegs): gyis 'du byed rnams yod par gyur/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs// ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye mched
384b3(dkon brtsegs): drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa// reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/ tshod pa'i rkyen gyis sbed pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa// len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skyog skye ba'i rkyen gyis na /
384b4(dkon brtsegs): rga sha'i rkyen gyis mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams yod par gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'da' zhig po 'di dag
384b5(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// ma rig pa 'gag pa'i phyir 'du byed rnams 'gag/ 'du byed rnams 'gags pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa 'gag/ rnam par shes pa 'phags pa'i phyir ming dang
384b6(dkon brtsegs): gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pa'i phyir skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pa'i phyir reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pa'i phyir tshor ba 'gag/ tsher ba 'gags pa'i phyir
384b7(dkon brtsegs): sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pa'i phyir len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pa'i phyir srid ma 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pa'i phyir skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pa'i phyir rga shi 'gag/ rga shi
385a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gags pa'i phyir mya ngan dang / sde sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'gag par gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba'
385a2(dkon brtsegs): zhig po 'di dag 'gag par 'gyur ro// gang de las mig dang / ye shes dang / rig pa dang / blo skyes pas 'di ltar dbus dang mtha' med pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba rab tu
385a3(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par grol ba de rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir chos gzhan gang yang thob par gyur pa med kyi rgyu dang rkyen las byung ba'i chos dmigs pa kho nar zad do//
385a4(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa ni ji ltar chos rnams rab tu rtogs pa de bzhin du sems can rnams la yang dag par rab tu ston to// glang po che'i lag de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung
385a5(dkon brtsegs): yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid ni 'gyur ba med par rtag tu gnas pas/ 'di lta ste/ ming dang gzugs kyang stong par mi 'gyur la/
385a6(dkon brtsegs): phan tshun 'gal ba'ang med/ skye ba'ang med/ 'byung ba'ang med do// glang po che'i lag nga ni rtag par de ltar chos ston pas/ khyed kyis kyang nga'i dgongs pa bzhin du rig par bya'o// ngas
385a7(dkon brtsegs): khyed la de lta bu'i chos bstan na/ khyod kyis kyang de bzhin du nan tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// glang po che'i lag ston pa chen pos slob ma rnams la gang bya ba'i rigs pa de dag ngas ma lus par
385b1(dkon brtsegs): byas zin pas/ khyed kyis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs nas/ chos rnams la ye shes kyi snang ba thob par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i
385b2(dkon brtsegs): lag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te 'ga' zhig 'di skad du de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i yang dag pa'i chos nub par gyur pa zhig yin na su zhig lam ston par 'gyur/
385b3(dkon brtsegs): lam ston pa med pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos nub bzhis bya'o// dam pa'i chos nub par gyur pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa yang nub pa zhes bya bas/ 'di'ang sems can thams cad yongs su
385b4(dkon brtsegs): ma bzlas pa zhes bya'o zhes mchin de la ji skad du lan gdab par bgyi lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag gal te de skad du 'dri ba yod na de la 'di skad
385b5(dkon brtsegs): du lan gdab par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni thams cad mkhyen pa yin par skye bo mang po kun gyis kyang shes shing mthong la/ rtag par sems can bzla ba'i dus la gzhes
385b6(dkon brtsegs): pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur kyang da dung phan pa mdzad pa yin no// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus su sangs rgyas rnams la byang chub mngon par
385b7(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bar lung ston par mdzad pas/ de nyid sangs rgyas kyi gdung bsab cing rgyun mi gcad par mdzad pa yin te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
386a1(dkon brtsegs): chos ni sangs rgyas gcig gi chos yin pas/ de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos zhes bya'o zhes bstan to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni
386a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos yin pas/ de lta bas na de bzhin gshegs pa ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing / ji ltar spyod pa
386a3(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du gsungs pa yin par rig par bya'o zhes brjod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa glang po che'i lag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
386a4(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad yongs su 'tshol ba legs par thugs su chud pa lags te/ chos thams cad legs par thugs su chud pa'i slad du sku dang / gsung dang
386a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs kyi 'phrin las mkhyen pa mngon du gtong zhing mkhyen pa'i rjes su 'brang bas na/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji ltar bstan pa bzhin du mdzad
386a6(dkon brtsegs): cing / ji ltar mdzad pa bzhin du gsung bar gyur pa ni shin tu ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ glang po che'i lag de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ glang po che'i
386a7(dkon brtsegs): lag khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du nga ni sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod cing / ji ltar spyod pa bzhin du smra bar gyur pa yin no// glang po che'i
386b1(dkon brtsegs): lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig nor pa med par bajig rten du byung nas sems can la phan 'dogs pas/ lha dang ma'i bde ba la 'god pa dang / thams cad kun gyi ston
386b2(dkon brtsegs): ba chen por gyur nas yang dag pa'i lam ston pa dang / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par grol bas spros pa mi mnga' bar pha rol tu byen nas da rung ma banal ba dag yongs su zlos shes zer pa la
386b3(dkon brtsegs): da ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das pa yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no// glang po che'i lag yang dag par smra ba gang la la zhig 'di skad du su zhig bsrub
386b4(dkon brtsegs): med cing / bya ba byas pa'i drin gzo ba yin zhes zer ba la de ni nga yin no zhes smra ba gang yin pa de ni yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te/ sems can gang la la zhig pa la bya
386b5(dkon brtsegs): cung zad cig byas pa'i dngos po de'ang chud za bar mi 'gyur ro// glang po che'i lag nga ni rang po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa tshun chad par der nam yang sems la ldog cing
386b6(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'ang med la/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par zhen cing mos par gyur pa yang dag par rjes su mi dran yang ngas chos de thos nas/ sems rtse gcig tu 'khor rnams nyan thos dang
386b7(dkon brtsegs): rang sangs rgyas kyi 'bras bu yongs su gnyer ba la gzung ba'i phyir 'dun par gyur pa kho nar zad do// glang po che'i lag sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na nga mu stegs can gyi drang srong byu pa'i tshe/
387a1(dkon brtsegs): shes rab gsal zhing rnol mang du thos shing spobs pa dang ldan par gyur pas/ chos zab mo'i thod pa thob par gyur to// de'i tshe bram ze gzhon nu lnga brgya zhig khyim na gnas
387a2(dkon brtsegs): ba dang / 'dod pa lnga'i nyes dmigs mthong zhing rab tu byung ba'i phan yon mthong nas/ khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ste lam bsgoms par gyur to// de dag thams cad nga'i thad du
387a3(dkon brtsegs): 'ongs pa dang / ngas chos bstan pas rang sangs rgyas kyi lam thob par gyur nas/ mngon par shes pa drug dang ldan zhing sems la rang dbang thob pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang ldan par
387a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pas/ rtag par rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas/ grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dag tu zhugs te bsod snyoms blangs nas nga la rim gro byas so//
387a5(dkon brtsegs): nga de'i tshe 'di snyam du 'di ltar 'di dag ni yongs su dag pa'i ye shes chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/ bdag gis 'di dag gi mchod pa bra ba mi rigs so snyam du sems par gyur to// drang srong de dag ngas
387a6(dkon brtsegs): rjes su bstan pa'i phyir de lta bu'i chos thob par gyur kyang / ngas thob par ma gyur pas chos de thob par bya zhing mngon sum du ma byas pa mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir/ nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par
387a7(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// glang po che'i lag ngas nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed nas chos de mngon sum du byas pa'i tshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha zhig 'ongs te/ mngon du lus bstan nas nga la 'di skad du kye ye
387b1(dkon brtsegs): shes 'di la mngon par zhen par ma byed cig/ khyod ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can tshad med dbab tu med pa rnams yongs su zlos
387b2(dkon brtsegs): bar 'gyur ro zhes bsgo'o// glang po che'i lag nga de'i tshe de skad bsgo ba thos nas lam bsgom pa btang nas/ sems mchog tu dga' ba thob par gyur nas/ tha ba byed kyi bar du dben par 'dug
387b3(dkon brtsegs): pa'i tshe dga' bas lus kun khyab par gyur to// mang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyis go bar byed cing rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyang thob par
387b4(dkon brtsegs): gyur la/ bdag nyid kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni bdag nyid bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
387b5(dkon brtsegs): chub tu sems rab tu bskyed nas/ gzhan dag kyang sems skyed par skul ba yin/ theg pa chen por sems bskyed pa dag mthong na phrag dog kyang mi byed la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
387b6(dkon brtsegs): ba'i byang chub ni bdag gcig pus thob par bya ba yin gyi/ gzhan gyis ni thob par bya ba ma yin no snyam du mi sems pa yin na/ sems can nyes pa spyod pa dag la dus su rjes su 'dems shing sems bzang pos gtam
387b7(dkon brtsegs): dag smras nas/ de dag gi dge ba yongs su srung bar byed pa yin/ bdag nyid rtag par rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyis chos rnams rgya cher gnyer zhing / gzhan dag la bstan nas ser sna med par gyur pa yin te/
388a1(dkon brtsegs): glang po che'i lag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan par gyur na/ lha rnams kyis kyang go bar byed la/ bdag nyid kyang mngon par
388a2(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rig par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshogs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' bstan
388a3(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis// za med theg la rab gnas shing // sems can dag kyang bskul byas nas// theg pa de la 'god par byed// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod tshe// rtag par zag
388a4(dkon brtsegs): dog khong khro med// nan tan brtson 'grus rtsom byed pas// dga' ba'i sems ni 'phel bar 'gyur// sems can sdig sbyor mthong gyur na// 'du shes rjes su 'doms par byed// rtag par
388a5(dkon brtsegs): byams dang snying rjer ldan// khong khro dag ni med pa yin// rtag par nan tan chos gnyer nas// sems can rnams la spel bar byed// ji ltar char ni rlan byed ltar// chos kyis thams cad tshim
388a6(dkon brtsegs): par byed// chos bzhi 'di dag gang spyod pa// khyod ni sangs rgyas 'grub 'gyur bas// the tsom sems ni ma skyed ces// lha rnams kyis ni go bar byed// byang chub sems dpas de thos nas
388a7(dkon brtsegs): nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed par byed// dngos po 'di ni ngas bden pas// bdag ni sangs rgyas nges 'grub sems// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni// brtson 'grus dang ni smon lam dang // dran pa
388b1(dkon brtsegs): dang ni shes rab dag/ bdag nyid rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur// gal ter bzhin gshegs pa rnams// 'jig rten du ni 'byung 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni/ 'di 'dra'i yon tan
388b2(dkon brtsegs): ldan par 'gyur// gang zag chen pos bkur 'gyur zhing // rgyal po blon po dmangs rnams kyang // thams cad sems ni rab dga' zhing / lam ldan yin par rig par 'gyur// bstan
388b3(dkon brtsegs): bcos gtsug lag tshig dang don// tshig 'bru tshigs bcad brtsis dang grangs// de dag thams cad legs rtogs pas// sems can kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// dbang po rno zhing shes rab
388b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan// bya ba stobs la mi ltos par// thabs dang ldan pa'i 'ba' zhig gis// thams cad yongs su grub par nus// dgra rnams rab tu gdul ba yang // lus kyi zho sha mi ltos par
388b5(dkon brtsegs): shes rab stobs ni 'ba' zhig gis// rang gi sems ni 'dul bar byed// sems can rab tu rtse ba'i phyir// 'jig rten du ni skyes pas na// rgyal po dron po dmangs rnams kyang // ngo mtshar
388b6(dkon brtsegs): che zhes bsngags par 'gyur// lha rnams kun dang smra bas ni// de yi ya mtshan kun gyis rig/ ci phyir de ltar rig ce na// bdag sems shes zhes sems phyir ro// byang chub sems dpa' de rtag tu// /
388b7(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas rnams ni mthong bas na// der song chos ni rab zhus nas// sems can rgya cher phan yang 'dogs// sangs rgyas nus lan gsungs pas na// the tsom dag ni chad par 'gyur/
389a1(dkon brtsegs): sems can rnams ni phan 'dogs pas// thams cad dga' ba thob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul mthu bstan nas// sangs rgyas 'gyur ba lung ston pas// de'i phyir byang /
389a2(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' de// sems ni dga' ba thob par 'gyur// shin tu 'phags pa'i nor rnams dang // phyi nang kun la chags med pas// de'i phyir dka' ba chen po yis// bdag nyid sangs rgyas
389a3(dkon brtsegs): 'grub par shes// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsngag pa yi// bzod pa ma nom thob pas na// de'i phyir dga' ba chen po yis// bdag nyid sangs rgyas 'grub par shes// chos rnams kun la ma
389a4(dkon brtsegs): gnas shing // chos brtan mi rung rig pas na// de 'dra'i shes rab thob gyur nas// lus ni mkha' la 'phags par 'gyur// de yi sems ni nang mi gnas// phyi rol na yang mi gnas te/
389a5(dkon brtsegs): 'du shes thams cad 'das pas na// de phyir bzod pa bla med 'thob// yun rings byams dang snying rje yis// sems can kun la sems pas na// de phyir bsod nams de yi dbang //
389a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshad med mthong bar 'gyur// de yi lus ni thams cad kun// sangs rgyas sku dang khyad par med// de 'dra'i bzod pa thob pas na// chos kyi bdag nyid 'phel bar byed// byang chub
389a7(dkon brtsegs): tu ni sem bskyed la// su zhig rjes su slob mi byed// rab brtan dam chos gang gnas pa// de 'dra'i yon tan thob par 'gyur// de phyir lam ni gnyeb pa dag/ rtag par nan tan chos
389b1(dkon brtsegs): gnyer bya// chos kyis bdag gi khe btsal nas// byang chub la ni phan gdags bya// brgol ba'i lam btab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/
389b2(dkon brtsegs): tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'das pa'i dus na byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs la shin
389b3(dkon brtsegs): tu brtan par gnas par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar che lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ da ni yun ring po nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa
389b4(dkon brtsegs): spyod pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i chos la shin tu brtan par gnas par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid rab tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/
389b5(dkon brtsegs): chos gnyer chos ni gang thob pa// de ni sangs rgyas lam gzhi yin// rtag tu chos la gang brtson pa// chos ma yin pa spong bar 'gyur// rtag tu yang dag lam spyod pa// log pa'i lam
389b6(dkon brtsegs): ni spong bar byed// sangs rgyas chos la rtag rten pa// de ni lam la rten par 'gyur// des na mi khom rnam spangs nas// khom ldan dag ni thob par 'gyur// khom ldan gnas ni thob gyur na//
389b7(dkon brtsegs): brtson 'grus brtsams pa chud mi za// gnas gnyis su ni mchog tu btsun// kha dog gzugs ni mchog tu 'gyur// g.yog 'khor dag ni phun tshogs shing // thams cad kun gyi mchog tu
390a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ brtan pa'i sems kyis rtag tu ni// tshul khrims bzod pa'i phyogs la gnas// brtson 'grus phyogs la rab gnas shing // bsam gtan shes rab
390a2(dkon brtsegs): 'phel bar byed// rtag tu sems can thams cad kyi// gtso mchog dag ni byed par 'gyur// yon tan kun gyi mchog gyur pas// don rigs 'jigs pa ci yang med//
390a3(dkon brtsegs): nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa gang pos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i chos gya nom pa dag la su zhig slob par mi bgyid de// bdag cag ni sngon dang po nas la
390a4(dkon brtsegs): lo can du gyur pas/ sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa la re ba ma mchis shing / bdag cag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa 'di lta bu thob par gyur pa mngon par yid ches pa ma mchis pas na/ 'di ltar nyan thos
390a5(dkon brtsegs): kyi theg pas bdag nyid nges par byung bar gyur pa lags so snyam du sems lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni deng slan chad byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gzengs bstod cing spro ba bskyed nas
390a6(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas kyi chos la dgod par bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dka' ba mdzad pa lags pas bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub
390a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi ched du rtag par de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po sha stag mdzad de/ de lta bu'i dngos po de ni dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas
390b1(dkon brtsegs): thams cad la'ang ma mchis na/ sems can gzhan la lta smos kyang ci 'tshal bas so// bcom ldan 'das de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
390b2(dkon brtsegs): dpa' chen por gyur pa 'ba' zhig gis sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba'i slad du / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po lta bu tshad ma mchis de dpag
390b3(dkon brtsegs): tu ma mchis/ grangs ma mchis pa dang ldan pas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag de lta bu'i shin tu dka' ba'i dngos po chen po spyad de/ bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
390b4(dkon brtsegs): chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas kyang / chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor te/ sems can sdug bsngal gyis gzir ba rnams yongs su bzla bar bgyid lags so// bcom
390b5(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bang po de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ khyed kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
390b6(dkon brtsegs): byang chub tu sems bsgreng nas/ sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rje chen po dang ldan pa yin pas/ sems can thams
390b7(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi ched du byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de lta bu'i smon lam chen po dang / dka' ba'i dngos po chen po shin tu zab pa/ shin tu dka' ba tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs
391a1(dkon brtsegs): med pa dang ldan par gyur pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsa shag/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po dang / 'khor bzhi pa rnams dang / lha dang / mi dang /
391a2(dkon brtsegs): klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa thams cad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la rab tu dga' zhing yid ches pas mngon par bstod do// gang po'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
391a3(dkon brtsegs): pa phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ gang po'i zhus pa ste/ 'dus pa bcu bdun pa rdzogs so// /
391a4(dkon brtsegs): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya raSh+Ta pA la pa ri pri ts+tsha na ma ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yul 'khor skyong gis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo// / bam po dang /
391a5(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa rus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'a das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la
391a6(dkon brtsegs): dge slong stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong thams cad kyang spobs pa thogs pa med pa/ bzod pa thob pa/ bdud phyir rgol ba bcom pa/ sangs rgyas
391a7(dkon brtsegs): kyi chos thams cad la shin tu nye bar gyur pa/ skye ba gcig gis thogs pa/ gzungs thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin thob pa spobs pa mtha' yas pa thob pa mi 'jigs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa/
391b1(dkon brtsegs): rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa nas/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad zad mi shes pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang
391b2(dkon brtsegs): baM dang / kun tu mig dang / kun tu lta ba dang / kun tu 'od zer dang / kun tu 'od dang / blo gros mchog dang / blo gros 'phel dang / blo gros mtha' yas dang / blo gros rgya chen dang /
391b3(dkon brtsegs): gros mi zad pa dang / sa 'dzin dang / 'gro ba 'dzin dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / khyad par blo gros dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzungs kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang /
391b4(dkon brtsegs): 'dam dpal la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' dpe med pa drug cu dang / bzang skyong la sogs pa skyes bu dam pa bcu drug dang / mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
391b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang / lha'i bu mtshams bzang dang / lha'i bu blo gros legs gnas dang / lha'i dbang po thams cad dang / klu'i dbang po thams cad dang / mi'am ci'i dbang po dang /
391b6(dkon brtsegs): dri za'i dbang po dang / gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po dang / nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po 'khor brgya stong du ma yod pa thams cad dang / 'khor de nyid du 'dus te 'khod pa
391b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal gyi snying po'i seng ge'i khri la bzhugs te/ lhun po ltar 'khor gyi dkyil thams cad las ni mngon par
392a1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags/ nyi ma ltar 'jig rten thams cad la ni snang / zla ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad lnga snang ba ni mdzad/ tshangs pa ltar rab tu zhi bar ni bzhugs/ brgya byin ltar thun
392a2(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen par dka'/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar byang chub kyi yan lag gi rin po che bdun dang ni ldan/ seng ge ltar ches thams cad bdag med pa dang stong par ni sgrogs/ me'i phung po chen po ltar
392a3(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad la snang ba'i sku dang ni ldan/ lha thams cad snang ba'i nor bu rin po che kun nas bsdus pa'i nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po ltar gzi brjid kyis ni kun tu 'bar zhing / stong gsum
392a4(dkon brtsegs): gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bas khyab par mdzad nas/ ron shin tu rnam par nges pas/ chos thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu byon pa/ 'khor gyi nang na
392a5(dkon brtsegs): bzhugs shing tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs bsgrags pa/ sems can thams cad go bar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis chos ston te/ tshangs par spyod pa/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/
392a6(dkon brtsegs): tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po ma 'dres pa/ yongs su rdzogs pa/ yongs su dag pa yongs su byang ba/ yang dag par rab tu ston to// de nas kya
392a7(dkon brtsegs): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das seng ge'i khri la bzhugs panyi ma stong
392b1(dkon brtsegs): las lhag pa'i 'od kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad zil du rlag par mdzad nas/ shin tu lhang nger bzhugs par mthong ste/ dka' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dad pas 'dun pa'i
392b2(dkon brtsegs): sems kyis stan las langs nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// lha tshogs lha ma yin dang mi'am ci
392b3(dkon brtsegs): klu dang nyan thos dag dang sangs rgyas sras// 'azo ba 'di dag rgyal bas gzi yangs kyis// zil mnan khyod ni gser gyi ri lta gsal// rgya mtsho'i dbus na gnas kyang rnam mdzes pa/ lhun po lha
392b4(dkon brtsegs): yi tshogs kyi gnas lta bur// thugs rje'i rgya mtsho'i dbus su de bzhugs te// 'od zer stong phrag brgya dag 'gyed par mdzad// tshangs pa'i gan lba pa'i tshangs pa de// tshangs pa'i mdun na
392b5(dkon brtsegs): gnas te mngon mdzes ltar// bsam gtan rnam thar ting nge 'dzin la zhugs// sems can dam pa 'gro ba kun la gsal// brgya byin sum cu rtsa gsum lha nang du// gnas nas gzi brjid
392b6(dkon brtsegs): yangs pas mdzes pa ltar// mtshan gyis sbas pa ye shes yon tan phyug/ thub pa'i rgyal po 'gro ba kun la gsal// gling bzhi mi yi bdag po snang ldan pa// 'jig rten 'di la ston
392b7(dkon brtsegs): pa mdzes pa ltar// 'phags pa'i lam du 'dzad par rab mdzad cing // thugs rje'i dgongs pa'i thugs mnga' 'di yang mdzes// mkha' la nyi ma lam metha la le ba// nor bu me 'od
393a1(dkon brtsegs): mog mog byed 'di ltar// nyi ma stong pas khyad par 'phags pa'i 'od// sangs rgyas nyi ma 'gro ba 'di na gsal// dri med zla ba nam gyi gung gsal ltar// shin tu
393a2(dkon brtsegs): rnam dag 'gro ba kun la gsal// rgyal ba'i zhal ras zla ba nya ba 'dra// kun 'od zil gyis mnan nas rnam par mdzes// ji ltar ro ben ze ma la ma 'bar ba// mtshan mo mi
393a3(dkon brtsegs): nyal tsam na kun snang ltar// gti mug mun pa ma lus bcom nas ni// drang srong chen po'i ye shes 'od kyang gsal// seng ge ri sul brtan pa'i sgra sgrog cing // sa la ri dgas
393a4(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnams skrag bgyid ltar// mi dbang stong pa bdag med gsung sgrog cing // pha rol mu stegs can rnams skrag par mdzad// nor bu'i rgyal po bzang po gzi brjid 'bar//
393a5(dkon brtsegs): nor bu thams cad zil mnan lam me ltar// rgyal ba'i sku ni gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// 'gro kun zil gyis mnan nas lam mer bzhugs// 'jig rten gang na'ang khyod dang mtshungs ma
393a6(dkon brtsegs): mchis// lhag pa'i sems can mchis par ga la 'gyur// bsod nams ye shes brtson 'grus thabs rnams dang // yon tan kun gyis khyod dang mtshungs ma mchis// mi yi dpa' bo/
393a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro la lam me ba// mgon po yon tan rgya mtsho bdag gis mthong // gus pa skyes shing dga' ba rnam par 'phel// rgyal ba'i zhabs kyi mthil la bdag gis gtugs// yon tan kun/
393b1(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'byung gnas 'jig rten sgron// grags pa dam pa rgya chen thugs mnga' la// bdag gis bstod de bsod nams 'dir thob res// 'gro ba thams cad byang chub mchog reg shes
393b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal pos// bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas
393b3(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar te/ mig gnyis mi dzums par de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la ni lta/ chos kyi dbyings nyid la ni rnam par dpyod/ zab pa dang / gting dpag dka' ba dang / mthong
393b4(dkon brtsegs): bar dka' ba dang / khong du chud par dka' ba dang / brtag mi nus pa dang / rtog ka'i spyod pa ma yin pa dang / zhi ba dang phra ba la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi
393b5(dkon brtsegs): khyab pa la ni rjes su rnam par dpyod/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes chos kyi dbyings thams cad du zhugs pa la ni rjes su rnam par sems/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mi mnyam pa dang mnyam
393b6(dkon brtsegs): pa la ni yang dag par lta/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings gcig gi tshul gyi ngo
393b7(dkon brtsegs): bo nyid la 'jug pa la ni rtog/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi gnas med pa nam mkha'i spyod yul du ni yang dag par lta/ chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin
394a1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yang rang bzhin la 'jug pa la ni mos/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa sgrib pa med pa la ni mngon par 'dod/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sku rtag pa dang /
394a2(dkon brtsegs): zhi ba dang / ther thug pa la ni 'jug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku zhing rab 'byams thams cad kyi rjes su song ba dang / sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa la ni 'jug/ sangs rgyas bcom
394a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan 'das rnams kyi yon tan gyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur yang zag pa med pa ni rjes su dran par byed/ chos kyi dbyings tar la ni rnam par dpyod cing / byang chub sem dpa' sems dpa' chen po
394a4(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu dga' ba'i rgyal po cang mi smra bar 'dug par gyur to// de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong mnyan yod du dbyar zla ba gsum gnas par dam bcas te/ de zla ba gsu
394a5(dkon brtsegs): 'das nas chos gos byas te chos gos zin nas/ de lhung bzed dang chos gos thogs te/ dge slong gi dge 'dun dang gsar bu las dang po pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma lon pa dag dang ldan cig tu/
394a6(dkon brtsegs): mthar gyis yul rgyu brgya zhing rgyal po'i khab kyi zong khyer chen po gal ba dang / b+ha rgod kyi phung po'i rig la ba der song ngo // de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor steng / bcom ldan/
394a7(dkon brtsegs): 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs las bgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs
394b1(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug nas kyang tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis thal mo gyur te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do// mi mchog 'od mdzad khyod
394b2(dkon brtsegs): la phyag 'tshal lo// nam ma beb mtshungs pa'i thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// rgal ba yid gnyis gcod la phyag 'tshal lo// srid gsam mthar byon thab la phyag 'tshal lo// zhi
394b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams bye ba rab 'byam kun tu yang // 'dren pa dag ni khyod kyi bsngags pa gsung // rgyal ba'i sras kyis zos nus rab dga' zhing // yon tan rgya mtsho thub pa mchog tu ma chi/
394b4(dkon brtsegs): bde gshegs tshul dang 'thun pas mchod bgyis te// thub pa che las rdul bral chos thos nas// de dag khyod kyi yon tan 'phreng brjod cing // yid rab dga' nas rang gi zhing du mchi/
394b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub dam pa mchog ni tshol ba na// khyod kyi thugs ni skyo ba mi mnga' bar// bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig bsam yas su// sems can rnams kyi ched du spyod pa spyad// 'dren
394b6(dkon brtsegs): ba khyod kyis sbyin dang tshul khrims spyad// zod dang brtson 'grus dang ni bsam gtan bslabs// shes rab thabs dang dbang gi pha rol gshegs// des na rnam 'dren che la
394b7(dkon brtsegs): phyag 'tshal lo// rdzu 'phrul rkang dang mngon shes mchog la mkhas// dbang po stobs dang rnam par thar pa bslabs// sems can kun gyi spyod pa grags chung rtobs// mnyam
395a1(dkon brtsegs): med ye shes mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba rnams kyi sems rgyud rab tu mkhyen// spyod pa gang dang ji ltar las 'byung dang // tshul sgo gang gis rnam par grol
395a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur ba// de ni bcom ldan mi yi mchog gis mkhyen// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug 'byung ba spong // gang gis sems can ngan song gsum mchi dang // gang gis bde 'gror mchi bar 'gyur
395a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i las// 'gro bas legs pa bgyis dang nongs bgyis mkhyen// 'gro ba phan mdzad gang dag 'das rnams dang // da lta lha dang mi yis mchod rnams dang // gang dag ma byon yon tan mchog
395a4(dkon brtsegs): mthar phyin// bde gshegs de dag thams cad rab tu mkhyen// dag pa'i zhing dang phun sum tshogs 'khon dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dang nyan thos dang // drang srong chen po
395a5(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi sku tshe'i tshad// rnam pa kun tu ma lus rnam par mkhyen// mya ngan 'das nas chos gnas ci 'dra dang // rgyal ba'i ring bsrel mchod pa ci 'dra dang // der ni chos mdzad 'dzin pa
395a6(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba// de dag ma lus mi yi dam pas mkhyen// dus gsum rnams su rtag par stobs bcu yi// ye shes mkhyen pa sgrib pa mi marab 'jug/ chos rnams kun la thugs ni chags ma
395a7(dkon brtsegs): mngag// phyag 'tshal rgyal ba ye shes mtsho bod la// khyod dang mtshungs mnyal mchis ga la lhag/ skar ma rnams kyis nam mkha' spras pa ltar// mtshan rnams kyis kyang spun
395b1(dkon brtsegs): rab smras pa// mi mchog thub pa mchog la phrag 'tshal lo// gzugs kyang mtshungs pa ma mchis yid du mchi// ltar bcas bzo ba zil du brlag par btsa// tshangs pa sa
395b2(dkon brtsegs): byin 'og min lha yi rnams// khyod kyi spyan sngar de dag mdzes ma lags// khyod ni gser gyi ri ltar dri mi mnga'/ dbu snum 'jam zhing g.yas su 'khyil bar gnas// lhun po
395b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po lta bur spyi gtsug 'phags// bsod nams rgya chen 'byung ba lam mer bzhugs/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig rab 'gyed cing // khyod kyi smin ma'i mtshams kyi mdzod spu mdzes/
395b4(dkon brtsegs): 'gro la thugs rje dgongs pas gang gzigs pa// spyan ni ut+pal 'dra zhing yid du mchi// bla nye dri med mkha' la ji lta bar// rnam 'dren khyod kyi zhal ni lam me ste// lta ba'i skye bo
395b5(dkon brtsegs): ngoms par mi 'gyur ba// zhal bzangs mi yi mchog la phyag 'tshal lo// dang parma b+ha ri dgus rgyal gyi stabs// glang po dregs pa dal gyis mchi stabs kyis// sa rnams g.yo bar
395b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad cing rab gshegs pa// stobs bcu brtul zhugs brtan la phyag 'tshal lo// phyag gi sor mo rang zhing zlum la mdzes// sen mo zangs mdog dag cing dra bas spras// bzhengs
395b7(dkon brtsegs): kyang pus mo'i lha ngar reg cing slebs// sku mdog gser mdog 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo// 'khor lo dra bas khyab pa'i zhabs 'dor bas// pa steng ri mor mdzad cing rab tu gshegs/
396a1(dkon brtsegs): zhabs kyi 'od zer gyis ni yongs smin pa'i// mi rnams gus nas lha yi 'jig rten mchi// chos kyi rgyal po nar bdun sbyin pa po// chos kyi sbyin bdag dul ba'i thugs ma sa
396a2(dkon brtsegs): chos kyi spyod pas 'gro ba rjes ston pa// 'dren pa chos kyi rje la phyag 'tshal lo// byams pa'i go cha dran pa'i ral gri mchog/ tshul khrims gzhug dang shes rab thabs kyi mda'// de yis skye ba chi srid
396a3(dkon brtsegs): sred 'brel bgyid pa// nyon mongs dgra dag rnam par bcom par gyur// brgal nas sems can khrag khrig rnams kyang sgrol// grol nas 'ching ba las ni 'gro ba 'grol// bde gshegs gang gis ni
396a4(dkon brtsegs): ba'i gnas mchi ba// bde ba rims nad ma mchis lam yang ston// gang na skye dang 'chi ba ma mchis shing // bral ba'i sdug bsngal 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba// gnas mchog ni ba 'dus ma bgyis pa de//
396a5(dkon brtsegs): thugs rjes brnyes nas khyod kyis bstan pa mdzad// chos kun dbang gi pha rol gshegs pa'i rgyal// thub pa chen po 'jig rten mchog bstod pas// bdag gis 'dir ni bsod nams gang bsags
396a6(dkon brtsegs): des/ 'gro ba byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgyar shogade nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gi/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod nas
396a7(dkon brtsegs): thal mo sbyar te stan wa langs nas/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pras mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/
396b1(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lhung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs bye na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dang
396b2(dkon brtsegs): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs bka' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka
396b3(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// yul 'khor stong khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang / ngas dris pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang
396b4(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa yul 'khor stong gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos du dang ldan na/ chos thams cad
396b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan gyi khyad par 'thob par 'gyur/ gzhan las rag ma las pa'i shes pa 'thob/ myur ba'i shes rab 'thob/ spobs pa rnam par nges pa 'thob/ snang ba 'thob/ thams cad
396b6(dkon brtsegs): mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyid pa dang / yid gnyis spong ba dang / somanyi spong ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rnam par nges pa pa thob/
396b7(dkon brtsegs): sems can 'dzud pa la mkhas pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin du bgyid pa dang / ldem po dag yang dag pa dang / sems can gyi khams la mkhas pa dang / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zab pa
397a1(dkon brtsegs): dang zhu ba thams cad zhu ba dang / chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur/ de nas tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong
397a2(dkon brtsegs): gis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab nges pa/ yang dag nyid du ji ltar de 'byung dang // ye shes rgya mtsho ba'i bka' mchid rnam nges pa/ mi
397a3(dkon brtsegs): mchog rgyal bas bdag la bshad du gsol// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi gzugs lta bu// sems can dam pa bsod nams mchog bsags pa// khyod ni skyabs dang gnas dang dpung
397a4(dkon brtsegs): gnyen lags// byang chub spyod mchog dri med dang bdag gsungs// gzungs dang bdud rtsi byang chub 'byung ba yi// ye shes mi zad ji ltar thob par 'gyur// gang gis skye ba'i dogs pa gcod
397a5(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa// shes rab rgya mtsho ji ltar rnam par dag/ 'khor bar bskal pa bye ba mang por ni// 'jig rten sdug bsngal nyen la lta bgyid kyang // skyo ba'i blo ni nam yang mi skyed cing // de dag don dge
397a6(dkon brtsegs): sten par 'gyur ba dang // dag pa'i zhing du phun sum tshogs 'khor dang // tshe mchog dang ni phun sum tshogs zhing dang // sems can ched kyi bka' mchid bla med dang / byang chub spyod pa dri med
397a7(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol// bdud 'joms mdzad pa ltas ngan sbyong ba po// sred pa skems pa rnam grol reg mdzad pa// chos kyi tshul yang bskrad par mi 'gyur bar// sems can rin chen spyod/
397b1(dkon brtsegs): mchog bstan du gsol// gzugs dang longs spyod spobs pa phun sum tshogs// snum pa'i gsung gis 'khor rnams tshim mdzad pa// bde gshegs sprin lngar 'gro ba tshim mdzad pa/
397b2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas spyod yul legs par bstan du gsol// ka la bing+ka'i sgra stan gsung 'byin pa// tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis blo ngan rab 'jig pa// chos 'tshal gyur pa'i 'khor rnams lpags
397b3(dkon brtsegs): lags kyi// gtso bo bdud rtsi ro yis tshim par mdzod// byang chub dam pa mchog la 'dun pa mchis// chos la 'dun pa zlog pa'i mi rigs te// 'dren pa bstan pa mdzad pa'i dus 'di lags//
397b4(dkon brtsegs): rin chen dam pa bsgrags pa'i dus la bab// thub pa bdag ni byang chub re ba mchis// bdag gi bsam pa rgyal bas rab tu mkhyen// rgyal ba co dri ma lags don du gnyer// spyod pa dam pa legs par
397b5(dkon brtsegs): bshad du gsol/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong byed legs so legs
397b6(dkon brtsegs): so// yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang / yul 'khor skyong khyod skye bo mang po la bde ba dang / lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang / phan pa dang / da ltar dang / ma'ongs
397b7(dkon brtsegs): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so// yul 'khor skyong khyod de'i phyir legs
398a1(dkon brtsegs): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol te/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong gis
398a2(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/
398a3(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa 'di dga' thob bo// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas nan tan byed pa dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa dang / stong pa nyid sgom pa
398a4(dkon brtsegs): dang ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po dang ldan na/ yongs su dag pa 'di dag 'thob bo// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid
398a5(dkon brtsegs): yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// bsdam pa zag pas rtag tu mngon brtson pa// byang chub lam las mi ldog yid ldan pa// g.yo mar za ba med cing sgyu med pa// ye shes mtha' yas ldan/
398a6(dkon brtsegs): pa de dag yod// skye dang na dang rga dang 'chis gzir ba// sems can mgon med sdug bsngal mthong nas ni// srid pa'i mtsho las 'gro ba bsgral ba'i phyir// de dag chos kyi gru ni yang dag sbyor/
398a7(dkon brtsegs): nges pa sems can kun la sems mnyam pa/ bu gcig pa bzhin 'gro ba rnams la lta// 'di dag thams cad bdag gis dkrol lo zhes// gang zag mchog gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// stong nyid rtag tu
398b1(dkon brtsegs): rtogs par khong du chud// bdag yod ma yin sems can yong ma yin// 'dus byas sgyu ma rmi lam 'dra ba la// byis pa mi mkhas padi la rnam par rmongs// mkhas pa de dag jig du cis smras
398b2(dkon brtsegs): pa de la nan tan byed cing kun tu gnas// dul zhing zhi la rtag tu skyon rnams spangs// rgyal ba'i sras rnams byang chub lam la dga'/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'dadag
398b3(dkon brtsegs): ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ gzungs pa thob pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed pa dang / chos zab mo la bzod pa 'thob pa dang /
398b4(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims yongs su dag pa yang dag par spyod pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbugs 'byin pa 'thob pa'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/
398b5(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya'o// gang gis sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'i chos mchog 'dzin 'gyur ba/ gzungs rnams grags pa chen po de dag gis ni rtag tu thob// nam yang chud zar
398b6(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur phyir zhing blo gros rab tu 'phel// de dag ye shes chags pa med cing chos kun pha rol phyin// byang chub yan lag 'phel bar byed pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed// de dag 'dren
398b7(dkon brtsegs): pa rnams ni gang nas bzhud pa'i lam mchog ston// de dag sdig pa'i grog po dag la brten pa ma yin te/ tshig byed bdag nyid med ltar de dag ring du rnam par spong // dpa' bo stong pa nyid
399a1(dkon brtsegs): dang ldan pa'i zab mo'i chos thos nas// de dag bdag dang sems can srog tu lta ba kun mi 'byung // de dag tshul khrims ston med dul zhing zhi ba'i yid dang ldan/
399a2(dkon brtsegs): sangs rgyas tshul khrims bla na med la sems can rnams kyang sbyor// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar
399a3(dkon brtsegs): byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong sangs rgyas mthong ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dka' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong rjes
399a4(dkon brtsegs): su 'thun pa'i chos thos pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba/ byang chub
399a5(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dmigs su med pa'i chos la bzod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dgag
399a6(dkon brtsegs): bar byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba na 'khod pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces
399a7(dkon brtsegs): bya'o// gzi brjid kyis ni 'jig rten thams cad kun nas snang mdzad pa'i/ rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi mchog tshe rabs kun tu de dag mthong // byang chub dam pa mchog tshol che ma
399b1(dkon brtsegs): 'grol ba'i phyir// dga' zhing gus par gnas nas de ltar mi dbang rgyal po mchod// 'dren pa rnams las zhi ba rjes su mthun pa'i chos kyang nyan// thos nas bsam pa zag pas brtan pa tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor/
399b2(dkon brtsegs): dmigs med chos thos chos 'di thams cad sems can med pa dang / 'di la bdag med par ni chos la som nyid mi skye// de ni bdog pa thams cad yongs gtong rtag tu kun 'dzin med// slong banye bar 'ongs pa mthong
399b3(dkon brtsegs): na sems ni rab tu dga'// grong dang yul 'khor sa dang srog dang bu dang chung ma dang // thams cad gtong zhing de yi sems ni gang du'ang g.yo ba med/ yul 'khor spyong byang chub sems dpa' chos
399b4(dkon brtsegs): bzhi la blta bar mi bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim gyi gnas la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' rab tu byung nas rnyed pa dang bkur sti la
399b5(dkon brtsegs): blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas khyim la 'dris par bya ba la blta bar mi bya ba dang / yul ba khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' lus dang srog la blta bar mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor
399b6(dkon brtsegs): spyong byang chub sems rabs chos bzhi po de dag la blta bar mi bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/ de la 'di skad ces bya'o// skyon gyis gzings pa mtha' yas ldan pa'i khyim spangs rtag tu nor
399b7(dkon brtsegs): mi blta/ yon tan ldan pa des pa de dag dgon par dga' zhing dbang po dul/ de dag gang du'ang bud med rnams dang skyes pa dag dang 'dris mi byed// bas ltar gcig pur gnas shing bsam pa dri med dag la dri//
400a1(dkon brtsegs): ma bral/ de dag rnyed pa rnams kyis dga' bar mi 'gyur mi thob yid zhum med// 'dod pa chung ste gcam la dga' zhing skyur dang tshul 'chos spangs// sems can don phyir brtson 'grus
400a2(dkon brtsegs): yid ldan sbyin dang dul la rab tu gnas// sangs rgyas ye shes don gnyer bsam gtan brtson 'grus yon tan pha rol phyin// lus dang de bzhin srog la mi lta sdug pa'i rtsa lag rnam spangs te// bsam pa rdo rje lta
400a3(dkon brtsegs): bur rab brtan rtag tu byang chub lam la sbyor// lus ni dum bu dum bur bcad kyang de dag sems la g.yo ba med// thams cad mkhyen nyid re ba phyir zhing brtson 'grus shin tu brtan 'dir rtsom/
400a4(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshul khrims skyon med pa byang chub sems
400a5(dkon brtsegs): dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong dgon pa la gnas pa mi 'dor ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyeng
400a6(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i rigs bzhi dang 'thun par byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong mang du thos pa thob par byed pa byang chub sems dpa'
400a7(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gdung ba med par byed pa'i chos so// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te/
400b1(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya'o// sangs rgyas tshul khrims dam pa 'di la 'dod byed cing // tshul khrims dri med nor bu rin chen 'dra bsrung // de dag nga ni khrims ldan legs sdom yin mi sems//
400b2(dkon brtsegs): tshul khrims de nyid la ni rtag tu sems can sbyor// de dag stong pa dgon par rtag tu gnas par byed// de dgu bdag gi 'du shes srog gi 'du shes med// gzugs kun rtswa dang shing dang rtsig
400b3(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dra bar mthong // 'di la skyes pa bud med bdag gi med par mthong // 'phags rigs bzhi la dga' zhing g.yo med tshul 'chos med// bag yod de dag bsam pa zag pas rab tu sbyor// thos
400b4(dkon brtsegs): dang yon tan rnams la rtag tu brtson par byed// bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan mthu chen don du gnyer// skye rga 'chi bas bcom zhing nad kyis rab gzir ba// 'gro ba mgon med srid pa'i btsonar
400b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dir bltas nas// zhi ba dam pa mchog gi chos kyi gru sbyar te// srid pa'i rgya mtsho'i chu las skye bo sgrol bar byed// 'dus byas gyur par 'jig rten 'khyam pas skyabs mgon dang // dpung gnyen
400b6(dkon brtsegs): byed pa gzhan ni gang yang yod min gyis// bdag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad yod dkrol zhes// de phyir byang chub mchog tu bdag gis smon lam btag/ yul 'khor skyong
400b7(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bde 'gro 'thob ste/ de'ang sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang phrad pa dang / blags sri zhu byed de/
401a1(dkon brtsegs): de'ang zang zing med pa'i sems kyis sten pa dang / bas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ste/ de'ang rnyed pa dang bkur sti la mi lta ba dang / spobs pa thob
401a2(dkon brtsegs): ste debang zab mo la bzod pa dang ldan pa ste/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag ni cang shes kyi 'gros su shes par bya'o// 'di la 'di ni chos nyid yin te//
401a3(dkon brtsegs): de la 'di skad ces bya'o// brtan pa nags dang sul na rtag tu gnas par byed// de dag rtag tu 'khor mo rnyed pa don gnyer min/ chags med blo can rtag tu spobs dang ldan pa yin/
401a4(dkon brtsegs): zab mo'i chos la mkhas shing spros pa rnams dang bral// rtag tu 'khor mor bla ma rnams la srid zhu byed// de dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin de dag sbyor// bde gshegs dpag tu med pa mang po
401a5(dkon brtsegs): mnyes par byed// rgyal ba'i ye shes ched du mchod pa rgya chen byed// grags pa chen po rnams kyi 'gro ba gtso bor 'gyur// lha mo rnams kyi nang na spyi bor phyin pa yin// rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam
401a6(dkon brtsegs): la rtag tu sems can 'dzud// dge ba bcu po dag la yang dag sbyor bar byed// sangs rgyas yon tan thos na de dag dga' 'gyur te// de dag ring por mi thogs nga dang nye ba 'gyur// de dag byang chub rdul bral
401a7(dkon brtsegs): dam pa sangs rgyas nas// sems can khrag khrig sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnams las 'grel/ yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub
401b1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ khong khro ba med pa'i sems byang chub sems dpa'i smon pa dang / tshul 'chos pa dang / kha gsag dang / thob kyis 'jal ba
401b2(dkon brtsegs): yongs su spangs te/ dgon par gnas pa dang / bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing rnam par smin pa la re ba med pa dang / nyin mtshan du chos 'dod cing chos smra ba rnams la 'khrul pa
401b3(dkon brtsegs): mi tshol ba ste/ yul 'khor stong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de'i tshe tshigs su/
401b4(dkon brtsegs): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// bla na med pa'i byang chub 'dod pa na// pha ba dri ma med cing khro sems med// de ni su la'ang skyon tshol byed ma yin// g.yo med tshul ba chos med cing spros sems
401b5(dkon brtsegs): med/ khyim gyi blo gros yang myang dun rtsa// skye bo ngan 'grogs tshul bzhin ring 'gyur ba// spangs te de la mi lta rab byung nas// thar pa 'dod pa ri khrod gnas par byed// dgon pa bas mtha'i
401b6(dkon brtsegs): rnam pa sten pa na// shes khe 'thob pa kun la mi rten zhing // lus dang srog la'ang lta bar mi byed la// seng ge lta bur gnas shing dgra las rgyal// byang chub lam phyir ye shes tshol ba la// ngan
401b7(dkon brtsegs): don tsam gyis chog par 'dzin byed cing // rtag tu bya ltar sogs pa spangs nas ni// 'jig rten kun la gnas pa ma yin no// dper na bse ltar gcig pug nas byed cing // seng ge lta bur 'jigs pa/
402a1(dkon brtsegs): yod ma yin// ri dgra lta bur sar 'jigs yid mi rton// de ni mchod pas khengs par 'gyur ba med// g.yang sar lhung ba'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas// rab tu thar par bya phyir babad par byed//
402a2(dkon brtsegs): gal te bag yod dge ba'i chos spyod na// bdag kyang 'gro ba 'di yi dbang gnyen 'gyur// mi mchog spyod pa 'di dag 'dod pa na// 'dzum pa'i bzhin gyis rab snyan tshig smra zhing // sdug dang mi sdug rtag tu rnyog
402a3(dkon brtsegs): sems med// rlung dang 'dra bar chags pa med par gnas// stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med la mos// dus byas kun la sgyu ma lta bur rtog/ yangs pa'i blo can ni dang dul la dgag/ de ni rtag tu
402a4(dkon brtsegs): bdud rtsib ro yis mgu// ci nas byang chub lam ni grub byed cing // de ni rtag tu bsam pa yongs su sbyong // gzungs dang spobs pa tshol bar byed pa na// yon tan 'dod pa sdug bsngal brgya dag
402a5(dkon brtsegs): bzod// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di bltas nas// gang zhig don du gnyer ba de dgar 'gyur// gang zhig byang chub 'di lam mos pa// blo chung de ni nyes pa brgya yang spyad//
402a6(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor steng bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i g.yangs ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong ma gus pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong byas pa mi
402a7(dkon brtsegs): gzo zhing g.yo la rten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul khor spyong rnyed pa dang bkur sti la chags pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa dang / yul 'khor skyong
402b1(dkon brtsegs): tshul 'chos pa dang kha gsag gi rnyed pa dang bkur sti sgrub pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa ste/ yul 'khor stong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi g.yang sa /
402b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// 'phags pa bla ma rnams dang pha ma la// de dag rtag tu gus pa med pa yin// de dag byas pa mi gzo gso
402b3(dkon brtsegs): can te// rtag tu kun tu ma bsdams spyod cing rmongs// rnyed la rtag tu chags shing zhen pa ste// de dag tshul 'chos pa dang g.yo sbyor dga'// kha cig tshul khrims brtul zhugs ji ltas
402b4(dkon brtsegs): kyang 'di na bdag dang mtshungs pa med ces smras// de dag phan tshun sdang bar sems pa ste// glags tshol ba la rtag tu brtson pa yin// de dag zhing gi las dang chong la dga'// de dag dge sbyong
402b5(dkon brtsegs): yon tan shin tu ring // phyi ma'i dus na 'di ltar ma bsdams pa'i// dge slong tshul khrims yon tan rab ring ba// de dag mtshang 'dru ba dang 'thab pa dang // phrag dog dbang gis chos 'di nub par
402b6(dkon brtsegs): byed/ byang chub lam las rtag par shin tu ring // 'phags pa'i nor las de dag shin tu ring // 'phags lam gya nom rnam par spangs nas ni// de dag 'gro balngar ni 'khyam par 'gyur/
402b7(dkon brtsegs): la khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te// bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong le lo byang chub sems dpa'
403a1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong ma dad pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong
403a2(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos dang / yul 'khor skyong pha rol gyi mchod pa la phrag dog dang ser sna'i sems dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'
403a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i chos te/ yul 'khor stong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub la bgegs byed pa'i ches so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe
403a4(dkon brtsegs): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// ma dad le lo rtag tu rmongs pa'i sems// de dag mngon pa'i nga can rtag tu khro// bzod ldan rtag brtson dge slong mthong nas ni// gtsug lag khang nas bgro
403a5(dkon brtsegs): tshe dbyig pas rdeg/ pha rol mchod phyir 'di ni phra dog skye// de dag sems ni gnas pa yod ma yin// glags lta byed cing 'khrul pa tshol ba can// sul 'khrul yod gang la gleb bya snyam// de dgar yi
403a6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa 'di las ring // de dag yon tan sdang zhing ngan song gzhol// de dag rgyal ba'i bstan pa bor nas ni// ngan song shin tu mi bzad 'bar ba'i 'gro/ de dag rnams kyi sdig pa'i spyod pa dang // chos
403a7(dkon brtsegs): min ldan 'gro rab sdig 'dir thos nas// rtag tu 'khor mor byang chub la ma la sbyor// ngan 'gror skyes shing gdung bar gyur ta re// sangs rgyas 'jig rten phan pa drang srong che// bskal pa bye mar brgya lam
403b1(dkon brtsegs): 'byung bar 'gyur// da lta la padam pa rnyed pa la// gal te bar 'dod pag med spang bar gyis/ yul 'khor stong gang bag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas brtan par miT+Ta
403b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan bzhi gang zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas sdig pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gang zag bstan par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dmigs par lta ba can gyi ga
403b3(dkon brtsegs): zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas dam pa'i chos spong ba'i gang zag bsten par mi bya ba dang / yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpas zang zing la brkam pa'i gang zag bste/
403b4(dkon brtsegs): par mi bya ba ste/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsten par mi bya ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshogs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sdig pa'i bshes
403b5(dkon brtsegs): gnyen rnam spong zhing // gang dag dge ba'i bshes gnyen sten byed pa// de dag rtag tu byang chub lam la 'phel// dper na malab la zla ba yang ngo bzhin// dmigs par lta la rtag tu zhen pa dang // bdag
403b6(dkon brtsegs): dang srog dang gso bar zhen pa dag/ de dag dus phyis bzhin du rtag tu spang // gang dag sangs rgyas ye shes don mi gnyer// gang dag mi mchog rnams kyi zhi ba'i chos// 'dod chags bral ba bdud rtsi
403b7(dkon brtsegs): 'thung spong ba// de dag dper na ngan skyugs rdza bzhin spang // gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// zang zing dag dang chos gos lhung bzed chags// rtag tu khyim la 'dris par byed brtson
404a1(dkon brtsegs): pa shA de dag rnams dang dris par mi bya ste// de dag me yi 'obs zhin spang bar bya// gang zhig bdud ni gdul bar bya ba dang // 'khor lo dam pa bla med bskor ba dang // de ltar
404a2(dkon brtsegs): sems can don yangs byed 'dod pa// des ni sdig pa'i bshes gnyen spang bar bya// gang zhig byang chub dam pa 'tshang rgyar 'dod// de yis rnyed dang sdug dang mi sdug dang // grags dang mtshang ba dru phrag
404a3(dkon brtsegs): dog nga spangs te// sangs rgyas ye shes rtag tu btsal bar bya/ yul 'khor stong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te// bzhi gang
404a4(dkon brtsegs): zhe na ta ta yul 'khor skyong shes pas mngon par rlom sems su byed pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang // yul 'khor skyong phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa'i sems
404a5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang // yul 'khor skyong ma mos pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos dang // yul 'khor
404a6(dkon brtsegs): skyong yongs su ma dag pa'i shes pa dang bzod pa'i longs spyod yongs su tshol ba byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos te// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub
404a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa'i chos so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// gang dag sa la tshes ni 'dzin 'gyur zhing //
404b1(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa'agyur ba// de la mi shes pas ni brnyas byed na// des na de ni sdug bsngal mtha' yas rnyed// yang bas ni gang zhig longs spyod tshol// shes pa mdag rtag tu bdun cing /
404b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dod// gang zhig rtag tung rgyal khengs gyur la// bla ma 'phags pa'i sde bo mi 'dud cing // sangs rgyas la yang mos pa yod min pa// chos dang tshogs la de ni mos pa med// bslab dang sbyangs pa
404b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams la de mi mos// sdig pa'i blo can ngan song gsum phyogs pa// de ni mi nang 'di nas shi 'phos nas// las kyi dbang gis mi mkhas rnam par rmongs// dmyal ba'amangon te dud 'gro ba'i gro rnams
404b4(dkon brtsegs): sam ta yi dgas 'gro ba rnams su sdug bsngal rnyed// gang zhig 'jig rten sgron 'gyur blo ldan zhing // mi yi dpa' bo sdug bsngal mtha' babyin pa// de yis ngan song lam rnams rab spangs te//
404b5(dkon brtsegs): byang chub lam ni rtag tu bsten par bya/ bam po gnyis pa// yul 'khor skyong bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/
404b6(dkon brtsegs): bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol la brnyas pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / 'jig rten pa'i thabs kyis sgom pa la sbyor ba dang mtshan ma'i 'du shes byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba
404b7(dkon brtsegs): dang rta kun 'dzin pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / ye shes dang bral ba dang / bag med pa la rten pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba dang / phyir babrang ba'i sems kyis khyim la dris par byed pa byang chub
405a1(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba ste/ yul 'khor sgong bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'ching ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ngobo tshe tshigs su bcad pa'ang dgas
405a2(dkon brtsegs): stsal to// rtag tu gzhan dag la ni brnyas byed cing // rtag tu 'jig rten pa yi bsam gtan sgom// lta gyur 'di dag gis ni de bcings te// glang po lus ring padam du song ba bzhin// khyim la 'dris byed 'ching dang
405a3(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dang // gang zhig bag med rtag tu kun 'dzin sems// ye shes spangs shing blo gros rmongs gyur pa// ma rigs spyod pa 'di dag rnams kyis bcings// gang zhig sdug bsngal 'jig pa 'di dag dang //
405a4(dkon brtsegs): skye rga 'chi la sogs las grol 'dod pas// brnyas par byed dang rlom sems bor nas ni// byang chub lam la rtag tu brtson par 'gyur// sdug bsngal mtha' yas ma lus bzod byas te// bde ba kun la
405a5(dkon brtsegs): chag pa med gyur nas// sdug dang mi sdug gnyen pa ma lus btang // brtan pa dag ni sdig bral sangs rgyas 'gyur// pha rol gyin drugs dang yon tan dang // stobs dang dbang po dag dang shes la sbyor// yon tan kun
405a6(dkon brtsegs): dang rtag tu ldan gyur nas// 'gro ba'i dra ba grol ba'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// bskal pa bsam mi khyab par sngon spyod tshe// sems can phan phyir byang chub mchog don du// sbyin dang dul dang des la rtag tu spyad//
405a7(dkon brtsegs): gnyen pa spangs nas bde bar gnas par gyur// bas mtha' nags su rtag par nga dga' ste// byang chub ched du bsam pa rnam par spangs// brgya lam na yang brtson 'grus nyams ma gyur// skyes chen
405b1(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi ye shes de 'dra 'o// srid pa'i brtson rar 'gro ba lnga pa khyam pas// sems can 'khyam pa'i 'gro ba mthong nas ni// sngon chad 'dir ni snying rje rgya chen bskyed// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub dam pa
405b2(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs// bskal pa mang por byang chub mchog tshol zhing // rang gi bu bo bu mo chung ma sdug/ 'phangs pa'i srog dang shin tu 'byor pa dang // grong khyer nor dang 'bru rnams mang po btang // me tog 'bras
405b3(dkon brtsegs): bu'i chu 'thor nyams dka' ba'i// nags su grub pa nga ni bzod dgar gyur// sa mtshan rgyal bas lag pa rkang pa bcad// de tsheng ni snang ba'i yid mgyur// nags dang sus sngo bsangs zhes bya ba'o// thub
405b4(dkon brtsegs): pas bla margas pa gso ba na// oMs dbang pos sra ba'i mdas bstan kyang // yid ni yongs su gnod par sems ma gyur// legs par gsungs pa'i ched du g.yangs nas// lus la ma bltas rab tu mchongs
405b5(dkon brtsegs): bar gyur// nga ni byang chub mchog gi rgyu yi phyir// lus rang srog la ltas par ma gyur to// stag mo bu dang bcas pa'i srog gi phyir// lus btang nas ni stag mo tshim par byas// nam mkha' las ni lha yi
405b6(dkon brtsegs): tshogs rnams kyis// skyes chen brtson 'grus brtan pa legs shes bsgrags// gang tshe sngon chad srid par spyod pa na// sbyin la rab dga' bram ze khye'u gyur tshe// rin chen ched du rgya mtsho bskams nas
405b7(dkon brtsegs): ni/ nor bu rnyed nas sems can bde bar byas// rgyal po zla ba'i bu zhes bya gyur te// brjod pa grags shing ngan spyod pa'i tshe// nga yis bden pa'i tshul gyis rgyal po brgya// bsad par byas pa myur du
406a1(dkon brtsegs): thar bar byas// dbul zhing sdug bsngal ba yi mi mthong nas// nga yis 'phags pa'i lus ni btang byas te// nga yis nor rnyed de ni phyug por byas// de tsheng ni kun sbyin rgyal por
406a2(dkon brtsegs): gyur// nga 'dir mi yi rgyal por gyur pa'i tshe// skyabs su mongs pa'i phug ron thong nas ni// rang gi lus las sha yang bcad byas te// rang lus ngas btang 'jigs pas 'phongs ma btang // rgyal po
406a3(dkon brtsegs): ral pa can zhes sngon gyur tshe// sman pa mchog gis nga yi ched du ni// mtshungs med sman rnams ma lus sbyar ba yang // srog btang ngas ni de dag gzhan la byin// 'gro ba'i don mor sngon chad spyod pa
406a4(dkon brtsegs): nargyal po che ba bzang zhes byakur che// chung ma madri khyol mi 'phyo ba// bur bcas bu mo ma chags ma bltas btang // gang tshe brtson 'grus pabar zhes bya gyur tshe// nga sngon lon stong du tshong
406a5(dkon brtsegs): bar yang // bya dka' brgyad cu rtsa bzhi bzod par byas// nor dang dpal yang sngon chad ngas btang ngo // rgyal bu gzi brjid dri ma med gyur tshe// nga yis rgyal ba'i ring srel mchod rten bdun/
406a6(dkon brtsegs): mchog tu gus pas lus la ma btang ste// stobs bcu mnga' ba rnams la mchod pa byas// nga ni rgyal po bla 'od gyur pa'i tshe// mi bzad mig can khros par gyur nas ni// de yis nga yi mag pa
406a7(dkon brtsegs): bslangs pas na// de tshe nga yis mgo bo bcad de byin// nga ni bsod nams mnyam zhes bya gyur tshe// grong dang grong khyer dag dang lam srang tho// thams cad du yang rgya chen sman gyi rnams// de dag
406b1(dkon brtsegs): sems can don phyir ngas bzhag go// srid pa rnams na spyod pa gang gi tshe// nga sngon rgyal po dge bsas na// bu med gzugs bzang gser dang mu tig gis// lus brgyan stong dgangs ni btang ba byas//
406b2(dkon brtsegs): gang tshed sngon mi yi rgyal po ni// rin chen gtsug pud gyur tshe me tog dang // spos mchog rnam dag ser gyis brgyan pa yi// bcod pan dpal ldan dam pangs btang ngo // nga sngon rgyal po mos ldan gyur paH
406b3(dkon brtsegs): tshe shing bal 'da' ba 'jam pa lta bu dang // pad+ma'i 'ar ba mnyen lta bur 'jam gzhon pa'i// lag pa rkang pa dag kyang ngas btang ngo // ded dpon seng ge 'dzin tu gyur pa na// snying rje med cing mi
406b4(dkon brtsegs): bzang rab gtum pa// srin mo brgya dag shin tu tshar bcad nas// rgya shug gling du mi rnams bkod par gyur// gang tshe mi bzangs shes byar gyur pa na// bris pa 'dod dang ldan zhing yid rmongs pa/
406b5(dkon brtsegs): srin mo dgal na chung 'du shes pa// tshong pa lnga brgya de dag thar par byas// gang tshe bsod nams 'od zer gyul // lha yi bu mo lta bu'i gzugs ldan pa// bud med bye ba phrag bzhi spangs nas su// rgyal ba ni
406b6(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa la ni rab tu byung // sems can don phyir nga ni spyod pa na// dri med dag pa'i gser gyi mdog can gyi// rgyal por gang tshe nga ni gyur pa na// sor mo dra bas 'brel ba rgya chen btang // rgyal po
406b7(dkon brtsegs): ut+pal mi ces bya gyur tshe// pad+ma sngon po bzang po mdog 'dra'i mig/ yid tu 'ong zhing snying du sdug gyur pa// 'gro ba'i don du nga yis btang ba byas// sman pa'i rgyal po spa 'drar gyur pa'i tshe// sdug
407a1(dkon brtsegs): dang bral bas nyen pa mthong nas ni// bud med cha byad gzugs dang blo nyams pa// ngas ni snying rjes yongs su thar bar byas// sngon gyi srid par kun mthong gyur pa na// nad kyis btab pa
407a2(dkon brtsegs): nad pa'i mi mthong nas// nga yis rang gi khrag kyang byin gyur te// mi de ngas ni nad dang bral bar byas// rgyal po me tog bzang zhes bya gyur tshe// nga yis lus las rus pa phyung nas ni// nad kyis rid par gyur la
407a3(dkon brtsegs): rkang byin te// ngas ni nam yang sems can ma btang ngo // rgyal po don grub ces byar sngon gyur tshe// rang gi mdzod rnams thams cad ngas btang zhing // baphangs shing yid du 'ong ba'i srog btang ste// 'phongs par
407a4(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa'i mi ni mthar par byas// rgyal po phyogs kyi tog tu gyur pa'i tshe// byang chub 'ded nas 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// 'khor lo'i mtshan can pad+ma lta bu yi// lag pa phrugs kyang ma bltas rab tu byin// rgyal po thams
407a5(dkon brtsegs): cad mthong du gyur pa'i tshe// snying rje ldan zhing 'gro don phan 'dod de// skyes pa bud med dag gis rgyas pa yi// gling bzhi pa yang ngas ni btang ba byas// rgyal pos drus shes ldan gyur tshe// 'jam zhing mnyen la dri med
407a6(dkon brtsegs): dkarda ba'i brla// dga' zhing mgu ba'i yid kyis bcad nas ni// rang gi sha dang khrag kyang ngas byin no// bud med gzugs ldan zhes ni byagyur tshe// bud med bkres sgo mnyam thag ngas mthong na// gas
407a7(dkon brtsegs): ltar ser zhing shin tu gzhon pa yi// num snying du sdug pa nyis ka btang // rgyal po dpal grags shes byar gyur pa na// shin tu nyams dga' ba yi rgyan mchog dang // rin chen du ma gos dang shing rta bano//
407b1(dkon brtsegs): gtang bar dka' ba rnam pa du ma btang // rgyal bu byas pa gzo bar gyur pa'i tshe// rgya mtsho las ni byas pa mi gzo bsgral// rin chen phyir ni de yid dmig phyung // 'on kyang ngal khros pa'i sems med do//
407b2(dkon brtsegs): srog chags go d+har sngon srid gyur pa'i tshe// grog sbur dag ni 'chi bar gyur dogs nas// lus kyi dam pa ma bltas btang bar byas// de chong yi sems ni g.yo ba med// spyad pa spyod tshe bya sre gyur pa na/
407b3(dkon brtsegs): rgan la bsnyen bkur bya bar rtag dga' ste// nga ni rim gro gus la rab tu dga'// nga rgyal ldan pa ma yin khengs pa med// skyabs su 'ongs pa'i don phyi nga yis ni// snying rje skyes po byas nas lus btang ste/
407b4(dkon brtsegs): gdol pa mi yis mda' rnams bsnun kyang ni// spre'u gyur ngas ni mi de ma btang ngo // rgyal po dbang du gyur tshe nga yis ni// glang po bla ma rgan dran lus skyabs te// shin tu yid bong zas kyang ngas ma zas/
407b5(dkon brtsegs): de tshe glang po bdag nyid thar par gyur// bgrod dka' gangs can ri la dred dbang gyur// nga yis zhag bdun rab tu bsrungs pa'i mi// de yis gsod pa nga la btang byas kyang // nga ni de tshe khong khro byas pa med/
407b6(dkon brtsegs): kha ba kun da 'dra ba'i glang por gyur// byang chub mchog rten sangs rgyas yon tan tshol// dug dang bcas pa'i mnga' yis bsnun kyang ni// mche ba dam pa byin gyis khros pa med// dum bu'i gling du nags tshal
407b7(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul ba// sreg pa'i phru gu byams la gnas gyur tshe// mthong ba tsam gyis ma ni zhi gyur nas// lha tshogs dag gis me tog rnams kyang gtor// ri rags gyur tshe gang+gA'i rlabs shugs kyis// khyer ba zhig ni nga yis
408a1(dkon brtsegs): bsngal byas pa// de yis gsod pa dgan khrid de 'ongs// 'on kyang de la nga ni yid mkhris// rgya mtsho'i dbus su son te mgon med pa// tshong pa lnga brgya dag ni bsgral byas
408a2(dkon brtsegs): nas/ bkras pa de dag rnams kyis bas du gyur tshe// rus sbal skye gnas gyur kyang byams dang ldan// nga ni byang chub spyad pa spyod pa na// sngon chad chu na rgyu ba'i nyer gyur tshe// sems can phan phyir nga
408a3(dkon brtsegs): yis lus btang ste// srog chags brgya stong dag gis zos par gyur// srog chags nges par gang tshe gyur pa ni// nad brgyas gzir ba'i 'gro ba mthong nas su// lus ni sman lta bur yang bsgyur
408a4(dkon brtsegs): byas te// sems can bde zhing nad kyang med par byas// ri dgra rgyal po seng ger gyur pa'i tshe// mthu stobs ldan par gyur cing snying rje ldan// mda' yis bsnun kyang khros pa'i sems med de//
408a5(dkon brtsegs): de tshe gsod la nga yis byams pa byas// dung dang ba mo lta bu'i rta rgyal du// nga sngon rgya mtsho'i ngogs su gyur pa'i tshe// srin mo'i nang du son pa'i tshong pa rnams// nga yis snying brtse snying rje bskyed
408a6(dkon brtsegs): nas bsgral// 'gro ba'i don du byang chub spyad spyod tshe// 'ang ba chags kun lar ni gyur tshe// 'dod pa'i yon tan nyes pa mang spangs nas// bud med dbang du nga ni song mthur// sel ba
408a7(dkon brtsegs): nags nas ri bong gyur pa'i tshe// legs spyod ri bong tshogs gyur de la bstan// thub pa gnas la gnas pa bkres 'phongs pa// de yi ched du ngas ni gnas kyang btang // sdong po me tog
408b1(dkon brtsegs): zas kyuzhe ma// sdong po bskams kyang ngas na da ma btang // da tshobargya byin byas gapyong mthong nas// sdong po de ni le 'bras rgyas par byas// da ni swa si rgyal por gyur pa na/
408b2(dkon brtsegs): mi rgyal po klu yis u 'dzem ste// spra yi tshogs la gnod pa byung mthong nas// rgyal po'i 'jigs las de dag ngas bton to// yang sngon ne cor gyur te pha ma'i phyir// sA lu blangs tshe mi yis
408b3(dkon brtsegs): bzungs nas ni// ne tse tsi b+hir nga yi sA lu len// lo tog smin 'di ma rung byar sems sam// ne tso des smras bzang po gsan du gsol// bdag ni brku bas khyod kyi 'bras mi len/
408b4(dkon brtsegs): pha ma rgan rgon gnyis ni gso ba'i phyir// de la snying rje bdag gis sA lu blangs// gang tshe thog ma sa bon bdebs pa'i tshe// 'gro ba kun la shas shas sbyin no zhes// de skad tshig spras de ni bdas
408b5(dkon brtsegs): thos te// des na bdag ni brku bar gzhar mi 'gyur// ne tse legs so sA lu ci dgar khyer// sri zhu 'di ni mi yin nang na dkon// khyod ni mi yin nga 'dir dur 'gro yin// legs so khyed ni dul
408b6(dkon brtsegs): zhi yang dag bsdams// byang chub rdul bral dam pa tshol ba na// sngon chad spyod pa de la sogs pa rnams// spyod pa'i tshe na dka' ba brgya la yang // nga yi yid ni skyo bar gyur pa med//
408b7(dkon brtsegs): nang gi dag dam 'on te phyi yang rung // nga yis dngos po ma btang gang yang med// tshul khrims bzod dang de bzhin brtson 'grus dang // bsam gtan thabs dang shes rab ngas spyod do// sha
409a1(dkon brtsegs): dang pags pa de bzhin rkang dang khrag/ de dag rang gi lus las sbyin pa byas// bas mtha' dag dang phug na rgyu ba'i tshe// ngas ni de tshe lus ni bskams par byas// gang la sbyangs na
409a2(dkon brtsegs): rgyal bar 'gyur ba yi// sbyangs pa gang dag rgyal bas bstan mdzad pa// spangs pa de la rtag tu rab brtson te// sngon spyod tshen nga ni rtag tu 'jug/ spyod pa'i tshe nang yis gang bstan pa// brtul zhugs
409a3(dkon brtsegs): chen de badra de dag dang // spyod pa 'di zos nas ni de dag rnams// tshig gcig la yang 'dun par mi 'gyur ro// 'di thos gyur nas de yi tshe na ni// bstan pa 'di nyid la ni 'phya bar 'gyur// de dag zas dang
409a4(dkon brtsegs): 'khrig pa lhur len cing // rtag tu gnyid non khwa ltar g.yo ngan 'gyur// rtag tu 'phags pa ma yin chos la sdang // bstan pa sran par byed cing yon tan nyams// zhi ba'i chos 'di thos par gyur pa na/
409a5(dkon brtsegs): 'di ni rgyal bas gsungs pa min zhes 'dzer// nga yi slobs dpon thos pa rgya mtshor gyur// mang du thos pa smra ba'i gtso bo yin// de yis 'di yi rnam par ji ltar yang // sangs rgyas bka'
409a6(dkon brtsegs): ma yin zhes dgag pa byas// pha rol las kyang rgal bar gyur de yi// bla ma de ni dpag med yon tan chu// des kyang 'di ni blang ba ma byas kyis// 'di la ma 'jug 'di ni nor ba yin// kang
409a7(dkon brtsegs): la bdag yon ma yin srog med dang // rnam pa cis kyang gang zag med bstan pa// tshul khrims sbyor dang sdom pa'i bya ba la// gang 'bad de yi ngal ba don med 'gyur// gal te theg pa chen po yin na/
409b1(dkon brtsegs): ni tA bdi la bdag dang sems can shed skyes med// gang la bdag dang sems can mi dmigs pa// de la bdag gis ngal byas don med 'gyur// sdig pa'i blo dang mu stegs ngan mtshungs pas/
409b2(dkon brtsegs): rang gi blo yi rang bzod byed pa ste// dge slong 'khor gyi nang du rgyal ba ni// tshig 'di gsang bar nam yang mi 'gyur ro// ngo tsha khrel dang 'dzem dang bral ba dang // khwa ltar spyi brtol cha la nod gtum
409b3(dkon brtsegs): zhing phrag dogang rgyal rgyags pas tshig pa yi// dge slong dag ni nga yi bstan la 'byung // lag pa dang ni rkang pa rno ba byed cing // chos gos gru rnams kyang ni kyog par byed// chos gos thogs
409b4(dkon brtsegs): shing chang dang rgyags myos nas// grong dang khyim dag tu ni rnam par rgyu// de dag sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan thogs nas ni// khyim na gnas pa'i skye bo sten par byed// bstan pa yon tan phung po
409b5(dkon brtsegs): 'di spangs nas// de dag rtag tu 'phrin yig 'khyer bar byed// de dag pa glang rta dang bong bu dang // de dag phyugs dang bran po bran mo bsrel// zhing gi las dang tshong gi sbyor ba la// brtson
409b6(dkon brtsegs): yid ldan zhing rtag tu 'phags ma yin// de dga' phags min tshig kyang mi smras med// bya ba ma yin pa dag gang yang med// de dag rnams la mchod rten nor dang ni// dge 'dun gyi dang
409b7(dkon brtsegs): gang zag nor de mtshungs// dge slong yon tan 'byor pa mthong nas ni// de dag la yang mi snyan rjed byed de// tshul khrims 'chal pa slu bzhugs nas ni// bu mar 'jigs byed mi bzang rab cas
410a1(dkon brtsegs): brjod rab tu byung ba de dag brkam pa ltar// khyim pa 'dod pas brkam pa de lta min// khyim par mtshungs pa de dag chung ma dang // bu dang bu mo dag kyang yod par
410a2(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ gang gi khyim du de dag chos gos dang // lus dang longs spyad dag gis bsnyen bkur ba// de yi chung ma la ni yongs chags shing // nyon mongs dpang 'gro rtag tu 'phags ma yin// 'dod pa
410a3(dkon brtsegs): 'di dag bstan bya ma yin te// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba lhung byed ces// de dag khyim pa rnams la rtag smra zhing // de dag bdag nyid ma dul nyer zhi min// ji ltar de dag bdag nyid ma dul ba//
410a4(dkon brtsegs): de dag slob ma tshogs kyang rab ma dul// kha zas dag dang 'khrig pa'i gtam rnams la// de dag nyin dang mtshan du 'gro bar byed// bsten pa'i phyir gyi yon tan phyir min te// de dag la ni de dag bcu
410a5(dkon brtsegs): ba sbyin// 'gro las rtag 'dir mchis pa thob snyam nas// rang gi slob ma'i tshogs kyis bdag kyang bskor// de dag skye bo rnams la smra ba ni// bdag gis snying rjes 'di dag sdud byed gyi// slob
410a6(dkon brtsegs): ma'i tshogs de dag las nam yang ni// rim gro don du gnyer ba med ces smra// de la nad kyis non dang mdze can mang // lus la sha bkru can dang gzugs mi sdug/ rtag tu 'phags min mi dag
410a7(dkon brtsegs): cig kyang // 'ongs shing lhags rab tu 'byin par 'gyur// lung nod pa dang sdom pa rnam par nyams// de dag dge slong yon tan rtag mi brtson// de dag khyim pa ma yin dge slong min// de dag sras
410b1(dkon brtsegs): ba dur khrod shing dang mtshungs// de dag so sror zar dang bslab pa dang // 'dul ba la yang gus par byed mi 'gyur// de dag rang nyams rang dbang 'gro ba ste// lugs kyu btang ba'i glang po'i dbang po
410b2(dkon brtsegs): 'dra de dag nags su gnas par gyur kyang ni// sems ni grong du 'gro bar 'gyur ba ste// nyon mongs me yis rtags tu rab gdungs la// de dag sems kyang gnas pa med par 'gyur/
410b3(dkon brtsegs): de dag sangs rgyas yon tan thams cad dang // bslab dang sbyangs dang thabs kyang brjed nas ni// rgyags dang nga rgyal dregs pa yongs rgyas te// de dag mi bzad mnar med ltung bar 'gyur// de dgra rgyal
410b4(dkon brtsegs): po'i gtam la rtag dga' zhing // rkun po'i gtam brjod po la'ang rab tu dga'// nye du gnyen la'ang rab tu dga' ba ste// de dag nyin dang mtshan du sems par byed// bsam gtan dang ni kha ton
