410b5(dkon brtsegs): btang nas su// rtag tu gtsug lag khang gi las la brtson// gnas la brkam zhing khro gnyer 'byin par byed// de dag slob ma 'khor yang ma dul ba// nga ni gtsug lag khang gi lag gi bla// bdag
410b6(dkon brtsegs): gi ched du ba di ni ngas byas te// dge slong gang dag nga yi rjes 'thun pa// gtsug lag khang 'dir de dag gnas yod do// gang dag tshul khrims ldan zhing yon tan ldan// chos 'dzin skye bo'i don la
410b7(dkon brtsegs): mngon brtson la// dul zhing yang dag sdom la rtag brtson pa// de dag rnams ni sdud par mi byed do// 'di ni nga yi gnas su bskos pa ste// 'di ni nga yi lhan cig gnas pa'i yin// 'di ni nga yi
411a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' bar byed pa'i yin// khyod kyi gnas ni gang yang med kyis song // 'dir ni dge slong dag kyang mang bkod de// mal cha rnams kyang ma lus bgos zin la// 'di na rnyed pa
411a2(dkon brtsegs): 'byung ba yod ma yin// 'dir nici zhig spyad kyi dge slong song // de dag la ni mal stan bgo bya ba// nam du'ang srid par 'gyur ba ma yin te// de dag khyim pa lta bur sogs 'gyur zhing // 'tshog chas
411a3(dkon brtsegs): rnams dang g.yog 'khor mang bar 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus na nga yi bu de dag/ kun tu spang ba byas par gyur nas ni// de dag nga yi tshig ni dran gyur te// bas mtha' dag dang nags su de tshe banas/
411a4(dkon brtsegs): hud rnyed pas zil non yon tan sdang // dge slong mang po gang du byung gyur pa// rgyal ba dam pa yi ni bstan pa dag/ ring por mi thogs par yang 'jigs par 'gyur// phyi dus tshul khrims yon tan
411a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan pa dag/ rtag par yongs su brnyas par 'gyur ba ste// de dag grong dang yul 'khor grong khyer rnams// spangs nas dgon pa nags sa gnas par 'gyur// 'byed dang zur zer 'thab mo dga' ba
411a6(dkon brtsegs): dang yon tan nyams pa rtag tu bsti stang byed// de dag skye bo'i ston par grags 'gyur te// de dag nga rgyal rgyags pas tshig par 'gyur// 'dir ni nga yi bstan pa yon tan gter// yon tan kun
411a7(dkon brtsegs): gyi 'byung gnas mchog dga' ba// 'dir ni tshul khrims nyams dang phrag dog dang // rgyags pa'i skyon rnams kyis ni 'jig par 'gyur// ji ltar rin chen 'byung gnas brus pa dang // pad+ma'i rdzing bu
411b1(dkon brtsegs): yongs su bskams pa dang // rin chen mchod sdong chag par gnas pa ltar// phyi ma'i dus na bstan pa 'jig par 'gyur// phyi ma'i dus kyi tshe na dam pa'i chos// rnam par 'jig 'gyur shin tu
411b2(dkon brtsegs): mi zad tshe// dge slong dul ba ma yin de 'dra ba// de dag nga yi bstan 'di 'jig pa yin// spyod pa 'di la rten par dka' ba rnams// de dag bzang 'gro ga la yod de ring // 'di nas shingab phos
411b3(dkon brtsegs): yi dgas 'gro ba dang // dud 'gro'i 'gro dang sems can dmyal bar gnas// lo brgya du mar sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa// mi bzad drag po nyams su myong bar 'gyur// ji ste de yis mi yi
411b4(dkon brtsegs): lus rnyed kyang // rtag tu sdug bsngal mya ngan ldan par 'gyur// sdig pa'i spyod pa 'di la rtag rten pa// long ba'am 'on pa'am zhar bar skye bar 'gyur// lus la rtag tu sha bkra 'byung bar 'gyur//
411b5(dkon brtsegs): 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mthong na 'jigs par 'gyur// gang zhig ya nga'i spyod pa rten pa ni// de la su yang yid rton mi 'gyur ro// de yi tshig la yid ches mi 'gyur zhing // de ni rtag tu smra 'bab pa
411b6(dkon brtsegs): yang 'gyur// de dag nad dang sdug bsngal brgya yis gdungs// mtshon dang shing dang bong ba rnams kyis bsnun// bkres dang skom pa'i 'jigs pas yongs su gdungs// yangs na de ni rtag par rab
411b7(dkon brtsegs): tu brnyas// sdug bsngal mtha' yas pa dag thos nas ni// nges pa rnams kyis sdig pa'i spyod bor la// legs pa'i spyod la rtag tu brten par gyis// 'di nas phyin chad 'gyod par gyur ta re//
412a1(dkon brtsegs): gang zhig sangs rgyas dang ni 'phags tshegs dang // bslab dang sbyangs pa'i blo la dga' 'gyur ba// gnyen dang rnyed dang grag brjod spang byos la// de ltar rtag tu mngon par
412a2(dkon brtsegs): brtson par gyis// 'dus byas 'di ni sgyu ma lta bu dang // 'jig par 'gyur dang rmi lam lta bu dang // sdug pa kun dang mi ring 'bral 'gyur zhing // 'di la rtag pa gang yang med rtogs la// pha rol phyin dang /
412a3(dkon brtsegs): sa dang stobs rnams la// rtag tu rab tu sbyor zhing 'bad par gyis// ji srid byang chub mchog sangs ma rgyas pa// de srid brtson 'grus nam yang nyams ma byas// gleng gzhi'i le'u zhes bya ste dang
412a4(dkon brtsegs): po'o// yul 'khor skyong byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag phal che la skyon de dag 'byung bar 'gyur te// mi brtson pa dag ni mi brtson pa dag la mchod par 'gyur/
412a5(dkon brtsegs): g.yo dang ldan pa'i ngag ni g.yo dang ldan pa dag la mchod par 'gyur// mi shes pa dag ni mi shes pa dag la bsti stang byed par sems par 'gyur la// zang zing la dga' bar yang 'gyur zhing chags pa
412a6(dkon brtsegs): mang ba dang // khyim la ser sna byed pa dang // g.yo dang ldan pa dang / bya khwa ltar mu cor smra ba dang // tshul 'chos pa dang / nye du lhur len par 'gyur/ phan tshun bsngags pa smra bas rnyed pa sgrub par
412a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur// rnyed pa yongs su btsal ba'i phyir de dag grong du 'jug gi/ de dag sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir ma yin// sems can la snying brtse ba'i phyir ma yin par 'gyur/ de dag mi shes/
412b1(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du ji ltar na bdag la pha rol gyis mang du thos pa dang / dge ba'i chos dang ldan par shes par 'gyur snyam du/ bdag shes pa dang ldan par khas 'che bar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dir mi brtson pa de
412b2(dkon brtsegs): bzhin du zhes med par 'gyur/ snod chag pa bzhin du 'gyur/ gcig la gcig 'khrul pa tshol ba dang / sbyor ba nyams pa dang / mi shes pa dang / le lo can dang / phan tshun ma 'thun pa'i chos 'gro ba
412b3(dkon brtsegs): byed pas ye shes la mi rtog pa mang ba dang / rang dgar byed pa dang / shar gnyer ba dam pa dang / gnod sems kyis rgyas pa dang / rigs pa ma yin pa'i 'khor gyi skye bo dang 'gro ba byed pas bstan pa
412b4(dkon brtsegs): 'di la spyod par 'gyur/ yongs su mi 'dri ba'i ngang tshul can dang / chos mnyan pa don du mi gnyer bar 'gyur/ mi rigs pa'i spyod pa dbral po'i khyim rnams su skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur//
412b5(dkon brtsegs): de dag dbul po'i khyim nas rab tu byung nas rnyed pa tsam gyis bstan pa 'di la dga' ba sred par 'gyur ro// de dag la nyes pa bshags pa'ang med par 'gyur na/ ye shes mngon par rtogs pa lta spos
412b6(dkon brtsegs): kyang ci dgos/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnams bor nas shes kyis khe dang rnyed pa tsam gyis bdag dge sbyong ngo zhes bdag nyid khas 'che bar 'gyur te/ yul 'khor skyong nga ni gang zag de lta bu de dag
412b7(dkon brtsegs): la rjes su 'thun pa'i bzod pa'ang mi sman/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes lta ga la zhig/ de dag la ni bde 'gro'ang ring na/ byang chub lta smos kyang ci dgos/ yul 'khor skyong gang zag de lta bu de dag la byang chub
413a1(dkon brtsegs): kyi bar chad byed pa'i chos brgyad yod par smra ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ ngan song gsum du skye ba dang / mtha' 'khob pa'i mi'i nang du skye ba dang / dbul po'i khyim du skye ba dang /
413a2(dkon brtsegs): rigs dma' bar skye ba dang / mdog ngan cing rtogs bzhan pa dang / sdig pa'i gshes gnyen dang phrad pa dang / nad mang ba dang / yang ba ma spangs pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ba ste/ yul
413a3(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong chos brgyad po de dag ni byang chub kyi bar chad byed par brjod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yul 'khor skyong tshig gis khas 'che ba la nga byang chub ces mi smra'o// tshul 'chos pa la spyod pa
413a4(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// g.yo byed pa la byang chub kyi spyod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// zang zing lhur len pa la sangs rgyas la mchod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// mngon pa'i nga rgyal can la shes rab
413a5(dkon brtsegs): yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// shes rab 'chal pa la the tsom gcod pa zhes nga mi smra'o// ser sna can la bsam pa yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// mi brtson pa mang ba la gzungs 'thob
413a6(dkon brtsegs): ces nga mi smra'o// yang dag pa'i nan tan ma yin pa yongs su tshol ba la de 'gro 'thob ces nga mi smra'o// khyim la ser sna byed pa la lus yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// spyod lam bcos ma can
413a7(dkon brtsegs): la sangs rgyas dang 'phrad pa zhes nga mi smra'o// khyim la chags pa la ngag yongs su dag pa zhes nga mi smra'o// ma gus pa la sems yongs su dag pa'o zhes nga mi smra'o// tshon mi shes pa la chos 'dod pa
413b1(dkon brtsegs): zhes da mi smra'o// lus drang srog la lta ba dang bcas pa la chos yongs su tshol ba zhes nga mi smra'o// yul 'khor skyong ji ltar skyes pa blun po de dag la su ba ltag/ ston padrug pa de ltarang mi sdod do//
413b2(dkon brtsegs): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag ni gzhan du sprul gzhan du byed pa'o// lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten la sgrub / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa'ade dag bka' stsal to//
413b3(dkon brtsegs): yang dag ma bsdams rgod cing khengs pa can// mgus nga rgyal ldan zhing chags shas che// nyon mongs zil non tha ba nyon mongs bcas// de 'dra dag la byang chub mchog rab ring // chags pas zil gyis
413b4(dkon brtsegs): non na le lo 'phel// le los zil gyis non ma nad pa nyams// dad pa nyams na tshul khrims rab tu nyams// tshul khrims 'chal par 'gyur na bzang 'gro nyams// dbul por gyur pas rab bla sa te//
413b5(dkon brtsegs): mchod pa rnyed nas dbul las grol bar 'gyur// de dag gser gyi khur ni bor nas sa// gso ma'i khur ni len par byed dang mtshungs// rnyed pa don du gnyer bas dgon par 'gro// der song nas kyang
413b6(dkon brtsegs): gos dang nye du tshol// mngon shes cig dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs// bor nas de ni phyir yang nye du 'dzin// rmongs nas nga rgyal dbang gis ngan song sa// mi khom 'gro ba rnams dang dbul po
413b7(dkon brtsegs): dang dma' ba'i rigs su skye dang long ba dang // mdog ngan pa dang mthu chung de dag 'dzin// de dag tshul dang spyod pa yongs nyams dngos// bag med rnyed nas dran pa rab tu nyams// g.yangs chen
414a1(dkon brtsegs): po mi zad ltung bar 'gyur// de nas bskal pa bye bar thar pa med pa// gal te 'dir ni 'thob pas byang chub na// de phyir lha sbyin gyis kyang byang chub theg// rnam par 'thor
414a2(dkon brtsegs): rlung gi ni bya ltung ltar// chags pas kyang ni de ltar mi rigs so// bsod nams nyams shing gzhan gyi chung ma chags// tshul khrims ma dag dge ba rnams las nyams// byang chub sems kyis
414a3(dkon brtsegs): ye shes gang ma thob// de dag bstan la mi dgos ru rang shing bzhin// byang chub don nye ba sangs rgyas chos 'tshol ba// dper na thar pa de bzhin mi gnas so// de ni rnyeng gi spre'u la dam byas ltar//
414a4(dkon brtsegs): nga rgyal zil non byang chub de badru'o// byang chub don du gnyer bar chos tshig phyir// nga yis rang gi srog ni 'phangs pa'ang btang // chos de gtang nas brtson dang mi ldan pa// don med gyur nas stan
414a5(dkon brtsegs): las lhung bar 'gyur// nga ni sngon char legs par bshed don phyir// g.yangs chen por me ldeb bar bar mchongs// de thos nas ni sdug dang mi sdug pa// thams cad rnam par spangs te nan tan
414a6(dkon brtsegs): gnas// bstan pa sna tshogs yon tan 'byor thos la// de dag nam yang 'dod pa mi skyen// chos min 'dod la byang chub ga la yod// dper na long ba lam bsal med dang mtshungs/
414a7(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa/ rgya che ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ tshad med
414b1(dkon brtsegs): par gyur pa de'i tshe de'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa skyes bu 'dul
414b2(dkon brtsegs): ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lnga dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das don grub blo zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal
414b3(dkon brtsegs): po bad zer ldan zhes bya ba zhig byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan ni 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad khri drug stong la rgyal srid byed do// yul 'khor spyong de'i tshe de'i dus na 'dzam bu'i gling de na
414b4(dkon brtsegs): grong khyer nyi khri dang / khyim bye ba phrag stong yod do// yul ba khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan de rgyal po'i pho brang gang na gnas pa/ rgyal po byed zer ldan de'i grong khyer rin po che snang ba zhes zla ba shar nub
414b5(dkon brtsegs): tu chur dpag tshad bcu gnyis yod pa/ lha byang du rgyar dpag tshad bdun yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir rim pa bdun dang / mig mangs ris su bres pas mdzes par byas pa yod do// de'i tshe sems can
414b6(dkon brtsegs): rnams kyi tshe'i tshad no le bye ba phrag bcu thub par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyi bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya ba gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/ bltan sdug pa/ kha dog
414b7(dkon brtsegs): bzang po rgyas pa/ mchog dang ldan pa zhig yod de/ debasas thag tu rin po che sna bdun gyi gter steng byung bar gyur to// rgyal po khang bsangs kyi nang du'ang rin po che sna bdun gyigate ma
415a1(dkon brtsegs): tshad tsam byung bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de btsas ma thag tu 'dzam bu gling ba'i sems can thams cad yi rangs par gyur to// sems
415a2(dkon brtsegs): can gang dag btson ra na 'khod pa de dag kyang btson ra nas thar bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer des nyi ma bdun gyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu rtsal ji snyed pa de dag
415a3(dkon brtsegs): thams cad rtogs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis nam gyi klung gis dus la bab pa dang / rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la
415a4(dkon brtsegs): gzhon nu khyod bag yod par gyis shig/ mi rtag par so sor brtag pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ bzhon nu mi rnams kyi srob ni chen po meng pa ste/ tshe 'pho bar 'gro ba yin gyis/ 'jig rten pha rol la 'jigs par
415a5(dkon brtsegs): bar bya zhing / las dang bya ba dang mi 'gal bar gyis shig ces bskul te/ de'i tshe lha'i bu de dag gis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smras so// gzhon nu bag med par na gyur ta re// bag med dbang du song bar gyur
415a6(dkon brtsegs): ta re 'a par gshegs pas bag yod rab stod cing // bder gshegs rnams kyis bag med rnams kyang skad// des pa gang dag 'di na bag yod cing // legs sdom dga' la ser sna med pa dang // sems
415a7(dkon brtsegs): can kun la snying rje byams yid ldan// de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur// bde bar gshegs pa gang dag 'das pa dang // 'di na da ltar dag dang gang ma byon// de dag thams cad dge ba rnams kyis
415b1(dkon brtsegs): 'phags// bag yod lam nyid la yang shin tu gnas// bza' dang btung dang gos dang khams dang // gser dang dngul dang nor bu mu tig rgyan// bskal pa bye bar de dgra rnams kyis btang // byang chub dam
415b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'dir ni don du gnyer// lag pa rkang pa de bzhin rna ba sna// slong ba rnams la rab tu dgas byin na// byang chub yon tan kun gyis bsam rdzogs nas// de dag ring por mi thogs mi mchog 'gyur//
415b3(dkon brtsegs): rgyal srid bde dang sdug pa'i bud med dang // nor rnams thams cad du yang rnam spangs te// 'dus byas gar la lha dang sgyu ma 'dras// 'dod pa med par dgon par gnas par gyis// srog na brtan pa
415b4(dkon brtsegs): med de rtag tu g.yo// 'jim pa'i bum pa lta bar 'jig pa can// brnyan ma 'dra zhing rtag tu zer zug min// gzhon nu 'di la rtag med dge ma yin// ngan 'gror lhung ba'i tshe na 'di na ni// pha dang ma
415b5(dkon brtsegs): yang 'dzin par byed pa med// de yi dge dang mi dge gang byas pa// de ni rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i rgyu yis bskal mang rgya mtshor ni// don med par yang gcig gis gcig bsad
415b6(dkon brtsegs): dekhyod kyis mi phan ma byas ci yang med// don med nyid du ngal ba bstan par gyur// da ltar khyod kyis 'gro phan byang chubazhi// mtshungs med go 'phang dam pa btsal ba'i phyir/ rkang rang sha
415b7(dkon brtsegs): dang pags pa de bskams kyang // de lta na yang khyod ni ngal ma sems// bde bar gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dka'// zhi ba'i chos thos pa yang shin tu dka'// bsgrim pa byas te bdud kyi
416a1(dkon brtsegs): phyogs gsal na// sangs rgyas ye shes ring po mi thogs 'thob// bshes gnyen bzang la rtag tu yongs rten cig/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen yongs su spang bar gyis/
416a2(dkon brtsegs): de dag rtag tu bzang lam khrid par byed// lamagol las kyang rtag tu zlog par byed// brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa legs byod te// lus dang srog la 'dod pa rnam spangs nas/ rdorje
416a3(dkon brtsegs): lta bu'i snying gi bsam gtan par// sangs rgyas lam nyid 'di la gnas par gyis// sngon gyi mi mchog dam pa 'od byed pa// kun kyang go 'phang dam pa bla med pa// tshol ba'i tshe na spyod yul
416a4(dkon brtsegs): dgon par dga'// khyod kyang de dag spyod pa'i lam du phyogs// dgon par gnas par rtag tu dga' bar gyis// pha dang mdang bu dang sdug pa'i nyin// skye bo bying du sdug pa kun spongs la// lus
416a5(dkon brtsegs): so la sred par ma byed par// bde gshegs ye shes rgya chen btsal bar gyis// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis de nas bzung ste
416a6(dkon brtsegs): lo bcu'i bar du nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur// nam yang dkod par ma gyur// rtses par ma gyur// dga' bar byed par ma gyur/ yongs su spyod par ma gyur/
416a7(dkon brtsegs): nam yang skyed mos tshal du ma song / nam yang grogs po mthong nas ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin/ nam yang glu la dga' bar ma gyur/ rgyal srid dang / nor dang / khyim dang / grong khyer rnams la
416b1(dkon brtsegs): 'dod pa bskyed par ma gyur te/ de ltar dngos po thams cad la mi lta bar gcig tu sems shing gnas par gyur to// nang du yang dag 'jog lhur len cing 'jig rten la snying po med pa dang /
416b2(dkon brtsegs): 'jig pa dang dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / mi sdug pa dang phrad pa dang / sdug pa dang bral ba dang / byis pa 'drid pa dang / 'khor ba la dga' ba dang / ro bre ba med pa dang / rgyal srid kyi
416b3(dkon brtsegs): bde ba slu ba'i chos can dang / srid pa la mngon par dga' bas mchog mi shes pa dang / so so'i skye bo nyid rtag tu mi mthun par rnam par sems shing bdag ni byis pa'i skye bo mo brtson
416b4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i nang na gnas kyi/ bdag gis cang mi smra bas 'da' bar bya'o snyam nas de phyogs gcig tu cang mi smra bar gyur te/ bag yod pa la sems shing sdug pa dang bral bar gcig pur gnas par
416b5(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ sa phyogs shig tu zong khyer dga' mchog ces bya ba byas te/ lho dang byang gi ngos su
416b6(dkon brtsegs): lam srang bdun brgya bdun brgya byas so// rin po che sna bdun gyi phyir dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba bres pa/ mu tig gi dra ba dang / rin po che'i srog shing dang / bla re dang ldan pa rim pa bdun
416b7(dkon brtsegs): gyis kun nas bskor to// lam srang thams cad kyi sgor yang rin po che'i srog shing stong btsugs so// rin po che'i srog shing thams cad kyang rin po che'i skud pa drug khris spel te//
417a1(dkon brtsegs): rin po che'i skud pa thams cad kyang rdzogs bzhi nas shing ta la'i 'phred bye bas sbrel to// de dag rlung gis bskyod de bskul na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo sel spyan
417a2(dkon brtsegs): brgya stong gi sgra snyan pa lta bu'i sgra'ang 'byung ngo // lam srang gi sgo thams cad na bu mo glu mkhas pa/ gar mkhas pa/ dbang po dar la bab pa/ skye bo thams cad kyis spyod pa'i 'os su
417a3(dkon brtsegs): gyur pa lnga brgya lnga brgya bkod do// de dag thams cad la rgyal po'od zer ldan gyis/ khyed nyin mtshan du glu dang / gar dang / rol mo'i sgras gang/ phyogs bzhi nas lhags pa'i sems can
417a4(dkon brtsegs): rnams yang dag par dga' brda bya zhing / ci nas gzhon nu dga' bar bya ba'i sems bskyed pa ma gtogs par gtam gzhan ma byed cig/ sems can gang la'ang yid du mi 'ong ba ma smra zhig
417a5(dkon brtsegs): ces bsgo'o// lam srang de dag thams cad kyi sgor yang bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la ni bza' ba/ btung ba 'dod pa rnams la ni btung ba/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni bzhon pa nas/
417a6(dkon brtsegs): gos dang / spos dang / 'phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / mal cha dang / rgyab rten dang / 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / gser dang / dngul dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai DUR+Ya dang
417a7(dkon brtsegs): rung dang / man shel dang / byu ru dang sa le sbram dang / dngul sil ma dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / shing rta dang / ba glang dang / nor dang / rgyan thams cad byin zhing / skye bo thams
417b1(dkon brtsegs): cad kyi yongs su spyad pa'i phyir/ rin po che'i phung po'ang bzhag par gyur to// de'i tshe grong khyer gyi dbus su gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi bIr/ khyim khar yug tu dpag rang
417b2(dkon brtsegs): tsam yod pa/ rin po che sna bdun mig mangs ris su bres pa/ rta babs brgyas rab tu brgyan pa byas so// de'i nang du khang bzangs cis byas te/ dir gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir mal rtse
417b3(dkon brtsegs): ba phrag bzhi bshams so// de'i dbus su skyed mos tshal byas te/ me tog gi shing ljon pa thams cad dang / 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa thams cad dang / rin po che'i shing ldan pa thams
417b4(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis khyab par bkang ngo // yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal de'i dbus su rin po che thams cad kyi rdzing rin po che sna bzhi'i them skas dang ldan pa byas pa la 'di lta ste/ gser dang /
417b5(dkon brtsegs): dngul dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / shel lo// gang nas spos chu 'bab pa'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad btsugs so// rdzing de'i seng ge'i kha brgya rtsa brgyad po de nas kyang chub bab bo// me tog
417b6(dkon brtsegs): u t+pa la dang / ku mu ta dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma dkar po rnams rtag par rgyun du rgyas so// kho ra yug tu'ang rin po che'i shing ljon pas yongs su bskor to// dus thams cad pa'i me tog da
417b7(dkon brtsegs): 'bras bu'i shing ljon pa rnams kyis kyang yongs su rgyas so// rdzing de'i 'gram du rin po che'i shing ljon pa brgyad brgya bskyed de/ rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad kyang rin po cher srud pa rnams
418a1(dkon brtsegs): kyis spel zhing / thams cad du'ang shing tA la'i 'phreng bye bas sbrel to// de dag kyang rlung gis bskyod cing rlung gis bskul na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na rol mo sil snyan brgya
418a2(dkon brtsegs): stong blangs pa lta bu'i sgra ba byung ngo // gzhon nu'i lus la sa dang rdul gyis reg tu 'ong zhes/ rdzing de'i steng rin po che'i dri bas bkab par gyur to// de'i tshe khang bzang dar rin po che sna bdun gyi khri bye ba phrag bzhi
418a3(dkon brtsegs): bsham te/ khri thams cad kyi steng du'ang ras bcos bu lnga brgya lnga brgya bting bar gyur to// gang du rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer 'dug par gyur pa'i khri rin po che bdun las byas pa/
418a4(dkon brtsegs): 'phang du mi bdun tsam yod pa bshams pa dbus ma der/ ras bcos bu bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bdun bting bar gyur to// khri thams cad kyi drung du'ang pog bor nas a ka ru saM bdugs shing /
418a5(dkon brtsegs): nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du me tog 'grems par byed do// gser gyi lnga ldi bres so// gser gyi pad+ma rab tu dablangs so// mu tig dang nor bu'i dri ba sgres so// nor bu rin po che'i 'od kyis snang bar
418a6(dkon brtsegs): byas so// rin po che'i dra ba brgyad khri rab tu dpyangs so// rin po che'i shing ljon pa thams cad la'ang ba dan brgya brgya dbyangs so// skyed mos tshal kun tu'ang nor bu rin po che'i 'od dpag tshad tsam yod pa 'bum
418a7(dkon brtsegs): phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu bzhag par gyur te/ de dag gi 'od kyis 'jig rten thams cad snang bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong skyed mos tshal de na bya'i tshogs mi'i skad du smra ba/ ne tso dang / ri skegs dang /
418b1(dkon brtsegs): khung khung dang / khu byug dang / rma bya dang / ngang pa dang / dran pa dang / kun la dang / ka la bing+ka dang / shang shung te'u 'khod do// de dag skad 'byin cing sra sgrog pa na dga' tshal gyi lha rnams
418b2(dkon brtsegs): rgyags par 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra 'byung ngo // gzhon nu'i longs spyod kyi phyir/ rol rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs pa ro rnam pa lnga brgya pa'i kha zas rnams rtag par rgyun du bshams par
418b3(dkon brtsegs): gyur to// de'i tshe gzhon nu lo bcu drug lon pa nas lo nyi shu lon pa'i skyed pa dang ldan pa dag grong khyer thams cad nas bsdus nas grong khyer der btsud do// thams cad kyang
418b4(dkon brtsegs): bzo'i gnas dang las kyi gnas kyi bya ba shes pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten pa'i dga' ba dang 'tshog chas kyi bya ba shes pa bye ba phrag brgyad cu grong khyer der btsud par gyur to// pha ma gnyis kyis
418b5(dkon brtsegs): del bu mo bye ba byin no// nye du'i tshogs kyis bye ba dang / grong rdal ba'i mis bye ba dang / rgyal po thams cad kyis bu mo bye ba byin par gyur te/ de dag thams cad kyang gzugs bzang ba/ mdzes pa/
418b6(dkon brtsegs): bltan sdug padasha stag go// thams cad kyang na tshor lo bcu drug lon pa/ glu mkhas pa/ rol mo'i sgra mkhas pa/ kar mkhas pa/ dgod mkhas pa/ skyes pa'i gan du 'gro mkhas pa/
418b7(dkon brtsegs): drang ba/ gzhon pa/ mnyen pa/ yan lag 'jam pa/ gsong por sme ba/ bzhin 'dzum pa/ tshul mkhas pa/ spu rtsal thams cad kyi bya ba la mkhas pa/ ha cang yang mi ring ba
419a1(dkon brtsegs): ha cang yang mi zung ba/ ha cang yang mi skem pa/ ha cang yang mi sbom pa/ ha cang yang mi dkar ba/ ha cang yang mi sngob/ kha nas me tog ut+pa la'i bsung 'byung ba/
419a2(dkon brtsegs): lus rnams las tsan dan gyi dri 'byung ba/ lha'i bu mo ltar gsal ba/ shin tu yid du bang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa glu dbyangs len pa de dag gi nang na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gnas
419a3(dkon brtsegs): so// glu dbyangs dang rol mo'i spa de la kye ma'o bdag dang mi 'dza' ba'i tshogs chen po dang / bdag gi dge ba'i chos yongs su nyams par byed pa byung ste/ blta bar mi bya'o snyam pa'i sems
419a4(dkon brtsegs): bskyed do// de de bi tshe 'di lta ste/ dper na gsad par bya ba'i mis gshed ma mthong na ngo mtshar gyi sems mi skyed pa de bzhin du/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer yang bud med de dag
419a5(dkon brtsegs): mthong na ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to// grong khyer de la'ang grogs dang lhan cig ngo mtshar du mi 'dzin to// lo bcu po de dag gi bar du bdag nam zhig na mi mdza' ba'i tshogs rnam pa 'di lta bu'i nang nas
419a6(dkon brtsegs): thar par 'gyur snyam pa dang / bdag nam zhig na bag yod pa'i spyad pa spyod cing des bdag thar par 'gyur zhig gu snyam pa de lta bu'i sems 'jug pa ma gtog par/ nam yang gzugs kyi mtshan
419a7(dkon brtsegs): ma bzung bar ma gyur te/ sgra'i mtshan ma dang / dri'i mtshan ma dang / ro'i mtshan ma dang / reg gi mtshan ma bzung bar ma gyur to// de nas bu mo de dag gis rgyal po'id zer ldan la/ lha gzhon
419b1(dkon brtsegs): nu ni mi bol to// dgyes par mi mdzad do// dgyes dgur mi spyod do zhes smras so// / bam po gsum pa ste tha ma // yul ba khar snang /
419b2(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal po 'ad zer ldan rgyal po brgyad khri dang lhan cig tu rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ gdong las mchi ma 'dzag cing lus 'dar te/ mu ngan rgyas
419b3(dkon brtsegs): sa la 'gyel to// des las langs nas/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ su gcig rin chen dam pa la ltos shig spos// nga ni mya ngan gzir
419b4(dkon brtsegs): khyim nang sa la 'gyel// su yis khyod mi dga' byas de myur nga la spros// de 'dir de'u re chad pa chen pos gcad par bya// khyod kyi ched du ngas 'dir yid kyis gang spras pa// lha yi khyim
419b5(dkon brtsegs): ltar nyams dga' grong khyer der ltos shig/ 'di la yan lag ma tshang ci yod deng myur smros// brgya byin lta bu'i 'byor pa de ring khyod la bstan// pad+ma'i mig can mig mdzes mya ngan nyam thag pa//
419b6(dkon brtsegs): lha yi bu mo lta bu'i bud med tshegs smra ltos// mya ngan thul te de dag rnams dang de ring rdzas// ci phyir zug rdul zug bzhin lus dman sems shing 'dug/ de dag rab dga' tshul mkhas
419b7(dkon brtsegs): dbyangs kyi yan lag snyan// glu dbyangs beg rdob dus kyi rnam par nges pa shes// khyod dga' dus la deng bab mya ngan ma byed cig/ pad+ma rnyis pa lta bur ci byor dang lus dman// me tog bras
420a1(dkon brtsegs): bu ya ma ga 'dab rgyas skyed mos tshal// sna tshogs steng bzhag lha yi sna tshogs shing rta 'dra// soms shig khyod kyi na chod 'di ni thig ma yin// dga' ba'i dus la bab kyis
420a2(dkon brtsegs): deng 'dir bu dga' gyis// khyod kyi khrus ched rdzing 'di lha rnams kyi yang 'dra// ut+pa la dang pad+ma rag gi tshal gyis gang // pad+ma rnams kyang bung ba rgyags pa mchog gis brgyan// de la bu sems su
420a3(dkon brtsegs): zhig 'di la dga' mi byed// ngang pa rma byA ne tso khu byug ri skegs dang // ka la bid+ma shang shang te'u dang kun la// yid bong sgra ldan gangs nye spos ngad dang 'dra ba// thos nas mi gang 'di la dga' ba 'thob
420a4(dkon brtsegs): mi 'gyur// gzhal yas khang dag mu tig drar bcas nor bu gtsug/ ser dang bai DUR+Yas spras rnam rgyal khang pa 'dra// rin chen khri mchog dam pa rnams kyang rab bting ba// gser dril g.yar ka
420a5(dkon brtsegs): ta la'i 'phreng ba sgra snyan pa// zab cing brtan pa mchog gi sil snyan sgra bsgrags pa// khyod kyi ched du srang rnams su yang sbyin rgya che// bu mo stong dag glu mchog snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa/ dga' tshal
420a6(dkon brtsegs): lha yi bu mo rnams kyi 'dra ba sgrog/ mthe ris 'dra ba'i gnas yid 'ong la ci yi phyir// rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems kyis 'dir ni dga' mi byed// gzhon nu khyod kyis rtsed grogs lha yi bu 'drag
420a7(dkon brtsegs): bu pho de dag rnams dang lhan cig rtsed mo gyis// khyod kyi pha dang ma yang mchis mas brnangs shing 'dug/ skye bo 'di la sdug bsngal snying rje med dam ci// 'dus byas yid byung 'ded pa'i
420b1(dkon brtsegs): longs spyod don mi gnyer/ yon tan bsags pa srid pa'i skyon mthong des smras pa// 'khor ba'i dra bar chud pa'i 'gro ba 'di bltas nas/ thar pa'i don gnyer
420b2(dkon brtsegs): pha la smras pa yab gson cig/ lha cig sus kyang bdag la mi dga' bgyis ma mchis// bdag ni da ltar 'dod pa'i yon tan mos ma lags// nyon mongs gang dag ngan 'gro'i g.yang
420b3(dkon brtsegs): sar lhung byed pa// sdug pa thams cad dgra dang mtshungs te rjes mi srung // mi mkhas bus pa skye bo bud med de dag dka'// bdud kyi zhags pa yon tan 'ching ba g.yang sa che// rtag tu
420b4(dkon brtsegs): 'phags pa'i skye bos de dag de ltar smad// sems dmyal ngan 'gro mya ngan rtsa ba ci phyir bstan// bud med 'di dag pags pa'i gzugs kyis dga' ba tsam// bdag ni rus rgyas 'khrul 'dzin
420b5(dkon brtsegs): mi gtsang don mi gnyer// khrag dang gcan dang mi gtsang ba dang dri ma 'dzag/ gsal bar dur khrod 'ad+ma la ji ltar dga' bar bgyi// glu dang gar rang rol mo'i dbyangs sgra gzung mi bgyi// dag
420b6(dkon brtsegs): ba rmi lam 'dra ba mi mkhas rmongs par bgyi// kun tu rtog pa sred gyur mi mkhas 'dir brlag gis// ci phyir byis pa'i skye bo lta bur nyon mongs khol// shing lkug 'di dag thams cad
420b7(dkon brtsegs): dgun gyi dus byung na// dgon dung shing ltar gyur te dga' bar 'gyur ma lags// mi rtag 'di yis dpal rnams thams cad za shig gyur te// srog g.yor gyur kyang gti mug gis ni bag med
421a1(dkon brtsegs): 'gyur/ sems ni rgya mtsho lta bur tshim par byed mi nus// srid pa rab tu 'phel la dga' bas phyir zhing 'dog// 'dod rgyus phan tshun gsod pa'i 'gro la bltas nas
421a2(dkon brtsegs): su 'dir ni ji ltar lhun po rlung gis mi bskyod bzhin// rgyal po khyod dang pa dang lhan cig skyes pa dang // gnyen gyi skye bo chung ma ngan song bdag skyabs min// bdag cag thams cad rtswa rtse ba zil pa
421a3(dkon brtsegs): 'dra ba ste// sems kyi dbang du 'gro bar ma gyur bag yod mdzod// mi dbang dpal bab pa mi rtag cir mi rung // srog kyang ri yi chu ltar myur 'gro cir mi rung // 'dus byas 'di zad glo sprin 'dra ste cir mi ru /
421a4(dkon brtsegs): rgyal po mkhas la srid gsum 'dod la chags pa ngan// lha rnams kyis ni bdag la bag yod 'gyur gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa' yul la chags pa min pas bskul// 'jig rten phan pa snying
421a5(dkon brtsegs): brtse sangs rgyas 'dir 'gyur bgyi// rgyal po bag med spyod la byang chub yod ma lags// rgyal po gang zhig 'dod pas g.yen spyo sems 'khor ba// de ni bsod nams chung za dga' zhing mtho ris ldog/ 'tshe
421a6(dkon brtsegs): ba shin tu rgyas pa nam yang spyad mi bgyi// skon par bcug pa'i bya ltar ji ltar dbugs phyin gyur// khams rnams sbrul dang 'dra zhing phung po gshed mdzadra// zag dang bcas pa'i sems ni don mang grong stong
421a7(dkon brtsegs): tshungs// rgyal po 'di na dug sdong me tog rgyas 'dra lus// chu bo rnams kyis bdas na bdag 'dir ji ltar dga'// rab tu gsal nas 'bar ba nam mkha' lta bu dang // 'gro ba ngan zhugs 'gro ba 'di la bdag
421b1(dkon brtsegs): bltas nas// rgyal po de ring ba dar ni de dag sgrol ba dang // gzhid legs sad par bgyi dang nad pa gso ba dang // zug rngu rtsa nas gdon dang lam log bzlog pa'i phyir// bdag gis zhi ba'i chos kyi gru ni myur du s+thA/
421b2(dkon brtsegs): stong chen du ni bcings pa rnams grol rab bsgrags nas// legs par bshad pas ring nas dbul ba tshim par bgyi// ngan bgrob yis lhung ba dag kyang gdon par bsti/ long ba mig sbyin srid de'i'i khri shing
421b3(dkon brtsegs): bskum par bgyi// rnam grol mchog phyir shes rab 'od zer mar mer byas// de yis srid gsum gar la lta ba 'drar mthong 'gyur// byams dang snying brtse snying rje pha rol phyin pa sprin// sems can bde 'a drug ldag
421b4(dkon brtsegs): mthong glog gi 'phreng ba dang // byang chub yan lag bde bsil char rgyun 'dra ba yin// 'gro ba yun ring dus nas gdungs pa bsil bar bgyi// rgyal po dag ni de dran gyur nas 'dir mchis te// bdag ni 'dus byas 'dod
421b5(dkon brtsegs): ba kun la yod ma mchis// byang chub den gnyer sems can ched du 'dir spyad bgyi// gcig tu nges te bdag ni srid la dga' ma mchis// rgyal po 'di na shes bzhin su zhig dgra khrod gnas// blo dang ldan pa
421b6(dkon brtsegs): su zhig 'jigs bcas lam du 'gro/ mig dang ldan pa su zhig 'di ni g.yang sar lhung // byang chub lam shes nas ni su zhig bag med 'gyur// 'gro ba thams cad rgyun 'gro bdag ni rgyun bzlog pa// rgyal po tshig
421b7(dkon brtsegs): tsam gyis ni byang chub thob mi nus// lhun po'i rtse nas rgya mtsho'i nang du mchod spro yis// bdag 'dir 'dod pa rnams kyis yid dga' de lta min// rgyal po dam pa rang gnyen thabs cig myur du bzhud// yul ba por
422a1(dkon brtsegs): dga' ba thams cad 'jig rten kun la stsol// gang dag bsam pa ji bzhin blangs nas mchi bar 'gyur// yab bdag bag med rgyal srid bye ba 'tshal ma lags// bud med tshogs kyi nang du
422a2(dkon brtsegs): gnas pas byang chub dang // grub bde zhi ba bla med gnas ni thob mi nus// dgon par dgyes pas rgyal bas byang chub brnyes pas na// bdag ni ri dang nags khrod mchis te gnas par bgyi/
422a3(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khang bzangs kyi nang du 'dug bzhin du yid byung ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis bud med dag dang ldan cig 'chag cing / de spyor lam gsum gyis gnas
422a4(dkon brtsegs): so// gsum gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'greng ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'dug pa ste/ rmugs pa dang gnyid yongs su spangs so// khang pa'i steng du song ste sa brgyad la gnas nas de nam gyi gung la bab pa'i
422a5(dkon brtsegs): dus kyi tshe/ gnas gtsang ma'i rtsis kyi lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa rgya che brjod cing bar snang las 'gro ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun gyi bsngags pa rgya cher rjod cing 'gro ba thos so// thos nas kyang yul khor
422a6(dkon brtsegs): skyeng rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer spu zing zhes byeng par gyur nas/ mchi ma zag cing skyo ba skyes te thal me sbyar nas lha rnams la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ lnga rnams sdug bsngal bdag
422a7(dkon brtsegs): la thugs rje bskyed nas ni// gal te skyo mi mdzad na cung zhig zhu bar bgyi// su yi yon tan rjod cing bar snang 'di nas bzhud// tshig de thos nas bdag 'dir yid ni bde bar gyur// yul 'khor
422b1(dkon brtsegs): skyong de nas lnga de dag gis// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ gzhon nu khyod kyis sangs rgyas thos par mgyur tam// don grub gro mes bya ste skyabs
422b2(dkon brtsegs): maud rnams kyi skyabs// de bzhin spyod mkhas bsod nams shes rab yon tan mchog/ de yi dge 'dun khrag khrig stong bcu bsam gtan pa// bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis smras pa// bdag ni rgyal ba
422b3(dkon brtsegs): blta 'a tshal de yi gzugs ci 'dra// de yi kha dog ci 'dra thams cad bka' stsol cig/ ji ltar smad na sems can kun mgon gcig 'gyur ba// byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra bdag ni yongs su 'dri// de nas lha
422b4(dkon brtsegs): ngag gis/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer la tshigs su bcad pas slar smras pa/ de yi gtsug tor ri yi rtse la gser mdzes bzhin// dbu skra 'jam zhing mdzes la g.yas su 'khyil ba ste/
422b5(dkon brtsegs): de yi mdzod snga mkha' la nyi ma lam me lta// nor bu shel ltar rnam par dag cing galas su 'a khyil// spyan dag zung ba'i tshogs dang ut+pal sngon po'ang // mi dbang meng ga'i 'jam par rang byung bim pa'i smos/
422b6(dkon brtsegs): sems can lhan cig 'od zer bye ba mtha' yas 'gyed// stong gsum rgyas par 'gengs shing ngan 'gro rnams kyang skems// de yi tshems ni rab dkar kha ba dngul ltar dag/ bzhi bcu mnyam zhing zags bzang
422b7(dkon brtsegs): rmad byung legs par grub// rgyal ba dam pa mchog de'i tshems kyi mche ba bzhi// de yi ljags ni rab yangs rang gi zhal gdo khebs// rgyal ba de yi gsung ni ri mchog 'dra ba'i'adi na// shin tu tshim byed
423a1(dkon brtsegs): 'brel zhing gya gyu med pa ste/ tshangs dbyangs shin tu rig pa'i sil snyan stong 'dra ba/ yid gnyis 'dzem pa 'dod pa rnams ni tshim byed pa// rgyal ba'i gsung ni lha yi sgra skad
423a2(dkon brtsegs): tshim byed pa// yon tan sna tshogs tshang ba byang chub yan lag thun// chos kyi 'phreng ba yid 'ong brgya stong rab brgyus pa// sil snyan dga' ba bsgrags pa lnga klu nyams dga' ba// me tsi ka la bid+ma khu b+huH
423a3(dkon brtsegs): ngur pa dang // rma bya dang pa sgra snyan kun la ka'i sgra// tshangs ma'i sgra dbyangs mi ci dbyangs kyi yan lag 'dra// ma 'khrul sdig med don rnams thams cad rtogs byed pa// rmad byung shel ltar 'jam zhing mkhas
423a4(dkon brtsegs): pa'i yid 'ong ba// bskul ba 'dul bar 'gyur ba sbyong bar dgar 'gyur ba// gzhan gyi spyod dang bathun pa zhus nas tshim byed pa// chos kyi dbang phyug de yi gsung gi yon tan 'di// ston pa'i mgul
423a5(dkon brtsegs): mdzes dung dang 'a dra zhing dpung mgo zlum// dbyug pa lta bur phyag ring de yi mdun yang mtho// phyag mdzes sna tshogs sor mo rnams ni ring zhing sbrum// rgyal ba de yi sku ni btso ma'i gser gyi mdog ba spu
423a6(dkon brtsegs): g.yas su 'khyil zhing gyen du re re skyes// lte ba mtha' dag zab cing gsang sbubs rta yi 'dra// rab byung e n+ya ya yi byin pa glang po'i sgra 'dra'i bcwa// zhabs mthil mdzes par bris pa bkra shis 'khor lo
423a7(dkon brtsegs): mtshan// glang po'i dbang po'i 'gros thabs seng ge'i rtsal gyi stabs// khyu mchog bsgyings pa'i stabs can dbang po mchod sdong rgyas// mkha' la me tog char ba bab me tog gdugs su gyur// gshegs
423b1(dkon brtsegs): pa'i rjes 'gro ba de dag de yi rmad byung chos// rgyal ba rnyed dang ma rnyed de dang sdug bsngal dang // grags dang ma grags de bzhin stod dang sprad pa yis// pad+ma chu ltar thams cad du yang gos pa med//
423b2(dkon brtsegs): mi yi seng ge de 'dra mtshungs pa'i sems can med/ yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhan nu bsod nams kyi 'ad zer gyis sangs rgyas kyi bsngags pa zas shing / chos dang /
423b3(dkon brtsegs): bdun gyi bsngags pa zos nas tshim zhing mgul yid rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'de zer 'di snyam
423b4(dkon brtsegs): du sems te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de ci 'dra ba dang / de'i dge 'dun phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra ba dang // des mngon sum du byas pa'i chos ci 'dra ba dang / de'i slob ma phun sum tshogs pa ci 'dra
423b5(dkon brtsegs): bdang ji ltar 'khor ba yang ba dang phrad pa dang / byas pa mi gzod pa dang / ji ltar 'khor ba na byis pa so so'i skye bo dag byas pa mi gze ba dang / ji ltar 'jig tshogs la lta ba yang ba dang / ji ltar khyim
423b6(dkon brtsegs): gyi gnas nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar 'dod pa dag nyes pa mang ba dang / ji ltar mkhas pa rnams kyis bag med pa smad pa dang // ji ltar ma rig pa'i mun gnas rmongs pa dang / ji ltar 'du byed
423b7(dkon brtsegs): rnams rtogs par dka' ba dang / ji ltar sems gdul bar dka' ba dang / ji ltar ming dang gzugs zab pa dang / ji ltar skye mched drug dbugs 'byin pa med pa dang / ji ltar reg pa yongs su mi shes
424a1(dkon brtsegs): te sdug bsngal rnam par smin pa dang / ji ltar tshor ba nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar sred pa'i 'ching ba dam pa dang / ji ltar nye bar len pa las 'byung ba dga' ba dang /
424a2(dkon brtsegs): ji ltar srid pa'i sred pa 'phags pa ma yin pa dang / ji ltar srid pa yod na skye brgyan bcad dka' ba dang / ji ltar rga ba rnam par 'gyur bar byed pa dang / ji ltar nad kyis rnam par 'jig par byed pa
424a3(dkon brtsegs): dang ji ltar 'chi ba rjes su mi bsrung ba dang / ji ltar 'jug pa ro bro ba chung ba dang / ji ltar srid pa mngon par 'grub pa nyes dmigs mang ba dang / ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa nyams dgapa
424a4(dkon brtsegs): ba ltar 'di mi nus te/ 'dod pa'i khol po nyon mongs pas rmongs pa/ sems za ba can bag med pa la dga' ba/ byis pa'i nang na 'dug pa/ tshul bzhin ma yin pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ 'khor bal chags
424a5(dkon brtsegs): pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ skye bo ma rungs pa'i nang na 'dug pas ni/ de 'gro'i lam yang rnam par sbyang bar mi nus na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par lta
424a6(dkon brtsegs): gal 'gyur snyam mo// de yang 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag sgo nas byung na ni nye du'i tshigs kyis bar chad byas su 'ong gis/ bdag khang steng bdi nas 'thur du mchod de snyam mo// yul
424a7(dkon brtsegs): bakhor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi bod zer/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshes pa den grub blo dag la ba der legs su phyogs te/ khang pa de nas mchod nas tshig 'di skad du/ gal de ba
424b1(dkon brtsegs): gshegs pa de thams cad mkhyen ci thams cad gzigs she na/ de bzhin gshegs pa de bdag la dgongs su gsol zhes kyang smras so// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs
424b2(dkon brtsegs): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blos phug g.yas pa brkyang te bod phyung nas/ 'od des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi bod zes la reg go// bad de las kyang pad+ma 'dab ma brgya stong
424b3(dkon brtsegs): yod pa shing rta'i phang lo tsam byung bar gyur te/ pad+ma de las kyang 'od zer brgya stong byung ste spang ba chen por gyur nas/ snang ba des rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer khyab par gyur to// yul ba khon skyong
424b4(dkon brtsegs): de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer pad+ma de la 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo dag la ba de legs su ral
424b5(dkon brtsegs): mo sbyab btud de sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes lan gsum ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do// yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des 'od de brtul ba dang / gzhon nu de sdong po bcad pa
424b6(dkon brtsegs): bsgyel ba de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du babs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan brgya stong du phyag 'tshal la/ sal ba ler spyong de na rgyal rtsa gzhan nu bsod nam/
424b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/ bdag ni ring nas na ste ring nas 'dod// tshegs ches sman pa'i rgyal po khyod rnyed do// ji ltar bde gshegs
425a1(dkon brtsegs): #bstan la gnas nas ni// bdag gis thob 'gyur mgon po bstan du gsol// 'dren pa bdag gis bag mchis zos pa ni// mtshan mo bar snang lha la thos lags te// zos nas skyo ste
425a2(dkon brtsegs): bdag ni 'dir mchis na// mi rnams bag mchis 'gyur ba ji lta bu// lam nyams pa la de ring ston gyur cig/ ldongs par gyur pa'i mig tu der gyur cig/ dad pa'i 'byung gnas gso mdzad thugs rje ldan//
425a3(dkon brtsegs): g.yang sa chen po 'di las bdag phyung zhig/ dbul por gyur pa dag ni bsdu bar mdzod// mgon po bcings pa bdag ni deng dgrol mdzod// som nyi bcas pa'i yid gnyis bcad du gsol// byang chub lam
425a4(dkon brtsegs): la spyod pa bdag lung ston// chus khyer bdag la 'gram ni bstan du gsol// mun pa dag la sgron ma mdzad du gsol// rmar gyur bdag la rma med mdzad du gsol// sman pa'i rgyal po bdag gi zug
425a5(dkon brtsegs): rngu byung // khyod kyis ngan 'gro dag las bdag par mdzod// srid par dmigs pa 'dzin pa bcad du gsol// yan lag brgyad pa'i lam gyi lam chen gyis// mya ngan chu chen pha rol bsgral du gsol//
425a6(dkon brtsegs): srog ni zad pa'i chos can tshe yang zung // dge ba bar chad mang po 'byung ba ste// bsod nams rnam smin ring por mi thogs 'grub// bdag gis dal ba gdod rnyed cig nges gsungs// byang chub
425a7(dkon brtsegs): sems dpa' ji ltar bag mchis 'gyur// ji ltar byang chub spyod pa mchog spyad na// 'gro ba srid pa'i 'ching las thar 'gyur ba// 'jig rten mgon po de dag bdag lung ston//
425b1(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blos rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi byed zer gyi lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya cher yang dag par
425b2(dkon brtsegs): bstan te// rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams 'od zer gyis de thos nas rnam par thar pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs thob bo// mngon par shes pa lnga'ang thob ste// de nam mkha' la gnas nas me chog
425b3(dkon brtsegs): rnams mngon par sprul te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la gtor/ mngon par gtor ro// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer bar skad de las babs te/ bcom ldan
425b4(dkon brtsegs): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo de la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ mtshan mchog ldan pa dri med zla ba'i zhal// gser mdog 'dra ba khyed la phyag 'tshal lo// rdul bral khyed
425b5(dkon brtsegs): 'dra srid pa gsum ma mchis// mnyam med mkhyen chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba'i dbu skra 'jam mdzes snum zhing bzang // khyod kyi gtsug ton 'di ni ri rgyal bzhin// gtsug tor mi mthong khyod
425b6(dkon brtsegs): dang mtshungs ma mchis// thub pa khyod kyi smin mtshams mdzod spu mdzes// kun da zla ba kha bdung ltar dkar// thugs rje gang gis 'gro ba 'di gzigs pa// spyan mchog bzang po ut+pal sngon po 'dra//
425b7(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba dri med spyan la phyag 'tshal lo// ljags yangs srab la zangs kyi mdog 'dra ba// de yi rang gi zhal gyi gdong yang khebs// chos gsung bas ni 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 'ang ma snum gsung
426a1(dkon brtsegs): ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// choms bzang shin tu brtan pa rdo rje 'dra// bcu dang sum cu snyoms shing zags bzang ba// 'dzum pa mdzad na 'gro ba 'dul bar bgyid// 58
426a2(dkon brtsegs): gtam snyan pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyod kyi gzugs dang mtshungs ma mchis// 'od kyis zhing brgya dag kyang snang bar bgyid// 'jig rten na ni tshangs dbang skyong de dag/ bcom ldan ldan
426a3(dkon brtsegs): bod cimi du rlag/ e n+ya'i byin pa mnyam med bcom ldan 'das// glang po'i rgyal po rma bya seng ge'i stabs// bcom ldan gnya' shing gang du gzigs shing gshegs// sa dang ri dang bcas pa g.yo bar
426a4(dkon brtsegs): mdzad// bcom ldan 'das sku mtshan gyis rgyas pa ste// khyod kyi pags pa 'jam zhing gser mdog 'dra// 'gro ba gzugs 'di lta bas joms mi 'gyur// khyod ni mtshungs pa ma mchis gzugs dang
426a5(dkon brtsegs): ldan// khyod sngon bskal pa brgyar ni dka' thub spyad// khyod gteng dul dang sbyin pa kun la dgyes// sems can kun la thugs rje byams thugs ldan// mchog tu thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod na
426a6(dkon brtsegs): sbyin dang tshul khrims rtag tu dgyes// khyed ni bzod dang brtson 'grus dgyes rab brtan// khyod ni bsam gtan shes rab bod gzi mnga'// mtshungs med ye shes mnga' la phyag 'tshal lo// khyod ni smra ba ngan pa'i
426a7(dkon brtsegs): tshogs can 'jom// khyod ni seng ge lta bur 'khor du sgrogs// khyed ni sman pa'i rgyal po dri gsum sel// mchog tu dga' mdzad phyongs phyag 'tshal lo// phub pa sku gsung thugs ni rnam par dag/ pad+ma chu ltar srid pa
426b1(dkon brtsegs): gsum mi gos// khyed ni tshangs dbyangs ka la bida'i sgra// srid gsum pha rol gshegs la byab 'tshal lo// khyod kyis 'gro 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang // bar la lha dang rmi lam 'dra ba dang // bdag med sems can med cing srog
426b2(dkon brtsegs): 'gro med// chos rnams smig rgyu chu bla 'dra bar mkhyen// stong bzhi pa skye ba med pa'i tshul// ma shes pas na 'gro ba 'a khyam thub te// thugs rjes thabs tshul rigs pa brgya dag gis// de dag rnams ni 'dzud par mdzad
426b3(dkon brtsegs): ba lags// 'dod chags la sogs nad mang brgya dag gis// skrag par gyur pa'i 'gro la rtag gzigs te// bde gshegs sems can brgyad dag yongs 'grel cing // bla med sman pa lta bur rnam par rgyu// sgra dang na dang
426b4(dkon brtsegs): bachi dang mya ngan non// sdug dang bral dang smre sngags 'don pa brgyas// rtag tu na ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// thub pa thugs rjes yongs su 'grel cing rgyu// dud 'gro yi dgas dmyal ba'i 'azo rnams su// 'gro kun shing
426b5(dkon brtsegs): rta'i phang lo bzhin du 'khor// glen pa dmigs su ma mchis mgon ma mchis// de la lam gyi dam pa ston pa mdzad// gtso bo mtshungs pa med pas gang bstan pa// 'a phags lam de nyid gang dag sngon chad gyis// chos kyi dbang
426b6(dkon brtsegs): phyug 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// rgyal ba de dag rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// 'jam zhing mnyen pa yid du 'ong ba'i mchog/ tshangs las lhag par mchog tu dga' bgyid pa// dri za mi tsi lha yi bu mo mchog/ sgra de zil gyis mnan nas gsung
426b7(dkon brtsegs): ba mdzad// bden dang drang ba mi zad thabs tshul gyis// yongs sbyangs yon tan mtha' yas ldan pa'i gsung // de zos sems can khrag khrig phrag brgya dag/ theg pa gsum gyi zhi bar mchi bar bgyid// khyod la mchod pas lha
427a1(dkon brtsegs): yi bde ba yi// rnam pa mang dang de bzhin mi yis thob// mi yi bdag po 'gro la phan bgyid pa// phyug cing nor che 'byod pa chen por 'gyur// mtshungs med khyod la dad pa skyed pa ni// gling bzhi'i bdag
427a2(dkon brtsegs): po 'khor los sgyur ba mchog/ 'gro la dge ba bcu po kun 'byed pa// rin chen rab bamang bdun ldan thob par 'gyur// rgyal ba khyod la mchod pa bgyis pa ni// tshangs pa brgya byin 'jig rten bdag po dang // yongs su
427a3(dkon brtsegs): dga' ldan lha yi bdag po dang // gzhan 'phrul pa dang 'a thab bral rab dag 'a 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par sel mdzad pa// mnyam med khyod la mchod dang mthong ba dang // thos pa'ang de ltar 'bras bu mchis
427a4(dkon brtsegs): lags te// gnas mchog rga shi med pa thob par 'gyur// bcom ldag la ma la ma las shing 'am ma khyed pa// jig rten 'di ni ngan pa'i lam las zlog/ bcom ldan 'gro ba dag ni 'phags pa'i lam// bde bzhi brdul dang bral la bgod//
427a5(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams gter khyod bsod nams don gnyer ba'i// bsod nams bgyi ba rtag tu mi bas te// byang chub dmapa 'thob bar du ni// bskal pa bye ba mang por bas mi 'gyur// gzhan 'phrul 'dra ba rtag tu dga' bgyid pa// yongs su dge zhing mdzen
427a6(dkon brtsegs): pa thob par 'gyur// dam pa'i zhing du lus dang ngag yid kyis// sems can dag ni rnam par dag par 'gyur// rgyal ba mchod pa'i mi yis 'di la sogs// yon tan rnam pa du ma 'thob par 'gyur// mtho ris thar pa mi yi bde ba dang //
427a7(dkon brtsegs): 'gro ba kun gyi bsod nams gter thob 'gyur// khyod kyi brjod dang grags pa rgya chen po// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing mang brgyar yang mchis// rgyal ba khyod kyi bsngags pa'i 'phreng ba ni// bde bar gshegs rnams 'khor du rtag
427b1(dkon brtsegs): bar sgrogs// rims nang bral zhing 'thob par mdzad pa// mthong na dga' ba thugs rje mchog ldan pa// bcom ldan dbang po ni pazhi gyes pa// mi mchog dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// bdag gis rgyal ba khyod kyis bsung
427b2(dkon brtsegs): thos nas// mngon par shes pa lnga thob mkha' la gnas// dpa' bo bde gshegs mtshungs par bdag gyur te// dri med chos ni krol rnam par dbye// lha dang mi dang klus mnod bde bar gshegs// yon tan
427b3(dkon brtsegs): kun gyi mthar byin deng bstod pas// bsod nams rgya chen gang bsgrubs gyur pa 'dis// 'gro ba sangs rgyas go par thob par she/ yul 'khor skyong de nas mtshan mo de'i rnams langs
427b4(dkon brtsegs): ba dang // rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis gzhon nu'i bud med kyi 'khor rdo ba'i sgra thos so// thos nas kyang myang bsu pa nges pa'i gzugs kyi grong khyer dga' mchog ga la ba der song ste phyin nas 'di skad ces
427b5(dkon brtsegs): smras so// khyed ci'i phyir du// de dag gis smras pa/ rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer mi gda' ba'i skad du'o// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gzhon nu phyor shing bcad pa bstsal
427b6(dkon brtsegs): bltar sa la 'brel te langs nas ngu zhing grong khyer der lan steng du yongs su btsal to// yul 'khor skyong de nas zong khyer den grong khyer gyi lha gang yin pa des// rtul po byed zer ldan la 'di skad ces smras
427b7(dkon brtsegs): so / rgyal po chen po gzhon nu ni de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir shar phyogs legs su song ngo // yul ba khyer
428a1(dkon brtsegs): / stong de nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan mas la ba'i phyir btsun mo'i 'khor dang // srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dang lhan cig tu shar phyogs kyi phyogs chag la ba'o
428a2(dkon brtsegs): song ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas don grub blo ga la ba der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs
428a3(dkon brtsegs): gcig tu 'dug nas rgyal po 'od zer ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pas mngon par bstod pa/ srid gsum khyod mtshungs ma mchis lhag pa ga la mchis// sems can dam pa lha dbang lha min rgyal pos
428a4(dkon brtsegs): bkur skye bo khyod kyi gzugs la lta bas ngoms mi 'gyur// yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rgyal ba khyed sku sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan rabadag/ lhun po rin chen mchog gis spras ltar yongs su dag/
428a5(dkon brtsegs): rgyal ba sdug cing 'jam pa gser gyi kha dog 'dra// blta sdug gzugs mngab thub pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal lo// bskal pa bye brgya bsam gyis mi khyab brtul zhugs spyod// bskal pa bye ba brgya mang sangs rgyas bsti stang
428a6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad sngon chad mchod sbyin brgya phrag bsam gyis mi khyab mdzad// des na khyod sku bzang zhing shin tu mdzes pa lags// sbyin dang tshul khrims de bzhin ting 'dzin shes rab dang // bzod dang brtson 'grus pasam
428a7(dkon brtsegs): gtan thabs kyis khyod gzugs sbyangs// khyod kyi spyan sngar brgya byin tshangs 'od gsal ma lags// chu shel nor bu glog gi bod kyang mdzes ma lags// 'gro ba'i don du yid du 'chi ba'i gzugs kyang ston//
428b1(dkon brtsegs): chu thubadra zhing sgyu ma 'dra bar gda' ba lags// ring gi phyogs rnams kun tu rgyal ba'i sku yang gdag// bde gshegs rnams kyi sku yi tshad ni gdab ma lags// khyod ni dag ba ldan gas zhig na yang bzhugs par gang la/
428b2(dkon brtsegs): 'chi pho mdzad cing rab dga' glang por gyur nas ni// dpa' bo yum gyi lhums su gshegs par gda' ba mdzad// thub chen nam mkha' lta bur thams cad rjes su zhugs// bcom ldan phyogs 'gar bsdam par
428b3(dkon brtsegs): ston pa'ang mdzad pa ste// sa 'ga' dag tu gom pa bdun por gda' ba mdzod// nga ni lha mir bcas 'gro nang gtso shin tu lha// 'gro ba sdug bsngal mtsho las gdon ces gsung yang byung // thub khyod chos gang la yang
428b4(dkon brtsegs): tsom mi mnga' yang // yi ge shes pa slob ltar 'jig rten dag na gda'// bsam gtan ting 'dzin spyod yul zhi ba brnyes gyur kyang // kha cig tu ni bud med nang na bzhugs par gdag// yab dang yum dang sa dang bud med rnam/
428b5(dkon brtsegs): kyang btang // gnyen rnams mya ngan non te rnam par brgyal zhing du// sems can dam pa bye ba brgya lngas yongs bskod nas// nags gnas pan ga cig sus 'byung bar gda' ba'ang mdzad// khyod ni bdud bzhi pham par
428b6(dkon brtsegs): mdzad nas yun ring yang // zhing na bdud 'dul ba yang gdab ba ston pa mdzad// sngon chad 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab bskor gyur kyang // khyod ni thugs rjes 'khor lo bskor bar gda' ba mdzad// rtag tu rtag ljang du
428b7(dkon brtsegs): shes ldan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// mya ngan bzla zhes 'khor gyi nang du tshig tu gsungs// rtag tu 'khor bar dga' ba'i 'gro ba gzigs nas ni// khyod ni zhi ba bsil 'gyur mya ngan 'das pa gsang // khyod kyi
429a1(dkon brtsegs): bsod nams ye shes shes rab thabs mtshungs med// thub pa khyod su 'od kyis zhing mang rgyas par bgengs// phyogs rnams dag na 'dren pa khyed kyi bsngags pa gsungs// kun tu
429a2(dkon brtsegs): spyod yul thub pa'i rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// chos nyid ma lus brnyes par gyur la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can kun gyi bgyi bar sgyu ma ltar gda' yang // thub pa khyod ni gang du bzhun pa'am byon ma lags/
429a3(dkon brtsegs): sgyu ma'i chos tshul gnas la mngon par phyag 'tshal lo// 'gro ba'i don du gang gis byang chub mchog thob pa// lam mchog mi yi dpa' bo khyod legs gsung // bdag gis chos nyid 'di ni myur du sangs rgyas nas/
429a4(dkon brtsegs): mi dpa' 'gro ba'i don du chos nyid bshad par bgyi// mi yi dpa' bo thub pa kun mkhyen rims bral ba// srid gsum mtshungs pa ma mchis lhag pa ga la zhig/ bdag gis 'dir bstod bsod nams mtha' yas gang
429a5(dkon brtsegs): bsgrubs des// 'jig rten byang chub bla med zhi mchog thob par shog/ yul 'khor skyong de nas de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo des// rgyal po 'od zer ldan de'i lhag pa'i bsam pa mkhyen nas/
429a6(dkon brtsegs): ci nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan to// yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
429a7(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa don grub blo la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sang bdag gi grong khyer du gdugs tshod gsol bar gnang bar mdzad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod
429b1(dkon brtsegs): nams kyi 'od zer la thugs brtse bar dgongs te cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis/ pha mde gnyis dang / grogs po
429b2(dkon brtsegs): de dag dang / bud med de dag la smras pa/ khyed cag thams cad rjes su yi rang bar gyis shig/ ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan te ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la dbul du rung bar gyis shig/ de dag gis sgra
429b3(dkon brtsegs): skad gcig tu rjes su yi nang ngo // yul 'khor skyong de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer gyis ci nas grong khyer dga' mchog brgyan de ma chags par de bzhin gshegs pa la phul lo// ro bro ba bkod pa
429b4(dkon brtsegs): lnga brgya pa'i zhal zas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa de la gsol to// dge slong de dag thams cad kyi phyir rin po che sna bdun gyis g.yogs pa'i gtsug lag khang nor bu'i 'chags
429b5(dkon brtsegs): bshams pa/ steng du rin po che'i dra ba'i bla re bres pa/ g.yas g.yon du me tog ci shing ljon pa legs par yongs su grub par byas pa/ me tog pad+ma dkar po'i rdzing gis mdzes par byas pa/ ras bcos su mu gnyis drim
429b6(dkon brtsegs): med pa brgya stong bting ba'i mal bshams pa/ dge slong re re la gos kha na ma tho ba med pa gang yin pa de phyi nyin mi sbyin gyi/ nyin gcig bzhin gos gzhan dang gzhan sbyin par 'gyur ba byas so// de lo bye ba phrag gsum gyi
429b7(dkon brtsegs): bar du rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur/ bdag la dga' ba ma byas/ sangs rgyas la mchod pa'i phyir gzhan yid 'am byas so// bar skabs der 'dod pa la rnam par rtog pa dang / gnod sems kyi rnam par rtog pa dang /
430a1(dkon brtsegs): 'tshe ba'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par rtog par ma gyur/ rgyal srid la sred par ma gyur te/ lus dang srog la'ang mi ldan/ dngos po gzhan dgal lta smos kyang ci dgos/ bar skabs der bcom ldan
430a2(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis gang gsungs pa de thams cad kun tu bzung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de la lan gnyis su ma zhus so// bar skabs der khrus ma byas/ mar dang 'bru mar gyis lus ma bskus/ rkang pa ma bskus/ ngal
430a3(dkon brtsegs): ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed do// phan za ba dang bshang gci byed pa ma gtogs par nam yang 'dug par ma gyur to// gang gi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i tshe/ tsan dan dmar po'i/ zhugs la/
430a4(dkon brtsegs): zhen pa byas so// gang du de bzhin gshegs pa de zhugs la zhen pa'i sa phyogs de nyid du/ 'dzam bu gling thams cad pa'i me tog thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang / spros thams cad dang / rol mo'i sgra thams
430a5(dkon brtsegs): cad kyis le brgya stong du ring bsrel la mchod pa byas par gyur pa nas/ rgyu rkyen thams cad sogs te phyis mchod rten bye ba phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du byas so// mchod rten de dag la'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi rin po che'i/
430a6(dkon brtsegs): dra bas g.yogs so// mu tig gi dra ba'i bla re dag bres so// mchod rten re re la'ang rin po che sna bdun gyi gdugs lnga brgya lnga brgya phul lo// mchod rten thams cad la'ang sil snyan brgya stong phul lo// 'jam bu'i gling /
430a7(dkon brtsegs): khar yug tu me tog gi shing ldan pa bskrun to// mchod rten re re la'ang mar me'i rdza be brgya stong las mar me zas so// mar me'i rdza bo re re nas kyang spos kyi 'bru mar drug cu rtsa bzhi pa stong gis mar me bus so//
430b1(dkon brtsegs): spos dang / 'greng ba dang / byug pa thams cad kyis kyang mchod pa byas so// tshul de lta bu'i le bye ba'i bar du mchod pa byas te phyis rab tu phyung ngo // des rab tu byung nas kyang chos gos gsum par gyu sing rtag tu
430b2(dkon brtsegs): bsod snyoms spyod pa dang / rtag tu cog pu pa ste/ nam yang blos ma phab bo// nam yang rmugs pa dang gnyid kyis non par ma gyur to// de zang zing med pa'i sems kyis lo bye ba zag bzhi'i bar du chos kyi sbyin pa/
430b3(dkon brtsegs): byin te/ des gzhan la za na legs so zhes bya ba tsam la'ang re bar ma gyur na/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti lta smos kyang ci dgos/ de chos mnyan pa'am chos bshad pas kyang ngal bar ma gyur to// de la lha rnams kyang
430b4(dkon brtsegs): bsnyen bkur byed do// yul gyi mi thams cad dang / btsun mo'i 'khor dang / nang mi thams cad dang / grogs po thams cad kyang de'i rjes su bslabs te rab tu byung ngo // yul 'khor skyong de
430b5(dkon brtsegs): nas gnas gtsang mi'i ros kyi lha'i bu rnams 'di snyam du sems te/ bsod nams kyi bod zer gyi rjes su slob cing / yul mi thams cad rab tu byung gis/ bad kr-i re la rime gro dang bsnyen bkur byas na
430b6(dkon brtsegs): dkon mchog gsam la rim gro byas par 'gyur ro snyam mo// de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / dam pa'i chos la bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi'i bar du gnas te/ dge slong bsod nams
430b7(dkon brtsegs): kyi bod zer gyis thams cad yongs sa bzung ngo // tshul 'de lta bus sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa bzhi la rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byas so// yul 'khor skyong de'i
431a1(dkon brtsegs): tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po 'od zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyed de ltar dogs shing the tsom za 'am yid gnyis su gyur na/ khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// ba'i phyir zhe na/
431a2(dkon brtsegs): de bzhin gshegs pa po dpag med de/ de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po bad zer ldan zhes bya bar gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhon nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin
431a3(dkon brtsegs): ba snyam du khyod de ltar dogs shing the tsom za 'am/ yid gnyis su gyur na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu gzhan nu bsod nams kyi 'od zer zhes bya bar gyur to// grong
431a4(dkon brtsegs): khyer gyi lha gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs par gyur to// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
431a5(dkon brtsegs): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pas bsgrub pa dang / sdug pa dang mi sdug pa yongs su spangs pa dang / bag yod pa spyod pas rgyal bu bsod nams kyi 'od zer de'i rjes su bslab par bya'o//
431a6(dkon brtsegs): ngas bya dka' ba mngon par 'du bya ba de lta bus bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// de lta bas na de dag mi brtson pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa lhur len pa dang /
431a7(dkon brtsegs): shes kyi khe mas pa dang / nga rgyal gyis bcom pa dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus nyon mongs shing sha thar ba dang / 'dod pa'i rgyus bstan pa las ring du gyur pa dang / rab tu byung ba don med pa dang / dge sbyong
431b1(dkon brtsegs): sman par byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam rgod dang / lus dang / ngag dung / sems mi drang ba dang / ltas lta ba dang / las 'che ba nor ba dang / rang gi dam bcas pa las nyams pa
431b2(dkon brtsegs): dang gos dang / zas dang / mal na dang / na ba'i ched kyi spyan dang / yo byad kyi mtshan ma la rmugs pa dang / ngon mi shes pa dang / zhal med pa dang / rog nyams pa
431b3(dkon brtsegs): dang / dam pa'i rlo ma yin pa la 'jug pa dang / spyod yul dang bral ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las ring du gyur pa dang / sangs rgya 'i khams padapa/ rdzogs pa'i byang chub
431b4(dkon brtsegs): kyi sems dang bral bar gyur te// yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na rnam pa 'di lta bu'i chos 'di thos nas/ sdig pa'i bshes gnyen rigs pa med pa don du gnyer ba dang mi sten par shes par bya'o//
431b5(dkon brtsegs): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs bcu mnga' ba'i spyod pa dpag med nas// snying ni 'thob dang shes kyi khe la song // byang chub yon
431b6(dkon brtsegs): tan brgyas khebs bor nas ni// de dag 'thob phyir gzhan gyi khyim la dga'// khri 'dra sdang ba khrel dang mos blo bral// shes kyi kha phyir bdud kyi dbang du song // nyon mongs rag las sred pa'i 'gro ba
431b7(dkon brtsegs): gzhol / bdag 'dir yon tan ldan zhes de skad smra// lus ni dkon na dran pa grong khyer ru// 'thob phyir de dag rnam par rtog pas spyod// gnam dang sa ltar thar las ring ba ste/
432a1(dkon brtsegs): de 'dra'i de dag sbrul ltar ring du spangs// de dag sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du// dge 'dun yon tan brgyas gang dga' ma yin// mtho ris bor nas ngan pa'i lam du song /
432a2(dkon brtsegs): sdug pas 'phongs nas srid pa'i 'gro bar 'khyams// nga yi spyod pa nye bar bstan pa 'di thos nas// yang dag lhag pa'i bsam pa'i sgrub pas 'di la sbyor// bskal pa bye ba mang pos rnyed dka' dal rnyed kyi/
432a3(dkon brtsegs): de ltar ji skad bstan pa'i chos nyid 'dir brtson gyis// gang zhig theg mchog byang chu ba dam pa tshang rgyar 'dod// de yis rgyal bu de yi yon tan dran par bya// bsam te yang dag ji bzhin tshul bzhin gnas
432a4(dkon brtsegs): par bya// de ltas bde gshegs rnams kyi byang chub chags med 'grub// yon tan 'di dag rtog pas 'phags pa'i rigs la brten// rang gis 'dir ni kun tu shes pa bskyed par bya/
432a5(dkon brtsegs): bstan pa yon tan snying po 'di 'dra ma spangs shig/ byis pa lta bur 'gro ba lngar ni 'khyams sa re// 'dir ni ri dang dgon pa phug tu gnas par bya// der gnas nas ni bdag mi bsnyems shing
432a6(dkon brtsegs): gzhan mi spad// sngon chad sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag mnyes ma byas// rjes su dran nas rtag par rgyun tu bdag la spyos// lus dang srog la sred pa ma chags spang bar bya// gus pa drag po bskyed
432a7(dkon brtsegs): nas chos la brtson par gyis// nga yi mdo 'dir bsgrubs pa bshad pa 'dir gnas na// de dag rnams kyis phyi nas byang chub rnyed mi dka'// gang dag rgyal ba'i theg pa 'di la dga' brtson pa// thos
432b1(dkon brtsegs): ngas phyir zhing yad ci 'jug par byaba'i rigs// da smra bas na bstan la mos pa bskyed par bya// rnam par rgyu mtshan gyis 'byed byu ra/ sbrul galang po nga chub sams
432b2(dkon brtsegs): pa 'gang cig yor tu phyin pa lnga la spyod lnga/ yang gang zhig dngag 'dril 'aslab bo// bdag sdom pa 'di la gnas par bya'o snyam du chos kyi rnam mangs 'di la nas pa gyis srung na/ bsod rnams
432b3(dkon brtsegs): kyi phung po de bsod nams kyi phung po 'di yin na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi chu dang / brgya stong gicha dang / bye brgya skyong gi cha dang / grangs dang / cha dang bzang ba dang
432b4(dkon brtsegs): dpedang / rgyur yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na sngon sems ma bskyed paro lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i skye dgu lhag
432b5(dkon brtsegs): ga gra gsum nu than med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las byang ma smrig par gyur to// dge slong bdun mye na lam
432b6(dkon brtsegs): ba med par theg pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ yul 'khor skyong gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam
432b7(dkon brtsegs): grangs 'di'i ming ci lags 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong pa 'di na ces paka' rgyam te
433a1(dkon brtsegs): yul 'khor skyong de lta bas na khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dam bcas pa don yod pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ skyes bu dam pa rnam par rol pa
433a2(dkon brtsegs): dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par nges pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ don yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan
433a3(dkon brtsegs): 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor stong dang / lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te
433a4(dkon brtsegs): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ yul
433a5(dkon brtsegs): 'khor skyong gis zhus pa'i le'u zhes bya ste/ 'dus pa bco brgyad pa rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po dza na mi tra dang / dA na shI la dang /
433a6(dkon brtsegs): mu na bar ma dang / zhu rkyen gyi le tsa ba ban d+hi ya~M shes sdes bsgyur cing zhusate/ sad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa shre ka bam po gsum dang /
433a7(dkon brtsegs): sh+lo ka brgya/ yang phyi mo dag pa gsum bltas nas phyi mo'i ched du zhus so//
